links_Review_Title: Great for a night out to the theatre
links_Review_Text: My husband and I spend NYE this year seeing a broadway show and this dress was perfect

links_Review_Title: Warning: Will make you feel sexy!
links_Review_Text: I ordered this dress for New Years Eve and I really loved it! I am 5'11 and it was a little short but I wore tights so I could get away with it. I am a 38 triple D and it fit nicely in the breast area. The material is stretchy and definitely fit me pretty tight but that is what I was wanting!
Love love loved this dress. SO comfortable while also flattering and flirty. The shoulders were fun and somewhat puffy. The length was perfect for my shorter height, short but not too short.
I liked the fit of the med and large. I sized up due to shortness of dress. Only problem was the top. Not something double sided tape couldn't fix. Overall loved this dress.
I wore this to a bachelorette party in Las Vegas. It was so comfortable and I got a ton of compliments. Would totally rent again!

I am DEEPLY obsessed with this dress! Being a bigger gal with a larger chest...I was nervous about the cut of the dress. I went with the medium and it made the girls look great! Granted I did have to periodically adjust the top. I usually wear an 8-10 in jeans and usually an 8 in dresses and the medium fit me snug but well. I love how flattering the cut and color of this dress is. I felt so gorgeous in this dress! Highly recommend!
Perfect fit, super flattering.
So comfortable and makes a statement without being over the top. The wrap front will slide around though so be careful to avoid any wardrobe malfunctions!

This dress was perfect for the wedding rehearsal dinner I wore it to. It is fitted, but very comfy and soft. It has the perfect amount of stretch and the velvet makes it very forgiving. I got so many compliments that I'm tempted to buy it! It's the perfect length for shorter women like me, but tights underneath would make it more comfortable for taller women I'm sure. Sleeves were also perfect length. Love love love!
Absolutely loved this dress for our Friendsgiving party! If you have a larger chest, be prepared to pin the front closed with a safety pin unless you want to wear a tank underneath.

links_Review_Title: Great fit, comfortable and looks amazing.
links_Review_Text: I wore this for a holiday party and it was perfect! I usually wear a S but went with the XS because I have a small busy. The dress has great stretch, is easy to put on and has a great flattering fit. I don't think the pictures do it justice!
Fit perfectly! Classy/fun winter party dress...the long sleeves balance the deep V & shorter length! I was able to wear a regular bra. Very comfortable to wear/dance!

links_Review_Title: Perfect color for a red head!
links_Review_Text: Fit perfectly, beautiful deep green color. Received many compliments.

The green Velvet was perfect for a Minnesota wedding. The material was stretchy, super comfortable and wasn't too tight anywhere. The simple rouching was very flattering and I easily danced all night long. Possibly one of my favorite rentals for sure.

I wore this to an event that was cocktail attire. It was very comfortable. The small was very tiny, but the medium was perfect. You can wear a regular bra which is great! Easy to move it! The front does slit open so you have to be careful with that! Got the most compliments! It is low cut but I used fashion tape and felt comfortable.

links_Review_Title: I was immediately drawn to the color of this dress and it was just as gorgeous in person.
links_Review_Text: I rented this dress for my Anniversary dinner. I loved how it fit, but the neckline showed a lot of cleavage (34/36 C). All in all, I loved this dress and I got a lot of compliments on it! The dress way also very easy to return with the pre-paid return label!

This dress was amazing for a winter wedding! The material is somewhat stretchy so I felt like I wasn't sucking it in all night! The only issue I had was the bust was a bit big so I used fashion tape but it didn't hold because of the fabric. The small fit well in the bust and I wouldn't have needed the fashion tape but my butt and legs were tight in the small.
Sexy and different for a night out! The material has a subtle snakeskin pattern that brings a little shine.

I was going to wear this dress but the style of the occasion changed, will probably choose for future! I am normally a L but ordered an XL so that it wasn't too bodycon and that was the right choice for me. It's a very flattering dress

I rented this dress for NYE this year and was very pleased. My midsection is my trouble area and I felt like this dress covered it well, without making me look bigger than I am. Additionally, the dress is a really unique color. It's not just standard velvet. The velvet has almost like an alligator print overlay, which I thought made it a little more special. Bigger chested gals, be warned. You will be exposed, so if you're uncomfortable with that, a safety pin did the trick for me. Would recommend!
Fits great, i have a larger chest and a bit of curves. For like a glove. Picked an XL usually a 10/12 dress.

Ordered a medium and large since I'm in between sizes. Tried on the large which fit great length-wise, wasn't so tight across the mid section, but the bust was just too big. Wore the medium and made due (kept pulling the front down as it would over time come up.
Super comfortable and flattering! Got lots of compliments on it. The color is beautiful and the length was just right. A bit too loose in the chest area so just be mindful

links_Review_Title: Perfect NYE dress!!! Lots of compliments!
links_Review_Text: I'm typically between a 2 and a 4, and the S fit like a glove! The chest area was a little big but nothing a safety pin can't fix. Super cute and comfy!

links_Review_Title: Love this dress! Fit great and true to size.
links_Review_Text: The dress fit me very well. It wasn't too tight but snug in all the right places. I paired it with tights as it was especially cold that night. I wore this to my husband's company work holiday party.

It definitely is a bit cleavagey for those with a larger bust, but if you are going to a party and want to show it off, this is the dress! It fit well around the waist, and was short. I personally love the ruffled sleeves, as it creates a more hourglass shape. If it is too short for you, you can pair easily with tights and heels. This would look very elegant for a more formal affair with your hair up, and long earrings with heels!

links_Review_Title: Showstopper velvet dress. Compliments all night long!
links_Review_Text: The XS fit very snug around my butt/hips, but fit perfectly in the chest area (B cup), so I went with the size Small to give me more room/comfort walking around and dancing at my work holiday party. I also paired it with black tights and booties to be more conservative with the short length. This is lower cut so prepare for cleavage, but it was tasteful on my chest size (larger busts might pop out, beware!). I felt beautiful in this dress and highly recommend! Order your regular size & 1 size up

Beautiful color, stretchy soft fabric, V neckline. Very beautiful dress. It wasn’t as flattering as I imagined, but still looked great. Had to pin the top closed to avoid a wardrobe malfunction, but not a big deal. Got a few compliments. Great value rental!

I'm 5'11, 160 pounds, with HELLA long legs and my hips are pretty wide. This dress hugged my curves perfectly. I got so many compliments on it and I honestly am considering buying this dress because I loved it so much.

This dress was probably my favorite rental so far! The color and fabric were gorgeous! I also loved the fit, but be aware, the dress is quite short! I also had to use dress tape on the top just to make sure it fit me properly. However, I received so many compliments and I felt so confident in this dress. I would highly recommend this!
It has some stretch so it's really comfortable. It's pretty low cut though so get so fashion tape.
So fun for a casino night event!
Stretchy, on the short side but perfect for a party, comfortable, on the cleavage it kept pulling down a little bit shoring the edge of my bra, wore a safety pin to fix that

My daughter wore this to a sweet 16. The velvet is thin so not stiff or hot. The draping looked beautiful on her! The color was so pretty with her red hair. i wish I could buy it! She will rent it again!!

This was not my favorite rental, but I still enjoyed wearing it. The neckline of the dress kept opening even wider to expose my bra, I am not well endowed in that area so this may not be an issue for others, but was for myself. I had to pay close attention to the wrap part of the dress as well, not to expose underwear with certain movements. Overall it was something different to wear being velvet and I still enjoyed it and received compliments throughout the night.
I wore this for my birthday and it looked sooo amazing! It's super short but super warm! I paired it with thigh high boots and didn't need a coat during the late fall in the Midwest.
I wore this dress to a sorority formal, I got so many compliments! It was very comfortable and I could wear a regular bra which is a huge plus. I'm 5'9" so it was a bit short but definitely worth it.

links_Review_Title: Sexy moment for a fall wedding!
links_Review_Text: Felt sexy and fun in this pretty dark green dress. Looked great with shapewear :) my mom said I looked like a blond Kardashian! I'll take it.
Wore this for a fall wedding and got a bunch of compliments on it! I'd say it runs just a little small. I'm usually a Medium, but I'm glad that I sized up.

links_Review_Title: This dress was so comfortable to dance in!
links_Review_Text: The thicker material and long sleeves made it perfect for a fall/winter wedding. I got so many compliments on this dress! The front is definitely low it though, so a safety pin is recommended!

Wore this dress to the opera and loved every moment. It was comfortable and the straps covered my bra which was a huge plus. The ruffles are asymmetric which I didn't realize when I rented, but it made the dress less precious and more sophisticated. I would definitely rent again
It feels a little tight in the chest area but overall it's such a cute dress! Wearing this out to a pre-valentines day dinner with my bf!

links_Review_Title: Photos don't do this dress justice!
links_Review_Text: This is a stunning dress! The photos online and that I took do not do this dress justice. I had favorited it before renting, but was on the fence until I saw it in the store. The material is really beautiful and eye catching - I got tons of compliments! It's a unique shape and really fun/perfect for any evening event.
Didn’t try on size 2 as the 0 barely fit, a little loose up top. Beautiful, super comfortable.
Besides being too tight in the busy, fit perfect. I didn't wear it because my boobs were so smashed (33" chest measurement). Velvet material and sparkly silver were cute details.

I didn't actually wear this out because I ended up wearing a red dress I rented since it was Valentine's Day. Made me sad I didn't have any wear to wear this! The velvet flower overlay is very pretty. The asymmetrical skirt is fun. The v neck is very flattering. Going to keep this in mind to rent if I have another occasion for a fancy dress coming up.

links_Review_Title: Very comfortable and easy to wear
links_Review_Text: Fits well.It’s a little long (I am 5’6”) and on the conservative side. The colors and fabric are beautiful.

links_Review_Title: Pretty dress, just not for me.
links_Review_Text: This dress would be great for a winter event, but the fit was weird on me. It was loose in the bust, but the waist was tight. If you have a bigger bust and a smaller waist, this would probably work really well. I also have a very short waist, and it emphasized that.
Loved it.
I wish I had taken better pictures while wearing the dress. I am a size 4 to 6 so I ordered both and ended up wearing the 4. I am a 34C cup and I was able to wear a regular bra with the dress.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress, runs large and you need a small waist
links_Review_Text: This dress looked beautiful on the model. I'm usually a size 4 but this dress gaped over the chest area and because of the band around the waist, made me look a lot bigger than I am. I'd probably have ordered a size 2 to see how that fits and I'm sure that size would've been more flattering.
the skirt was too long. Just too much fabric in general for a shorter person.
Slightly snug in busy and shoulders I am 4/6, I went with the 4, but may try again with a 6. Very nice
Such a beautiful feminine dress. There isn't a lot of stretch so size accordingly. I'm 135lbs, size 27 jean and xs on top and the 0 fit like a glove. The arms are a little tight FYI.

I rented for a date but ended up wearing to work because the pussy now provided enough coverage on the chest. It's a bit tight in the chest and ribs but otherwise a great fit. Comfortable in february with tights and a jacket, but could totally be worn in warmer months as well as it's a floaty material. It flows beautifully when you walk as well.

links_Review_Title: Cute but small in the chest
links_Review_Text: This dress was so cute and trendy. The only problem I had was the bust. I'm a DD and this dress is for someone with a smaller chest. Also if you reach forward there was no give or stretch from the back, so it was tight. None the less I wore it all day and made it work. Very cute. True to size in the waist.
This dress was so gorgeous. I loved the wide, fluttering bell sleeves and the asymmetrical drape of the skirt. This might be one of those dresses that works better for tall girls.
I liked the style and pattern but the fit was terrible. It ran so small in the top getting it off and on was impossible. Definitely don't recommend if you are busty at all.

It runs a little small but still works. If you are like me and have broad shoulders, I might consider sizing up, especially if your arms are on the larger size. Love the bow at the neck and the fabric is cool and comfortable.

links_Review_Title: This dress allowed me to celebrate my birthday in style.
links_Review_Text: It fitted perfectly in all the right places.
Excellent fit, cheerful color, perfect for work in the summer. (It's so cold inside and so warm outdoors!) Perfect length and lined. Loved the tie at the neck. This is a dress I'd consider buying!
Looked and felt great on. Light and comfortable for work

links_Review_Title: Beautiful Dress!! Extremely tight in the arms.
links_Review_Text: The dress was perfectly fitted in the body but WOW the arms were tight. If you have bigger arms like me I would try to size up and see if it's a better fit; it took some help from another person to pull the dress off. I received a ton of compliments. Perfect dress for a wedding if you're a dancer land like a little more movement in the bottom of the dress.

Amazing dress, received so many compliments every time I wore it. Such a unique pattern and cut. Just wish the chest wasn't so low cut, the bow definitely comes in handy covering up to make the dress work appropriate. Wore out for a dinner and drinks as well in nyc with fun heels and jewelry. Very versatile piece.

This fit me a little tight in the shoulders and arms, but it wasn't unmanageable. I wouldn't recommend this for anyone with a wide chest - I'm a 32C and it fit well. Deep V that I covered strategically with the tie for work. Good day to night transition dress.
Wore this in San Francisco at the beginning of spring. Perfect with sandals or with booties, by itself or with a leather jacket. Highly recommend!

I like this dress, but it did not end up making it out of my (very messy) closet, as the photos show. It just came off a little too "bumblebee" on me. The color contrast was just too much. Ended up wearing a different RTR dress. It is very comfortable, flowy, nice lining, good length, fit true to size. I could definitely say it would be good for a long day or evening of wear.
Wayyyyy too low cut. Oddly tight in the arms and chest. Accentuated my hips. Just nope.

I absolutely love this dress, however I had to order it twice to get the correct size. The dress runs small so size up. I love the way the dress hugs the curves. I received a lot of compliments for this dress :)

This dress is very flattering and an attention grabber. The only part I did not love was the deep plunge with the high neck tie. I found the best look was tied to the side of the neck and just a half knot. It you tie a knot the fabric is too heavy and flops a bit.

Love this dress so much, think I'm going to keep it a while! Does run small in the chest but fits perfectly everywhere else. Super cool asymmetric cut at the bottom makes it move and drape beautifully. Dressed it down for a rainy day with my Freebirds and some sheer socks... Felt super comfy and low maintenance. Rent this dress!

My arms wound up being fine - I was worried based on others reviews. But this dress is SUPER small in the bust. If you have a larger chest order up. Unfortunately for me I was already trying the largest size. It is beautiful so I'm sad I couldn't wear it.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress, but decolletage not appropriate for most offices. Great for an evening out.
links_Review_Text: The body of the dress fit perfectly, buy I have an athletic build and it was a tiny bit tight across my back and biceps. I was going to wear it anyway because it didn't look tight or ill-fitting, it just felt that way to me. Then I realized that the decolletage was too much for work. I thought it was ok bc I am only a 32B, but my husband said that all of the men in the office would be distracted. He loved it of course! If your chest was any bigger, I think it would have been a lot of cleavage. The picture doesn't show it because it is under a scarf. I also thought that I could hide it for the day with the scarf, but I couldn't risk it so I ended up not wearing it. That's too bad because I thought it fit beautifully otherwise.

The top is slightly gaping (if you have a flat chest), slightly too much for work. It would have been fine with a black camisole beneath it but as I was traveling for work and hadn't tried it on before I left I wore it without one (and felt slightly self-conscious all day!).

links_Review_Title: Beautiful pattern. Interesting sleeves. Very low V neck...the tie is helpful to make it a bit modest
links_Review_Text: Fitting dress. Tighter sleeves. VERY low neck line...tie makes it a bit more modest. I flux between an 8 and 10. I wore an 8 with spanx. Beautiful pattern and nice hemline.

links_Review_Title: Not okay for work but cute
links_Review_Text: This is not work appropriate without an undershirt. I tried to pin it but there wasn't enough fabric. Otherwise cut for lunch.
Veryyyy small. Arms are super tight and it was hard to get on. This is my regular size and it was nothing close to it.

Compliments all day long, brightened the day for me and my colleagues. Was afraid it would be too much dress for my petite frame but not so! Next time I rent I will try a size down. Only wore it once though - I could tell it was dry cleaned but still this dress had a scent. RTR, go the costumer route and include pit pads! :) Otherwise, simply fabulous, flattering dress.
Wore this dress for a work conference. It was perfect because it didn't wrinkle in my bag and when on, it fit like a glove. Beautiful neckline, sleeves and hem. Would definitely rent again!
Perfect fit.
Lower cut in the chest than expected. Sash adds coverage but not completely. Great dress though.
This dress was a bit snug in the bust and neckline was low but attached bow allowed me to get creative to provide enough coverage.
The arms are a bit tight. Overall I think there is a little too much going on with the pattern+ extra frabric on the sleeves being said I received a ton of compliments on it everywhere I wore it!

Very disappointed I couldn't wear this dress . It fit perfectly everywhere but the arms! Wayyyy to right and I was afraid I may rip it so I didn't wear it. Size up. It be aware that the body of the dress may be too big

links_Review_Title: Love the colors and neck tie.
links_Review_Text: Really fun, beautiful dress. A little too low cut though.

links_Review_Title: Love the Style But Way Too Small
links_Review_Text: This dress was so small I couldn't fit my shoulder through- I didn't have a back-up size didn't end up wearing it as I couldn't get it on! If you plan on renting, be sure to size up!
Great fit. Professional but sexy.

links_Review_Title: Snug in the arms and chest area. Couldn't wear
links_Review_Text: Order a size larger and it night fit
I loved the style, but my arms were too tight. I was afraid to zip the side zipper. I unfortunately have to send back without wearing.

links_Review_Title: I did have much rooms for my arms. I found once unzipped it was hard to even get on.
links_Review_Text: As above Did not fit my boobs well either

The reviews were spot on for this dress. The top size for the style is 14R but it felt smaller than that. I'm 5'7", 180lbs, 36DD wearing 12/14 in Banana Republic/JCrew. This dress was tight across my bust. Also, as several reviewers had commented, the sleeves were really tight. I was not going to be comfortable in the selection and chose to not wear it. Such a shame though, I loved the pop of yellow.
lady-like with a pop of coral for good measure. smartly tacked at the bust to keep the girls in. great flow and gorgeous silk fabric in a fun floral and stripes mixed-print.
I liked this a lot. Very punchy color and a dress with good flow. A little too low cut for work so I added a cami under.
This is definitely my favorite rented item so far. It's such nice flowy material. Beautiful dress.

A great dress. Loved the fabric, the color and the fit. Faux wrap style is great because you get the look without having fabric pulling or worried about the neckline slipping and revealing too much. Received so many compliments. Very versatile can be dressed up or down.

Might run slightly large or just stretched out in chest area. I had to tie very tight to make sure I wasn't revealing too much but otherwise a beautiful dress. Flowy and perfect fabric for a warm summer night

links_Review_Title: Rent this if you want nonstop compliments
links_Review_Text: I rented this for a semi formal wedding reception. It was perfect!! I got so many compliments. I am 5'4" and it fit perfectly even with some flat sandals. I am pretty busty but found the little string holding the dress in place was perfect and fit me perfectly!!
Very comfortable and flowing. Got many compliments on the dress!
This dress was pretty but too low cut for me

links_Review_Title: Perfect for a day in the park
links_Review_Text: I wore this to a friend's birthday in Central Park. It was perfect and got so many compliments! Because it was an adult party, I didn't mind the extra cleavage. Although, my bra was definitely showing in some pictures. (Fortunately it was red, and looked like it was on purpose.) If you're renting for a more formal affair or trying to keep it a bit more conservative, be prepared with a safety pin.

First of all, this service is amazing. I wore this dress to a friends wedding which was indoor/outdoor. It was so easy to move in and I didn't have to adjust anything all night. It was pretty and comfortable, and I got a lot of compliments on it!

links_Review_Title: Great versatile and comfortable summer dress!
links_Review_Text: This dress was super comfortable. I ordered a 16 but could probably have worn a 14. Neckline is not too plunging which is good - I wore it with a regular bra. Wore to work but could also see wearing this to a party or summer casual wedding. Will be renting again!

Lightweight fabric, beautiful coral pink color, breezy and flowy when the wind hits it, nice coverage of upper arms and belly area. Wore it once to work and once to a mother's day brunch. Would rent again.

I loved this dress! It was perfect for the tea party I went to. The original size I ordered (16) fit fine but was snug at the hips since I'm pear shape. So I wore the back up size (18). I got so many compliments. I would definitely rent this again.

I loved this dress. It highlighted my curves but felt very comfortable, and the fabric is beautiful. I did have to pin the top to make sure it stayed closed, and in general I think it's designed for someone with a longer torso than mine. But it's a beautiful, lightweight, eye-catching dress. Will rent again!

links_Review_Title: Love Tanya Taylor dresses so much
links_Review_Text: For me, this dress has extra room in the chest. The sleeve is more of a circular cut so not fitted, which in my opinion makes it more casual and not as formal. It's a pretty dress, the fabric is light and provides nice coverage if you want to cover arms. It's really fitting for a bridal/ baby shower during the day.

The color was unique. Not red, not pink. Maybe watermelon? Fit well but the little string that holds the top together busted open in the middle of dinner and I had to pin it. Would fit a smaller chested woman better but I made it work. No stretch in material so size up for a back up.

I wore this dress for Easter Sunday and LOVED it! It runs large. I ordered the 16 as part of my unlimited closet and could have easily worn the 14. It was breezy and easy to wear. The length was perfect. It hit me mid calf. I'm 5'7". I'd order again but would Size down. LOVE this dress!

I'm typically a size 4 in most brands but opted to go with the backup size in a 2 for a more fitted look. The dress is beautiful in person and photographed really well. The fabric has a really nice drape and feels weightless. This would be the perfect summer wedding guest dress, it's airy and elegant and not at all clingy. Loved this rental.
Would rent again!
I am normally a size 6, but I wore the size 4 and it was perfect.
Very low cut so I wore cami under it

Loved the pattern and fit of this beautiful dress! The length was perfect too! My only issue was that I was worried about the wrap top because I'm slightly busty so I used a piece of fashion tape to make sure it would stay closed. Highly recommend!
Wore to Dear Evan Hansen. Got compliments at HH and the show.
Perfect summer dress. Wore to the office and got tons of compliments. Would rent again!
So flattering!!
Super wearable and versatile - I wore this to work, to hear Margaret Atwood speak, and to Tea on Fire Island. It fits so beautifully.
Comfortable and flattering. Can be worn anywhere
I've rented this one before and I still love it so much! Beautiful fabric, great fit.
Great dress! Color, weight, cut and movement. Very feminine and flattering. Looking forward to renting again.
This dress is so pretty worn with white kicks - multiple compliments

It was a nice dress to wear to work. Nothing impressive, so I don't think I would rent it again. I wore a size 2 and it felt a little loose in the waist but I'm not sure a smaller size would have covered my chest. The 2 was fine straight on but when I moved, there was some small bra showage.

Super light. Perfect material for summer. If you're going to be wearing spanx make sure the color is nude or wear a nude slip. Tried it on with my black spanx and I could somewhat see them. They didn't have my size (14/16) so I went up two sizes. The dress was too big but I just tied the waist really tight and it looked fine!
The v-neck is pretty revealing, but I used fashion tape to make it work-appropriate. The color is great for summer and the fit is true to size.

links_Review_Title: I didn't end up wearing the dress
links_Review_Text: It was a beautiful dress but the top was very large on my frame. The stitching around the butt is weird and made my butt stick out

links_Review_Title: Pretty pattern and flowy, but didn't fit right
links_Review_Text: This was a pretty dress, but I would've needed it to be tailored to fit properly. It was a little big on top.

links_Review_Title: Received lots of compliments because it can be flattering to fit your body type.
links_Review_Text: Fits perfectly
Flattering, breezy dress that is so comfortable

Loved the color! I thought the dress was super pretty, in a school teacher-ish way. I didn't get any compliments, and I normally do for the RTR dresses I try. That's not a deal breaker though. I thought it was office appropriate, not too dressy and not too casual. I wore it with flat brown sandals, but you could definitely doll this up with some nude heeled sandals.

links_Review_Title: I felt comfortable confident and sexy!
links_Review_Text: Comfortable and true to size

I don't typically like wrap dresses, but this dress was perfect! It is light, flows beautifully, and fits well. I wore it to work, so there was enough coverage in the front, and it was not too sheer. The color is stunning, and I loved the length for my 5'4 height, which still fit as a t-length. I received tons of compliments and will likely rent again! It truly fits just like in the model photo.
This is a cute top, def on the smaller side so requires high waisted pants unless you're ready to show off a bunch of stomach. Light material
Super fun dress! Fits like a glove and definitely sparkles galore. Just be careful sometimes the arm gets stuck to the side because of the sequins.

links_Review_Title: Dress was a showstopper! I received so many compliments!!!
links_Review_Text: I loved the dress! I am in between sizes at the moment so I went with the 8 but all in all the fit was great. The sequins on the arm did like to snag with the body of the dress but it wasn't terribly bad!

links_Review_Title: This was for my 50th birthday Feb 15th I received so many Compliments I felt so sexy in this dress
links_Review_Text: I'm normally a medium or large depending on the cut of clothes because of my hips. Lol but this size 8 felt good it wasn't too tight or big I was comfortable. I highly recommend this dress for your occasion

Runs slightly large. It's comfortable to wear and dance in all night! Wore sticky bra with sheer black tights and black heels. Dress really stands out and would be appropriate for a lot of different events!

links_Review_Title: Everyone loves the shiny! (But tight in the arm)
links_Review_Text: This was really pretty/shiny and went well with my dark also-shiny cape. It was *extremely* easy for the sequin netting to get tangled in things (hair, other sequin strings) and the one arm was very tight. I don't have huge arms; it really seemed unreasonably tight. You might want to size up specifically because of that.
This dress fit great and if really stands out! I received a ton of compliments. Sequin kept getting caught making it somewhat challenging. Good length for both a black tie formal event and cocktail!

Rented for NYE. I'm 34b & sz 6 w curvy hips and butt; both 6 & 4 were fine but I went w/ the tighter size 4 for more fitted look & used a pair of spanx. Typical sequin dress issues - sequins can snag on smallest thing, it didn't fit me like "like a glove "- a little rumpled in some areas- & the side without the sleeve didn't hold up as well as snugly as side with sleeve. All that in mind, for a several hour party, it was the perfect NYE party dress & a unique look from other sequin dresses

A sequined beauty! I knew when I saw this dress that I would love it. It fit really well and the sequins were perfect. Love the ombré look at the bottom. The one shoulder is cute. Definitely rent this one!

links_Review_Title: Show stopper at NYE black tie wedding
links_Review_Text: I absolutely loved this dress! I felt like a million bucks and got lots of compliments throughout the night. It was comfortable and easy to dance/move/sit in. The sequins are held on by what feels like fishing line basically. There were a handful of times that a sequin under my arm would get snagged on a loose loop of the fishing line on the side of the dress, and I had to untangle myself. Small inconvenience, but totally worth it to feel that fabulous!

I noticed this was a knit so decided to size down, which worked out perfectly (even with my 32DDD). It's definitely comfortable for a cocktail dress so if you're looking to sparkle this is a solid choice.

links_Review_Title: Nice fit for a holiday party!
links_Review_Text: This worked perfectly for a company holiday party that was disco themed. It fit true to size and fit me more midi length since I'm 5'1" but worked well!

Rented this glamorous dress for my formal company holiday party. It's completely amazing! Got so many compliments all night! I'm usually a size 2, sometimes 4. The 2 fit me almost perfectly, but was a little loose in my waist — I probably could have gotten away with a size 0, although it may not have zipped over my boobs (I'm a 34C and the size 2 was perfect around that area). Length was great for me too, I'm 5'3" and wore a 2R. Overall, loved this dress and would definitely rent again!
I can't say enough good things about this dream. It was easy to wear and a true head-turner. Enjoy your spotlight, ladies.

links_Review_Title: Normally I wear a size 4 in her other dresses but this was too lose around the bust.
links_Review_Text: Sequins are gorgeous and the dress is sassy. I would recommend shape wear to keep everything tight. I rented a 4 because that's my normal size for this designer but the bust was huge and looked baggy - normally not a problem as a 32DD. Overall just an awkward fit so I wore something else.

links_Review_Title: A bit bigger in the hip area than expected but great from certain angles!
links_Review_Text: I rented this for a black tie event where I knew lots of folks would be dressed in cocktail attire. The dress is a bit hard to zip up as sequins get in the way. Overall beautiful but a bit too big for me in the hip/butt area. I am typically a 2-4 and this was the size 2, so I didn't actually wind up wearing. I think I'd rent it again, it just didn't work for this occasion where I decided to wear a floor length gown.
I had so much fun in it I didn't get a picture. ;) The gold is very bright yellow but still looked nice. I usually have issues with one shoulders gaping at the chest but no problems here!
I did not wear this as it was not long enough in the torso....if you're tall like me at 5'i order the long so the fit is right. Overall pretty dress and true to size.
Gorgeous dress! Definitely a show stopper. Unfortunately, it did not fit me it runs small; especially in the chest/breast area.

links_Review_Title: Very gold ! More yellow gold than the photo.
links_Review_Text: Very gold ! More yellow gold than the photo. Runs smaller than their normal line. Smaller in abdomen and bust.

Every review said this ran large so I sized up. I am normally a size 4/6 leaning on the 6 side so I opted for a large (size up) based on reviews. I had to do some major doctoring to Bobby pin the top up so I didn't fall out. The hips fit well but I could have done a medium. Overall cute outfit but odd sizing. Heavy material. I think probably actually fits true to size???
Rented for a wedding it was a super fun spring pick but like other reviews say the torso/ribs are run really small.

links_Review_Title: I really thought this was cute but it doesn’t fit. It’s too small on me and can’t be zipped up:(
links_Review_Text: I’m sad this didn’t fit right. I now don’t have an outfit for a baby shower because it doesn’t fit.

I wore this for my birthday this year and loved everything about it! Because of my height, I usually have trouble finding jumpers/rompers that work for me but this was comfortable and flattering. Plus who doesn't love these fun colors?!

links_Review_Title: Tight Around Hips. Tight when you eat.
links_Review_Text: Loved the idea of this jumpsuit and really tried to wear it, but the jumpsuit became too uncomfortable after I ate. Beware if you have wide hips/thick thighs.

This romper is very sturdy and well made. It is thick so in warmer weather it would be a bit much. I got SO MANY compliments. People were going out of their way to come tell me how much they loved it! In the one I got, the elastic in one of the arms was not as tight as the other but you can't tell unless you're wearing it. I was worried it would hang lower because if this, but it didn't.

Loved the fabric and the low neckline. I would say it runs true to size, am normally in between medium and large because of wide hips, I wore the L was more comfortable since it does not have stretch.

links_Review_Title: Killer curves!!! So many Instagram DMs!
links_Review_Text: I loved this jumpsuit. I thought I wouldn't fit because I have big chest and thick thighs but this outfit fit me gorgeously. It also gives you a tiny waist due to the corset ;-) I posted an IG story wearing this and received so many DMs asking me where I got it from. Definitely a show stopper! Find me on IG as @victorialeandra to see more pictures on how I styled this!
Wore this to a rehearsal dinner and was so comfortable and cute! Got a ton of compliments. The top is corset like so it was a little tight but so worth it. Would definitely rent again!

links_Review_Title: So fun I had to buy it!
links_Review_Text: Fits like a glove, super flattering. Shows cleavage but not too much. Definitely recommend for bridal shower, baby shower, event

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous romper! Proceed w/ caution if you're hippy or tall!
links_Review_Text: Rented this to wear to my boyfriend's company event on a boat. Gorgeous romper - I saw Cameran from Southern Charm had rented this before and was obsessed. If it fit better I would have purchased! I'm typically a standard size 6, but do have a smaller chest and bigger hips. I made the Medium work for sure, but it was teeny bit short in the torso and the hips were slightly tight - by the end of night I was ready to get out of it! The Large would have been too big. Highly recommend this one especially if you're pretty standard in sizing (top & bottom consistent).

Wore this for our baby announcement photos. Medium was just a tad tight around my belly area because of the baby bump but would have fit perfect sans those few lbs! Super beautiful, love the sleeves and neckline. Would be great for a party or even just going to work!

I was a little disappointed in this one. I still really loved the way it looked, but I thought I was going to be in love and I really wasn't! First - it felt a little bit like a diaper on the bottom half. It also wasn't breathable AT ALL so I was sweating throughout the night. The pattern is cute and the ruffles/top of it make the jumpsuit, but probably wouldn't rent again.

Love, love, love! Overall, I was happy with the fit of this jumpsuit. It did run a little big on the top, especially when I let the sleeves fall off shoulder but it was really no big deal and I was perfectly happy with how it looked on me. I do think it would be very flattering on someone with a fuller chest. Again, super happy with this rental and it’s flirty and fashionable vibe.

This is a beautiful piece. IF it fits you properly. I sized up to a medium and the top is like a corset. Wore to a party and found it to be super uncomfortable once I'd eaten. It's also a lot of cleavage. Not my favorite rental.

links_Review_Title: Wore this to a spring/summer wedding at a country club, it was the perfect outfit for the occasion!
links_Review_Text: This was my first time using RTR and I LOVED this jumpsuit! Very comfortable, flattering, received many compliments wearing it! Highly recommend - definitely an outfit that you can dress up or down. Great quality material! Only setback was there was a stain on the sleeve from the tape used around the garment bag. I would order your regular size and a size up. I found it to run a little small.

links_Review_Title: This was my first time wearing a jumpsuit and I absolutely adored it!
links_Review_Text: I wore this to a rehearsal dinner and it was the perfect outfit, I got so many compliments! When I ordered this jumpsuit I was so afraid that the chest area would be big but it fit so well! I felt so confident in this jumpsuit and wish I didn't have to return it!!

links_Review_Title: Mother's Day dinner with my mama!
links_Review_Text: Loved everything about this. Runs true to size, except if you are a little busty it can run a little small there. I may have been more comfortable in a small in the chest area but other than that an XS was perfect. The sleeves were hard to stay up but nothing that was a deal breaker. Super cute, flirty, comfortable, and fun! Definitely renting again.

I wore this to a derby party! I have large hips and a small waist and the jumpsuit was able to accommodate both of those things. I received so many compliments and was told it looked like a vintage dream. The sleeves are so unique. The fabric is so comfortable. Honestly one of my favorite rentals to date!

I rented this jumpsuit for a formal event and I loved it! I saw the comments that it ran a little small, so I ordered a medium and a large. It does run small so I ended up wearing the large! It was very comfortable and I got so many compliments on it!
Super cute, and flattering on your upper half but a little tight through the bottom if you are curvy and have a long torso.

One of my favorite rentals! I saw lots of comments about it running small, so ensure I got a size up, which I'm glad I did. It was such a comfortable fit and airy for an outdoor wedding. The top is a pretty deep fit.

I am OBSESSED with this jumpsuit. I wore it for my birthday and got sooo many compliments. It fit like a dream and is so so flattering up top. It was a BIT tight in the stomach/crotch area but no complaints. I love it so much and would definitely recommend if you're considering renting!!
Super sexy. Rented for vacation. Lots of compliments but a bit small through waist and breast area if you are curvy.
I wore this jumpsuit to the Philadelphia Flower Show and I received so many compliments. It fit perfectly! I sized up in this piece and the bigger size was great!
Very flaterring and received many compliments! Usually a size 4-6 and the Medium fit perfectly!
Fun, and Flirty for my Mexican dinner. This was a perfect option for a night out! It was surprisingly comfortable! The arms weren't restrictive, and the bottom flowed nicely. I would rent it again!
Great fit, love the trendy & detailed sleeves. Pretty color and print. Can pass as dressy or somewhat more casual.
Tight at the bust and waist area. Not stretchy at all, gives you a good hour glass shape.
The top fits so great-it hoists up the boobs and makes your waist look slim! Extremely comfortable as well. I made more casual, but would look great with tall wedges.
The fabric was different than I thought! But everything about it was still perfect

links_Review_Title: I wore this to a friend's bridal shower and got many compliments! The fit was a bit weird though.
links_Review_Text: The Small fit me better in the legs but I couldn't zip it on top. The Medium legs were pretty long and lose but it ended up looking okay.

links_Review_Title: Turns heads, but is uncomfortable to wear
links_Review_Text: I am conflicted when writing this review because the jumpsuit is beautiful. It is flattering, distinctive, and people of all ages were complimenting me. The real downfall is the fit of the jumpsuit. It was pretty loose in the belly/hip region, but extremely tight around the rib cage - almost to the point that it felt like I was wearing a corset. It was uncomfortable to sit in and once I started eating brunch, it got to the point where I couldn't wait to take it off. I'd recommend sizing up for this one - maybe if I'd done that, I would've had no fit issues. Either way, I can't deny how gorgeous the jumpsuit is, which is why I still gave 4 stars.

This is much cuter on than the pic displays. I have narrow ribs and shoulders with fuller thighs, so I didn't quite fill out the top, but it's comfortable. It requires some flexibility to work the zipper in back. (Not recommend for those with IBS.) I received compliments all day for its sweet unique appearance, but I never did find my sheep. I'm wearing it on our YouTube show: 3rd Eye Thinkers. Episode 15.
If you are looking for something fun and flirty this is the jumpsuit! Just make sure you're cool with tits on parade!

links_Review_Title: I loved this bold jumper by Finders Keepers!
links_Review_Text: Running true to size with a little room for movement, I recommend wearing your true size and going down a size for a backup. This style is loose in the midsection and hips.This style works for all cup sizes. You are not able to wear a standard bra with this jumper, so you should wear a Nubra or strapless bra. At 5'4", the jumper hit tea length on me. The pattern of the jumper is very pretty in person. Pair with nude heels and fun earrings to complete your look!
My daughter wanted me to be "fancy", but I wanted to be comfortable- so this was perfect! I should have ordered a M, so it was a little big, but so well constructed and flattering, still.

links_Review_Title: colors were wonderful! love the ruffles!
links_Review_Text: The jumpsuit was really tight! I wear a 32DDD and the boobs looked great, but just fyi in case you need to be a little more modest. Wore this engagement shoot, obviously it photographs great!! :)

This jumper has an interesting fit. The top is very tight because of the boning. Typically, I fit medium size jumpsuits, but had to exchange for a large because of the boning. The pants are very loose, which was my only complaint. Beware - this is very low cut!
This fit odd. Maybe for someone with huge boobs and narrow hips?
Rented this for my birthday dinner and it was perfect. Wore with dark skinny jeans and black booties. Super fun top!

I wore this to a party with a side ponytail, dark blue jeans and camel booties. I got a lot of compliments. I'm usually at two and the extra small fit perfectly. Love the coppery color and it's not too sparkly
Wore it to a latin music concert was the perfect thing for salsa dancing!
It does run small. Size up. I would rent again.

links_Review_Title: Fun and neutral but a STATEMENT!
links_Review_Text: Super flattering! Is a shimmering top but not itchy!

I rented this for a surprise 30th birthday party and wore it again to a nice dinner. I'm a sucker for one-shoulder and this did not disappoint! The brown/bronze color was unique and it wasn't itchy under the arm. I'm usually an 8/medium in tops. The large fit fine, which is what was available, but I could have gotten away with the medium. Would recommend!
#luxeyourstyle

links_Review_Title: Just as in photo, really cool top, wasn't crazy about the color aferall but great for an evening out
links_Review_Text: I'm 5'4 and 120 lbs and the small was too big for me. The sleeve was really long. I should've rented the XS

links_Review_Title: So fun for NYE! Comfortable, looked great with just black jeans. Spiced up my outfit!
links_Review_Text: Fit TTS. Not really scratchy at all. Was longer enough and super fun!
It was a tad itchy, so I didn't end up wearing it, but is a great color.
Fits perfectly.
Absolutely beautiful color and shape to this piece. Material is a little scratchy when your bare arm rubs against waist but the inside isn't at all. Perfect for a holiday party or date night!

i really loved this dress i got so many compliments! it was super cute, but reallyyyy short, not short enough to the point it wasn't wearable. but i was pulling it down all night. i definitely recommend it but be aware that it's crazy short.
The dress is super short and form-fitting. Great for petite girls and this was perfect for dinner on vacation!

Cute dress, great for a beachy vacation and received lots of compliments! Fits like reformation dresses which for me is a couple sizes up, which I did, and it was perfect. It's short, I'm 5'4", but I liked that!
Loved this dress so much! The arms rubbed a little but I have bigger build so it didn't surprise me.
Oh so cute, perfect fit but does not leave anything for the imagination... but really really cute

links_Review_Title: Such a beautiful dress!! A million compliments
links_Review_Text: God I was obsessed with this dress. It was comfy and airy and so flattering! I would've bought it if the discount was more than 10%
Love this dress and will rent again. Luckily i knew that Ref usually runs small so i sized up!

links_Review_Title: I wore this dress to a birthday party my friend had at a vineyard! It was perfect
links_Review_Text: Dress is for sure on the shorter side, I am 5'5 and it was perfect for a hot summer day. I wore it with the sleeves more on my shoulder and felt it was better (less worry of boob slippage)

I wore this dress for a nice day walking around the city. It was airy and light which was perfect for the heat. I did end up wearing the 0 which is my typical size in reformation. I was nervous about the length, but with flats it was fine. I would not have been comfortable wearing heels. I love this brand and would recommend this cute summer dress.
The dress is really cute and rented it to wear for my birthday. I rented 2 since other reviews said to size up and but it was too big in the chest
This dress is everything. Fit perfectly and was easy to wear on a warm summer night out.
This dress fit perfectly and was nice and airy for a hot June day.

Wore this out for a dinner / night out with girl friends! I sized up because Reformation tends to run small/ short at times, but probably could have stayed with my normal size 8 because it was a little big at top. So pretty and girly - would def rent again!
I'm a standard 2 but I always wear a 4 in Reformation. This dress is amazing. Light material but still lined and great quality material. I'm 5,4 so will be pretty short on taller women
This was the length of a shirt, it did not cover even half of my butt. Huge disappointment!
This dress runs SO small. I'm usually a small in dresses but it looked like a shirt on me so I couldn't wear on my vacation. I would size up 2 sizes
Didn't end up wearing bc it was an unforgiving dress around the midsection. My mom pouch was on full effect.

Overall the dress was the right size (waist, chest, etc.) but the length was SO insanely short. If I made the wrong move in any way, I would've flashed everyone. I'm only 5'1" too so if you're on the taller side and really want to try this out, definitely size up, although I'm not sure if that will help as I didn't attempt to re-rent a bigger size.

I love a mini, but this dress wasn't mini, it was basically a shirt. It looks like it was made for a child. I am taller than average, but even if you were petite, it would probably be way too short. Plus, the dress that I received had been cleaned and pressed too many times, the ruffled sleeves were just sad and messed up, it was in very poor shape. Other sizes may look better.

links_Review_Title: So adorable, too short to wear
links_Review_Text: Pulled this out of the bag and was so excited but it looked like a shirt. Fit great everywhere but so short it didn't cover my butt. :(
This was unusually small and could not zip and was so short it fit more like a shirt and not a dress. Def size up!!

links_Review_Title: LOVED!! A great rent! Will rent again!
links_Review_Text: Bigger chest preferred for Reformation but still worked with my cup C.
Cute dress but so short, it barely covered my butt! Def not comfortable with wearing it out, which is a shame bc def cute!
Super short and wouldn't zip. Once again, runs small or I've gained weight and didn't realize.

surprisingly soft and comfortable sequined dress. wore to a grammy themed jazzy party. sexy but not trashy; classy while trendy. ABSOLUTELY RECOMMENDING. and don't worry about the sizing much, i should get 2 but 4 also worked!! the straps are adjustable.

I wore this for a girls night out to a club in Boston. It's well made and doesn't feel cheap. The sequins didn't irritate my arms at all, and the straps are adjustable so you're able play with the length depending on your height and/or event. Also, this dress sparkled nonstop with the Kira Kira app
Fun detailing and smooth sequin design - a little itchy at first, but i wasn't too bothered. Had to really tighten the straps to get a good fit, but didn't slip during the night. Highly recommend.
Fun, flattering sequin dress to wear for a night out! Would definitely rent again. True to size, very comfortable and sequins didn't itch.
I am returning because I liked another option better based on the color of the other dress but if you're looking for a fun black dress, this is the one! So cute and flattering.
The dress fitted perfectly and I loved the double straps. However, I did get a rash on the inside of my upper arm rubbing against the sequins. Good for one-time party wear.
I wore this to a disco themed party and felt pretty comfortable in it! I did wear a large and wish I sized down but its the perfect length and the sequins did not irritated my skin.

links_Review_Title: Adorable dress for a birthday party. It's classy and fun.
links_Review_Text: I liked that it wasn't too fitted. I've ben having a lot of fun eating lately so I need a little relaxation at the waistline, which this dress provided. It's sexy without trying too hard. It came an inch or two above the knee on my 5'3 frame.
Comfortable and good for work or dinner

This did not fit me perfectly. Under a blazer I was able to hide the weird fit (I sized up to account for my tummy and larger rib cage but that made it too big in the chest and shoulders) and it was a respectable enough outfit for the office. Regardless, I got about 1000 compliments. So go you, Derek Lam. If this were to be your correct fit you should consider buying it. It is SO COMFORTABLE. And the hemline is super fun. And the pattern works for the office or drinks or wherever your fancy takes you.

links_Review_Title: I wore this dress for a rehearsal dinner, and it got so many compliments! Not formal, but not casual
links_Review_Text: The hem stitching was completely undone when I got this dress, so it was unwearable. Fit perfectly, though. Not too tight across the chest or my back, and it fell nicely - hit right above my ankles in the front.
Not meant for short girls. It hit all the wrong areas in the torso and was way too low from the shoulders.

links_Review_Title: Sexy but not too revealing cut
links_Review_Text: Beautiful shape. Nice, light fabric. I could have sized down but 52 R fits fine.
I loved how this dress fit, the length is perfect, the fabric looks expensive
Best casual or work dress - is fitted and stylish but is super comfy. Looks good with a blazer.

Wore this to a winter wedding. I'm only 5'1", so the length was actually perfect on me to make it feel a bit more formal. I wore a 36 (which is apparently the smallest size they make) and it fit very comfortably. I imagine that it might run a bit large for anyone smaller than me. Overall--great dress that could easily be dressed up or down depending on how you accessorize.

links_Review_Title: Fun dress. Nice fabric. Enjoyed wearing it.
links_Review_Text: Fit well on my short, pear-shaped frame.
It fit a little large but that might've been my own misunderstanding of the sizing. I loved the fabric of the dress, but not the fit. A little too baggy because of the size. I'm usually a 14/16.

links_Review_Title: Night out in Vegas with friends
links_Review_Text: Fit on top was perfect. Loved this, very flattering. The only issue was I needed to be a couple of inches taller. Best if you are 5"6 or above but I was able to wear it with very high heeled boots.
Pants felt a little short (I'm 5'8/5'9) but still looked cute with heels, but the top half was by far my favorite.
Loved this jumper. I'm 5'9 and the jumper fit perfectly (if I were a little taller the body might have been too short). It was flattering and comfortable to wear all night.

The material was great! It had a little stretch but was thick enough to hide all your problem areas. Love the size 14 even though I normally wear a size 12. However the top was a little loose but did not cause me a lot of issues during the night. Would definitely rent this again!
I got so many compliments on this! Classic jumpsuit but the top gives it a little edge. Fit like a glove.

This is seriously so cute - I'm considering buying it! I've been trying to come up with every single reason that I could wear it - it is flattering, the neckline is amazing, and the material is so comfortable and stretchy!

links_Review_Title: I wish I could have worn this but designer sizing is not for the curvy
links_Review_Text: I was so sad I couldn't wear this! Designers, while including larger sizes, are not necessarily designing for the curvy body. I couldn't get this over my hips. so very sad as I loved the neckline of this jumpsuit.

This was a great jumpsuit. It definitely requires stilettos for those in my height range. I also am large breasted, so I could have used some fashion tape to ensure it stayed in place up top. But I looked fabulous in it. I was worried about a cameltoe look, but I chose shapewear that covered to midthigh to avoid pantylines. I survived a wintertime fashion shoot with no coat in this outfit! The zipper is a tad fussy though so you may need help.

links_Review_Title: This was such a fun jump suit. Very easy to put on and off and looked beautiful!
links_Review_Text: The 8 was a little big but nothing that couldn't be managed.

I got a 10 because I am curvy and it fit well, but was a little loose in the top. That being said, because the top is so structured, I was never worried about a wardrobe malfunction. Also, this is one of the few jumpsuits I've tried that I felt were okay for someone on the shorter side (with heels)

links_Review_Title: Loved the color and comfort but it kept moving out of place...
links_Review_Text: Rented as my backup option for a winter wedding. Loved the color and it was so comfortable to wear all night long. The fabric is a little thicker which made it perfect for the season but also gave it a nice shaping effect. The only downsides were that the dress was a little longer than I would have liked and I occasionally had to tug it back into position, especially around the shoulders and midsection. Overall I loved the dress and would rent again.

I loved this dress SO MUCH. The fit was just on the small side, but that just made it hug my curves all the more -- I got a larger size as a backup and the extra room didn't quite do the design justice. I had seen other reviewers mention that you can't lift your arms, but I found the neck/arms to be pretty versatile. You can place it low on your shoulders like in the picture, but if it sits a little higher it gives an equally attractive boatneck look that lets you move your arms all you want (which I did, because dancing). I got zillions of compliments, and you will too. My only concern: both this size and the backup size had a hole in the side seam; luckily the backup size was worse (it looked like it had been mended by hand with a hotel sewing kit; it was awful) and the size I wore didn't really show all that much. But since this was my first Rent the Runway purchase, that doesn't bode terribly well for my future business.

links_Review_Title: Great soft teal color! Thick material really fitting but flattering.
links_Review_Text: The zipper was tough as people say... but doable. The fit felt really good, a comfortable amount of tight but it's thick enough that it doesn't show it. You can choose to not show skin on the side by shifting the top and bottom slightly and it'll stay put, I had it closed all night.

Very classy dress that is form fitting and has a bit of sass with the peekaboo cut on the side. Only issue was that I definitely could not lift my arms up but I looked so dang good that I didn't even care!

Fit was fairly snug but not uncomfortable. The dress was SO flattering, I got a million compliments throughout the night. I love the little peek of skin around the waist. This was very hard to give back.

This was my first rtrw experience and I'm not really the type of person to leave reviews but... The fit was amazing! I'm someone who has a weird body shape - I have a large chest, love handles, and a rather small behind but somehow this dress even though form fitting was so so beautiful. I felt confident and got so many compliments! I loved this dress!

This dress is fantastic! It's super snug and spankx-like while still comfortable. It was a bit hard to get into bc of the zipper but worth the effort. Definitely order a size up to be more comfortable. Thick material feels good too

Love the color. Fabric is extremely thick and forgiving. I rented a large and xl. The xl was too big but the large was a touch too small, couldn't see the cutout. Extremely comfortable. Although it's a GREAT dress, I wouldn't rent it again because it was a touch high maintenance (to keep the off the shoulder price down and attempting to show the cutout).

I rented this dress for my boyfriend's company Christmas party. I love dressing up fancy, but I wanted to get something that was unlike anything I've worn before so I came to RTR. This dress was made of a heavy material, stayed in place all night, and got me lots of compliments. It did get a bit tighter after dinner but wasn't constricting. Highly recommend. Beautiful color, great fit, even great length for how short I am.

I received so many compliments. I had initially ordered a small and it was so tiny I couldn't even get it past the bottom of my rib cage. I decided to get the medium and I'm glad I did. I will say I think the color looked a little bit born and you can tell the zippers been yanked on heavily. The zipper was so sticky my husband was really struggling to pull it up. So once it's on it's on! I still recommend it but just be wary to order up and know that the zipper is pretty difficult.

links_Review_Title: Comfortable and cute but tough zipper!
links_Review_Text: It probably would be too long for someone shorter - I'm 5'9"ish. I kept having to pull down the top part but overall it was fun and comfy!

Reviews are all true. I unfortunately didn't read the reviews and ordered a small and med and should've ordered a large. The medium fit but the bottom was snug. It also does pull you in like spanx which is flattering. The shoulders for me well but the top of the dress was a little bigger for me in the chest area. Definitely need a second person to get the zipper up and down. Felt like we were able to break it it was so tough. made out of great material. Stretches while dancing.
Overall, a really great dress for a winter wedding! I think it looks much better in person than it does over photographs.

links_Review_Title: just the right amount of sexy.
links_Review_Text: This dress was my add-on back up dress and I am so glad as it was far superior. It was just the right amount of sexy. Its a bit difficult to get on, but be patient. I wore a SR, my measurements: 33, 26, 38. Its stretchy. Spanks are difficult because of the waist line, but the fabric is thick and a thong is fine. My only complaint is its a little long for us short or athletically legged bodies. You'll have to wear those high heels, or at least use the slit aggressively when taking photos to give yourself some length.
It's really hard to put on but once you negotiate with it for a minute you're good. Zipper is difficult, results priceless. Many compliments.

links_Review_Title: A great alternative to the LBD
links_Review_Text: Based on the reviews I ordered a M (I'm typically a true size 4). This dress was so comfortable and super chic. Fabric was thick and flattering. Due to the way it's off the shoulder, you can't really raise your arms but it didn't bug me. Loved it!! I would absolutely rent this again!
Definitely felt like a model in this dress!! I didn't want to take it off. No bra or underwear worn, but it worked. This dress runs very small, so size up. Would rent again!!
This dress was a little hard to get on but once I figured it out - oh my gosh it was stunning! Got so many compliments

Snug around the stomach which is my problem area anyway, so I almost didn't wear it. But I am so glad I did. Very comfortable, very flattering, good material great color. I got the size XL because I read several people's posts that it ran small. The XL was perfect for me, and I typically would go for a M or L.

This was my first time using RTR and of course I was a little nervous. I ordered this dress in small and medium for a wedding.... I loved it! I could wear either size and get away with it but the small fit my body a lot better. I am usually a size small so it fits pretty true to size for me. I received a lot of compliments and felt beautiful wearing this dress. The slit and the cutout make the perfect accent without overdoing it.

This dress was wonderful! I wore it for an outdoor semi-formal wedding in November in Miami, FL. It was great for dancing and fit beautifully (form fitting, but slimming thick fabric), although it was difficult when sitting at the tables since it was picnic table style benches. The slit is sexy but elegant and the color is beautiful and rich. 10/10 would rent again and recommend!!

Thick, quality fabric and hugged in all the right places. Received many compliments on it. I ended up having to wear the large, as my normal size (medium) was too snug. Would recommend sizing up and would also recommend this dress!
Flattering, yet tough to wear for a wedding if you dance with your arms up! Will rent again.

links_Review_Title: Beautifully made & perfect for a wedding!
links_Review_Text: I absolutely loved this dress. I have a small chest and wider hips and the thick fabric worked so well for me. The zipper is really hard to get up like other reviews say but I rarely had to adjust any part of the dress.
Beautiful dress, hugs at the right places, but definitely snug. Zipper on both sizes were very difficult. Wore the small but zipper was ripped.

The dress fit well, a little on the small side. Size up if you don't like a tight fit. Got some compliments. All of this was overshadowed by the fact that my new friend, that I never met before that night, was wearing the same RTR dress! All of this would be fine but this was my first RTR experience. Hey RTR: how about a dress rental wedding registry????
It does run a little small but is stretchy and really comfortable

links_Review_Title: Great first RTR experience with this dress!!
links_Review_Text: I'm 5'7, 160 lbs and self conscious about my "mom" belly. This quality dress made me feel great and it snugged all the right spots. Easy to move, dance, and sit!! The skin around your waist is easily covered if you don't want to show skin. I wore it closed for the wedding and showed it at the reception! This dress made my first experience a great one!!

I received so many compliments on this dress. At first, I thought that it may be a little too form fitting, but this dress acted like spanx. The color was beautiful, the length was perfect, and the slits were in all the right places. The only reason I'm not giving this dress a 5 star review is because the zipper was a little hard to zip and unzip. Other than that, the dress was perfect!
Ended up wearing the small over xs because it was very tight around the rib cage. Would size up. Was a very nice quality fabric and thick enough to keep warm at a fall wedding. Pretty color!

Love the side slit. Felt sexy without being too much. Color was beautiful and perfect for an October wedding. I rented the medium and the small. I typically wear a 6 and the medium fit, I consider my self thin and even the medium get a little tight pulling up the zipper. I have a small chest and there was a bit of loose fabric.

This dress was so flattering, I loved wearing it and got so many compliments! The zipper is a little tough, especially where the top and and skirt meet. It runs a little small - I'm typically an 8-10 in dresses and the LR was just a little snug for me. This was my first RTR rental, and I'm so glad it worked out!
Lots of compliments! Cutouts were perfect for a sexy look. The material was a little hot, better for a fall event.

Much like the previous reviews, the zipper was the biggest downfall to this dress. Once it was finally on, the dress looks great! I'm 5'1" so the dress hit me at mid calf, but with heels it was still a flattering line. I'm a bit bigger on the bust, so there was a little bit of side-boob action, but nothing to concern the elders about. Typically I'm a size 8, it was a little loose fitting around the mid section, and I had to keep pulling down the skirt whenever I would stand up or walk. The off-shoulder fit was not a problem for dancing at all - I danced all night long! I kept getting compliments on the color of the dress, it was a huge hit at the early fall mountain wedding!

I sized up due to larger breasts. The dress was incredible and I felt amazing in it! People stopped and asked me constantly where I got it. However, the zipper was difficult and I noticed a small hole on the seam where the end of the zipper itself stuck out. Overall a great dress and experience, I loved it so much that I wanted to buy it.

links_Review_Title: Very easy to rent and huge selection. Everything is there for your return as well
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress! The color was very pretty and the style was amazing. I normally would have worn a Sz 8 but it was unavailable but I loved the dress so much I decided to try the 6 and it worked! I was so happy!
Both classy and sexy!

I am 5'6", 135lb, 34B, wore a size M. Had to wear a strapless padded bra to fill out the top a bit, otherwise the dress fit nicely. Very comfortable and snug. The fabric is nice and thick with very little stretch (would not recommend for expecting mamas). Biggest problem with the design of the dress is that zipper! Make sure you have someone with you to help muscle it over the middle where all the waist fabric meets up - it was a joint effort by myself and my husband. I wore this to an outdoor gala and the end of August (mid 70s temps) in upstate NY for St Jude's Children's Research Hospital. It would be comfortable in warm-cold weather, not for hot weather - material was thick and warm.
Thick material. On me, it was tightest through the hips and loosest in the chest area. Loved wearing this dress!

Easy comfortable fit. Had to tug a bit on the sleeves during the night and I was afraid I would rip them but they were deceptively sturdy. Wore to a valentines symphony performance. Loved the below knee length, felt very '20s.

links_Review_Title: A modest choice with fun details
links_Review_Text: I really liked this dress! The material was a little heavy and the shoulders of the sleeves didn't always sit quite right, but this was a good choice for a formal work event.

links_Review_Title: Loved this dress! I got several compliments. It fits like a glove and I would love to buy it!
links_Review_Text: Perfect for any occasion that requires a black dress with some fun
The fit was amazing, the dress was amazing, I need this dress in my actual closet like NOW!
Fit perfectly ! In love with this dress ! Very classy . Wore to husband work party at the museum !

links_Review_Title: Quite pleased with the dress and received many compliments.
links_Review_Text: Very fitted but forgiving little black dress. Exactly what I was looking for for a "Haunted Holiday " Christmas party.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress but tight & longer than I thought
links_Review_Text: Loved the sleeves, but it was very tight in the middle and a little long for a date night.

links_Review_Title: Stunning...conservative and sexy at the same time
links_Review_Text: Rented this for a holiday work party. Dress was stunning and fit perfectly.

links_Review_Title: Loved the Simplicity of the dress
links_Review_Text: Runs small, I am 5'6" and 160 pounds, usually a size 12. So glad that I ordered a size up.
Was a little long, but the slit in the back is high so I didn't mind the length. Loved this rental - super classy!
The sleeves give this dress a cute touch but as other say it is midi, quite long for the type of dress and it makes it look very formal
I wore this to a Russian party and dressed it down with camel cowgirl boots. I was a hit pre vodka! Then I paired it with black tights and red heels. Instant flirty girl. Perfect date night dress.
it was just to long. sleeves are beautiful! the size 10 was snug, but, the 12 was too big (2nd uploaded image)

links_Review_Title: Subtle yet impactful details and body hugging silhouette while staying classy!
links_Review_Text: The sleeves are fairly delicate so be careful with them. It also hides wrinkles in low light so if you're going to be on stage, like I was, be sure to steam it, like I didn't lol I ordered a 6R and it fit pretty much like a glove although I would usually order a 4.

links_Review_Title: Cute and comfortable! Much longer than I expected.
links_Review_Text: The fit was perfect. I loved the sleeves! The dress was MUCH longer on me than I had imagined when I ordered it. However I paired it with very high red heels and it made the whole outfit work! (Unfortunately I had my heels off for this photo). SUPER comfortable and great (thick) fabric. Small hole near the armpit area but it wasn't noticeable so I didn't mind. Definitely recommend if you don't mind putting on those fancy heels you have stuffed away in the closet ;)

links_Review_Title: Beautifully made dress- just unique enough!
links_Review_Text: I'm so bummed I didn't get a chance to wear this dress- it arrived a few hours after I left for my event. It fit beautifully. The material is great- comfortable but not too thick. Definitely will rent again when I have a need for it!
A winner

links_Review_Title: Beautiful but tougher fit for athletes
links_Review_Text: Gorgeous sleeves and great dress. Tad longer than pic on me as I'm 5 foot 3. Waist loose and back right but I'm very athletic... love it but athletic chicks like me could get a better fit with a slightly thinner fabric
Fit true to size- classy and comfortable. A little warm on the dance floor, will definitely rent again.

links_Review_Title: Received lots of compliments, this dress was classy, sexy, and a standout at the same time.
links_Review_Text: The dress was fitted through the body, true to size, and came down to my calf (I'm 5'10) it's a very nice material that will hold you in, but I still wore shapewear. I was hesitant to wear it because it arrived with a white mark on it, but it was the most beautiful dress I received and the one I truly wanted to wear, the sleeves are so amazing. This dress is a must rent for women who want to be covered and still want to feel sexy.

links_Review_Title: The fit, the material, the details on the sleeves were all amazing
links_Review_Text: I felt like I was almost too curvy for this dress and although I had room in the waist I had to pull it down a few times to adjust. So worth it.

I wore this dress to a fundraising event. I'm a size 10 and am broad through my shoulders. The dress fit my shoulders well. It was large in the hip area, but only I noticed that. The fabric is heavy and drapes well. I would absolutely rent this dress again.

This dress attracted many compliments. It was super attractive and comfortable. I don't like slits that much and the one in the back felt like it was higher than I cared for. Aka borderline showing my spanx! But I would recommend this as a classic black dress.

links_Review_Title: I felt amazing and was given many compliments throughout the night.
links_Review_Text: It hugged all the right curves and was very comfortable. The thicker material is very forgiving when eating throughout the night.

links_Review_Title: Dress fit perfect and received lots of compliments.
links_Review_Text: Fitted curves in all the right ways, loved having a fun sheer sleeve and the slit detail in the back. Highly recommend.

This dress is well made of a thick crepe material. Note that it was much longer/calf length on me than on the model, and I'm not short (5'7"). I wore the 2R because I liked that it was loose for my work holiday party, but could have worn the 0R for a non-work event for a different look. Definitely would recommend!

links_Review_Title: There was a wide range in formality of attire and in its simplicity and elegance, this dress shone.
links_Review_Text: After having some sizing issues with other dresses, I sized up two sizes for this selection. It was a little large but I still loved it. Such a well made, effortlessly stylish dress.

links_Review_Title: An elegant dress perfect for a cocktail attire event.
links_Review_Text: This is a beautiful dress. Works with minimal jewelry. Best for a top-heavy or balanced hourglass figure but still works for someone who is relatively larger in the hips, as I am. (Was somewhat snug in the hips on me, but still fine). Do not rent this dress if you have no one to help you zip it. It's tricky because of the snug fit and the zipper quality is not excellent. You can wear any normal bra with it, which I loved. I also wore Spanx graduated compression black sheer pantyhose. Lots of compliments! My stats: 5'7, 130 lbs, 36C
I'm 5-10. The slit was a little high in the back but otherwise fit really well!

links_Review_Title: I really loved this dress. I wore it out for our family dinner on Christmas Eve.
links_Review_Text: The fit was perfect. I am 5'4 and in the middle of the a 12 and 14. I loved that the sleeves were long but still revealing, it made the dress festive. It definitely accentuates a curvy figure. There is not a lot of stretch though, I think if you are in between, you should definitely size up.

Sorry about the super extra photos but this dress gave me such a boost of confidence! It's so comfortable and chic. It fits like a glove and is sexy without showing anything. I love it so much! I'm thinking about actually buying it.

links_Review_Title: Glamorous but long; not for short girls
links_Review_Text: I rented this for a work event as my backup, but I didn't feel like I could quite pull it off. I'm 5,6", and the length was just too long on me. It fit beautifully size wise, though. I'm normally a 4-6 and the 4 fit perfectly.
Comfortable yet stylish
Perfect fit and style for a work party. Sophisticated and stylish. Great for hourglass ladies.

I love everything about this dress. Rarely do I want to purchase my rentals, but if I had an extra $400 laying around it would be mine! This was the perfect modest a link. There is a little stretch to the dress. The sleeves are an appropriate size, not too small. I received many compliments from both young and older women. I will definitely rent this again.

Really beautiful dress with lots of stretch. That said, the size 10 still gapped at the waist on my hourglass frame. I maybe could have made it work with a black belt but the slit was REALLY high in the back (up to my bum). If the waist had fit better I maybe would purchase and sew up the slit a bit. The length was mid to lower calf on my 5'10" frame so this probably isn't a dress for <5'7." Really beautiful dress though.
This dress is true to size. Very comfortable. I didn't end up wearing it for a speech I had to give at a university but I would rent it again.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress- might be too long for some
