links_Review_Text: I rented this for a formal dinner which ended up being cancelled but I would rent again. Quite long- very much a midi dress so it definitely needed heels
Dress is so pretty. Wore heels and pearls. Longer than expected but was prepared based on reviews.
This was so comfortable! I want to buy it! Sexy and classy. Perfect for us shorter ladies.
Wear a 14/16 and sized up. Love this jumpsuit and bought it! Have a long torso, so I got the larger size!
Loved the Slight crop and shirring at the calves. V- neck was not too revealing. Elastic waist. Will rent again.
I'm 5'3 and the length was perfect. Straps were just slightly too long but still very wearable.

Wore this to a friend's rehearsal dinner and it was perfect. Easy to get on and off by yourself (very important in rompers!), comfy, but fashionable. The bust is held together with a snap button, so if you're busty definitely size up!
Perfect on-point jumper that is sexy and comfy. Loved the elastic waist. Could go from casual to dinner date very easily

links_Review_Title: Easy tiger! This dress is packed with va va vroom!!!
links_Review_Text: Don't be deceived by the demure fabric and maxi length, this dress is full on sexy. The top is very revealing and needs to be pinned or worn with a lacey bra if you are anything but Kardashian confident. I wore it for a date night and felt very glamorous. True to the other reviews I sized up and that was perfect.

links_Review_Title: Runs very small and the opening is revealing. Its gorgeous and well made. Size up Xs2
links_Review_Text: I usually wear a 10-12 in this style. But this one is way off. The dress is stunning and well made. Perfect for Cocktail or a Party. I wore it casually with some combat boots, but this dress definitely is for a night out. I used size 12R.... 14R would have been better. Overall gorgeous dress!
Beautiful dress, very timeless and sleek. The opening on the chest was a little revealing for me so I pinned it some.

links_Review_Title: Runs small - not for over a B cup maybe C
links_Review_Text: Love Cynthia stuff - this dress was just a bit small in the hips and obviously the chest area. Sometimes keyholes work if there is enough fabric but uh not here clearly. I would size up one - I can range from a 12-16 depending on dress and this one has no give and looked horrible - you are welcome for the unflattering photo which shows in what ways. I think you need to be sub a size 10 and with a smaller chest and this will look great. Loved the pattern/material just no dice!
Pretty dress but very busty. I had to grab some tape to hide my chest

Like the other reviewers, I did not wear this. It's runs VERY small. I sized up and still didn't get it over my hips. Maybe go 2 sizes up and that may make the keyhole work too? Otherwise I love the print and the material is great.

This dress fits really well. Hugs in the right places, yet flowy. Beautiful soft material. Does wrinkle easy. The eyelet is VERY revealing, though. I could not wear it as it felt too inappropriate for me

I first ordered a 0 and when I noticed that the fabric was gathering around the waist I ordered a 2 in hopes that it would smooth things out. Oddly, nothing about the waist/hip size changed when I sized up, only the chest/shoulders got bigger (which I didn't need). I guess my hips are just slightly too large for the way the dress is sewn and since the fabric has no give, it just doesn't work. Generally, the cut, fabric, and pattern are beautiful and elegant.

links_Review_Title: I ended up not wearing the dress, but I had rented it for an engagement party
links_Review_Text: Too tight, couldn't zip up
true to size
Good quality, nice fit, long enough. Front slit exposes a lot.

Incredibly flattering cut, beautiful material. I ended up not wearing it because it was too tight in the chest. I have a broad ribcage and large boobs - so the slit at top was too open even for fashion tape. But with a smaller chest/less of a ribcage it would be stunning! Definitely not an everyday piece- more of a special night out

I loved this rental, it took me two months of spot juggling to get the set. I was going to wear it to cirque de Soleil but the event was cancelled. I can't wait to actually wear it somewhere, it's fantastic.
Received SO many compliments from strangers that night. It was gorgeous!

links_Review_Title: I wish I got the pants!
links_Review_Text: Sequins can either be really good or really tacky. This blazer was PERFECT! I felt so old Hollywood and got so many compliments.
I got this blazer for a Celine Dion concert and it was the perfect choice. Loved the fit and it was comfortable. The belt lets you pull it in as much as you want!

links_Review_Title: Love the fit and swag of this jacket
links_Review_Text: I wore the matching jacket and pants for a formal work party that I hosted. Obsessed with this jacket. Note that I did wear a black cami underneath as it would have been too revealing without something. Definitely a statement piece.

The blazer is true to size and felt very comfortable. I wore it to a night out in Vegas and felt very comfortable. Also since it's January it was perfect to wear without a coat. I always have struggled with feeling good when I go out because I am not skinny, but this really made me feel so good.
Rented to full suit it was amazing blazer can be worn without a shirt I pinned the neckline to keep it closed

I dressed it up for night time and dressed it down for daytime. I felt so fantastic and confident in this I literally couldn't stop taking pictures. I'm 1000% renting this again and I honestly might even buy it.
You truly can't beat this blazer. I want to buy it now!
Fun for New Years. Lots of compliments! Super sparkly and relaxed fit. More sparkly/gold in person.
Perfect for an outdoor NYE party!

One of the most flattering and gorgeous pieces of clothing I've ever had the opportunity to wear! What a fun classy sexy jacket! It fits so well, and the attached belts really made it even more attractive. Fun for a night out on the town! Do it!

links_Review_Title: Most Compliments I Have Ever Received!
links_Review_Text: I rented this with the matching pants for Christmas Eve and OMG I have NEVER received so many compliments on an outfit! I wore it to a family gathering, church and dinner out, and it was stunning at all 3. I tried the 8 and the 6 (I'm A true 8), but ended up going with the 6 in the jacket (it ran a bit large) and an 8 in the pants (they rain true to size). Rent this suit. You will love it.
This sequins blazer is everything! It was so comfortable & easy to wear, yet glamorous for a night out in Vegas. Got lots of compliments. Would absolutely rent again.

I was a big gold ball of fun at the holiday party where I wore this jacket. It's so perfect for a rental, no reason to own it. Not itchy, comfortable fabric. I wore it with the matching pants and with a T-shirt and jeans on separate occasion. Highly recommend!
Love this jacket & outfit. Got lots of compliments & it was super comfy to wear all night. If I thought I'd have a need to wear this again, I'd buy it!

Stunning, flashy. Good quality. I felt a bit larger than I am in it. Felt like it made my bust huge. (I am a 32DDD, but I usually don't feel this big. I wore it briefly without a top under it, and you could, but you'll need a good plunge bra. I would probably consider wearing again, but I need the spot for something new. So, it's like a 6/10.

So far my favorite RTR rental!! This jacket is amazing and super comfortable to wear. I received so many compliments! The length was a tad bit long but i am 4'11". I received so many compliments in it. I dont want to return it! The color is more of a gold black than a silver black. But gorgeous!

This blazer is so gorgeous. It is well made and best of all - it's comfortable! I wore this out in Vegas for dinner and drinks (not the club it would probably be too warm for that). I regret not getting the matching pants but wore it with black tights and a black mini skirt. If you're wearing it sans bra I highly recommend garment tape.

Flattering. Comfortable. Full sequined without being too in your face. I wish they had the matching pants in my size when i ordered this because the full suit would be fab! It's not overly bright gold because the individual sequins are actually black and gold striped which gives it a really cool look.

links_Review_Title: Holiday outfit for Annual Deck the Trees event at the Alley Theater

links_Review_Text: The jacket is GORGEOUS in person. I felt like a disco queeeeen. I wore it to host an event for 4 hours and I was surprisingly comfortable. The jacket runs a little big so I sized down to my backup. The 6 was just roomy enough for my 34F chest. 10/10 would rent again.

links_Review_Title: There aren't stars high enough for this jacket.
links_Review_Text: Fits true to size, with some stretch, heavy enough to be warm and feel luxurious but light enough for an easy wear. Wow wow wow I knew it would be good but this jacket blew me away. Such high quality. More gold in person than the product stock image shows.
This jacket made me feel like a superstar. I got compliments all night long. I will definitely be renting this one again
Glitzy fun jacket! Runs true to size with some stretch. Comfortable and chic. Pair back to the pants for a shimmering look!
Great jacket - high quality - good design. Fun for the evening. Successful rental. :)

links_Review_Title: Standout piece but is gold not black
links_Review_Text: Looking at the pic, I thought this jacket was going to be black. Should have looked at the description bc it was very very gold. It was a standout piece and everyone noticed but was way more standout than I was expecting. I felt like Elvis
Comfortable and stylish!

I rented the pants as well to wear as a suit- major complements. I had to pin the lapel as it would have been too revealing. The pants were a bit scratchy in the rear from the sequins but all in all a big hit

Loved the material, not really sequins but metallic fabric that glittered nonstop. Didn't wear because it wasn't flattering on my broad shoulders but was true to size and high quality material with some stretch.

links_Review_Title: I wore this as part of my outfit to an 80s party on NYE and it was the perfect amount of glam!
links_Review_Text: I am tall (6 foot) and the length was good, the jacket hit about half way down my butt. The sleeves went all the way to my hand. They shifted up my arm easily, so I flipped the cuff, but overall, it fit really well.

I got so many compliments on this jacket. The material was thick and kept me warm at our office holiday party when I did not wear a jacket. I felt glamorous and gorgeous wearing this dress and it was sassy and sexy but still sophisticated and classy, which was exactly the look I was going for. I would rent this again and would recommend to all. The tie at the waist accentuates your figure and curves and is very flattering
Great fit, very warm, perfect for holiday party. Would rent again
Such a great holiday party look! Overall felt TTS, it's not itchy or cheap feeling like some sequins are. Will need to wear a top underneath

links_Review_Title: Forget the dresses get this blazer!
links_Review_Text: Great quality! Amazing for parties

I rented this bad boy for work (at a dressy place where I can actually get away with this) and fell totally in love. I will more than likely be buying it before the end of the year! The fit of this blazer is great - oversized without feeling lumpy or unflattering - and the belt does wonders for the shape. It's fully lined, so you don't have to worry about itchy sequins. There wasn't too much shedding of sequins either, although I did notice some rogue ones lying around the office for a few days.

links_Review_Title: They said cocktail attire and I wore this!
links_Review_Text: Showstopper. Fit perfectly. Great blazer for the cocktail event.
I wish I could afford, to keep it!!

links_Review_Title: I love this jacket. It arrived new with tags, always a bonus! It fits great and is flattering.
links_Review_Text: I've worn this several times--with jeans and a teeshirt and with black leggings and black cami under. Flashy and tailored. I'm trying to come up with a reason to wear it to work!
Beautiful fabric and sequins. It runs a little large.
I rented this for a semi-dressy fundraiser. My husband loved and I felt sexy! I have a small chest but the fit was still good.
Perfect top for going out or a date night! Paired with black jeans I got so many compliments on it! Although it's a bit low cut, if you're not shy it's not too much at all!
Both the 6 & 8 fit, the 8 just laid better. I'm a 34D. My event was cancelled & I didn't wear but very cute!

I wore this on Valentine's Day for a night out with my husband. I got so many compliments. Fit me perfectly and looked sexy without showing too much cleavage. My husband loved how I looked in this top.

Felt very comfortable in this top, hugging yet not tight, my husband loved it!, appropriate for a cocktail attire company party (winter celebration), glittery yet not showy, I felt I could move without feeling stiff
Rented for an NYE party. Lots of sparkle and compliments. Fit well. Flattering and comfortable.
Perfect for a party.

Cutest little dress, with the greatest puff sleeves! Runs small around the chest area. Was also extremely hard to zip because the fabric was so thick it was hard to get the zipper over the seam. But once it was finally up i loved it! Will definitely rent again.
This dress was perfect! So cute and flattering! I would say the flattering is accurate as long as you remember to translate your size to EU sizing.

links_Review_Title: This dress has no give. It is not for full busted gals unless you size up. Minnie Mouse-ish fun.
links_Review_Text: This dress is for a fun party. There is no give to the fabric. Straight and narrow gals may do best, or girls with a C cup at most. The dress has a Minnie Mouse vibe from the original Disney cartoons in black and white. It is also short. Someone will have fun with this dress.
Unfortunately didn't get to wear. I'm in scrubs at work for the foreseeable future.
Wore shape wear for my tummy and it fit wonderfully. Fun twirly action.
Beautiful print, nice fabric, flattering. I'd rent it again.

This dress fit my curvy figure very well. I have a large chest and it covered me appropriately for work. Wore it to work but it would be great for a wedding or a casual dinner party. I will rent this one again.
Dress fits great, pattern is eye catching
Nice cut and easily dressed up or down, comfortable in the heat, travels well
I really wanted to love this dress, but it is way too boxy. The waist hits at a lower point than what is pictured.

links_Review_Title: It is so cute and very very comfortable to wear.
links_Review_Text: It is a bit smaller so I did size up specially on the chest area

links_Review_Title: Such a fun dress to wear!
Obsessed, obsessed, OBSESSED with this dress!
links_Review_Text: It fit like a glove and I received so many compliments both on the overall look and the color (lilac-ish!). I went with the XS because I preferred it a bit more snug -- a lot of moving around at my office holiday party. I felt like an icon in this dress! My size - 5'1/100lbs, 32DD, rectangle petite body type.

links_Review_Title: Junior Parents' Weekend gala dress on valentine's day!
links_Review_Text: Comfy but not much give - I'm lucky to fit pretty true to a medium, and this fit like a glove!! If I was bloated tho... probably not so much :) Got lots of compliments on it, though it was a pretty vibrant lilac/pink. Not sure why I thought it would be softer, but even with a bright pink it still looks super delicate! Would def wear again.
I rented this for a headshot photoshoot for my interior design business and it did not disappoint!! True to size for me.

links_Review_Title: This dress was PERFECT for our engagement photos!
links_Review_Text: This dress was fabulous for our engagement pictures. The small was more form fitting, while the medium was a bit looser, more comfortable and easy to move in. This dress so versatile - I dressed the outfit down with some Golden Goose sneakers, and then added a formal touch with heels as well. The adjustable straps are convenient, too.

I ended up not having the right occasion to wear this dress and it broke my heart. I really felt like this dress was made for me! It definitely hugged all the right places and is super fun and unique.

links_Review_Title: Lace elegance with a sexy long tie black shoulder
links_Review_Text: Great for a function that I had. It does tend to pull up a little above my bust line and since I always wear a bra I couldn't let it hang lower even though the straps are very adjustable due to my bra. Very pretty and lots of compliments. Girly and yet sexy

I loved that this dress is unlike most other dresses. It's sexy without being over the top, and feminine without being too girly. The black and blush pink provide a cool contrast and it's fun to wear.
Be sure to double knot the bow straps, they don't hold.
Rides up when you walk and very tight fit but absolutely loved this dress!
Loved this dress, fits really well and is easy to move in. I love the color and got lots of compliments on it. Definitely would wear again!
I rented this for a wedding, fit perfectly, I rented the S. I am usually a 2 or 4. Got so many compliments!
i typically wear an XS and i chose to wear a small, fit perfectly! got compliments all night long

I fell in love with this dress from the picture online but unfortunately it's not as great in person. The color is a bit darker not ice pink as it appears and looks a bit cheap. I'm an athletic body type with small waist. I usually wear XS but XS was too tight in the chest area. Size S was good in the chest but really big in the waist area so I had to improvise and make it work by wrapping the straps around the waist which made it look better. It does photograph nicely though especially in darker lighting.

This dress is so stunning and flattering - I was receiving compliments all night long! I wore to a formal event. The straps were a little hard to tie, but once I got someone else to tie for me they were fine. I am size 4 and probably the medium would have fit better, but I made the L work. I wish I could wear this dress everyday!

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous, elegant, whimsical. Perfect for a cocktail beach-side wedding.
links_Review_Text: Loved the length, the fit, the feel. High quality. Straps were so fun!
I absolutely LOVED this rental! Had compliments left and right. It fit perfect and comfortable to eat and dance in. So happy that I found this dress. :)
Beautiful dress. A tad looser than expected but still fit very well.
Loved wearing this dress! The straps are adjustable. Super comfortable and lightweight. Fit TTS. I also wore the yellow printed version to another wedding :-)
So comfortable and I loved how you could adjust the straps. I got so many compliments on this dress. It makes you feel so pretty.
Such a great dress to strut in. I wore this in vegas and it was super comfortable. Loved the pop of pink
So flattering and unique. Got compliments all night long.
This dress fit perfectly. I added a velvet belt and got so many compliments on this dress. Perfect for bridal shower, or any other formal event. Love!!!

links_Review_Title: beautiful dress and fits so well... I felt so comfortable in this. the color is a bubble gum pink
links_Review_Text: fits true to size, make sure to tighten the straps as they will untie easily.

links_Review_Title: Great dress! Fit perfectly and loved the lace detail.
links_Review_Text: Elegant classy dress.

I wish I could've kept this dress forever!! It was so comfortable and easy to wear. I usually wear a S and ordered a S and M but even the S was just a little loose. Not a bothersome amount but if you are teeny teeny tiny, it may be a bit big. For reference, I'm a 2/4. The ribbons add such a fun, feminine, dreamy touch!!

Either small or xsmall would have worked for me since this dress was for a photo shoot. Both sizes were brand new which was a nice surprise. Easy to pick-up and return. Can't wait to use this service again!

I loved this dress and wanted so badly to wear it but felt something else I had rented would be better suited for my event. The shade of pink on this dress is gorgeous and I hope to rent for something else in the future.

links_Review_Title: everyone loved this dress and I got a lot of compliments on it. It's very feminine and unique.
links_Review_Text: The dress looked great overall. I'm tall and the center slit felt a little short. It was a little too revealing when i was sitting. I wore it to an evening party and it was fine that it was a sexy cut on me but wouldn't be appropriate for a more conservative atmosphere. I had to wear a strapless bra with it because I didn't fill out the top and needed the structure. It's a fun dress for an event if you want to make a statement.
This dress was amazing and I didn’t want to give it up! It was comfy, sexy, and fit my body perfectly. I’m usually not one to wear tight dresses but this just worked perfectly.

links_Review_Title: Sadly, I was disappointed. The quality wasn't as nice as I thought it would have been.
links_Review_Text: The quality of the dress seemed worn out. The slit was higher than I was expecting.

links_Review_Title: My daughter wore this to homecoming and loved how unique and stylish she felt in it. I loved how she
links_Review_Text: I wasn’t able to change the style profile as I ordered for her on my account. She wears a size 0 or 2 normally.

links_Review_Title: Very lovely quality. Feminine and flirty.
links_Review_Text: Very tight along the waist.
Love love love love. So amazing and perfect. This brand never lets me down, I am so glad RTR has pieces available! This one was incredible.

links_Review_Title: Cute, flirty and sexy! Figure flattering!
links_Review_Text: I wore this dress for a barn style wedding. I'm tall with broad shoulders and this dress is tight in all the right places. I usually wear a size 4, but needed to wear a medium due the chest. I could have pulled off a 4 for waist, so suggest sizing up if you are on the bustier side. This dress was extremely flattering. If you have a long body, you may need to wear a nude slip underneath as the center area does get very short. I did not wear one but was careful of my movements.

Cute dress. I thought it ran tight across the chest, zipper tough in places. I did not wear because it did not feel formal enough for event. However, I was tempted to live my best life in this Barbie Cupcake dress and say go for it if you decide to rent! A little too frilly and youthful for me though!
really pretty and frilly for a special night out. however, the lined lace part of the skirt is extremely short--beware!
The quality of the dress is not the greatest- it's super thin. I have a short torso so it was super unflattering/big around the stomach area. Won't end up wearing unfortunately.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress, but not for me
links_Review_Text: It was a pretty dress but pepto bismol pink, and the material felt kind of cheap
I loved everything about this dress! Color, fit and structure. I am a size 10 in most dresses and I found this TTS. I am 5"8 , 36DD and 175 pounds.

I rented just to try to get excited for summer. It fits well, but probably not great for large busted women. I would have given 5 stars, but I would have to do do some serious steaming before heading out in the world in this. I will rent again though. Not sure what mask would match!!

I read reviews that said this was short if you are tall so I ordered an 8 instead of a 6. It was good on length but huge on top!! Cute dress though. The top part was kind of falling off. It was cooler than expected in Miami so I left my jacket on which helped. Would rent again and see if a smaller size worked in length.
I rented this for a work dress and ended up not wearing it because it was too low cut.
Very flattering dress but a little to low cut for a family or formal affair so use tape or a safety pin as I did
Needed to pin the top closed which made it a bit uncomfortable but cute overall. A LOT of static.
Really cute dress to transition into fall. Lightweight. Very comfortable. The top runs very large.
This dress fits true to size. The side shirring with the buttons is such a fabulous detail. I had to safety pin the chest so it wasn't too va va voom for the office.
Fit great. Perfect for work.
This was my first RTR dress and it's so sexy! I love it and will be keeping it for a bit so I can wear it a few times

links_Review_Title: Cute and can be dressed up or down.
links_Review_Text: Very easy to dress up and down. The only con was the front was very low cut and any movement, the front would gap and show bra. I had to pin it to keep from flashing my bra to coworkers.

links_Review_Title: Perfect work to happy hour look
links_Review_Text: This dress fit me like a glove. Had to safety pin the cleavage to make the dress appropriate for work, but overall a great outfit. Compliments galore!
I wore for work and it was light and cute! Easy to wear!
Super cute with button details on the side. I'm between a 16 and 14. I should have gone for the 14. Needed to pin the top because it was a bit low cut but otherwise great.

Fit was odd and bunched near the zipper in the back, then again I'm only 5'2". I feel like this had potential to work, but between the strange fit and the too many competing elements (deep v, ruffles, buttons, etc) it was off. Pretty material though.

links_Review_Title: Fun and flirty - perfect for winter parties!
links_Review_Text: Great dress for winter parties!
Loved this dress, comfortable and feminine. Wore with navy blazer and nude pumps on a chilly day. Would rent again.

ok, take two on the review. Beautiful dress and super flattering shape for an hourglass figure but I'm more pear-shaped so the top was baggy meaning I needed to keep covering my bra. Overall tho the dress was gorgeous and maybe if I went a size down it would fit better, however on the shorter side so I might not have worn a size down to work or been comfortable everyday. Great for date night tho!
Dress ran small. Also really short. Perhaps because the size was wrong, but wouldn’t be work appropriate.

The dress is very flattering, but it is a little short and low cut. Is is definitely more suitable as a date night dress. It would not be appropriate for work or church. Otherwise, it is a great dress.
Very cute and flattering, but difficult to keep the low neckline in place -- might work better for bigger busts

Beautiful and flattering dress. Very fun for date night and can be dressed up or down. Chest was big so had to pin it, but still looked good. Would buy if not so expensive and will definitely rent again.

Loved this dress! Wore it for a girls night out for dinner and drinks - it was feminine and fun! The wrap neckline was pretty low cut, but worked for my body type. I felt like the sleeves and style of the dress added modesty to balance the lower cut neckline. The pattern was super cute and the ruffles on the bottom of the skirt moved when I walked, which was a great touch! I wore it with heeled booties to keep it more casual and "fall appropriate", but would have also looked great with heels! Would definitely rent again!!

Very flattering and classy. I love the neckline and was happy to wear a normal bra with it and feel classy and put together. Not too short and definitely light and airy. Really nice transition piece- summer to fall.
I could barely zip it up. Very tight in the stomach area and pretty low V neck. Not flattering at all.
Has a 80's vibe to it but it is incredibly flattering. Wore a tank underneath for work because the V is a little too low cut. Would rent again!
It's on the short side for work but doable with tights. I dressed it for winter but easily could be a summer dress as it's super lightweight. The bow is actually kind of silvery which was a surprise.
Beautiful and unique dress!
Fantastic and conservative option for work. I'm 4 months pregnant and there was plenty of room for my growing belly! Loved it!

It is a lightweight material and is non-restrictive. Since it is an a-line dress it skims away from the body. I wore it in winter with tights and boots but it was probably too thin to be a winter dress.

I sized up as everyone said the arms/shoulders area is a bit tight. I'm usually a 2/4 and I rented the 42. Got so many compliments on this dress and I loved it. It is a thin material but very nice. I paired it with black tights and pumps for the office. Would rent again, adorable!

I rented this for Christmas and got tons of compliments! The material is beautiful and the dress photographs really well. It's very comfortable and no part is form fitting so I would order true to size
Great fit but not lined so i recommend a slip. My tights would stick a bit.

This dress made me feel super pretty! I received many compliments on it. I wore this to a dinner with friends and to my thanksgiving party at work. It is such an elegant yet simple dress that you can wear pretty much to any occasion. I love this dress and I would rent again in a heart beat.

links_Review_Title: I didn't want to stop wearing it
links_Review_Text: I wore this dress about four times. I travel for work so I just kept packing it. I loved it! My boyfriend even commented how much he loved my dress. Side note I forgot the bow went in the front, but I pulled it off in the back. Super cute dress!

This dress was a hit thanks to the pattern and neck tie. It instantly upgraded my look. The shoulders were a little tight, which was the only issue I had with it. The fit was great everywhere else. Would even consider this for a holiday party.

links_Review_Title: Perfectly unique for a cocktail party.
links_Review_Text: I wore this for an end of summer cocktail/dinner party and it was perfect. The material is thin so it definitely wasn't too hot. Lots of compliments.
Cute drop waist dress. Slightly sheer, wear a slip.

Typically Valentino Red size 40 dresses fit me perfectly and this one ALMOST did, but it did hit me at an awkard length, I feel like if I had sized up one then it would have been a perfect fit, it was a smidge short for a business trip but paired with a low heel it worked. Be sure to use a setting powder and spray before wearing this collar since it is bright white!
Loved this dress. Classy photographed very well. Would love to buy at a 50%discount. Will rent again

links_Review_Title: Loved this dress, tons of compliments. Perfect for summer work
links_Review_Text: Fit was perfect for me

Such a different, fun dress to wear for work! Received many compliments. The material is light and flowy and good for spring/summer. While I rated it true to size, it is close to running a little small. It *just* fits me in the arms and shoulders and I never have a problem there. Also the band that hits around your butt/thighs has no give. Would definitely recommend this dress!

links_Review_Title: Really cute but someone told me I looked like a Christmas tree!
links_Review_Text: I rented this for work. I think the bow and the collar are really cute but still sophisticated. The material is really thin, and I think it was slightly sheer in very bright light, but it wasn't really a problem. I'm usually a US 4 so I rented the IT 40, and it fit great. Style is obviously quite generous through the waist
Cute almost school girl look. Just long enough for me. Great fabric, the 42 fit my hips (39-40"), super flattering. Loved it!

links_Review_Title: I did not end up wearing it.
links_Review_Text: the fabric is pretty thin and it is tight around the chest - would be great for smaller chest sizes.
This dress was a No. I looked like a giant baby in it. The fabric was thinner than expected.

links_Review_Title: Blair Waldorf Becomes a Christmas Tree
links_Review_Text: Cute dress for work, def felt the holiday cheer... In October. Shoulders were tight.

links_Review_Title: Different style for me but I loved it
links_Review_Text: Interesting fabric and big bow but it worked.
I got lots of compliments! Absolutely loved this dress
This dress is super cute. I didn't wear it because it was not my style but it is really cute and fun.
Loved this, super cute. Was a bit too short for work, so I was a bit uncomfortable in it there. It's also VERY thin, don't plan on it keeping you warm.

links_Review_Title: Love looking like a Christmas tree
links_Review_Text: I just got the Christmas tree comment I love this dress. I've worn the pink version as well and it's very forgiving and flattering. I wear a slip underneath for modesty as it's a bit see through and bouncy at the bottom. Really pretty
Loved this dress but tight in the shoulders and arms.
Rented for my daughter to wear to a party. Perfect choice for a 17 year old - a classic red valentino style with a fun print. Got tons of compliments and was so comfortable.
Odd fit on the bottom, at times felt a bit short

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress for a special event
links_Review_Text: I ordered size 44 and it was a little big, probably would have fit in the 42 perfectly. But, I didn't bother ordering the correct size since it was too dressy for work. It would be great for a nighttime event (show, nice dinner, etc.) but I would have felt out of place wearing it to the office (and I wear dresses all the time to the office). Next time I have a special event this dress will be on the top of my list to rent.

Rented to switch up my work wear and loved wearing this piece. The dress is true to size and a respectable length for the office without looking matronly. The white silk collar and bow provide a fun, feminine touch. I loved wearing this dress and felt very comfortable in it. Well made, beautiful print.

links_Review_Title: My very favorite RTR to date!!
links_Review_Text: Tags on upon arrival! The most unique, standout dress ever! Stopped twice by random people. Size up, if you want it to hang straight, which I did. Will definitely rent again!
I typically wear an 8, but sized up for length and it was perfect--still fit in the shoulders and gave me plenty of length room elsewhere. Will absolutely rent again. The bow is perfection.

This dress was very pretty in person, I received compliments all night on how good it looked. The fit was perfect for me, the XS in petite made it so that with my 4in heels I had no issues walking or having the dress drag on the ground. The only thing to note is that you will need fashion tape and safety pins in order to secure the chest area and not end up accidentally exposing yourself. All in all, I'm very happy with this rental.

Absolutely loved the dress. The lining was a nice stretchy material that was comfortable and made it easy to dance in all night. The fit thought was great. I needed quite a bit of tape to keep the neckline in place. The shoulders were a little long/big on me but that was easily fixed and not noticeable with tape. Got quite a few compliments throughout the night. Would definitely recommend!

Got this for a black tie event and this dress was beautiful, classy and sexy. There is no way to wear a bra so I spent a ton of time taping my chest, beware girls with a chest. The sheer overlay is forgiving and creates a nice waist. I would wear it again!
wonderful neckline and back, very comfortable, forgiving cut

This was my first experience with RTR, and I will definitely be coming back. I had ZERO problems with shipping/returning, and the dress was even better in person than in the photos. Typically, I wear a size 16 and was hesitant to get this dress because it only went up to XL. It fit fine, although I couldn't use the zipper to get it on - I had to put it on over my head. I was honestly bummed to return this dress. I felt so good in it! Compliments all night.

links_Review_Title: Loved this dress! Perfect for black tie wedding.
links_Review_Text: Loved everything about this dress. It fit perfectly and does have give to it. The gathering in the front and one shoulder detail is just perfect. I got tons of compliments. I did end up safety pinning the bottom of the from v together so it didn't gaps open quite so much. Definitely recommend!

links_Review_Title: Fun and elegant for NYE event
links_Review_Text: You need fashion tape for the top!

links_Review_Title: I felt like $1,000,000! I had a hot date & my organization was presented an award!
links_Review_Text: The dress fit great! It was definitely form fitting, but the sheer overlay was perfectly placed to make me feel less self conscious... definitely a "plunge" neckline, still had to pin down my bra a bit. But great quality and definitely would recommend!
Hugs in all the right places, so comfortable and chic!

Had ordered this dress and the original came damaged-- sheer material was torn at the bottom. Customer service shipped me another the same day and I received that night. Good reminder to have the arrival date 2 days before you really need to wear it. Loved this dress, lots of compliments. Deep neckline so requires boob tape or sticky bra if individual- clasps would be visible. Would recommend!
Fabric shapes amazingly - I'm a mom of two under two and I looked fit in this dress ! Form fitting which is great !

links_Review_Title: Y'ALL THIS DRESS IS EVERYTHING!! Perfect fit and just overall gorgeous!
links_Review_Text: Wore this dress for a NYE wedding and got so many compliments! I'm short and more of a square figure, but this dress hugged in all the right places! Wore size small -- TTS 6. I'm not busty at all and just had to pull down to keep from letting the "girls loose"! Perfect dress! I don't take selfies but this dress was making me FEEL MYSELF!! Love it cannot recommend it more!

Got this for a Casino Royale NYE party and it was nearly perfect! The small worked perfectly for me, with a few adjustments. When I tried it on the plunging neckline went WAY too low--I was in danger of a serious wardrobe malfunction. The rest of it fit quite nicely including the length of the dress, so I put 6 safety pins up the front to close up the deep V to a reasonable depth. Worked like a charm! The outer layer draped so nicely. 10/10 would rent again. Got compliments all night.
Felt very fancy in this dress! Was very comfortable and I was able to dance it in. Definitely need fashion tape to keep everything contained though.

links_Review_Title: Simple, yet made a statement. Overlay was very forgiving to fitting style
links_Review_Text: Fit like a glove however the side without the sleeve was a little loose. The deep neck was a little out of my comfort zone.

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous silhouette but not meant for dancing
links_Review_Text: This dress is gorgeous!! Hugged my hips so well and hid my stomach with unique overlay areas in all the right places The problem was it slid off my shoulders and nearly exposed me every half hour or so. I would recommend going a size down as it does have stretchy give in it. I recommend boob tape as to not have a slip up!
I loved this dress! It fit very well and has nice material which hid my stomach area (not my best quality). It was super comfortable and you can never go wrong with black!

I absolutely LOVED this dress. I rented for a work Christmas party. Fit like a glove. I got SO many compliments on it. I have big boobs, so I definitely recommend taping them up if you do too. This dress could be beautiful for so many occasions. This dress complimented my curves better than any dress I've ever worn.

I got so many compliments on this dress! Normally, tight fitting dresses aren't the most flattering on me, but the mesh overlay skimmed over everything beautifully. Added bonus is that I was able to wear flats without tripping all over the dress!

Loved this sexy yet elegant gown. Wore it to a massive wedding and felt free to dance the night away in comfort with no fear of slippage. The zipper was difficult but we worked through it and it was well worth it! Definitely recommend!

The dress is great: the contrast between the form-fitting inner layer (which shows your curves beautifully) and the outer layer of polka-dotted tulle is the perfect mix of classic and new! The dress doesn't need much accessory, as when put on, it says quite a lot!
Stretchy material, which makes the dress easy to move in. Fit great! Only slight problem was the chest was a little loose, probably didn't fill it out enough.

The photos do not do this dress justice! It is a showstopper, but in a subtle classy way. It has a beautiful chiffon overlay that has polka dots that gives the dress texture. The dress is a bit high maintenance to fit bc there is a very low front and back. This means, no bra. I'm a 32 C/D and needed to pin the straps higher, use boob tape and stick on bra. But even though it took some time to fit to my body, once I did it was comfortable throughout the night and allowed me to exude confidence.
Beautiful dress. However the one shoulder kept falling down. I even had a friend try it on to see if it was just my shoulders and it fell off of her as well. Couldn't wear it.
Didn't try on, because only rented it as a backup but it looks beautiful with great polka dot accent! And beware the neck plunge goes very deep!

Very comfortable! Length fell right to my ankles, so you could see my shoes which I loved. The 'V' is lower than you would think, but tasteful nonetheless. I could of done the XS, but the small was just fine.

links_Review_Title: It was my first black tie wedding!
links_Review_Text: First off, the dress is stunning. I got so many compliments. The only downside is the chest area was quite large on me (cup size 34-B) and I was constantly worried I was revealing myself. While standing it wasn't bad but when sitting, without double sided tape, the girls would definitely be out (ifyouknowwhatI'msaying). I would probably not rent it again just for the peace of mind. I prefer to not have to worry about showing more skin than expected :) Other side note though- it is super comfy everywhere else!! Great to dance in.
Loved the dress. Fit perfectly. Gave the illusion of curves which was great

links_Review_Title: The numerous complements that I received about this dress!!!!
links_Review_Text: Everything was perfect!

I ordered this as my back up dress but it ended up being too low in the front for me to wear. I think it probably would have looked OK on someone who didn't have a lot going on in the bust area. The XL ended up being too big but it wasn't that long. I personally like to cover my shoes for the most part with long dresses but this one I was probably an inch to 2 inches shorter than what I would've liked.
I really loved this dress. It fit true to size and was super comfortable all night long. I got so many compliments on the dress. Highly recommend! I would have bought this dress!
Fits great and hugs curves so well. Super soft material;)

This dress is gorgeous and I looked and felt gorgeous in it. The large was a bit too big and I probably should've worn a medium but it was still very flattering. It is a heavy knit material and super stretchy so it hugged my body in all the right places. I received tons of compliments from both men and women all day.

links_Review_Title: This dress laid on me SIMPLY GORGEOUS I loved and so did everyone I walked passed! perfect!
links_Review_Text: Awesome fit and flare! great length and quality
Great dress overall and warm for winter too. It's a heavy knit so I wore Spanx and a regular bra. I would rent this again. My husband loved it immediately!
I still believe in dressing up at least a little for the theater. I wore this and it was a huge hit as well as exceptionally comfortable, formfitting, and super flattering.

links_Review_Title: A bit much on its own
links_Review_Text: I love Leopard print - and this dress delivers. I thought it was actually a bit much to just wear on its own so I styled it with a black blazer - et voila perfect for work. Also, I am busty so these armholes showed my bra on either side - I couldn't have work this without a shirt underneath or a cardigan or soMething. I wore shapewear to avoid that lumpyness that comes with knit dresses and found I had a very sexy silhouette even with the blazer.
I felt so sexy and flirty in this dress. It is super body con, has a lovely shape and flair at the bottom. The fabric is comfortable, and the pattern is super fun!
Absolutely loved this dress. The fabric is stretchy and substantial and super comfortable. Would definitely rent again!
Better in person. Hugs all the right places!

This dress is perfect! It it a thick material and very stretchy so it looks extremely flattering on. I also love the ruffled detail on the bottom. I posted this on my Instagram and within an hour I received hundreds of DMs on where this dress is from!
Definitely would rent this again! I loved the fit (gives you the illusion of curves) and the print is bold but not too much. Perfect for a night out.
This dress is so small, I could barely get it over my head. So sad!!! I was really looking forward to showing this one off... but, back it goes to RTR!

links_Review_Title: Loved it! Lots of stretch in fabric. Lots of compliments!

links_Review_Text: I thought this would look better. The knit is strong but can be unforgiving. It was too big in the chest. I had to throw a sweater on for work. It's just ok.

links_Review_Title: Looks great. Normally a size 16 so got the xxl.
links_Review_Text: Really sexy dress and cute. Only complaint is underarm fat showed but covered it up with leather jacket.
I rented it for work but when it came, it is a stretchy material and hugs your body. So it turned into a date night dress. Sexy dress!
It fit like a glove, I wore it on a date and for work. So many compliments. Love love love.

links_Review_Title: Rented size avail, but much bigger than I needed/wanted for holiday parties.
links_Review_Text: B/c its knit, the too-big size was ok for 1 wearing w coat, not great. Flatters curvy figure. If can get smaller size, would rent again. Prob true fit, I couldn't tell in too large size
I loved the structure of this dress with the 3 tiers. Got tons of compliments! Really cute for end of summer. True to size

I recalled loves this dress! It was perfect for a Luau I went to in Hawaii. I did wish the top tier was a bit longer and the dress itself was a tad shorter but still looked and fit great! It does wrinkle easily so have a steamer handy!
Beautiful for a July fourth party. Great details, flows in the breeze.

Rented this dress for a work dinner held on a sandy lagoon. The material didn't have stretch but was very light and comfortable. It breathed well in the Miami heat! The red embroidered accents after each ruffle layer were adorable. The tasseled straps at the neckline were a nice detail. Would definitely rent again!
Perfect for our Mexican vaca. Although it was a bit heavier than I thought and got warm with all the tiers.
Friends love it. It is so cute. They asked me to go shopping with them.

links_Review_Title: I attended an amazing retreat that had a dinner themed with a "Mexican Twist"
links_Review_Text: The dress fit very well and had good room for the bump. I would assume it runs large though if your midsection is average sized. The material was sturdy but breatheable and comfortable for an entire evening of food and dancing.

links_Review_Title: Cute but sent it back. Wasn’t super flattering and a little too fussy.
links_Review_Text: Cute but too fussy ~ skipped wearing this one.
This dress was great quality and different than any cute white dress. Statement making especially with a Vacation tan!
Wore this for our international convention and this dress was perfect because I was invited to the latino lunch! Perfect dress with a touch of Spanish flare!!!
I wore this out to dinner on vacation and loved how comfy it was. It was a little loose on me but it still worked.

links_Review_Title: Fun and flirty date night option!
links_Review_Text: Wore this on a first date and could definitely tell that he was pleased. It's a beautiful dress, that feels sexy (but not too much so). The fit was good and to -size (I normally am an 8 and wore an 8 in this, too). I am a mommy, and have a bit of a tummy, so the dress fit snugly around my middle, but I still think it looked good. I wore it with cute flat sandals, but could see it being dressed up even more with heels. Do rent this dress!
It fit like a glove. Really the perfect summer fro k.
Fabulous summer dress. This dress fits true to size. It is luxurious and really flattering.

links_Review_Title: Fourth of July festive fête favorite!
links_Review_Text: Perfect summer dress for a beach party, holiday party/bbq or even beach getaway. The dress was lightweight so perfect to wear outdoors on a hot day/night. The straps are adjustable. Would need to wear a strapless bra or pasties under it. Fabric is thin so undergarments would be visible.
I'm small chested but I found this dress to be big up top..more for a perfect hourglass body shape. Wasn't see through at all! So cute on.
I loved the fit of this dress. It's straight through the torso but flares at the hips. It was perfect for dancing salsa all night.

I needed white clothes for my bachelorette in tulum. There were slim pickings on rtr so I went with this even though it's much more feminine and frilly that my usual style. At first I thought I looked like a cupcake but once I got used to seeing myself in such a feminine dress, it's super cute and flattering. The body fit perfectly, the bodice is perfectly fitted so I didn't have to wear a bra and felt comfortable and it gave great waist shape. I got so many complements and ended up surprisingly loving this dress

I loved this dress and the material is really nice. It wasn’t the right fit for my body type. Being a pear shape, the mid panel that doesn’t have a tier of extra fabric can highlight your torso and mid section. For me, my waist is more flattering than my hips, and this just made me look disjointed. Never ended up wearing it on vacation.
I wanted to love this, but the waste seam falls at a weird spot and I wish there were pockets. It's cute, but not great. It is a nice fabric though and not see through

links_Review_Title: Fun, but not a home run.
links_Review_Text: Very cute dress; love the red embroidered trim as a splash of color. Material doesn’t have much give to it, so I couldn’t even zip the size 6 (my typical dress size). With my broad shoulders and wide rib cage (but very flat chest), the size 8 was just big enough to not be uncomfortable.

links_Review_Title: I am keeping this one! I felt great!
links_Review_Text: Fit perfectly and the places wear it was more snug gave way a bit as the evening went on. So it got more comfortable! Fun flattering and beautiful comfortable dress for a warm outdoor party.
Too flouncy

links_Review_Title: Beautiful! comfortable , great for warm weather
links_Review_Text: Super comfortable and pretty dress. Can dress up or down. fits true to size
great for every day wear. if you have amazing arms show them. I'm typically a size 6-8 but I prefer things very form fitted so probably could have gone down to a size 4 on this one.
Fit perfectly, the material was light and not heavy. No see-through and what added to the outfit was a cute little cardigan. Received so many compliments! Love this!

links_Review_Title: Well made but just wasn't flattering on me
links_Review_Text: Heavy fabric with pretty embroidery. I felt like it hugged my stomach (and I don't have much of one) and it made my hips look wide. I don't know I expected it to be light and flowey and it kind of seems bulky and heavy. I did love how tan it made me look and the straps are very cool
description probably should note that it'll not accommodate a large bosom.

links_Review_Title: Too small, couldn't wear it. Looked better in pics
links_Review_Text: Lots of fabric

The second ruffle was too far down. I have a very long torso so it didn't look very proportionate on my body. The material was very nice and light, would be a great summer dress it the ruffles were just more evenly spaced.

links_Review_Title: lots of ruffles, lots of material
links_Review_Text: thought it would be too much dress for a tropical vacation
Loved wearing this to dinner on vacation. It was fun, fit well, and very comfortable.

links_Review_Title: I wasn't able to wear it
links_Review_Text: The ruffles are very fluffy and take over. I am 5'6" and it hit me at the wrong point on my calf.

links_Review_Title: Still debating if I should buy this.
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress! I bought it for an anniversary trip and absolutely loved it. It was very tight through the waist. Not uncomfortable, but definitely a dress I would only eat salad in :-)
Very flattering, pretty
The proportions are not flattering.
Wrinkles easily

links_Review_Title: I got so many compliments on this amazing dress!
links_Review_Text: It fit just like I thought it would!
Fit perfectly. It's good quality heavy cotton with beautiful frills.. not too girly, just fun enough! Loved the clean crisp white which the pop of red!
i felt like a cupcake and didnt wear it. i think this is better for taller people, at least 5'5

links_Review_Title: Heartbroken I can't wear this every day
links_Review_Text: This dress is perfect. It fits true to size, the color is rich, and the detailing is immaculate. This is my favorite piece I've ever rented. My event was cancelled so I didn't get to wear it when I wanted to but I know I will find an excuse to rent and wear this in the future. The zipper was a little difficult but it worked. But this dress is perfection. I'm 5"4' and it wasn't too long or too short.
Sexy dress for wedding. Size up for sure, I did 1 size up and was fine, the side zipper is tight but was able to get it on with help. Would definitely wear again & again

links_Review_Title: Sexy yet classy - perfect for my event!
links_Review_Text: This dress was great! I got many compliments throughout the night and felt that the corset top added some sexiness but the dress overall was very classy. Only issue I had was that the zipper was tough to get up over the seam.
Absolutely loved this dress! Should have went I size up, but I was able to make it work.

I'm usually a size 4 but ended up wearing the size 6 because it runs pretty small. The dress was a little difficult to zip up, I needed help. Overall, the dress was very comfortable and elegant. Love the thick fabric and color of the dress, perfect for a winter wedding.
Beautiful dress with great details. Unfortunately zipper was very hard to close. Had to work for a while to get it closed! Especially at the center where the sash is! Gorgeous fabric!

This dress is seriously amazing, I did not want to return. Lots of compliments. It's unique and fit really well. The bottom fabric is thick and drapes nicely. The previous reviews were right though. Definitely for smaller chests... I'm a 34b and it fit me perfectly. Wore the 4, it was slightly tight but good because the top stayed up. The 6 fit as well but I felt like it was going to slide down.

links_Review_Title: I wanted to love this much!!!!!
links_Review_Text: If you are anything larger than a B cup I would not recommend. I loved the shape, color, and style of this dress but as you can clearly see it was NOT fitting in the bust! So so sad it didn't fit!
Wore this dress for an art party. Normally, I wear a 0 and this time took a 2 - happy I did it runs small but the good thing is the corset is tight and it doesn't fall down.

links_Review_Title: Love love love this dress but SO small on larger busts
links_Review_Text: I rented this for my engagement party and loved it but it runs SO small in the busy. Jonathan Simkhai sizing charts shows a 33" bust on a size 8, so I sized up to a 10 hoping that was incorrect. I fit into the 10 but it was so tight on the top of the dress as you can see. I would consider buying and keeping this dress in a larger size but wow I am not a 12. This designer runs very small. PS there is a filter on my photo, the dress is a true burgundy.

links_Review_Title: I didn't wear but I really recommend it
links_Review_Text: I first rented a size 10 but I had to get size 12 runs small buts it's stunning dress
Arrived really wrinkled. Pretty color. Fit okay on top as I am a B cup. But I have a booty! Just did not look good on the bottom.

links_Review_Title: This dress was a show stopper. My husband could not keep his eyes or hands off me.
links_Review_Text: Fits beautifully. Top gives you cleavage even if you thing you don’t have much. The front wrap shows just enough leg when you walk. And the color....the color is stunning. I wore leopard heels and gold jewelry. I’m 5’3”, 122lbs and 42 yrs old. Bust size 34b and athletic build.

Rented this dress to wear to a wedding and was super excited to get it! Based upon other reviews, I sized up for my rental and sized up 2 sizes for my backup. When the dress arrived, NEITHER fit me! I usually wear a size 4, sometimes a size 6 depending upon the brand. The size 8 would not even zip over my ribcage. Super disappointing and the sizing of the dress is most definitely off.

The dress is stunning and unique but I am a C cup and it barely worked for me. However, I received many compliments. The fall the drape was beautiful and covered any little bulges. For reference I am 5'4", 130 lbs and usually a size 6, I wore the size 8. It is more suited to an A/B cup size.
I loved this dress but I usually wear a zero and could not zip this up. The material is beautiful and thick but doesn't have much stretch around the bust.

I am usually a 0 in dresses off the rack. I am 5'2" and 115lbs. I ordered a 2 in this dress and it was nearly impossible to zip while off; so when I tried it on, it was so tight in the chest and I could not zip it to save my life. It had enough room to close, but there was no way. Order 2 sizes up!! It was a beautiful dress

This dress is absolutely beautiful in person. The material is dreamy and the color is even better IRL As the other reviewer mentioned, the cups are VERY small. I am a 32/34C and decided to size up to a 4 in hopes that my bust would fit better. Unfortunately the cups were still TINY and it just looked silly on me, so I did not end up wearing.

links_Review_Title: Really beautiful gown! Gorgeous detail and flattering for my body shape. Didn't want to return it!
links_Review_Text: The size 14 fit but was a little snug around my stomach and arms. I went for the larger size to ensure more mobility with the sleeves and to sit comfortably. The sleeves are not super scratchy but I did rub a little powder on my arms to make sure I was comfortable all night.
This dress is perfect because it can be dressed up or down. Very pretty, fem, and versatile.

This dress fit like an absolute glove. It was the most romantic thing I could find for a winter wedding rehearsal dinner. The nude slip with the red stitching was so beautiful and I got compliments on it all night. I would highly recommend this dress if you have a formal affair to attend. I don't typically wear tea length dresses and I thought this one was a little long so I wore my highest heel.
Don't size up! This dress was too large on me bc I sized up. I was excited for this dress but it was too big, long, and loud for me to wear comfortably. Did not wear.

This dress was a serious show stopper! I wore it to a upscale rehearsal dinner and got compliments all night. It was comfortable enough to wear all night, and I felt like a million bucks. Highly recommend!

The red & hot pink embroidery on this dress is a show stopper! Surprisingly, I wore Spanx & the dress fit like a glove! I was worried this dress would not be flattering because of the nude slip dress, but it was! I would recommend this as a rental!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful red dress for a Florida winter wedding
links_Review_Text: I got so lucky! This was the last size left so I only had one dress- and it fit! Super comfy and beautiful color (has both red and pink floral pattern). Also, bra straps show through the lace on the top so be prepared to go bra less or strapless.
I just wish a smaller size was available but the dress was perfect otherwise! Wore it to my company holiday party
Perfect for evening catholic wedding. There was a small tear in the lace overlay but wasn't super noticeable. Got lots of compliments! Fit was perfect.

This dress is STUNNING! I received so many compliments and felt amazing! After a recent weight loss, I struggle finding an appropriate size in different designers. I am between a 12 and 14. I ended up wearing the 14 and was comfortable all night long!
This may be the most stunning dress I have ever worn. I loved it!

This dress is so pretty! I was stopped by people I didn't know that complimented me. I received so many comments about the dress on social media after posting pictures from the wedding I attended. The dress fit true to size. I even wore a regular nude colored bra with it. It is flattering and comfortable. The color is vibrant and eye catching.
This dress is beautiful, intricate and you'll be getting compliments all night. Definitely have someone around to zip, but it's lovely!

links_Review_Title: Many many many compliments from guests, the bride, even the photographers.
links_Review_Text: This dress is absolutely beautiful on. The tea length was perfect. The detail with the lace was very intricate. The sleeves added a nice touch. I couldn't put my arms up very much, but I didn't really need to either. The bodice was a little tight, but if I had gone a size up, it would have been too baggy at the top. It was not tight to the point where I couldn't move or breathe so it was all good. I got a ton of compliments on the dress, on and even carrying it in the garment bag. Love love love

links_Review_Title: Tea-Length terrific, size up for comfort
links_Review_Text: I could get into my size without assistant but I recommend sizing up just so you have smooth lines/can eat/breathe/dance around with impunity

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress. Comfortable and felt like a million bucks...
links_Review_Text: Lots of compliments. Fits perfectly. 5'2. 130 lbs Usually a size 6. Clasp was broken on the back and some of the embroidery was coming undone but the dress was gorgeous

I cannot tell you enough about how incredible this dress is! The color is gorgeous and the embroidery is stunning. Non-stop compliments all night! The only issue was that it was a little big for me in the chest area, but I blame my own genetics for that. I would definitely rent this dress again!

This actually was my backup dress after my first order didn't fit at all...the dress fit true to size - though a bit snug in the waist and bodice. That being said, it was comfortable to move around in and I received a bunch of compliments throughout the evening! The embroidery is to die for, and the color is fantastic. Highly recommend for any formal/black tie optional event!

This fit is great if you are an hourglass - the waist is the only fitted part really the hips and bust have a bit of give as do the arm bands. I could have maybe swung a 14 in this. It does run longer I'm 5'8 and it was lower than tea length which I liked but point being unless you are really tall I don't think it would hit anyone like it does on the model.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful fabric- good for people with hour glass figures
links_Review_Text: I love this dress!!! I have a straight silhouette (aka a bit of a belly!) So I felt a little self conscious as this is designed for a small waist figure. But the fabric is so pretty I wore it anyways and loved it!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress for a garden wedding reception
links_Review_Text: The dress fit great. No give on the waist band or bust so need to be aware of this when renting. Though this was my first choice for the wedding I ended up wearing the back up dress only because I liked it a smidge better. I would definitely rent this again!
The outfit looked wonderful and fit the vibe for having our dinner rehearsal at a dim sum restaurant. Loved it!
It fit great, and was perfect for the occasion. The only issue I had was the top clip coming undone a few times.
It was a little tight around the stomach but looked much better than the 16. I loved where the dress hit on my leg and I found it very flattering.

This dress is gorgeous. Beautiful detail work that is very unique. I'm 5'3" so it hit around my ankles rather than midi length. I could have possibly worn a size 4 on top (34C usually- I went braless which felt fine) but i think the butt area would have been too tight (I have a big butt and thighs). This dress works for curvier girls. I wore it to an indoor summer wedding, it would have been a bit heavy for a hot outdoor wedding.

I LOVED everything about this dress. I've only ever worn Marchesa dresses to all the weddings I've attended this year. The 0 was exactly the right size for me. I wish I could wear this dress to work without being over the top! Snatch this beauty up for your next wedding!

links_Review_Title: Not only is this my favorite dress I've worn, but my boyfriend says it's his as well!
links_Review_Text: The color was even more beautiful in person. Great length and fit. The top would have been a little right if I wore a bra, but I was able to go without one comfortably.
This dress is lovely! Fits true to size, a little snug on top so maybe size up for your second size. Great length and the dress came in excellent condition.

Wore to "Garden Formal" wedding. Fit great- awesome option for petites. The length was perfect for me being 5'0. Weather was around 70 degrees and could have felt a little warm if the temperature wouldn't have dropped.

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous dress, I received lots of compliments, but it did not fit awesomely.
links_Review_Text: I am 5'4", 115lbs, 34B, 26" waist. The dress wanted a longer torso and a couple inches; you can see the extra fabric around my waist and it grazed my ankles in a way I didn't love. The waist is very tight and doesn't give. The dress needs tits to fill it out. The arms are a little droopy and it was a bit hard to lift my arms over my head on the dance floor. (But it was still very dance-able.) The back neck clasp came undone several times (I think due to my height). All that said, its beyond beautiful and was fun to wear, even though I had to hold my breath the whole night. The wedding dress was "mountain formal" and this dress, paired with boots and a cowboy hat really fit the bill.

links_Review_Title: Loved this dress! The detail is so beautiful. Fits true to size. Tons of compliments.
links_Review_Text: Fits true to size. I’m 5’6 and the length was perfect and unique. The color is beautiful.
LOVED THIS DRESS! I got so many compliments on it all throughout the evening- the fabric is so high quality and just stunning. Fit very will and true to size- shorter on me since I am 6'0"

This dress is an amazing color and is very comfortable. I rented this for an outdoor wedding with a black tie dress code and it fit the bill perfectly. You could easily make this even more formal with black heels and sleek jewelry but I went with gold block heels and statement earrings. It also travels well and doesn't get too wrinkly.

This dress was just stunning! I ordered both a 0 and 2 and ended up wearing the 0. The 2 definitely had more room in the waist/tummy area but the 0 looked like it fit better once on. I rented 4 other dresses and this one was by far my favorite!

links_Review_Title: Hints of fuchsia with a popping red!
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress. Wore it to church for Easter and then to my family's house for dinner. I received so many compliments. The photos do not do the dress justice. The hint of pink in this garment really brought it to life for me. If I was a repeat wearer, I would rent again. Absolutely recommend! I have no idea how I'll top this for my next rental.

I sized up to a 14 since I have a large bust and it was perfect. The color is vibrant and the dress is a showstopper!! I can't wait to wear it to the wedding! It's not super comfortable, but worth it for the gorgeous look. Excuse the mirror selfie!

links_Review_Title: I wore this dress to a military ball and felt so beautiful!
links_Review_Text: This dress is stunning and surprisingly comfortable. I have no complaints!
Wearing to a formal wedding. Love this color. Got a lot of compliments
The fit was amazing. I received compliments throughout the wedding. Bonus that the dress was extremely comfortable!
I rented this for engagement photos. It was perfect. It's a great color, great fit, great for formal occasions. Photographs beautifully!
Loved this dress! Wore it to a wedding and got so many compliments! Sized up bc the 4 was a little tighter than I wanted!

I loved this dress and how it made me feel! The colors were fantastic and the cut of the skirt is very fun. I should have worn a Cami because V was very low. I had to send back the ten and the 12 fit much better.
Had to keep pulling it up, 6 probably would've been a better choice.
Wore this to a fun dinner in Chicago! Got soo many compliments on this dress. I needed a size or 2 bigger but I just left it unzipped and tossed a jacket over it because it was so cute lol

Dress it up or down. Bc of the colors you can wear it for summer or winter season. I rented for a few days away in Florida with sandals, and then wore it back home in the cold with leggings, boots and a denim jacket.
Flattering dress, fun and flirty. Also really comfortable. Perfect for date night.

This dress is very flattering for someone with a fuller bust. I was able to still wear a bra. The fabric is thick / scrunchie so it hides all the right places. Fun pattern, but on the short side for me (5'6" long legs). Wore on vacation. Would rent again.

links_Review_Title: Stunning number from Tanya Taylor with an eye-popping pattern & color scheme!
links_Review_Text: Another beautiful dress from Tanya Taylor! Fit true-to-size and enjoyed that the bust area was slightly V-shaped, but had plenty of coverage if wearing in a corporate setting. The colors on this one are positively delightful, and could bring sunshine on even the rainiest winter day! Paired with black tights and ankle booties. Wore this one a couple of times, including to the office and to take my niece shopping for a flower girl dress. Wear this beauty in happiness and good health!
I'm a 10 but my bust is a 14 and this dress just hugs my body so well. Tight in chest but I love how it looks. Fun and flirty for a date or a cute work look.
Fits nicely and I am heavy chested. Its such a versatile dress,can wear in the winter with boots or summer with sandals.

links_Review_Title: Super cute dress! Great color and fit!
links_Review_Text: I absolutely loved this dress. It is very flattering. I will reorder when it gets warmer. It would be the perfect summer date night dress.
This is really right in the waist, I was hoping the cut would hide my stomach but it didn't, I should have gone up a size.

Really cute dress - more low-cut of a V-neck than I normally wear...probably more flattering for someone with a larger chest but the pattern was fun and the fit was otherwise very flattering (great length and strategic ruching!). wish I had a picture - wore it with black tights, booties and a cropped jacket.

links_Review_Title: Great dress! Unfortunately I wore something else. Would love another opportunity to wear
links_Review_Text: true to size and fit well on my short torso
Amazing pleats and figure flattering
Ran big. I am usually a 2/4 in dresses and this swallowed me (the 4). Definitely a cute dress, though!
This dress was SO cute. Definitely size up. I'm a curvy 4 and got the 6 which was still a bit tight in my chest but being I didn't wear a bra it worked out. Definitely recommend!

This dress was totally stunning. I usually wear a 2 in dresses but the 4 fit perfectly. I had a blue bra that complemented the colors and looked great exposed (it's a unique racerback bra)! I really wish I could afford to buy this one. I'm in love. Oh, & it's has pockets! Seriously a dream dress that will make you feel effortlessly beautiful.

Fit just as you would expect, just not as flattering as I would have hoped. It puffed out a bit but still got compliments and liked the fit overall. Rented for vacation and wore to dinner one night and was very comfortable.
Perfection! No bra needed! Even w big boobs. Pockets! Slimming! Constant compliments!

links_Review_Title: Worn as a costume, but beautiful nevertheless
links_Review_Text: I wore this to an Oktoberfest celebration and it was fitting. I could still imagine wearing it to another event as it is a beautiful dress with a great print. The material does not wrinkle easily, which is great, as I discovered there was no iron in my airbnb when I needed to change into it. I am normally a size 2-4, closer to a 4, and should have rented the 4. (Size up if you are between sizes.) Instead, I rented the 2, which was all that was available at the time, and it was definitely too tight to button the top few buttons, even without the shirt I wore underneath. Very beautiful, vibrant colors.

links_Review_Title: Super fun for a summer BBQ party or hot date
links_Review_Text: Great dress - I usually wear either a 6 or an 8 and risked the 6. It fit perfectly but there was a little bit of pulling around the boob area, the buttons are real. Wore to a wedding rehearsal dinner / BBQ event and I'm seriously considering buying this dress. It was really flattering and I got tons of compliments.

Absolutely loved this dress! The fabric quality is fab- super thick with a bit of stretch. The empire waist made it so that I could rock this cutie at 6 months pregnant! Compliments and confidence galore. Will definitely rent again!

links_Review_Title: Cute dress... but extremely busty on me. I love the style reminded me of a stepford wife.
links_Review_Text: Tight on a the top of s busty girl.

links_Review_Title: This fit like a glove, did amazing things for my breasts!
links_Review_Text: Loved this piece. It was perfect for a summer birthday dinner party.
Like all Saloni, I size up to a six. Super cute dress. Didn't need a bra. Straps did keep falling off but it was manageable.

links_Review_Title: Felt like I belonged in a German/Austrian village with the pattern but good dress
links_Review_Text: Salon I runs small - I size up to a 4 as a normal 2. Still a little tight in the chest for a 32DD. I liked the pockets and the length. Cute dress!
The dress was a little bit tight in the chest. I wore it with no bra and I'm a 34B. The straps were too long for me so I had to pin them in the back.

I will start saying I loved this dress. It is cute, it is comfortable and good quality. Having said that, I think the straps were too long; they kept slipping off my shoulders, especially when I was sitting. I also had to wear a white top underneath because I didn't want to show too much cleavage. But overall, I enjoyed wearing this colorful dress.

links_Review_Title: Cute style but too small on the chest

links_Review_Text: This is a gorgeous dress but it runs extremely small. I am usually a 2 or 4 in dresses and got this in a 4 - I couldn’t even button it all the way up. Bummer because I loved it, so order up!!

Runs small so I didnt wear it. However, the dress is lovely. Im a 6R always and I couldnt close the top buttons.. its probably made with girls with a smaller frame, although Ive never had issues before. Anyway, its beautiful, I wish I had been able to wear it.

links_Review_Title: Cute dress but definitely runs small!
links_Review_Text: I am petite and the top of this dress fit like a corset on me. I wore it and thought the overall look was pretty, but would definitely order it 1 size up next time. Straps are also long as stated by other reviewers.

Wore this as a day dress for our adventure to the Ammoudi Bay in Oia, Santorini. I paired it with flat brown Grecian sandals was complimented by the most chic local women on how lovely I looked and how fitting it was for the setting. Surprised to find it was such a substantial cotton fabric and less red-white-blue, more red-white-blue-orange-pink, which ended up working better for me anyway, as I wore a complimentary orange/pink/white smocked bikini underneath that provided for some more coverage. It is a bit low cut for daytime, and since I sized up probably unnecessarily (options offerred were S or M - not number sizing - but a 6 arrived), it was a little longer than it needed to be and the shape wasn't really doing my figure any favors. Would go with the 4 if I were to rent it again. Still, it was somehow classic in that quaint Sound of Music way and felt completely right!

links_Review_Title: These buttons were working hard. And I have a 26.5 inch waist... :/
links_Review_Text: I tried to upload a photo but there were issues with the site and I eventually gave up. WAAAAYYYY tighter in the top than expected. Completely smashed bust and the buttons were pulling so you could tell it was too small. A larger size would have been too large in the skirt because the skirt already had extra fabric as it was. Perhaps the extra fabric should have been used for the waist/bust...? The shoulder straps were long which was odd given how small the rest of the top was. Super cute print though and would have been amazing if it was a better fit. Not sure how to recommend sizing to anyone....but if you have any bust at all you should size up.
If you are TRULY a D cup, this will be VERY tight on your bust. Fit perfect everywhere except the bust was super tight, also the straps were too long and fell alot.

To begin, this garment runs small, yet the straps are too long and don't adjust. That aside, the fabric is a crisp poplin with a touch of stretch and the dress is innocently sexy. Lots of cleavage, knee length. Fun.

links_Review_Title: Too small, was unable to wear
links_Review_Text: Small

links_Review_Title: So many compliments! I would buy the size up if it was cheaper. Perfect bright summer dress.
links_Review_Text: Tight fit in the chest.

Such a cute dress but unfortunately not a fit for bustier ladies. I am 5'2" 34D and could not close the top of a size 4. I don't think even a size 6 would fit me comfortably in the chest. The silhouette is otherwise gorgeous on this dress so I'm really bummed that wearing this is not a possibility for me.
A little low cut and cleavage showing but otherwise awesome

The pattern and material is adorable, perfect for brunch or a bbq. Unfortunately there is zero give / stretch in the ribcage so I would size up if you have a wide rib cage or larger chest. Will rent again and try a 6 vs 4.
The dress fit perfect except for a little too snug at the bust and right under. Could have gotten away with it but wouldn't be able to eat!

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous pattern, well made, small fit issues
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress but the bust was SO tight. I added a thick belt over the waist line to hide some of the puckering that was happening in the chest. The fabrication is very high quality and the pockets are very convenient. Will rent again a size up

links_Review_Title: Bust was small straps were long
links_Review_Text: Bust pulled at the button but the straps were way too long - could have been cute but the straps needed to be adjustable and a secondary latch would have helped at the bust.
