First of all let me tell you I loved everything about this dress - except that the straps were just a tad to long and so I either had to have the dress tugged down just right or should have put double stick tape on those guys. But honestly - the pattern is so bright and colorful, the pockets were a godsend at a garden wedding, and the form was so flattering. I want this dress.
fits well!!

links_Review_Title: SUPER cute but SUPER tight in the bust.
links_Review_Text: very tight in the chest area so would need to size up although overall it fit really cute.

links_Review_Title: Too small so I had to send back
links_Review_Text: It was a beautiful dress, but ran too small. You would also need a camisole with it- very low cut

links_Review_Title: Good day dress for a shower or party
links_Review_Text: Tight in the torso and a little low cut on the cleavage but I wouldn't have sized up. I wore it with an army green utility vest to keep it a little more casual and modest but I'd wear it alone on a weekend.

links_Review_Title: Strange fit in the chest, great material
links_Review_Text: The fabric was nice and heavy, but not too hot for outdoor wear. The main issue was the strange fit in the chest. The band below the bust fit a little snug. I rented a 10 and usually I wear an 8. So in that spot, I'd say it runs small. But the straps are very long and the bust itself is sized appropriately. So I couldn't keep the straps up and could NOT wear a bra with the dress because it hit me so low. I ended up sending this back unworn because this was a recipe for a wardrobe malfunction.
I love Saloni dresses but whenever straps are involved they are always too long. The dress was beautiful otherwise.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful fabric, flattering bodice but long straps
links_Review_Text: I usually wear 8 - 10 but always size up to 12 with Saloni. Size 10 might have fit better – the waist was surprisingly large on me. I have a short torso, soft belly, and 32E chest – the straps were too long, no button gaping, but it went over my large chest so low that you could see my bra so I styled with a black turtleneck underneath.

If only the straps had adjustment or I was a little taller/a little less full in the bust. Being short with a full bust makes shopping so hard! This dress has such beautiful fabric and details; it fit like a glove in the waist and I love the length, but I would have to go braless because due to strap length this ends up looking VERY low cut. Would not recommend if you have small shoulders/petite frame with full bust.

I ordered this for a day time event and it was stunning! The print, the pockets, I thought it was going to be an easy choice that I would be wearing this dress. Unfortunately, for my body type it did not work. The straps were WAY too long and the button front was gaping a little. So sad but I'm sure would work for girls without large chests.

links_Review_Title: Such a sparkly fun unique dress that scored me lots of compliments!
links_Review_Text: I ordered a large and wanted medium as a back up but due to availability had to order a small. The large and small fit the same! Stretchy waist and wrap belt made it easier to fit! I did use a pin to close up the bust a little but that was mainly due to it being a work party and wanting to be a smidge more modest. No complaints- it was comfortable, fun, and had sleeves to make a winter event a little more bearable!

This was a perfect fit for me! I ordered the XS and the S, and the small just felt more comfortable and gave me a tad more length. I'm a 32B in the chest and wore this with a regular strapless bra with no issues. I didn't have to pin it or anything and it stayed in place great without any fashion tape. I received tons of compliments! It was perfect for my Mardi Gras ball.
I wore this dress for a casino night. It was a little short, and definitely could not wear any bra I owned, though it was comfy and I received a lot of compliments.
I rented this for a Roaring 20s party, it was definitely on brand. It's so comfortable. Very stretchy too.
wore to a holiday party and it was perfect! super comfy and flattering
Beautiful dress! It was rather short (I am 5'8) the large fit best in the top but I wore the back up xl for the little bit of extra length!

links_Review_Title: Comfortable Fancy Formal Dress (what else can you ask for?)
links_Review_Text: I am normally a size 12 in dresses so ordered the XL and Large. The Large was a MUCH better fit up top but was a little short (stockings solved that problem) The XL was better on length but my boobs just couldn't fill it out and felt like it was super saggy up top. I imagine if you're gifted a little more than my size B boobs, than the XL might work!

links_Review_Title: So flattering and tons of compliments!
links_Review_Text: This is the perfect sparkly holiday dress--it shimmers without getting glitter all over your legs and arms! Very lightweight and a perfect fit.

I usually wear a 4 in shirts, and most dresses, and 6 in pants so I snagged an XS ("4") and an S ("6") as a backup. Glad I did! The S ended up fitting way better. I was a bit worried that it would be too short for my work's winter party, but I wore it with tights and the lining in the skirt part is tight enough that everything stays put. Got a lot of compliments, and it worked for the 1920's theme of the party even though it is decidedly not a dress you'd see at a Gatsby party. But it's gold and fun, so I'm claiming it worked.

Rented for a NYE party and was so happy with the dress. Sized up for length based on previous rentals with this designer but could have stayed TTS as it was a bit baggy in the chest. Dress was flattering and received many compliments on the dress. Would rent again!
I loved this dress. It's super comfy and I received sooo many compliments. I was a little uncomfortable with how low cut the chest was, so I just pinned it to make sure it stayed in place! Viola!

I rented this dress for Christmas but unfortunately, I hated the belt that came with the dress. It made the whole dress look sloppy and it was sewn on, so it couldn't be removed. I ended up wearing the dress for a photoshoot so I hid the belt in the back and wore my own belt. I LOVE how the dress came out in photos. It looks amazing in photos, but just "nice" in person. Glad I got some use out of it, though! Great length. Great fit but you will probably need something underneath for the top.

links_Review_Title: Got this for a black and gold themed holiday party and it was the perfect amount of shimmer.
links_Review_Text: Would have been 5 stars but the dress was super short on me - it worked out with opaque tights but I would not have been able to wear it with bare legs. I am 5'8 for reference. Otherwise it fit great and was super comfortable and cute for a holiday party!

links_Review_Title: I celebrated the completion of my master's degree at a fun spot in Wash, DC with friends & family!
links_Review_Text: I got so many compliments on this dress at my graduation party. It was so comfortable and a great length. I love the stretchy material and adjustable tie waist. I used dress tape to keep the top in place but the fabric took to the tape and I had no issues at all. This dress was the perfect amount of shimmer!
rented this dress for a formal Christmas office party, loved the dress received a lot of compliments, it runs a teeny bit short and it's very flowing in the wind as it is thin

links_Review_Title: Such a statement piece while still being comfortable and easy to style
links_Review_Text: I am on the shorter side (5'2") and wished I had sized down. The overall fit was amazing, hit in the right places, cinched my waist and created an amazing neck line, but it was a bit too long in the hem and sleeves. Definitely would recommend this for an event though, it is super comfortable and very flattering on all different body types

I wore this for a night out in Las Vegas (dinner, show, etc.) The length and fit were perfect, I was so comfy all night. My only (non) issue is that the sleeves were a bit puffier than I have ever worn, but I still loved it!

links_Review_Title: Perfect for my New Years party!
links_Review_Text: The material is stretchy so it is very comfortable! It is low cut but I did not feel exposed. It was the perfect amount of sexy and it was flattering on my figure.

links_Review_Title: Great choice for a winter wedding!
links_Review_Text: Color was much prettier and more multi-dimensional in-person, super easy to dance in, very flattering to wear

links_Review_Title: Great dress for a work holiday party!
links_Review_Text: Fit nice, needed a safety pin for the bust area but other than that it was great!
This dress is gorgeous. Flirty and fun. Used a saftey pin to secure the top. The fit was true to size. It is quite short though so i wore booty shorts just in case. Perfect for my Christmas party.

links_Review_Title: This was the perfect dress to feel confident in!
links_Review_Text: I am glad I got an XXS. I typically wear an XS or S but this was the perfect fit because the V-neck wasn't too low and the length was perfect. I loved the cinched waist and the twirly skirt. It was very flattering

links_Review_Title: I felt confident in the dress!
links_Review_Text: I rented this for a company holiday party and got a lot of compliments throughout the night! The XL fit great, which worked out since a backup size wasn't available. It is a pretty short dress so I ended up wearing panty hose with it.

I love the way this fits and would've bought it except for the inexplicable choice to put a slit that stops above my crotch (seriously, I'm not even exaggerating). Why make a dress for work purposes in suit fabric/style that is inappropriate for a work environment? I don't even find it appropriate with tights.

The knot in the middle really makes for a flattering waistline. There's a hook-and-eye feature in the v-neck so you can adjust the deepness of the neckline to be more or less conservative. The material is thick enough to wear without a bra, which I did. Some of the reviews mention the hook-and-eye clasp not closing in the back - I found that when I pinched the hook piece after connecting it with the eye, it secured the clasp for the entire day. Also note that you can button and unbutton the buttons in the front vent. It's a great desk-to-dinner dress. Will definitely rent again.
This dress is amazing! If you're like me and need to work on your arms and tummy a little, this dress will hide everything while also managing to give you an hourglass shape. Loved it!

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous fit! Very flattering and so well made
links_Review_Text: This dress is gorgeous. I loved the way it fit and was extremely flattering. I rented it for a professional conference and wore it for the opening night party. You'll need a zipper buddy to get the back zipped up - that's the only con I can come up with. I wish this wasn't so expensive because this would have been mine forever. It makes a statement without being attention-grabbing. Will definitely rent again.

A great work dress that's just a little sexy but not inappropriately so. Only issue is the hook can come undone during the day. I might have gotten away with a size smaller but I liked that it was not super form-fitting while still being flattering.
Nice color, runs large overall with heavy yet wrinkly fabric. Nice length though for tall people / work appropriate. Need to pin or plan on wearing something pretty underneath - low neckline.
This is a nice statement dress. The only bad thing is that the hook on the back opened all the time.
perfect fit!!

Overall I really liked this dress, but the back closure was a bit weird. The zipper doesn't go all the way up, leaving a weird gap, and the top closure was really hard to do on my own. The button details on the skirt were neat, but be aware there's no material underneath! Fortunately I wore dark tights...
Love the silhouette this dress creates. It's lovely! Did end up pinning the front as it dips just a hair too low for work. Will rent again!

I hate a cap-sleeve, but had to try this dress. It went right back. I also didn't like how most of the buttoned slit in the front wasn't lined. I found it inappropriate for work, even if tights were worn.
This jumpsuit is perfect if you want to look great without looking like you are trying too hard.
Perfect dress up or dress down outfit. It has stretch and runs a little large, so probably wouldn't be great for smaller chested ladies.

links_Review_Title: My fiancé couldn't take his eyes off me!
links_Review_Text: Firm fitting, sexy and fun. Can dress up or down.

links_Review_Title: Snug fit but good for curves
links_Review_Text: Wore this for one of my bridal events and it was very sexy. Can accentuate hips well and bum for those with one!

This jumpsuit is super sexy! The details are great and the material is stretchy so that it fits well. You do need fairly full breast to make the bust fit right. I'm a 34C, but a little flat on top and had trouble with the top of the cup. Overall really nice jumpsuit that would be great to wear to a party or dinner out.
The chest was big and the fabric grew as I wore it. Maybe size down but I have a long torso so I am not sure that would work for me.

links_Review_Title: Super cute!! Great fit for short waisted ladies. Length teeny tiny bit long in legs at 5'4"
links_Review_Text: Comfortable and adorable the 4R fit me very well I think I am short waisted and The torso did not hang too low like a lot of jumpers. Denim is movable and stretchy I could wear with or without a strapless bra. I've been eating a lot on vaca in Vegas and the belly area wasn't really "held in" seemed to be hidden well. I probably weigh about 135 right now 34C 28 inch waist 36 inch hips. I felt so cute and a step above casual with some heels and earrings. Hubby loved it.

links_Review_Title: The twist on a sweetheart neckline. Style many ways!
links_Review_Text: I am a true zero and it's sometimes hard for me to find rompers and jumpsuits on RTR. This was PERFECT. I wore it in Mexico. Perfect mid weight stretch denim. Boyfriend loved it. Very flattering on the torso. No bra needed.
Fit perfectly and super trendy for this 29Rooms exhibit I went to. Got lots of compliments.
Cute, but I didn't have enough to fill the top. It was too big in the small of my back and breast area. I returned without wearing this one.
Very tight and flattering, accentuates the arch of the back. Tough to zip and unzip though. Great with cardigan too.

links_Review_Title: Wore it for my birthday dinner. GREAT jumpsuit- fit perfectly and I felt super confident.
links_Review_Text: Absolutely in love with this jumpsuit. Hugged me in all the right places. A really great outfit and kept me feeling sexy all night.

It's different, that's for sure. If you can get past the idea of wearing a denim jumpsuit (without feeling like Brittany and Justin c.2001) it's adorable. It is so soft and forgiving, almost like a jegging material, and fit like a glove. A little busty, but no other issues. Loved it! (Sorry for the bad photo - I didn't take any others!)
One of my favorites!! Many compliments. Great fit!!!
The jumper has good stretch. I like that it covered my 32DD chest and if I wanted to I could add a blouse under it to be more conservative.
Very sexy and fun jumpsuit. Good amount of stretch so size down if you want it more fitted in the bust (aka not having to pull up every five seconds). Nice thick denim that shaped everything nicely.

This jumpsuit was amazing! I got a ton of compliments all night- it was super comfortable! easy to move in- a bit big on top, but it stayed up without issue. The material did wrinkle easily. A great jumpsuit to dress up or make a bit more casual!
Very original jumper. It's actually a dark denim with white trim.

links_Review_Title: The jumpsuit is so flattering and comfortable. You can feel stylish while also running to the train.
links_Review_Text: It hugs your waist at the perfect spot to really accentuate your curves. Also holds the twins up nicely... I wasn't even wearing a bra. It's perfect for a daytime stroll that lasts into night. It's really hard to find a fit like this, loved it!!
Kept this one for awhile. Wore to concert with sneakers, work with a white blazer, and night out with heels. Great rental! Lots of stretch so huge to body well

Rented for my birthday dinner and bar hopping. The fit was ALMOST perfect, which is a lot to say for a rental, I think. It is a teeny bit long in the torso if you're on the petite side. I also wish it was just a tad more snug in the chest. I almost think I could have gotten away with a 2 and then it would have been perfect. Would definitely rent again.

This was wonderful. Tags on made it even better. The fabric has give, so I’ll rent in the summer and go down a size. The top fit me fine at a 36B, but with a strapless bra, it was better to pump up the girls. This jumpsuit is super easy to wear and with shorter legs you’re not dragging it all over the bathroom floor and fumbling. Easy, easy, easy zipping...

Need chest up top to fill in the chest area but it stretches and I didn't have an issue - this designer usually runs small but I could fit into it and I'm not the smallest - it's amazing so comfortable, so many compliments - I would rent it over again - perfect for the spring and cooler summers and it's light weight
Jumpsuits can be tricky but this fit perfect and was so fun to wear!!! Since it's new, there were no reviews so I took a chance and went w my usual size 6. It's so comfortable and cute!!

I originally rented this in the spring in an 8 and the top was way too big (see my previous review posted with photo) even with a padded bra. This is me in the 6r and I think it looks order good. Still the cups wrinkle a bit even with the padded bra lol but I pulled it off. It's different and interesting and everyone at the party complimented me in it.
Great fit, but you will need a strapless bra... really flattering and fun.
I LOVED THIS jumpsuit! Looked great, very complimentary on my hourglass figure.....true to jumpsuits, you need a friend when using the ladies room to zip back up
Good concept. Didn't work on my figure. Did not wear.

links_Review_Title: Great denim jumpsuit that can be dressed up or down.
links_Review_Text: Fit like a glove but stretched through the hips easily. I felt like a million bucks in this jumpsuit and would definitely rent it again. I received compliments all night!
Jumpsuit looked great on and fit well. I am however large breasted and it was a little difficult to keep the top in place. So for women who are larger on top I would pass.
Very cute! Nice thick demin with enough body to stay up all night. Did not wear a bra and it was fine. True to size. Loved it.

But I wasn't in Vegas, I was just living my normal life at home. This outfit was cute- just. I sized down to an 8 and that didn't work out great- it was too tight imo although chest fit fine. No problems with it slipping though! I styled with snakeskin sandals and silver jewelry.
Hard to zip past waist, I might need a size up.

links_Review_Title: Got many compliments on it - loved the way it fit!
links_Review_Text: Great fit and very comfortable!

links_Review_Title: Really nice just too small In the chest
links_Review_Text: Did not wear. To small in the back.
Needed a strapless bra to fill in the top Just right but overall AMAZING! Will wear again

i'm typically a 2 and this fit perfectly. looks best w high wedges since it'm short. there's a touch of stretch all around, but be aware, this will show everything so i don't recommend for a large dinner. the denim isn't too thick so it was fine even though it was warm out. i did find myself pulling it up every so often, but i think it was just because i didn't wear a bra. rent this sexy and edgy jumpsuit.
This is sooo cute but it's very large up top even though it fit everywhere else. I'm a 32 DD and had to pull it up frequently. A little large in the legs too. Would rent again in a smaller size.

links_Review_Title: Cute jumper, but if you have curves it ends up being too tight.
links_Review_Text: Too tight through the hips so I didn't wear it.

This dress is incredible! I wore it to a formal work Christmas party and got so many compliments. Definitely unique and sophisticated. No one else had a dress like mine. The fit is true to size and the fabric has a bit of stretch to it. The shiny collar and belt are a unique detail that add to this already incredible dress. I didn't want to return it!
This dress is absolutely stunning. It fit me perfectly and I am pretty short. It was classy and I got so many compliments on it. Will definitely rent again!

I love this dress. This is my second time renting it and it's perfect for a casual wedding, brunch, etc. It's fun, frilly and has so many unique details that pictures don't do it justice. I know it seems funky and risky to rent, but I think it's so worth it! It stands out.
Felt like I matched the grand floridian. perfect tea party dress.
Five stars! Tons of compliments. Fabric high quality. Can cinch waist with ties. A little short. But not a problem!

I rented this for dinners out with friends on a warm weather holiday. So many compliments!! Fabric and detailing are high quality. My favorite part were the ties on the sides of the waist so you can loosen or tighten as you please!
It's fun and unique.

links_Review_Title: Wish I had bought this dress!
links_Review_Text: One of my fave rentals hands down! Sizes up based on reviews/avails and so happy I did. Short but able to wear it to casual office setting & to a birthday party with booties. Such a great dress and so many compliments!
I normally wear a small, ordered a medium after reading reviews and I definitely wish I ordered the small! But it was really cute either way!
Obsessed is an understatement! Love, love this dress and all of the fun intricate designs on it.
Loved this dress, print and fit! I wore this for my daughter's second birthday and to a music festival. It is versatile and can be paired with sandals, heels or sneakers.

I rented this for a football game. It was so fun and flirty! I ordered the medium and because it had the ties on the side it sinched into being a small which I loved because it gave me more length and more volume while looking good.
Great quality! Drawstrings around waist allow you to tighten or loosen as much as you want!
Beautiful color and print, loved bopping around in this dress.
1. Comfortable 2. Crazy fun ruffles, details 3. Overall, it was a good outfit for grocery shopping.
Fit true to size. Really cute option for summer!

I wore this for my husbands law school commencement ceremony and received so many complements! It's a very pretty dress! I will say though that the dress can be a bit boxy but you can tighten to side bows to give yourself more of a waist. As someone with short stubby legs I thought it looked best with heals but it would also probably be really cute with white sneakers or flats if you have the legs for it.
This fit was perfect! The ruffles, color and floral were so pretty. So girly, and flattering! I got a ton of compliments on this one! Material was very nice too!

Beautiful dress perfect for a spring wedding! Fit a little big but luckily there are ties on the side you can use to make it tighter. Also super comfy I could've worn this all day - definitely would recommend!
I usually am a size S/M but am glad I went with the small. There are ties on the sides so you can make the waist area smaller if needed. It's a very dainty and feminine-looking dress. Loved it!
It's a bit cute-sy and country... but the images represent accurately. Fairly true to size - I'm usually a 4/6 and wore medium.

Between the ruffles, the minty color, the busy print, the length (on me, SO short), and the shape (babydoll, so it really enhanced the bust), there was a lot of look here. Somehow it worked though - I received a ton of compliments! I found that the drawstring didn't really change the waist a whole lot, but the overall effect was still flattering. I wore it with high heeled nude clogs but could have dressed it up with strappy metallic sandals.

I love this dress so much! I'm so sad everyone reviewed it poorly. It has so much detail that the photos don't do it justice. So many pleats and trims! The draw strings are actually rolled up on the ends and sewn together. Note that there is no zipper on this dress, the dress pulls on over the head and then the draw string is pulled tight on the sides to bring in the waist. This style reminds me of fashion popular in Japan. I'm a girly girl so this dress is perfect for me. I got a ton of compliments on her pretty this dress was by strangers just walking around town. Definitely a unique look perhaps not for everyone.
I wore this dress for a trip to TX. It's that perfect almost over the top girly dress that I felt super cute in. I paired it with a denim jacket and felt like a fancy farmgirl.

The answer is...no...the reason no one else has a photo in this dress as a review is because it should have never been made....fail as a design. Definitely did not end up wearing for my birthday party.
I usually wear a small, but small wasn't available so I ordered the Medium and it fit nicely. I received many compliments. Would definitely wear this again.

links_Review_Title: This dress is so cute and girly
links_Review_Text: I will definitely be ordering this dress again. It would be perfect with white sneakers to make more casual.

5'7" 115-120lbs, longer legs...small fit very well with cinching the side ties. Flattering and nice material. Wish I had a picture as I disagree with the "grandmas tablecloth" comments, fabric super cute styled the right way

links_Review_Title: This dress is adorable! The print is fabulous and the details are fun.
links_Review_Text: Dress fit a bit large but the ties on the side took care of that issue.
I wore it with white tennis shoes to run around the zoo. It made it cute and causal. I received a lot of compliments while wearing it.

You will definitely get compliments. The arms and shoulders are a bit large, so size down because the waist has little ties on it that allow you to draw it in as needed. The color is super delicate and feminine, with chucks or sandals this is a perfect picnic or day dress, with some heels and jewelry, you can take it to a nicer place.

links_Review_Title: Cute and girly. Great for a baby shower.
links_Review_Text: Didn't end up wearing. I was looking for a casual day time dress to wear with sneakers. This was too cute and girly to wear as casual day wear. Perfect for a fancy baby shower or bridal shower.
This dress was soooo cute. A little on the short end so if you are tall this isn't the style for you but got so many compliments!!!

I really wanted to like this dress. It's not bad, the length is a little short and the shoulders are a bit too puffy that you feel like a real like doll. But I just couldn't find myself wearing it for anything.

links_Review_Title: Didn't have the opportunity to wear!
links_Review_Text: I rented this with my Unlimited membership. I was hoping I could wear it to an engagement party with sneakers at a brewery. It was a bit big and looked fancier on. If I had the right occasion, I would have worn it. I probz won't rent again, but if I did I would size down.

links_Review_Title: Cute and comfy for a spring brunch event!
links_Review_Text: Fits super short for anyone with long legs like me. However, it has adjustable ties at waist. I ordered 2 sizes up and cinched waist so it would be long enough. Worked out perfectly and I got TONS of compliments at brunch! Would definitely rent again!

links_Review_Title: Used for Mother's Day, look adorable and ready for spring.
links_Review_Text: Fit comfortable and easy to adjust.
Wore this twice. Once to a concert. Once for a GNO. Such a fun and easy to wear dress! This is my second time renting it.

Bust and shoulders are way too big (and puffy). The strings on the side help the rest of the dress look cute, especially the ruffles, but nothing could save the top half. Didn’t end up wearing and had to get a replacement. If you’re determined to rent this, make sure to take advantage of the back up size
Not a flattering fit with puffy sleeves
Very ruffley
Ordered this dress for Easter. It is really cute, but there is A TON of fabric on the shoulders, making my shoulders look WAY wider than they are. Other than that, it fit true to size.

The dress fit PERFECTLY - length, width, arms, etc. the straps are adjustable which was a pleasant surprise. The slit goes up really high but doesn't hang too open, so it didn't feel overly revealing. I could see the material being scratchy on your arms but the part under my underarm was low enough that it didn't rub or irritate my arms. I got compliments like never before, including a bunch of strangers in passing. Felt beyond amazing.

I was leery of using RTR because of my height (4' 10") but I gave it a shot and I'm so glad I did! The dress arrived the day of my event and fit wonderfully! I did have to squeeze my breasts (32D) in otherwise, it fit perfectly all over!! The length of the petite was perfect with heels!!! The dress was beautiful on and I received so many compliments!

Other reviews said it ran large so I went for a size up. It was a little baggy around my waist and back side. Still look great and I didn't mine the extra space since it was so minor. It was nice change to not wear a skin tight dress but have it still look incredible.

I rented this for a gala and received so many compliments! I am normally a 4, and this dress fit true to size. I am 5'6 and the regular length was unavailable, but I went with the 4P and it was a little short but fine even with 3 in heels. The slit is a little high, but balanced with the high neck gives a sexy elegance. Very comfortable also and easy to move around in. Overall highly recommend!

links_Review_Title: I received a lot of compliments on this dress and I felt it fit great
links_Review_Text: The adjustable straps helped and even though it was fitted, it still fit over my hips.
Wore to a 20's theme party
Went with the 8r because the 6 was a little tight in the bust. The dress was perfect length for me and I received so many compliments!! So much prettier in person!

links_Review_Title: Stunning dress! I received so many compliments!
links_Review_Text: This dress fit me perfectly. I wore 3- 3.5 inch heels and the length was perfect. The slit is pretty high but I only had an issue with this when sitting down. I will be renting this dress again for another event!

I wasn't sure how this dress would look based on the photos however it was absolutely stunning in person. I received many compliments at a New Year's eve wedding. The fit is on the looser side though still very figure flattering.

links_Review_Title: Perfect for Black Tie New Years!
links_Review_Text: Beautiful dress. Amazing fit! I received many compliments throughout the evening! One thing to warn: the slit is high! I didn't have issues with it, unless I was sitting down - I just made sure to wear full-coverage black underwear! Great for dancing! Also, it hit at perfect length, never dragging the floor. I am 5' 5" & wore 3in heels, it was PERFECT. Highly recommend, amazing dress!

links_Review_Title: This dress was a showstopper. Very glam. Classy, but sexy. I am short, but the petite was a perfect
links_Review_Text: So many compliments!
So many compliments! Perfect dress overall!
Slit is High! Goes to hip!
Loved the fabric, silhouette and slit up the side.

links_Review_Title: Dress was beautiful and pretty comfortable
links_Review_Text: It was pretty much true to size. It was just a little big on the waist. I'm 5'2" and the length of the petite was perfect. The dress could have been worn with flats

links_Review_Title: I got so many compliments in this dress! One woman even asked what designer I was wearing!
links_Review_Text: I typically wear either a 0 or 2 and went with the 2 because it was longer and more comfortable. The dress looks tight but it was not constricting and easy to dance in. The slit was higher than I expected but not inappropriate by any means. I'm 5'7 and in 4in heels the length was perfect.

I loved this dress and it fit perfectly! I received so many compliments on it, I wore it for a black tie optional wedding. My only complaint is the slit looks like it had torn from the previous renter and the renter mended it with a safety pin and RTR sent it to me in this condition! Very embarrassing when another guest at the party noticed it. Also some of the embroidery/lace was looking worn. Only reason for the knock of a star is the condition it came in, otherwise beautiful dress.
I am short, 5'2, and the slit was so high on me, you could see my underwear. Not sure how this would even work!

Fitted top with a high neck and cape back that conceals bra lines! A-line skirt. The fabric is crepe but the inside is satiny which feels amazing! Length hits at the widest part of my calves (I'm 5'1") so I wish it were shorter. Overall it's a beautiful dress and I feel great wearing it!

links_Review_Title: A bit baggy around the waist
links_Review_Text: I normally love RED Valentino but this was not right for my body type. I am normally a size 4 and ordered accordingly. The length was great but the high neck and fit around the waist and chest made me appear almost shapeless and really hid my waist. I returned without wearing. It is high quality for someone with a different body type.

links_Review_Title: Perfect intersection of casual and sexy!
links_Review_Text: I love this top so much. There's something very modern about it and it's very on trend. While it's undeniably sexy it is so in an understated way. Very casual in nature but can be dressed up also!

Sheer but lovely, I wore a nude cami under and it was great for work and transitioned to my night event perfectly. Received many compliments and was able to talk about RTR with people again (my favorite pastime!) could have worn a small in this as well probably, might rent that next time just to see the difference?
Wore this with flared jeans and it was a hit. Cute mesh with tank underneath to not give too much away. Rented this twice and will rent again. The fit was perfect.

Love love this! I wore with leggings but could also wear tucked into jeans. Totally my style I don't want to send back! I ordered a medium but a small could also fit. It forms to your body in a flattering way. Great colors and good for work or play. Perfection.

Super cute top. Thin, wore a cami underneath. Great for a fall day when you don't want to wear a sweater. Paired with a stylish black coat to later. Pattern looked more gray/purple in some light. Would rent again.

This shirt is so cute and easy to wear. It looks great with skinny jeans or as a close fitting layer under a vest. I wore it with a furry vest on top when I got cold. My only gripe is I wish the back wasn't so see through. The front is double layered so that is not an issue.
Doesn't choke you, body clinging, sheer back, oddly non-sheer front. Fabulous! May need to rent again, and buy.
The back is sheer (without a lining) It's a great top for jeans or dressy- color didn't flatter me.

I loved this top! It is sheer in the back and slightly less sheer in the front. I wore it with dark blue jeans and white boots and received so many compliments. I would recommend it and will rent again for sure.

links_Review_Title: Excellent, very comfortable to wear regardless of the weather, with a light jacket and jeans
links_Review_Text: This top was perfect for everyday with jeans or business with a pair of dress pants, a light leather or a blazer or on it's own. I really enjoyed the ease of the fabric for packing for the weekend as well!

links_Review_Title: Comfortable and attractive but the sleeves kept rolling up.
Cute top! but need to wear black cami under (for work, weekend is a diff story!)
links_Review_Text: Wore with black cami underneath because the shirt does come one built-in, it is only in the front and the back was very shear and not work appropriate. HOWEVER, i would wear as-is on the weekend for a little sass. Got a lot of compliments - would rent again.

links_Review_Title: Fun casual top with a little funk to it
links_Review_Text: Fit TTS in the body but the sleeves were very long. The length hit at the waist - not too short and not too long.

links_Review_Title: Fantastic shirt with a fantastic fit
links_Review_Text: Loved the shirt; fit well; got a lot of compliments
Loved this shirt--thin fabric fit well under winter coats. Gorgeous fabric.

links_Review_Title: great top! goes with everything and super flattering. thin, but works under a blazer, by itself. luv
links_Review_Text: see above

This long sleeve is a nice choice. I wore a white tank top underneath to cover my back while a work and I think the pattern, little bit of sheer in the back and sleeves makes the top dynamic. The material is soft and comfy. I received many compliments.
Gorgeous fit and style. I wore with a black tank since it's completely sheer mesh. Love it and will rent it again!
Light weight and flattering

links_Review_Title: Funky Cute (& a bit see through)
links_Review_Text: Shoulder has a little puff detail I didn't notice in the pictures...

links_Review_Title: This is pretty much perfect. It is conservative to wear to work. It is sexy enough for date night.
links_Review_Text: The colors are great and go with so much. You can dress this up or down. I might buy it!
Wore a long sleeve black shirt underneath because the back is see thru. Great fabric & cute top!

links_Review_Title: Did not want to take off!
links_Review_Text: This may be the most comfortable feeling shirt ever. But this pattern just did not work for me AT all. If this shirt comes out in a solid color, I'd seriously want to wear it every day.
Really liked this top. Lined in front, sheer in back. Very cute pattern. I wore high waisted jeans but it didn't really stay tucked in. Super cute though.

Very cute - I dressed it up and down. With jeans and boots, or with black pants and a blazer. Note that the back is very see-through, so a black bra strap will show, but I thought that was kind of part of the charm. But I wouldn't wear to work without a blazer on top because of this. But fine for dinner!
This was a cool top for work. Tight fit, very thin/shear material.

links_Review_Title: I have to return this without wearing. It is just too large.
links_Review_Text: I will reorder in a Medium. I love the shirt, but it needs to fit tighter to be flattering.
This is a nice lightweight top. It is sheer in the back however but the front is lined. Sleeves ran a little long but I just rolled them underneath. Looks fantastic with black denim skinny jeans.

If you're looking for something fitted, this is not your dress. It's flowy, light, and very feminine. It probably needs a slip underneath but I'm a rebel and didn't wear one. Love this dress. Will rent again.
I rented this for work and it's perfect. It's very hot where I live and this worked perfectly for work! Not too short so I could still move and work very easily in it.
This dress is so cute and comfy! Great for spring! I'll definitely be renting again!

I really liked this dress and wore it both to work during the week and to lunch on the weekend. Although I believe it's a spring/summer dress, I liked it in Chicago November with tights and a leather jacket. It was kind of big and blousy, but I believe this was the design of the dress. I would rent this one again!
This is a great little dress for work or a party, runs large, but very light and comfortable. I wore this in a 0, if you are smaller than me it may just be too big of a dress for you.

Loved this one and husband did too! Wore it several times at 7.5 months pregnant- running errands, to lunch, to dinner and got several compliments. Would have probably been swimming in it pre-pregnancy. Was a little long but since I'm not loving my legs these days I was ok with it.
Just wish it was a bit shorter. Loved the print

Pretty and comfortable. There are many shoe possibilities to match the colors. I'm too short for this piece. It looked frumpy on me, but would be a great choice for a different frame. The only compliment I received is that I matched the flowers in my office.
Flows, flattering and light. Perfect for work!

I loved the material, it was light and airy which was perfect for summer in Georgia. The colors and patterns were unique. Overall the dress looked and felt expensive! The loose fit was great and would work well on any body type. The length is on the longer side, so great for my tall sisters!
Fit a tiny bit big but was fine. Super flattering and cute for a summer event!

I loved this dress. It was a little sheer so just make sure to wear nude underwear. It was super comfy, and actually didn't feel 'shapeless' even though it was a straight shift cut. Highly recommend! It could be dressed up or down
Loved this dress for work. It was so comfortable and such a fun print for summer! Lots of compliments!
Loved the colors, patterns and fabric, and this was super comfy. wore this at 4.5 months pregnant with plenty of room. if not pregnant - id suggest sizing down if debating between two sizes.
Beautiful pattern, super silky and comfortable. Found it ran a bit big and I'll size down if I rent it again, but it didn't stop me from wearing it and loving it!

links_Review_Title: This playful design is a summertime staple!
links_Review_Text: I kept this dress for three months! Love it so much! We even used it for our newborn portraits! I'm definitely going to buy it! It fits my changing body from baby to recovery from baby!

links_Review_Title: Cute everyday dress...but it runs super large!!
links_Review_Text: Fit was overall large. Print was Cute. I received several compliments on the dress. Was very comfortable for everyday attire.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful vibrant patterns/colors! Perfect for spring!
links_Review_Text: #work #spring

links_Review_Title: Wore it to a drumming circle and got to dance freely.
links_Review_Text: Soft and light. Comfortable. Great colors.
I loved this dress. Its roomy (bump friendly) yet flattering, and can be dressed up or down. I would definitely rent it again, pregnant or not.
Cute dress, nice material but there is no shape and a lot of pattern so it's not the most flattering - found it looks best with a jacket or blazer with it.

I rented this dress because I had in hand a thick green faux fur Apparis coat and wanted to pair it with something! The dress was perfect because it was light Really light, like... see through almost. I found an old black slip to wear under it- it was too long but I folded on the boobs and it was fine. This dress had great colors but was by no means a sexy number. It was, as I stated, a muumuu. I tried a belt but with my generous boobage that didn't look great, so I kept it flowy! I styled as shown and threw on that green fur beast when outside!
This is such a pretty dress and super comfortable. Fit well, nice length for me. Would rent it again.
Beautiful fabric, but the ruffle hit at a strange height on me. Also, the back is a little see-through so I wore a body suit underneath.
Fitted around arm holes but then just hangs like a long sack. Frumpy. Lovely silk and colors.
Loved this dress! It does run large but I listened to other reviews and ordered appropriately. The colors are fun and it's easy to dress up with heels or dress down with flip flops.
Definitely runs large, but super super cute!
This dress is a do-over! The colors are beautiful and the feel and fit were incredible!!!! ❤️
The pattern is stunning, and it's so easy to wear!!
The fabric and the print are beautiful. However this dress has no shape to it and you really need a belt to make it look flattering. It's really big
Ran big! Very loose dress

This was flowy, tent-like but amazing in that it somehow managed to flow in toward my curves. For the hottest part of the year where temps went over 100 this was PERFECT, like wearing a fancy, pretty breeze machine. When it got cooler I put a denim jacket on, and it became a flattering and fun evening out with the ladies dress. Wish I could buy it for next summer!

BEAUTIFUL fabric, color, and print. It "feels" great on, but runs large as others have said. I am large busted and it was still large. I am always afraid to size down, but this one is safe. With a denim jacket, it is perfect, light, and feminine.

Loved this. Super easy to wear. Flowy and oversized, but in a chic way. I'm usually an 8 but rented the 6 due to the oversized cut - perfect. Wore a few times - looks great with either heels or denim jacket/sandals. Will rent again.

links_Review_Title: Great dress for work in the summer
links_Review_Text: This dress was light and fit great. The perfect dress to wear to work on a warm summer day.

Arm holes were a little small but not uncomfortable. Was loose around the body which was perfect for me around 8 months pregnant. I'm usually a 2-4, and the 4 still fit. Fabric is a little sheer so you may want a slip on bottom.
Runs incredibly large (everywhere) and didn't look great belted.
Wore this a few times to different occasions - work , lunch, etc
Lots of compliments, easy to wear with or without a belt. The print is lovely, it is very thin fabric I wore a slip under just in case since I was wearing it to work.

I wore this top to work with white high waisted jeans and casual white sandals. The colors are beautiful and it's really unique. I got several compliments from both men and women. It is flowy and does run large...I always size up in this brand for dresses, but thanks to the reviews I sized down on this top and I'm glad I did! Would rent again.

links_Review_Title: Perfect for a summer dinner outside
links_Review_Text: Fit was flowing and easy.
Need to pair with something fitted on the bottom as its moo moo shaping. But I was so comfortable innit and had a blast at Universal

Loved this top! Fabric is gorgeous. Very flowy. I'm post baby and losing weight so maybe should have ordered multiple sizes but it fits loose and flowy so I probably could have sized down to 12 or even 10. Where the fit is noticed is in shoulders and length. Would rent again!

links_Review_Title: Such a cute and unique top!
links_Review_Text: I wore the top to work and then transitioned it to vacation wear after my flight! I loved the look and it was very comfortable. It is rather short in the front, so if you aren't comfortable with something hitting higher and perhaps showing some stomach, you should avoid this top! I wore with high waisted jeans so it didn't show any skin, but you can definitely see the shape of my tummy which I didn't mind.

Loved this but needed a strapless bra to really get the full effect of the top. It was fine but not my favorite undergarment. That being said, it was fun and flirty and I got lots of compliments. I would rent again.
I too wore this with white jeans and felt fantastic. Great color!
Too low in front

links_Review_Title: Too short - Not for the full-busted woman.
links_Review_Text: I ordered this for Christmas photos and it did not fit. I ordered it in a size up. Couldn't wear it because it was too short in the front. Disappointing.

links_Review_Title: Cute top for day or night.
links_Review_Text: Worn this to a double-header-kid party and picnic after. Love the flexibility. Could go from day to night. Great colors.

links_Review_Title: Cute top, but runs pretty short in the front. I opted to wear it backwards!
links_Review_Text: Short in the front, and a bit tent like but the sheer top made it memorable.
Wore this top to a party, got compliments. It is very flowy, pretty much a babydoll top. No bra needed, but the arm holes are a little tight so it got uncomfortable throughout the night.

This was super comfy! The cut was very flattering and generous. It's good to pair with tight jeans since it's so loose on top. I received several compliments on this one, since the color was striking. The only con was the shoulders were a little itchy at times. I'd definitely wear this one again!

links_Review_Title: Love the color and how the top flows.
links_Review_Text: It is a little short in the front, but when tucked into a skirt it works great!

links_Review_Title: Weird proportions, but it's undeniably gorgeous!
links_Review_Text: This top is just ethereal and beautiful. I love the flowy, billowy back that a lot of the reviewers seemed to dislike. My cons: the netting material on the chest and arm holes is itchy, and the arm holes are a little tight (though I would prefer tight to loose on this top). Only other con: this is DRAMATICALLY high-low. The front is nearly a crop top on me, and I am 5'1" without a particularly long torso. I wore this with high-waisted pants and still had to tuck in the lining underneath to ensure I didn't have an unexpected midriff moment at the office.
I just thought this was too bulky. Also have to wear with strapless bra.

links_Review_Title: Loved the color, style, and quality
links_Review_Text: Loved the color, style, and quality

links_Review_Title: This is a fun flirty top, it is just really short!
links_Review_Text: I marked this as "true to size" because it fit perfectly across the shoulders and through the arm holes. It has a lovely neckline and it's a beautiful color, BUT even in my high waisted jeans, this top showed my stomach if i reached my arms the wrong way. I'm not talking over my head like a touchdown reaching, more like just reaching to hand someone something. I had to wear my belly band around the top of my jeans (that I hadn't used since I was pregnant) just to make sure my midriff wouldn't show. Just something to be aware of:-)

The colors and pattern on this shirt were gorgeous, but the fit just didn't suit me. The front was a little too big and billowy, while the back was awkwardly long. The arm holes were also a tad tight, so I wound up returning it without wearing it.
This is a very beautiful shirt! So much detail. It's really lovely! Fit nicely.

Absolutely beautiful fabric and design, but more than just being flowy, the shirt was very boxy and made me look larger than I actually am. Didn't end up wearing but would consider sizing down and trying again as it was a really pretty top.

links_Review_Title: Very pretty! This top was complimented all day!
links_Review_Text: Although it was slightly large, the cut drapes nicely. The sheer top portion gives a lovely, nearly-bare shoulder look.

links_Review_Title: Very versatile top. Must wear strapless bra but work. Nice!
links_Review_Text: Yes!

links_Review_Title: I wish I could buy this top
links_Review_Text: One of my favorite tops that I've ever rented!!! Such beautiful colors and amazing quality.
Wore with white jeans. So beautiful! Best with a strapless bra because the top panel near neck area is very see through (I actually wore a white nursing tank top underneath)
Gorgeous blouse but not flattering on a figure with curves. It's probably better suited for someone who's very slim. It's very billowy in the back and made me look like a big watermelon.
Really pretty top with stunning detail work
Gorgeous red dress. Very flattering but does wrinkle easily.
I had to go home to change as it was so wrinkled by midday and I had multiple events to attend. Very lightweight and was flattering on.

links_Review_Title: Such a beautiful red and I don't wear a lot of red dresses. Layered with a leather jacket! Loved!

links_Review_Text: 1st time I put it one I didn't feel it. But I tried again and I loved it. People at my work come by my desk to see it. It moves very nicely too. I am very large chested so I sized up from my normal size.

links_Review_Title: Nice dress, nice fit, perfect for work.
links_Review_Text: Great for work, especially with a jacket over or a shirt under it.
Form fitting, comfortable wrap dress. The wrap tie hardware was slipping around a bit, but minor detail compared to how beautiful and comfortable is it.
Loved the color and got many compliments
The fit on this was great. The red is a beautiful red. It's not a wrap dress, so it fits like a regular dress would fit (no extra give). It's made to look like it's a wrap though.
Pretty color but the fabric is thin and looks weirdly cheap. It's too long and the faux wrap has excess fabric which gives a more dumpy effect than I expected. True to size.

I absolutely loved this dress, even though it was a bit tight through the torso. I wore it to work and was complemented by just about every female colleague or passerby! Everyone appreciated this dress. One thing though: I live in Miami and this dress is light enough to wear down here, but I don't recommend it for any cold climates! It's paper thin.

After renting the beautiful green Jason Wu dress that looked to be a similar cut in photos, I was very excited for this red dress. However it is a total disappointment. It's a very light summary chiffon material and runs more like a 10 in the waist. It fit my chest- which was shocking considering how much tighter it was in the waist. It also doesn't wrap- there's just this flap of material down the front and them belt, that doesn't really do anything besides keep the flap down is sewn on.

Lightweight fabric with a beautiful flow and professional look. Unfortunately the fabric is also extremely wrinkle prone. I looked like a mess after riding in the car to work, and it only got worse while sitting at my desk. Not a deal breaker, but something to keep in mind if you're going to be in front of a camera or on a stage.

Absolutely stunning color and fabric. Would give it 5 stars if it weren't for the hardware at the waist (which isn't my taste, and I found rotates and tangles the belt through the day if you're doing a lot of walking) and how easily it wrinkles. Got compliments all day. I (long torso, curvy on top and bottom, small waist) found that it fit true to size, which surprised me because I expect to have to go up a size with higher-end designers, especially to accommodate my wider hips and booty. I ordered this in a 4 and 6, and could have worn either, but preferred the 4 for the narrower fit in the shoulders. As other reviewers have noted, this is not a true wrap dress. But the belt is adjustable, which is great for a better fit for those of us with hourglass and pear shapes.

This dress is cute, the fit is fine. But it wrinkled way too easily. I steamed it before work (I sit at a desk all day), and by the end of the day the dress was a mess with wrinkles. Would not recommend or rent again.

the cut on this is stunning while standing... in your apartment... with no wind... but as soon as you walk in the street the skirt can become very sexy and forget about crossing your legs or wearing a normal bra. For my company it was fine but more conservative companies this may not work. May be more appropriate for cocktails or a date night
great dress but I needed the 8. Not a wrap on the bottom and was too tight.

links_Review_Title: Amazing top. Fits great. Business yet fun. Got lots of compliments!

links_Review_Text: I am between a small and medium, so it's always a roll of the dice when ordering. And since this was never worn, it was definitely a gamble. Perhaps it wouldn't have been I'll fitting if I sized down, but I have a hunch the sleeves would still be entirely way too long. Noted for the future: I don't think this brand is petite compatible, unfortunately. Cute top for the right build, I'm sure, just not for me.

Ordered a M based on recommendations- this is huge. It has snaps as closures and where they are placed I definitely need a S. So someone smaller I am not sure if you could wear this. I am a 4-6 on top and an hourglass shape with a smaller waist. When I connected the snaps the top was hanging off me. The belt definitely helps with structure but it was so big it wasn't flattering. Would rent again in a smaller size though since it really is a cute top.
I liked it so much I bought it!! A must for your closet. The broad shoulders are so elegant. You can pair this top with anything.

I loved this dress MUCH more than I expected. I was unsure it would fit because I have a 32DDD bust that needs a good amount of support. This dress was surprisingly supportive because of the adjustable tie back. I did not wear a bra because it has an open back. I have a slim, athletic build; for reference, I am 5'6'' and 135 lbs. I wore a size 4 but could probably have worn a size 2 as well. I do not have much of a backside so the fabric gathered a little more than desired in the front/abdomen area. If I rent again, i will most likely get the size 2 because of this extra fabric. The bust area was supportive and appropriate for my sorority formal. Very well made dress-- the ties did not stretch out. I received many complements on this dress!
This was perfect for a NYE party, or any party! Dress it up with accessories and you're sure to impress! The color is gorgeous.
Fit was good, tight but comfortable. Great material

I love Milly, and found this to run true to size to almost a bit too big. The tie in the back was really flattering, and the length was actually perfect on me for a rehearsal dinner. The straps were a good length, even though I have a shorter torso. The body of the dress was a bit loose, so don't look for this dress to be skintight. All in all, really liked it.

The literal epitome of "business in the front party in the back" the classic square neck feels super 90's and the back was sexy without being slutty. The color was really pretty and would be flattering on any skin tone. The fit was m TTS. I got a ton of complements. 10/10 would recommend.
Loved this dress! It was very fitted but gave a little stretch so it was comfortable! (It will appear in season 6 of "Botched" on E!) :)
I normally wear a 6, but this dress was too big on me, so I wore the 4.
This dress is simple but works great for a more casual semi! Works in all the right ways!
I rented this for my vacation to Dubai and Singapore and could not have been happier! Very comfortable and unique. The dress is very photogenic as well. I may have to buy this one.
Super cute and comfortable.
Loved this dress. Great for a hot summer day. I wore to work and then a family dinner at night. Runs true to size.

links_Review_Title: Wore this for my girlfriend's bridal shower. Dress is super comfy and great and hides your food baby
links_Review_Text: Bridal shower, fits very comfortably Also does not exposed to much belly

I rented this for my friends birthday dinner and it was a hit! I loved the fit and I got a lot of compliments. The material wrinkled very easy but I think the colors and the stripes helped make it less noticeable. I loved the length because I am relatively tall and it was perfectly long enough. I will definitely rent again!

I was looking for something fun and unique to wear out to dinner for my birthday with my husband and the dress was perfect! Fits true to my normal JCrew size 6. It was also super comfortable and lightweight for a warm summer evenings. The only con is it did come pretty wrinkled but I just steamed it or a couple minutes and it was good the rest of the night.

links_Review_Title: Cute dress! A bit long but I'm short
links_Review_Text: I am a sold size 2 in j crew and this fit true to size. It was a bit long for me; I'm only 5 ft 2 in, wish they had a petite version. That being said, comfortable, cute, lots of compliments.
True to size and easy to wear. Sitting down was not at issue with the cut out- no skin bulge! Received so many compliments!

Can't say enough about this dress. It's J. Crew Collection. So higher end. So well made. Fits like a glove. I will def rent again. HIGHLY recommend. Wore to a party one night with wedges and to dinner the next with straps sandals. Perfect for both.

links_Review_Title: Such a cute dress, perfect for dinner at a beach resort
It was not my style. It's a darling weekend spring/summer piece.
links_Review_Text: Very cute piece for someone with a great figure.
I rented this dress for a Palm Spring vacation and loved it! It's very flattering and comfortable. Great for a casual day with sandals. I'd rent it again for sure.

I ordered a larger size due to the reviews but I probably could have worn a size 6. This was so comfortable and fun to wear. I'm usually very conservative so I felt really comfortable wearing this dress.
Sooooo fun with the cutout. Was a little long because I'm very short but was really fun!!

links_Review_Title: Perfect dress for my body shape!
links_Review_Text: So fun and casual, perfect for an outdoor reception
This fit a little big and was definitely long, but it was like a 1950s silhouette with a modern edge. Loved it.
The cut of this dress is so unique and super flattering (especially if you're still rocking your summer tan). Really clever way to show a hint of skin without rocking a full midriff.

links_Review_Title: Just loved it! Cute with the slight side cut out.
links_Review_Text: Pros—looked great. Comfortable and fit well. Maybe a tad large for me but really not too much.

links_Review_Title: great in vacation pics. Perfect summer European sightseeing dress
links_Review_Text: was loose and longer than expected, but very flattering and so cute on. Stripes are also more apparent in real life than in pics.
Great fit, comfortable dress

links_Review_Title: cute dress for a ladies lunch
links_Review_Text: cute and comfortable.
Great dress. The top is super flattering. And the cut out is festive,
The dress fit true to size and was beautiful in person. Only reason I didn't end up wearing it on vacation was that it was much more formal than I expected.

links_Review_Title: Pretty on the rack but ill-fitting
links_Review_Text: This dress is gorgeous and well made, but it looks awkward on. The cutout is just in a weird place and the skirt is too big to sit right on me. I'm 5'10" and usually wear a 4/6 but the 4 was too big on me.

Rented the dress for fun and received so many compliments throughout the day. I'm a 4/6 and the dress didn't hug so tightly that I was uncomfortable showing some skin. Fun and flirty, perfect for a summer party or date. Would absolutely rent again.

links_Review_Title: Unfortunately, I couldn't get the zipper to close.
links_Review_Text: I wanted to love it! It is really cute. Couldn't get the zipper too close. Seems like it runs a bit small in the chest.
Very flattering dress. Fun pop of color. I felt great in it.

links_Review_Title: Hot dress! Great for curves! Forgiving!
links_Review_Text: I'm tall, big booty. Smaller up top than bottom and this dress hugged all the curves in the right places. Thicker fabric so you don't see the dimples, if you know what I mean. Lots of compliments. Perfect for the fiesta party!

links_Review_Title: So many people complimented me! An awesome dress
links_Review_Text: I normally wear between a 6 and an 8 but the 10 fit perfectly so definitely size up. It's an awesome body con dress and great for people with a larger bust as it's not too clingy. Was a perfect fit and highly recommend for making a statement!
Fit very well and is comfy to wear. Was able to wear a strapless bra with it. Would definitely rent again, loved wearing it

links_Review_Title: I loved this dress but even when I went up a size it was still super tight!
links_Review_Text: I received compliments all night on the dress color, etc. but it was disappointing that I almost had to send it back since it was so tight even after I went up a size. I would definitely recommend but just know that you need to rent up, at least one whole size if not two!
this dress is extremely flattering. it was a little big on me up top, but otherwise fit perfectly. i loved wearing this dress!
This dress was eye popping, perfect pink color and nice fit for a curvy figure. Great quality fabric, I got many compliments. I would definitely rent this one again!
This hot pink was perfect for a neon party. Great fit- a little form fitting but very flattering. Fun dress!!! Didn't want to return it.

The color of this dress is stunning, and really catches the eye. I liked that the v wasn't too low cut, and very flattering. My only complaint is that I feel like there is a lot of fabric in the middle of the dress and it can bunch and not be super flattering. It was nice summer wedding dress, but I probably wouldn't rent again.
Color and fit were perfect! Highly recommend!

I got so many compliments wearing this dress. It's hard for me to find more formal dresses that are great for my both height and breast size but I truly loved everything about this dress! It flattered both my top and my mid section and believe it would look wonderful on women of all shapes and sizes. I would for sure rent again.
Hugged all the right places without being too tight. Amazing bright pink color.

links_Review_Title: The color was perfect for a tropical wedding!
links_Review_Text: This was my first RTR dress and I LOVED it! The color was so fun for a tropical wedding and I got compliments all night. I sized up for a little more room but the fit was very flattering on the waistline. 100% recommend.
Got a few compliments on this dress - might want to size up for this one. It looked good in person but in the photos I think I look huge.
Very comfortable, pretty dress. I loved that it was short, but not too short. I was able to sit comfortably, and never had to tug it down. The color was beautiful.
Wore this to a concert at a jazz club with outdoor seating on the marina. Perfect for the occasion. Very flattering cut and color. Easy to move in.
If you want the perfect curve hugging pop of color this glam getup is for you. Form fitting and great for olive skin tones. There's a fire to wearing fuschia
The color really stands out and is perfect for a summer party. Fit well, and was cool even on the hottest day of the year! Definitely would rent again.

links_Review_Title: Great color for a summer event!
links_Review_Text: I rented this dress for a summer wedding. When I first put it on it was very tight around the legs making it hard to sit and walk. But after having the dress on for about 30 mins I either got used to it or the fabric got more flexible. It was so comfortable the whole night which included a ton of dancing! I got a ton of compliments on the dress- which always makes it better. Definitely recommend this dress!
Bachelorette party perfect. I usually am a size 12 and I wore the 16 so ran small on me. I have a large chest though. Was super flattering and I got a ton of compliments.
Well made flattering dress. Adjustable straps. Not too clingy/short. Classy for a sexy dress.
Loved the dress, it was comfortable and fit true to size

This dress was beautiful and was a great color for summer. The straps are adjustable which is very helpful for short people like me. He dress was also comfortable and somewhat forgiving in the stomach area which was great for a long evening. The dress was lightly textured which was a surprise but a great feature as it is better at hiding the curves nobody wants. There is a side zipper which helps when you are dressing alone. I got plenty of complements.
I have a larger bust so felt a little tight there but otherwise fit perfectly and received several compliments. Loved how bright and fitting it was and my boyfriend loved it too.
All the very young girls complimented my dress. The fabric has a nice texture and some stretch. Straps are wonderfully adjustable.
Loved the color and fit of this dress - very flattering and received tons of compliments.
Great material. Runching helped hide the belly

links_Review_Title: Loved everything about the shape, length, and color of this dress
links_Review_Text: This dress is a beautiful pink color (looks darker in my photo than it actually is). The material is relatively thick so no need for shapewear underneath, but not so thick that you couldn't wear this to a summer wedding. There are adjustable straps which is always a plus for dresses in my opinion. Loved everything about the shape and length of this dress - perfect dress for a cocktail attire event. For reference, I am 5'4, 117lbs, 34B.
Couldn't zip up

links_Review_Title: It fits great, flatters my curves and stomach!
links_Review_Text: It's a lot darker and brighter pink than in the image online

links_Review_Title: Such a fab and comfy dress!!!!
links_Review_Text: The fit of the dress was true to size, and was super comfy. I wore it for a rehearsal dinner and got tons of compliments on it!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful color on any skin tone!
links_Review_Text: The color will be gorgeous on fair or dark skin and everything in between! The chest was too big for me (36D)- adjusting the straps solved this problem until 5 minutes later when they loosened up again. It is an overall forgiving fit and quality material, but I didn't wear because at 6'0 it was just too short for me.

links_Review_Title: So many compliments in this dress!
links_Review_Text: Very flattering fit. Runs true to size

links_Review_Title: Great dress! Awesome color! Comfortable enough to dance the night away.
links_Review_Text: This was a great dress! The fabric was nicer than expected. Love that straps are adjustable as I’m short from shoulder to breast bone. The color is awesome! If you want to blend in with the crowd don’t get this dress as the color pops! The length was perfect and I have short legs. Not too long and not too short. Definitely would rent again.
Beautiful dress and beautiful material but size was a bit tight so I didn't use it

links_Review_Title: It's really cute, but I was unable to wear it.
links_Review_Text: This dress is much tighter in the rib cage than I expected. I wasn't able to zip it up to see if it could fit my chest. I have a broad ribcage, so maybe someone with narrower ribs with fair better.
Beautiful color. Rented for a trip to Las Vegas. Didn't end up wearing out but fit as expected (runs small).
I loved this dress! I had to size up, but it fit beautifully and I received a ton of compliments! You will stand out in this gorgeous dress!

links_Review_Title: This dress holds you in and hugs you, I loved it.
links_Review_Text: Thicker material and soft, very comfortable to wear. I recommend it for a wedding.

links_Review_Title: This dress is a beautiful color and I felt very good in it!
links_Review_Text: To fill out the top with my small chest, I needed to wear a size 2 with a strapless bra, which was quite snug everywhere except the chest. The size 4 fit great everywhere except the bust. But, even the size 2 was quite comfortable once I was all zipped in to it.
Fits perfect. Very flattering if you have a larger chest. Not as white in color as pictured and does wrinkle easily, but it was so perfect for vacation!

links_Review_Title: Love this for love and lemons top
links_Review_Text: Must rent - true to size!
Love this Top soooo much. Goes with everything and so fashion forward.
Everyone I saw while wearing this top was obsessed and so many people asked about it! I wanted to buy :)
Perfect Saturday afternoon shirt. The fit is so unique and flattering!
Cute top. A bit cropped but perfect length with high waisted jeans! The ties came undone a few times throughout the day but not a big deal.
The fit is tts and definitely cropped above the belly button. Mini mouse vibes for daayyyyys
Cannot get over the cuteness. Need to find a reason to rent again already. I'm smaller chested so not sure how it would fit far larger chests. Just rent it already !!

links_Review_Title: I had dinner with friends at Zahav, awarded the most outstanding restaurant in the country!
links_Review_Text: I'm OBSESSED with this top, it was so flattering on my petite frame. I loved how it gave me volume in my chest without being too revealing. I was able to transition to work and to a fancy dinner with friends at night. I would 100% recommend.
I don't have exceptionally large boobs and even for me this just wasn't flattering. The shirt itself seems super cute but just not for my body type.
Amazing

links_Review_Title: It was so cute!!!!!! love the sleeves
links_Review_Text: It fits true to size and didn't show my belly.
I couldn't even begin to try to wear this. I absolutely adored it and if I had a smaller bust, think it would've looked great. It's just too low and the cups of the top are too small for my size
Overall fit so nicely and was very cute!

links_Review_Title: Great transitional top that can be worn for a lot of different occasions
links_Review_Text: I wore this to a friend's charity event at a bar during the day and got lots of compliments. It's very flattering and transitions perfectly from a day to night time top. I wore this all day and felt like it worked for a few different things I did that day. Would rent again! Fits TTS
Literally almost bought this top because it is so cute. Definitely runs small and is cropped like all For Love and Lemons but great shirt.
Loved this top. Fits true to size. I was worried about it fitting my boobs (DDs) but it worked with both a bra and strapless bra.
I wore it to my salsa class. It's pretty and feminine. I felt pretty in this top.... I liked it. I would love it even more if it were a little longer.
I rarely keep a rental long term but I love this top! I wore it multiple times.
Comfortable and super cute and easy

links_Review_Title: Cute, fun summer but never wore
links_Review_Text: Short and couldn't find something to wear under it.

links_Review_Title: cute! hard to wear a bra with - used nipple petals instead
links_Review_Text: just get the biggest size you can
Perfectly cropped top! I wore twice : once To dinner and once to work with jeans. I love this Top. It's so flattering. I would recommend
Just maybe a bit too young for me

links_Review_Title: Way to low cute and short
links_Review_Text: Extremely short in the waist area and the top is really low cut. Hard to wear a bra with
This top is super cute and extremely comfortable - I sized up since the small wasn't available and it fit true to size, but still worked for me!
this was SO cute so many compliments, super flattering and it has elastic in it so should fit anyone easily

links_Review_Title: this top runs very small and is a barely there midriff top
links_Review_Text: the top is a crop top and barely comes down to the belly button - it wasn't like it was pictured at all.

links_Review_Title: LOVED THIS TOP, comfy, sexy, and versatile
links_Review_Text: Loved this top, wore it with red pants and jean shorts!

The fit was great the top was beautiful but I couldn't pull off the ruffles and puffs. I ordered a large (I am typically an 8 and take a medium or large in tips depending on designer). The fit was great but again, sadly the look is not for me.
Loved this top. Only complaint is it is a little low cut for anyone over a B cup

I loved this jumpsuit! I would size up because it was a little tight. A size 12 would have been perfect. I would def buy this jumpsuit! However, it was shorter than I expected but i didn't mind. It is also lightweight, in the photos it looked more heavier.

links_Review_Title: Finally a jumpsuit perfect for us shorties
links_Review_Text: Christian Siriano, you have my whole heart. As someone who is 5'2, I always attempt to rock a jumpsuit, but something is always slightly off. But not this time. Chest and waist fit were perfect, length (!!) too. Highly recommend for a cocktail or formal affair.
Perfect fit! I felt elegant in it!
Been wanting to rent this forever. Got so many compliments. Felt glamorous while being comfortable. I'm 5'2" and had no length issues in 2" heels.

Was beyond happy with the jumpsuit! Color is beautiful grey blue so definitely on the cooler side. Very comfy with no wardrobe malfunctions. I did use double stick tape on the shoulder less side just for full comfort. Highly recommend this just remember the commitment you must have for using when using the restroom... all comes off!

Wore this on a night out at the casino. Hubby, best friend, and I all love it! Got compliments. I love it so much, I'm going to buy it. It's so versatile and can be worn to formal or more casual occasions. It's unique and classy. I wore 85 mm (~3.35 in) heels and I'm 5'2". It's nice to wear a jumpsuit that works with my proportions. A definite winner!
I really enjoyed this jumpsuit. The pants were shorter than I imagined but over all a good length. The one shoulder action was amazing and made for good photos!

WOW! This jumpsuit was amazing. It was sleek and modern and stylish. The quality was top notch and the cut was just impeccable. I felt like it really hugged at the right places, and the wide leg elongated me. Awesome jumpsuit--even for short girls like me.

links_Review_Title: Very comfortable, but had to keep adjusting the top.
links_Review_Text: I was a little apprehensive about this piece after reading the reviews, but it fit well and wasn't too short on me at all. However, I had to keep adjusting the top so that my bra wouldn't show and tucking the hanger loop back in on one side. I probably could have fixed this with some fashion tape if I'd thought about it before I was at the event. All in all, a good wear, but a little more stressful than anticipated.

This jumpsuit was the most incredible fit. I'm 5'0 and feeling a little uncomfortable with my body right now. I was nervous about feeling ok about the way I looked at this wedding, but this jumpsuit totally made me feel confident and sexy. It was the tight in the right places and left me feeling sexy while also feeling classy. The fit was true to size. My bust is a 32DD and the sleeveless arm tended to drop a little. If I'd had dress tape with me I would have definitely used it!!

I loved this jumpsuit! I ended up getting this as a replacement because other items didn't work all day they only had a 4L versus a 4R. I ended up not wearing it because I thought the other items I had fit better and were a little more appropriate for a black tie wedding event. 26 sized waist, 32C, 125 LBS. hope this review helps! Pros: friendly for girls with hips/booty. Extenuates your waist area and hugs your top if you have a small bust. Cons: definitely will need to wear shape wear if you are concerned about your waist sticking out in any way. Nude strapless bra is a must.
Fits true to size. Light material so great for an outdoor summer party. Loved it.

This outfit is great, in theory. It felt great when I first put it on. Howvever, when I looked in the mirror I could totally see the outline of my belly button and my stomach (and I don't have a lot of stomach) which is really not flattering. I really wanted it to work, but I wouldn't have felt comfortable, so I didn't wear it. I know going up a size is an option, but then I feel like it may fit wrong elsewhere.

LOVED this jumpsuit! It's super comfortable and the wide legs make it flattering and cool at an outdoor summer party. Gorgeous color. Would definitely rent again although it was difficult to unzip myself so I needed a buddy when heading to the bathroom haha

I would definitely recommend getting the long as the regular looked fairly short in the other reviews. I also sized up to go for the 6L because the 4L was a lil tight in the armpit area. But to anyone on the edge of renting this: DO IT! I absolutely loved it & got compliments all night!
