Beautiful jumpsuit. Great fabric, nice lines. I wore to a business conference and felt comfortable, stylish & professional. But I'm 5'9, got a long and I could only wear flats. The other thing is it's super hard to unzip by yourself. Don't drink too much water lol!

links_Review_Title: Untraditional but comfortable outfit for a spring wedding
links_Review_Text: Loved loved loved this. Incredibly comfy a little tight in the chest (and I have no boobs). But! Fit over my thunder thighs like a dream. I would recommend sizing up for your backup but if you're a pear, be careful! The top was a hair too big on me.

links_Review_Title: I wore it to easter, and added some light pink accessories to make it a bit more springy!
links_Review_Text: It fit me so well! I have a curvier figure, and sometimes pantsuits look bad on my thicker thighs. But, this one looked amazing! It is long though, I am 5'9 and got a regular (it was the right length for me with 5-inch heels on too).
This little number made me feel elegant & comfortable at the same time. Will probably rent it again in the future!

links_Review_Title: Perfect to dress up for formal event
links_Review_Text: The middle is kinda funny and I wish it was a little longer too but overall I enjoyed this piece.
Calling all short gals!! This one piece is awesome. I'm shorter than short at 4'11" so I still had to wear 6" heels, but it's a lovely, lovely piece. Worn to a PTA function.

links_Review_Title: Huggy in all the right places
links_Review_Text: Great fabric. Flattering. I'm tall .. would have loved another inch

links_Review_Title: Nice material, perfect length for shorter people
links_Review_Text: Great fit. Beautiful color. Material felt nice and expensive. I had to be sure I stood straight at all times otherwise it would slightly bunch up in waist area. It could be because my body type is pear shape so snug on the hips.

This was a super fun jumpsuit I wore to a black tie optional wedding. Very flattering and well made. The fabric is very stretchy which made it easy to dance in. Bonus was that it was the perfect length for me with 3" heels, I did not have to use any fashion tape to temporarily alter it! Would definitely rent again!

links_Review_Title: It was so comfortable, form fitting and simple yet trendy!
links_Review_Text: I wore this to a gala that my company hosted so I had to dress up yet still be able to run around. It was perfect for this. Could honestly dress it up or down. I wish I had a better picture but this is the only one I have!
Great wit with bit of stretch and doesn't wrinkle

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous Jumpsuit, Runs a Bit Short
links_Review_Text: I rented this gorgeous grayish-blue jumpsuit for the Dior exhibition at the art museum and felt so fancy! I find that Christian Siriano designs tend to run a bit small, so I ordered a size 6, rather than my typical size 4, and am very glad I did. (A quick warning to tall girls that this ran a bit short in the bodice, as well as in overall length, so you may want to consider ordering the long version, if available.) Also, the material in the mid-section is a little clingy and not very forgiving, so I wore some shape wear for extra confidence, but it probably wasn't necessary. I went bra-less, but a regular strapless bra would probably work just fine. Overall, this was a comfortable, classy outfit for a fun girls day, and I would highly recommend renting it.

links_Review_Title: Power jumpsuit for dapper work event
links_Review_Text: Great fit, complementary color, overall fab. I wore this for a cocktail attire event at work. It was comfortable and unique. The cut required I augment one of my bras and there was a bit of side boob on the sleeveless side. Felt great! Oh and get tall if you're planning to wear heels. I'm 5'7" and tall was perfect with 4" heels.

The color of this jumpsuit is lovely. It's like a blush blue. Very unique. Fun one shoulder with gorgeous wide pant legs. Cons - poor zipper design. Extremely hard to get in and out of alone. I also didn't love the length. Would have liked longer or at least 6" shorter. Awkward length for my 5'6 frame. Overall I would recommend. It is worth dealing with the design flaws to wear this beautiful piece.

I didn't like having to wear a strapless bra with it. I tried to opt for petals but you could seriously see the outline of the petals because the material is so thin. Other than that it was super comfortable and I love that it was a jumpsuit.

links_Review_Title: So stretchy and flattering! Perfect wide leg for larger booty and thighs!
links_Review_Text: I got this to try on for a potential cruise dinner outfit (for the fancier night). I LOVEDDD the color and so did my husband. The material is so stretchy and comfortable. I was nervous that it would be too tight around my stomach show where your belly button is but it has a very smart seam right down the middle so that it cuts the belly button in half and smooths it out. One caveat though -- the material will show under garments (as you can see from my lace underwear) so make sure you have seamless underwear or even Spanx to keep things nice and smooth. I'm not wearing a bra in the photo but would probably wear nipple covers just in case it got cold (if you catch my drift, lol). Overall this is a beautiful jumpsuit and will definitely rent again for a wedding or even a fancy date night with my husband! Also, I ordered the 6L without knowing and it was the perfect length for my longer legs and grazed the floor on my tippy toes.
Runs short. Tall girls should wear with flats.

links_Review_Title: Really great fit but RUNS SHORT!!!!! Hard to get off to go potty. Zipper is a stinker, too
links_Review_Text: Super cute, comfy and flattering but beware it RUNS SHORT! Even at 5 foot 7, flat-footed, it still didn't graze the floor. So with heels? A little short but I wore it with heels anyway. I did no bra and it held me in just fine. The zipper was a booger and needed help. Took me awhile in the bathroom to get in and out of it so keep that in mind.
Rented this for our family Christmas portraits. Amazing quality. Perfect length with 4 inch heels. The fit was also very flattering.
This jumpsuit is amazing! It is very flattering and easy to wear. It was a bit difficult to zip and unzip on your own.
Am 5'7" and the L was definitely necessary. Tightest in the stomach loosest on the shoulders.

links_Review_Title: Elegant AND Comfortable AND Dance floor favorite
links_Review_Text: I loved the dusty cornflower blue and sleek minimal design of this jumpsuit. It was so comfortable and easy to wear. I was able to break it down on the dance floor all night. Lots of compliments all night as well. Do make sure you have a bathroom buddy bc the zipper goes up the middle of your back and not the side, making it impossible to unzip and zip on your own. Oh and I had to order the long bc regular was unavailable. I was a little worried bc I'm only 5'6 and thought it would end up much too long to wear, BUT I'm so glad I did bc it would have looked weird if it was any shorter. If you are 5'5 and taller I would get the long version of this!

Regular length is very average. I am 5'3 and wore 4" heel. The jumpsuit was touching my ankles. I usually like them to lightly touch the floor. But over all git was very true to size. Super comfortable to wear.

Perfect jumpsuit--I received so many compliments at the event I attended. I am about 5'8, 135 lbs and wore an 8L. It was the perfect length with a kitten heel. I have a small chest (34A bra size), so I did add a little piece of fashion tape on my strapless bra to keep it from showing. Highly recommend for spring transitional weather--just thick enough that it hides imperfections, but still breathable--and the color was lovely!

Loved loved loved this jumpsuit. I'm 5'1" and the R size was the perfect length. Wore with 2" boots and a leather jacket and felt amazing and received a ton of compliments. In fact I really wanted to buy it except even on sale it's $500+ but what a beautiful jumpsuit!
So many compliments and so comfortable. I loved wearing this dress. I wore it on vacay and very casual. Did well in heat

Wore this for med school graduation and absolutely loved it!! I'm 5'10" and it was the perfect midi length with 2.5 inch heels, hit just below the graduation gown. The material was even more beautiful in person, tons of dimension. I'm between a 16 and 18, usually 16 in dresses with an open skirt and 18 in jeans and the 16 fit my perfectly with honestly a little extra room in the bust area. I wore this dress for a full day of ceremonies and dinner and it was so comfy. Highly recommend!!

links_Review_Title: wore this for my rehearsal dinner!
links_Review_Text: This dress was very comfortable! It was a little big because my size wasn't available but I was able to pin the chest so it wasn't so gapey. the silhouette felt a little mermaid-y, which is out of my comfort zone, but I really liked it. Our rehearsal dinner wasn't super dressy so I paired it with a jean jacket and it looked great!

Great fit. Great length. I thought it was a true wrap around but it was not. Had a zipper on the side. I had to pin the front because it was very low cut. Otherwise dress was beautiful and received tons of compliments.

links_Review_Title: Made for a great boat dress
links_Review_Text: Wore to a rehearsal dinner and was a huge hit. Length was perfect and the wrap was very figure flattering. I do have larger boobs so I needed something under or a Bobby pin and I would have been perfect all night
Easy breezy beautiful wrap dress, perfect for a summer wedding. I loved dancing the night away at a hot outdoor wedding in this breezy dress.
This dress was a good fit. In my size (14) the cut isn't very flattering. I looked like a refrigerator.

links_Review_Title: My favorite I've rented so far
links_Review_Text: Love love loved this dress. Fits perfectly, so comfy. Wore around town sightseeing on vacation in Toronto, but you could also dress it up with heels for a date night/wedding/etc. contemplating buying, but it's pricey. Loved it

links_Review_Title: Bit too much gape in the chest
links_Review_Text: Loved the fit in the body but it was too large in the chest and gaped ALOT, even when pinned. Still very pretty.

links_Review_Title: It was comfortable and so pretty!!
links_Review_Text: If you do not have boobs like me, you may need a pin. I normally wear a 14 and had to order a size up.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful, flowy, spring dress. It hid my problem areas really well.
links_Review_Text: I have struggled with postpartum weight gain around my bust and belly, and this dress helped hide my problem areas quite well. The V is deep and shows cleavage, but I was able to cover up nicely with a small safety pin. The material is flowy, and very comfortable to wear. I wore a size 16R to be on the safe side, but could have easily gone down one size. Loved the dress and received compliments too. Pretty and feminine :-)

links_Review_Title: Perfect for a formal beach wedding!
links_Review_Text: Beautiful flowy fabric with pinks and blues. Loved the tie and ruffle down the front. Flattering cut for a bigger girl who doesn't have many curves. The neckline kept gaping and showing my bra, which may not be an issue for someone who fills out the top better than I did.

links_Review_Title: Perfect dress for a casual outdoor wedding
links_Review_Text: Dress is super flattering and the material was super light making it perfect for an outdoor summer wedding.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful, comfortable fitted dress and received many compliments!
links_Review_Text: The fit was perfect. I opted for a backup size because I can sometimes fluctuate between a size 0 and size 2. There's a hook and eye at the bust, which was much appreciated, since I have a smaller bust and narrow shoulders, often making it hard to fit into tops/dresses. I received many compliments. Also, I'm glad I didn't have to pay $545 for this dress. This was my first RTR experience. The dresses were dry cleaned and packed into the bag with care. The delivery vessel is very neat and easy to transport. The return process was very straight-forward. I look forward to my next rental.

A pretty fabric and overall flattering fit, nice length. I felt a bit like a cupcake with all the ruffles. I wanted to dress it down and couldn't really. Too much cleavage, I wore it as-is but I was too aware of it. I usually don't mind that at all, but it opens sideways so in some positions you share a panoramic view of your bra with the world. I just went for a pretty bra, but don't think I will rent again and certainly never for work

links_Review_Title: The color was beautiful. The texture in the fabric added depth.
links_Review_Text: The fit was perfect. My dress came with a safety pin already attached in the bust area. It was definitely needed for my bust size.
Wore this for a work event and got lots of compliments. It's very long, which worked well on me because I'm on the taller side. Very comfortable and flattering!

links_Review_Title: Perfect for spring -- beautiful colors and flowy
links_Review_Text: Rented this to wear to a winery event. High quality, soft and flowy fabric. Super comfortable! Got many compliments on this dress and colors photographed really well. Usually wear a 0 or 2, I chose the 2 which fit fine but 0 may have fit me a little better up top (small boobs) and length-wise. Highly recommend this dress!!
This dress was very beautiful but it showed quite a bit of cleave. I was nursing at the time so it was great for that purpose. I had to use a safety pin to hide a bit of the cleavage.
This dress received so many compliments.

links_Review_Title: Perfect Spring Dress for a Semi-Formal Occasion
links_Review_Text: Beautiful and breezy dress. The material is so nice and super light weight. Nice enough for a formal affair! Loved it and would rent again!

links_Review_Title: Flattering, but choose your undergarments carefully!
links_Review_Text: Great dress! Super flattering, and the ruffle, length, and print feel very fresh for spring. The fabric is lined, but still very thin. Amazingly, even with nude-colored underwear, they still showed through slightly (which is why I took off 1 star). Nothing that some shapewear couldn't resolve, though!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress with lots of compliments
links_Review_Text: Wore this to a rehearsal dinner and got a ton of compliments. I tried on the 14R, but could have fit in the 12R due to the size of the waist. It's not a true wrap dress (side zip) so you can't adjust it much smaller with the tie. There was a lot of fabric in the chest, which I'm sure is great for the ladies with a larger bust. For someone on the smaller side, I wish it was more low cut so it had a little bit more sex appeal (I don't need it to go down to my navel but like, let's show the girls off while I'm young, ya know?). Overall, the fabric was beautiful and flowy. The dress was lined, but would definitely need a lighter or neutral undie. I was going to wear black spanx beneath it, but you could see them easily.
Didn't end up wearing, but was true to size and flattering

Loved the feel of the fabric and the sleeves on this dress! However, the chest and neckline were a tad too big. I even sized down from my normal size. I would've had to pin the neckline up a bit if I was going to feel comfortable wearing this to a wedding.

The dress fit well, overall. However, the cleavage line was very low and I could not wear the dress without wearing a Cami underneath it. It definitely would not have been work appropriate without it. Even with the Cami, it felt a little bit off wearing it. I definitely could not have worn it without something underneath.
Soft, feminine, flattering.
It's a great cut, and a pretty pattern. The material is a little more casual than I anticipated, but it worked great for a rehearsal dinner.
This was really pretty and very comfortable. I loved that the v-neck has a little stitch in it to keep it from gaping. It's a little robe-like, but I felt good in it.
This fit really nicely for the event I wore it to. Fits true to size.
Very comfortable and true to size. It was a little too low cut for me but I used some fashion tape so no issues there.

Got about a million compliments on this one. The fabric is beautiful and breezy, and it's so comfortable! I did have to pin the top but think this wouldn't be an issue for less busty girls. Great for work or a nicer event.

links_Review_Title: Great day to evening summer dress. Got tons of compliments!
links_Review_Text: Comfortable fit. A little large in the top, if you aren't busty. I wore a tank top underneath.

Rented this for an outdoor summer wedding and it made the bride happy. It's a beautiful and comfortable wrap dress. The material is light and breezy. It has a painterly effect and is stunning. Felt like I was wearing art. Paired it with blue heels but light pink, bright pink, purple, green all work too for accessories.

The dress was decent... I liked the color, and wrap style dresses always fit me better than other dress styles. But the material felt very cheap and past the bust was a weird inseam on the sides where it would seem like it should just be flowy down to the bottom but went in instead. Not a fan.

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous dress, excellent fabric, stellar fit. A winner if you can get it!
links_Review_Text: stunning dress. I've kept this rental a long time, debating buying it. Worn multiple times for both dressy needs at work and personal events outside of work. it's lovely and fits beautifully.
So bright, float, whimsical, and feminine. I had to safety pin the chest, a tad low cut but and absolute beautiful fit and perfect for a summer day!

links_Review_Title: Perfect for a mid-afternoon summertime wedding! Perfect lightweight for a humid outdoor ATL wedding
links_Review_Text: Fits true to size, skin colored undergarments work best.
Absolutely love this Tanya Taylor dress! Fits true to size, flattering length and pretty spring/summer floral print (a bit brighter in person than the photo). Super comfortable!
Lower cut than I expected, so I wouldn't recommend it for a family party. The bust seems larger than the rest of the dress, so that contributes to it as well. Otherwise a pretty dress.
Not for busty ladies! This layers of ruffles mixed with the fabric makes this dress super heavy...not light and flows like I would expect with such a fun patterned maxi dress.
Got so many compliments

links_Review_Title: This dress made all my color dreams come true!
links_Review_Text: Alexis is one of my go to designers on RTR. The cuts are always super flattering and the material is always unique and luxurious. This dress is no exception. It's gorgeous and perfectly cut.

The lighting in this picture does the dress no favors, but in person the colors are super vibrant. Beware of three things: the fabric is super heavy, it's very long (I'm 5'10" and had to wear 2.5 inch wedges) and the bust area gaps when you sit so just make sure you wear a bra or safety pin it shut. All those things considered, it was a really lovely dress to wear and perfect for a vacation vibe.

links_Review_Title: Turned way too many heads. This one is one of my all time favorite rentals. Oh-so-cheery
links_Review_Text: It fit just perfectly. It is heavy like other reviews have mentioned but it wasn't too much. Super comfortable too.
I'm 5' 4" and this dress is about 8" too long. I dealt with it and got a ton of compliments but I could never rent this again. Sad because it's so high quality and unique
Dress is long and Danis is better than I thought. Many compliments and a lot of people think it had a 70's vibe. Lots of fun and very comfortable!
This dress is #beautiful but sadly it is so incredibly heavy. I felt like I was being pulled down the whole time. If you're any shorter than 5'4 I do not recommend this dress.

links_Review_Title: It is very forgiving fit dress because of waist elastic
links_Review_Text: Length is too long , i used safety pin to reduce but overall very nice, easy fit. Good for vacation

Such a fun bright dress for vacation, so glad I rented! I sized up for length based on reviews, but should have just stayed TTS as it runs a bit big. Great statement dress for vacation, got so many compliments!

Don't be scared of the colors and ruffles, this dress is fantastic! I brought it with me on vacation and I wore it several times. The fabric is breathable and flows so nicely. I will say this dress is heavy and has lots of fabric, so it will take up a lot of space in your luggage because of that I opted to actually wear it on the plane home because I needed the space. Also, the buttons are a bit annoying to fasten on and off, I couldn't do the top button for fear of it popping-the fabric has zero stretch. Still a great rent!
So many compliments on this one. The ruffles make it :)

I can't rave more about this dress! It's a party in itself! The colors, the cut! So fun! I did belt it because it was a bit boxy on me! But you could do any color belt really! So much to work with! HIGHLY RECOMMEND

Absolutely loved the fabric pattern and material. I would definitely size down. Only the small was available. I think it would have been perfect in extra small. It is VERY long though. Needed to wear 5/6 inch heels and it was still lightly sweeping the floor. Very elegant. Would love to be able to rent in an XS at some point.

What better way to represent the Dominican Republic! Beware it's A LOT of material and is a little heavy as well. The waist down gives you the illusion that it runs big but if you're a lil top heavy you may have trouble fastening the bust. I would recommend ordering your size. FYI it buttons in the middle front from top to bottom. You will NOT be disappointed!
Colorful. Vibrant. Flattering fit. The dress is long but with wedges I was able to wear it comfortably.
Perfect dress for a luau in Hawaii! Tons of fabric and pretty long. Not a ton of room in the chest.

The dress is amazing but it is DEFINITELY long. VERY long. I am 5'9" without heels and if I wouldn't have worn 4 inch heels I would have been very annoyed all night dancing, etc. - it's a beautiful dress and very well made (Alexis did it again!) but it is a LOT of heavy fabric. I went bra-less and it felt great -and haven't ever received more compliments on anything else I've rented on here! Very Mad to Mod - and killer for a Naples wedding!

links_Review_Title: More formal than expected - extremely heavy
links_Review_Text: ALEXIS: HARMONIE MAXI Size MR... was A LOT, too long and very heavy. It was too tight on top to wear a bra but voluminous on the bottom. Looks totally amazing in photos, but unfortunately was impracticle to wear in a casual environment. One pet peeve of mine... when you have ruffles that bounce, the material should be double-sided so you don't see the unprinted "back" of the fabric. But it was fun and cute. Just not for me.

links_Review_Title: Heavy material, but perfect for my trip to Mexico with 70 degree weather with low humidity.

links_Review_Text: I cannot WAIT to wear this dress!! The print on this fabric is amazing. I love the way it falls. Other reviewers have said it was heavy but I don't think it is. It is going to be the highlight look for my upcoming vacation!

So fun to wear. Moved beautifully, because the dress had the perfect amount of weight. Colors were very vibrant--perfect for a warm vacation locale, but maybe a bit much for your average summer maxi dress. Runs a little big in the chest, and is pretty long. I'm 5'7" and it was the perfect length for me in 5" wedges.
This dress is beautiful. It turns heads. The colors are so vibrant and the fabric lays really nicely. I got compliments all night and felt like a million bucks!
Made so well, best quality!

This dress definitely got me a lot of complements. It is absolutely so flattering and great if your going out dancing! The colors make you stand out in the crowd. The only thing was it was heavy which caused the space in between one of the buttons to open that I had to safety pin closed. I wore with bright yellow earrings and nude wedges. I'm tall so the length was perfect. I can see that being a problem for shorter girls. The dress is heavy, but doesn't make you hot. I wore this to an outside dinner in Cancun and it was perfect. Oh and the straps are difficult to adjust.

links_Review_Title: Fun dress for dress rehearsal in Mexico
links_Review_Text: Colorful dress--received a lot of compliments. I put a belt on it to be more fitting.
Want to keep

links_Review_Title: Everything! Since I got the dress I felt special until the compliments that I got in the wedding.
links_Review_Text: It was AMAZING! So many compliments. Perfect for a wedding in a hot/beach city. I wore it in Cartagena/colombia. True to size and should wear it with high heels.

I was looking for a fun colorful dress, and this was a good option, but didn't live up to expectations. The fabric is pretty heavy (a more formal material, not casual) and the straps dug into my shoulders a bit. It also looks like it should be fitted at the waist in the picture, but it isn't (it pretty much just hangs down). Colors are really fun though!

links_Review_Title: Wore this on my birthday and loved loved it
links_Review_Text: Runs true to size. very nice quality love

links_Review_Title: So many compliments on the dress.
links_Review_Text: The fit was beautiful and it has an elastic band so it is stretchy and the weight of the dress is perfect. I absolutely loved it.

This dress is beautiful. I am normally an 8 or 10 and RTR gave me a XLR and it fit perfectly. Same as the other reviews it is LONG - I am 5'9" and had to wear pretty high heels for it not to drag. But, it is an awesome dress and you will get lots of compliments!
This dress was EPIC! I didn't believe the reviews however and believed everyone was exaggerating on length. I'm 5'1 and even with 4 inch heels this was MUCH too long to actually wear.

This dress is beautiful, and I rented it for a girl's weekend away in Miami. It would have been perfect, however, it was just so long. Even with my tallest shoes, I was worried about ruining the bottom if I tried to wear it out.
Very long and buttons pull open around large chest. :(

This dress was super bright and festive. The fit was big, though it gapped a little bit between the top two buttons at my chest (34D). It was heavy and at least a few inches too long (I'm 5'6" and wore 3" wedges) but despite its imperfections, it was so much fun to wear! I would definitely rent again and recommend to a friend.
This dress is incredibly vibrant but it weights so much and was not working on my 5"2 frame

links_Review_Title: the buttons that allow for a front center slit.
links_Review_Text: I think it would have fit better if I had a bigger cup size.

links_Review_Title: Colorful, fun and fashion forward. Showstopper at pool party. Received so many compliments.
links_Review_Text: 5ft 8in and wore with flat sandrals. Dragged ground slightly which was perfect. Loved this rental!

So sad I didn't get to wear this because this dress is EXQUISITE. Unfortunately, it was sooooo long. I am 5'3 and the XS fit perfectly. However, even with 4 inch heels, the dress had 2-3 inches of fabric on the floor. I don't know how anyone under 5'7 could wear this dress. Disappointed.

I wanted to love this one but it was just so much work to wear! I needed an extra safety pin to keep it closed, or fashion tape would work, and it was very short as well so I wore my highest waist jeans. I felt like I was tugging it down all day too.
wore this on vacation and loved it, did come close a few times to a wardrobe malfunction but otherwise looked awesome, Super tight in arms and ribcage but somehow manages to not look too tight.

Absolutely adore this cropped blouse . It fits true to size and the fabric was thin (but not see through), silky and comfortable. I have a short waist and it pretty much covered my stomach when worn with high waisted jeans....but would likely show more skin on someone with a longer torso. Very cute top and would rent again.

Love the color, print, cut, its light (kinda see through), I wore this a couple times for date night ha in the summer and wasn't too hot. It's cropped so I suggest wearing with high waisted bottoms. I didn't have to wear a bra with it but you certainly can. I'm usually between a size 2 and 4. This was a bit snug but I found that I zipped the bottom half way and then slid it over my head, that worked best. Can't wait to rent this again!

links_Review_Title: Cute top but bad fit and poorly made
links_Review_Text: You can see from my photo that the back is super loose. The shirt is very cropped (about 3 inches above my belly button). I'm normally a size 4 and the 38 was very tight in the shoulders, arms, and yet really loose in the back. Also made for someone with a larger chest than 34B because the fabric kept falling forward and revealing my bra!
Looked super cute. It was too small for me to wear.

links_Review_Title: Super cute! It was just way too small
links_Review_Text: If you have broad shoulders, rent a size up

Loved this top, I could have worn it but it was a little snug in the arms so I decided to return it and rent a larger size later. I'm fairly petite (normal size 0/2 or 24/25) but have broader shoulders and muscular arms. Super cute and not as low cut or revealing as I thought it might be.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful top - too short. I don't like to show my stomach.
links_Review_Text: I didn't quite realize how midriff baring this top was. I didn't feel comfortable without a cami underneath. It is a beautiful top though.
Couldn't wear, sleeves too small
You have to have an extremely large chest to make this one work.

Beautiful - well-made red top with really cute detailing on the arms and waist... I wore it to a salsa class and the men like it more than they should..... the top tends to open up and advertise your assets.... so if you are not a flasher .... you made need a safety pin.
Too short in the torso

This top is made of comfortable, breathable material. It has a flattering, slimming, cropped cut. I layered it with a light jacket to walk into town and then took the jacket off to go salsa dancing. Cons: some of the material in the back hangs out in a strange way that a few people commented on, like "oh, let me fix that." You might need to use fashion tape over the bust because the fabric is loose there and there's nothing holding it together. But I have to say, neither of these things stopped me from wearing this shirt several times and loving it!
For a large it was still really snug on arms and the back material ballooned out as you moved.

links_Review_Title: Runs small is an understatement - unless you're a runway model.
links_Review_Text: I wish I had read the reviews. It suggested I do a 42, but now I see someone who was a size 4 had the 42 and they even said it was too small. So clearly the recommendation for me a 8/10 was way off. And it's made for runway models only.
This blouse was too small for my arms. I couldn't wear it.
Tight arms and very loose body. Overall weird fit
was excited about this but couldn't get it on. The arms were tiny! sad because the print was great.
I really liked the top and rented originally a size 36, I could not even try it on it was tight. So going up two sizes, I still had no luck... Very small. Beautiful material
Wierd fit. Tight on arms, way too big around chest area
I received a lot of compliments on this top. I thought it would expose my chest too much, but it didn't at all. It does run a bit small so size up!

I liked the feel of the fabric but the arms were tiny! I can usually fit a 6/8 on the top since I have a relatively small bust and narrow shoulders but I couldn't even get this top on due to the small arms!
Couldn't even get this on and zip it closed.

links_Review_Title: Sized so very small. A 40 is a small/ 4/6.
links_Review_Text: Bummed
Pretty top but didn't get to wear it because it runs way small. Also it seemed pretty sheer, definitely not okay for work

links_Review_Title: Everyday glam. This is a beautiful top.
links_Review_Text: The body of the top fit. However the sleeves were to thin. I have "normal" sized arms and these were simply too tight.

links_Review_Title: Wore it on a date and to work :)
links_Review_Text: Fits great and great pop of color. Was shorter than pictured so my midriff showed but I have a long torso. Overall cute top!

links_Review_Title: So teeny tiny. Size WAY up
links_Review_Text: Runs Barbie small

I rented another version of this dress from the same designer and loved it so thought I'd try this one too. The material is different - more of a satin. There's one clasp at the boobs and one right under - like a high waistline. There's no give to the fabric though and I couldn't get the waistline one done, so I wasn't able to wear it. I still love the silhouette of the style though!

This dress I saw someone else wear to a baby shower in November and I thought it looked stunning! When I received it, this dress didn't disappoint! I loved the floral pattern and it was a satin wrap dress. I thought it was breathable and had just the right amount of clips and ties to make it form fitting around my body! I would wear again! It is so flattering.

There's not one bad thing about this dress. Love the bust and waist hooks to keep my wrap dress secure. The fabric is light and gave a beautiful flowing effect as I walked. I paired with a camel colored pair of wedge heels and simple jewelry. This will definitely be in my bag again!!
Wore for a date, work, and conference. So many compliments. It's super soft too. My only complaint is how tight the chest is.
Easy to wear, beautiful fabric and has pockets!

Bust and waist closures for those that don't like wrap dresses these closures help. Still opted for a cami underneath for work. Soft material and great fall colors. I'm 5'4" so length is a little longer than I'd like.

links_Review_Title: LOVE this silky, stylish, unique dress!
links_Review_Text: Oh man, I felt like a Queen! It's so silky and the slit is just flirtatious enough while still being elegant. I was hesitant to rent this as it seemed a bit bold for my classic taste, but once I tried it on I fell in love. It feels like a silk robe and is so flattering with the cinched waist. I received a lot of compliments.

links_Review_Title: Great dress and fabric. Both sexy and professional. The bodice has a built in clip (good for work)
links_Review_Text: A tad small, I wear a zero in most stores but got a 2 for this and it was snug. True to size but on the snug sie.
Really nice material but was see through.
Loved the fit and style of this dress. I sized up because of other reviews. Perfect fall floral.

links_Review_Title: Broad chested and big busted women beware!
links_Review_Text: I gave this dress 2 stars because the silky fabric really is beautiful. However the fit is for slender, tall, narrow ladies. When wrapped as tight as I could get it, my bust was entirely exposed. The bust snap was of little help--it turned the girls into pancakes and gaped wide below the snap. Super disappointed, wanted to love.

Very cute dress that can be work to work, nice dinner, etc. The material is rather thin, so this won't keep you warm and would be better with a slip. Sleeves fit well, not too tight. It's a wrap around dress so the tie goes through the back and will tie on the side at the waist clasp. The ribbon tie fell out numerous times but you could always double knot it. The top bust area has a small latch the cover the ladies, didnt find it right away so was worried about the cleavage situation. Keeping this for more than one wear since it's so cute.
Nice cut and gorgeous fabric, just a bit too long for me

I loved this dress. The fabric was gorgeous and the skirt flowed beautifully. I got lots of compliments. This is a wrap-around dress that fastens with a hook and the waist. It also has a hook at the bust, which you can fasten or not, depending on how much cleavage you want to show. Note that the waist will be very snug. If you have a large tummy area, consider sizing up. There wasn't a larger size available for me, so I used a safety pin discreetly at the waist. Also note that because it's a wrap dress, a gust of wind will easily blow the skirt open. You'll probably want to use a little piece of fabric tape to hold the skirt closed.
Unfortunately, like the other review, runs very small. I'm a true 0 and the wrap doesn't truly wrap all the way so the opening ends up being very low.

This dress is a classic wrap dress. Beautiful fabric and well made. I normally wear a 6 and this was an 8. It was big in the bust on me and I was able to wear a something underneath that covered me up but didn't take away from the dress. Also at 5'4 this dress was a maxi on me not a midi.

This dress is beautiful. The puffed sleeves, ruffled neckline, satin fabric, floral print, midi length and wrap silhouette are the ingredients for a wonderful dress! Unfortunately I only rated it three stars because it is SMALL! I'm usually a size 6 but ordered an 8 because the 6 wasn't available and thank God I did. The 8 just barely wrapped far enough around me to be work appropriate. I still had to wear a camisole underneath and was careful when I walked so as not to expose my entire leg.

I ordered this dress for work and I loved it BUT I had to pin the top as it was so low cut (as it's a wrap around) and as soon as there is a gust of wind your underwear is on show. It looks amazing... just not easy to maneuver in!

links_Review_Title: I couldn't wear it as it was too tight on my waist.
links_Review_Text: I would say this runs small as I am typically a size 10 in most brands. The dress is very pretty though and I hope to exchange it for the size 12 as I would very much like to wear it.

links_Review_Title: This is a super flattering (for an hourglass figure) dress!
links_Review_Text: Loved the dress. It is work appropriate with a camisole under. There is a hook closure at the bust which is very helpful and makes it fit better but I still felt more comfortable with a cami. It is also a true wrap so I pinned it to the inside of a pocket in order to feel safer at work. The fabric feel very nice to the touch, silky, although I believe it is polyester. Not recommended for hot climates for that reason. Planning to wear it out to dinner this weekend as well, and can be easily worn to a fall wedding, party, etc. Wish I could buy but still pricey at only 10% discount.

I wore this for a formal wedding and it was perfect! Lightweight, comfortable material, just the right amount of dressy. It's a wrap-style but there's a hook at the waist to keep it closed, which I loved. The sleeves are slightly ballooned, but the waist had a snugger fit, so the overall look wasn't too oversized or '80s-feeling.
Beautiful dress hard to figure out how it fits.
I loved this dress but it was too tight on my bust. I will try to rent again, just one size up!

links_Review_Title: I bought it for a baby shower and looked nice.
links_Review_Text: The bust is a little snug but the dress is flowy and moves when you walk.

Super small sizing - I'm normally an 8 and already ordered up a size. I would have had gone up at least another size or two for this to fit properly. I realize I'm a bit larger in the bust but I couldn't even secure the clasp. This is made for women who have no shape!
This is my favorite dress i’ve ever rented. I got more compliments than ever on it! Fit comfortably and true to size
Wore this during Forced WFH to my kitchen, super cute, not sure if it runs small or if I've had too many quarantine snacks. Would love to wear this out one day!
I wore this for my birthday and it was a hit! Sleeves were a little long but it didn't bother me. I loved this fun and unique style of dress for a night out!

links_Review_Title: This dress was so fun for Valentines Day date night!
links_Review_Text: Loved the bold print and lace details of this dress. I wore to work with a leather jacket and then to date night. The chest is a bit tight if you are bustier but it still worked.

links_Review_Title: Super fun and very comfortable cocktail dress. Loved it!
links_Review_Text: So easy to wear. Very comfortable and unique dress.
Super comfortable. Fits great! Lots of compliments :-)

Very flattering, fun party dress. Received many compliments, stood out, and was very comfortable to dance in. It was a little large in the chest but thankfully the strap was adjustable. Highly recommend if you want to wear something different than another black cocktail dress!

Rented this for a girls night out. Such a fun dress! Got tons of compliments. Fits pretty true to size, might run a little small. If you are between sizes, order one size up (especially if you have boobs). I'm between a size 2 and 4 and the 4 was perfect for me, I honestly don't think the 2 would have zipped up over my boobs (I'm a 34C).
Love it! Fun and versatile dress. I wish to choose my correct size but I wanted to wear for thanksgiving, it was a little bit tight on my breast but with a top under it fits perfect.

This dress isn't really my style, but it worked perfectly for a theme party I attended. The dress fabric is quite nice and the lace was lovely. Could wear a strapless bra. There is a hook and eye clasp at the chest to keep the dress closed and it hid the bra.
Sleeve were a little big so I rolled them up and wore it that way. Super fun dress!

This dress was so much fun and I got a ton of compliments on it. It fit true to size, but the bust area was goofy. Once I closed the front clasp, it made my bust look weird so I ended up leaving it open but had to use lots of double sided tape to keep it in place. It was still super fun and sexy!

I love the sculpture construction of Self Portrait and this did not disappoint. I find SP usually runs small so I sized up to a 10 (I'm typically at 6-8) and it was too big but I was able to fake it a little by rolling the sleeves under and tightening the waist tie. Stick with your true size. This dress NEEDS to be steamed or pressed to looks its best and make the lace lay right.

This dress fit true to size, I am an 8 or 10, and often choose a 10 for a looser fit and added length. I felt sexy in this dress and received so many compliments. However, the shoulder strap did break after 15-20 minutes of wearing it. Since the dress was a looser fit on me, I'm not sure what happened. Thankfully, a girl had a sewing kit since we were out of town and I did not pack my backup size.
Wore this for a night out on Broadway....it was perfect. Fit was a lil big but I could tie it up a bit tighter and it worked great!
Not my usual size, but I was able to make it work. I loved this dress and will rent again.

Still unsure if I love or hate this dress. I'm a size 6 and sized up to an 8. It fit well, but my review is more on the dress alone. I still can't decide if it looked a cheap or luxury item. Will say in the right lighting you look like a million bucks and I would suggest wearing it in the evening.

This dress was so comfortable! The different shoulder styles give you a sexy side and a conservative side. Many compliments all night. I had a blast dancing all night. Great length, I am 5'2 135lbs. size 6 fit like a glove.
Perfect!
I wore this to a concert! Such a fun print, got compliments all night. I'm usually a 4 or 6, and rented the 6 which worked, but I wish I had rented the 4. It ran just a tad big in my opinion.
LOVED this dress. It felt so silky and fell just right on my body. Perfect for a date night to show off legs and a tiny bit of skin up top. Definitely took a picture in this for the 'gram.
Obsessed with this little number. The fabric is so beautiful in person. Faux wrap. Very sexy and unique. Loved how it made me feel. Head turner for sure. Rent this little puppy!
Hook and eye gave me Quadra-boobs. If not for that it would have been perfect.

links_Review_Title: The photo doesn't do this dress justice. It was amazing in every way. I didn't want to take it off.
links_Review_Text: This dress is unique, sexy, comfy, flattering.....everything you want in a dress!! I wanted to wear it every day. I'm pretty small in the bust, so I didn't have to wear a bra with it. I'll definitely rent it again.

Really pretty and cool dress! Only thing was it was tight around the chest area, made my girls look a little squished... if you have a bigger jest I would order a size up... but then the strap will fall off, like mine did. Would get this dress again though!
Love this asymmetrical dress!

Fit was great. Showed the shoulder and legs in a sexy, playful way. Wore this dancing (not smart cuz you can't really lift your arms haha but as cute as it was I did not care!!) I would buy this look. Just loved how unique it is!!

links_Review_Title: Strap wouldn't stay up! Beautiful print- I wanted it to work!!!
links_Review_Text: This dress not only has a cool print, but there is a print in the background too. It is well made and feels great. But, I couldn't get the single strap to work for me.
Wore this out to a concert at a nightclub with colleagues in Miami. Absolutely loved the fit, colors and that it wasn't a typical tight club dress.

links_Review_Title: Rock n roll feminine dress! Loved it!
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress!!!! I got so many compliments, and if it hadn't been for one of the straps being broken, I would have bought it! Super cool!
The top is fantastic it has an asymmetrical design that is stunning and attention grabbing.

links_Review_Title: Felt SO beautiful in this dress!
links_Review_Text: This dress is just simply special. I felt so beautiful and received tons of compliments. If I had another event I would definitely wear it again!

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous dress just runs a little small
links_Review_Text: Will definitely rent this again in the next size up!

links_Review_Title: It weirdly works! Sexy but not OTT
links_Review_Text: Fits hourglass / pear shape perfectly. A little short if you have a big butt, but not out of bounds. Unique and fun!
I got so many compliments on this dress. It's definitely sexy, but not in a revealing way. Will absolutely rent again!
Perfect for Cruella outfit.
I liked this dress. If you like loud prints and interesting cuts like I do, you'll enjoy it. It's not as flattering to the figure as I would have liked.

links_Review_Title: Absolutely LOVED this dress. So chic and fun.
links_Review_Text: Great for a cocktail party
It was a fun design but didn't look right on me and was a little loose in the chest. Didn't wear
Best item I've rented so far. Note that if you're 5'2 or less it will come down to your toes in length. Soooo many compliments and the fit was perfect with my 26/27 waist.

I loved this skirt for my beach vacation. It's a slightly heavy fabric but it's breezy and relaxed. Looked really cute with a plain black tank tucked in. I'm typically a 12 or 14 and the 14 fit perfectly / very comfortably. I'm 5'6" and the length was perfect. Will rent again!
Obsessed. Probably my favorite thing I've rented and I've rented a lot. Tons of compliments. So fun to run around New Orleans in! A must rent!
Fit perfect, loved the pockets, got so many compliments. It is slightly heavy but still perfect for hot weather!

This skirt is made of beautiful thick material and was fun for a night out with a black tank top tucked in. I added a pretty turquoise necklace to complete the outfit. Probably wouldn't rent again since the skirt had its moment, but would recommend to others!

I love Mara Hoffman-- the print, the fabric, it's all luxe and lovely. Fit on my true waist and I'd say if anything it ran a bit small but mostly TTS. If you're between sizes, though, I'd go up. Heavy fabric, but so beautiful. I loved this and almost kept it!

Well, kind of your grandmother's curtains, but in a cute way. Heavy fabric keeps the maxi length skirt from feeling too bohemian, as does the 70s print. Zip and button at waist and, no stretch. I got a positive review from the most fashionable person in my office!
This skirt is so fun. Wore it to work and felt fancy, but also professional. Would definitely rent again!
Fantastic skirt that is the perfect length for walking through the city. It doesn't drag and it's so vibrant. Loved it.

Such a bold, fun print! The cotton/linen fabric is heavy and flows beautifully. I'm a 6/8 and should have had the 6 -- I think it would have been more flattering. I wore this with a belt, because there are loops on the skirt. Oh and it has pockets!
This was so much fun to wear. Wore it to my bridal shower (and received it early so also wore it to work!) absolutely loved the for, colors and feel of the skirt.

I wore this skirt twice, once to a nice dinner with the girls and the second time on the weekend to the mall. The first time I wore it with a belt to dress it up and wedges. The skirt flows great and sits comfortable on your waist. The second time at the mall I wore with flats (I'm 5'8 and it did not drag) and no belt to keep it comfy, easy on and off for try ons. I would recommend.

links_Review_Title: such a fun bright pattern! tons of compliments and very comfy
links_Review_Text: looks great with a cropped white top and wedge heels :) great for work or play
Perfect skirt for vacation in Mexico. Beautiful fabric. Loved the length. So comfortable and effortless.

links_Review_Title: Love a tropical two piece ensem
links_Review_Text: Wore this to a wedding welcome party that was at a tropical themed bar. It was perfect and got tons of complements. Both pieces fit true to size except the top I needed to shorten the straps.
Perfect skirt for summer! Super lightweight and easy breezy. The pockets are amazing!

I rented this for every day and ended up wearing it for engagement photos. While the sizing runs slightly small, it is well made and comfortable. The fabric feels heavy to the touch but not heavy on. I received numerous compliments and it photographed wonderfully. One of my favorite rentals!

links_Review_Title: Pretty fabric but tight in the waist
links_Review_Text: Skirt is linen and has no stretch. The waist was slightly small on me, but not enough to size up. Skirt has a zipper fly and button.

links_Review_Title: Fun skirt to dress up or down
links_Review_Text: I liked but didn't love this skirt. It is definitely well made and beautiful. I felt it accentuated my big hips more than I'd like. I would suggest this skirt for women that don't have big hips as it does give a little flair in the hip region. Having said that, I still wore multiple times in a month and got countless compliments!

Have worn once a week since I rented in Unlimited! So fun and versatile. Received many compliments and IT HAS POCKETS. Figured Mara Hoffman sizes may be a little small so sized up to the 10 (usual 8) and am quite pleased.

Love, love, love this skirt! The colors are even more amazing in person and the fabric was dressy enough to wear to a rehearsal dinner. The waist was a bit snug, even going a size up from my usual, but not too constraining. Also, the length was exactly what I was looking for! I'm 5"3 and wore flat black sandals-it was long but not to the extent I felt like I was going to trip all night.

Such a cute skirt! It's a little heavier than you would think, but still loves the way it looked. The 4 was perfect for me and I usually wear a 25 or 26 in jeans. Literally got 15 compliments on this. It hit right at my ankles since I'm 5'2", but looked great with heels.

This skirt is really fun and comfortable. I rented it for a Bachelorette party and received so many compliments. The fabric is on the heavy side and there is a lot of fabric. It runs smalls so I probably could have ordered up a size. Overall, loved the skirt and would rent again!

This skirt was glorious. Beautiful print and vibrant colors. The linen blend fabric was thick and not too hot/cold. True to size for me. At 5'4.5" the length hit at a strange spot. Kind of in-between maxi/midi length. I paired it with a white cropped cami for a day wine tasting in Napa. Wish I could keep this one!
Gorgeous skirt and thick material. Perfect length and hits high on waist. I had zero room available and even was a tad tight. Didn't have a belt to go with it, so I blossomed my shirt out to cover.
I ended up just using for photo shoot but still so fun
I wish I could keep this! High waisted fit was super flattering and love the button closure. Tons of compliments. Length was perfect.

Worn to a Palm Beach wedding in Spring. It was perfection! Thinking of buying it. Heavy quality linen material. It is high waisted, bright and comfy! Definitely a statement piece. Stood out in an abyss of boring formal wear. Highly recommend this piece!

links_Review_Title: F L O R A L Perfection!
links_Review_Text: Easy as 1, 2, 3! Can be worn with black or white. I wore for bridesmaid luncheon at a winery.. great transition piece! Has belt loops -- if you had a small waist belt could be super cute!!

links_Review_Title: The perfect splash of green for St. Patrick's day!
links_Review_Text: Great fit, easy spring print!
Day time event, it was hot and I felt good and stylish all day. The colors are super vibrant! Good size Pockets

This is just as beautiful as you think it is. Please excuse the wrinkles, it's linen and my steamer wouldn't work :/ The waist is tighter than I had hoped so maybe size up if you are fully figured. I loved the boldness of it and it was very nice to wear in cold weather bc the material is very thick.

This skirt was a thicker material than I expected and I really liked that. I got so many compliments! Wore it several times. There are belt loops so I had to dig out an appropriate belt. It is quite long and hit me at the ankles. Very comfortable to wear, wonderful print and fabric.
I felt like a princess in this skirt and received compliments from EVERYONE! I wore it with a nude pair of heels and it was perfect. I like it so much I'll probably re-rent it in a month.

links_Review_Title: This skirt was wonderfully heavy, but breezy!
links_Review_Text: It fit like a 12 would fit. I know higher end brands sometimes run a little smaller. I normally wear a 12, but ordered the 14 and it fit perfectly.
This is going to be a repeat offender in my RTR closet. The skirt is tea length and looks so good with either flats or heels. The print is such a statement. I can't wait to wear it again.
Heavy linen material & gorgeous floral print. It even has pockets! What more can u ask for? It also wasn't long on me and I'm pretty short

I love this preppy, feminine skirt by Mara Hoffman! Running true to size with no stretch, I recommend wearing your true size, for your primary size and going up for your back up. This style is loose throughout the midsection and, loose at the hips. At 5’3, the length hit Tea length on me. The vibrancy of this skirt is absolutely stunning. Pair with heels and cute top and earrings to complete your outfit!

I love everything about this skirt! The bright colors! The high waist (with belt loops). The fabric! It's so amazing. I rented it for vacation and will also be wearing it for an upcoming speaking engagement.

links_Review_Title: Perfect for a tropical destination wedding
links_Review_Text: Received tons of compliments on this skirt! I had trouble finding the right top for it so just ended up wearing a black tank. Definitely consider this skirt for a destination wedding welcome party or tropical vacation.

links_Review_Title: 💙 HARD TO FEEL BLUE IN THIS DRESS! 💙
links_Review_Text: Wow, just wow! Beautiful design, beautiful fabric. Looks and feels like a lightly textured silk, but is poly blend woven fabric. I thought it would be jersey, it's not and I'm so happy! Zoom in on pic to see texture (I have more pics on Instagram at agentcheryl). It fit perfectly true to size. The cutout on side is adjustable, so you can control how much skin you're comfortable exposing (I cranked it in). It is lined. There's a button at the neck to get in and out of it. If you don't have hips, the cutout will give the illusion of hips. If you do have hips 🙋‍♀️ this will accentuate. Stay well out there my RTR family! 🥰🤗

This dress is so fun! Definitely better in person than the photos online. Heavier than I thought, which makes the straps not great at adjusting. Runs TTS and super comfy. Little bit of boning in the bodice and chest is padded so no need for a bra :)

My event was cancelled so I didn't actually get to wear it out, however - I LOVED it! Will be renting again. It's fun, flirty with ruffles. Great dancing dress! Love the unique purple color! Hugs in at the waist and really flatters!
She-ra dress! most beautiful purple metallic dress. Wrinkle free, absolute showstopper I loved it.

links_Review_Title: First time using TRT, and I wore this to a comedic "Italian wedding" performance dinner.
links_Review_Text: True to size in the waist and hips, but terrible fit through the bust. Like most of the reviews, I had to pin the straps almost 2" after adjusting them. What you see in the pic is me wearing a "miraculous bra" to fill out the gap in the bust. I'm a 38C, so I was a little surprised how much gap there was. I did receive lots of compliments and it was comfortable to wear and dance in.
Loved this dress- as most other reviews mentioned the straps are long and don't stay tightened so needed to be pinned. Otherwise it was great!
Another favorite rental of mine, I wore this dress to celebrate my grad school graduation. It fit perfectly and the color is gorgeous.

Fun, flowy, and SO many compliments all night long. I am considering buying because I love the dress but the only complaint was that the wire on each side (near where the straps attach to the dress) were poking out and made it painful every so often. I think this could be fixed, but it was aggravating.
I wore this to a wedding and got so many compliments. I do agree that the dress is very heavy and the straps fee like they may nap off. I probably could have worn a 2 but it wasn't available.
The boddess was wired and because I have small breasts, it looked like I was wearing a heavily padded bra. The wire kept poking me throughout the night, but it was a pretty dress.

I absolutely loved this dress! It was fun and flirty and definitely wowed! It was lightweight and comfortable. My only cons were the boning was uncomfortable at times and although the straps were slightly adjustable they gave me no support.

I rented this dress for a wedding welcome party in a surf shop in Cali. So fun and I got so many compliments on it. Like other reviewers said, the straps don't stay tight. Throughout the night I always had to have someone tighten them up. They probably would've stayed tight if I safety pinned them. But it wasn't a huge issue. I would absolutely rent again.

In a wedding filled with women wearing RTR dresses (seriously I saw three dresses I've worn or considered wearing + a few more that everyone said they were renting), this dress stands out! It was super comfortable but still fitted through the bodice and lining of the bottom half. The metallic is high quality so it looks cool and not cheap or too shiny. I'd definitely rent again.
This dress was so much fun! I wore it for a big fundraising event and got a stream of compliments. Warning: the metal detailing in corset poked me at all night.
This dress is SO much fun to dance in!! Straps are a little loose and don't stay tightened, but still an amazing dress!
Gorgeous dress, simple, but stands out from the crowd. Straps on the dress didn't work, so couldn't adjust length & showed alittle more cleavage then I would have liked. Otherwise, would rent again.

links_Review_Title: Everyone LOVED this dress! Anyone who asked I told them I got it from Rent the Runway!
links_Review_Text: True to size

links_Review_Title: Beautiful Dress - Straps Slipping Makes It 3 Stars!
links_Review_Text: This dress fits true to size and is very sturdy and has boning throughout the top - it's very beautiful and the color is AMAZING! The only reason this dress is three stars and I wouldn't rent it again - the straps! The dress has thin spaghetti straps that are adjustable like bra straps, but because the dress is heavy, the straps keep slipping out of place all night! I had to adjust them every 30 minutes!

Perfect for a night of dancing! I took salsa lessons in this dress. It made me look like I knew what I was doing! lol! The stretch is a life saver. Such a fluid dress to hide u wanted "curves". Only down part is the unsupporting straps. I ended up knotting them. Earrings are RTR as well!
This dress is FUN! A girl asked to peek at the tag to know who the designer was. Had to wear Spanx to get the zipper up comfortably. Other than that it was very comfortable to wear.

I absolutely loved this dress. It was so flattering on me. I'm heavy set and it hugged me in all the right places. The only complaint was that the straps were a little long. They are adjustable but we're still oversized. I safety pinned them and make it work. I would highly recommend this to anyone looking.

Unique dress which is so much fun! I got as a back up for a wedding but chose a different one. Fit was true to size. Lots of support for the girls so didn't need a bra. Hopefully I'll have another event soon so I can rent this again!

links_Review_Title: This dress was everything I hoped for!! Made my birthday!
links_Review_Text: Amazing dress! So fun for dancing-so many compliments

The color and fabric are gorgeous in person! I opted for no bra because of the built in pads. I didn't love how the straps loosened all night. Definitely not something I would wear to work, but it was perfect for the concert I went to.

links_Review_Title: I really liked this dress! It was so fun for a night out.
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress - it moved really well (see the twirl!) and was very forgiving to areas I like to hide (tummy). I am very large chested (DDD) and it fit, but did show off some cleavage. For my event, it worked great, but definitely something to be aware of. Only con was the fabric on the zipper was pulling back and the straps slipped, so I had to have a friend keep tightening them.
The ruffles are perfect and so cute when you walk! Perfect birthday party outfit!

links_Review_Title: I ended up not wearing it but it was cute.
links_Review_Text: I would say you have to have a chest to wear this one!
Looks great on curvy body and such a fabulous color!

I usually wear and 8 but wore a 6. I'm more bottom heavy but because the dress is well-made it fell nicely and was still flattering. The downside is the straps are like a bra with adjusters on the back that kept loosening so I kept having someone tighten them for me through the night. It's a heavy dress so they kept slipping. Would recommend pinning or taping them. Also the lining in the bra poked up a little bit could be taped if needed. Overall really fun, comfortable and unique dress.

I loved this dress. Top has nice structure with boning. Somewhat stretchy, fitted material from waste down. Very figure flattering and very comfortable. Tea length on me, which was perfect. Only con for me as others have mentioned was the straps loosening and slipping. Had to adjust a few times through the night.

links_Review_Title: Waited 2 months for this to become available
links_Review_Text: I was so looking forward to wearing this but it runs huge. Not only was the zero still too big in the top but the boning bowed outward making the top bubble out (i'm pointing to the area in my pic). It was so weird, so I am going to try another size zero... Also, the adjustable straps are ribbons so they loosen from the weight of the dress almost immediately! So sad! But great color and concept.

links_Review_Title: LOVE this dress! the color is beautiful and very flattering. it was very comfortable!
links_Review_Text: my only complaint was that the straps fell down as i stood/sat down. it is adjustable but only a little bit and it didn't stay once i made it tighter. even with that, it was still a great overall fit and i would still recommend!!

This dress was great for New Years Eve! Note that the dress is heavy and it causes the straps to loosen and if you're small chested like me it will hang a little! I also felt that it was a little too loose around the bodice.

I had a baby 5 months ago and wanted to wear something fun but forgiving. This dress hit the mark and then some! It fit perfectly! Definitely true to size. The zipper was a little hard to get over the waist seam, but that was just the construction of the dress. It is SO flattering. My mommy belly was WELL hidden under the pleats and layers. If you are very busty, this dress will be great for you. I'm pretty small up top and had to wear a padded bra inside the built in cups and tie the straps to give a "halter" look. The material is sooo pretty. It draws attention without being too "in your face" flashy. Since becoming a mom, this dress definitely helped me feel like my old self :)

The dress was just as pictured and went over great at my holiday party. I didn't wear a bra with it, and the adjustable straps worked well. I really loved being able to use Hollywood tape under the different layers to make it a bit shorter.

Let's just say this is not for the faint of heart. It is magenta, shiny lamé fabric. The plates are very playful but can add bulk if you are bottom heavy. Overall an amazing dress, wish there wasn't padding in the boob area though!
Super fun bold dress. Ran a bit large, would size down if I rented again.
So many compliments! Loved this dress. It ran large, so I safety-pinned the straps to criss-cross in the back (they were still too long although they were slightly adjustable).

I loved this dress, especially the material. My only issues were the strap holders not being very strong, so they kept getting loose. I had t The boning in the sides of the bodice were also a little wonky and would bend on each other, looking a little frumpy. Other than that, it's a really fun dress that had a good amount of stretch!

links_Review_Title: Fit in waist boobs are a FFF
links_Review_Text: Way way to big in the boobs and I am D cup.
This dress is a showstopper. It runs big and I had to pin the straps, as others have said but it is a winner! Love it.
I'm usually a 0 but I was a 2 in this brand. Lovely material, color and quality!
The fit of this dress is so flattering. It hits your waist at the perfect spot and was great for my hourglass shape.

links_Review_Title: Glad I sized up, very cute dress
links_Review_Text: Had read to size up to fit in larger busts and I'm glad I did. It also made it forgiving in the stomach area which I needed. Looks super cute with a denim jacket or on its own. The weather turned shortly after I rented it so unfortunately it became too cold to wear more than once but I'd rent it again for slightly warmer weather. Could look a bit too boho depending on the shoes and accessories (unless that's what you wanted).
The top is stretchy so it fit great and was easy to wear. The fabric is pretty light which was nice on a hot day. Overall I thought the fit and the colors were both super flattering.

I'm small up top and larger on the bottom - this dress was so flattering and perfect for work or an event! It's cotton so it's definitely on the casual side. It's stretchy up top but I usually range between a 0-2 and the 2 fit perfectly.
This is a length and style that usually isn't flattering on me, but I LOVED it. It's a well-made piece; the quality is impressive. Lots of compliments on this one.

links_Review_Title: With boots it fit the updated western look I wanted.
links_Review_Text: Fun dress for a bachelorette in Texas. Very comfortable and fits true to size. Could see myself wearing to other occasions.

I love this dress. I am short (5'1) and it fit perfectly! It's definitely one of the best fitting pieces I've rented. It is casual enough to wear during the day but can be dressed up for a wedding or night out.
I felt really elegant Ian's professional in this while also feeling sexy AND comfortable.
Runs small. Bodice of dress was very unforgiving and unflattering.

I LOVED this dress. It is very feminine and darling, with the frilly neckline, flutter sleeves, and the floral print. At first I didn't know how I'd feel about the waistline, but I found it to be SO slimming. I kept wanting to twirl! I did wear tights, which was a mistake, since the fabric kept clinging. Next time I'd wear bare-legged so it would fall and flow appropriately. I wore this to a casual and conservative wedding, but I think it can be dressed up or down. Definitely a fun pick!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful color and fabric, weird fit at armscye
links_Review_Text: Wore this to the symphony, loved the fit in the bust and the overall design. Did not like the armscye as it cut in at an awkward spot and the ruffles only did so much to hide it. Might have needed to go up a size? But it fit great everywhere else so I'm not sure that would fix it.

links_Review_Title: Adored this dress! Well made, soft, comfortable material ... pretty!
links_Review_Text: Rented as a back-up for a “farm chic” event and although it worked, I went with something with a bit more color and maybe a little more flattering (and sexy)! No “cons” ... I would rent it again or buy it.
Love the fabric but it was too tight on the top half.
Felt pretty and cute and just perfect for a trip to Paris

I thought the top cut of this dress was awkward and I don't think it would have been solved by renting a smaller or larger size. It looked funny how much skin was exposed under the shoulders and the smocking was short waisted. I think the color and floral print are very pretty but the fabric seemed a little cheap and was very wrinkled.

links_Review_Title: The print looked cheap, and the top was really small.
links_Review_Text: Tight fit on the top - I am usually a 2 and couldn't even zip this dress up.

links_Review_Title: The only thing that would make this dress more perfect would be pockets. Love this dress!
links_Review_Text: Very comfortable and light.
loved this dress! the smocking is very forgiving and flattering. It was not too racy (great for work or if you don't want to show cleavage).
Very comfortable to wear around town, but just a very average sundress.

links_Review_Title: Cute dress for a casual get together
links_Review_Text: It fit well...snug around chest but it was smocked so it didn't look too tight. It doesn't have any give so if you are big chested, which I am not, size up. I normally wear a 2-4. Length was shorter than on the photo. Fabric is breezy cotton. Pattern wasn't my favorite but it looked somewhat boho/batik like.

Absolutely loved this dress and got so many compliments. It's a fun pattern and relatively flattering shape. The only caveat worth mentioning is that the fabric is on the thick side -- so if you live somewhere in the south it may not be ideal for summer. I personally loved it though and am holding on to for another weekend!

links_Review_Title: I love this dress - so flattering
links_Review_Text: I love this dress - so flattering and hits at the perfect places (waist and just above my ankles). I wore this two work a couple times, perfect summer lightweight dress. Will definitely rent again as the temps continue to increase!

links_Review_Title: Love this dress. Got so many compliments!
links_Review_Text: I'm usually a 6 but went up a size based on reviews and was glad I did. The little ruffle cap sleeves and ruffle peplum are super flattering.
Wore this to a work event and got at least 10 compliments.

links_Review_Title: It’s a great fit, but print looks a little cheap
links_Review_Text: This dress fit me like a glove. I’m petite 5’2” with some curve. But the print looked a little old school and cheap. Wasn’t a fan of the print in person.
Very comfortable - pictures did not so it justice - this was a great dress showed all the right areas

links_Review_Title: Sexy and comfortable, would rent again
links_Review_Text: I loved this dress! It was really comfortable and fit snug but not too tight. The slit is high and I was worried I was going to pull a Britney but the fabrics heavy and with the snug fit I didn't have any problems.

links_Review_Title: Slit way too high for corporate office. Did not wear.
links_Review_Text: This dress is so strange. And in the RTR picture, it looks like it has no slit at all. But when the dress shows up - surprise! The top of the dress is great. Loved the neckline. But the high slit made it impossible to wear to work.

links_Review_Title: Not work appropriate but great for a date
links_Review_Text: Originally I rented this for work. I couldn't tell from the picture how low cut it would fit or that it had a very high cut thigh slit. It was not appropriate for work but made for a great date night dress.

links_Review_Title: Fabulous dress, but not for the conservative office
links_Review_Text: This is a great dress--comfortable and flattering. The neckline is a bit too low and the slit in the skirt a bit too high for my office/credibility. Could be perfect for a night out or date.

I rented this for a work event and was surprised when I tried it on, that the slit was HIGH! It's almost scandalous. The material is nice and the dress would've been perfect without the big slit. Too sexy for daytime. Not able to wear and am sending it straight back.

links_Review_Title: The dress is beautiful, but I was not able to wear to work because it has a high slit.

links_Review_Text: Cute in theory but not meant for a pear shape.

It is truly a lovely dress. It has a slit in left that can be a little risque for work if someone can see you seated. Otherwise, absolutely gorgeous. I wore it to work anyway and noticed all the guys looking hahaha, I think it looks conservative because it covers most of your body, but the way its put together, with the slit, just-right neckline and defined waist makes it very sexy as well.

links_Review_Title: I wore this dress to the ballet.
links_Review_Text: The dress is great looking, and the draping is super flattering. However, it is very, very low cut, which is especially noticeable when sitting down. I almost couldn't wear a bra with it, but ended up pinning it in place and being okay. Also, note that the leg slit is very high; too high to wear spanx under the dress.
I wouldn't wear this for work-- too sexy- but I wore it for a wedding and it looked fabulous. It is quite fitted and the slit is high and neckline a bit low. But it is beautiful!

Very sexy dress, def not office appropriate. Was perfect for the party I attended. Low cut but tasteful, side slit that did require a safety pin to not show my undergarment. Nice thick material that was great for winter weather. Lots of compliments!
Very quality fabric. Love the fit. I have enormous breasts and although low cut, it was flattering. Very comfortable and classic. Love it!

This dress is EVERYTHING. I almost bought it (and probably will end up buying it). It is the most flattering dress for ladies with curves, shows off the chest and butt but is forgiving in the waist (while still being cinched). Fabric is soft stretchy and breathable, it's like sexy pajamas. How is this possible? Rent it asap!

links_Review_Title: I rented this for a work holiday party, but it will not work. The neckline is WAY too low.
links_Review_Text: The material is thick and forgiving, but the neckline is very low.

links_Review_Title: Very glamorous! I wore this dress for a "Night in Hollywood" Murder Mystery party. To die for!!!
links_Review_Text: Low cut and high slit made the dress very glamorous, the ruching made the dress very figure forgiving!! Perfect for my curvy figure. Loved it.

Beautiful dress in every way, but totally inappropriate for work. I loved the sturdy fabric and cut of the dress. Fit was really pretty. Just couldn't wear for work, which was the reason I rented it at all. Bummer.
I can't think of a situation where I could use this dress. The dress is too elegant for a club, the slit is too high for work.

I liked this, but it was a little too revealing for work - the v neck was deep, and the zipper on the v neck was a little informal. Also ended up having to pin the slit in the skirt - it went up really far! Otherwise I loved it.
Runs slightly large. Well made, nice material, flattering cut. Note that it has a slit in the skirt that goes quite high
As shown in previous users photo, this side slit is far to high for what is a conservative work dress otherwise.
The slit is high! Not good for formal work events like court or meetings. Very pretty dress on and the quality is wonderful.

links_Review_Title: Sexy - too sexy for some workplaces
links_Review_Text: Really great dress, but cut really low and has a high slit. Beware if you work in a conservative place, and definitely would not recommend for an interview.

links_Review_Title: Great style and perfect fall/winter fabric - too low cut/ high slit for the office
links_Review_Text: Nice fit, great style and perfect material for fall/winter office wardrobe. Low cut neckline (def need camisole / tank for work) and left side slit was very, very high - impossible to sit down in this dress at work w/o pinning the slit closed or wearing shorts. Loved the dress but better for a night out

links_Review_Title: It's beautiful and fits well, too low cut for daytime work. I would wear to an evening work event
links_Review_Text: low cut
There is a very high slit on one side which is not pictured well in the dress images. The neckline is also a bit low as such do not recommend for conservative work environment.

links_Review_Title: Felt like Hawaii while in lock down!
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress, it was cute and fun. I got it while sheltering in place and it added some fun to my boring days. It was large overall, especially, in the chest, which was disappointing because I thought the 8 would be great given Reformation sizes. The arms and chest were so loose it kept slipping off, so it was not appropriate for any Zoom work calls, but I but a bikini top on under and it was great for lounging with an at home mai-tai!
This dress was really cute on and great for short girls! The zipper kept getting stuck which was such a pain so I would not rent again.

links_Review_Title: Fit perfect, preferred it with the sleeves on the shoulders.
links_Review_Text: Great fit, perfect for a summer outdoor wedding.

I'm 5'4.5" and as you can see in the picture it's not really a midi on me. The color was beautiful. I've found reformation dresses wrinkle easily so only rent this if you have a way to steam it/iron it before the event. This dress in particular was great since you could wear it strapless or with straps.

I received so many compliments on this dress! I'd rent it again and again if I could and wear it to any/every event! LOVE LOVE LOVE This dress! Fit like a glove! Wore no bra. True to size. I'm around 130lbs and 5'4" (curvy and athletic build) - 34/36 B cup.
Beautiful dress. Wore it for a bridal shower. Fix like a glove, but wrinkles very easily. In fact it came completely wrinkled I had to steam it before I wore it.
Excellent fit, hugged my curves and was the perfect length. Danced all night in it and was super comfortable.
