Great dress for going from day-to-night! It is very fitted on the top and the dress has zero stretch. With the nature of the fabric, the dress doesn't get overly wrinkled. Although, having wrinkle release spray on hand to get out light wrinkles-can be handy.

Wore this to my engagement party barbecue at the end of the summer. It was really comfortable and perfect for the outfit that I wanted to wear to my engagement barbecue. Most people were wearing jeans or khakis or some cute jumpsuits. But I really felt like I stood out in this dress. It was extremely comfortable and I took the advice of others and sized up even though I didn't really need to. But it was good that I did so because I felt like the length was even more perfect!

links_Review_Title: So many compliments on this amazing dress!
links_Review_Text: Dress was beautiful. Got so many compliments the entire night. It looked great on and was lovely and flowy, while hugging all the right places. It was great for dancing and also really comfortable. Only complaint is that it wrinkled pretty easily and got a little stretched out by the end of the night. But, I would definitely rent again!

I rented this for a trip and ended up wearing it to a nice dinner out. It was perfect, made the night feel extra special. I would recommend for a wedding, special day, or nice dinner. There was good stretch in the shoulders, and the waist and length were perfect. Will rent again :)
Fit perfectly! Perfect for petite sizes and I'm on the shorter size and it was the perfect length! Highly recommend

links_Review_Title: Easy quick and not stressing in the stores shopping.
links_Review_Text: It was true to size except I'm a 36D and was a little big in the chest, so I wore it with straps up to hold it up to fit better. Was perfect for a wedding that was outside in hot weather.
5.9", 155Lb with DDD cup. Worked well is a strapless bra. Felt well covered. Very pretty. Very comfortable.

links_Review_Title: This dress made me feel like a million bucks! I was SO upset that I couldn't keep it forever.
links_Review_Text: This dress fit perfectly! Fitted and flattering at the waist and hips, but so comfortable. The lightweight fabric was perfect for a 100 degree day. I was worried the sleeves would be tight, but they were perfect! RTR please let me know if this is ever up for a sample sale because I NEED IT!

links_Review_Title: Wore this for my 30th birthday in Miami and it was one of my favorites!
links_Review_Text: Perfect fit, am small busted (32a), very comfortable and a good length to wear with heels!

I wore this dress for engagement pictures and I loved it! It was tight in the top, but flowy in the bottom. I wish I could have kept it longer! It was a hot day but the material on the dress was very breathable.

I rented the 8 and 10 based on the recommendation to size up since reformation runs small. I found the 8 fit true to size without feeling tight or uncomfortable. It fit in all the right places with a thin pair of spanx shorts and regular strapless bra. The chest was a little loose (small 34C for reference), but not enough to make me worry about a wardrobe malfunction. I would definitely rent this dress again. It was classy and sexy all at the same time!

Beautiful dress, got so many compliments on it. Absolutely size up, especially if you are fuller than on top...I'm normally a size 6, but wore the 8, and would have been way more comfortable in one size bigger.
Absolutely loved everything about this dress! It fits like a dream and I got compliments all night long.

This dress for great in all the right places, loved it. I'm 5,5" and about 125 pounds and the 4R was perfect. I had to use a little dress tape on the top but was a super easy fix. Great choice for a summer wedding.
I loved this dress. It fit true to size and was super flattering. It fit perfectly in the bust (38DD) and the material was beautiful. I wish I owned this dress!!

Pretty with the straps up or off the shoulder. You'll need to wear a strapless bra. Runs relatively true to size. I wore a size larger than usual and it was a bit loose in the waist and bust. I would rent it again!

This dress reminded me a grown up, sophisticated Lilo dress (from Lilo and Stitch). I loved the shape and it was very flattering! Super comfortable too! You can either wear the sleeves off the shoulder or, like I did, as a cap-sleeve (I had a huge bruise on my left shoulder, so this camouflaged it). I got a ton of compliments!
I usually wear a 2-4 and ordered a 4 based on reviews. It fit perfectly. I received many compliments all night!

links_Review_Title: It was so easy, I wore a dress I would've been too self conscious to purchase.
links_Review_Text: The fit is form fitting, and runs tight in the rib cage area. I needed help with the zipper because I have broader chest area but it went on and fit like a glove. It was easy to dance with too!

Got a ton of compliments. Loved the sleeves and they didn't bother me throughout the night. I'm 5'3" and could wear it with flats (and shorter and would have needed heels for it to not drag on the ground). It runs a bit small and definitely is NOT a forgiving cut in the stomach area if that's what you're looking for!

Loved this fun dress that was perfect for a summer wedding. It definitely runs small in the waist- I'm usually a 2 and I wore the 4 in this dress, could not zip up the 2! However, it's either stretched out or just generally bigger in the chest. I have small boobs and I had to wear the straps on my shoulders instead of off them like the intended style because it kept sliding down otherwise. But it still looked great that way! The rest of the dress was flowy and perfect for dancing. Loved wearing this dress.

Fluttery, comfortable, feminine but with strong colors. I used a regular strapless bra. At first I was worried about slippage if the sleeves were worn lower but that wasn't a problem, it just wasn't my style so i wore them higher on my shoulders. Great dress for a date night with my special man.
This dress was very beautiful. I received some awesome comments about the way I looked in dress. This dress made me feel right at home and sexy. Will rent again soon from RTR.

links_Review_Title: Accentuated my figure in all the right the right places, yet it was still cute and formal !!
links_Review_Text: I received so many compliments at my graduation! The shoulder straps/sleeves were a little tricky only because if I let them down the chest area would slip down a bit, but that was about the only real issue I had with the dress. It was super comfortable and fit perfectly! The fabric does not feel cheap like with retail dresses, so I think overall the price wasn't bad for the quality and comfort :)
Tighter than anticipated but still fit comfortably
definitely size up! Im normally an 8 and wore a 10
Loved this dress and would own it. Size 4 was longer than the 2- almost too long but it worked with tall heels!
Great dress - fit like I thought it would - / would definitely rent again!

This dress was gorgeous and I surprisingly loved the lower neckline. It was so fun and easy to dance in. However, the material has no stretch and because of my wider hips I had to use my backup size. That being said, since I have a smaller bust, the top kept slipping down even with my "miracle" bra. Still worth it and would wear again, just add some fashion tape.
Wore this on vacation but this could be worn at a casual wedding. Will rent again! Sized up to a 6 (usually a 4) due to bust.

This dress fit me perfectly. It was exactly the dress I needed for a spring day in Napa. The off the shoulder style is sexy without being too revealing and it flowed the perfect amount! I wish I could keep this dress!

links_Review_Title: Wore it for our engagement photos and loved it! Would rent again.
links_Review_Text: Pros-I wear between a 10 and 12 and this fit perfectly. Bottom half was breezy and light, not form fitting. The wait is tight but not comfortable. Shows off your waist! Loved the color. Looks great in photos. Cons-I do not have a large chest so the top was slightly big.

links_Review_Title: I sized down and it was beyond perfect
links_Review_Text: Everything was amazing I didn't want it to be loose so I sized down
Loved this light weight dress!! Went to a party in Florida and it was perfect. Does run a little on the shorter side but I didn't feel it was uncomfortably Short.
I loved the color and print! The material was thin and it was a bit too short. I probably should have rented a large. Nevertheless, it made for great pictures! :)

I can run a little big but I generally found the fit comfortable and not big enough that I necessarily would have chosen a different size. I really loved this dress and how special it feels. So unique and gorgeous.

links_Review_Title: Don't be afraid by how weird this is
links_Review_Text: So even though there's a lot going on here, this dress ROCKS. It has smocking and is cotton so its actually SUPER comfortable to wear! Its a little short but nothing some under shorts cant help. Wore this to run around town on a Saturday. Hides sweat and spills! Pairs nicely with sneakers!
This is such a cute and comfortable dress! Very flattering!
I was nervous about this dress bc the reviews said it ran small but I found it to run a tad large. It is very unique and a statement piece. I never wanted to give it back! Will probably but it
Fit a bit looser and longer than expected. Sleeve was restricting if worn as meant to below elbow. Got so many compliments and was perfect for a summer wedding.
I loved this dress so much. The material is pretty thin and it's more of a printed pattern than what I had assumed it was going to look like but I loved it regardless!
Dont be fooled by the pic. This is not a flattering or form fitted dress. Lots of bunching and extra fabric. Size down!

links_Review_Title: I loved this dress for a gala I attended. Very fun and nicely hides any kind of tummy.
links_Review_Text: It was a little tight across my rear, but the ruching in the front is very forgiving. Because of having a more substantial booty, this dress was short, even on my 5'1" frame, but overall I loved it and would definitely rent it/this style again.
Unclear what Rhode was thinking when designing the fit. Size 0 hung on me like it was 4 sizes larger. Obviously returned.

links_Review_Title: Was nervous about the style, but exceeded my expectations!
links_Review_Text: I was a bit nervous about this style and how it would fit, but I loved the print/color so much, that I thought I would give it a whirl and boy, did it exceed my expectations! I didn't expect it to be so flattering, but it really was. The blouson sleeves, the rouche bodice and the length (not too short- I'm 5'5") were all perfect. It's pretty versatile too - I dressed it up with some strappy sandals and jewelry for a wedding welcome party, and then, later threw some white sneakers on with it and it looked just as good. One thing to add is that the fabric is actually quite lightweight - lighter than I would have expected, but not a negative or positive - just thought I would mention.

Dress is a little on the flimsy side- the skirt hangs a little too loose and low, the sleeves don't hold cute shape. I did not end up wearing this to my event. Not as cute as I thought Generally fits TTS

links_Review_Title: Beautiful garment that is easy to throw on + flattering.
links_Review_Text: Flattering and camouflages extra weight around waist

links_Review_Title: didnt wear it was too big
links_Review_Text: didnt wear it was too big

Haven't worn this brand before but I should have tried the xs. I suspect it would also be too large, as the small was very baggy on the top, and I think the dress is supposed to be a bit form fitting.
Bummer - wanted to LOVE this dress and it was huge on me. I am very small but the excess fabric was crazy. Also, it is yellow and blue not white and blue as it looks on the pics.

I was so excited about this but it ran incredibly small and short- I'm a curvy 8/10 and the L barely fit over my hips and, at 5'7", it was indecently short on me. I was also disappointed by the fabric- it was much thinner than I'd expected. Love the design but just didn't work at all for me!
This dress was sooo cute---loved the fit and how it looked!! the sleeves and neckline were great---wore a strapless bra with it! Low key wanted to buy the dress so I could keep it!

links_Review_Title: Will be renting this one again
links_Review_Text: Love the quality and embroidery of this white dress. I also enjoyed how the long sleeves balanced out the mini length. Wore worn long gold earrings and multi necklaces which added a classy bohemian feel.

I rented this for my bridal shower! It was perfect the sleeves weren't too puffy at all, I'd switched from wearing it up right and off the shoulder. Both looked great, I will say it was a little on the shorter side. But other than that it was super fun and different!
Great dress for a bridal shower. Cute and fun. Fit great.

links_Review_Title: A winter twist on a white lace dress
links_Review_Text: Such a cute dress! Short and sexy, I styled it with black for a winter party, lots of compliments on this look.
Very classy, feels expensive

links_Review_Title: Lots of compliments on this dress and very comfortable
links_Review_Text: I rented this for my bridal shower. I loved it. I did get the large and kinda wish I would've ordered the medium as back up it was a bit big in my mid section. Making me appear a bit bigger than I am. However beautiful dress wasn't sure what to do with the sleeves. On or off the shoulder... but never the less it worked perfectly.

I wore this to a brunch the morning before my wedding. It fit pretty large on me (because I always choose to size up) but it was cute, comfortable, and worked well once I added a heavily padded strapless bra.
I loved this dress! I wore it on my bachelorette party in NYC. Great fit. The sleeves kinda slipped but no biggie
I rented this dress and a back up dress. I ended up wearing the back up - but loved this dress as well!

links_Review_Title: it was outside and very hot, but looked fresh
links_Review_Text: tons of compliments, looked great, lining helped with sweat :(
Fits well... cute and flattering

links_Review_Title: Perfect dress for my bridal shower!
links_Review_Text: Rented this for my bridal shower and LOVED it! It was extremely comfortable and not too short, which is usually the issue for me. I highly recommend it!
The square neckline is this dress is on point! I got so many compliments! I usually wear a M/L but sized up to an XL so that there was no riding up.
sooooo sad i had to return this dress. So cute, easy to dress up or down, endless compliments and not too tight. RENT IT!

I love this dress!! I think it does run about a half size to 1 size small. I wore the XL and am typically a medium or large. I ordered both the L and the XL, the large fit great, but it was just a little short for my wedding rehearsal so I wore the XL which just was a bit big but I made it work. I received tons of compliments on it all night long! I think if you are shorter (I am 5'9" with longer legs) this dress works best!

LOVED this dress could not recommend enough. The sleeves were puffy but comfortable and the lace was not too girly. Had a 60s vibe too it, I got so many compliments. A TAD short on a tall girl but fine for a weekend.

links_Review_Title: Great dress for my bridal shower!
links_Review_Text: Very cute sundress worn to my bridal shower. TTS!

links_Review_Title: The dress was super cute and good for a vacation.
links_Review_Text: It was perfect for a Mexican vacation, but the bust was big. And hard to wear a bra.
I love this dress! Sooo many compliments! I wore it to work and on vacation. It fits so well and I have huge hips on a small waist.
Love this sweet dress. The sleeves make a statement without being too over the top. Love the square neck and where the dress hits on the thigh. Super flattering and light weight for warm weather.
Im a fit M and this dress is little too tight but it is my problem:) Beautiful dress

Loved wearing this dress for my bachelorette! I'm petite and curvy. The length was just right and it hugged in all the right places. It was a bit tight through the bust so I recommend sizing up one size.
Obsessed. Buying.

links_Review_Title: This dress was perfect for my graduation!
links_Review_Text: The dress was a little big in the chest area, otherwise it was perfect!

LOVED this dress. It fits true to size. It might be a little right for someone with a bigger chest. The dress is perfect for everyday wear, a bride, a vacation, etc. The dress is very simple but chic. I can't wait to rent this dress again!!
This fit very well over but does run small. I am usually a 12 and had to get an XXL it did fit well on me though. My one issue was that the sleeves were a little big and kept falling off my shoulder.

links_Review_Title: Like the way the dress looked on me.
links_Review_Text: CON: the should kept falling down.

I am so in love with this dress. It is one of the best dresses I have ever worn. It is simultaneously revealing/sexy, but also classy and conservative. The textured fabric is very flattering and forgiving in the tummy area. Also the neckline is low without being revealing. The sleeves were the tiniest bit short on me, but I have long arms. I felt like a million bucks in this dress.
This is such an adorable white sundress. Sleeves make it fun and different. Definitely rent!

this dress is very pretty in person with lots of fine detailing. it wore it to a graduation and it perfectly fit the occasion. made it a bit more boho with my clogs, but could go preppier with wedges.
Great little white dress. I used it for my engagement party. I’m usually a size small but this ran big. Would’ve preferred the Xs but since it wasn’t available. However I loved this dress.
Was a tad small in the chest but loved the lace details and balloon sleeves. very sweet for a day in Napa
Will be renting again!

Ordered this last minute for engagement photos after my original dress was too sheer and it was perfect! I ordered both the small and medium and went with with small for a more fitted look. It was great weight and material-wish I owned!

links_Review_Title: Cute dress for a spring day!
links_Review_Text: I wore this dress to the White House garden tour. It was very humid (hence my hair), and this dress stayed nice and cool. It is not see through (just wear nude undergarments. Definitely a strapless bra). I probably could have worn a L, but it wasn't available. I was worried about the length but at 5'9" this was just fine, and I think the length would work on women of all heights. I love that the fabric didn't wrinkle too much but it had a linen-y look. Super cute! Would rent again.

links_Review_Title: I got engaged in this dress...
links_Review_Text: Pretty sure this is good luck! I wore this for vacation and my boyfriend proposed! It is so so so cute! I do think it is most flattering if you have a small small waist and hips - it made me look wider than I am. BUT the sleeves are amazing and it's a great vacation dress.

The fit is perfect. Fitted enough to show off your waist but loose enough to feel comfortable. A large amount of décolleté (that somehow manages to look elegant) and a relatively modest hemline, without looking frumpy. The sleeves and detail help make it look super modern. I live in Florida, so I rented it to just wear in my daily life. Came across some festival tickets, so I paired it with fun sunnies and dad sneaks -- it was a lewk that fit the occasion without looking granola. What makes this dress special is (in this climate, anyways) you could literally wear this dress anywhere just by changing your accessories. I would feel as confident wearing it to work or dinner as I did to the show. Also, if you live or are traveling in the tropics this dress is perfect. I was cool enough when it was in the mid 80s and sunny, and the sleeves prevented me from getting chilly when the sun set and it got windier. My only regret is that I didn't just buy it!
I'm usually a 16/18 in RTR and the 3x was too tight (especially in the chest) to wear.

links_Review_Title: Very cute but runs a bit large!

links_Review_Text: Loved this dress. It was a little boxier than I like so I belted it and that made it perfect.
Damn were the reviews right. I came in to work not realizing the slip bunched all around my waist! It is a super cute dress though and very light. Flattering fit
I loved this dress. I wore it to work. I loved the subtle details in the dress. I'd definitely wear again.
Size down, I normally wear a 10, looked great but an 8 or a 10P would have been better
The slip part of this was a little snug on me, so I was worried about it riding up at work. I'm between an 8 and 10 right now, and the 10 would have worked better on this.
I liked this dress - it's actually two parts, and both were a little roomy on me. The hidden placket & sheer bib detail are special!
I ended up wearing this to work, a job interview, and my sons back to school night. So classy and such a great fit! Very comfortable and at 5'3 the length was perfect. Received tons of compliments

So many compliments on this cute dress! Wore it to work, looks black, but the dress i s navy. Wore it with some gray tights, adorable. Appropriate to wear to other events too. I liked that it wasn't too short also.
Runs large

The style is really cute. The main outer dress is easy and comfortable, however the slip is a bit snug if you are curvy and have hips. I wish the slip was a touch bigger in the hips, it doesn't match the A-line line of the body of the dress so the slip rides up throughout the day. All and all it fits like a 10 but you may be tugging at the slip if you have hips.
I usually wear a size 6 but went down a size after reading reviews. Fit wonderfully.
The dress is super fun and light with beautiful construction to it. The top is designed for someone with a full C cup bust. A little long but great with a wedge heel.
Loved this dress! So comfortable, can be dressed up with heels or down with sandals. No need for a bra. Zipped easily over a 3mo-4mo baby bump. Did not want to return.

The dress has a thicker poplin/cotton like fabric in person that gave it a more casual vibe. Also- pockets!!! The cutouts and neckline are great while still holding everything in place. Really loved and would easily rent again. Wore to a rehearsal dinner at a winery.

Lightweight material made this a great dress for hot beach days. Just remember to iron it before wearing. Pretty true to size but the top pieces were a little small. I'm typically a 6 top and 8 bottom and this dress was a 6. I didn't wear a bra but might have been able to squeeze in a nubra underneath.

links_Review_Title: Super cute, lightweight and comfortable fabric!
links_Review_Text: I wore this to an outdoor wedding at a farm. As was stated in previous reviews, it does wrinkle easily so I had to iron it when I got it. The color is so pretty. The fabric is light and comfortable. I received many compliments on it and I would definitely rent this dress again!
This dress is stunning!!

Wore this dress on a summer day to meet up with friends and I received non-stop compliments; this is a special dress that can be dressed up for special occasions or just worn when you want to feel special. I am short so it was long on me and I had to wear heels so it wouldn't touch the floor when I walked. It does run a bit on the larger side. Overall such a great dress!

Beautiful dress. Lined. Did have to steam it on arrival. I'm 5'7 35-25-37 and the 2 fit great. Slightly bigger on the bottom but that was fine given the style. Don't need a bra which is a plus. Really love this and am looking for any excuse to wear this. Great vacation dress.
I can't explain how much I LOVED absolutely everything about this dress. I would buy but it's too expensive. I will keep and wear all summer long.

I really liked this dress, color and length were great. It wrinkles very easily and I had to iron is before wearing. This dress does have a liner so it could be warmer than anticipated. All in all it's cute and easy.

links_Review_Title: I rented it for a photo shoot for my blog. You can see more styled outfits on my IG - @kat.proano
links_Review_Text: I rented it for a photo shoot for my blog. You can see more styled outfits on my IG - @kat.proano

links_Review_Title: I really loved this dress but it arrived damaged.
links_Review_Text: Super cool for a beach wedding. I will rent and try to get one that's not damaged.

links_Review_Title: This dress is beautiful on. Perfect for vacation. I wanted to buy it.
links_Review_Text: I was afraid the size would be too small and it was a little tight in the waist, but I think a bigger size would have been too big and would look a bit baggy.

links_Review_Title: Weird and small fit at the bust
great fit and lots of compliments
links_Review_Text: the pockets make the dress event more amazing

I need a larger size, but will re-rent in my true size (4) in the future. Was hoping I could squeeze into the 2 as that was all that was available for my event, but alas, it was too snug. Renters will definitely need to dry clean press or steam prior to wearing as it is cotton and arrives very wrinkly. Cute enough to be worth the extra work, though!
Size 4 was snug around back and size 6 was a more perfect fit. My only issues was the opening in front was too revealing when sitting down. Didn't want to be paranoid all night.

This dress runs large. If you are pair shape you may not like this dress. It made me bottom heavy. It could perhaps be the size. I recommend sizing down. I am normally a 4 and this dress was huge all around in me. I did receive several complements on how pretty it was. I also like my clothing to minimum wrinkles. I ironed before wearing as the dress arrived wrinkled.
I didn't get a chance to wear because I could not get the bust closed. It fit everywhere else except that area. If you're a C cups or above, I recommend sizing up.

Everyone talks about how large the busy is on this dress. I am a standard 36 C and the size 6 would not zip up, the size 8 would have fit which is my true size. Waist is true to size and hips are super roomy!
A little funky fitting up top if you don't have much of a chest.

links_Review_Title: really nice dress but could not xip the top part almost!! if big chest size up!!
links_Review_Text: Did not wear beautiful though very cute!!

I originally got this dress as a potential back up but I couldn't wear it because it was too large. It's a size bigger than I usually wear, so it could be that but I also felt that the top was just bigger than it needed to be.. maybe in the right size it would've fit?

links_Review_Title: I did not wear because it did'nt fit
links_Review_Text: Beautiful but the top of the dress runs large and is best for busty women. It was too big for me and the waist in the back comes up very high. I was unable to wear it.

Elastic waistband PLUS a zipper. Groundbreaking! Why don't other designers do this?? The fabric is a bit thin as others noted but since the skirt isn't tight it didn't make a difference. I wore shorts under because if I don't my legs will catch fire from rubbing so it was fine. Has a subtle pleat and wrinkles *sort of* easy. I did steam it upon arrival to get the big creases out but it just wrinkled again when I sat down. Didn't bother me. I'm typically a 6 but sized up just in case, was perfect

links_Review_Title: Retro and feminine - and super wearable!
links_Review_Text: This skirt was great - I rented it around the holidays and wore it to a few Christmas parties since it's green, though easily could have dressed it down and worn it to work with a white tee and sneakers. I wouldn't say that it runs small, but it's not super stretchy in the waist, so I'd size up if your an apple and stick with your normal size if you're a pear/banana/hourglass.

The cut is flattering and the color is vibrant- but the fabric on the mint side is almost see through. I wore a slip so that I could tuck in the stripe shirt. I guess I he trade off is- the light fabric let's the skirt have great movement.

Loved this skirt even though it ran small. The zipper is meant to be on the side so the two tone seam is in the middle but you can move it as you like! Ran small and the elastic cut into my belly a bit but a looser shirt helped cover that.
Loved this skirt! Super lightweight and fun to walk around in and fit perfectly at the waist. Would rent again!
Flowy dress. Love the dual tone and elastic waist band. Wore it to work and to the race track with family.

Such a flowy, pretty piece to wear. Perfect to be photographed in because of the movement from all the pleats. The colors are vibrant. The skirt is not lined at all, though, so a slip is necessary for it to lay right. The waist is also very tight. This fit more like a 4/6 than 8.

I wore this to work because I LOVED the color and I dressed it down with a grubby t shirt but I think it gave it that subtle runway look!! This skirt was a little long for my liking but the hips fit really well!! No bunching or riding !! I loved this skirt I would totally rent this again!

Overall, the skirt was cute. It has both an elastic bands and zipper closure, which feels a bit like overkill and made the fit tighter than I should have been. Still, I got lots of compliments, and it was a festive choice for a Christmas party.
Nice skirt. Unique design. Ran small so didn't end up wearing it as I had something more comfortable.

Gorgeous and comfortable skirt. Where to work and then to a wedding pre-event party and got tons of compliments. It hugs your stomach a little bit, but I wore a jacket over a t shirt and it looked great.
I'm 5'4" and 3/4th inch. Came to mid or low calf but above my ankle Did have to wear a slip It is not lined and might be a little transparent
fit perfect

links_Review_Title: Can't wait to wear this weekend for my open house!
links_Review_Text: It has an elastic waistband that works great! Love the light flowy material
The greens of this skirt are so pretty. It flows beautifully. It's a great length--I'm 5'6'' and it hit me mid-calf. LOVE this skirt and got tons of compliments!
Love this skirt. Versatile. Runs a tiny bit small and is a little sheer.
Super cheap feeling material and the description notes that it is line. it's not and you can see whatever you have underneath it very clearly.
Writing this review as I'm wearing this skirt. I absolutely love it. It's lightweight and the perfect flow. One of my favorites to date!
Wore this for a night out with friends. I'm short so the legs were a little long but with my heels you couldn't tell.
Loved this jumper. It was so classy and comfy. Easy to pee, get on and off and also very flattering! Highly recommend
Love love love this outfit. I paired the black jumpsuit with a sequin blazer for a corporate holiday party. The jumpsuit was stretchy and had pockets!
Loved it! Lots of compliments on it. I'm just short so it ran a little long. I had to safety pin it shorter and wear heels to make it drag less in the floor.
For someone 5'1" the legs are way too long.

links_Review_Title: It was beautiful and easy to move in.
links_Review_Text: Fit, very flattering.

I really wanted to love this jumpsuit by sadly it was just too baggy & the cut didn't work for me. I get it's supposed to be a little oversized but it was very unflattering in the hips on me. Tried to style it different ways but couldn't get it to work so returned without wearing it.

I wore this out to dinner for my birthday. It was perfect for a night of celebrating! The bust and straps were a little tight, but not enough to be uncomfortable - the small was unavailable so I only rented an XS with no backup. I recommend sizing up if you're between sizes.
Fit perfectly! So comfortable and easy to wear for a fun evening out. Got lots of compliments!

This was really cute but ran way big. Based on reviews of it running small I got a medium instead of a small and it was huge. It felt more like pajamas than something I'd feel comfortable wearing to work. I might have been able to wear it to work, but I felt too dumpy in it. I would re rent it in a small another day though.

links_Review_Title: This jumpsuit was perfect for my work event! I looked professional but was still so comfy!
links_Review_Text: Normally I'm a size 4/SR but I ended up wearing the XS in this case because I liked the tapered fit more. The SR seemed like it had a lot of extra fabric in the stomach area and wasn't really as much on an ankle cut compared to the XS. The only con with the XS was that the button on the wrap front top keep unbuttoning but besides that it was great! Would definitely rent it again!
This jumpsuit fit & felt great! Would order again!

links_Review_Title: Nice quality, but fit was too weird for me
links_Review_Text: I pulled out this jumpsuit and wish it could have worked for me, but I think my body type just does not work with jumpsuits! I can't give it a bad rating because of that, so I settled for a 4! Some things I noticed were that the spaghetti straps were very hard to adjust and kept getting caught in the slider. Also, the ankles were more of a straight leg fit rather than a skinny fit. I really liked how soft the fabric was.

links_Review_Title: Way to big in the waist and mid section
links_Review_Text: Looked like a diaper butt. It was also very large on me .

Easy choice for a party or special night out. I am 122lbs, 5'3 and the XSR fit perfectly. The length of the legs was just right, I wouldn't want it to be longer but it could have been shorter -- so I'd say rent if you are 5'3 or taller. I also have a large chest and the inside button provided perfect amount of coverage so that it wasn't too revealing at my work party.

This was super cute and comfortable. The pockets are a great addition. I ended up not wearing this to the event I was going to because it was a little more casual then I expected. Great jumpsuit overall - would definitely rent again!
Loved the fit, super comfortable and easy to dress up or down.

It was a little big, I probably could have done a medium but one wasn't available. I am short and the rise was just a little long, but I rolled the ankles and wore it with a velvet jacket. The fabric was great.
This jumpsuit is great but the pants were too long and baggy for me.
This is the best jumper ever. I wore it on a 6hr flight and then dressed it up for a formal event. Wore it on the beach, took a nap in it. It's really so comfortable and flattering. LOVED IT!

Loved the fit and cut. 5 months pregnant and it fit perfectly...so, not quite sure I could wear this if I wasn't pregnant! Material is OK. Doesn't feel luxe or anything but isn't flimsy or see-through. Doesn't wrinkle - big plus!
Rented this for a date and it is very baggy in the crotch. Definitely not made for petite women.
Adjustable spaghetti straps make this jumper easy to wear! Loved having pockets. Fabric was light but in great condition.

links_Review_Title: "Love" is an understatement on my feelings for this beautiful dress!!!'
links_Review_Text: Rented with Unlimited for vacation and only wore it once, I can not wait to rent again during the summer!!! It is SO beautiful, fun to wear and overall dreamy!!! The fabric is light and airy, I loved the cap sleeve details, the pretty neckline and silver threading is subtle and shimmery!! This dress made me want to twirl!!!! LOVE!!!

Got so many compliments - wore this dress just to work and after work drinks. Felt so confident and flowy all day. Ended up wearing a cami underneath because it's a little low cut for work. Tripped on it a little. Want to buy this dress it's so angelic!
Love the neckline detail. Fabric has silvery threads running through which I didn't notice from the pics. Beware it runs quite long. I'm 5'6" and XS was probably 2 inches too long for me.
This dress makes an impact. It's a loose dress and I wish it were more structured in the waist. Other than that, it's beautiful in every way.

Beautiful pattern, material, and cut...very long and no shape as other reviewers have noted. I thought it looks amazing with a belt (I just tucked up the extra fabric, and I'm 5'4'') and was so comfortable. Perfect for spring weather.

Medium was too long to wear with flats 5ft 7. I wanted this for a beach vacation so I didn't want to deal with heels. Roomy so could probably size down one. Gave me nightgown vibes. Shapeless. See-thru from top of thighs down. The fabric/print was pretty with gold thread.

I lovvvvve this dress. So flowy and light and gorgeous on. It's definitely very roomy throughout but fit me perfectly through the shoulders so I would say it's true to size. It's very long -- I'm 5'8" and I had to pick it up as not to step on it. So plan to wear some heels if you're not y'all! It's a gorgeous dress that can be formal or more casual depending on how you style it. Loved.
It runs extremely long.
I'm 5'8" and this was way too long
I'm 5.5 and this dress was 4 inches too long.
Fits true to size. Fabric is stunning. It is a little long. I'm 5'8 and wore flat sandals and it slightly skimmed the ground.

I wanted to wear this to a friends party, loved the dress & got the XS because other reviews said it was big & it was still really flowy. Maxi dresses are usually a perfect length on me without altering but this was way too long, even with heels. The dress liner is shorter than the full length so it's pretty sheer & see through from thigh down. It's a beautiful dress & I wanted to love it but couldn't deal with the length!

links_Review_Title: Love love love! I received so many compliments on this dress - renting again!
links_Review_Text: So light & airy, it made a very hot summer day bearable

links_Review_Title: Runs very large! But if you size down it's a beautiful dress
links_Review_Text: This dress runs pretty large-- which is what some other customers have said. This size I could have fit two of me in and still have room. The fabric of it though is light and airy and has a little tick of lurex in it with the flower it gives it a little extra shine! It's very beautiful and would be great-- just in a size or even two down

links_Review_Title: This dress is really beautiful, but it runs large. I had to belt.
links_Review_Text: It was a beautiful print. It was a sheer fabric but the ruffles and layers along with the print help mask this. I definitely had to belt in order to wear. I would rent again but would rent a smaller size.
Nice light and flowy.... got many compliments

This dress is beautiful but definitely prairie/nightgown-ish. I am curvy but this dress definitely made me look straight as a board. I rented it for fun with unlimited and it's too fancy for everyday. Very ruffly and I felt like i was tangled all day. I wore the top unbuttoned for a casual look but this very nice dress was a miss for me. Too formal for everyday, and the fit isn't something i would wear for a more formal occasion. I loved walking in it though- felt so glam!
Not a good fit for me with the ruffles and oversize fit. Just "big" all over. Super pretty print pattern though. Maybe I should have tried a smaller size.

links_Review_Title: The dress was for my in-laws wedding anniversay.
links_Review_Text: The dress was gorgeous except for it was way too long. I'm 5'5". The bottom of the dress was just way into the floor that I had to carry it the whole time.
Such a gorgeous dress in person but unfortunately it was way too long to wear. I'm 5'6 and this dress drug the ground significantly with even my highest heels on.

Definitely runs large, but the style is also meant to be loose and flowy. I'm 5'6" and it is still just a tad long. But, I love this dress! There is a thin gold metallic thread running through the fabric which dresses it up. Dressy and very comfy.

This dress is extremely beautiful! There are silver threads woven into the print. The shoulders have ruffles but aren't too fluffy. The neck can be tied or left open for two different looks. Very flowy and ways to wear.

This dress runs large and long. I'm 5'11" and it's a perfect length overall if you're tall; however, the lining doesn't match the length as it barely covered my bottom standing up and was totally sheer beyond that. I could not have bent over even slightly without everything being seen since the bottom half isnt lined and sheer. It isn't as obvious in the photos on RTR but was VERY noticeable in the sunlight!! As a result, I didn't wear.
I ordered a size smaller than I normally wear based on reviews... it was enormous. I wore it but didn't feel pretty

I got compliments on this dress everywhere I went, even from complete strangers. And it's so comfortable, it practically feels like a nightgown. It's going to be hard sending it back. It runs a bit large, and quite long, but it's stunning and so fun
Very light and flowy. Lots of compliments!

links_Review_Title: Comfort and style wrapped into a shimmering muumuu!
links_Review_Text: I never met a muumuu maxi I didn't like but I rarely meet one my husband does like! This dress was that exception. I could have used a medium as the sizing is generous. Will rent again!
It's a pretty sack, but a shapeless sack nonetheless. Definitely needs a belt, and definitely need to size down. I'd Skip this rental and will actually be sending it back without wearing.

links_Review_Title: This dress was so cute! I wore it 33 weeks pregnant.
links_Review_Text: Super long. I am 5'4 and kept tripping on the bottom. I should have just ordered my regular size even though I am very pregnant.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress, but unfortunately too long!
links_Review_Text: I wanted to wear this with heels, but even with 4" heels, this was dragging along the ground. Beautiful material and fit well otherwise but ended up not wearing.

I love the beautiful print on this dress, but it runs very large. There is a lot of material, and its loose fit is pretty generous. The ruffle details at the neck and sleeves were lovely, but it is pretty low cut and open at the buttons, as the picture shows, so larger chested women may have trouble wearing this.
This dress is absolutely stunning. The pattern has a little sparkle in it, in the least tacky way possible, and flows so nicely. However it runs very large! Definitely size down
It was beyond huge. Not just flowy...

I rented this for a wedding I was attending and it worked great! It fit like a glove and I was able to dance in it all night. Because I'm on the taller side, 5'8", I had to be mindful of the slit when sitting and dancing but other than that it was great! Would definitely rent again!

links_Review_Title: Wore this to the ballet and loved it! Very flattering.
links_Review_Text: The straps are a little tight on the arms and not adjustable, but otherwise the dress fit perfectly. Size 8, 5'6, 165 lbs
Wish the straps were shorter I had to sew them to wear it out but other than that very comfortable.
For like a glove. A nice update to classic LBD. Was a little cleavage forward, but still appropriate for a wedding. Would rent again.
I felt very girly and comfortable in this dress. It's sexy and elegant. The flower pattern was so pretty. Not my most flattering fit ever but still looked and felt nice.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful but next time I'll go dressier
links_Review_Text: Really beautiful dress. It fits very well. Please note, that the way the dress is split in the front when you sit it does run very high and I used my purse most of the night to keep everything covered up. I would rent it again but just for a nice dinner where as the event I was going to was a very formal occasion. Next time I would get something with a little more bling and take it up a notch. :)

links_Review_Title: Loved this dress! Perfect for a formal occasion
links_Review_Text: Great fit, loved this dress! Runs true to size and a perfect length for someone tall (I'm 6'0.) Super comfortable too! Would definitely recommend and would definitely rent again!
I loved this dress I want to buy but a little pricey so flattering and sexy!

links_Review_Title: It was too large- didn't wear.
links_Review_Text: Too large in hips.
This dress is super comfortable and very flattering. It's the perfect mix to sexy and classy. Still considering purchasing it.

links_Review_Title: Massive slit up the crotch reduces this dress to slutty!
links_Review_Text: Great fit! If not for the slit, this would have been great for my event.
Gorgeous dress, great quality. A little big in the bust for me.

Wore this dress to a fall wedding and it was great. The shape is good if you are an hourglass or pear because it does flatter the waist, but would look good on others. The bust runs a little small. The slit in the front opens to the middle which was a little awkward for sitting and keeping it from opening all the way so be prepared for that. Overall great dress!
comfortable/not tight, the way the fabric falls is very flattering, the slit goes high

links_Review_Title: Very revealing slit made this one a miss!
links_Review_Text: This dress has a lot of potential. The fit is true to size and its comfortable. However, the slit in the front is super revealing when you walk because the fabric is not sewn down, the entire front of the dress is a more like a wrap/flap if that makes sense. While standing the slit is perfect and very chic. But when you walk, your entire leg is visible. I was too worried about this to wear the dress to a cocktail party and returned it.

links_Review_Title: This dress is fabulous! Perfect for a wedding!
links_Review_Text: It flattered my figure SO well and made my wait look so small! I will say that I had trouble with the straps being a tad too long, but I usually have that problem with all of my dresses, so I do not fault the dress itself.

links_Review_Title: Cute dress but nothing to write home about
links_Review_Text: I wore this dress for a wedding. It was cute but since the material was really think, the rouching made kind of stuck out a bit around the stomach.

Absolutely stunning dress, got quite a few compliments. I usually wear between an 10 and a 12, and ordered a 12 because it was all they had. It fit like a glove. I have a large bust, a large rib cage, average hips, and most of my weight is centered in that pesky tire around my waist. This dress fit snugly but hid any problem areas due to the beautiful ruching. I would say this dress is accurate to size if your measurements are fairly proportionate to each other (ie. I am fairly evenly distributed), as it is a sheath dress with very little stretch or forgiveness. I wore a normal bra with it, though wide straps would certainly show with the thin straps of the dress. I am of average height, and so the dress hit right around my shins. I usually tend to avoid dresses like this because I don't want to appear shorter than I am, but the slit in the dress that runs up to about the knee/lower thigh, made up for this. Overall, I will absolutely be renting this dress again.
Beautiful, sexy fit, cut for an hourglass figure and the runch detail hides any tummy! So flattering! I can't wait to wear it!
Well made. Great fit and details. Just beautiful. Wore it to a party and to work.

links_Review_Title: Sezy and flattering. A bit big at the waist.
links_Review_Text: Order your normal size
Loved this dress! Overall just a classy dress.

links_Review_Title: A sophisticated dress that makes you want to dance.
links_Review_Text: Typically, I wear a size 6..so I was a little surprised when that didn't fit. But, I ended up wearing my back-up size 8. It fit beautifully--all except for the length, as the hem reached down to my ankles and the little ruffle would have been dragging on the floor if I hadn't been wearing heels. Otherwise, it was perfectly elegant and made me want to dance all night.

links_Review_Title: Incredible dress! Super classy and comfortable.
links_Review_Text: This dress is amazing and I received many compliments! I am 5'4 and typically a size 25 in jeans and wear a 32DD bra. This dress allows for some room in the bust, but still looks slimming! The length is also great because you can move around and dance without it getting in the way.
I really loved this for a black tie. Loved that it was a bit different/a bit less "gown" - though the top did lay a little funny on me.

I got this for a NYE party that had a formal attire dress code. The dress fit perfectly and was incredibly flattering. I loved how unique the neckline and top part of the dress were - it made a simple black dress a little more interesting and edgy. I took a risk because there were no reviews at the time and am so happy I did!
One of my absolute favorite rentals! So classy. The cut on the hem is a little long so I wouldn't recommend if you're under 5'4".
Flattering fit, ran a little large, elegant black dress

links_Review_Title: Really cute but runs a little big

links_Review_Text: Well made and interesting for just being a black dress. Loved it!

links_Review_Title: Elegant, chic and comfortable! Many compliments!
links_Review_Text: Fitted through hips, tea length. Difficult to zip past thick fabric seam but persistence paid off.
This dress was so amazing, the draping and fit are so flattering and really make this a stunning classic dress. Comfortable and am easy to move in I want to buy!

links_Review_Title: I wore this to an engagement party! I was able to dress it up just enough and it was perfect.
links_Review_Text: I love this dress. Only tricky thing is the zipper gets stuck around the cinched waist, so you might need some help getting it zipped up. Otherwise, very flattering and was true to size. I will rent this again for sure.
Fell in love with this dress! I felt so fabulous in it. Great fit and so flattering!

links_Review_Title: Comfy. Doesn't even require a bra if you have small boobs.
links_Review_Text: Flattering

This dress could be very pretty, but it didn't seem to be cut on the bias correctly. Was such a shame--I wanted it to work out so badly. Also, the material is an interesting jersey--I fear it could be too sheer if being photographed in it.
The dress fit perfectly.. very chic.. the draping is elegant & the material is substantial.. i love it !! The right dress for a formal rehearsal dinner!

links_Review_Title: Such a gorgeous dress! Very comfortable and flattering. I’d rent it again if I have the opportunity.
links_Review_Text: Comfortable, flattering
Wonderfully elegant! Fit true to size and very flattering on 5'9" figure
Great black dress! Wore it for a black tie wedding, but it could be dressed up or down. Very flattering.
I loved the print on this skirt. It's very busy so I paired it with a plain white crop top. Definitely size up a size or two. Lots of compliments.
I was not able to wear this as there was a tag on it says unable to return if worn

links_Review_Title: Super Cute ! But Beware of the Booty!
links_Review_Text: Love the design, fabric and overall fit! I would just beware if you have a booty because the length of the overall skirt is mostly in the waist since it's high waist not leaving much fabric in the back. Enjoy!
This fit and looked great for a baby shower. Ok trend but not over the top.
Cute dress, sleeves add a nice touch. I do recommend sizing up. I usually wear a 6 or an 8, in this dress a 10 was perfect.
This dress had the best sleeves and the color was gorgeous. Definitely size up though- it's tight on the bottom and short! I wore tights with it.

links_Review_Title: Might Work For Fit, Tiny Women
links_Review_Text: I really wanted to make this work, but I'm not the right shape for this dress. I'm normally an 8, rented a 12 based on other reviews. If I had spanx to handle my belly AND fashion tape to keep the dress from riding up, I might have worn it but I would have been self conscious the whole time. To be fair, I never wear body con dresses or poofy sleeves so this was an attempt to push out of my comfort zone. I think this dress is probably most flattering on taller, slender women
Dress was perfect for the night. A little snug but had enough give for me to wear it comfortably all night. Received many compliments. Great quality and overall fit.
Did not wear. Print was beautiful but those sleeves were too much (maybe the volume would look better on a taller person). It ran two sizes small.

The pattern is really pretty up close. Impossible to wrinkle, which was nice. The sleeves are big and I never knew what to do with the tassel things at the cuff, but in general this is a stunning dress and I got a lot of compliments. I'm usually a 2 and wore a 4.

This dress was really beautiful good material has some give to it. Very fitted. The arms are poofier than the picture shows for this reason I couldn't bring myself to wear it because it took away from the dress.
I usually wear a size 8, 5'5 145lbs and I could barely zip this dress up. Once zipped it was way too tight. Consider this when picking your size!
Loved this dress. It fits exceptionally well and is both elegant and stylish. Wore it for a company holiday party and it was perfect!
Way too snug. If you have any curves- don't bother with this dress! Beautiful material. Unfortunate that it didn't fit.

links_Review_Title: Runs very small! And has no give.
links_Review_Text: First rented a 6. Did not fit. Upgraded to a 10, fit almost like the 6. Very tight, not stretchy, could not move. Definitely runs small. Unless you look like that model, it may not fit you either. My normal dress size is 6-8.
Definitely runs small. I'm usually between size 6-8 and I wore the 8. It was snug. If you're between sizes, order the larger size and the next size up for backup. Really cute dress though.

links_Review_Title: Cute but tight. Great fabric though! Did not wear.

links_Review_Text: super form fitting and I am usually a 6-8, and a 10 was... like super duper tight!
So tight! I wear a 2 or XS in almost all clothes, so many I just need to adjust my size for RTR orders, such a bummer because I loved the color and style.

links_Review_Title: This dress popped with the blue color at a derby event I attended.
links_Review_Text: The length was great, a bit smaller and had to wear a larger size. But I was comfortable in it while I ran around volunteering for a gala.
Too short and tight for work networking
Loved the color but runs very small! Even ordered a size up and still way off.
Couldn't wear it - very tight and short skirt. The fabric felt luxurious and may try to rent a bigger size.

links_Review_Title: This dress is sexy and classy!
links_Review_Text: This dress is simply fantastic! Very forgiving and flattering. The colors (and shine) are more vibrant than the pictures show!

links_Review_Title: Super tight in chest area... didn't wear.
links_Review_Text: Cute dress, but not for my body type as I found the sleeves to be unflatteringly large, the chest area really tight, the overall length too short, and fabric very stiff to feel functional.

links_Review_Title: Runs small in the hip and rear
links_Review_Text: I liked the pretty fabric but ultimately couldn't wear it because it was too small in the hip/rear/thigh region.
Such a gorgeous dress and fabric. This piece is stunning. But I could not wear it! It was wayyyy too tight. Size up ladies.
Not my style at all but I thought I would try it. I thought it fit well. Snug and length was fine. Just too girly for me. Wore it to lunch w the fam

The XS was perfect. I'm usually a size small but sized down and it fit great. You can go straps or no straps. The ruching and small floral print so cute. This is a flattering top and hides your belly area. Would rent again.
Cute to dress down for work or up on the weekends and is very flattering
This was perfect for what it is: a cute little tank top! was perfect for a beautiful Sunday in the city. More items I rented on @thanksitsrtr

I wore this on a date walking around the city and it was perfect!! It was super hot that day but this shirt kept me cool and flirty! I'm so glad I rented it this shirt was soo fun and very in style !! I loved !
I am obsessed with this shirt! So cute and great for summer! I love that I can wear it to work and going out!
Perfect for day or nighttime wear. Obsessed with this one!

this shirt was fine - nothing special. the peplum is NOT see through like shown in the photos, but that wasn't a problem for me. the top ruffle was a little annoying under my arms. it was cute for a dinner out but i don't know if i'd rent again.

Was supposed to wear on my Mexico vacation that got canceled because of coronavirus, but I did wear it to WFH with a cardigan over it. Very comfortable and stretchy. The straps are adjustable, which is a nice add.

links_Review_Title: Fun too that can be worn casually or a bit more dressed up. Chiffon material
links_Review_Text: Chiffon material shirt. Fun for the weekend!
Cute, nothing special.
wore it during they day, then threw on a leather jacket over it at night. so cute - can dress up or down!
Super comfortable and forgiving, I wish the straps were a little farther apart as they come in a little weird. Looks cute with a T-shirt under too

links_Review_Title: Wore this to Denver for a quick weekend trip!
links_Review_Text: Super cute! I tucked the straps in to make it a tube top. The material holds itself up so no issues with staying up. So cute with jeans/small heels!
Fun outfit, strap broke but it looked cute strapless. There is lining over stomach so it isn't seethru like the photo shows. Really loved
Size up and you'll be good. The dress was comfortable and perfect length (I'm 5'3"). Would def rent again

links_Review_Title: Sexy, cute but SHORT if you are tall!
links_Review_Text: Rented this for a fun date night. I did size up based on reviews and got a large because of length. I am 4 on top and 6 on bottom. I think I could have easily done a medium but it wasn't available and RTR recommended a large. It was definitely too large in the bust and I was pulling at it all night but there is NO way I could have done shorter so don't think a M would work. The seam came to right below my booty so the ruffle was right below that. Such an adorable dress though! Would rent again!
Love this dress! Definitely glad I sized up as it ran small. The large fit me perfect.

links_Review_Title: Love the style and how it flatters my body.
links_Review_Text: I wore this outfit when I attended bruno mars' concert and people complimented me on it. I'm usually a medium on other clothes but this material is not stretchable and it runs small so I had to go for Large. It's very flattering, comfortable to wear. You can wear it with heels or flats.
Tight across the chest. Glad i sized up

links_Review_Title: Loved the dress! Got so many compliments and it fit like a glove
links_Review_Text: Fit perfect. 5'6
This dress was perfect! It did run slightly small and is definitely better if you have a big chest. It was heavy material and not too short!
Runs small, but overall happy with it

Wore to cocktail hour the night before a wedding. This dress was perfect.. just enough going on with the ruffles, didn't find it to be too short but def mini so you'll show some leg. I thought ran a tad small, I'm usually a 6 and the medium was a little tight in the rib cage, but not uncomfortable once zipped up. Would absolutely rent again!

links_Review_Title: Absolutely loved this dress! So comfortable and flattering
links_Review_Text: It was great except it was definitely made for women with larger chests than mine! Luckily I was able to pin the top tighter and hide it with the ruffle

links_Review_Title: So in love with this dress!!!
links_Review_Text: So happy people told me to size up. I had so many compliments on this dress! Love love love

links_Review_Title: Size M feels like a S
links_Review_Text: Tight in chest (I am basically a 35A) and tight on tummy so it's not flattering in that area. I showed my husband and told him I wouldn't feel comfortable wearing it and he said, "Why because of the frills?" Ummm, no because it's so short and tight. (He said there is no such thing as too tight and too short HA!)
Awesome statement dress for a family party I Puerto Rico. Got many compliments :)
It was a little on the shorter side (but I'm not that used to wearing this length). I received tons of compliments on this outfit!
I wore this around Tulum and it fit and looked amazing!
Wore this dress to a summer cocktail party and absolutely loved it!! The S fit me perfectly, however it only fit without a bra. Luckily, material is thick and heavy enough to support.

Dress runs small. I ordered medium and large but large wasn't available to ship so I was given a backup. I ended up wearing the medium but definitely would've been more comfortable in the large around the ribcage area. It wasn't too short, I think the added ruffle flare helped with that. The top stayed up but I still used a little tape for security. It is a denim material with little to no stretch. Definitely size up. This dress was so cute and so much fun and I love it!!
The ruffles are fun and I loved the belt. The fabric is thicker and is pretty flattering. I wish the belt was easier to tie to make it look good but it's not a deal breaker

Loved this dress as did everyone else! Pic is actually of my best friend, who wore it to a wedding, but I wore to a party and we both got tons of compliments! Great fit, stays up fairly well for a one shoulder. Just know it is a thicker material so not best for super hot outdoor events. Will consider purchasing!

links_Review_Title: Wore this to a Bridesmaids luncheon and it was perfect! Got so many compliments!
links_Review_Text: It was a tad bit big in the waist, but couldn't really tell. So cute and comfortable!

links_Review_Title: Super cute and fun. Lots of subtle frills and love the cut of the dress
links_Review_Text: A bit tight in the chest and short but the outer frill on the edge covers enough to keep it modest enough to wear. Overall great dress just size up.
It fit like a glove!

So cute! Didn't realize it was a denim material so too casual for what I intended. I'm busty and it was SO tight for my boobs. Definitely better for small chested ladies. Ruffle makes it feel shorter than it actually looks!

This dress is amazing! This runs true to size and works best for A to C cups. This is fitted at the natural waist, but the skirt is full so there is comfortable room for hips. This dress is super short. You can wear a standard bra! I love this for a party!

links_Review_Title: Runs small. Tag says large, but fits like a medium. Was not able to wear.
links_Review_Text: Runs small. Tag says large, but more like a medium.

Super cute dress! I am 5'10" and I am a size 8 in dresses. It was short!!! I tried the large however it was too big on the top! Super fun and comfortable dress but if you are wanting something longer, this dress won't satisfy that!
I sized up and it was tiny. The chest area is so small. I do not have a large chest and this was tiny. I would not reorder this. Size 2x up!
So cute but couldn't wear. Top was way too small but the bottom fit perfectly which was weird

This dress was so cute. I wore with a pair of high tops and received so many compliments on the entire look. It was a little larger up top but that was probably because I did not wear a bra. I was impressed the shoulder strap stayed up. So so cute.

links_Review_Title: Cute dress but definitely runs small!
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress! A bit short so better for the weekends but wore it out to a bar with friends and it was perfect! Definitely runs small, i usually wear a small (sometimes xs) in Alexis and am very glad i went with the medium as the small would have been wayyyy too tight and short. For reference I'm 5'6, 125lbs and 34B

links_Review_Title: Size up but fun and flirty!
links_Review_Text: Loved this denim and ruffle number. Very small on top as well as low cut in so if you are really busty could be tricky. I wore pasties with it and it worked well. Short for me, but I am tall , but not too short. Felt sexy . Easy and great summer casual weekend out dress.
Runs very small

links_Review_Title: Fit great, good quality, pretty color, loved it, favorite rental!
links_Review_Text: Overall the best of everything
This dress is fun, flattering and so well made! I love Alexis in general but this dress can be worn for day or night. It's darling! I am normally a size Small but rented a Medium.
Runs small
It fit well but overall styling was just ok, didn't feel like anything too special. Fabric is thicker denim material.

links_Review_Title: Very cute but very small if you have curves
links_Review_Text: I didn't do a good job of reading the reviews before I ordered so I got a medium and given that I have a rather large chest it didn't work out. There's not any stretch to the material so I couldn't zip it up around my boobs. So cute just make sure you go up a size
Cute dress but it is WAY TOO SMALL. I would definitely order a size up. I'm typically a 4/6 or a medium and this was no where close to zipping.
Didnt end up wearing because it was so snug. Cute dress though.

Got lots of compliments on this dress! After reading the reviews I ordered a size up but was still nervous it might not fit in the bust area. It zipped without any problem. The only minor inconvenience was the shoulder piece needed occasional adjusting.

Loved this dress. It was my back up but I preferred it over my first choice. Received tons of compliments and it was so very comfortable to wear! The fabric was beautiful yet not too heavy. Would rent again!

Wore to a black-tie, southern soirée-themed event. Fit my 29-30" waist beautifully. Length was perfect (5'3" with 3" heels). Bust was a tad big (not unusual for me). Wore a stick-on backless, strapless bra. Would definitely wear again!

links_Review_Title: Love the print and the back of the dress!
links_Review_Text: I would normally order a long length, but the 10L was unavailable. The 10R worked, though because of the high/low cut . The back of the dress is an unexpected surprise, too, and I received compliments all night. It’s a good departure from the typical all black or red formal gowns!
Very comfortable and no need to wear a bra or Spanx. I have no cons at all. Love love love!!!

links_Review_Title: Great dress with bold interior fabric
links_Review_Text: Dress fit well against all my curves, gold fabric on the inside was a nice pop of color and the dress flowed nicely. I am 5'5" and was perfect with a small heal.

links_Review_Title: Great dress, but didn't wear it out.
links_Review_Text: For people with a short torso, this dress is tough, it bunches and the straps are too long. The halter area in the side boob seems like it flares out too much. Cute patter though. Great quality.

I wore it to a gala event for work. The fabric has a great texture, the open back is really pretty and appropriate for a work event (I didn't want anything showing too much cleavage), and the high-low hem was perfect since I'm only 5'1". I got lots of compliments on the dress!

Beautiful structured fabric holds its shape with no wrinkles and fun ruffled front slit. The waist felt a little snug while the chest was a little lose since I am a b cup. Length fit my tall frame perfectly with a small wedge. Fabric is thick so this is best suited to cooler months or indoor events. Lots of fun and TONS of compliments!

links_Review_Title: Wish I had somewhere to wear it!
links_Review_Text: Turns out the event I am going to isn't this formal, but the fit is so nice and the back of the dress is lovely. It's a very elegant silhouette. My boyfriend informed me it would be "too extra" to wear to the event we are going to, but I like it so much it makes me wish I had an appropriately extra place to go in it! It is long for us short girls but at least it's short in front so you can walk.

This dress is a dream. I loved the way the top fit. It was a high low, so I wasn't a danger to myself and others tripping of the hem. If you are short and have a hard time finding floor length gowns, rent this!

Lovely dress -- better than I expected. Fabric had a firm structure to it. I guessed on size and the 16 was on the edge of too tight but the 18 wasn't available. It showed too much back for me to be really comfortable and would have been a struggle to find a strapless bra for. That said, the dress was gorgeous and really well made and I was disappointed not to wear it.
I did not end up wearing this. I assume it's true to size because I am a size 6 and this 8 was slightly large especially in the chest. the cut is fun, but you couldn't wear a bra so be aware of that.
A little snug in the back because fabric has no stretch. But overall a great dress that moves well and was super comfortable

links_Review_Title: Great ball gown for twirling around the dance floor
links_Review_Text: Absolutely loved this dress! It was my second choice when I ordered it, but I fell in love when it arrived. It felt like I was on the runway the entire evening. The only con was the two eye-hooks holding the back neck piece together came undone three different times while dancing. The front of the dress stayed put, but I was nervous it would cause a scene. If you are going to sit and look pretty or not have your hands up while dancing, this dress shouldn't be a problem.

links_Review_Title: I love this dress and received many compliments.
links_Review_Text: Beautiful detail on the dress. Feels luxurious.

Pros: front halter provides great coverage for busty body types, deep v cut back keeps things sexy Thick material perfect for winter occasions Peekaboo inside bronze pattern gives a pop of color Cons: Halter fit my narrow shoulders a little loosely so I secured the front in place with double sided tape without a problem

links_Review_Title: I got so many compliments on this dress!
links_Review_Text: The dress fits more like a 10, it hugged every curve I have... Not designed for top heavy women!
I received so many complaints on this dress! I felt beautiful in it and save a bunch of money renting it vs buying a black tie dress!!! Loved it

links_Review_Title: Fit perfectly! Nice, thick material and easy to wear. Lots of compliments all night.

links_Review_Text: Best dress award! Very comfortable & stylish.

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous dress - lots of skin but no cleavage!
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress! It was my back up but I was VERY torn after trying it on about whether to go with this one! Fit was perfect (5'9" 145-150# 34 D) and forgiving of my broad shoulders and straight waist. Warning for the very tall - length in the L was not super long - a 1-2 inch heel would have been it for me. I also would have needed some serious boob tape action as it was not fitted enough for me to go without a bra. I would definitely consider renting this again for my next event!

links_Review_Title: A full length dress that works for someone 5'2''
links_Review_Text: Thick fabric. Very comfortable to wear. Used a stick on bra that worked great.

links_Review_Title: So many compliments! And I could dance the night away!
links_Review_Text: I tried in so many dresses for the "festive formal" themed wedding I attended. I am really a size 8 or 10 on the top and a size 12 through my waist and hips. I tried the 12 and the chest area was ridiculously big on me. The 10L fit me like a glove, a tight glove.... but with a girdle it was perfect. It was snug all over and held everything in. It wasn't uncomfortable anywhere and I could dance for like 5 hours straight. I loved this dress and got a TON of compliments!

This dress is comfortable and makes you feel like a million bucks. The back is the best part, giving it a sexy look but still formal. I would say though this would fit better someone with a fuller breast. Even though I could wear it I had a lot of extra fabric in the front.

It was a beautiful dress. I always feel like the midsection has a potential to be a lil smaller but it was not uncomfortable. I got this fit for my hips and booty so the top was a little larger but it was OK because I wore a little cover up! I would rent again.
It was a little small. I'm in between 14-16. I love the flowy bottom and high low skirt part. It made not so long.

The print and silhouette are so gorgeous. The back is even more beautiful than the front. I got loads of compliments in this. At 5'9" the Long was perfect for me in a 3-in heel. It did fit a bit large through the bodice. I was able to wear the 4 without it looking too big, but I think the 2 would've been perfection.
Gorgeous dress and fabric, but 2R too large for 5'5" 125lbs. Did not wear

links_Review_Title: Fabulous dress, so stunning and comfortable!
links_Review_Text: Perfect dress for a fancy night! The fit was flattering and comfortable. I'm an hourglass/pear shape with a 36B chest; the top was looser than I would have liked but even without a bra it was comfortable and with the thick fabric was still discreet. Loved the high/low style!

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous material, super comfortable, great dress.
links_Review_Text: 6L is a good size for 5'9" with low heels. Slimming if you are wanting to deaccentuate waist and hips, with a nice complement for shoulders/back/arms. Big on top for 32B, needed a stick on bra to fill it out. Great dress overall.

links_Review_Title: This dress was fun and beautiful!!! It was comfortable and I would recommend it for a special event
links_Review_Text: The back is so pretty and little jewelry needed because of the fabric. Loved it!!
I Loved this dress but the straps were too long for the top to fit properly. Ended up wearing something else.

I didn't end up wearing this but only because one of the other dresses I rented was a little looser on me. True to size and looks stunning!. The high-low cut makes moving easy and I didn't need much of a heel which is always a bonus for me!

links_Review_Title: Fun, flirty yet classic- comfortable & elegant
links_Review_Text: The open back & halter style perfect for my broad / felt elegant & sexy CD! Leopard underlay so fun - arrived a day late- give yourself time for weather and holidays- but loved & happy with the service & choices - thank you!

links_Review_Title: Stunning - just not for the short waisted!
links_Review_Text: This dress is incredibly beautiful in person - I couldn't wait to wear it. Unfortunately, I had a couple for issues with this dress. There was not any stretch, so you have to be sure to get your actual size, but the top (waist up) was just too long for me. I'm five feet tall and the straps didn't offer any adjustability. I wish this came in petite sizing!

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous but sticks out at chest
links_Review_Text: I was really disappointed to find that the dress fit except at the chest. I'm 5'2 size 12 with a 40E bust. The top created wings at the side so I'd have to pin it and use tape. In the end I went with another dress. However this dress was gorgeous and other than at the top, it fit great. If this would go on sale I'd totally buy it then have it tailored.

I did not pick this dress, it was sent to me as a replacement when the dress I ordered was returned to RTR badly damaged. It is pretty, but not a pattern or style I would have chosen for myself. I attempted to try it on anyway, but it was just way too small with no stretch. I did not wear it.

links_Review_Title: I really stood out in the print and cut like this. It just screamed fun!
links_Review_Text: It was just what I expected.

I had a last minute invite to a black tie event and RtR came to the rescue with the perfect outfit. I'll admit I wasn't very excited about this dress based on the stock photos, but it is SO much better in person and I'm glad I gave it a shot. The dress is beautiful - sexy without showing too much skin. The back is gorgeous! (mostly bare with two small straps) And the pop of copper on the underskirt is a great detail. I received compliments all night! I hope I can find a reason to rent this dress again! Note: I've tried to upload pics but I keep getting an error message. Just trust, this dress is gorgeous!
Beautiful brocade evening gown but runs quite small through the rib cage and breast area. Also revealed quite a bit of side cleavage.
Wore this to my rehearsal dinner. The material is nice! It's fitted but not restricting. Perfect sexy midi look
I'd had use spanx since I got very bloated that day, but love the dress. Customer service is excellent I got confused with dates but they were pleased to help. I will def use the app again

Pro: Wore to my wedding shower. Very classy and pretty. I'm 5'6.5" 135lbs very athletic build normal sz 2-4, 34A/B. Women's/designer clothes - I tend to be an XS. I ordered S in this, since white tends to show through. Slightly loose/overall a good fit. Con: the first one they sent had the remnants of a grease stain on front, they graciously and quickly sent a new one. The 2nd dress hem was coming apart and could see it in all my photos. First RTR impression: all of the dresses are messed up.

links_Review_Title: The ease in selecting a dress, receiving the dress on time for the occasion, the packaging all great
links_Review_Text: I chose this dress for my wedding rehearsal dinner. Selecting the dress on Rent the Runway app was very simple and enjoyable. My package was delivered nicely packaged and at the estimated time frame. Rent the runway made this experience extremely simple and I will use their services again!
Wore to my rehearsal dinner and LOVED it!! It was tight enough and cut with a slit and interesting top, so it looked sexy, but also long enough and classy enough to be appropriate for the occasion.

links_Review_Title: On trend and appropriate for my rehearsal dinner!
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress. I didn't wear spanx under it because I don't hav me any, but probably could have used it for the tummy area. I straps were a little loose so I used fashion tape to make sure they didn't fall down. Looked great and photographed very well too!

links_Review_Title: I wore this dress for my wedding rehearsal and rehearsal dinner! It was perfect!
links_Review_Text: The fit on this was perfect! It was sexy and sophisticated. I got compliments all night. It is definitely see through, however. I had to buy nipple petals so that nothing was able to be seen.
I wore this to my tenth wedding anniversary party and it was awesome. Fit well. Super simple. Thick enough to be both tight and flattering. Comfortable.

Stretchy, thick material that hugs in all the right places. I couldn't wear a strapless bra because it wouldn't fit in the dress cups. You have to wear nipple covers of some sort because the material gets thin right where the nipples rest in the dress. The straps were a bit loose so I would recommend a contraption that would push up the breasts if you are a middle aged gal like me & the girls don't sit so high anymore. But overall- a gorgeous dress that came with lots of compliments!

links_Review_Title: Husband’s bday dinner! Perfect dress for a nice night out!
links_Review_Text: Fit perfectly and looked great! Lots of compliments! A little see through so needed bra petals and nude seamless panties but other than that was a show stopper!

links_Review_Title: Perfect dress for my rehearsal dinner!
links_Review_Text: Dress fit perfect! I am 5"2 and it wasn't too long. Perfect midi length.
