This is such a beautiful and classy dress. I got compliments from random strangers. You should note that it is quite see-through so undergarments need to be nude. The straps were also quite long.
This dress fit well but was very form fitting, especially in the stomach/waste.

The dress fits fairly true to size, and is a really nice thick material that keeps it from being see-through. Same as other reviews, the top is a bit loose, and the straps are longer, so the bust has somewhat of an odd fit.

Wow, this dress is amazing! If you have curves be prepared for this dress to show them off. The slit is super high so wearing Spanx is difficult if not impossible; I managed to roll them up really high on one leg just to have a smooth look through the hips. But the dress fits amazingly, and is the perfect combination of elegant and sexy. I wore this for a desert Christmas photo shoot with my boyfriend and it was an amazing style for the look I was going for. I would definitely wear it again!

links_Review_Title: The fit was like a glove
links_Review_Text: Pros, dress is incredibly flattering, fits curvy women like a glove, and could not be more elegant. Con, on this one had the front hem had fallen out and could not be fixed without ruining the material so it looked a tiny bit frumpy. But the dress is phenomenal.

I was worried the bust would be too revealing for my business casual work environment (34 DDD) but it wasn't. Not super modest but neither am I. Nice thick material hung well on me. Paired with a jean jacket & red chunky jewelry. Forgot to snap a pic on my way out the door. Sorry!
this didn't really flatter me, and the medium was awkwardly baggy, so I didn't wear it.

links_Review_Title: the fabric is see through and very tight fitting- cute dress from the back
links_Review_Text: fits true to size
I looove this jumpsuit!! It has a very elegant feel and fits nicely. The reason I didn't give 5 stars was because it wrinkles very easily and by the end of the day it looks a bit messy.
Do yourself a favour and hire this. I felt like Goldie Hawn in "First Wives Club". I've never had so many compliment walking down the street.

This jumpsuit was amazing for our engagement pictures and photographed beautifully!!! I am so glad I picked this outfit! Got compliments from photographer and people walking by. Absolutely loved everything about the fit and I could not recommend more! I want to own so bad but I will forever have these pics wearing it anyway! If you're thinking about this RENT IT and SIZE DOWN!!! I am usually a M and rented the small.

Wore this for an anniversary dinner and concert date. Absolutely loved. The belt here was a little loose, but looked even better when tied securely. It moves like a dream- wish I could upload a video! Very flattering and forgiving around the midsection because the waist is cinched and the pant legs are so wide, so the proportions make you look tall and lean. Wrinkles easily, so be ready to steam or iron upon arrival. I'm 5'4" and it looked like I'd had it hemmed with a 4" heel. Highly recommend

This is a beautiful piece that makes a great statement. If you're 5'8 or above, it's kind of short so it's more of a one-time wear. It wrinkles immediately as well so keep that in mind when deciding which place to wear it to.

Definitely a head turner. The fabric has a great weight to it so when you walk the super wide leg looks fantastic. I left a few buttons undone for a plunging neckline and wore with gold accessories and tan fur. Perfect for a Autum night in San Francisco. I could have sized down one but it still looked amazing.

Sooo many compliments with this one! I was even told I looked regal! Yes, it's a lot of fabric - you're kicking weighty (not heavy) fabric with each step. Yes, it's a bit long (I'm 5'7" and I was fine in 5" heels). Yes, it's low cut...but it is stunning! Challenges: bathroom (lots of fabric on the ground), walking up stairs (my heels would get caught every once in a while), and I did safety pin the front down to be work appropriate. Pros: it is extremely comfortable (perfect for traveling), it irons well, the pockets are extremely deep, and the fit is flattering. I plan to hold on to this one for a while...!
Pro's amazing runway outfit Cons: hard to pee in since the buttons on the sleeve are on the outside but it's totally worth it =)
This was lovely but completely unwearable without a belt. I do not own a white belt, and the look was very different with a contrast belt. I was very disappointed.
So elegant but be careful in the sun because it can start to see through
Oversized by design I wore a small and the length was appropriate in the sleeves. The legs are super wide and flows. Paired with a statement heel. Got lots of compliments. Fun!!
Unfortunately was way too long for me, even with heels! It also got a little large in general. But otherwise probably would have been very cute. I'm 5'3", 123lbs so maybe I should have expected this.

This dress was amazing! It fit like a glove & the material was extra comfy. I highly recommend this for any event that you don't mind being the center of attention at lol. Seriously, it's a gorgeous dress. I would rent it again.

links_Review_Title: Fit to perfection! Just an an all around fabulous all purpose dress
links_Review_Text: I'm an avid believer in SPANX, SKIMS & undergarments at all times but this dress needed none of those things. I wore without a bra & no shape wear and it fit flawlessly. The material is thick enough that it defines a shape, lifts the girls & stays put effortlessly. I'm debating on purchasing based on how well it fit straight off the hanger. If you're considering just go for it!
Get ready to have the spotlight on you!, this dress is true to size and supper confortable.

I ordered a size up (6r) because it was the closest size available at the time. I'm usually a 4 and it probably would have fit better if I had ordered a 4 (the straps were falling off and it was overall a little loose). My fault for ordering a size up. Still, a pretty dress and beautiful color
I'm on the short side, had to pin the shoulders back to get it to fit just right. Overall very chic style & color.

links_Review_Title: Great dress, a little strange of a fit but overall good
links_Review_Text: Rented this for hat day at polo, dress was beautiful and design was neat but it did fit a little weird around the middle and back. If you have back fat it will bulge out because it's low cut in the back. You can't wear a bra either but it should hold up your breasts nicely.

I mean, this dress is beautiful no matter what, but I had a baby a few months ago and the structured flounce on the front does a great job of concealing what's left of my baby belly. I got so many compliments on this dress, I'm definitely going to rent it again!! It's made well and doesn't look cheap at all. Elegant and comfortable, a definite win!

This was a great dress! Wore to a wedding and had lots of compliments. The dress is darker in person than what it shows on the RTR photos there is not much give or stretch. Wore a 6 which fit well in the chest but the waist was pretty baggy, it was also longer than I expected. Overall would recommend renting!

Great for curvy ladies. I have a 34 Dd/36D bust and they barely fit in there but I'm not sure I would have wanted a larger size. Very flattering esp if you carry a little tummy weight like me. I've had trouble getting dresses zipped all the way up lately because of my curvy hips and large bust so the low back and zipper was perfect. I am not tan in the slightest right now, it's December- and it still looked great. This is a stunning and classy dress that is very forgiving! Loved!
Rented this dress for a winter wedding and it was a hit. The material is very thick and nice for extended amounts of time outside (of course, I have a coat). Lots of compliments!!

True to size (normally a 2 and wore a 2). Dress is not tight in waist but a little tight around the legs (can't take huge steps when walking, but can still dance in it)! Amazing color that's a darker nude -- doesn't wash you out. Fabric around the mid-section isn't too bulky. Would 100% rent again.
This dress was everything and more. Endless compliments and absolutely figure flattering. I felt so beautiful!

links_Review_Title: Not for me but probably for you
links_Review_Text: My torso is just too long so the butt was too high for me, but it's very elegant! Wish I could wear it. Boobs run big and waist small and hips normal imo.
Fits great. Super comfy and fits right in the right places.

I rented this dress for a wedding that I did not wear it to. I order the 8R, I loved the fit of it despite being too long for my frame, however I do want to note that the shoulder straps are very long and if you are larger than a C cup, you're going to have some wardrobe issues. Those 2 things aside, stunning dress.

At first I was upset I didn't size down for this but it was still a gorgeous fit. The waist detail is so unique and conveniently hides the tummy so you can skip the shapewear. The fabric is super soft and stretchy but still luxe. Will absolutely rent again in a smaller size.
Loved this dress! Very flattering for a post baby body. I did have some issues with the straps falling down periodically, but overall the dress was amaaazing. My favorite rental so far!

links_Review_Title: The dress was beautiful and unique
links_Review_Text: This dress runs very small. I had to have RTR overnight me a bigger size because I just couldn't breathe in the original requested size. It does not stretch. You cannot wear a bra with it because the back is low. You sort of need to be top heavy to fill the dress and that's tough when you can't really wear a bra. The straps were loose so make sure to get double sided tape to keep it up. Overall a beautiful dress but keep everything above in mind when renting.
I wanted to love this dress! The 4 ran small and the 6 was too baggy in the butt/legs. It's a great material and a nice color if you have a skin tone that can match. Just make sure to rent two sizes!

Got this sent as a backup dress because my original pick made me look pregnant. This dress is super flattering, but may not be a good fit for ladies with larger chests as I'm pretty flat and it just fit me perfectly. Received a ton of compliments and would highly recommend renting this one!

Kept checking back into RTR for this to come available. I'm 5'3" so I was nervous the dress would be too long, but it worked perfect. It fit snug, but extremely comfortable - it feels like neoprene so it has some heavy stretch. Love the way the back dips down a little lower. Easy and elegant. The detail at the waist allows you to eat all the potatoes at the wedding buffet that you want! Would highly recommend.
This dress was EVERYTHING! I can't count how many compliments I received. Fit me perfect everywhere (5'7", 140lbs, 36C)....you won't regret this one!
I wore this dress to a late-Summer beach wedding and got so many compliments! The fabric is structured but has a little give to it - very comfy! Loved the color too!

Another favorite! This fabric feels so great on, and the detail in the middle hides any imperfections. I loved this neckline -- super trendy right now -- and the scoop back is also a nice detail. Highly recommend this look!

This is a must-rent! Loved this gorgeous dress, especially the nude color and the modern detailing in the front. SO many compliments. Please note the slit is quite high! Also, I’d normally wear a 2 or 4, wore a 4 in this though a 6 may have worked well too.

I'm always between a 4 and a 6. The 6 was massive. So happy I got both sizes; even the 4 was a bit baggy in the lower back area. This dress is unique, the color is perfect for early fall, and so many people will stop you to ask about it.

I received so many compliments! I'm 5'5 and 155 lbs so i order an 8R and she fit perfectly. The color was great on my skin. I didn't need a bra and I'm a 34 D. The material is thick and very structured but it stretches enough to provide support and control. Like neoprene but wayyy better... the split isn't too high either. It's perfect. I wore strappy rhinestone heels. I loved the fact that it hugged my curves BUT disguised my tummy... ACLER for thee win!!! Yess!!

Gorgeous dress! Quality is even better than I thought. I am a 2 but they only had a 4 available & I was still able to wear it just slightly loose on the straps. Overall my best dress rented, loved it and will likely rent again.
Beautiful clay color and quite a piece of art!
Was too large

links_Review_Title: Light flex at the Office Holiday Party!
links_Review_Text: I'm 5'6 w/34C bust, 28 waist, and 41 hip--I wore the size 6 with comfort (once zipped LOL). The size 8 was too big, the sleeve were falling down my shoulders, but zipped up without help.

links_Review_Title: I felt confident! I think the photo speaks for itself !
links_Review_Text: Fits like a wetsuit. No need for a bra or shapewear. The straps were a bit long but not to the point of falling down. The fan part isn’t bulky at all and looks good even sitting down!
Super flattering, interesting and different! Got multiple compliments and looked super cute style with a black leather jacket over it.
Quality feels amazing and the fit was amazing around the hips and waist but the straps were a little loose. I considered sizing down but didn’t think my booty would’ve fit.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress didn't fit as a little small in chest and large in hips
links_Review_Text: So pretty - material thick and designer -rent this especially if you have a bit of curve on the bottom and not too big up top, bummed I couldn't wear didn't fit my body type

links_Review_Title: Dress was very beautiful I got complement the whole entire night
links_Review_Text: the fit was beautiful

This dress is gorgeous and very flattering. It was a little bit tight on top, but I'm usually between a 6 and an 8, so I would still call it true to size. I didn't need to wear a bra with it. The fabric is very thick and supportive.
I ordered this dress for a wedding. It was one size too big so I didn't wear it. The dress was a little too long for me. It's not a cute as the picture.

links_Review_Title: Not for a pear shaped person
links_Review_Text: This was super cute but I needed a smaller size in the bust and waist. Great material but wish I could have exchanged for a smaller size

links_Review_Title: Just do not order if you have hips / thighs / a butt.
links_Review_Text: I ordered this for a wedding in two sizes 6R and 8R, and both were comically small in the hips / thigh / butt area. If you are curvy there, I would be wary.

links_Review_Title: I received so many compliments on this dress. It fit perfectly.

links_Review_Text: Este vestido es perfecto! I rented it to emcee a Hispanic bar association gala. The colors and patterns were PERFECTION esp for that event. It's very standout without being revealing in any way. Few things: It's hard to latch the top clasps on your own. And the fabric around the arms is really tight so your range of motion will be a little limited. Finally, DON'T wear shoes with pointy heels. The holes at the bottom of the dress will catch all night. I learned the hard way! Otherwise, memorable!

links_Review_Title: LOVED this dress, so many compliments
links_Review_Text: This dress is really the reason I tried RTR. I ended up getting a couple "bonus" dresses when the back up size of this one and one other couldn't ship on time...this was my favorite. I have never been complimented so much on an outfit. I agree with other reviewers, there is ample boob room, and the material does not exactly stretch...but the size is very true. I had low heels on, lucky because the regular cut is not very long for tall girls. Just loved it.

links_Review_Title: When you don't want a basic black gown
links_Review_Text: Very pretty, not your typical black-tie gown, perfect for a wedding at a botanical garden. The cups are padded and lined. If you're more comfortable wearing a strapless bra make sure it is a plunge style otherwise it will be visible.

links_Review_Title: I rented this dress for a 3-day wedding in Dubai and wore it for one of the evening functions.
links_Review_Text: This dress is absolutely fantastic... It was a perfect fit and was ideal for the Indian wedding I attended. The fabric was heavy which I loved and it hit in all the right spots, making me feel extremely glamorous.

links_Review_Title: Wearing a dress of this quality and style was simply a dream. I felt like a queen.
links_Review_Text: Fit perfectly like a glove. The weight of the fabric and lining was a comfort and allowed me to wear no bra. I am 5'5 1/2", 132 lbs, 32-G, 27 waist, 36 hips.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful! Unique dress. Comfortable. I could still dance! I am 5'8 and wore a kitten 1.5 inch heel
links_Review_Text: Tons of compliments. I could still dance.

Such a beautiful change from the usual black. Per the reviews I read, I took the chance and ordered a 10. I usually wear a 6 or 8 in RTR dresses. The 8 was not available. I'm not sure it would have fit, for the 10 was perfect. I am 5'6" and wore 3 in heels. The dress skimmed the floor which looked nice. Any longer and the lace at the bottom would have caught in the shoes. Wore NuBra and clamped in tightly together to get a bit of cleavage. Loved this dress, one of my favorites!!
Such a great fit! Gorgeous details. I had so many compliments on color and fit.
This dress fit true to size! It was comfortable and well made! Rent this dress!
This dress is Fun & Exciting! It photographs well & the colors are vibrant! I wore spanx to tighten & flatten my mid-section. It Definitely show cases large breasts!! It is eye-catching!
Despite another “renter” choosing the same dress- I would do it again! Great fit, true to size. The 8 was not available. It was too long for me (5 4” barely) but tall shoes helped.

links_Review_Title: Originally not my favorite but received a ton of compliments...
links_Review_Text: This dress fit very nice when I first tried it on. I wasn't a huge fan of the style at first, maybe because it is out of my ordinary style, but it was probably my most complimented RTR dress to date. It is a heavy dress and I had to wear 3 inch heels to prevent it dragging on the floor. But it lasted a really fun family wedding.

links_Review_Title: "Your dress is the coolest one here!"
links_Review_Text: This was the perfect dress for a garden wedding in Guadalajara, Mexico! Got so many compliments - especially the most memorable, "your dress is the coolest one here... aside from the Bride's, of course."

links_Review_Title: Really stands out (in a good way!) STUNNING
links_Review_Text: Gorgeous is an understatement. The colors of this dress are so vibrant. I attended a formal event where most women wore black gowns, so I felt like a rockstar with all the compliments I received! I wore the 2 because I have wide hips but the top ran a little big on me as I don't have the chest to fill it out! Loved this dress!

I didn't end up wearing this dress because i needed something more casual but this was gorgeous. I need to find something to wear it to. I'm 120, 5'4 and a 0R fit but would have done a 2 to be more comfortable since my shoulders are broad

links_Review_Title: Did not wear this dress. It was VERY long.
links_Review_Text: Beautiful dress, beautifully made. Way too long for me at 5'7".

I wore this to an Indian wedding which was formal/semi formal in dress. It was the perfect level of formality and fun to wear. I was surprised at how big the dress ran. A size down would have fit better. The waist ran large, though the dress may have been stretched out slightly. The fabric is quite structured and does not give much. I am 5'5" and wore 6 inch heels. Overall very happy with this and would rent again.

I had multiple people come to tell me how much they loved this dress!! I felt like a million bucks! I also loved that the sleeves were enough to keep me from having to wear my husbands jacket at the end of the night!

The pictures don't do this dress justice as it is so much prettier in person. I'm 5'10 and the length was perfect. It barely touched the ground which allowed me to choose between flats and 2" heels. I'm also a 34 DDD and sized up to allow for room in the chest. I wouldn't recommend this dress for anyone with a larger bust or for anyone taller than me who is also is in the D cup category (It won't hit you in the bust area correctly as I had to lift the girls TO. THE. MAX. to them squeeze in).

They didn't have this dress in my size so I went up one size. I have wide hips so it fit perfectly in hips but was big on top as I have a short torso. Used double sided tape to hold the dress up and to address the bulge in the back. The dress was heavy but extremely comfortable- lots of compliments!!

I wore this to my first Indian Sangeet. I was unsure if I would feel overdressed but it was perfect. The colors popped and I felt like a million dollars. Hotel guests and staff were stopping me to tell me how beautiful I looked. Gush!
Ordered a size 6. It fit perfectly. IGot so many complements.

links_Review_Title: This RTR dress proved stylishly apropos for a Shakespearean themed gala.
links_Review_Text: A bright and colorful selection that beautifully complements a curvy figure. I felt like Foxy Cleopatra in this stunning number. This dress received a long list of compliments, some even claiming it was the best look of the evening. My most successful RTR pick yet!

links_Review_Title: I got so many compliments. Comfortable, danced in it all night!
links_Review_Text: The fit was perfect. No spanx needed. I was afraid it would be to tight on the sleeves and I wouldn't be able to pick up 18month old, but it was not tight. Perfect in the chest area. I didnt have to wear a bra.
Loved this dress! I got a larger size & I'm glad I did. I typically wear a 8 or 10. So I got a 10 & 12 and the 12 was perfect with some room. I'm 5'7.
Everything about this dress was amazing. The fit, the colors, the sheer glamour of it was exactly what I wanted.

links_Review_Title: The most gorgeous dress I've ever worn
links_Review_Text: I wore this to my brothers wedding. I felt so beautiful in it and many people told me how stunning the dress was.
Dress was absolutely stunning, fit like a glove but still comfortable. It is a quality dress with all the detail, a real show stopper. Colors are unique and vibrant. Highly recommend.

This dress fit like a glove. I have broad shoulders and usually worry that the back may be too tight, but it wasn't. The color and quality were just beautiful. It was about a half-inch too long even with my tallest heels but it was worth it. I am 5'4", 32DD, 106lbs for reference.
Loved this dress! I ordered a 4R and 6R...the 4R was snug but was the perfect length with my heels so I chose that over mobility. It was still comfortable and absolutely gorgeous.

links_Review_Title: Black tie wedding, compliments all night (at TWO hotels) felt like royalty
links_Review_Text: True to size, could have worn Long (regular was almost too short with medium heels). 5’6.5” and 163, curvy figure at the time. Beautiful, unique dress

links_Review_Title: Everyone at the Resort were dropping their jaws when i walked by
links_Review_Text: I am 165 pounds, 5'7" and my bra size is a 34 F. My measurements are 42 hips, waist is 32. I am 24 years old with a curvy physique. I was able "get low" for dancing lol. The dress was beautiful, a little loose at the tummy area but thats usually how my dresses fit because my body is a size 6 but my breasts dont cater to that size. Compliments all night. Strangers were taking pictures with me lol
Perfect for an Indian wedding in LA. It is even more gorgeous in person, and I didn't want to take it off. So beautiful. The only con is that it is very long for someone that is petite.

I felt like a goddess in this dress. It's a beautiful quality, and the fit was amazing. I'm pear shaped, typically a size 10 in dresses to accommodate my hips (which measure somewhere in the 40" range). But the size 8 fit like a glove. I tried it on without shapewear and it fit fine but ended up choosing to wear some just to give myself a little more room in the hips. There is no stretch in the fabric. But it was beyond comfortable, I could sit, stand, dance. I think if you are a true hourglass shape, you would wear your regular size but pear shapes could likely size down so your bust fits. Highly recommend this one. Got compliments all night.

links_Review_Title: Red carpet screening and never got so many compliments on a dress!
links_Review_Text: Love this dress and want to buy it. Super flattering. I'm 5'5" and 127 pounds, usually wear a 2 or 4 in a dress, depending on the brand. This 2 fit perfectly. I'm a little smaller on top. This dress has a little padding so made my chest look big (for me!). Wore a strapless bra underneath. Only con is that it's hard to do the clasp up by the neck by yourself. You need someone to do it for you because the arms don't stretch enough to reach up and back.
This dress was FABULOUS!! Comments all night! Fits like a glove!!

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous dress that you'll get so many compliments on!!
links_Review_Text: Gorgeous dress!!! All the details are so beautiful and colors so vibrant! I wear a 4 or 6 usually. This dress (4R) fit me perfectly, so I'd say if you're in the middle of two sizes go with the smaller one. I'm 5'7 and wore wedges and it was the perfect length. I can't say explain enough how great this dress is!!
True to size, comfortable, kept me warm on a cooler spring evening in Sonoma.
The dress was fantastic. I received a ton of compliments. The colors were bright and the detailing on the dress was intricate and flattering.

This dress / blazer could not be more fun. Total showstopper. Dark red sequins look more glam than tacky in person. I would size slightly up and note that the dress is very short in the back... I'm 5'8" so with heels on it came right past my butt. Only downside is that the buttons can come undone if you're not careful, otherwise I would definitely recommend.

I rented this for a themed Greatest Showmanesque gala- but the sparkle but it wasn't a dress. With my athletic build and sequins that doesn't give- I work leggings underneath. The front bottom purposely angles and was nowhere near long enough to wear without bottoms of some type.

I wore this to a fashion show fundraiser and I received so many compliments. It's shorter than what I would normally wear but I just wore biker shorts underneath so I could dance later without any worry. Very glam!
Loved the dress but it fit me like a jacket. Great quality and very heavy. I'm 5'9 175. It fit my daughter she is 5'3 150.
Love this dress, I got so many compliments. A little itchy on the collar but would totally rent again

This was perfect for my Circus Ringleader Halloween costume! I had first rented the S and while it fit fine, I kept my eye out for the XS and was able to nab it in time! It fit much better and was more fitted whereas the S had lots to extra room. Loved it!
Worked wonderfully as a devil costume. Beware these buttons are snaps and this runs small. Definitely recommend sizing up if you don't want to this to randomly pop open.

Absolutely impossible not to notice this dress. So much fun to wear. The only con is it is thick and very warm to wear. Good for cold weather events. Also a little tough to sit in but overall showstopper.
Though the look was oversized but definitely not. Could have made it snap, but opted for a jacket look instead to avoid busting open. Size up, if it's big, it'll look better anyway.

This dress was so flattering! Fit me like a glove and the low V was perfect! Now to low but enough to make this dress very sophisticated! Just like any other RTR, you will get tons of compliments! Dress is true to size and sparkles don't itch! It's lined inside! Heavy material! Buttons are super easy and you can take this dress on and off very efficiently! 10/10! Would recommend everyone rent! Don't Trent if you don't like dresses too short though! So happy I found this gem!

links_Review_Title: Too small to comfortably wear out.
links_Review_Text: I'm 5'8" and about 160 and more of an athletic build. The Medium was an absolute no go. The large snapped shut but it was very tight and I wanted an over sized look. I decided not to wear it because I just didn't feel comfortable wearing it out all night and trusting it wouldn't unbutton. The material was heavy and thick, so definitely more of a winter option for anyone considering it.

Rented this for a James Bond party it was a hit. It was a little tight across the back because the dress doesn't have any stretch to it. So if you have broad shoulders you might want to size up. I wore booty shorts under it because it is really short. No one could see but I felt more comfortable when sitting down.

links_Review_Title: Will only fit straight body shape
links_Review_Text: I wore this as a jacket over a tank and skinny jeans. It was super cute. I couldn't wear it as a dress because the buttons wouldn't stay closed. The shoulders fit, which is good b/c I have wide shoulders. But the shape of this dress is straight and my hips and chest didn't fit. It might be a really cute dress on a different body type.

links_Review_Title: Showstopper, but just too short for me!
links_Review_Text: This dress was gorgeous, but I should have sized up to a medium. I rented it for a 'camp' themed party and it would have been great for that. It was just too short to wear (it came just below my backside). Would definitely rent it again and get a larger size!

Have not worn it yet. Still debating whether it is suitable for a rehearsal dinner. It would be a def. yes for a party, NYE etc. A bit glitzy, but I really like it. I ordered size M, which worked overall, but was slightly big in the waist and hip. May try size S next to see if it fits me better.
up the edge-factor with a black bra peeking out. double-sided fabric ties for a little flair. the lengthening silhouette is figure flattering.

My favorite designer. This dress has great detailing and a unique sophisticated print. A pear shape has room to alter the degree of modesty and appropriateness so the dress can be enjoyed for many occasions. Love to wear with designer knee-high boots that the high side slits show off elegantly.

links_Review_Title: I love the flowers and deep v neck
links_Review_Text: The v neck is very deep but all stay in place, love it!

links_Review_Title: An eye catcher but get some tape!
links_Review_Text: I liked this dress and it was way outside my comfort zone for rentals. I normally dressed more subdued and classic, but when I saw this dress I couldn't resist. For fit, I am a 4 up and down and 5'9", and this dress in a size 4 worked well. HOWEVER, I may have liked the size 6 more for some wiggle room and stretch in the shoulders and sleeves. I used to be a swimmer, so my shoulders are broad.
I had been waiting to rent this and so glad I did! It fits true to size and the material is still comfortable for a summer night despite the long sleeves
Yes it has a plunging neckline but looks fantastic with a white cami. Super fun, photographs very well. I also paired it with some white adidas. Loved it.

links_Review_Title: Stunning, head turning, chic and sexy.
links_Review_Text: Rented for a trip to Rome and wore on one of our fancy nights. This dress is absolutely insane -- be warned that it is very very low-cut and I definitely felt like I was busting out, but in a good way. If you have larger breasts, definitely size up. I did and could have gone another size (10R) up and probably would have had less cleavage, but the length and long sleeves made it not too scandalous. Would rent again in a heartbeat. I also wore this with Oscar de la Renta earrings and it totally amplified the glamour.

My friend ended up wearing this dress and she loved it! Only con was that it is super low cut and she didn't have the right undergarments to feel totally comfortable all night. Otherwise it's a really pretty dress and she received compliments all night!
Fits very true to size. The fabric is very nice and the dress is extremely well made. Great piece.
This dress was absolutely stunning. I received so many compliments. Used some tape to hold dress in place but didn't really need it. Worth the money!

I love the spring floral update to this dress it's soo gorgeous! I would wear to work with a sweater over it! I've worn a 0 and a 2 and for people with a smaller chest the 0 is the better size since the clasp closure at the chest would get unhooked on the size 2. Would rent again!

links_Review_Title: Hugged in all the right places!
links_Review_Text: Someone told me this dress was "made for my body" and I couldn't agree more. At first I wasn't sure the dress would zip because I was trying it on alone. When I decided to take it on vacation and had a restaurant host zip it up for me (you gotta do what you gotta do!), I was pleasantly surprised how comfortable the fit was on top. It provided the perfect amount of warm for a slightly breezy night on a beach vacation.
It was a perfect glammed up Vegas look. Loved it and received major compliments!

I always have to size up in dresses bc my bust and ribs are larger than my hips--this dress was loose at the waist, but did not look out of proportion. I needed a lot of fashion tape--but it was perfect for a festive gala
Love the deep neckline and that it is paired with a longer skirt and long sleeves. Wore this in another pattern over the summer and was excited to rent it in this new color! Fit true to size

links_Review_Title: Compliments all night. XX-plunging bra and tape needed.
links_Review_Text: ~120lbs. Gorgeous. Definitely needed heels proportionally, but at 5'3" I could have worn flats. Very low cut on me. Thankfully NYE I'm ok with that. Also, there's a hook closure I didn't see at first. I cuffed and pushed up sleeves. Not sure when I can wear such a plunge again, but I hope to!
Fit like a glove. I didn't notice the piping details in the model photo so that was a nice surprise! The cut and print camouflage everything. I taped up the girls a la Kim K.
Loved this but for someone who is smaller on top and curvier in the hips, the fit was just off. Loved it though for the night.
Beautiful dress; however, it is very low cut, so I would recommend pinning it. Also wasn't sure what to do with the weird ties/hole under the chest...so I just kept the ties untied...
Pretty but incredibly low cut. If u look at photos it looks like some people sewed it shut. Not very breathable material

links_Review_Title: Didn't end up wearing, but beautiful dress.
links_Review_Text: I usually wear a 6, but this dress was only available in an 8. Was just too big to wear so sent back. Therefore, think this runs true to size. Do not size up, even if RtR says you can.
Wasn't work appropriate but loved it for an evening out
Super cute face a bit on the sexy side but I worked it very high-quality and very posh

I almost always read reviews and look at others' photos before renting. This time, I didn't and I was unpleasantly surprised when I went to put this dress on. At first I thought I had it on backwards because I didn't recall it being so revealing from the picture of the model. I found it hard to get the tie to look right at the bust and then the fabric pulled strangely around it. I considered wearing something underneath but that just ruined the look. I took it off and it went back in the bag.

links_Review_Title: I was so excited for this dress and it's the weirdest fit I've ever worn
links_Review_Text: The fabric is gorgeous and I was so excited about this dress. It looked sophisticated, flirty, and regal. When I tried it on, it bunched in the shoulders, bunched in the hips, and ultimately in no way fit. I was so bummed! I hope it fits better on other bodies!
This is definitely a WOW dress! I wore a black lace cami underneath so I could wear it to work. It looked great and everyone kept raving on how gorgeous it was.

links_Review_Title: Really high quality and unique dress.
links_Review_Text: Low cut, seems best for smaller bust.
Awesome dress! Wore to work and for client cocktails. Dress is low cut but looked great with white cami. Great details and lines. Will rent again
LOVED this dress.

links_Review_Title: The neckline is way tooooooo low!
links_Review_Text: Way too low-cut.

links_Review_Title: Spectacular! I wore a shirt under it because way too low cut for work but this was a show stopper
links_Review_Text: Great dress, well made, great details. A tall girl must

links_Review_Title: The dress wowed. I got so many compliments while wearing it. A true showstopper.
links_Review_Text: Fit perfectly. The only thing I would note is that the sleeves have fabric on them that can easily fall into a drink.
I couldn't zip up the back. I would size up

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress for a SLO night
links_Review_Text: This dress is gorgeous and unique. Yes, as reported it is super low cut. A small little hook helps a little but to pull this off I wore a blank bandeau top that worked well . I little big on me but I am not sure I could have sized down.

links_Review_Title: Look carefully at photos- this is a more formal, very low cut dress
links_Review_Text: Beautiful colors and detail - style much more formal than playful design

links_Review_Title: Way too big and gapes at the chest
links_Review_Text: This dress might work on someone with a longer torso but it did not fit me. The length from shoulder to waist was huge. But then the waist was tight so sizing down wouldn't have helped. Other reviewers mentioned how revealing this dress is in the bust, and I was prepared to wear a camisole, but there was so solution to how wide and long the top for this dress was. Gorgeous fabric. On the right body this could be beautiful.
I wish I could keep this dress! It's a really interesting print in person and the cute is very flattering on someone small chested. Love it.
Way too low cut

links_Review_Title: Tight on the arms and shoulders.
links_Review_Text: Couldn't wear it - super tight arms/shoulders and crazy deep V. So much boob.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress, just too low cut
links_Review_Text: I was unable to wear this dress even though I loved it. It is very, very low cut and would not be appropriate for work or even a party (in my opinion!)
I loved this dress and the deep cut. It was sexy and elegant for the charity event I attended! Highly recommend.

I loved the full-length but peek of my shoes & pedi; I wore this to a black tie beach wedding so the colors were coastal but blended with the formal feel; the pockets are fantastic!; the different fabrics leads to the classic RTR problem of tough zipper at the transition. The bottom fabric was a bit heavy but I was warm! One shoulder was normal/loose while my other was pretty tight and left a mark! BC of this, I sized up from 2 to the 4. Maybe I'm that lopsided personally, who knows. I was able to pick up my rental at the DC location a few hours earlier than instructed and returns were a breeze. I have a very small waist but large chest/hips so this silhouette was really flattering and comfortable. I recommend!

The dress is gorgeous and I felt great in it! The straps are definitely long and I needed to tie them together on the back, but once I did that it fit perfect and I didn't need to wear a bra. I would have gotten a 14R if it were available but they only had a long. With 3inch heels it was totally fine!

links_Review_Title: Tight fit but does looks lovely!
links_Review_Text: Any dress with pockets is great, and the top is tight enough that you don't need a bra, but didn't like how the dress looks wider in pictures because of the stripes if you have hips. Overall did the job though and was happy with the dress.

I loved this dress! I was able to wear it without a bra and it fit perfectly. It was chilly out so the pockets were nice to keep my hands warm. The high low cut made it easier to walk in than a floor length gown.

Very comfortable, flattering dress. Loved the pockets! I'm 5'7", 155lbs. Measurements are bust 34, waist 28, hips 41. It was only a tad large in the bust. I wore flat boots with it and the back just barely brushed the floor.

Beautiful dress and well constructed (didn't need to wear a bra and I'm a 34C). I'm 6'1 and 146 lbs so rented 6L and 4L - wound up wearing the 4L even though it was very tight. Felt amazing all night - never worried about adjusting etc.
Dress was a little loose on top but tape helped. Otherwise fit and looked great. Lots of compliments at my work party. Felt great and was super comfortable. Love the pockets of course!
Loved this fit! Would definitely rent again.

Same as several other reviews, just toooo large up top for smaller chested gals. Fit perfect from the waist down, but the top was so big and not even in the chest but the straps! End solution was a lot of fashion tape! Beautiful for a winter country club wedding

Wore this to a black-tie optional wedding in Texas in November. Fit true to size but the straps were a bit loose. The neck line was much lower than expected. Better to go braless! I kept fidgeting trying to make sure I wasn't TOO exposed and used sticky tape to secure (that didn't help). Otherwise the dress was AMAZING! So comfortable and very flattering!
Dress fit very well. Top was a little loose but there were no accidents. Best part is that it has pockets!

I got compliments on this dress all night, it fit my body type really well, if you're not feeling your hips this cut is perfect! Probably would have gone with the 0Petite had it been available, but the Regular length wasn't too bad with ~4inch heels (I'm 5'2"). As other reviewers mention the straps are too long and non-adjustable. I tacked mine to fit me with a few pieces of thread. Used sticky tape for the triangles at the front just to feel more secure. Would rent again!

If I could wear this dress 100x I would. I received so many compliments and it fit my body type perfectly. I didn't wear a bra and my cleavage was appropriate for a wedding, but still made me feel sexy. This was actually a last minute dress when my original dress wasn't available two days before my event and I guess everything happens for a reason. RENT THIS DRESS!!
The fit was loose in the bust while tight around the waist. I had to make the straps smaller so I wouldn't be exposed. I am normally a 6 but RTR suggested an 8. It was a good seize besides the straps
Beautiful dress. Got loads of compliments, loved the pockets. It for my body shape really well. As previous reviews stated the straps were very long and I had to pin them.

Loved the fit of this dress. I am 5'10" so the long was perfect. I am glad I ordered a size smaller than I originally thought as the top is just a touch big. Loved the pockets, quality and received many compliments on the dress!

The top portion was way big, the straps just fell right off. I used a safety pin and pinned them behind my neck together and then it was perfect. The pockets were great, especially for photos and chapstick.
The dress is great & has pockets!! My order this time shipped in a box.. dress came wrinkled luckily i had enough time before the event to have it dry cleaned!

I loved wearing this dress and got so many compliments! It is very fitted at the top and around the rib cage, which worked well as I am smaller on top. And the high low was perfect for my height. Overall great dress and definitely recommend!
Wore this dress to a symphony gala. It was so comfortable and I had people coming up to me throughout the evening tlingme how much they loved the dress. Rent it!

The dress is beautiful and comfortable and the pockets make it even more amazing. A 2P would have been my ideal size but the 0L was the only option available. With that being said, I needed help zipping it up all the way and it was a tad long for me being 5'1" but, I made it work wearing 4" heels. Tons of compliments all night long. LOVED THIS DRESS!
Such a fun dress and received so many compliments. It was tight to zip up if you have larger breasts but overall the size is right for the other areas. And, it has pockets!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress that was fun to wear!
links_Review_Text: This dress fit well for my body type, I'm slimmer (and small chested) on top and wider through the hips and butt. I just had to wear a little boob-tape to keep the top in place. Loved the pockets!

This dress was perfect for the wedding! So many compliments! Only complaint was that the straps are WAY TO LONG so we had to make a stop at a fabric shop for me to buy some ribbon to tie it together. But loved this dress!

Loved the colors on this dress! Much more soft pink/silver than the picture shows. I agree with other reviewers, straps are very long, I was prepared for it but definitely had to adjust them. Dress came with some pretty deep wrinkles but they flattened out easily. It had obviously been well worn and there were a few very small holes, but thankfully they were not noticeable unless you were up close. I have a narrow rib cage but did find that the dress was very narrow around the chest, it fit but was snug, especially for being more roomy everywhere else. Overall a fun party dress for a formal wedding

This dress is more stunning in person, the photos simply don’t do it justice. I’m between a 4-6 and I wore a 4. The 6 was too large for my chest. Otherwise the 6 fit nicely. 5’3, 133lbs, 34 D. Fit like it was made for me. Definitely a dress with cleavage. Received so many compliments and felt amazing all night.

links_Review_Title: Great for black tie optional wedding
links_Review_Text: I first chose the 2R thinking that would be perfect. When I tried it on, I didn't love it. Fit fine, but couldn't figure it out. I then tried my second size on, 0L, and that fit perfect. Perfect length, comfortable and eye catching. No adjustable straps but wasn't a problem. Recommend.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful black tie wedding at an antique boat museum
links_Review_Text: I wear a size 12 in most brands I wear everyday (Target, Loft, Gap) but have found that if I want to breathe in designer dresses I wear a 14. This dress fit perfectly everywhere except the straps. They were too long and had to be clipped together into a racerback style. The dress grazed the floor without heels but didn't look bad with heels on because of the high low skirt.

links_Review_Title: The dress was perfect! It was so comfortable and people were complimenting me all night.
links_Review_Text: Fit was great, too was a little big
Super fun, easy to wear. Dresses that have pockets are a revelation! The chest is a little low/revealing but workable. I received so many compliments. Would wear again in a heartbeat.

I was 12 weeks pregnant when wearing this dress a black-tie optional August wedding, and I wish I had a larger size because the waistband was a bit tight. However, if you're short waisted, expect the top to be a little low because the straps aren't adjustable. Otherwise, great and beautiful dress.

Both the 4 and the 6 fit but the chest area in the 4 felt more secure so I went with that. True to size if a thicker torso or large chest but size down if thinner torso or smaller chest. I got tons of compliments, but unfortunately another girl at the wedding had the same dress on! :-( Not what you hope to have happen. But either way, it was a blast to dance in and I loved the dress. Has lines of metallic tan/gold, silver, light pink, black/gray, and base is cream. Goes great with anything!!

Fits like a glove! It was a tad tight in the stomach area but I received so many compliments! So comfortable and elegant! I'm 5'5, 118 lbs and 34d. I originally thought 0 would fit but 2 was the best fit! Highly recommend!

links_Review_Title: Very comfortable and long enough for me!
links_Review_Text: I was sad to send this dress back! I have long legs and this was perfectly long even with a slight heel. I don't have a large chest so I used a strapless bra and fashion tape to keep it in place. It has pockets but doesn't make you look wide. I got compliments all night. Highly recommend.

It was a lovely dress and the material felt very durable, but it was loose in the bust area and the straps were really long. If I crouched over I'd probably flash everyone. I sent it back without wearing it out in public

links_Review_Title: Finally a long dress for average-height women!
links_Review_Text: I loved this dress! It was fun for a formal attire summer wedding. I think it could be dressed up or down. I loved the length of this dress! Im 5'4", so it's often tough to find long dresses that I'm not tripping over. This one was perfect! The dress is form fitting around the ribs, but below that it flows.

links_Review_Title: Many compliments on a unique dress that wasn't too over the top!
links_Review_Text: The straps were much too long, but I simply pinned them together in the back to create an "x". I wore my hair down which covered the pin well enough for me. Pinning the straps also brought the deep V up a little bit, which I personally found the additional coverage to be more in my comfort zone. Very comfortable fit to wear the dress for several hours at a black-tie event.

I LOVED this dress. It was comfortable, no bra needed thanks to the fabric, great length, colors to pair with lots of shoes/partner outfits and POCKETS. I felt cute yet sexy and was comfortable all night. Can dress up but doesn't have to be super formal.

I wore the 0L because the regular wasn't available. I'm 5'5" and it was a little long with heels but not bad. The straps were a bit long so i wore fashion tape to keep it secure but I absolutely loved this dress!! Perfect for a formal event
This dress is so stunning! Bright color that can be worn on or off the shoulder. This picture does it no justice I wore it on a sunny day and felt full of life.

The dress is flowy and loose but fitted in all the right places. I wore it on our vacation in Spain and a tourist asked if he could take a photo with me lol. SO gorgeous, I'm thinking about purchasing. You can't go wrong with Nicholas.
Not my style but fit well and when paired with the right accessories- it just works!

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous color, felt like Stevie Nicks
links_Review_Text: This dress is comfortable, beautiful and great for fall. Highly recommend.

links_Review_Title: Floating in a sea of orange
links_Review_Text: Loved the dress. Tried to pull it off during the winter which was a bad choice. I was freezing but I looked cute. Need to wear a strapless bra with this one. The elastic on the arms is a little tight and kinda dug into my skin. But the color was delightful and I enjoyed it.

I wore this for brunch the day after our wedding, to breakfast and around the resort from on our honeymoon, and on the plane traveling back home. It was perfect for all of the occasions and perfect for a cool to warm day. Fun option to go on or off the shoulder.

links_Review_Title: BEST RENTAL. The most gorgeous orange for many occasions
links_Review_Text: This dress is made of a heavy cotton material that surprisingly flows like water and hugs all the right spots in spite of its weight. I wore this dress for a Morning safari, a mid day shrine visit , and a late night wedding party - it it THAT versatile in terms of on shoulder conservative or off shoulder fun . I can not recommend this dress more

links_Review_Title: Wore this dress in the city and the desert.
links_Review_Text: Took this dress on a business trip to NYC and wore it for Sunday brunch back home in Phoenix. So easy to throw on. Both the 12 and 14 looked good on me, so I wore them both! The fabric traveled well.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress, felt like a goddess
links_Review_Text: It's really a great dress for photoshoots, social occasions, and the summer/fall seasons. It's just a beautiful dress.

this is a great between season dress; i listened to reviewers and sized down and i'm glad, it's stretchy and can be worn off shoulder or not. i wore it on the shoulder since the off looked weird. if you do wear it on shoulder it's pretty wide so you definitely have to wear a strapless bra. all in all cute dress and great color for fall.
Fabric was different than I expected but I adored the dress. It's more of a linen like material rather than a traditional sun dress. The ruffles of the fabric are beautiful and striking.

links_Review_Title: Cute summer dress, but doesn't look like the picture
links_Review_Text: This dress is much more casual in real life than it looks in the RTR photo. It's not shiny at all, it's washed down linen beachy fabric/vibe. Also a lot of the praying from the RTR photo has fallen out. Definitely runs big especially, in the top. Does not follow normal Nicolas sizing. I have about an 1 1/2" safety pined out on either side of the neckline. All that being said, I definitely recommend for and easy summer beachy dress

Rent this if you want a effortless dress that will make you feel like a sun goddess! Did run big so get a size smaller if it's available. For me the size smaller wasn't available but this is the kind dress where you can make it work.

Obsessed. If it wasn't a $670 peasant dress, I'd buy this in a heartbeat. The high quality linen was flowy but not flimsy. The neckline is sexy, but not inappropriate. There are some lovely details on the sleeves that help elevate this dress. People kept complimenting the dress but also me--not even the dress!--as if the dress had magical powers that also made my skin glowy and my hair unfrizzy. I almost believe it does.

Cute dress! I love the bright pop of orange and it's flattering on many skin tones - including my very fair skin with red undertones. It is a little baggy in the chest area which I was surprised by since i have a larger chest. Wore this to work on my birthday and out to dinner and it was a great summer day to evening look. Can be dressed up or down!

links_Review_Title: An absolutely stunning and comfy dress
links_Review_Text: Got this dress because I love the vibrant colour and boho look for everyday, weekend casual wear and I was NOT disappointed. It's flowy, flattering, the colour is gorgeous and the off-the-shoulder style emphasizes my cute shoulders and collarbone. Would recommend for the curvy girl (I'm pear-shaped and this emphasized my shape without being tight).
It was super comfy. Would wear again but it's larger than I expected. I would do a size smaller next time

I loved this dress! It was comfy, looked great and could be dressed up or dressed down. The color was awesome. I wore it to work and also on the weekend when it was off the shoulder. It did feel a little big, usually I wear a 10 or 12 but I think honestly the 10 would have been too small. Really recommend!

I got this dress from the Georgetown location and all the girls there are so nice- they loved this dress on me- it was a size too big, but it was the only one they had. I should have gone down a size but it still worked. It was heavy material but didn't drag. It worked all day walking the city even on the plane across country and home. I wore it with a long army green jacket and combat boots. Sooo comfortable. The guy at TSA complimented me on my outfit!
Just threw on this dress, which is a bold color and didn't have to accessorize much to make a statement.
It's nice and well made dress but the overall design feels very matronly for me.

links_Review_Title: Such a fun color - I received a lot of positive comments!
links_Review_Text: I can see how some say it's slightly larger because of the fit in the sleeves, but I actually liked that aspect of the fit!

links_Review_Title: This dress looks simple but grabs so much attention. I wore it to my birthday celebration.
links_Review_Text: Great daytime dress for the spring.

Lovely piece. Fit was perfect. Color is a beautiful pale orange. Material a tad heavier than anticipated. Ideal for a spring day. I wore on the first 75 degree day we've had in NY and was comfortable in the shade but quite hot in the sun.

I had so many people compliment this dress - the color was gorgeous, the fit was flattering, and It ended up being more comfortable than I thought it would be! I'm 5'3" and length was perfect. Can be worn off the shoulders or not.
I love this dress. Super comfortable and the perfect weight for spring in California, which is typically in the 70s. I'm pretty small chested, so it was a little loose there, but overall fit great.

links_Review_Title: Great color, but runs big up top.
links_Review_Text: I was so looking forward to this dress, but didn't wear it because it is way too generous in sizing and fabric, especially in bust and shoulders. The style is super cute and the color is wonderful. It would be a nice daily stunner if it only fit. May try again with smaller size. FYI - the fabric is on the heavy side and a bit wrinkled. Not a gauzy feel that I expected.

Loved this flowy pleated flattering dress. Super comfy material and cut with sexy neckline. (I wore a strapless bra because it slipped off shoulders which I liked) I felt like a fire nymph. Perfect RTR dress - tried something completely new and loved it.

I'm in LOVE with this dreamy dress! I rented it for a day of wine tasting with my boyfriend and I received compliments all day long because the bright orange hue just makes people happy. The fabric is lightweight and breathable and the neckline is super flattering, although the sleeves tend to slip down sometimes (I just went with it and kept it off the shoulder for part of the day). The elastic waist is comfy and the midi length was perfect on my 5'9" frame. This dress is great for gals with curves (I have wide hips and wear a D cup) and is effortlessly chic. I would definitely rent it again and again!

I had to use fashion tape to keep the sleeves on my shoulders. I couldn't tell if it was meant to be off the shoulder, but that made me look frumpy. Love the quality of the fabric. Definitely had a "Swiss maid" feel, but I was into it.

links_Review_Title: I don't want to send it back...ever
links_Review_Text: I love this dress. There are no cons. It is comfy, flattering, and just gorgeous. I couldn't wait to wear it win it came out of the bag and it will be worn a couple more times before I part with it. It is just so gorgeous.

The night before my best friends bridal shower, I popped into the RTR store and this was the only dress in my size. How lucky was I :) The Orange is stunning - I got so many compliments.i definitely could have sized down. The waist is very stretchy. Overall beautiful, comfy & POCKETS. Highly recommend! x
Plenty of room to size down if needed, very comfortable! The linen is beautiful and feels light. The pockets are a perfect addition to this dress
Wish the waist was a little lower but love the color and feel!!
Fit was larger than I expected-- I wear a 4 and could've done a 2. I wore it to work and to thanksgiving dinner. It is very comfortable and the color is vibrant

links_Review_Title: I did not wear this dress
links_Review_Text: Very large all around. I am narrow and I think this would be better for someone with more curves. Beautiful color though.
Color was great - fit was overall a bit large and I could have probably sized down. Regardless, really liked the dress!
Gorgeous dress, shoulders fall down a lot.

My husband and I both burst out laughing together when I tried this one on. I looked like a character in a children's play. Maybe it was just the wrong choice for me, because it looked really cute on others.

This dress is a dress from heaven. The fit is amazing, and the fabric has a beautiful flow to it. Color is great, and the sleeves can be work normally or off the shoulder. 100% would have purchased if it weren't so dang expensive- will definitely rent again!

Wanted something fun that I could wear to work to spruce up plain pieces and that could transition well to all my work holiday parties. Only complaint: this I NOT lined, insane for a designer of this caliber, so it's a little see through on the white panels. Being thin and unlined, it was also not a good weight winter. Sizing wise: fits true to form, borderline small in the waist because there is absolutely no give. I'm a 25.5-26" waist with 38-39" hips, so this is a good cut for me.

links_Review_Title: Perfect power skirt for work. Fun and bold fabric
links_Review_Text: Such a gorgeous and unique print. Runs a bit small so I would size up. Definitely a statement skirt but easy to pair with black top and boots.
This runs VERY small. I usually wear a 6 and got a 10. I wore it high near my rib cage and it was fine. I got tons of compliments and its so easy to dress up or down. Will definitely rent again.
Wish I could keep this beautiful skirt! Comfortable, goes with a lot and got tons of compliments. Rent it!
This skirt is so on trend. With the mixed prints, it was casual & dressy enough for work at the same time. Paired it with a black T-shirt & sneakers! So comfy!

Read the reviews and ordered two sizes up and everyone was right! There is 0 stretch in this waistband and it runs small so sizing up is essential but once you do - YOU WILL BE SO GLAD! Such a fun skirt, I really loved wearing it. Great for so many occasions, I wore to work and would absolutely rent again.

Wore this to work and got A TON of compliments! The skirt moves beautifully when you walk! It was longer on my 5’2 stature than the model shown, it came about to my ankles. I typically need to order a size 14 in these high waisted styles and am pictured wearing a 48R and it was really tight at the waist as some other reviews commented. The waistband has no stretch. Would order again is they offered a size 50R.

This skirt is extremely well-made and fun to wear. As far as the sizing is concerned the skirt is very full. However, the waistband has zero stretch and runs very small. Keep this in mind when she's in a size.
Loved this. I received so many compliments. The waste was tight. So size up a size.
no stretch in the waist so if in-between sizes go up. wore it to work and also on the weekend. comfortable and light. bold fun pattern but can be dressed up for work.
The texture was amazing and looks very professional.
The waist band is a little too tight but the skirt is gorgeous. Had it not been still so expensive with the discount, I would've bought it

links_Review_Title: Such a lovely skirt too bad it runs too small

links_Review_Text: Waist about one inch too small. Very pretty panels of fabric, interesting combination. I wish I could have worn it!
I sized up but it was still too tight - will definitely retention in a bigger size though bc the skirt is beautiful
So colorful. And lovely.

This skirt is even prettier and more unique in person. The fit was perfect. It sat at my waist and I didn't have any issues with it being too tight or too large. The skirt has a beautiful flowy vibe to it. Would rent again.

The skirt is beautiful and so well made. I wore it to work, but was pretty uncomfortable with the waistband. I have a pretty small waist and rib-cage, and even with sizing up it was tight! The band has absolutely no give. The skirt is also slightly see-through... but not enough to really show anything. Wouldn't rent again but was good for a day
This skirt gets a lot of compliments. The prints are pretty over the top. Wear it on a bold day!

Following other reviewers I sized up one and it was not enough. I could not zip it up. I would rent again because the pattern and style are lovely but I would say that unless you have a small waist you need to go up at least two size.

links_Review_Title: So cute. Got complimented on the street for this piece. I loved it!
links_Review_Text: Ran a little small, but other than that no negatives!
Admittedly, I had baby 2 just four months ago but I'm generally in an 8 and moving to a 6. But a 10 in this was just painfully small.
Print is fire
This skirt is very pretty and very see through. The waist band has zero stretch and is not true to size.

So this skirt is prettier in person but the description says "elastic waist band" and there is definitely no elasticity about this waistband. I am usually anywhere from a 27-29 size jean depending on the designer and wasn't sure if I should get the 44 or 46, but sized down after reading the above. Well, it barely zipped up and was uncomfortable, so sadly I was not able to wear it. The waist is definitely fitted, so don't think otherwise!
I loved the dressed so much! It fit great and I got so many compliments

links_Review_Title: I received so many compliments.After putting a spank on I probably could have worn the 10
Great Dress! Comfortable and easy to wear!

links_Review_Text: My boyfriend is not a big fan of my fashion choices for the most part. But this body hugging dress with asymmetrical shoulder and small slit drove him wild. Would highly recommend if you want to show off your assets in a tasteful way.
This dress is gorgeous and I got tons of compliments, even from the bride herself (one of my best friends). It fit snug but was a really comfortable, stretchy fabric. I highly suggest this dress!

links_Review_Title: Great cut showed off my curves!
links_Review_Text: This dress is amazing! Great color and it showed off my silhouette so nicely. Many compliments. Super comfy. Only thing I will say is that it will show next to everything because it's so form fitting. I would suggest wearing a shaper if you're not super comfortable with everything being shown. But it was still a great dress!
It felt a little tight on the top, but it is a problem with my body, not with the dress. I recommend the dress to women with small busts.
Quality material, very comfortable. I didn't have to wear any type of shapewear under garment the material of the dress held everything in.

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous color, perfect fit, best rental so far
links_Review_Text: Hugged my curves, easy to wear, danced in it without riding up, loved the length, was not a vibrant orange like pictured, it was more of a beautiful apricot but still gorgeous
I loved everything about this dress, color off the shoulder and fit. It was perfect for my wedding in Charleston last weekend
Fit great, sleeve on shoulder was a little constricting but didn't feel like I was raising my arms regularly so it wasn't an issue
The color isn't bright but is still nice and unique making you stand out. The fit is great and really accentuates curves.
Loved everything about this dress #awesomecolor #curves #legs #sexy

I absolutely loved wearing this dress! It was super comfortable and easy to dance in. The top of the 4 fit perfectly and I was able to wear a strapless bra. I have narrow hips so I had a little extra room in the bottom but it still looked great. The color is very unique and I got tons of compliments all night. Highly recommend!
I was worried about color but it was a great choice. A little snug in the bust area (couldn't do a bra only pasties) . Recommend!

links_Review_Title: I came back from London directly to the wedding, I literally had 15 min to get ready. RTR was there
links_Review_Text: It's a classy and comfortable dress, it fits perfectly, I wish there were more colors available because I'd totally wear it again. De detail on the shoulder gives a classy look and the open leg it's sexy but just right. So perfectly fine to wear at a work event or any party.

Wore dress to a late-summer wedding and the color was perfect for the occasion! Lots of compliments and it was pretty comfortable, too. Some reviews said the material wrinkled easily, but I didn't find that to be the case. Definitely recommend!
This dress fit perfectly and got loads of compliments all night.

links_Review_Title: Nowhere else can I find such a nice dress at such a good deal! I would definitely do this again!
links_Review_Text: Nice fabric, the orange is like a sorbet shade so it made me look a bit pale. Loved the asymmetrical necklines. Elegant length. Got a bit tight at the slit when I sat. Overall very pleased though!

I wore this dress to a summer wedding and thought it was really pretty! I loved the orange color (go Vols!) and the one shoulder design. I ended up wearing the size 2, and I didn't even try on the size 0 I rented. The 2 fit great, but I did wear Spanx since it's a form-fitting dress. For reference, I'm 5'4", 115lbs, with an athletic/curvier shape. I received many compliments through the night and would definitely recommend this dress!!

links_Review_Title: The perfect dress for a summer wedding!
links_Review_Text: Beautiful orange color for a summer wedding, Tons of compliments in this dress, fit like a glove, great quality, comfortable fabric. Would get this dress time and time again if it came in other colors. Highly recommend!

links_Review_Title: I loved the dress style and color
links_Review_Text: I usually wear a 6 and I am glad I went up a size as the 6 was a little too tight for me.
Great fit
The color is like a papaya/mango. The fit was amazing and so flattering.

links_Review_Title: I got sooo many compliments! Amazing dress!!
links_Review_Text: It is more orange than it looks in the pictures, more of a sherbert color. Very beautiful!
The fabric was forgiving, which I wanted since I'm 4 months post baby and body isn't back where it was. The slit is sexy and love the shoulder detail. The color really popped

This was my first RTR and I was blown away. Everyone at the wedding was so complimentary, I didn't want to give it back. I typically am a size 4 but went with the 6 because I am a 34D and it fit more comfortably. I am 5'1 and was worried it would look too long but I thought the length was perfect. I loved the side slit. I already rented another Likely brand dress for this coming weekend. Will definitely rent again.
I expected the color to be more mango than orange, but it was still very flattering. Loved it!
This dress was super comfortable! Received many compliments. Highly recommend!

I am obsessed with this dress. The creamsicle/organge sherbet color is so pretty! I typically wear a size 8, but after reading the reviews, decided to go up a size and I'm glad I did. The fabric was thick enough you couldn't see through it and had enough "give" to be forgiving. I did wear spanx so I had smooth lines since the dress was fitted. I received so many compliments on this dress. I will definitely rent this dress again!

links_Review_Title: 'Orange' you glad you rented this dress? YES!!!
links_Review_Text: This dress was perfect for a Summer wedding. Comfortable, chic and great with a tan. It did get a little wrinkly after sitting which was a bummer but to be expected with this material. I almost wore the 4 as it fit better in the hips but the bust was too tight so I went with the 6 instead.
Loved this dress! Color was perfect and it fit like a glove. Super comfy! #wedding

links_Review_Title: Tons of compliments and a unique color!
links_Review_Text: I rented a size 6 and 8. I could fit in the 6 but felt more comfortable in the 8. The fabric was a little loose around my hips but honestly I don't know how I would have managed going to the bathroom in the 6. I'm small chested and the top was snug so might not work well for busty gals.
Best dress ever. Obsessed. It was perfect

links_Review_Title: SO many compliments on this dress!
links_Review_Text: Really loved the color and fit of the dress. You will most likely need to use nude undergarments or spanx. I will say if you sweat easily like I do I would not recommend wearing it for a partially outdoor event. You could see some of my sweat seeping through under arm/under boob area but overall a great dress for a great price!

This dress is amazing ! I rented for the Beatles LOVE show and it was the perfect choice. The color is beautiful and the one-shoulder part is so flattering and unique. It is definitely fitted but very comfortable. Would 100% rent again!

I loved everything about this dress!! Absolutely perfect for an early summer wedding. Based on reviews and other dresses by Likely, I was afraid it would run really small, so I ordered one and two sizes up from usual. One size up was pretty perfect- if anything, actually a little bit big on top! But not so much that it was annoying or a problem. I felt amazing in this dress and got TONS of compliments! Highly recommend!

links_Review_Title: Favorite dress I've worn so far.
links_Review_Text: So easy to wear, molds to the body and amazing color. Would recommend a pair of spanx just to even out minor lines, otherwise, the fabric is thick enough you most likely won't have to.

links_Review_Title: How quick it got to me and there were no issues at all.
links_Review_Text: The fit was amazing. Fit true to size

I loved this dress! It's form fitting but has some stretch to the fabric so it isn't uncomfortably tight. I felt sexy without showing too much skin. Highly recommended for a fun night or a fancy dinner
I rented this for a hot climate vacation. The dress fit really well because of the ruching on top. The material wasn't too light or too heavy, and the lining really helped.
I loved this so much more than I thought I would! I wore it to a Maggie Rogers concert, a weekend in Palm Springs, and to work! I'm glad i sized up. Really comfy and cute!
The fit and length are perfect on me! I love the print and colors too. Got lots of compliments on this one!!
The dresses, both sizes, came super wrinkled and a bit well worn. But, both fit. The large was a little more roomie. I recommend this dress for everyday wear.

I normally wear a 2 and the band on this dress sat a little too high/tight with the XS so I returned it for the Small, which fit perfectly. It's stretchy on top, so I'd go up 1 size if in-between. The pattern is gorgeous and it's easy to wear (regular bra, not tight around your stomach). Very eye catching and traveled well without wrinkling.
pretty tight around the rib cage but an overall great everyday piece and can dress up if you want to!

links_Review_Title: Somewhat mixed feelings about this one.
links_Review_Text: It fits perfectly, but is looking a little worn. It will be fine for a casual vacation in the South Pacific where color and floral rule fashion. Sort of "meh" about this one.
The colors are just ok, but the dress is very wearable for summer and flattering. Has pockets :-)

Pretty print and comfortable dress. I brought it on a beach vacation with me and it was easy to pack and wrinkle resistant. Dress is very casual, I think it would be hard to dress up for a special occasion but for casual affairs it is great. The smocking is high waisted, I have a long torso so it wasn’t the most flattering cut but was so comfortable I would rent again.
A great summer dress. Really fun and eye-catching pattern. Good fit - comfortable. Highly recommend.

A great dress for that in between phase of pregnancy. Not comfortable in normal clothes but not yet ready for true maternity. I'm tall and it fit very well and was nice and lightweight for summer. I dressed down for a backyard BBQ but could easily be worn with fancier hair/shoes/jewelry to an afternoon outdoor wedding.
Super cute and easy dress to pull and it worked for the office, casual and more. I liked the midi length on me.

links_Review_Title: Super cute, comfortable dress. I love it!
links_Review_Text: Size up.

This dress is to die! The material is thick but still sketchy, it really holds in bloat well. I carry most of my weight on my lower half, and this dress was stretchy enough to fit snug up top but also fit over my butt (lol). The only draw back is that it is a little hard to walk in. Got tons of compliments all night!

Loved wearing this dress! Fit like a glove (I am usually a size 4 and the 8R fit as per their recommendation). The color is a very nice burnt orange, the straps fit fine- saw some reviews that complained about the straps but they're meant to be crossed at the back and fit just right. The only thing is, is that it was difficult to go up stairs with the tightness at the bottom and couldn't dance around as much as I wanted (but did just fine!). Lots of compliments and I felt fantastic in it!

Look at size chart. I typically wear a 4 or 5. I rented the 8R with 10 as a backup. 8 fit fine but dress shows everything so have the support ready if you use that (I did). Length was fine with heels. Beautiful color and material. I’m 5’1, 125lbs
The structure of this dress made it feel and look so sleek! It was a bit tight, but felt better that way in my opinion. Definitely would rent again!

Everyone seems confused by the European sizing. It's just two sizes up from your normal size! I wore a 12 which is a US 8. I'm normally a 6 or 8 so maybe runs a smidge small. Beautiful dress, flattering color, maybe a bit hard to dance in because of the shape. Got tons of compliments! Don't hesitate on this one!

Fit like a glove! Material is form fitting and has a little bit of stretch. I'm typically a size 0 or sometimes size 2 because of my hips so for this, I ended up going with the 8R. The color was like a burnt orange/terracotta and perfect for a wedding or formal affair! Very comfortable but needed a little help for stairs.

This color was gorgeous for a fall wedding. The fit was amazing and flattering for an hourglass figure. I felt so sexy and confident! I'm usually a size 4, but I ended up wearing the 8R. It was still skin tight and a little short even with flats (I'm 5'9"). I would try a 10L next time so I have room for the buffet!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress and most importantly very comfy!
links_Review_Text: This dress was so comfortable to wear. It's made from a stretchy material but thick enough to not feel exposed. It is beautiful and perfect for a fall wedding! I'm usually between and XS or S and had to get the 6R for this.

links_Review_Title: The dress was AMAZING! Fits like a glove and shows your figure in a sophisticated way.
links_Review_Text: It was great
Thick , luscious, fall colors

links_Review_Title: In theory this dress is super cute but it is so unforgiving
links_Review_Text: I loved the shape (esp the flared bottom) of this dress and even the color (perfect for fall) but this dress will show every lump and bump of your body. Shapewear MAY help, but as my mom put it "even your triangle" is showing. Wear at your own risk or wear two sets of spanx. Would have loved to wear it but didn't feel like being self conscious the whole night.
Beautiful dress that definitely runs small so go one size up. Material is a thick stretchy fabric. Loved this dress for wedding/formal event
Ordered for daughter to wear at her friend wedding and it worked out perfectly

Beautiful color and shape, but echo other reviewers who note that it runs small - I tried on the 6R as the only size available, and will wait to wear it out in public until I can get the 8R. Will work best for people who are comfortable with their bodies being fully on display!

Sadly, did not get a photo in this dress, but absolutely loved it! So comfortable, and got many compliments throughout the night. Some of the reviews said it ran small, so I sized up but could have probably gone with the 8. This dress is not US sizes, so with that in mind, I think it was TTS (I am usually a 4 US size)
I never wore this dress. Tried it on and it was very plain. Not suitable for fuller bust girls unless you have perky breast.

links_Review_Title: I did not end up wearing.
