links_Review_Text: This was waaay too long, the mermaid tail part was on the floor. I suggest this for someone who is much taller.

I did not wear this because the 4R was too tight. I usually wear a size 0 but I would hesitantly try this dress in a larger size. The color was a beautiful burnt orange and the shape is gorgeous, but it is super restrictive to walk in.

links_Review_Title: Very pretty for a fall wedding
links_Review_Text: comfortable but runs small. I am usually a 4-6 in dresses and 2-4 in pants. the 8 fit perfectly.

The fabric is fairly stretchy, but if you don't like you clothes skin-tight, I would size up. The length in the photos appears to be a little shorter than what I experienced, which is good. I'm about 5'7" and it hit at my lower ankle. The color truly looks like pumpkin spice! Not a huge fan of the straps. They make the dress look a little cheap.

I thought this was a tomato red dress - turns out it is more of a burnt orange (description calls it brown) - which was actually perfect for my fall wedding. Thick, very stretchy material that will be great for dancing. Adjustable straps. Very long dress - hits my ankles at 5'9" so may look like a full length gown on a more petite gal.

links_Review_Title: Wore a long sleeve to transition it into the winter
Felt beautiful at the vineyards in Argentina and got so many compliments.
links_Review_Text: For someone with a size 38H bust, I didn't have to wear a bra and it held me in. Regular runs long for someone 5'3 so had to wear high heels and hold the dress up when I walked. Got so many compliments and felt so beautiful. My husband said i shined. I loved it so much I bought it and am going to get it hemmed.

links_Review_Title: Perfect fall pattern and high quality
links_Review_Text: Loved it!! Worn with a denim jacket since it was chilly out. Love how long it was and just so well made! Nicholas never disappoints! The double belt is the only thing that felt a little strange, but it was fine under the jacket.

links_Review_Title: HUGE on top and the belt was SO large it was not wearable
links_Review_Text: The dress was A size 10 which usually I could wear eight or 10 (although this one was way floppy up top) but the belt they sent with was more like a size 16. The pattern on the fabric was OK but it looked a little bit like curtains- too much of it

This dress was so comfortable and functional with the pockets! It looks and feels so well made. The double wrap belt just adds the structure the linen dress needs. I got so many compliments all night long, everyone kept asking me where it was from! I wish I could keep this dress forever!

Wore with flats only and it didn't hit the ground, I'm 5'8. Arrived dirty which was a bummer. & also seemed super worn. Light fabric. Belt has to be wrapped around 1.5-2x because it's very long. Fit a tiny bit big but overall a nice summer dress!
Loved this dress for wine tasting, so comfortable. The double wrap belt took a couple tries but it was so flattering. Got compliments all day!
Added my own belt.
The double wrap belt is a little weird but works! Length was good for me with a couple inch heels

links_Review_Title: Runs big and is super long; belt requires a PHD
links_Review_Text: This dress is lovely but I wasn't able to wear it because this size was way too big, particularly in the armpits. The material is linen and the skirt is draped and heavy with material so it floats and feels a bit magical. I'm 5-5 and would have needed to wear big heels to not have it drag on floor (just an FYI). Also, though this wasn't the reason i didn't wear it, the double belt was impossible for me to figure out. I spent a good 15 minutes trying to figure out how it make it lay properly (including googling and so forth), to no avail. Bravo to anyone that's able to master the the belt; you deserve an advanced degree. All in all, I would rent this again in a smaller size and just forgo the belt that's included altogether.

links_Review_Title: Perfect dress for glamping at a winery.
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress!! It is very broad in the shoulders (no undergarments with straps would work) and the wide straps on the dress kept falling but I definitely got one size too big when I could've gone down an entire dress size from what I normally get and think it would've been fine. Heavy linen fabric, very forgiving and just lovely!
Yes, it's a lot of fabric, yes, it's a double wrap belt, but, yes, it's amazingggg. Compliments from people walking down the street. So cute. So comfy. Linen fabric. Pockets. Love it!

links_Review_Title: 70's Sofa Glam - Fun, Flirty Floral Showstopper Sundress
links_Review_Text: This dress is 70's floral realness. I love the fit, the print (which reminds me of upholstery from a simpler time) and the double wrap around belt that highlighted my waist. Wore this to dinner for a summer patio dinner in Sonoma wine country and got compliments from strangers. Chunky floral statement necklace and earrings really set it off. The material is a bit stiff and has no stretch, so try to order as close to your true size as possible.

Loved this flowery, summery maxi dress. Wore it for a rooftop bar night with some friends. It does run small through the ribcage/chest. I'm pretty small up top (larger through the hips) and could barely get it zipped. Also the belt wraps around twice which is a bit awkward with the belt loops and stiffness of the belt (it has to cross over itself in the back). But the dress is fantastic enough to overlook these faults (and way out of my budget so glad it's available for rental!)

links_Review_Title: A LOT of dress but very high quality
links_Review_Text: This dress is LONG & there is a lot of it. I recommend sizing down 1 size & investing in some flatform sandals. The linen is super high quality & the print is gorgeous. There's just so much of it haha. 4 stars. More on @thanksitsrtr
I think the title speaks for itself.

links_Review_Title: Obsessed! but warning-not for the short & petite
links_Review_Text: From the waist up, this dress is perfect. Love the color, fit (I always size up in Nicholas because of my bust), the belt wraps twice and fit on the tightest hole. But beware: this dress is super long and full at the bottom. I'm wearing 3-4" wedges and at 5-6" it's barely off the ground. This plus the fullness makes stairs a little tricky (fearing a J-law moment). If I owned I would definitely hem and take out at least 2" each side on the bottom width.

I loved the picture of this dress with the matching belt but did not notice that in the picture the belt wraps around twice. The belt is very thick so it ends up sitting at an angle so it can cross over. Poor design choice when you could have just made a regular belt. Also this dress is quite long. I'm 5'9" and it hits the floor. Otherwise it is a nice linen fabric

links_Review_Title: It is a beautiful dress and I love the style
links_Review_Text: It is made big, the belt was 20 sizes too larget for the dress, and I couldn't wear the dress for long.

links_Review_Title: Love this dress so much that I bought it
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress so much I ended up finding it on another site and purchased! The zipper is super tough though (even with the one I bought) so need 2-3 people to help zip, no joke. But it's adorable!
REALLY long - ladies 5"5 and under - even with heels this is LOOOONNNGGG.

links_Review_Title: Fabric is fabulous and this dress is a head turner.
links_Review_Text: The belt was left out. I’ve rented this before and the belt wraps around twice and is a great design detail so I missed wearing it.
Too long everywhere

Fit true to size. The skirt has such great movement. I'm pretty short and a small espadrille wedge or heel was perfect with this. The double wrap belt is a little odd and def takes some playing with, but overall loved this dress!!
I am 5'2 and was able to pull this off with 4 inch wedges. It is super fun and flirty
Cute dress. Great material and length yet unfortunately the top was way too big and open. Even with a larger chest, I couldn't fill it and wasn't wearable.

I typically wear an 18 RTR, and a 16 in non-designer (Ann Taylor, etc.). This dress was too big in the 18. The underarms gapped, the waist was much too large, and the included belt ended up down around my hips. The 16 definitely would have been a better fit, but I swapped their belt for a skinny black leather belt of my own so I could cinch in the waist, and it looked great for a one-night wear, since the dress is supposed to be flowy and the excess fabric wasn't too noticeable. I'm 5'9, and it was a perfect length with 2 inch block heels. Shorter gals would need very high shoes or it would drag. The dress is linen, and has beautiful hang and movement. I wore it to a girls night at the theater, and I'd definitely rent again in a smaller size!

This was very big on me and a lot of fabric. It also is long on me and I'm 5'4. I loved the pattern. It's just a lot of dress. I'm going to try it one more time but size down to see if I'm successful. Keep you posted
Hit me at the ankles (I am 5'9)

links_Review_Title: Felt like I was wearing a circus tent
links_Review_Text: Really pretty fabric but did not wear this item. Way too much fabric. Added 20 pounds.

links_Review_Title: Tons of compliments! This is a fun statement dress for anyone who loves bright colors and florals.
links_Review_Text: A few cons - first of all, the mesh part of the dress below your knees can be itchy on the back of your thighs if you sit for a while. The mock neck looks normal on the model but it's a little stretched out and may droop. Finally, the opaque part of the dress above your knees can ride up - be sure not to accidentally flash your crotch. Overall - this dress LOOKS amazing and is fun to wear once but isn't something that I'd want in my closet for multiple events. I have no regrets though!!

I absolutely loved everything about this dress when I first laid eyes on it. When it came time to try the dress on, I knew there would need to be additional hands to help zip the back up. It was a little snug...glad that I didn't order that back-up 6. Once I got the dress on and zipped up as far as I could I noticed a very noticeable poke ie wire from your bra. So I figured that it was an easy fix, I had duct tape- I would just tape it and where it as planned... I found more in the end.

This dress is gorgeous. Although the fit was snug, I wore spanx and managed to wear it comfortably. The arms and bodice were snug on me. The see-through fabric cones up pretty high on the leg. I received many compliments on it.

links_Review_Title: I wore this dress to a wedding in Mexico City. I received so many compliments!
links_Review_Text: The dress fit true to size.

This dress is festive without being too unprofessional. I like the sheer on the skirt. Like wearing a shorter skirt without being "too short". The colors were very pretty. I got a lot of compliments. The only complaint was the wires in the bust. They made it stand out unusually. One of the wires had come loose and was poking my skin.

Got a ton of compliments. I wore the 10 to accommodate my DD's and so I could move my arms. The neckline is a bit strange - per other peoples reviews. You can actually see it in the photo. When dancing at the end of the night - the dress moved quite a bit more than I thought it would. I'd rent again.

I am truly between a 4 and a 6, last minute RTR didn't get the 6 in time to ship to me, so thankfully the 4 worked great! This is SO pretty in person. Be careful if you have really long legs, it's sheer up above the knee and when you sit down you may be able to see to your underwear. Would rent again! The neck of it kind of sits weird but nobody will notice but you!
Wore this to a formal summer wedding. It is very unique and I got a lot of compliments. Spanx were necessary!
Loved this dress.

links_Review_Title: The dress was incredible and was different from other homecoming dresses. I got TONS of compliments.
links_Review_Text: The dress fit very well and was very comfortable. It is very form fitting so those with a smaller figure will probably feel more comfortable in this dress.

links_Review_Title: ‘Creative cocktail dress’ read the invite. This worked at an annual benefit art center event.
links_Review_Text: Comfortable, form-fitting, a stand out jewel toned embroidered fabric @ a flower-themed event. Danced the night away in this, loved it. (I’m 5’7.5, 158#, 65 yo, lightly spanxed, 1st time RTR.)
This was a great option for a winter wedding. It stood out amongst the sea of black dresses. I was hesitant at first because I thought it was too busy looking but it was perfect.

I loved this dress and how beautiful and colorful it was! I felt very pretty in it and received lots of compliments:) It fit me very nicely (I'm 5'7") and the slit in the back wasn't too high (which I see was a concern for some). The only downside for me was that It was a bit scratchy, at times, in the arms. Though, this may have been due to the warm weather. Overall, I was very pleased and would highly recommend!

links_Review_Title: Buying this. It's so flattering. Beautiful.
links_Review_Text: The embroidered detail is beautiful! And it's so comfortable. It has a shape and details that are flattering around the waistline and the skirt is gorgeous.......

links_Review_Title: I've never gotten so many compliments in my life!
links_Review_Text: It is definitely form-fitting but also very flattering! I'm 5'4 and the suit did come to the bottom of my butt but I wore shorts. I've got hips and a booty and was nervous about how "straight" the dress looked but went for it anyway and loved it. The 8 was perfect, I would've liked to try a 10 as well (usually in dresses I wear a 6 so size up!). I wish I could afford to buy this and wear it EVERYWHERE. It's so cool.
Loved this beautiful dress for an Oceanside harbor wedding. The neck was a little loose and dress was a bit short for my 5 10 frame but a spanx accessory fixed that in a jif.
I loved this dress. I could've worn an 8. This was a secondary style I ordered but the colors were great. Very fun dress to wear.

This dress is very flattering. Although it looks long, the coverages is quite short for a taller lady like myself. I had to double check to make sure I wasn't flashing anyone! The fabric was a little uncomfortable, so I don't recommend this for a dance-heavy event. I went to dinner and the theater and it was lovely. I felt very pretty and I would rent this dress again!
Beautiful dress and great fit overall. Arms were a bit snug and the dress slipped up a bit when walking but other than that- fabulous!

I normally wear a size 4 .. curvy body type and it was a perfect fit! If you prefer a looser fit then I would go up a size. The fabric is on the thicker side.. I was worried it would be too hot for a summer wedding but it wasn’t at all. Beautiful dress!

this dress is so unique and attracted lots of compliments. the 2 wasn't available so i rented the zero which worked out fine. although the solid part of the dress was pretty short and i kept having to pull the dress down. i do have a very very long torso, however. i think getting the size 2 may also have helped this. overall a great dress.
This dress was so vibrant and beautiful! The only downside was the drooping neck, would have preferred it to be a bit tighter.

I did wear the 4 instead of the 2. I have a long torso and the 2 was too short, would have been high risk for a wardrobe malfunction. Was stopped probably 20 times with compliments on the dress. Super happy with it.

Loved the fit! It was pretty TTS, I have wider hips so had to be careful putting on, but once it was on it was very comfortable. The slit did come up pretty far in the back so I couldn't raise my arms all the way up! But I got soooooo many compliments on this!

links_Review_Title: Stunning and standout. Endless compliments await!
links_Review_Text: This dress is absolutely stunning in person and in photos. I wore it to a wedding and received endless compliments and had perfect strangers telling me I looked beautiful! I'm giving it 4 stars for three reasons: First, I have a lot of *assets* so the dress was a little short in the back and I found myself pulling it down fairly often. Second, the bodice has metal boning, so if you are smaller-chested the top may run large. I ended up wearing a strapless pushup bra to fill it out a little. Third, the midriff lace was right at belly-button level on me, which was a little awkward. I think this dress would be perfect for hourglass-shaped women. If you're on the fence, do yourself a favor and go for it!

I wanted to find something for a fundraiser for a non-profit (I sit on the board). I received so many compliments on the dress from men and women - colors, fabric, and the uniqueness of the design. It fit a little big - also lost about 8 pounds since I ordered the dress. Otherwise, incredibly comfortable and sexy without needing to always fidget with the hem!

I wore this dress to a Kentucky Derby watch party and got so many compliments. The fit is great. I loved the lace and mesh details. It's the perfect mix of classy and sexy. The dress really showcased my legs. #dayparty

Ok, this dress rules and is incredibly flattering. I was prepared for the black skirt above the mesh to hit short, but I had no issues. This dress will flatter anyone with a curvy shape, but I recommend getting the extra size up if you have larger arms or want some more room in the waist. I LOVED this dress!!

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous, unique dress--got tons of compliments
links_Review_Text: I was worried about the fit after reading other reviews, but to me it felt true to size. I'm 5'5", 116 lbs, 34AAA-26-34, and the size 0 was perfect. Came to an inch or so below the knee. The lined part is much shorter, as others have mentioned, but I just made sure to be careful when sitting. And you'll need help zipping it up. I got a lot of compliments and there was nothing else like this at my event! Wish I had a reason to wear it again!

links_Review_Title: This dress choice (my first with RTR) was a perfect selection for an outdoor California wedding.
links_Review_Text: I thought I might need a size 2 since dress sizes are so weird these days, but the size 4 was perfect. The dress has so many unique features and really stands out in a crowd. I received compliments starting at our hotel reception to the wedding venue, and back!
Beautiful details! The sheer bottom was flattering for my short height. It's a little big in the waist but not bad. The neckline was saggy, but was hidden by my hair.

links_Review_Title: The wedding of my dearest friend.
links_Review_Text: Fit ran a tad large, but thankfully I read other reviews and ordered a size 4 and 6 (actually wearing the 4). I was disappointed in the stretched-out neckline on both dresses, which was significantly worse on the size 6. So hid the weird neckline under a chunky statement necklace; problem solved. I loved the style, the details, the colors, the curious, the illusion sections...and it was so insanely comfortable! I was also impressed that I had full-range of motion (especially while running after a toddler during the wedding). I was able to crouch, bend, etc. easily. The other great thing about this dress is that there are so many colors in the embroidery, you can really match it with any shoe or accessory colors. I've also never received so many compliments! This dress was amazing.
Prom

links_Review_Title: Very unique style -- good statement dress!
links_Review_Text: The dress was very flattering and colorful -- definitely not the best if there will be dancing, but appropriate length if you're on the shorter side.

I loved this dress so much. I wore it to a surprise birthday party. It is very flattering and snug in all the right places. Only thing I will say is the back slit is pretty high. I ended up wearing very tight shorts underneath just in case. Other than that, amazing dress.
#Wedding

links_Review_Title: This dress knows how to party.
links_Review_Text: I took my true size - it was snug but still comfortable. It does run a little narrow through the hips and the slit up the back is very high. The embroidery is gorgeous. I received loads of compliments and had a blast dancing in this dress.

Perfect dress for a formal event. It's stylish, elegant, delicate with a touch of sexiness. The dress has a sheer neckline and bottom part of the skirt. The material gives a little bit and it's comfortable. When you sit be aware that the dark part of the skirt will be high on your thighs.
Tons of compliments. The embroidery makes it look expensive. The non-sheer part of the skirt is shorter than you would suspect.

This dress was a great fit for a spring wedding! Two downsides: Droopy collar, though I thought it was easy to overlook. Wiring within the dress ends up poking you throughout the evening which could be a little uncomfortable. Otherwise it fit my body so well and I could still dance the night away!
Why, hello gorgeous shoulders and the cutest little polka dots. This one was almost a keeper. It's so darn cute!

Such a cute and flattering top that went well with white pants, jeans and even overalls. Showed just enough chest, had the cutest puff sleeves and the flare at the waist was great. Only thing to note is that there is no tie around at the waist as pictured, luckily I still loved it without.

Really cute and youthful looking. I got many compliments even just shopping around town. Comfortable and lightweight. I had to iron it before wearing every time on vacation, as there's no way to fold this without producing a crop of wrinkles everywhere. Still recommend. Also cute with a denim jacket.
This top is so cute and delightfully feminine! It was comfortable to wear all day while at work, and could definitely be worn for other occasions.
It fit alright, I got a 14 by bust, but a 12 otherwise, and with cut of this one I tried just a 12. It worked out. It was a fine work shirt, nothing particularly particular.

links_Review_Title: Modern Little House on the Prairie Vibes
links_Review_Text: Loved this cute top! Could be worn casual with jeans or dressed up for work. It ran a little big, but it didn't look like it and I loved the overall fit!
Obsessed with this cute top perfect for the office and then an evening out for dinner. It's super light so it's perfect for summer and it's also true to size.

links_Review_Title: Very pretty; but too high maintenance
links_Review_Text: I thought this was flattering to my figure and even toyed with purchasing it. However, peplum and pleats combined with the pink polka dot print was a little too babydoll on me; and the idea of ironing all those intricate details over and over made this more effort than it was worth in the end.
I probably could have sized down - it's a bit too much fabric. Lots of compliments though and a sweet pattern. Neckline is conservative.

This top is very cute. It is a thin cotton material and i felt it ran a little big. I am typically a size 6-8 and ordered the 8 to make sure the torso was long enough. This would work fine for a more busty girl as I had plenty of room at a 32C. It gathers ALOT, for perhaps a very ruffled look, but I felt i had to keep gathering it in the back so that It didn't look so big. Love the v neck and the soft pink polka dots!

This top fits true to size and is super flattering even for a bigger chest. Lots of room in the arms and chest making it very comfortable. Sinched waist makes top extremely flattering for all body types

links_Review_Title: I was really looking forward to the bow.
links_Review_Text: Soooo disappointed. The bow really set this blouse off and it was missing.

links_Review_Title: Love the print and material, but the sleeves were awkward and overpowering.
links_Review_Text: Overall it was flattering, but the sleeves would just not sit properly on my arms.
This top was very large, I would order a size or two down. Had to return as it was so loose.
Cute top, nothing overly special, fits true to size
This fits well and looks great. Many people have complimented on how they like the sleeves.
Easy from work to play
The sleeves are fun and the overall fit was nice.
I got a six 6 because I was worried a 4 would be too tight. The shirt fit me perfectly and I got so many compliments!
This wore well and was comfortable. Only thing that would be better is belt loops are flimsy so belt was important but not ideal style for ease to put on.

links_Review_Title: So cute I need to own it!
links_Review_Text: Loved this adorable top and I wish I had kept it. I might rent again just to buy it. Super sweet style and was light and airy for hot Houston summer days. Adorable!
Cute, cool material. Didn't end up wearing, wasn't professional enough for work
Shirt was super cute - the puffy sleeves were a lot of fun!
Fits great for post delivery belly.

links_Review_Title: So many compliments on this one!
links_Review_Text: Such an easy shirt. I sized up because I'm tall with a big bust. It was a little looser than I'd prefer, but I sacrificed it so I wasn't pulling the waist down all day. Still looked adorable on me and got lots of compliments!

links_Review_Title: Cute top. Great for a day in the office. Loved the sleeves.
links_Review_Text: Fits a bit loose in the waist.
Perfect for desk to date look.
Way too big and see through fabric

Not much stretch but easily fit my 32E chest. Very big shoulder detail. Belt at waist is needed. Length is shorter- ended near my belly button. The flare/peplum was more flattering than others I've worn with my short torso and soft belly because the fabric is so lightweight. Might need white tank if you feel uncomfortable with thin fabric. I wore with high waist pleated lavender current and Elliot pants from RTR. I might go down a size next time.
Really upped my day time outfit. Super cute sleeves and extra light so not too warm. Would rent again,
cute but thin

I wore this out to dinner with some girlfriends. It looked great with skinny jeans and was super flattering. The top of the shirt was a little large on my small chest. I wore a cami underneath to make sure I felt covered. The puff sleeves are dramatic; my husband wasn't a fan.
The shirt arrived and it was missing the wrap around belt. It would have been cute, although big, however without the sash it just looked stupid. Really bummed.
Was a very cute top, pretty soft crushed velvet. The neckline was a littttle stretched out, but wasn't too bad, therefore still wearable.

links_Review_Title: Fun velvet fabric, beautiful mauve blush color, fun off shoulder and bell sleeves!

links_Review_Text: Lovely top! Compliments galore.
This blush color crushed velvet number is a fun departure from my normal date night attire. Fits a little snug and the hemline is a bit short. May want to size up.
I ordered this for the winter holidays. Great shiny and soft fabric. Very festive and great for holiday parties.

links_Review_Title: Fun party top, one shoulder isn't very dramatic
links_Review_Text: Fun material, received lots of compliments at a xmas eve party. I'm petite and small-chested, and this worked well fit wise. But the one shoulder wasn't as dramatic or pronounced as I anticipated.

I wore this for thanksgiving and I loved it. It's very comfortable and versatile. Could be dressed up or down. I wish I would have sized up so it would be a bit longer to wear with leather leggings, but it fit perfectly in my usual size. I'd rent it again.
Very pretty! I received several compliments. I felt it was more copper than pink; guess it depends on the lighting of the room!
Just not for me for wise. It made me look larger than I am.
Love this blush pink top. Super cute style. It was on the shorter side in length if you have a longer torso it may not work. Loved the color and softness.

Rented this for my birthday dinner and loved it! It was the perfect mix of dressy but not too much. The fabric is very soft and the fit is flattering. The sleeves do flare out at the bottom so I was worried about them getting in the way of our meal, but overall it was fine and a fun rental! Got tons of compliments on it and everyone was asking where it was from!

This top is very beautiful. I rented a large to accommodate the girls - and I was happy with the size. You can tie the belt around the waist as tightly as you need to. Sleeves were a bit much hence the four star rating.

I rented this shirt to wear to work and then traveling on the plane to New Orleans and out the first night of my trip. It was a great transitional piece as the weather in New Orleans was much warmer than that in NYC. The belt part was quite long so I was able to double wrap it around my waist and tie on the side, which looked fantastic! The color was also beautiful and I felt like I looked great all day. This shirt is TTS

links_Review_Title: Beautiful, soft, perfect for the ballet
links_Review_Text: This shirt fit perfectly. I usually wear a large, but based on recommendations went with an XL for this top. I have never cared for off the shoulder tops before. This top was extremely comfortable.
Wore this to a cocktail party, girls night out and dinner with hubby. Compliments every time. Very comfy and way better looking in person. Sexy, fashion forward and warm fall piece

links_Review_Title: Not my favorite. Looked a little cheesy in person
links_Review_Text: Not my style

Wore this for a Valentine's Day dinner and for a work party. It was really flattering and fun, and I received a lot of compliments. It does run a bit shorter than expected, but would definitely rent again for a party.

links_Review_Title: If you're long waisted it will only come up to your rib cage. Did not love this one.
links_Review_Text: See above.

I am taller so the waist part with the belt was a little higher on me. The cut is very boxy and even with a tie belt it made me look like a square and wasn't very flattering. Retired Ed without wearing.
didnt wear

links_Review_Title: Didn't look as cute with larger chest
links_Review_Text: I didn't love the fit of this and thought it wasn't as flattering with a larger chest. I didn't end up wearing to the party I rented it for.
Just wasn't flattering on me. But nothing wrong with it
I wanted to like this top more than I did. I'm on the taller side and felt this was just a bit too short as compared to the pic of the model. It worked but not super crazy over it.
Very comfortable and breathable material! Was a bit shorter than I expected but overall love it.
Was pretty tight but material was cool.

links_Review_Title: Not a good color for me
links_Review_Text: Nice top, fit well. Color was just bad- and that was my fault. I'm fair with light blonde hair
didn't like the belt around the waste and the way the shirt fell.

I should have gotten a medium & then it would gotten 5 stars. The sizing scared me off my normal medium, I would recommend you get your normal size in this top. It feels great, beautiful color and stays up well.

I normally wouldn't rent but due to being quarantined I let my husband pick this one. Was afraid would be too tight but the fabric stretches and I actually felt comfortable. Would rent again for something like New Years or a date night.

I thought it was flattering, even without a bra. I did adjust the tie on the top for more cleavage but it could be tighter to suit your style. The material was comfortable; I wore this clubbing in Vegas in January so it was sexy enough for that but I also didn't need a jacket because of the long sleeves so that was ideal. It was a little on the short side for me so I wore it with tights. For the price point I would rent again.

Rented for a party but ended up wearing as a tunic to work. The short length wouldn't be so bad if the dress didn't ride up a few inches every time I raised my arms. As it stood, couldn't wear it without pants. Otherwise, I did love the color and fabric.
Rock a 70s vibe with this comfy light velvet dress
Loved this dress for my birthday! Perfect party dress
Super cute and just sexy enough. I have wide hips and a big butt and the dress was a little too tight on the bottom half, but I could make it work!! Also a little short
Amazing fit, quality fabric, and you're able to tighten it as needed at the top. I realllllly want to buy this item, but it's a bit too warm for FL.

links_Review_Title: Wore this on New Year's Eve!
links_Review_Text: Super cute dress. A little on the short side, but I have long legs and it wasn't too short for me. I couldn't quite get the bow to tie as pictured, but still cute!
Very short but a great cut and color. It was perfect for a night out in Miami in the winter. It has a kind of shiny corduroy fabric.
The dress was a bit too revealing for me, so I tied it around my back. I got so many compliments.

Rented this for an office holiday party. It is definitely low cut, but I never felt like a wardrobe malfunction was impending, it was nice and snug with the adjustable tie! The only thing that wasn't great is it definitely has the tendency to ride up in the waist area as it's not very tight in the midsection.

links_Review_Title: So much better in person and on than the pic!
links_Review_Text: Absolutely loved this dress on! The pics suck but take a chance on this one. For the fall / winter, it's an awesome color and the fabric is decent. I paired it with some over the knee boots for a date and felt real cute ;) Be aware the fabric is stretchy, it is low cut, forgiving in the tummy :) More green than brown!

This dress is very cute, sexy and velvety femininity in a piece of clothing. I'm very tall 6' so it was too short for my comfort because any bending would lead to a booty flash. I wore it several times anyway because I'm scandalous but I wore shorts under. I got a lot of compliments! It was fun to wear and I felt like a girly girl.

Super cute even with a small chest you can tie it to make it work. Didn't feel my chest was exposed at all but I did need to pull it down a lot to avoid it riding up because it is very short and I'm only 5'3". Was good for the event as I was standing the whole time but would have more uncomfortable if sitting or dancing - not best for a wedding probably.

links_Review_Title: Kept pulling it down to fit right
links_Review_Text: This dress is so cute and flattering. LOVE the neckline. I can't usually pull off deep V, but it was narrow enough to not show much boob and I didn't need fashion tape to keep it in place. I did have to keep my arms down by my side the whole night to ensure the waist wouldn't ride up my ribcage which throws the whole fit off (+ gives everyone a show of your underbits).

Absolutely love this piece - wore it to a brunch as a dress, but actually preferred it as a tunic with some skinny jeans. Wore it twice. My kids loved "petting" me because it was so soft. Very cute, almost kept it.

links_Review_Title: Really comfortable, didn't need to wear a bra which is always a plus!
links_Review_Text: Fit true to size, definitely for a less formal wedding because of how low cut it is and how short it was, but it was still very cocktail-classy. Didn't need a bra, always a plus!

This was my birthday rental and I loved it! The small and medium are about the same size and with the tie at the waist, could easily wear either size. I ended up wearing the small because the sleeves were slightly shorter. The fabric is a gorgeous moss color with a ribbed velveteen texture. The interior is silky feeling. The velveteen and silky create a bit of static and so the skirt does ride up throughout the night. I'm a small busted lady and chose not to wear a bra--this dress would be difficult to wear with one. As other renters noted, it is slightly sheer but nothing dark undergarments can't camouflage.
Length is very short.

links_Review_Title: Still up for debate but I felt I couldn't wear it to a cocktail party
links_Review_Text: Fabric is fun but not as lux as it looks. Just didn't fit me right. Boxy waste
I usually wear an XS but a wore a small this round. This dress was AMAZING! I got so many compliments. I almost cried giving it back.

links_Review_Title: I rented this for my birthday dinner and was so happy with how I looked!
links_Review_Text: The fabric is a bit thinner than I was expecting. Medium fit as expected, is a little short which was fine with me but something to be aware of. Also, I ended up not wearing a bra b/c the one I was planning ended up showing due to the low cut tie in the front. No bra was fine for me but I was just going to dinner - if there was going to be more walking/dancing I would have needed pasties/stick on bra. Overall loved it and so did my date!

links_Review_Title: Cute fit and could dress up or down !
links_Review_Text: Definitely a lighter material that looks a little less fancy if you're trying to go super formal , but I loooved this dress! I felt so beautiful and so comfortable and confident all night at the networking event I wore it to! Perfect for any type of cold weather party

Ok so this dress is incredible. The tie is nice for adjusting how the dress hangs—especially because it was big on me. I probably should have ordered the medium, but it was nice to not worry about it being too tight. The shoulders stayed on and the dress never slipped. The length is perfectly fun but not wildly short. The material is a little thinner than expected, but it was by no means see-through. I would definitely rent this again!!
The XS fit perfect and the tie front made it easy to customize to your chest size. A smidge short on me but I was careful.

I got so many compliments on this dress!! It fit so well. The low cut made me nervous about dancing in but I had absolutely no problems all night, and I get DOWN at weddings. I felt so adorable and great in the dress. A great color for blonde hair and fair skin as well. I want to buy it! I couldn't recommend it more highly!
I loved this dress and felt amazing in it. It's flattering in the tummy area and I liked the tie in the middle. The material is warm- like, velour almost. Good for winter.

Cute! I have a really large chest so I had to wear a bandeau to make the dress appropriate. But the bandeau didn't look awkward at all and the dress fit well. The material is on the thinner side but I have no complaints. Great forest green color!!

links_Review_Title: Comfy & shows just the right amount of skin
links_Review_Text: I wore this for a show and night out in Vegas during the winter. It was perfect. I loved the color, material and overall fit. It was sexy enough, stylish and still comfortable. It fit true to size with a little stretch. I love this dress so much!

Wore this for a bachelorette party cocktail hour. Dress is lovely color, fabric is thin but color looks rich. It is definitely very low cut but like the other reviews said the bow in front is completely adjustable so I just tied it how I felt comfortable with. Also I'm 5'9" so with the low neckline it was a little shorter than I would have probably been comfortable with without the tights, but that's just personal preference .

Dress is pretty short. If you are tall size up. The material is thinner than I expected but since I wasn't outside long I wasn't too cold. I wore this for a holiday house party that I found out was ’fancy’ at the last minute with over the knee boots so I wouldn't feel so exposed.
Wore this to my birthday party! Very cute and comfy, tied the tie very tight so as to hide my tummy and it worked very well. Would wear again!!!
This dress was super cute, love the velvet in hunter green. I was going to wear this to a holiday party but decided to go with another dress.

Total throw on and go dress, very comfortable, slinky, good movement. The longer length of the sleeves made it feel just a touch more luxe. M was a bit roomy, though an S I think would have been contrary to the intention of the design (too tight and not as 'effortless'). The fabric is a BEAUTIFUL color, very rich and light catching. All in all, a fun dress for a girl's night out, but certainly not, in my mind, for a special occasion. I liked it on me, but it didn't feel any more special than a mini dress from F21...aside from the fact it's made in the USA.

links_Review_Title: Cute dress but not ideal fit
links_Review_Text: The dress is cute, however I think the fit could be improved. It was on the short side; I wouldn't have worn without tights. The elastic waist fit around a wider part of my rib cage so made me look a bit wider than I'd like. Cute to try once but glad I don't own this dress.
Cute dress but very short in the back

links_Review_Title: The order was everything I expected

links_Review_Text: I wore this out to a fancy birthday dinner. The front does plunge pretty low, but I wasnt nervous that anything would pop out. I did not need to wear a bra. It was a bit shorter than I thought it would be, but I wore high boots so there wasnt as much skin showing.

links_Review_Title: You'll need fashion tape but you'll like great.
links_Review_Text: I loved this dress even though it was not as easy to wear as I expected. The material is really thin so I needed nipple covers as well as tape to hold it in place.
Fun dress to ring in the new year. I was apprehensive about the undercut with the tie but it didn't feel too revealing at all. Rather sheer- would not have worn without tights. Fairly short.

links_Review_Title: Great pattern, fit, and shoulder pads
links_Review_Text: A really nice work dress. I wore a black turtle neck dress underneath it since it's a little short and low cut, it helped make it more work appropriate. The shoulder pads are great and it add a little 80s CEO vibe to it.

Ordered the M, hoping it would fit me like the model photo, but fits much more like a jacket. Wore it to work with a black turtleneck under it, and black leggings tucked into black suede walking boots. Dress was so large that I could not pin it together (gap too big), so I had to wear something under it. I think the small would fit better, but it would probably be too short to wear to work as a dress. Disappointing.

Loved this piece so much!!!!! I wore it for a professional outing and it was so cute. The 10 fit me perfectly and I am normally an 8 in jeans. I have curvy hips so I sized up. Glad I did for the length.

I am a a true size Small but the XS was perfect! Slight shoulder pad was nice and dress was overall warmer than expected. I wore it with a turtleneck and black leather leggings or tights underneath and a coat on top and was warm enough in 30 degree NYC weather. Would recommend! Not so heavy that you couldn't wear in warmer weathers by itself

links_Review_Title: TRENDY FIT but Loose/low cut in the bust
links_Review_Text: Lots of buttons to get this baby on but it's lined with a soft silky material. I'm 5'8" with a booty and rented the large and felt it was long enough. My main gripe was how loose it was in the chest and low cut, I actually ended up wearing a tight black turtleneck and tights under because I felt more comfortable and secure. I probably could have safety pinned it to make it work without. This piece arrived slightly worn looking (time to retire it) and it wrinkled easily I had to personally steam
It's very nice and professional. But they to short to be called a dress. I wore with skinny pants
Cute dress but the sleeves were very long on me.
Loved this blazer dress. Chic look.

On trend. Runs big in the arms, chest, shoulders and waist, but too short to size down. I kinda chalked it up to the menswear style and figured it was passable with tights. When I got to work, I was totally mortified to discover the button closure arrangement creates a slit that is definitely NSFW when you sit down! Also was disappointed at how wrinkled it got throughout the day.
Looooved!!!! Was a little big on me like most xs items but the belt helped, was also able to tuck it in a little to fit better.
Cute and versatile! Wore out and to a basketball game. I was pleasantly surprised that it was long enough. However, the L was a bit too big so I would get a size down next time.

links_Review_Title: The Small runs big. Didn't really like it but I loved the patterns

links_Review_Text: This outfit looked great at work and while on vaca - lots of compliments. The belt allows you to sinch in at the waist. I wore with different sneakers each time.
Wanted it to be a bit longer but I put leggings on and it worked.
Dress was super cute and fit in all the right places! If you're in between sizes I would size up because the dress buttons from the front and can be a little revealing.

links_Review_Title: I got some compliments at work on this. Very cute!
links_Review_Text: The top was a bit bigger than I expected it to be. It ran large, but I think if I had gotten a smaller size, it would have been too short for work. This can easily be sized down and worn out and about. The material was thick enough that my top half felt warm and I paired with some cute black stockings

links_Review_Title: Great idea, but didn't look great on me
links_Review_Text: I love the idea of this, but the excess wrinkles around the torso and sleeve fit undermined how chic I wanted it to be. I think it would look better if you size up or were a very slim person. Also I needed to wear shorts underneath.

This was very cute and I was excited to wear this. I had thick tights to wear but when I put it on it was too short. I even sized up (which I should have just kept my size small) because the medium was very big on top and not long enough. I am only 5'8 but I have very long legs so most things are short on me. I would definitely rent this again to wear for a night out

The dress has a funny fit in that the sleeves are long and fit well in the shoulders however belted area of the dress is tight. I would go a size up when ordering and be prepared to get creative with the sleeves by either rolling them up or wearing them open.

links_Review_Title: Cute print and soft material. Really fun piece.
links_Review_Text: Longer than I wanted for a mini dress, but great fit through arms and waist. Ended up wanting to wear it as a long blazer over jeans and a tee.
Great for work. Kind of bulky, but warm for a cold NYC day.
The dress looked cheaper than expected, but it was fine, not horrible. It was also a bit shorter than expected. Also note the color is more white-and-black than grey.
The hips didn't fit

links_Review_Title: Loved this dress runs really small
links_Review_Text: size up one or two sizes for correct fit.

Very romantic. It's so much more salmon than pink like the photos! I honestly could have gone with a 2 easily. I usually wear 4-6, but I'm smaller up top. I would say if you're smaller up top then sizing down would be the option! Didn't love the color, so I returned it.

The fabric on this was beautiful, the design is so well made and it feels like top quality. It was a big long and large on me. The mesh on top doesn't stretch at all so it's not the most if you want to move around your arms. I was okay because I had extra room

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous details, be prepared to complimented
links_Review_Text: This dress is absolutely darling and everyone will acknowledge that fact. I have a petite upper body, so unfortunately it was too big for me on the torso. It's a mesh material around the shoulder and neck so I was able to play it off. Otherwise, I was very happy with it.
Very comfortable. I received so many compliments!

The fit was a little tight for me especially in the chest area. However the bigger size worked great for me and I'm so glad that RTR lets you chose 2! I got a ton of compliments at the wedding and it was comfortable enough to dance in!
This dress was perfect for the dia de los muertos gala. The details in the flower are incredible.

This is very likely my favorite thing I've ever worn. It was a work of art. Every person I spoke to said something about it. It's really flattering. I was not expecting it to be structured on the bottom since the skirt is more flowy but the layer underneath is fitted and that made it more flattering and slimming. I usually fit comfortably in a 6 and lots of reviews said it ran large so I for a 4 and 6 but the 6 was pretty darn hard to zip. I recommend getting your usual siZe and one size up personally.

I rented this for a wedding in LA. I am a size between 12 and 14 and was nervous the 12 wouldn't fit but they didn't have 14 available so I went for it and it was awesome. It was pretty tight on the bodice but it was Wearable. Everyone loved it! So many compliments. The arm sleeves were tight so if you have bigger arms you might want to upsize. The zipper is incredibly hard to get up because of stiffness but with help it was fine. I felt like a queen and it hugs the body in all the right places.

If you are someone who sometimes has to size up a dress for proper fitting on top, size up this dress! The dress was a stunner, and I had folks walk across a large ballroom to compliment me on it. I felt quite glamorous even if it did take a little wriggling to get zipped in :)
I wore this to a fall wedding and received so many compliments. I love the romantic vibe and thought the waist was very flattering
Very pretty dress. Sheer portion is more pink in person. Many compliments. Felt it ran small - wore the size 16.
Absolute beauty of a dress which I wore on my birthday. I'm short in the waist and it was still a comfortable fit. You can wear with or without a strapless bra.
SO many compliments from people! This dress fit like a dream. It's a statement dress for sure!
Loved this dress! I'm pretty small chested, so I needed some 'help' filling out the top. It was so fun to get fancy for the wedding. Such lovely detail!!

I am 4'11 so I usually have my own dresses tailored for length and have the shoulders taken up (distance from armpit to shoulder is short) so I knew renting this was a gamble. But I loved the design so much that I went for it anyway, and I'm glad I did. While it was definitely long on me, the shoulders weren't as big of an issue because of the mesh. The dress is so gorgeous that it made me forget about the fit issues, and I got a ton of compliments. Loved my first RTR experience!
So many compliments! Beautiful design and embroidery. Rich colors. Zero give! But true to size.
I didn't need an actual bra. great support. Beautiful colors, sheer top was sexy/flattering and I received many compliments. Nice length even with heels

The dress fit perfectly and was comfortable for a long day of wedding festivities! It was everything I'd hoped for and I received so many compliments. I wore it with a strapless bra, sheer nylons and nude Tahari heels. #stunning
This dress was so easy to wear. The embroidery was a work of art, so you don't have to wear much jewelry or accessories. And, yes, the bag is from RTR too.

links_Review_Title: Prepare for compliments! Romantic show stopper.
links_Review_Text: This dress is more beautiful in person than pictures can show. It is well made structurally. It has a strapless look and feel but with the benefit of the illusion neckline (a positive if a bit more busty). I went with the 6. Initially, I had difficulty zipping it up by myself. I believe the zipper may be more stiff along the back where there is more material from the floral embroidery. It also could be the case from repeated dry cleaning. When I had assistance it fit as it was intended.

links_Review_Title: My wedding colors were blush and marsala so it was perfect for my bridal shower. So many compliments
links_Review_Text: True to size, I'm usually a 4/6 depending on where the dress is fitted. This was more fitting in the chest / ribs so a 6 would be my true size. No cons, fit great perfect weddding dress for all events.

links_Review_Title: I got compliments from strangers in this dress! So unique and flattering.
links_Review_Text: I am generally a 12 but was glad to have the 14 in this dress.
It's was gorgeous and perfect but a little snug when I had just rented a 10 the week prior- the 12 in this was tight in the bust, arms, and back. But I still boogied down!
The dress is a bit heavy due to the layers and embroidery. The top section isn’t super comfy since it’s made of Tulle. I would not recommend for an outdoor event if temperature exceeds 80 degrees.

links_Review_Title: This dress was a little big, but I ordered a size up, but I still think the photos came out amazing!
links_Review_Text: Since this dress has a mess top, it will fit every woman differently depending on your body build.
Unique, well-constructed, and embroidery perfectly covers all those "body after baby" curves :)

links_Review_Title: Marchessa fashion nails it again with this perfectly romantic dress
links_Review_Text: This dress made me feel so magical /whimsical with its perfect rose detailing that sits on the skin in the softest fabric. I really enjoyed the compliments on the gorgeous dress that were well deserved by this timeless piece .
Most beautiful rental yet. I received compliments all night and felt like a princess. It was perfect

links_Review_Title: Stunning dress, amazing details. Got many compliments and loved it myself. I wish i could keep it!
links_Review_Text: Ordered size 6 and 8, wore size 8, highly recommend going one size up. #glamorous #stunning #wedding

This is a stunning dress! I wore it to a wedding at a rooftop garden in Brooklyn. The attire was Garden Party and this was a hit. Although I will say it was a touch heavy for the mid-July humidity. Super comfortable otherwise. Beautiful coloring even for a redhead like me. It was also very fun to be wearing a dress that retails for more than my rent! Definitely give it a try!
One of my most favorite rentals-I will definitely rent it again. Not great for hot weather but would be better for a spring wedding.

links_Review_Title: Show Stopper at my dear friend's wedding
links_Review_Text: This dress was simply amazing. I felt like a million dollars. I honestly could have worn either the 4 or 6 but decided on the 4 due to how it fit my bottom half. It was a bit tight on top but not so much so that it looked ill fitted. Again received TONS of compliments.

I wore this for my Goddaughter's Quinceañera. I received lots of compliments throughout the night!! It's definitely a show stopper. I felt very pretty and comfortable all night. It's a beautiful dress! Highly recommend
Absolutely loved this dress! True to size, I usually wear 2/S, wore size 2 to the event. Got so many compliments!
Had a lot of extra fabric/didn't fit snugly. Fit more like a tea length on me.

links_Review_Title: Wonderful dress! I received so many compliments all night!
links_Review_Text: Fits well. Zipper sticks a bit even while on the hanger. Very pretty and a bit pinker than the photos.

links_Review_Title: It was for a cousin's wedding.
links_Review_Text: I loved this dress. I got more complements on this dress than I ever have before.

I was nervous that this was going to be a bit matronly but it was not. Fit true to size and like a glove. Awesome for an hourglass figure. The colors are really vibrant. Compliments all night. My only challenge was what shoes to pair it with, but I found some burgundy suede pumps that worked perfectly.
Very original & eye catching. Has beautifully intricate details, love the sparkles, pink, red & gold. I'd say it looked better in person than in pictures!

The dress ran true to size. I received tons of compliments at the Kentucky Derby! Very well made, somewhat forgiving, and a show stopper! I was afraid the mesh overlay would be itchy. It wasn’t at all! I just loved this dress!
I love this top. Very flattering! The material is great. Great rental for a night out.

links_Review_Title: Loved so much, I might not send back!
links_Review_Text: So beautiful and I recieved so many compliments. Very cropped, but a body suit makes it work appropriate!
Very cropped. So wear something high waisted. But overall I loved the wrap. Follow me @jaimers_7 for all my RTR Unlimited Looks
Great, fun top. It's short so I wore higher waisted pants. Loved it.

This was a pretty top, lots of compliments on it. I liked that it wrapped and made it adjustable. It is short, but worked with high waist jeans. A nice in-between weather option, with a flower pattern but long sleeves.
Love the top very true to size. Best with high waist bottoms. Semi low cut.

I got this for a night of a bachelorette party and it's an easy top to have for drinks, dinner etc. I didn't really know the top was cropped before getting it but ended up keeping it. Its a true wrap - I wore a bralette underneath and used the snap to keep it closed. You could wear it with light jeans or pants for more of a day look too. It's true to size - maybe order a size up if you want a less cropped look.
The sleeves- they made me flourish my hands a lot and got in my food. Otherwise quite liked the top. No stretch but a true wrap top

links_Review_Title: Wore it to meeting with hospital administrators.
links_Review_Text: Looked professional yet cute.

Definitely size up...I'm normally a small and a medium fit well. It's cropped so you need pretty high waisted jeans and even then it will be a bit cropped. I didn't think the material felt that great given the retail price. It felt like I could get this at forever 21. Other than that it is cute
It was flattering and super fun to wear!
Cute top, I wore it with high waisted jeans. Def more cropped than I thought and the little button kept opening so I would be mindful if you have a bigger chest.

links_Review_Title: I really love the pattern of this top and the style.
links_Review_Text: I ordered a size M due to what was in stock. I really should have stuck with a S. The arms were a bit too long and there was a lot of material. Stay true to size with this one! Very pretty pattern and style with high wasted pants or a skirt.

links_Review_Title: such a cute, fun, airy top.
links_Review_Text: a little shorter than i thought.

links_Review_Title: Love this piece, cute with jeans made me feel dressed up without even trying!
links_Review_Text: Tight around the wrists, but other than that cute.
This was way too short on me, wouldn't be comfortable wearing in public
It fits perfectly and it doesn't show the boobs too much. It's very cute and lots of compliments!

links_Review_Title: Rented for dinner with future in-laws however too much of a crop top
links_Review_Text: Crop top. Flattering with high waisted pants

links_Review_Title: SOOO great. I would wear this everyday if I could!
links_Review_Text: I did have to wear a shirt underneath because the snap button kept coming undone.
Contemplating buying this flirty, flattering piece. Wore with high waist jeans to work but plan to rock with leather shorts for an evening look. Absolutely adorable.

links_Review_Title: Light and flowey, perfect for spring.
links_Review_Text: Perfect fit.
Hits very short even with high waisted jeans
Very short crop!
I rented this for work and then ended up wearing it to a work recognition dinner. It really dressed up the culottes I’d worn earlier in the day. Was sad to have to send it back

This shirt is pretty but was much more cropped then I thought. Also I have a size c chest and the little button in the front kept snapping open. The small was even a little tight around my waist. Did not wear

links_Review_Title: Perfect shirt to dress up or down!
links_Review_Text: I wore this shirt to my cousins bridal shower with black high waisted jeans. This shirt was so cute and I got a lot of comments. I was worried it would be see through or not dressy enough but it was perfect. I think you can really dress it up or down. Between the shirt and my jeans only a small part of my stomach was showing but really barely any. I wore it with just a black bra underneath and it worked out wonderfully. I think it runs true to size. I don't have a full chest but I can see if someone did that the button that holds it together might pop open. Overall I would definitely rent it again. My aunt kept telling me to buy it!

I love that a bra is not needed with this & I almost always have to wear a bra due to my chest size. I'm also smaller in the waist so rarely does the top fit with the rest of the outfit but this was like a glove. Pockets are a plus!

links_Review_Title: Sweet material and colors, but really short!
links_Review_Text: Sweet material and colors, but really short! I recommend it for a day by the pool or at the beach. It's really short (and I'm only 5'4)
Rented this for Polo Classic and got tons of compliments. Fit perfectly made my boobs look great!

links_Review_Title: Great quality piece but not for larger chests!
links_Review_Text: This piece was beautiful and made of great quality material - it definitely felt expensive. I rented for a cruise and paired it with some spicy red shoes and thought they worked well. The downside is it didn't seem like it's meant for larger chested gals as I spent the evening pulling up the fabric to cover my goodies. You could probably wear a strapless bra with this one but I just used nipple covers and they did the trick. Love the colors and pattern and didn't wrinkle easy in my suitcase!

I am 5'2" and 115 pounds and I rented the 2 and the 6 since I saw reviews that said it ran really small. The 6 was pretty big and the 2 fit great other than the straps having some room. I could have pinned them but I just let them be and it was fine! I wore this for my bachelorette trip in Nashville and it was so comfortable and so easy to wear. Wish I owned it.

I am obsessed with this romper! I received so many compliments while wearing this. I am a 12/14, and the 14 fit great. The zipper was a bit annoying, but totally fine in the end. It wasn’t tight or uncomfortable, although it did ride up a bit if I was walking a lot. I would totally rent again!
LOVED this colorful, fun, and memorable piece. Perfect to wear to a summer party.

It's such a fun print and I adored the cross-cross back, but this just fit me poorly. From the front I just felt like it just emphasized that I don't have a flat tummy. The neckline was also very low. So low that I couldn't wear a bra without it popping into view. Yet without one, I felt like there was potential for a nip slip. From the back, looked good, but couldn't get over the cons, so I didn't not wear this piece.
Super cute romper WITH pockets! The section around the ribs was a bit tight, especially after a meal. I would size up next time just for comfort. Will definitely rent again.
The straps were a bit large but other than that fit perfectly. Received so many compliments loved the outfit
I wore this for a date night on our beach vacation. I went with the two because the straps on the 4 were too long. Loved the thick fabric and colors in this outfit. I felt cute and comfortable!

links_Review_Title: Cute colorful and comfortable pin up girl vibes
links_Review_Text: I'm a 14, but I have a larger bust, so I had to wear the 16. It fit but the straps were a bit loose. Love this romper because it comfortably hides any lower body imperfections and it has pockets! Got so many compliments. Would definitely recommend for a summer event.
Wore this to a baby shower! Went with a size 10 and the romper fit perfect. I will say the straps were a bit of pain throughout the day and you need to keep pulling it up. Otherwise it was adorable!
Little tight in the waist but once zipped, was super fun and flattering. Considered buying it to keep!

links_Review_Title: This is a fun outfit for a summer party!
links_Review_Text: I rented this romper for my birthday party and loved it! The bust line was on the more revealing side while still being flattering. I didn't wear a bra and still felt completely comfortable so I'd highly recommend this to anyone with a fuller bust. While I think it was worth it, be warned since it's a romper with criss-cross straps, it was difficult to go to the bathroom in and I also needed a friend to come with me to zip me up.

links_Review_Title: So many compliments all day long!! Felt so confident and unique in this one of a kind romper
links_Review_Text: Fit my body perfectly, didn't have to wear a bra. I was worried about my chest falling out, but the fit was perfect.

links_Review_Title: I felt super sexy, yet comfortable, in this jumpsuit.
links_Review_Text: It’s snug through the chest and bodice, but was loose on the bottom.

links_Review_Title: Not very flattering for hour glass / full bust !
links_Review_Text: Such a fun and cute romper but my only complaint is that it didn't fit me the way I expected ! It fit in the top perfectly but the shorts were so big and loose , that if I sat down , you would see my underwear / they made my legs look larger than they are ! But ! Super cute

links_Review_Title: Very simple but elegant romper. Perfect for a beach rehearsal dinner.
links_Review_Text: Fit was a bit small but really comfortable. Zipper was a bit sticky, but overall, the romper was a hit.

Great romper! Wore to a PGA golf tournament and it was perfect for Texas heat! Would recommend sizing up two sizes if you have a large rib cage like me:) had to go to a size 14 and normally wear a size 10/12
I wore this for a fashion show and I stood out while still being comfortable enough to run around the event.
I would definitely recommend! It was comfortable and for my wide hips well. Casual yet can be dressed up with platforms.

This romper is adorable and fit me perfectly. The wide leg was my favorite part, it gave a 60s vibe and also didn't feel like the fabric was clinging to my skin or going to bunch up. perfect weekend outfit in the summer
This fit was so great! Great fabric! Perfect fit!

links_Review_Title: This romper was perfect and fun
links_Review_Text: I had to size up on it. But the 10 fit great. I got many compliments and it looked great in pics. I usually avoid rompers because I have a longer torso and because my thighs rub together, but this one fit perfect and was comfortable to wear.

The fabric is thick and stretchy, which made it very comfortable despite it being a little tight. I am also 5' 11' and it was a fairly good length considering. It felt like it covered everything. The bottom is more like a skort which means it a little wide in the leg so be careful bending over if you're tall! Overall, loved it and would rent it again for fun outdoor party.

Rented this for my bachelorette party in the Bahamas! It was perfect for the occasion- definitely very short, I wouldn't have been comfortable in it if I wasn't in a vacation setting personally. Didn't need to wear a bra though which is great - the material isn't see through at all!

Really comfy, fits true to size. Not much stretch, however, so size accordingly. The 0 just fit me. Straps could be borderline too long on a more petite frame. Wore this on vacation in Miami and it was perfect
Such a cute fit! Definitely would rent again.
Probably my favorite romper to date! This romper is bright & flowy - Criss cross back and a super soft material. I wore it on a very warm day in New Orleans and felt great!

This romper is comfortable, flattering, flirty, cute, and fun to wear. The straps were a little long for my small frame but i safety pinned them and had no problem. Had a blast wearing this for my 30th!
This romper was comfy, flatter and so flattering. Bunch of compliments on our cruise . I had to up to a size 10 because it pressed by bust flat in a size 8.
Colors were beautiful and the quality of fabric was amazing. Super comfy & great fit.

links_Review_Title: Wanted something white with color on it for our anniversary party at an arcade. This was was fun!
links_Review_Text: The 4 fit great, but the top part is made for girls with a bit more in the chest. I just had a strapless bra on it. The straps are also made for someone slightly taller, but it wasn't an in issue or anything. Easy to take off and on -- even for a romper. It was a great print for a retro arcade party and I got numerous compliments on it!

This romper makes for a delightfully cute and easy outfit. Love the pockets, which are well-hidden among the pleats, and the perfect cut and length. It was just slightly tight around the chest and just a bit short, but not so much that I noticed five minutes after putting it on. Note that it can be a little hard to get on and off, but it is so adorable and comfortable once on that I barely noticed :)

I rented this for my bachelorette party in new orleans and wanted something a bit different, sexy but still classy. This was comfortable, flattering, and pretty. I have a small chest so it was a bit big in the chest and due to the cross cross back I didn't wear a bra, which could have helped. Overall I felt like I was in a fun, sexy and comfortable bachelorette romper!

Can't speak highly enough of this romper!!! Looks like a dress and has plenty of room to move. Fabric breathes even in tropical climates and there's lot of room in the hips. Looks like a day dress but feels like a comfy adventure outfit! Pockets are great! If you're small chested like me, maybe go down a size... straps were long and the top gapped a tiny bit but not enough to worry me... got tons of compliments, don't be scared off by the 80's/90's look of the pattern, if you want to look great at a spring/summer/tropical event... rent this!
I ordered size 4, but I'm usually 2. It was a bit wide in the chest but still worked out fine

I rented this romper for a date night out with my husband. I rented a size 12 and backup size 16 (only other size they had). I was nervous about the fit because I usually wear like a 14. To my pleasant surprise it fit wonderfully! I got so many compliments and I felt so cute. The top is fitted so watch out for the girls, but other than that it fit in all the right places. It wasn't too short and the flare legs helped my thunder thighs breath and not look huge. I loved this look so much I didn't want to return it.
Everyone loved the dress!

links_Review_Title: The pictures do it no justice whatsoever
links_Review_Text: Such a knockout of a dress. The fabric looks like this peacock pattern with teals, purpled, and fuchsias in it. The drape is flattering and forgiving. My only issue was that the top part was much too big on my 32B chest. Had I been moving much or especially dancing, the dress would have slid right off.

links_Review_Title: My most favorite dress ever from RTR
links_Review_Text: The fabric of this dress is incredible! Very subtle jewel toned colors really make it so unique! The dress fit me perfectly. I felt the cut and seams were all very feminine and flattering in all the right places. This dress runs true to size. It will not disappoint!

Based on the reviews I got the 16R and the 14R as my back up. I was pleasantly surprised to find not only did I fit in the 14R but because of the ruffle I did not even need shapewear underneath. The fabric is absolutely stunningly beautiful in person. All the reviews are correct in that photos just don't do this dress justice. The fabric has no give to it so be confident and realistic in your size choices. I highly recommend this dress to anyone looking to stand out and wow the crowd.

links_Review_Title: Loved the fit and surprise splash of color
links_Review_Text: I didn't end up wearing this, as it didn't fit the theme, but loved the fit. Super flattering and I would order again. Large enough I could have tried the 10L.
I absolutely love this dress and got tons of compliments but I am pretty big busted a 34DDD ( E ) and I felt it was still a little big on top
This dress was beautiful, comfortable and I received compliments all night! Dress fit true to size but the zipper was a little tricky.

links_Review_Title: Hands down, my favorite RtR dress ever (see notes for tall girls)
links_Review_Text: I loved everything about this dress! Leaving a detailed review so you will get the info you need to love it, too! 2 photos attached to help! Style: The fabric gathering on the left side is so unique and feminine, but it doesn't add bulk to your waist or hips. The fabric pattern, an iridescent sort of rainbow stained glass, keeps it from being too frothy or sweet. Color: As other reviews have noted, the color is a bit hard to pinpoint. Scroll through the 3 pics I'm attaching here - one has the dress laying against a grey pillowcase and next to a bright yellow gold necklace (from RtR). I decided the necklace was too gold to really work, but silver didn't work either. I went with a bronze metal necklace, but I think a black metal would look great, too. The jewel tones throughout the dress give you lots of colors to work with for accessories and shoes. Soft gold shoes (see note below on what I chose) worked well. Length and Size: Ideally, I would have rented this in a 4L, but the closest I could get was a 6R. I ended up wearing the dress with 1" heel sandals (Nina brand, Shane style) so it wouldn't be too short. That gave me just a hint of a train in the back. Size-wise, it was too big on top for me, both in the waist and the chest, but I was able to make it work with some safety pins inside the dress and fashion tape around the chest area. I got more compliments wearing this dress than I ever have at any other event!

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous Ball gown! Perfect for formal Mardi Gras event
links_Review_Text: The only size available when I needed the dress was a 10 L but it worked great because it tapers in front so I never felt like I was stepping on the gown and I loved the train effect in the back. I got so many compliments on this dress! Definitely would recommend!
Dress fit true to size, thick expensive material. Fits and hourglass shape. I'm 5'2" 148 lbs.

links_Review_Title: Absolutely beautiful dress-the colors are even better in person! Wore to a Mardi Gras Ball. Love it
links_Review_Text: Dress is a show stopper! Comfortable to wear, 12L is LONG...dress has a train, was able to pin & make it work. Was stopped several times & told what a great dress it was-would rent again for sure!

links_Review_Title: I wore this dress to a Mardi Gras ball, so beautiful! I got compliments all night long!
links_Review_Text: The fit was great! Length was perfect with high heels at 5'3". I think this is my favorite RTR dress. The material almost has some metallic threads (red, blue, purple) that you can't see in the pics. It is beautiful! Highly recommend
I did not want to take this dress off! It was more beautiful and colorful in person and I received compliments all night long. I'm 5'8" and I could still wear 5" heels.

This dress is even more amazing in person. The fabric is BEAUTIFUL!! The cut and the ruffle was perfect. The fabric on the other side is a beautiful rainbow color of the same fabric. It was like a peek a boo of fun! I got compliments all night! Every one (even the guys!!) asked where'd I get my dress from! Thank you RTR again for another fabulous dress!!
So many compliments! Perfect for our Oscar night formal affair. Fit like a glove!

This dress is gorgeous in person and pictures don't do it justice. It is thick, quality fabric that has a metallic sheen to it. I got an 8L and it fit perfectly. Sometimes when I get a size "Long" it will be too long but it was the perfect length with my 3" heels. I got compliments all night and for days after my event on Facebook!! You will also turn heads in this dress!!
I wore this dress to a Mardi Gras Ball received compliments ALL NIGHT LONG! The fabric is beautiful, and picked up colors in different lighting. Loved, loved loved this dress!

links_Review_Title: Worn to a black tie Mardi Gras ball. It was perfect!
links_Review_Text: This dress was just beautiful! Fit perfectly...hugged all the right curves, stayed in place with no tugging or pulling, moved with me for fun and dancing. The shimmery fabric is truly stunning! Pictures can't do it justice. I got so many compliments! It fit exactly as I hoped it would and is true to size. Highly recommend this dress for any glamorous night out!

links_Review_Title: "The most beautiful dress in the room"
links_Review_Text: I loved every minute of wearing this dress and got so many compliments. I thought it looked like a mermaid but everyone else thought peacock! Even better. The bodice was a little big, even with a padded bra, but I was able to keep it up without too much hitching. If I rent this again (can't wait for another opportunity!) I'll try a 2. Overall wonderful experience! Didn't even try the backup 4L.

links_Review_Title: If you want to make a statement THIS is your dress!!
links_Review_Text: This dress is SO beautiful. Thick material with so much depth to the colors + the peacock pattern really make it visually appealing. The peekaboo of the blue / pink underneath also adds drama. Not a dress you can wear just anywhere but if you want a make a statement this is THE ONE! Size up if you have a larger rib cage. Mine is smaller than the rest of me and it was snug. The bottom part of the dress fit true to size and was really flattering from all angles.

links_Review_Title: Felt great in this gorgeous dress
links_Review_Text: Came exactly as expected. The 12 would have fit perfectly but they didn't have it in stock for me to rent so I received a 14 and a 10. The 10 wouldn't fit over my chest so I had to go with the 14 and although it was big, I was able to add a strapless bra and I only had to worry about it falling down a few times. I want to be very clear, it wasn't snug at all, so if you like the snug mermaid look and you are similar to my size you want to get your exact size! My measurements are 41-33-41 (38D)

links_Review_Title: I absolutely LOVED this gown and felt fantastic in it!!!
links_Review_Text: I almost didn't order this gown but SO glad I did! The colors online don't do this gown justice. I thought it was silver and wasn't going to try it. However, the color is more of a pale gold and has some jewel-toned colors in the design to include navy/cobalt blue, emerald green and berry. I felt FABULOUS in this gown and got sooooo many compliments at the event I attended. I love the fit of this designer, this is a winner for a formal affair.

I ordered 2 dresses for my company's formal anniversary gala and neither fit right. I ordered replacement sizes of the first two and picked this on a whim. Best decision, ever. The fabric is gold, silver, red, black, blue, and purple, so accessories are easy to find. The cascading ruffle is so beautifully dramatic that I received nonstop compliments. I'm usually a 12 in dresses, but I have a wide rib cage so size up if you're like me. 100/10 rating.

I loved this dress! It was even cooler in person than it looks online. The fit was fantastic and the side ruffle makes your waist appear smaller. I received numerous compliments and would definitely rent this again!
I loved this dress!! It was fabulous and I received soooo many compliments!

The fit is true to size. I made a last minute rental and had to wear the 4R which was slightly big in the chest for me but I was able to make it work. I am 5'6" with long legs and the regular fit great in length. I tried on a 2 petite (that's all that was available in a second size) and the fit was better but it was way too short. If I had worn higher heels I would have needed the 4long. Lots of great compliments all night. And I even saw someone else in the dress and we both looked fabulous!
