I rented this dress for a NYE gala and it was stunning! Great fit, great color, great material. I'm 5'2, 150 lbs, athletic build. I rented a size 6R and I have a wide back so it was a tad snug in the back but it still looked great! I would definitely recommend this dress!

links_Review_Title: I received so many complements on this dress. It was a hit! I'm a 0 and the 0 fit just right!
links_Review_Text: Fit true to size, loved that is was longer in the back then the front. The side ruffle really added a wow to the dress.

I usually wear a size 8 but like other reviewers I went up a size. Size 10 fit perfect! I wanted 10L but it wasn't available. 10R was just right with 4inch heels. I'm 5'5. It's definitely a show stopper! I received compliments all night and was told I was the best dressed. If you want to shine all night this is the dress to wear. The dress looks silver in the picture but when you see it in person it actually has Gold under tones!! Loved it!
Runs small so size up and if you're over 5'7" also get the Ling not regular length. Beautiful peacock like print. I felt gorgeous and got so many compliments

links_Review_Title: So many compliments on this dress!
links_Review_Text: Amazing dress. It fit so well and I am still getting compliments on it a week later from pictures. Would definitely rent this again. It was perfect!

The pictures on the site do not do this dress justice! The colors are shimmery red, blue, purple, gold, and silver. Received tons of compliments and the side ruffle design made me feel like a Barbie doll (in a good way). The only caveat is that the picture is very misleading about the length. In order to get any train like effect I had to switch to the "long" size and even then I still felt like it was too short when paired with 3 inch heels.

It so so much more beautiful in person as the print changes colors as you move. This dress turns heads! I'm 5'2" and 150 lbs. the 10R was a perfect fit and I'm wearing 3" heels. It does have a bit of a train, which I love.

I thank the lovely Kaitlin at the San Francisco RTR for pulling this dress out for me, as I had already passed on it as being too busy, too dramatic. It was stunning on! Once I sized up it was perfect! It is such a quality dress, with a comfortable and shape-making construction. I think this design would work for many heights and body shapes. It stayed in place throughout the night, no tugging or fussing. Everyone loved this dress on me and I loved wearing it!!!
This dress is flawless and SO MUCH FUN. Surprisingly easy to move and dance in, and just stunning.

This was my first time using RTR and will definitely use again! I wore this to a black tie event and received so many compliments. It definitely stood out in a sea of black dresses. Fit true to size and was very comfortable
Dress was divine.. wore to a black tie event and got tons of compliments!

The dress is beautiful and I wish I could have worn it! It fit perfectly, true to size, except through the bust where it was huge! I am a 30c and there was no way I could make it work. Gaping throughout the front even with a push-up and padded bra.

links_Review_Title: Very hard to zip but very beautiful in person
links_Review_Text: I loved this dress. It's so elegant and chic. Unfortunately I went with another option. I just felt too bare on top since I'm more top heavy. The fabric was very nice. It really was a lovey dress. It runs small. I'm a 14 and the 16 was snug. But more than that it is very hard to zip because of the fabric. So I didn't get to wear this one. I know many others will rent, love and look beautiful. Just not for those of us with big boobies.
true to size

links_Review_Title: Beautiful spring print w just the right amount of ruffles. Recommend
links_Review_Text: Didn't think the wrists were too tight. Def could size down especially if smaller on top
Great for conservative family occasions where you can't have a low plunge. Light and flowy. My boyfriend loved this look

I loved this dress so much. It is really well made and beautiful fabric. I wore it a few times and styled it a few different ways. Can be worn with a leather jacket and black booties or with open toe heels for a summer look or dressed down with flats. Love!!!
Tight wrists but I was SO tempted to buy. Loved this!

I love this dress! The colors are so pretty! A size small was not available when I ordered the dress, so I went with a medium. The waist tie can be synched in, so the bigger size worked fine! If you're between sizes, the smaller or bigger size would work!
Super cute and flowy dress. Got many compliments.

This is such a beautiful dress! It ties at the waist so it's super flattering but it's also so fun. If you have a larger chest and butt I recommend sizing up. My normal size is a medium (8) in dresses but after reading reviews I decided to go for the XL. It was perfect for my chest and booty.

links_Review_Title: Don't wear on a hot day!
links_Review_Text: Overall, it was OK. The sleeves are extremely tight at the wrists and the material isn't pleasant on a hot day- beware! It was cute though! And I got compliments.

Obsessed. This dress went from work to date night to fancy dinner to weekend brunch seamlessly. I brought it along on a business trip to London and I wore it four times. Would wear this every day! The sleeves were a bit long for my arms but the elastic made it possible to keep them in place so it wasn't a problem at all. Rent this!

links_Review_Title: Would rent again in a second!
links_Review_Text: Seriously considered buying this dress - very comfortable and totally loved the style. The picture really doesn't do it justice. Must rent!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress but not the most comfortable
links_Review_Text: Wore for commencement with white heels. LOVE the look of this dress and it photographed great. Cons: warm/heavy, the drawstring isn't elastic at all, and the cinching on the sleeves is super tight and uncomfortable (esp since I wore my sleeves up higher on my forearms). Also worth noting is you can wear it in a bunch of different ways- I wore it unbuttoned like a v neck, but I also tried it buttoned all the way up, sleeves up vs down, waist tied vs loose like a shift, and even unbuttoned more to make it off-the-shoulders.
I rented this in a medium. I typically wear a size 6. I feel it runs big. I singed it as right as I could with the tie. Also the sleeves run very long
I wore this to a brunch and received so many complements! It was the perfect outfit, gorgeous and comfortable!
Love this dress!

links_Review_Title: Flowy floral dress for warm or chilly spring days!
links_Review_Text: I love this trendy dress by Alexis! Running true to size with a bit of stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for your back up. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and more loose at the hips. It works for all cup sizes. You are able to wear a standard bra with this dress. At 5’4”, the length hit mid-thigh on me. The pattern on the dress is pretty in person and the option to wear the sleeves up or down makes it unique option to wear on those tricky spring weather days! Pair with nude or colorful heels and fun earrings to complete your outfit!
beautiful fun dress! True to size. Can dress up or down....very "girly"!
This dress is stunning! Loved!
I love the fit of this dress. The tie waist is very flattering and its not too short for tall girls. I find this brand to run small so I got a M and it was perfect.

I avoided hearing this dress for more than a year because I never liked the way it looked on the model. Well, I should have known better - Alexis is just the best. The dress fit beautifully. I am petite and the waist still hit in a flattering spot - and it was great to adjust the waist with the tie. It was modest and flirty at the same time. Loved everything about this dress and wore it several times. Highly recommend.

links_Review_Title: Super cute! Wore this to an engagement party and received compliments.
links_Review_Text: Fit perfectly. Sleeves are long and large but its part of the style.
Perfect for a light summer dress by the beach unbuttoned but also could wear to work if you wanted to dress it up more conservatively

links_Review_Title: Never got so many compliments on a dress at work before this!
links_Review_Text: So flattering and great print! Love love love!!
The dress was great. Perfect for dressing up or down.
The cut of this dress is odd. There is a waist and then a drop waist in the most unflattering part of the dress, plus it's super short.
Very comfortable. Went to an outdoor event and in humid weather and it was not hot. Received many compliments. A little see through.
stunning in person, flattering fit and overall great day occasion dress!
When it first arrived, my husband didn't like it, but when I put it on, it was just so flattering! It was so easy to wear. It was perfect for my daughter's first birthday!
It's a little short for most work days, but it was appropriate for my work occasion. It's so comfortable and beautiful. The sleeves are my favorite.

I wore this dress for a bridal shower. The dress and fabric are so beautiful and lightweight. I was concerned about the fit, as I've never worn this designer before, but the sizing was spot-on. Very comfortable dress and flattering. I could wear it over and over again... and I just might!! :)

links_Review_Title: Bright, flowy, unforgettable! Need it as a staple in my closet...
links_Review_Text: This dress was absolutely flattering! It nipped in at all the right places, all the while remaining flowing in the rest. The color/pattern was bright and happy. I so want to keep this dress!

I wish this wasn't an Alexis dress and so expensive because I LOVED this dress. I got SOOO many compliments and it was the perfect dress to spruce up my wardrobe for spring. Length was great, not to short, the tie in the middle made it adjustable (depending on what I ate that day ha) and the fabric was light and roomy, but not too light! Alexis is definitely on the smaller size overall, so this was true to Alexis size, but definitely the M fits closer to a S if you are similar to my body!

links_Review_Title: I loved the pastel colors and the fit was great!
links_Review_Text: The rope tie at the waist helped turn this into a more fitted but comfortable dress.
Slightly short. I’m 5’2” and it was short on me. Wore with booties and it was adorable.

This dress has great colors and I liked the materials! I did not wear this dress because it was too short on me. I usually size up to get more length, but even after going up a few sizes it wasn't going to work for the bridal shower!
great print-easy and comfortable can dress up or down
Love this dress! A little big for an xs!
If you're petite do not get this, even XS fits like a L.
Cute top for a night out. Know top does hit at waist so can have crop top like look when moving etc
Super cute top and love the color! Very flattering, especially with the open back! True to size.
Beautiful color and very comfortable. It is a short/crop top but I wore it with high waisted jeans and my stomach didn't show.
I loved the fit and design of this. Helped shift my usually casual wardrobe a bit towards the dressier side. Loved the back detail as well!

This was a pretty floral top that gave all the feminine vibes. It is sheer on the top so I wore a strapless bra. It's also a bit short and would be best worn with high-waisted pants if you don't want to show your tummy.
I loved this shirt! It's a bit cropped, but it works with anything high waisted. The back has a cut out detail which is very pretty. Overall, a great daytime shirt for any casual occasion!

Runs a bit on the small side. & the blouse was a tad bit to short & shows some midriff. I wish it was a little bit longer. Maybe I'll wear it with a body suit or white shirt underneath. Overall a pretty blouse. I like the lace & style of the shirt it's very unique.

links_Review_Title: Color is gorgeous and fit was great. Not too tight in the arms
links_Review_Text: I wore is backwards accidentally and it still looked cute!
Easy to wear, comfortable and beautiful color, details ... I loved this top.
Super cute for all types of occasions! Great color
Had high hopes for this top. It's more of a crop than appears in the photo. Fit is very boxy and not flattering

links_Review_Title: Loved the top, very feminine and the color is beautiful!
links_Review_Text: Runs a little small. I usually wear 00/XS in tops and this one felt slightly snug. I have a short torso and this top is cut a little shorter so it worked perfectly for me!

This top is absolutely adorable, but I didn't end up wearing it because it is very short. I could definitely see my belly if I raise my arms and I'm just not super comfortable with that. I definitely recommend it though if you are comfortable with that.

links_Review_Title: I wore it for a party at my house, at work, and to a family get together.
links_Review_Text: Love the color and look of this top! Length worked for me, but would've been absolutely perfect if it was a teeny bit longer. Very feminine and comfortable because it's not tight in the belly area so I felt great it in not needing to suck anything in =) Didn't want to send this one back!
Loved the color of this. Received compliments. Would recommend wearing with high waisted bottoms since it's a crop style.
Was shorter than I thought but very pretty.

links_Review_Title: Wore it on a date night with my boyfriend who told me how gorgeous I looked about 10 times! :)
links_Review_Text: Fits great except it is a little short. You can always wear a cami underneath, but I did not since it was just for date night. The smallest bit of mid drift showed but it looked sexy. The keyhole back detail is beautiful as well!

links_Review_Title: Too short even though I am 4'11
links_Review_Text: While the color is so pretty, it's impossible to wear without an undershirt, mind you, I am only 4' 11. Didn't event end up wearing it.

links_Review_Title: Didn't love the fit for my size chest. 34 D.
links_Review_Text: Snug and not super flattering on me. Almost wanted to wear it backwards.

links_Review_Title: Sweet top - pretty lace and color
links_Review_Text: Great shirt- good fit. Short and cropped without being too short.

links_Review_Title: Nice color, tight around the neck and sleeves
links_Review_Text: This was a really pretty shirt -- great color, pretty lace, crop top but work appropriate with a high waisted skirt or pants. Only thing was it was a bit tight around the neck and around the elastic on the arm band that made it a bit uncomfortable.
The shape was a little weird

links_Review_Title: Cute top. The detail on the back is nice
links_Review_Text: Sits right at the waist

This shirt was very cute and I got quite a few compliments! I love that you can wear a regular bra with it. I did not like the length, it was just a bit too short hitting at the top button of my 9 in height jeans. I loved the color and the details.

I loved the color and the lace. It's a crop top that's a bit on the longer side, and the open back is really nice. It was pretty good movement, but the neckline was a little tight for my comfort. You also really need to wear a strapless bra for this, as bra straps show through the lace in the front and the open back. The sleeves were maybe a bit much for my own personal style, but it was a fun piece to wear!

I wore this to work. I have a short torso and wore it with high waisted jeans and it did not end up like a crop top on me. It was a great color and style and I got compliments on it. Caution if you lift up your arms it will show skin but that didn't bother me since I rarely have to reach for anything. Would recommend to others! Loved the lace detail, sleeves, and overall style :)

links_Review_Title: I dressed it down a bit with high waisted Levi's shorts and it was so cute. Want it.. too expensive
links_Review_Text: My torso is long and my chest is large and a small fit me.

links_Review_Title: Cute shirt, liked the color and the lace.
links_Review_Text: It was a little small and a little more cropped than it looks in the picture. I was able to wear it to work with high rise pants.
Runs small. The top was short on me (I'm 5'8) and felt I had to wear high waist jeans otherwise it'd be a crop top!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful and delicate, this top is the highlight of any outfit
links_Review_Text: Dress it up, or dress it down, this top is everything! Slightly cropped, makes highwaisted jeans look polished and perfect for any summery event. The fit was great, the color pops, and I received many compliments each time I wore it.

links_Review_Title: Great fit, falls right at waistline, nothing is too tight or baggy. Very flattering!
links_Review_Text: Easy to wear, lightweight and flattering.
This shirt definitely has a plunge to it! If you're comfortable showing a lot of cleavage- this shirt is a must rent.
Perfect fit! I have a large chest and it fit me perfectly!
Wore this out and got lots of compliments

links_Review_Title: Sexy, flattering top for a night out
links_Review_Text: I love this top so much that I've rented it twice. The stretchy material fits your body like a glove, and the amount of cleavage is perfect for a 2nd or 3rd date or a fun night out. I have a smaller chest, so it might be a little bit too revealing if you have been gifted with a larger chest than me.

Loved this top and the compliments were endless. Make sure you know how to use boob tape and such if you need a little support :) Fits TTS, maybe a little small, but not by a lot. I may have to buy this to have on hand!!

Literally can't wait to rent this again. I got it for my best friends 30th in Lake Tahoe and it was perfect. Long sleeve made it a warmer option in the cold weather, but the pattern and lace kept it very sexy. It's extremely forgiving material super stretchy and forms to your figure like a glove. Loooooove this piece.

Wow! This top made me feel so sexy. I'm modest but I feel in love with this beauty. I didn't need to wear a bra and used pasties. It is very form fitting so size up if you want a less fitted look. The material is soft and easy to wear. I might buy this top I loved it so much!
This shirt was a hit! Wore with black jeans for anniversary dinner with my husband. Very flattering and received tons of compliments.

links_Review_Title: It would've bee great if I got a bigger size
links_Review_Text: Comfortable material
Snug to body and deep v but perfect for a Vegas night! Will snag again.

Very pretty top yet poorly made. Lining was skimpy,poorly made and wouldn't stay in place. On my torso seams fell in awkward spot above waste yet too far below bust. I really wanted to like this top, for me though it wasn't flattering. If you want to try it definitely size up and have a good bra for plunging neckline.
Too tight and a bit low cut but cute. Could not wear

links_Review_Title: My husband wants to buy this shirt!
links_Review_Text: I did find it a bit snug. I am usually a XS/S and wore the S. It fit, but was skin tights. It runs a tiny bit short. It did not show any stomach, though. The cut is very deep, so be prepared to show cleavage. If that is what you are looking for, this is the shirt for you.

links_Review_Title: Was way too much cleavage, couldn't wear it
links_Review_Text: Form fitting and nice on the arms but way too tight on the chest
This shirt is an amazing fit; it does show cleavage but has enough spandex in it to hold your chest up in a flattering way.
I LOVED THIS! it is so flattering, so comfy, well made and perfect for a night out. I will definitely be renting again.

links_Review_Title: Cute and fun but not too revealing
links_Review_Text: Fit snug, accentuated my cleavage

Wore this for going out on a Friday and I wish it wasn't so darn expensive or I would've bought it! Super stretchy and small chest friendly (doesn't gap or anything)... rent this top you'll feel hot all night.

I put this on , zipped it up, and where it stopped I thought "oh, this is a low cut plunge, and went on about my day.... it wasn't until after I walked my runway in my living room , it actually pulls up further:) I guess you could wear it both ways:) what I did was tape lift my boobs with clear wide tape and it made my chest look fabulous! Try it!

links_Review_Title: The Jumpsuit made me feel sexy and powerful!
links_Review_Text: The fit was perfect, it shows of your curves. It was very comfortable to wear even though it was a sequin jumpsuit, the inside was soft and not scratching my skin. I always dress in black and the color of this jumpsuit was just beautiful, it is a little bit brighter in person. Perfect for a girls night out! I would wear it again.
Surprisingly comfortable. No chaffing from sequins. Stretchy and smooths over curves. Front zip. Fun to wear.

links_Review_Title: Wasn’t going to wear it to my event
links_Review_Text: Fit nicely

links_Review_Title: If you are petite rent this jumpsuit!
links_Review_Text: This jumpsuit is amazing. I saw it months ago and have been waiting for a reason to rent it. It is super comfortable- fully lined and you cannot feel the sequins through the lining. Zipper in the front for easy in and out. The pants are cropped - so for a 5"3' gal it was ideal. I got so many compliments on this outfit! I wore it to a party in NYC and it fit the location perfectly.

links_Review_Title: This was one of my favorite rentals.
links_Review_Text: This was one of my favorite rentals!!! I wore this to a POAC gala .... it was definitely a hit!!! I received so many compliments and wows..... so thank you RTR !!! I would suggest sizing up- as this piece does run on the small side in the torso area- so comfortable it felt like I was wearing pajamas!!!

links_Review_Title: Very warm and perfect for cold nights. Lots of compliments. Wore this to see Broadway show Wicked.
links_Review_Text: no pockets

links_Review_Title: Impeccable material with a good stretch
links_Review_Text: The piece was of great quality. Very glamorous but not too exposive. Unfortunately I am not of a taller physique how most of the RTR pieces run, but luckily this fit right on the money.

Comfortable, beautiful and fun. I wore this for a New Year Party and got a lot of compliments. For me was this jumpsuit fit like a glove. I am 4'11" and it is always difficult finding jumpsuits that fit right. Very good quality and color. Thinking about keeping this.

Had my eyes on this since it came out and I KNEW I had to have it for NYE - if you can't wear a sequined catsuit then, when can you? Absolutely loved it! Ran a little small, but also it was post-holidays ;) I have a longer torso, a 34G bust, and am usually a 10-12 in designer clothes and I went with the XL to make sure that I could move around comfortably & not have it ride up. Go with your TTS for a sexier fit, or size up for a fit that skims you a bit more (and leaves rooms for champagne)

I got SO many compliments on this jumpsuit-- it's outrageous, but a lot of fun. The shape is not super flattering (at least not on my body), and it doesn't do much to show your waist or your butt, but it's so bold and dramatic that I don't think the fit mattered much. It was also VERY comfortable and awesome for a full night of dancing. Got a pretty hot and sweaty on the dance floor-- would not recommend for a mid-summer rental. Nice to be able to choose how high to zip it up in front.
This jumpsuit was awesome! Fits true to size and is super comfortable. Rented for a birthday party and it was perfect.

Loved this jumpsuit. Wore it to a space-themed office holiday party with some big moon-shaped earrings. I'm typically a size 4 these days, so was a bit worried it might be big, but it fit perfectly. It hugged my body a bit better than on the model. I'm busty, long-limbed, and athletic and this honestly felt like sparkly pajamas. I did wear spanx, and honestly the bathroom trip wasn't nearly as bad as my other jumpsuits that zip up the back. Wish I could've kept it.

The jumpsuit literally fit like a GLOVE. I found the XSR to be a little small- which would be my normal size, so I went with the SR and was super comfortable all night. The zipper allows you to be as modest (or not!) as you like. The sequin is super well made and soft on the outside, but the inside is literally like pajamas. I wore this for a work holiday party and got lots of compliments. Super fun.

links_Review_Title: Perfect and fun for this particular concert!
links_Review_Text: Fit true to size. I'm only 5'1 so it was good lengthwise. Just a fun and unique outfit to wear out.
So happy I had this number DJing a dance party that evolved into an engagement party.

links_Review_Title: One of my favorite RTR outfits!
links_Review_Text: This jumper was AMAZING. I felt sexy but not too over the top for a holiday work party. I was so comfortable and received tons of compliments! Definitely order the size you would normally wear and then a size up to be safe. Would definitely rent this again!

Beautiful jumpsuit - Heavy and of good quality. Many compliments throughout the night. SIZE UP as other other reviews suggested. Front zipper gives option to have a conservative neckline or a deep plunge.

This was such a fun piece to wear! I got so many compliments on this jumpsuit, and it was super comfortable! It is lined, so it's great for a winter or fall event. The sleeves were tight on the Medium, but I have muscular arms. The top was a bit difficult to get off, but is doable!

links_Review_Title: I wore this for a NYE wedding - attire was “formal.” Got a lot of compliments!
links_Review_Text: The fit was perfect! Super comfy, especially for “formal” attire. It zips in the front, so you can decide how high or low you want the “v” to be. The material is soft on the inside, and there’s some velvet behind the sequins. The overall jumpsuit has a heavy feel so it’s nice for the winter (not too heavy to wear at all, though). Highly recommend, I loved wearing it!
This sequins jumpsuit is so comfortable! At first glance I assumed it would be itchy once on, not at all. I received compliments all night. Rent it!

If you have never gone full sequin know this: there is no stretch like our normal daily clothes- plan to get a larger size just Incase!! I loved this, worn to NYE party, color is great. Might be tight in the chest if you're bigger. Inner lining at the bottom of the legs stuck out a little, tucked it back up a bit a few times. No underarm scratching bec of the sleeves.

I wore this romper to a New Year's Eve party and received so many compliments. It was a little heavy so I would recommend wearing it in cool weather otherwise you might get overheated. It was the perfect outfit for the occasion.

Wore this for our family's Christmas Eve party and it was incredible! The material was this and luxurious. It does run small though, and for my fellow long torso girls I suggest sizing up so you aren't crouching your shoulders all night

I LOVED this jumpsuit!! I'm 5'0 tall and always have a hard time finding good jumpsuits but this one felt like it was made for me. I got compliments all night long at the work Christmas party. I usually am a size 2 but ended up using the Small so that it fit more comfortably.

links_Review_Title: Wore this to my work holiday party (which is formal); got a ton of compliments.
links_Review_Text: The M fit me like a glove; it was incredibly comfortable, I felt like I was wearing pajamas but looked like a rock star. Easy to get on and off with the front zip (which caught a little at the waist, but I didn't have too much trouble gently easing it past that point). Fabric is heavy, excellent for winter and covering up any lines underneath. Color is a little brighter than it looks in photos.

This romper was THE PERFECT choice for my company holiday party - it was comfortable and so flattering on my curves. I got stopped by people all night telling me how much they loved it. The color choice is perfect to subdue all the sparkle. I couldn't have loved it more!

links_Review_Title: I received so many compliments and it was so comfortable.
links_Review_Text: It fit perfectly. Showstopper. So very comfortable and fun.

I rented both the Small and Medium sizes, but I ended up wearing the small. It was slightly tight on me due to the length (I'm 5'5")...had I been about a 1/2 inch shorter this would've been a perfect fit! The medium practically swallowed me. I got compliments all night on this stunner of an outfit.
I rented this for an awards show and I got compliments all night. I'm not normally into sequins but this was the perfect amount of sparkle and so flattering.
Wore out to a 70's themed Bachelorette Party and it was perfect! Slightly short in the torso but I'm tall So that's normal. Danced all night and had a blast

I would have sized up to look a little more like the picture. I'm 5'6, 130 lbs. This has a nice liner and is super comfortable. I have a long torso and that part was a bit snug. This was so fun to wear.

I wore this to a Lizzo concert in San Francisco and let me tell you, I felt like 1 bajillion dollars! After surviving cancer and two brain aneurysms last year, it was important to celebrate my birthday with a bang. And this was PERFECT for that! The fabric was beautiful and actually surprisingly comfortable! Not super stretchy but enough give that I didn't feel stuffy. It was pretty easy to get in and out of too for bathroom breaks. For the right occasion, this is THE PERFECT OUTFIT!

links_Review_Title: Super gorgeous-i wish the bottom ran a little more spacious
links_Review_Text: 1. Super super fancy-if you like the look already 2. Top(upper) feels perfect as the size is given 3. Bottom is like a skinny jean if you have more than a chicken legs. Point- i would have ordered a size up for the leg to look like a model in the photo

I'm a true size 8 and this fit like a glove. But there was no extra room and it's a VERY fitted stretchy material so I would suggest sizing up! The zipper goes up really high in front but I think it looks better with some more cleavage- especially since I am wearing it for a Halloween party. So I left the zipper only zipped halfway. The material is a velvet with sequins.

I absolutely loved this jumpsuit! I rented it for my wedding rehearsal dinner and received so many compliments. It isn't scratchy at all, there is a good liner inside. It fits true to size but it was a little tight getting my arms into it.

Whenever you see sequins, you think itchy. But this jumpsuit is smooth and silky on the inside and fits like a glove. It's gorgeous and unforgettable. I wore this out to a birthday dinner, and when I walked in, a girl immediately came up to me to talk about this jumpsuit. It truly is a showstopper!

Rented this for a black tie event and got so many compliments! The fit is so flattering, the quality of the fabric is amazing and the sequins and color are beautiful! And I felt so comfy like I was lounge wear all evening! Don't miss renting this.
Fit my small frame really well.

links_Review_Title: Comfortable if you can get it on...
links_Review_Text: I wear a 4 and the small wouldn’t even go over my hips. I could zip the medium up but it was so tight that it looked like sequin spanx. It was very soft in the inside, fun and well made but this curvy girl wasn’t looking her best in this jumpsuit! Love the front zipper to decide how much you want to show.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful fabric, feel like a princess wearing this

links_Review_Text: I wanted to wear this to work but there was way too much cleavage - would love to rent again for a nice weekend brunch or something! Other stuff I loved on @thanksitsrtr
Incredibly flattering and elegant. I've never gotten more compliments. The shoulder pads are a nice touch, as are the buttons. Can be worn to work or dressed up.

Currently working on my post baby body and this dress made me feel beautiful! It fit nicely in all the right places and was so feminine and beautiful. I would have bought it if it wasn't so expensive.
See through and deep v neck.
Fit perfectly. I love the stretchy sleeves because sometimes sleeves are too tight on me! DEFINITELY needed a slip underneath. Got tons of compliments!

Loved this dress. Feminine and flattering cut. Pretty print and color. Good length for tall. I had to pin top as too low cut but fit perfectly elsewhere. The dress is lined except the top-half of the back. I could wear without a bra so it didn't bother me that the back was fairly sheer, but if you wear a bra you would see the outline at the back. I wore with the shoulder pads but they are removable. Zips up the back so don't have to deal with the buttons down front.

I only wore this to work but it would be great for a spring/summer occasion. I wore a tank underneath but could've done without if not at work. The floral pattern is so pretty, and something about the flow of the dress was so gorgeous - I felt very elegant while I walked! Definitely runs large since I usually rent a 4 at the very smallest and more often a 6.

This dress was really pretty and perfect for Easter brunch. It's pretty sheer, so I put a nude slip underneath. I also put a safety pin at the top of the neckline because it was just a tiny bit too deep. I was worried about the sleeves (I have bigger arms), but they're elastic- yay! I ordered the size that was suggested (the 2) but probably could have even gone done one. I didn't mind the extra room, though. The fabric is so light and airy. I would definitely rent this again for a wedding or outdoor event.

links_Review_Title: beautiful style but VERY low cut
links_Review_Text: This is a beautiful but thin/sheer fabric that is very flattering. Fit true to size (I'm normally a 2, wore a 1R). I didn't end up wearing it because it was so low cut and there was a small hole in the one that I received, but I think it would look great with a bralette or nude slip underneath.

links_Review_Title: Love this dress! Beautiful print, but very sheer. You will need a slip!
links_Review_Text: I love the print and the flowy chiffon fabric, but it's very sheer. You definitely need a slip with it. the zipper sort of pokes out at the bottom on the one I had. Not sure if all sizes do this, but mine did. It was a little loose, so maybe if it was tighter, it wouldn't do that. I still loved it though!

Dress is super cute and comfortable. I highly recommend wearing a slip under the dress, it is a bit see through. In addiiton to that, it is a bit low cut so be aware of the bra / slip you are wearing.

links_Review_Title: I wore this to the Grand Ole Oprah and it fantastic. I felt like the main star in the new Notebook.
links_Review_Text: airy, great arm coverage, love the front button detail
Deep v, cute puffy sleeves, super flattering!

links_Review_Title: Sheer sheer sheer - but granny ish
links_Review_Text: This dress was Not a hit. I liked it overall but it can look a bit frumpy. I wore a vest as I am very booby. As all the reviews said it's Very see through. Didn't love it but perfectly fine for an unlimited rental

This dress was way big in the chest. I am usually a 6/8 in dresses and rented a 3R. It was baggy in the chest, and a but big everywhere else. I should have ordered a size down. The arms holes are flexible, which is nice. A lot of dresses with shirt sleeves have constricting arms but this one does not.

links_Review_Title: Pretty and perfect for a hot day
links_Review_Text: Ran big in the chest and shoulders. Light weight and perfect for a hot day. Was low cut but could have just been due to the fact that it was too big, wore a cami underneath to hide the goodies.

links_Review_Title: Wore to church with a sweater over it.
links_Review_Text: A little large in the bust, but overall great throw on dress for everyday in the Spring. Wouldn't recommend for work since it's a little low cut.

links_Review_Title: BEAUTIFUL fabric, color and fit! Flattering for hour glass!
links_Review_Text: I sized up to fit my chest and ended up having to wear a tube tube underneath. But I got so many compliments, it fit like a dream, felt great!

As title states, super see-through. And I didn't have a slip, so couldn't wear this dress. It comes with shoulder pads, which are removable, thankfully. Wish I could have worn it. Very cute for a spring party.
Ok in the front, BUT sheer in the back

links_Review_Title: I wore this to church on Easter.
links_Review_Text: This dress is beautiful but completely transparent. You need a slip or flesh colored underwear for this dress, and even with the flesh colored underwear the outline of your legs will be visible through the dress in the sunlight.

So comfortable and so beautiful! This dress is slightly larger than other The Kooples dresses I have rented in the past. Erring on the conservative side, I sized up after a disastrous rental with their white eyelet dress last week. I rented the 2R and it was ample everywhere but it didn't look or feel giant on me. I wore it once already and I am saving it for Easter Sunday.
Really pretty dress but ran a little bigger than I expected.

This is the perfect rental, it's a jumpsuit, it's a dress, you have the best of both worlds. The fit is so flattering, the jumpsuit portion is comfy and not restrictive, the legs are not too wide or too skinny. The overlay is so pretty, I like this combination. I highly recommend it for fellow pear shapes, would also be great for a curvy, athletic figure. Check out my other pics on Instagram: renttherunwayfashionista

links_Review_Title: Best fitting romper, but not my style .
links_Review_Text: I don't have the figure to wear a romper. I am pear shaped , so if a romper fits my hips, it is too big everywhere else. This fit really well . The floral layer covered all the awkward and imperfect areas ,so it looked fine and felt custom made. Something about it , though, it just not my style . Strong 90s feel. I sent it back without wearing.
Super comfortable and cute! Loved the pockets and the fit. The top is structured enough that I didn't need to wear a bra.
Flattering, comfortable and fun!
Overall this jumpsuit is really cute and comfortable! Got some compliments. It has adjustable straps which are super useful and is a pretty thick material so you feel supported
Gorgeous, bright and fun. Loved everything about this jumpsuit. I received so many compliments!!!! The fit was true to size and I thought it was very flattering. Love the pockets also:)
This was much thicker than I thought it would be. It was comfortable and fit exactly how i wanted it to.
This was my all time favorite so far. I got it for my trip to Hawaii. It was perfect and so comfortable. I have a really large chest and even that area fit great! Highly recommend!
The 4R fit great and was really comfortable! Got lots of compliments and it was perfect for my recent vacation!

I'm obsessed with this jumpsuit. The quality is great, material is thick but not too thick (I wore it in Austin and was fine), and it's sooo flattering. Pretty easy to get out of to go to the bathroom too. Highly recommend!
I have a short torso and the waist hit just right for me. Loved the skinny straps with the full pant leg; it's a good way to avoid being swallowed up by a wide-leg when you're petite.

Fabulous jumpsuit. The fabric is thick and rich. The top is lined. I wish I'd gotten a size 4 because the 6 was a little too baggy but on short notice, I was perfectly happy with it. It's such a flattering silhouette! I wore it in Madrid, and the compliments just kept on coming!

Rented this originally in an 8 with a 10 backup size. I am normally between a 6 and an 8 but I have 34DDDs so I erred on the side of caution. The 8 would've fit but thankfully I called and the 6 was still available so they overnighted it to me. Great service. The jumpsuit itself is so stunning and I have never gotten more compliments. No bra needed the material is thick. Favorite rental ever and I have rented a lot

Absolutely loved this rental! Wore it twice, to a party and then to the beach... got so many compliments. Had just the right amount of cleavage and looked great with a cardigan or denim jacket. I have a larger chest [36 in] so I recommend sizing up if you have some boobies too because it fit great over "the girls" and was only a little big on the rest of my body. The straps were a little hard to adjust but I eventually figured it out. Loved this! So great for summer and even early fall on a warm day, so recommend!

I rented this to wear to a wedding and was so glad I did. The fabric was thick and luxurious and felt very expensive. It was also extremely comfortable to wear and the pockets were such a nice touch. The top is cut high enough that I also felt comfortable wearing this to work. I got tons of compliments on this and seriously considered keeping it! I will definitely rent again.

links_Review_Title: Great fit, didn't wear a bra
links_Review_Text: Love this romper. It's thick material but wasn't too hot to wear in the Florida heat

I rented this jumpsuit for a family wedding and absolutely loved it. The fit was perfect and so flattering, I was comfortable all night. The pattern was adorable without being too over the top and I received so many compliments - would definitely rent again!

I loved this jumpsuit and so did my husband. I wore this several times throughout my 2nd trimester and felt so good in it I didn't want to return it. I would say that it runs slightly large since it's not meant for maternity and it fit me perfectly at 22 pregnant. Would love to rent this again after baby!

links_Review_Title: Dinner out and Work the Next Day
links_Review_Text: This jumpsuit was fabulous! I'd consider buying it but with such a stand out print, I'm not sure I could get a ton of wear out of it. That being said, it's a perfect piece to rent. The fabric is a bit heavier weight, so it draped beautifully. It was easy to step into and zip by myself. The straps were also adjustable, which was perfect for me (shorter torso/longer legs). The cut and length were perfect for my 5'7" frame. I paired it was pumps but it could easily go with sandals. I received a ton of compliments at the office. I also used a cardigan sweater to cover up though a light weight jacket would also work.
I loved everything about this! The colors were so vibrant, the fabric felt luxe inside and out. Wore it on a date and to a baby shower.
Thicker than I realized but still quite flattering And easy to wear.

links_Review_Title: The color was vibrant and beautiful! Great for a summer bridal shower!
links_Review_Text: I loved the jumpsuit! My only complaint was that I had a 50 minute drive to the party and when I got out of the car the legs of the jumpsuit were wrinkled. It wasn't very noticeable in person but I can see the wrinkles in pictures.
Absolutely loved this jumpsuit. Adjustable straps made for a perfect fit. Will definitely rent again.

links_Review_Title: Loved the pattern, fit was off
links_Review_Text: Wanted it to work so bad, but it was way too small in the chest even though I sized up. A bit short for my height as well. Beautiful colors

This for so well. I wore it out for my birthday dinner with the girls. I am normally between an 8 and 10 and the 10 fit perfect. I did wear a strapless bra but the chest area was a little snug so it held everything in place nicely (34 DD). I would definitely rent this again. Got lots of compliments.

links_Review_Title: Perfect for Bachelorette Weekend at the beach
links_Review_Text: Rented for a Hawaiian themed bachelorette party weekend. Wore a 6 and it fit well but could have sizes down since it is a looser fit. Material is thicker so no bra needed. Straps are adjustable. Zipper in back made it easy to get in and out of. Loved it so much that I wore it to work with a sweater and wedges before returning it!! It's bold and I got so many complements! Definitely not something I would have picked out in a store but am so glad I took a chance on this!

This jumpsuit was so comfy and flattering, can be dressed up or down. I will say that it's lined and not super breathable so a little tough on a hot day. Also, the top was a little bit big (but not so much that it really mattered).

This is by far my favorite piece I've ever rented. It fit so well! Nice thick material- no need to wear a bra. The colors & print are gorgeous. This jumpsuit is amazing.....I would have bought it if it were less expensive.

links_Review_Title: Bright piece that transitions well from day to night.
links_Review_Text: I usually size up to 12 for my hips and DDD's bc sometimes the designers run small but this was true to size and quite baggy. I wanted to love this - it is light weight and bright and I got lots of compliments. That was before I sat at my desk for an hour. It got super wrinkly and stayed that way for the rest of the day. Fit great in the chest so if you're smaller up top it might be too big.
Fit great loved the pockets and bold, bright colors!

links_Review_Title: A scary motorcycle man complimented me
links_Review_Text: We were at a dive bar in Kentucky and a terrifying motorcycle gang-looking dude said he liked this jumpsuit. Material is nice and thick and you don't have to wear a bra. Gorgeous colors and print, like the biker said.
I wore this outfit to a baby shower, and it fit like a glove. Thick material, really don't need to wear a bra. The floral print is fun and it's a really high quality piece!

This outfit was great to wear. The fabric felt nice, the fit was great. It was a little big on top for me but I am small on top and bigger in the bottom. I used this outfit for a smart trip to Napa and it was perfect for the occasion. I would recommend this outfit. Good fit for pear shaped bodies.
So comfortable, and has pockets!
I loved the jumper it camouflaged my stomach. I'm a 36DD and was able to wear no bra the material and adjustable straps provided enough support

links_Review_Title: Loved it, most compliments on any outfit I've rented!
links_Review_Text: Loved it and would love to buy it but too pricey for me. Will definitely rent again. I received more compliments than any other rental I have had. It fit true to size the only problem I had was with the straps, but I always have problems as my shoulders are very small.

I love this jumpsuit! I originally rented this to wear around on the weekend but the fabric is definitely more on the formal side so I ended up wearing it for Easter. It fit perfect and was super flattering. For reference I'm 5'7" 126 lbs 32C and carry my weight in my hips.

links_Review_Title: So perfect for spring. Sturdy fabric and vibrant colors.
links_Review_Text: Classy and flattering

I rented this for a bridal shower and absolutely LOVED it. I rented a 14 because I was nervous the 12 wouldn't fit. I could have 100% worn a 12 but the 14 worked out great! I'm 5'9 and 190 so renting can sometimes not go great when it comes to jumpers. This was by far my favorite thing I've ever rented to date. It was comfortable and the material was so nice! I got so many compliments and it made me feel amazing! I even was able to go braless which NEVER happens for these 38D's haha! I highly recommend this jumper to everyone! Especially my girls that are curvy like me!!!

Although I am working from home most days, I am trying to still have fun with fashion and feel good about myself, and this outfit helped. The size zero is snug in all the right places and formfitting, but it made for the perfect fit and was not uncomfortable. I wore it to my home office and used the computer the majority of the day. The bright colors and pattern made me smile.
Fits a little right but it's comfy and nice. Beautiful print

I'm pretty average length, I don't usually have an issue with jumpsuits being too short for me, but this one was. The straps are adjustable which helps, but if I pulled the top up where it should be over my chest it would ride up too much in the crotch, especially when sitting down. I made it work for a day out with family. The floral design is beautiful, the fabric is very thick and a bit stretchy, it really feels high quality. The chest was a bit snug, I easily wore it without a bra which I liked, but larger busted ladies will want to size up.

Loved this dress. The fabric is smooth, thick, lined, and non-stretchy. I am generally a 6 or 8, and I wore an 8 in this dress. It was a smidge snug around the hips but perfect on top (which is pretty normal for me). My backup was the 10, which could have worked too, but the fit was a bit too loose on top. The straps are adjustable, which made it fit a lot better for me. Didn’t need a bra or spanx, since the fabric and lining provided great support and coverage. The pattern on the fabric is gorgeous in person. This dress was really flattering.
This was really pretty fit well, was fun and sexy but still wedding appropriate

links_Review_Title: Sexy, comfortable and still work event appropriate.
links_Review_Text: Rented this for an industry daytime event (a tea). Got a TON of compliments. Fit true to size. I'm a 12/14, but especially thick around the ribs, so the 14 was necessary, but I didn't care! Should have bought this because, with a jacket, I could actually wear it to work. Will check the sample sale!!
Really liked the adjustable straps and not having to wear a bra is always a plus. The bottom on me was a little big, but I probably should either eat more hamburgers or size down. Love this dress!
Great for a spring/summer event. Comfortable easy to wear dress. Not super flattering in photos but worked out great for my sisters bridal shower. Good length for Petite girls
Amazing fit. Tons of compliments. Fits a large bust very well, no bra needed.

links_Review_Title: So beautiful I wanted to keep it!
links_Review_Text: Gorgeous dress! I usually wear a 6 but the 8 fit better. I wish I could keep this one!
Got this dress as a backup and it looked great! Very comfortable and very flattering. I would own this dress for sure! Perfect for a fall Florida wedding!

5'9 and size 12 and the 12 fit like a glove - snug but not too tight. It was pretty fitted in the top (D cup for reference) and I could wear without a bra since it held the girls in place. Straps are adjustable too which is a nice touch! Fabric has some stretch so really shows off the curves. I opted to wear for Spanx but you don't have to since the fabric is pretty think, stretchy, and forgiving. Great dress and compliments galore!

links_Review_Title: Lovely dress with a beautiful print. Sweetheart neckline adds an elegant touch.
links_Review_Text: This dress runs a tad small and was a little snug in the chest and torso, but it was still very comfortable.
I loved this rental! Stretchy and flattering, I felt great in it. I would rent it again.
Fits as expected
The dress fit like glove and the straps are adjustable. Love the knee length. Didn't need to wear a bra which was great!
I am 5'5" 110 lbs and the 2 fit like a glove. Beautiful dress!!

links_Review_Title: This dress is super flattering! Lots of compliments too!
links_Review_Text: It ran a bit small for me. I usually wear a 10, but I ordered a back up size of a 12 based on reviews. I ended up wearing the 12. It's a little busty, so be cautious if you prefer to cover up more. Very cute and flattering!

I wore this dress to my 20 year high school reunion. It is so beautiful on, feels super expensive and fits like it was made for me. I got the 6 and the 8 because other reviews said it ran small. I am usually between and 4 or 6. The 6 fit wonderfully. I'm SO HAPPY I rented this dress and would rent it again (or buy it) in a heartbeat. I got so many compliments all night and it was surprisingly comfortable all night long.

links_Review_Title: Floral print was perfect for this outdoor garden wedding. Loved the colors, lots of compliments.
links_Review_Text: Fit was great, looked nice with black shoes. Comfortable for dancing. Would rent again!

Size up! I am usually an 8-10 and the 12 fit me just right - couldn't even zip the ten over my backside. Other than the sizing, this dress was PERFECT! The material was just thick enough to be forgiving (plus, didn't have to wear a bra!!) but not too thick to where I was dying for an outdoor southern summer wedding. The straps are adjustable. The length is perfect and the shape and tightness of the dress is just right to show off curves but also hide imperfections. I would definitely rent this dress again!

links_Review_Title: Obsessed with this dress I wish I bought it
links_Review_Text: So sexy and fit perfectly. Extremely flattering, I will definitely be renting again

links_Review_Title: Complements made it worth every penny
links_Review_Text: That pic isn't very flattering but I really enjoyed wearing this dress. The size 2 was a bit snug on the ribs. Around that black belt there is absolutely no give (including when you try to zip it up) but there's stretch in the belly which overall made the dress is very comfortable and beautiful. I was nervous about only getting one size but I read almost every review looking for ladies near my height/weight/body type and I think I made a great choice.

links_Review_Title: This dress was perfect for an outdoor Vermont wedding.
links_Review_Text: The dress fit perfect! I am 5'6 and it hit just below the knee. It was comfortable and easy to wear!
This dress was so beautiful and I recurved so many compliments! It fit so well and was so flattering. I would buy it if I could!!!

Loved this dress. It’s the perfect mix of classy and sexy. Definitely form fitting so size up. The dress accentuates your curves and hides a lot of sin. I wore it to a high-end wedding in NYC. Received compliments all night long. Would rent again.

The dress has a great, substantial fabric which was flattering. I liked that it was a little past my knees (I'm short). It definitely is a little small on the top so if you have a larger chest, it might be tight. Otherwise, true to size!

links_Review_Title: The "girls" were on display but secure
links_Review_Text: I wore this to a wedding in Cape Cod. It was very secure feeling which is great since my chest is a little bigger than average and I was still nursing at the time. I got so many compliments and people asked me where they could buy it too.
I absolutely felt stunning in this dress! The fit does run small but once on it fit like a glove. Would rent this dress again.

I wore this for a rehearsal dinner & felt beautiful. Once I got it zipped up past the black stripe under the boob area (with my husbands help, and several attempts) it felt perfectly snug. I wore an adhesive bra underneath...but I don't know if I really needed a bra at all. Funny thing is, I walked into the party and someone had the exact same dress on as me (see picture -I'm on the left). We got a great laugh out of it (must be a popular choice?). I do feel like it ran small. It isn't very forgiving around the tummy area (the fabric is like a tighter silk -- but still has some give). Overall, I really loved wearing it & received compliments on the pattern and style.

I am between a 2 and a 4. I wore the 4 and it felt great on. I needed to pull the hem down after sitting for a while because it is form fitting around the hips and thighs. But overall, a great fit! I would rent this dress again. Perfect for a summer wedding.
I loved this dress! I'm usually between a size 4 and 6 (I'm a 4 on top, 6 on the bottom) and a 4 worked great! The silhouette was very flattering and I received many compliments.

links_Review_Title: Wore this beautiful dress to an outdoor wedding, fit and cut of this dress is great,
links_Review_Text: Great dress for hourglass figure, heavy material so no need for spanx, adjustable straps, beautiful dress, recieved many compliments

links_Review_Title: So many compliments! A bit tight in the torso
links_Review_Text: I rented this dress for a summer wedding in Charleston, SC. I normally wear a size 2 in pants and xs/s tops, so I got a 2&4 dress. The 2 wouldn't even zip in the torso, no clue how it actually fits anyone that wants to be able to breathe. The 4 fit much better, a bit snug in the rib cage too and I'm not big busted. It's roomy in the hips if you have a larger bottom. I'm pretty narrow in the hips and there was plenty of fabric I could pinch on the side, but you couldn't tell. The fabric has some give in it but it very soft and comfy. I received ton of compliments from people all evening. Definitely recommend this dress, but you may want to get the next size up from what you normally wear. Happy renting!
The fit was perfect and the material was very soft yet firm and well made. I didn’t fill out the top perfectly but I still loved the look.
I wore this dress to a wedding welcome party. It was comfortable and looked great. Wore the size 4 and fit true to size.

links_Review_Title: Perfect dress for my sons Wild One themed party!
links_Review_Text: I'm 5'2 126lbs & the size 4 was PERFECT! So many compliments!
Fit like a glove, didn't need to wear a bra. Great length for a wedding. Got so many compliments. Made me feel fabulous. (Of course didn't get a good pic of me in it at wedding)
Fitted, elegant sheath - received lots of compliments. Spanx made this fit much nicer for me.

This dress was great quality, comfortable, and made me look like I have curves I don't really have! I am on the short side so I did a little temporary hemming with fashion tape but otherwise it was a perfect fit.

I got compliments on this dress all night long! I wore to an indoor, evening, summer wedding. I will say that the top, while flattering, very difficult to zip up alone. I ultimately needed assistance getting past the black trim line. Still a knockout dress, I'd consider even renting again! I generally wear a 0-2 and went with the size 2, which fit like a glove.

I loved this dress! 10/10! It was very fitted but I didn't feel restrained or constricted in any way. My measurements are 38"-30"-39" for reference. I really appreciate the space in the chest so that nothing was being squeezed. No need for a bra, either, but plenty of support. It was a warm evening- mid 80s- and I didn't feel too warm in the fabric. I got a lot of compliments - the bride said "you look GOOD!" and my husband was a huge fan, too. Definitely recommend if you want to enjoy your curviness!

links_Review_Title: The dress was very comfortable. I would rent it again if I could.
links_Review_Text: I like that the straps were adjustable. The length of the dress was perfect for my 5'2" height.

links_Review_Title: Pretty and comfy, right amount of sparkly
links_Review_Text: Love the straps are adjustable. So fun to dance in so sexy but not too revealing
This fit like a glove and got so many compliments at a New Year's Eve wedding. Loved this dress - comfortable and flattering
I loved this dress - perfect for a holiday party.

Loved the fit of this dress. The fabric is anti-cling and the sparkles are fun without being too flashy. The straps are adjustable which makes it great for small or big chested girls. The slip under the dress gave it a sexy tone too. Received compliments all night - would rent again.
It's perfect for any formal occasion. Fit perfectly.
Fit like a glove! Very comfortable and easy to dance in. Will consider renting this one again
A little tight around the midsection, so I had to size up. The slip is short, so the slit runs pretty high! Gorgeous dress.
The fit was great but as with most things sequined it was a bit itchy.

links_Review_Title: Best dress I have ever worn
links_Review_Text: Got so many compliments on this! Such a flattering fit, body hugging all the way down to the hips then a gorgeous hemline. Comfy, doesn't wrinkle after sitting and is so easy to dance in.
This was too large in the top for me. The next size down would probably work. It's a very classy, elegant dress. The fabric is amazing.
Doesnt fit well
Fit great. Loved it
i wore it to work and dressed it down with a blazer but it was super comfortable and flowed so beautifully. can dress it up with fancy heels. just a lovely dress

links_Review_Title: wore this to my ballroom dancing party and it looked beautiful when dancing
links_Review_Text: I liked the design and the material, although the shoulder and waist fitting was off. I wore it to dance at a ballroom showcase and it looked amazing. Got compliments from the ladies in the room.
Great dress, rented the 18R. The neck was a little strange to figure out. The dress was heavy but so pretty it didnt matter. Would rent again

I wear 6 and 8' with TL (I'm between a 6/8). I wore the 6 with this dress since it was available. It was a little tight and the pockets bulged a little, I would love to rerent in an 8. The dress is truly stunning. Heavy material.
N/A

links_Review_Title: Beautiful Dress, the size I normally wear was too big, so I did not get to wear to wedding!
links_Review_Text: Bottom fit good, top was a little large!

This dress fit like a glove! I am 5' 2", 115#, and the 0 was perfect. Although it's a bit low cut, I was able to wear a low cut bra for support and it didn't show. It was super comfortable and I felt so good in it!

links_Review_Title: Everyone and I mean everyone stopped me to compliment my dress!

links_Review_Text: This dress fit perfectly and was exactly what I needed for this black tie wedding. The fabric generally has some give to it so it was very comfortable and I felt secure without a bra (I didn't have to worry about anything slipping out). The length and everything was spot on. Would rent again for sure. Could've worn any height of heels and been fine.
Also, the color of dress in person is much more vibrant than photo indicates.

It is VERY low cut. I used safety pins and double sided tape. I could have gone down a size or maybe even to. I loved the material, but it is an adults only look and more revealing than what I prefer. Incidentally, I have above average breast size for my frame in case you wonder how that impacts fit.

The dress is a striking color- metallic black/gold- photographs a bit on the green side. Loved the construction of the dress- offered a great silhouette, although a bit more low cut than I anticipated, especially for the event I wore it to- I stepped out of my box and wore it anyhow and recurved compliments. Really loved the dress!

EVERYTHING was right about this dress. The material was stretchy without being too thin, it was easy to wear, and the cut was both sexy and sophisticated. For someone who wears a size 14 but doesn't have a large chest, I couldn't believe how well this fit without having too much extra fabric on the front. I spent the whole night in it without once feeling like I would have a wardrobe malfunction. This has been my favorite RTR piece so far. Oh, and the color... stunning.
Very comfortable stretch fabric that was true to size. I felt great all night and received lots of compliments. Would definitely rent this dress again!
I didn't end up wearing this to my event, but I liked the dress and appreciated that it kept me warm with a lining and long sleeves.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress, but too large in the rib cage and chest
links_Review_Text: I've been cycling through a bunch of formal dresses trying to pick one for a wedding at the end of January. Pros: Glitzy, but not too over-the-top. Slit is not too high, and the deep V is very flattering. Cons: This was very big in the bust and rib cage for me, but it fit my hips, so I doubt the 14 would have been any better. I'd recommend this dress for someone who is more proportionate (busty with big hips, or hips small enough to go down a size to match the smaller bust).

This dress is beautiful and looks expensive but on me the fit was a little off. The sleeves were a tad looser than I would have expected and the back wrinkled up on me but I couldn’t have gone down a size without the top being too tight. Be prepared to show some cleavage if you’re busty but overall it’s a beautiful dress. I’m 5’7 and wore 2-3 inch heels and the 4L (140 lbs) and the length was absolutely perfect. The color is gold but the sparkle is more subtle and perfect for the roaring 20’s themed wedding I was at. Overall I think it was okay on me but would be breathtaking on the right person.
Obsessed with this dress it shimmers in the light
Great fit - wore without a bra. The 4L was perfect with 3.5 inch heels - I am 5'9

This dress was absolutely perfect- even more gorgeous in person! I didn't want to return it!! It was super comfortable, the length was perfect and it was super flattering. The fabrics had a bit of stretch which made it really comfortable for the evening. I got so many compliments on it- there also was a tiny gold thread that went through the entire fabric that created a beautiful shimmer effect. I would definitely wear this one again <3
Elegant. Well made. Too low cut for my work event. A little loose in bust on me but perfect elsewhere.

links_Review_Title: I wanted to keep this dress on forever! I tried something different and felt so elegant.
links_Review_Text: True to size. I am 5’3 and prefer “petite” length but with 4 inch heels this dress ended up being a great length. The material looks and feels luxurious. I received many compliments. Material has stretch to it which was great but didn’t cling to problem areas. Slit helps with movement and isn’t too high to where it feels “too” sexy for a wedding, especially with the low cut front.
For a taller person or the right occasion maybe but this is a lot of dress
I would say the fit is true to size. The material was beautiful and the length was perfect on me with ~1.5 inch heels. The fabric is forgiving too.
Just the right amount of shimmer without being a disco ball, just the right amount of cleavage and right amount of sexy allure with the slit. Dress is true to size and forgiving.

links_Review_Title: Knockout of a dress; got so many compliments at our office holiday party
links_Review_Text: This dress fit me like a glove (I'm a true 8L - 31" waist, 34" inseam) and I almost didn't want to take it off. Amazing on an hourglass body type. It was surprisingly comfortable due to a slight stretch in the fabric. It was shimmery but not super sparkly like sequins. High leg slit made it easy to walk around. Could wear a regular plunge bra underneath. Sleeves have zippers on the cuff as they're pretty tight.
Lovely shape. Felt a tiny bit short (I am 5 7) but not noticeably so. Shows some cleavage but not overly so.
Love the dress but very low cut

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress, great silhouette. Deep cleavage!
links_Review_Text: This is a very festive dress but not a cry for attention (well... taking aside the massive cleavage). Wore to the theater. Loved it! (btw the petite is, nevertheless, long! I'm just under 5"2 and had to wear ultra-high heels).

links_Review_Title: I liked the dress but didn’t wear it as it didn’t look as good on me as the backup dress
links_Review_Text: Front was very low cut and left a low and wide space exposed, so I felt pretty bare. Maybe if I had more cleavage it would have worked better. The 2 fit better than the 4 on me, but I ended up not wearing this dress.
Wore this out for a friends birthday - Super cute! The sleeves are a little extra but added a fun element. The black down the center is sheer so it adds a bit of sexiness to it. Fit true to size.0

links_Review_Title: This shirt was amazing. I wore it without a bra, but used pasties. It was comfortable and cute.

links_Review_Text: Just gorgeous sleeved and detailing. Not itchy at all and very comfortable. I wore it with a bra but I think if you had a small chest you could also wear it with no bra, on a date or a more sexy event. The lace down the middle is so pretty, I wouldn't wear a cami because it ruins the effect. I might buy it! Love it!

This blouse has the most incredible sleeves. I wore it to an after work function. Definitely needs a cami underneath it as the whole middle vertical panel is see thru. Anyway, back to those luscious sleeves..... found myself posing and showing them off all night! Such fun to wear.

This is a pretty blouse, nicely made but my top is heavier and it was just a little too snug to pull off. You will need a good solution for bra or cami as the front has a sheer detail down the middle. Overall a pretty blouse

Cute blouse that got lots of compliments and was a perfect work to going to dinner look. The bell sleeves are the perfect amount of trendy and don't get in the way throughout the day. The only con was the high neck lace would itch every now and then.

Such a pretty top and perfect for dinner and drinks with friends or date night. Didn't wear anything underneath and it wasn't see through at all. Very light and comfortable! The sleeves are fun too :)
This top was super-cute. Unfortunately, the fabric had little give and was right across my shoulders and chest.
Wore a nude bra and it looked super cute for dinner and a show with my spanks leather leggings

links_Review_Title: Fun top for a work party or date night
links_Review_Text: Great top. Needed a small tank under it as the center is see through but with that very classy!
I loved this top. It was super cute - got lots of compliments. True to size.
I wore with a bralette (you can see through the back a bit and front) and high waisted jeans and got compliments all night.
I wore a black cami underneath because its see - through. I loved this shirt and will rent again.
Very nice, wore a cami under and really liked it
I rented this for a night out, but with a black tank underneath it, the top was appropriate for work. The sleeves are so fun, the fit is true to size, and the color/material is beautiful.

links_Review_Title: It is pretty and sexy, see through down the front.
links_Review_Text: I got tons of compliments and the fit was snug in the right ways and flowey in the right ways. It is see through down a strip in the front so I wore a camisole under it.

I wore this multiple times and loved it. It's one of my favorite rentals yet because it's so versatile. Wore it to work, to a shower, and to dinner. Love the pattern, the fun sleeves, and the delicate details.

links_Review_Title: Perfect for a fundraiser silent disco!
links_Review_Text: I rented this one in all black, so I knew that it would be great… The sequins are amazing and it's really easy to wear!
I got lots of compliments on this. Wore it over jeans at a club.

Really fun top! The sequin sash makes it glamorous but not over the top. The sequins are just a tiny bit itchy but totally worth it. Got lots of compliments and will likely rent again. It was perfect for a Caribbean cruise, dancing in the club.
Super cute. The neck is a little scratchy but overall love it!
Loved the look and style of this top but the front seam from the collar to the armpit gaped so much it looked bad. Couldn't wear it.
runs a little large and gaps a bit if you have smaller breasts. am size 32B

The neck can get a touch itchy but it doesn't matter. This looks amazing. Prepare to be stopped. Worn w Jeans but can be dressed up even more than that. Really can not recommend it enough. I am a 2 and that fit w room to spare so if you're btwn sizes, size down
wore with lace pants and pumps
This shirt is really nice, only bad things to say are that it runs small and it's is very low cut. I pinned mine to wear to work and that worked fine for me!

links_Review_Title: This was a fun shirt to wear to work and for a night out.
links_Review_Text: Fit tru to size. I had to pin the "opening" in front because it was very floppy.

I got so many complements on this shirt! The cut made my boobs look good and The cinched waist was really flattering. Loved the color and the thin/sheer-ish sleeves made wearing a leather jacket or any jacket over it really easy
Runs really tight in waist, very low cut. Wouldn't recommend

links_Review_Title: There is no way to wear this without something underneath.
links_Review_Text: The print is beautiful but there is no way to wear it. It's basically open past your belly button. Had to send back without wearing.
I didn't think the fabric was of good quality. It did fit true to size.
Cute & comfy in just the right fall floral but it needs a tank worn under.
Must wear a cami underneath, but still cute!

links_Review_Title: So flattering, but needs a cami underneath
links_Review_Text: Loved this top, though it runs quite small (I usually wear an S but found even the arms on the M tight, and the top gaped open, which it probably wouldn't if it fit better); you'll definitely need a cami underneath.
Doesnt cover chest, I ended up wearing a black cami underneath. This also runs very short.
It cuts so low so unless you want to wear a shirt underneath you can't wear
cute but too open on the chest.
This was the best fitting dress I’ve worn from RTR. I would definitely get it again. I have a small bust so usually the tops of stuff I rent from here are too big but it fit perfect
I absolutely loved this dress! I rented it to wear during the day on vacation and it worked perfectly! It is a little on the shorter side but not crazy. Definitely want to rent again!
I'm a tall girl and this was not too short for me which was great. Cute and easy to wear on a warm vacation day :)

Fun pattern and the back is cool too. I got a large but I think that a medium may be better. It was a big on the top and I'm a 32DD. The ties are only for design so I wasn't able to tie it tighter in the back. Also wasn't sure if I should wear a bra or not. Either way... Wore it twice, once with a strapless which was tricky because of the back and once without. Pasties would probably be a good option for this dress. I will give the medium a try and if it fits... I may not send it back.
This was definitely more low cut than I'm used to (and had to go bra-less), but it was so fun for a vacation in Key West! Medium fit really well and the elastic waistband is nice.
Low cut but cute dress. Great for vacation. Loved it, could just slip on. I didn't wear a bra because of the back and front cuts didn't allow
This is a great dress for travel destinations. It did not wrinkle and it was so comfy!

I wore this formally with heels on a Friday night, and today I was outside in 100 degree weather. This outfit was perfectly light and airy. It can easily be dressed up or dressed down. It was a little large around my rib cage, but I still didn't have to wear a bra because the strings in the back can be tied/adjusted. Would definitely order again!
The fit was true to size and the best part about it was that I didn't have to wear a bra! The backless details were so fun and the perfect dress for a party!

I rented this dress for a country concert and it was great. While it was slightly shorter than I'm used to wearing, it was super comfortable and airy for the outdoor venue. Would definitely rent again for weekend wear!
This was perfect for a nice dinner out!

links_Review_Title: Very flattering for women who are expecting!
links_Review_Text: I am nearly 6 months pregnant and really loved this dress. I felt like a hot mama in it! I opted to not wear a bra underneath as the back is out and I felt completely comfortable doing so. The material is very durable. If you are on the bustier side, you will have cleavage. My favorite part of this dress was the ruffles. I couldn't get enough!

This is such a fun summer dress. Can definitely be dressed up or down with different accessories. It is pretty low cut, but I was able to wear without a bra and didn't feel over exposed. Fits true to size
This dress is perfect for summer and very easy to dress up or dress down. The small fit perfectly and was tot too short

links_Review_Title: fun dress to wear on vacation!
links_Review_Text: fit well and accentuated figure. loved wearing it!

links_Review_Title: Flattering summer dress perfect for a fun day out or event!
links_Review_Text: The dress is cute and flattering. Keep in mind it is low cut and exposed in the back and on the shorter/mini side but without being too much. Definitely recommend for a fun summer dress for vacation or fun day out!

links_Review_Title: Dress neckline and top is very large and minimal coverage
links_Review_Text: The length and waist line is fine, but the check/top straps are not adjustable and very open / reveling and not in a cute way. Didn't end up wearing this one.

links_Review_Title: I rented this dress for everyday wear.
links_Review_Text: This dress was really short and very low cut. The color and print were really cute but the fit made this dress a miss for me. Also, the straps aren’t adjustable so I had to pin them back so my chest/bra wasn’t hanging out too much. I wouldn’t rent this again.
The dress with the perfect length and cover for a vacation dinner. However, the top was big which made me self-conscious about all night. I would rent a smaller size next time, but I loved the color!

I love this dress! I've worn it as a cover up to the beach, as a dress for everyday, as well as going out. The material is soft and stretchy without being too tight on your body. So comfortable and flattering.

links_Review_Title: Wore to beach side dinner & drinks
links_Review_Text: Gorgeous dress! I wore it on vacation in Costa Rica and it was the perfect combo of casual/comfy and stylish. 10/10 recommend.

links_Review_Title: Very cute but not for someone with a chest.
links_Review_Text: I'm 5'2" and a D. The length was perfect but it was too revealing for me.

links_Review_Title: Great dress to pair with a jacket for the fall
links_Review_Text: comfortable dress. I'd prefer to size down next time. A small would have fit better...
Perfect fit, comfy material
Way too big! I even cinched the back as much as I could and it still was too big. The straps also wouldn't have stayed up. The style reminded me of a house dress. Pretty plain.

links_Review_Title: pretty low cut for my large chest but still very cute!!
links_Review_Text: not too short, not too long. a bit low cut and was way too big to not wear a bra. I should have gotten the L not the XL, though I wore it twice anyway with a creative tie job!
Love the print of this dress! It was hard to find a bra with the open back but I managed and still liked the dress overall
It was a little big in the boobs but still looks good on.
This fit well and was fun to wear. I even considered purchasing it.
This dress required a lot of tugging and readjusting in the chest all night. It also was pretty short, even on my 5'3" frame. The pattern was cute, but definitely orange and not red.

Probably one of my favorite dresses I've rented! Almost bought it. Perfect fit and just fun. I didn't get a photo in it, but filmed an OoTD video on my IG @sereinwu Fits great, did not need to wear a bra.

links_Review_Title: I loved this dress. Cute and flirty.
links_Review_Text: It's low cut on back and front. I had a low back strapless bra that i wore with it and it was fine but you could also wear it without one. The shoulder straps are not adjustable but it ties in the back.

links_Review_Title: LOVE LOVE LOVE this dress! So sexy and luxurious!
links_Review_Text: Can't speak enough on how wonderful this dress is. My boyfriend and his mom adored it and I'm getting one more public outing in this before I send it back! It hugged my body so well and the material is sturdy. The only tough part is the lining. When you lift the dress up to use the bathroom the lining can be a little pain to pull back down.
Fits true to size. Received a lot of compliments! Classy dress
