links_Review_Title: Pictures don't do justice for this gorgeous dress!
links_Review_Text: This dress is amazing! Love the detailing. Definitely on the longer side and the straps were extremely too long. I clipped them together in the back to make a V-neck which worked fine. Dress runs true to size and surprisingly you don't need spanx. It's snug but perfect!

Absolutely love this dress and can't wait to wear it to a holiday party this weekend. I'm usually a 0 or a 2. Only the 2 was available and it's fits very comfortably, but I wish the 0 would've been available for a more fitted look. I'm still really excited to wear it!

links_Review_Title: Great fit. Sophisticated / sneaky hot dress.

links_Review_Text: This dress was sexy and sophisticated. I wore it for my birthday dinner with my fiancé. It was fun and flirty and a great excuse to wear this number
Na

links_Review_Title: This dress was absolutely stunning. It fit like a glove, and I got so many compliments!
links_Review_Text: Nothing was wrong with this dress. The color was outstanding and the fit was supreme, very flattering. I got so many compliments and my boyfriend couldn't keep his hands off me.

Loved the color and fit. The only thing that disappointed me was the dress had a faint iron burn (shaped like the v part of the iron) on the back so I opted to wear a different dress. Otherwise, I loved it. Very flattering.

links_Review_Title: How confident this dress made me feel!
links_Review_Text: It fit perfectly, a bit longer than expected but good. The straps were a little loose but I was very comfortable. It tore a bit in the seam at the bottom of the dress because I was dancing and its flexible but not to that extent. I really loved how comfortable I felt in it!

I could have worn a S but the XS was all that was available and it worked. I wore a black long sleeve shirt under it because it was 40 degrees out. You have to belt this dress, it just looks weird not belted. Wore it all day with knee high boots and a brown leather jacket and it keep me warm. Easily able to be dressed up or down. Wore it to Napa.
Loved this misa dress. The elastic waist was super comfy and would allow for a good range of body types within each size. Got several compliments! Perfect for a fancy winter dinner.

links_Review_Title: An all time favorite- great for any season!
links_Review_Text: One of my favorites. So comfortable and so flattering. The print is stunning. You can dress it up or down and wear in so many different weather types!
Flattering, comfortable, and cute. Perfect dress to wear day to night.

links_Review_Title: Comfortable dress to wear all night!
links_Review_Text: Fit snugly, I would get a size smaller so the neck fits. Very comfortable and easy to wear!

This is so chic! I wore it twice, once to work with loafers again to an engagement party with boots. Got lots of compliments both times! The waist has a bit of stretch which was nice, I liked it belted! Would definitely rent again.
This dress is amazing! I rented it for my trip to Europe and it was the perfect dress to wear in Paris. It's super soft and comfy and can be dressed up or down for any occasion.

links_Review_Title: This was a comfortable, pretty maxi dress
links_Review_Text: When I tried it on, I found the high neck extremely uncomfortable. So when I came to wear it, i just turned it around and wore it backwards, unzipping the neck a little. This worked well, looked deliberate and I got loads of complements. I wore it with tapestry boots from a few seasons ago.
Itchy around the neck with the smocking

Loved this dress especially since it was soooo comfortable! Very flattering and received compliments although for different reasons: I thought it looked Boho, my wife thought it looked Victorian, and my dad thought it needed cowboy boots for an Old West romantic look. Will rent again.

I rented as a NYE option but wore something else. But I really liked this dress, wore it to work. The mock neck was sorta annoying but not intolerable. Love the sleeves and the ends w ruffles. Love allll the ruffles on the skirt. Very on-trend modest style. I want to own!!
Loved this dress. It fit well, true to size and was so stylish.
Stylish and comfortable for an everyday winter outfit. Wear with chunky boots.
I felt like I was on an early season of Downton Abbey. Got several compliments. Comfortable and easy to wear.

links_Review_Title: Love this dress. I wore it with heels to a charity event and it looked boho but chic.
links_Review_Text: Fit was accurate. I am 5'10" and it hit right at my ankles similar to the fit model.

links_Review_Title: Not my personal taste - it looked a bit too 'Victorian' for me.
links_Review_Text: Nicely made, and interesting layered details.
Classy, comfy Fall dress.

links_Review_Title: Loved this dress but it was very hot even though it was see through
links_Review_Text: I think this would be a great fall dress paired with a leather jacket. I wore it on a 70ish day and was burning up, despite it being thin
The fit of this dress could have been better. Length was too short, and the waist was unflattering. However the print was lovely & skirt was fully lined (but not the top).
Beautiful but definitely dark - wore my hair down and messy with pint velvet sandals to lighten the look
Can wear off the shoulder or not! Such a fun daytime dress - no complaints!

This piece was really easy to wear. It was a rainy day in Boston so I threw a jean jacket over this and it was cute. I was pleasant surprised at how roomy this was for a medium. I am always concerned Tory runs a little small but with the stretchy bands, this fit perfect.
Runs a little large, but elasticized bodice helps. Lightweight fabric best for warm weather, but I added Frye Campus boots and a cardigan to make it cozy. Very pretty, many compliments.

links_Review_Title: Loved this fun print and fit
links_Review_Text: This dress was such an easy dress up or dress down piece. I wore it twice within a couple of days to dinner and a kids birthday party. I lean on the side of a small medium and the small was still a great fit. Love that you can wear it on or off the shoulder. Would rent over and over so many compliments!

i wore this for my sisters bachelorette! i'm 5"4, 130 lbs and usually wear a medium. i went with the Small in this based on reviews and it fit PERFECTLY. it looked so good on my body. i wish it wasn't so much money or else i'd buy it asap!!
Loved this for my trip to Greece. So fun and flattering. Great for shorties too! Size down
Very easy and effortless to wear. It's perfect for daytime or dinner. Love this un-fussy dress. Very forgiving fit.

links_Review_Title: Wonderful for Third Trimester and Beyond
links_Review_Text: I love having this dress for the third trimester. It's very flattering without being body con. Great for the heat too. Would also be flattering on all body types regardless of maternity status.

links_Review_Title: I'm 5 months pregnant and I felt cute, comfortable, and ready to take pics!
links_Review_Text: This dress stretches so it stretched perfectly right over my baby belly bump. It had a lining so I didn't have to worry about anything underneath showing. Super adorable and I was very comfortable!

links_Review_Title: Sweet. Lovely pattern. Relaxed and comfortable.
links_Review_Text: I wore this on my trip to the Bahamas. Lots of compliments. It was super comfortable, but not a lot of support in the breast area, so I wore it over a swimsuit.
The best dress for a beach vacation! Easy to throw on over my swimsuit or for a beachside meal.

links_Review_Title: I get to wear clothes from my favorite brand without making a hole in my pocket.
links_Review_Text: Dress fit perfectly. Great for vacation. Very comfortable and has a beach feel to it.
Wore this to a winery in Mexico. Was very comfortable and flattering. I thought it was a little large around the waist as it is stretchy in the mid-section. Overall was great.

links_Review_Title: It's such a pretty, girly dress.
links_Review_Text: Love the dress!!! It's very comfortable, girly and unique print.
Wore this on a 79 degree day, it was perfect. Pros: comfortable, light, easy to change look with accessories, good for weekend time. No cons

links_Review_Title: Cute Mexican inspired dress- wish fabric wasn't so casual
links_Review_Text: I ended up wearing this even in a size too big- it has stretch so it didn't really matter, fit fine. I wish it wasn't such a light cotton it had a real 'Ole' feel to it maybe a bit more than I wanted but I rocked it anyways.

links_Review_Title: Just loved this one! It was in great condition. I got so many compliments.
links_Review_Text: Perfect comfortable fit.
So fun and easy to wear. It fit's great and is very flattering

Super fun dress. Looked brand new. Cute on. I've got curvy booty and boobs so the cut made me look a little wider from the side. I don't care, though. It is darling. Light. Pairs well with a jean jacket. Tons of compliments. It felt light and feminine.
Fabric is light and airy. Roomy with give so size down between sizes.

I wore this to my friend's rehearsal dinner and got so many compliments! It definitely runs large, and I sized down. It's very light weight, and not particularly rich fabric. However the pattern is great and just a beautiful dress that I'm already planning to rent again!

This dress was perfect for a date. I wore it on a very hot night in NYC and was able to stay cool. The print and fit are true to size and it made me feel like I should have been in the Tuscan country side. I love the flutter off the shoulder sleeves - it covers arm fat. I wore the dress with flat sandals but it would look cute with heels too
Im 5'3, 120 and 18 weeks pregnant. Wore it during vacations in Hawaii, my least favorite of the rental just because of how big my chest look otherwise it's a pretty dress
wore it once and got compliments from all the guys ;) for some odd reason the boys loved this.
loved this dress. great for Caribbean vacation!
Light weight. Comfortable. Flattering

links_Review_Title: Comfortable material, nice length and lovely print
links_Review_Text: Fits well, comfortable
Beautiful easy to wear dress. I actually opted to wear it on the shoulders, and could wear a regular bra. Made the M work, but a L would have probably been better to accomodate a larger bust.
This dress will work for a wide range of body types.
Comfortable and pretty. Didn't need a bra.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress. Very fun and summery. Received many compliments. Very comfortable.
links_Review_Text: Fit true to size - very comfortable.
Loved how effortless this dress was- comfortable for all night at 20 weeks pregnant! Seriously considering buying the dress.
Great for large bust.

links_Review_Title: Wore this to my Palm Springs bachelorette party and strangers stopped me to compliment this dress!
links_Review_Text: Very forgiving! The skirt is loose and relaxed through the hips and stomach, and the smocked panel is very flattering. This is a vacation dress or a party dress. I tried to wear it to dinner back in regular life and it was just too much

links_Review_Title: Used this dress for a cruise, supper pretty and relaxed.
links_Review_Text: Everyone loved it

links_Review_Title: This dress would be great for a Cinco de Mayo
links_Review_Text: Cute-ish, but could not help but think that I should be serving Cadillac margaritas and chips and salsa. Would be cute for a tropical vaca.
Fit great, would look really great on girls with a bigger chest than me.

This dress didn't work at all for me. It looked busty and the style is faux-ethnic silly, like I should be serving up beers at an Oktoberfest or pierogis at a Polish festival. I couldn't wear it. If you've got a flat chest, it might work better.
has two layers so can get warm in warmer climate, but I got so many compliments.
Fit is lovely and accentuates shoulders and waist

links_Review_Title: This dress was made for me
links_Review_Text: This dress is drop dead gorgeous. People were coming up to me all night asking me about the dress. I wish I could wear it over and over again. I sized up after reading the reviews and am so glad I did. I'm 116lb, 5' 3", 32DD and got a 2R. I couldn't wear a bra with it but the material is thick enough that it didn't matter. I actually could have sized up to a 4 because I have wider hips and I had to be very careful when putting it on. Perfect length for me. Wore 3" heels and it didn't drag.

I wore this for a black tie optional wedding, and received many compliments. Based on reviews, I sized up and am glad I did. The underlay of the dress still felt a bit short, but the lace is thick enough that I felt covered and comfortable dancing all night. The cut of the top made it difficult to find a bra that wouldn't show, so I ended up going no bra for the evening - fine for smaller girls but may be a problem for others.
Fit like a glove. Runs a little small - so size up if need be. Comfortable. Didn't need to wear a bra.
Wore this to a black tie wedding. LOVED IT - it's fun and different. I would say it runs a bit small up too. Anyone with big boobs might have a hard time breathing.
This dress was great! Would definitely recommend it. Quality materials that covered your body but was sheer in the right spots. Got tons of compliments!

This dress fit amazingly! I rented it for a black tie optional wedding. I ended up going with a different option that I was even more in love with, but I liked this one a lot and already have it saved in a list to rent again in the future. The only thing that surprised me was how short the lining was for the skirt, which is sheer enough to be able to see through from close. I would definitely wear either some black tights or black spandex shorts to keep myself safe.

I loved this dress. It was perfect for a New Year's Eve wedding. It does run small though. I am small chested with larger hips and this was the first time ever that my normal size (2) fit me in the butt but was too small up top. I couldn't zip it up! Even with the 4, I couldn't wear a bra. Which is fine by me but just be aware. The material of the dress was thick and structured enough that not wearing a bra was no big deal. I ordered the regular length and it came to my ankles and I am 5'7".

links_Review_Title: Love this dress but size up!
links_Review_Text: Reviews are spot on - beautiful, flattering party dress. Shape and hold detail make it stand out. Wore it for a New Years party but could have worked for a wedding or another formal affair. But I'm small chested and barely got it to zip up- very small in the chest/ribs. The 4 was perfect but could not have gone any smaller.

The fit was perfect! I felt beautiful and confident all night. I was worried that I would need to size up based on the reviews, but in my experience, the dress was true to size. Such a unique dress that really stood out with its gold embellishments. No bra necessary!
Great dress for a wedding
Stunning dress for a formal affair that fit well and was comfortable too! No complaints whatsoever. I'm 5'7 and it was almost floor-length on me. I felt it fit true to size.

links_Review_Title: Had the squeeze myself in but worth it. So many compliments!
links_Review_Text: The dress is absolutely gorgeous & perfect for a fall or winter evening wedding. I loved wearing it even though the bodice was extremely tight & I felt like I was wearing a corset all night. Definitely needed help to zip it up. This is even after sizing up to the 6, the size 4 had no chance!!

links_Review_Title: You will receive SO many compliments!
links_Review_Text: I recently wore this dress for a Creative Tie Gala and it did not disappoint. Everyone told me it looked amazing! I rented two sizes and went with the 8. It fit a bit snug on top, but I'm thankful that I didn't have to wear a bra. I would definitely wear it again!

I felt absolutely glam in this gorgeous gown. Runs a size small, so order up one size. The dress fit well, though was a full length gown on me (5'6") not tea length as on the RTR model. The dress material is slightly sheer and the inner lining only extends to mid thigh.

links_Review_Title: Felt so glamorous in this dress!
links_Review_Text: Got so many compliments on this dress and it felt great on - I am usually a 6 or 8 and the 8 fit perfectly.

links_Review_Title: I felt so great wearing this dress! It fit me in all the right places!
links_Review_Text: Nothing negative to say about this dress. By far, one of my most favorite choices from RTR

links_Review_Title: Runs Very Small But So Gorgeous
links_Review_Text: I didn't get to wear this one, it was my backup anyways, but if it fit I may have chosen it over my first choice it was that beautiful. I ordered my usual size 0, but I couldn't get it zipped up. The tag equates 0 with XXXS, so no wonder! With my measurements I should have sized up to a 2 or maybe even a 4. The fabric detail was stunning though! Note the neckline is not for extra full busts. Also, I'm short, 5'2", and while this is a midi dress on tall models it's a good full length on me.
Was flattering, forgiving of my various problem areas. Really added to the sense of celebration. It pops in pictures - lots of compliments. And super comfortable! Danced in it till wee hours!
the dress is all around a great find. fits perfectly, amazing quality, flattering, and comfortable. i definitely recommend!
This dress was perfect for my cousin's semi-formal wedding. I got so many compliments, and it was very comfortable.
I'm a true 4 and sized up based on reviews. It fit great! Loved this dress.

I love the fact that it flows well and the air actually goes through the lace while I dance on the dance floor. It was a little heavy as far as weight but it doesn't bother me. It was a little tight on the chest area too but as long as I can comfortably breathe, which I did, a bra wasn't necessary.

links_Review_Title: This dress was perfect for a black tie wedding, received many compliments!
links_Review_Text: This dress is so much prettier in person, I almost didn’t order it and am so glad I did. It was a bit snug as I would typically order a 6 in a dress and was glad I sized up for this one. Length is just below ankles but the ruffles at the bottom are a great detail so the slightly shorter length is not an issue. Loved this dress and highly recommend!

Gorgeous dress. Embroidered details were stunning. Very well made. Top however was quite tight in the bust. I ended up wearing the 4 because the 6 was too loose in the waist but I definitely needed some help getting it zipped shut because of the bust.

This dress was so gorgeous, the pictures do not do it justice. The embroidery is stunning and the dress looks very expensive. It fit like a glove (works well for pear shapes) and was very comfortable. I got many many compliments and I felt like a million bucks all night!

links_Review_Title: Stunning fabric and flattering cut even on a petite frame
links_Review_Text: The fabric of this dress was so elegant and not as fragile as some gown with sheer overlays. The top to the chest is sheer and there are sheer cutouts at the sidewaists. Overall, I’d say the other reviews I read are right, in that this dress does run small. I’m generally a 0/00 with a 24” waist, and this dress fit me wonderfully. The tag says 0R and XXXS so keep that in mind if going with this size. There is no give at the hips to get it on as the zipper goes just below waist. I love a good bodice that doesn’t require a bra, this dress has a nice liner and structure at the chest for those who need minimal to moderate support. It definitely holds it all in! The liner below the skirt goes above knee or mid thigh for those who are taller. Being petite, this dress was a full length on me, and it was perfect with a small kitten heel height. No high heels as the even was outside in grass and gravel. I received complements all night, and only wish I had a reason to wear this dress again! But instead I think I’ll just rent another one ;)

It wasn't what I expected from the photo, but I still loved it! I am 5'2-5'3 and with 4 inch heels this dress was floor length - not tea length as expected. The colors are also definitely black and gold- I had anticipated the gold being more muted. I still absolutely loved the dress and got a million complements. Highly recommend for a more formal affair!
Beautiful dress - fabric and fit! Great floor length dress for someone who's 5'2" or a little taller, which is hard to find. Perfect dress for a winter wedding.

links_Review_Title: First annual St Jude fundraising gala in Charlotte, NC
links_Review_Text: I am so thankful for the ladies who reviewed and said to order a size up. You may even need to order 2 sizes up. This dress is a knockout. No bra needed. Very flattering and comfortable. I loved it.

links_Review_Title: I wish I could wear this everywhere.
links_Review_Text: This dress is flawless. It's gorgeous and unique, well made, and incredibly easy to wear. I loved that it was special enough to wear to a "black tie optional" formal event but not fussy at all.

links_Review_Title: So many compliments and really fun to dance in.
links_Review_Text: -As many reviews said, it does run a little small. I ordered my regular size (4) and a size up (6) and ended up wearing the size 6, mainly because the lining skirt is fairly short with shear outer fabricand the size 6 was a little longer in that respect. I probably would have been fine in my true size but maybe would not have been as comfortable dancing at the wedding. -The neckline makes things so easy! You don't need to worry about fashion tape or "falling out" and I just wore a regular black bra. -This dress looks beautiful on curves and is super fun for dancing- especially Latin style dancing or anything where your hip movements are emphasized. It's also really pretty to see the skirt twirl up and around whenever you are being spun around. -The fabric is not itchy or irritating at all. -The length was perfect for me in 3" heels.

links_Review_Title: I got so many compliments on this dress!
links_Review_Text: I normally wear a size 4 and the size 6 fit me perfectly, so I would definitely recommend sizing up. I’m 5’1” and the dress went all the way to the ground.

links_Review_Title: So easy to rent and fun to have something new for the event
links_Review_Text: A true 0 with right fitting bodice. Dress was a show stopper for the event. Highly recommend
Loose in the stomach and hip area
This dress was far more fitted throughout the hips, so I wore the bigger size, many parts of it are sheer which gives it more interest. Very cool dress for a winter or early spring event.

This dress is killer! I wore it to a black tie wedding and loved it! Got a ton of compliments too. It runs a little small, so make sure to order your actual size and one larger to be safe. 10/10 recommend!
This dress was a show stopper! The details and colors are so beautiful in person. I usually wear a 4 but wore the 6R so it runs a little small. Loved it!

Wonderful fit and made well. The details on this dress are amazing with a hint of sexy. It has sheer material in lower legs, torso and shoulders. I sized up and it was a perfect fit and the weight of the material made the dress hang beautifully. Many compliments!

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous Lace Dress with Amazing Detail
links_Review_Text: I rented this dress for a fancy girls night out and had so much fun wearing it. I'm glad I read the reviews prior to ordering, though, as it definitely runs a bit small, especially in the chest. I typically wear a size 4 and ended up wearing a size 6, which fit perfectly. Because the chest area does run small, I wasn't able to wear a bra, but the dress was supportive enough that it still looked great. The length is perfect for tall girls and the detailed embroidery is absolutely gorgeous. I would definitely recommend renting this dress.

links_Review_Title: I couldn't zip it up, but it was so great I wore it anyway!
links_Review_Text: I'm 120, 34C, and I could not get the 2R zipped. I got it past the band so the zipper stayed and I threw a safety pin at the top (see pic) , threw a blazer over it and wore it anyway. It's so so pretty! But be warned, as the other reviews that I ignored said, it runs small!

I rented this top in the nyc store to wear to a Celine Dion concert and it was perfect. They only had a large left in store - could have used the medium, but it still worked since it's a roomy top in general. Lots of compliments!

I rented this for NYE to pair with high waisted black pants and it was super comfortable yet fun and sparkly. Definitely a bit of an 80s moment, but I loved it! It's cropped but it'll be covered with high waisted pants. Just know the waist part is super elastic and the top is definitely billowy, but I really liked the silhouette it created. Great for New Years and I even got to wear it for Christmas dinner too!
wore this to a 70s themed roller disco bday. definitely roomy - the sleeves are huge which I think is on purpose - the v neck was not too low which I appreciated

I wore this out to a couple events and it was super fun, got some compliments. It's shiny and standout but still not too fancy. It was cropped and would prob be a bit short on a tall woman but otherwise I found it ran a tiny bit large. But still was pretty and enjoyed wearing it
I wore this top out to dinner in Beaver Creek and loved it! The sleeves are little bigger than I expected, but I liked the cropped look with my high waisted jeans! Definitely runs large, size down.

I usually do not wear bold pieces and loved that I had a chance to rent something outside my comfort zone. I hosted a Christmas party with friends and felt like this was a great piece to wear cause as a host I stood out and felt a little more formal but trendy. I'm unsure if it's true to size cause I have lost weight and floating between Small and Medium right now.
This was huge and unflattering! Usually ASTR is true to size on me but this just did not work out.

links_Review_Title: This is a fun piece with lots of sparkles which was perfect for a glitter themed party!
links_Review_Text: The fit was good in the arms and the bottom. it does rid up when you lift your arms so I wore a shirt under it as it was a work function, up to you. It is also a bit itchy so the undershirt helped with that too. Enjoy the piece!
Loved this! Eye catching, fun and classy!
Rented this top for Celine Dion concert in December. Fun around the holidays with the shimmer, and flattering neckline.
slightly itchy but worth it...so festive and fun! Flattering fit

Listen, I know I have it tied weird in the photo. I'd had a glass of wine and the tie was poking me in the back on my drive home so I tied it in the front instead and forgot to switch it back. It looks cuter when tied in the back, I promise. This fit well, I have bigger legs and hips and a short torso and this managed to accommodate me nicely. I was able to wear a strapless bra, but you could easily go without. I liked this a lot!
Overall very cute and easy to wear. Runs small and a little short so would size up next time.

I felt so fierce on this jumper! Once I actually figured out how to wear it (lol) I got endless compliments at the wedding I attended. The wedding photographer asked if he could photograph me at sunset and the photos he took are some of the most liked photos I've ever posted on social media! Fits well but is super comfy!

links_Review_Title: Got many compliments, can be worn several ways. Be careful with coverage for bigger bust
links_Review_Text: So cute. For people with bigger busts I suggest cross tying around your neck instead of around body. It was very flattering for someone with a small waist and big hips - I was dancing around and had to be careful that I wasn't falling out a little so be aware of that.
Looked and felt great, got lots of compliments.
Absolutely loved this jumper. Framed me perfectly as I am tall and smaller up top. I would definitely recommend.
Loved wearing this to a wedding. 10/10

links_Review_Title: Wore this to a dance performance in NYC
links_Review_Text: Loved this jumpsuit! very stylish.

I'm 5' 9 1/2" it was almost a little short in the torso but not enough to bug. It took a few practice runs to tie it right. It's lined so there are so panty lines. I received lots of complements. It's a great piece.

links_Review_Title: Very flattering once you figure it out
links_Review_Text: I love this jumpsuit. The lining is a little short in the torso, but it was so flattering I couldn't not wear. The top is a little confusing to figure out and I needed a bra with it despite the keyholes. Otherwise...top notch!

The ties are tricky but if u have a small chest u can def make it work. I'm 5-2 and length was great. It was tricky to get way I liked it. I can't imagine having to deal w that every time I used bathroom. Waaaaay too much of a process.
Fit well and can be dressed up or down. At first I couldn't figure out the long sashes but fit beautifully once I did.
I could live in this jumpsuit. Period...

Wore this for a friend's wedding, was super comfortable all night and got lots of compliments! The tie in front takes a few tries to find a style that works for you but was able to wear this with just a normal strapless bra. The pockets were a big plus and the wide legs meant it fit well over my hips and was super flattering while feeling like i was wearing sweatpants. Definitely would recommend and rent again!

links_Review_Title: Its a beautiful dress, made me feel super sexy
links_Review_Text: The dress fits beautifully, but seems worn. I wore it for a date for wine tasting and got many compliments :) made my day
Loved the look but ordered a size up based on what on the other reviews I saw and it fit perfectly. The wrap around on top is a little odd but I loved the cut out under the boobs.

Wore this jumpsuit to a wedding. Ended up wearing the back up size (6) because the 4 was unavailable to ship. It worked out well because even then, the size 6 was a little snug in the chest area. This outfit accentuated everything I wanted it to. Tying it wasn’t as difficult as I had expected it to be. Overall a great and unique outfit.

links_Review_Title: Flows beautifully, a little sexy, a lot comfortable
links_Review_Text: First jumpsuit for this long-torsoed lady.

links_Review_Title: Lovely but a little too risque
links_Review_Text: The bust coverage on the top of this jumpsuit is not enough for me to be able to wear a bra and have it not be seen. The material is thin enough that you do need some time of coverage, and I didn't have anything on hand to make this piece professional. I didn't feel comfortable having a visible bra at the workplace, so I ended up sending it back without wearing it because of that.

links_Review_Title: Fun and festive jumpsuit for a night out!
links_Review_Text: I loved this jumpsuit! Wore it to go to a Broadway show with my girlfriends. I am pear shaped and much smaller on top (34B) so it fit me perfectly in the bust and I didn't need to wear a bra. Would recommend for a smaller bra size - cleavage will be showing for sure. Would rent again for a fun occasion or summer night out!

Did not have the opportunity to wear unfortunately because it was too small. Better off sizing up from your US size or getting your corresponding European size. It is not completely a tie front. There was a band across the front resulting in the top being too tight in my chest and waist so I was not able to zip.
Couldn't zip up and I wear a pretty consistent size 4

I love this. Length is perfect - I wore flats with this- and the design is great without being overwhelming. I received several compliments while wearing the jumpsuit and plan on keeping it for a bit. It's really easy to dress up or down and everyone who saw me in it suggested I buy it.
Very cute style

links_Review_Title: Too small will try a bigger size
links_Review_Text: Didn't wear, ordered a 2 because I'm small on top but this is more true to size and I will try a 4 next time!
Fit true to size but wasn't super flattering around the tummy. Color is kind of a weird washed out yellow that ends up making it look like a yellowed ivory. Didn't end up wearing
Overall kind of snug. Not a lot of movement. Not good if you have a larger chest

links_Review_Title: Really cute, but a lot of cleavage
links_Review_Text: Great flowy jumpsuit, but exposes a lot of cleavage. The zipper was also a little sticky and I needed help zipping it up. The straps are adjustable which is nice. I may wear on date night, but I feel it would be too much wearing day to day or around family.
So comfortable yet looked plenty dressy with heels.

links_Review_Title: I loved this but it didn't work with my large bust. Way too much boobage
links_Review_Text: Fit and material are great. If you are a DD or bigger you may want to avoid
I wore this while on vacation in DC and in the section of the Smithsonian history museum where they display all the First Ladies inauguration dresses a little girl complimented MY dress.
Pretty and fit well, but not enough coverage at the boobs. Would look really cute if I had a flat chest.
A great LBD, sucks you in, and can be dressed up or down!

links_Review_Title: It fit like a glove and needed no accessories
links_Review_Text: Perfect fit, very flattering. Loved it so much I bought it for a great price. Perfect LBB.
I LOVED this dress! It fit like a glove. Was so comfortable and flattering. The material is stretchy and I felt like I could move around so well! Loved it!
The color, material, and ruching were very flattering even for someone who holds weight in their middle (me!). Perfect for a nice dinner out!

links_Review_Title: Comfy and sexy but super revealing
links_Review_Text: I had to pin this one to keep the front from opening up too much. Definitely fits a bigger bust without looking too baggy to go up to XL but was gaping open a ton. It's hard to pin the stretchier material but i managed to do it after a few tries without the pin showing. I wore on a date (but ended up wearing tights under) and felt great in it all night.

Super stretchy fabric but also built to keep its shape. It was a little short on me so when I sat down I had to make sure I wasn't revealing too much (I have a big butt). But great for a fancy dinner in Vegas!

VERY boob-y so I constantly felt like I needed to tuck myself back in. But when it was sitting the right way - I felt sexy and bold. My fiance liked it too ;) Very comfortable material and great length. Love the long sleeves - great dress!

I usually wear a medium but needed a large in this. The front is pretty revealing so if you're heavier on top like me, you may find yourself safety pinning it closed. The dress is a heavy material so definitely meant for colder weather. It was a flattering shape and comfortable to wear but nothing totally spectacular about it.. just a decent LBD if you're looking for one.
Zipper was a bit worn out but otherwise I may have bought it. Easy fit.

I rented this for my boyfriend's formal work Christmas Party and I LOVED this dress! I felt so sexy in it. It was a replacement as the dress I originally rented was way too big and I'm so glad I picked this one and that it worked out. The fabric is very thick and warm - so perfect for a cooler season. The length was perfect on my short frame but may not be good for tall women.

This dress is very flattering and made out of a nice thick material. The asymmetrical hemline gives it some dimension while the ruching on the waist really flatters your figure. The length of the sleeves, hemline and neckline all fell very nicely also. Would rent again.

links_Review_Title: Fits in all the right places!
links_Review_Text: I decided to wear this dress to a wedding. I normally do not wear tighter-fitting dresses, but I felt so good wearing this! It was very comfortable and was snug in all the right places to fit my body. Loved this dress!! The dress shows a slight amount of cleavage..I wasn't used to this so it did make me slightly uncomfortable at times, but I'm sure it wasn't overbearing to others.

links_Review_Title: I wore this for an anniversary dinner.
links_Review_Text: This dress fit great but definitely size up. It was a little short, it was perfect for a nice dinner but I don't know that it would have worked well if I was dancing or moving much. It was a thick material and very comfortable. It was perfect in colder weather (we were in Chicago in April, it was around 40 degrees and I was very comfortable with a mid-weight jacket).

This dress is one of a kind. It's unique and has some sex appeal, but is also classy and in my opinion can still be worn to something formal. It's flattering, comfortable, and the perfect little black dress! I am usually a S in dresses, but it's a good thing that they sent a backup size, because not only was the small just a liiiiittle too tight, but it reeked of B.O. SO other than that, great experience!
Fit was very flattering and the perfect combo of youthful/sexy and professional for a party honoring my dad.
Was confusing to put on. Plain black dress.

links_Review_Title: Didn't feel comfortable wearing that dress. I think the V neck was a little too much for me.
links_Review_Text: #sexy #party

This dress is absolutely fantastic. It fit me like a glove and I got so many compliments. I got it for my best friends bachelorette party and it was the perfect dress. Would definitely rent again. For sizing reference--I'm almost 5'8", 126 lbs and a 34A bust and got a size small.

Loved this dress - wore it out in Vegas. It's very thick and stretchy so perfect for winter. The ruche detailing is a bit of a throwback to my forever 21 days but I liked it. Didn't find the dress too short as others did and liked the geometric detailing at the bottom. However it is extremely low cut - i am small chested and it was pretty racy at the top. Would rent again for a Vegas-type situation or club. Probably too vavavoom for just a dinner or bar.

links_Review_Title: Perfect ! I need buy this dress
links_Review_Text: Rented for my bachelorette party. Absolutely perfect! The low cut was easily solved with a black bralet . Short on one side but not too much (I still wore spanks ). So flattering ! I’m 154lb .

Rented for Valentine's date with my husband. His eyes just about popped out of his head when I walked out, so safe to say I love this dress! Fabric extremely high-quality, thick, so perfect for a February date in the Northeast! Very flattering. Low-cut, so depending on how daring you are, you may want to consider a cami underneath. I'm 5'1 and it was a perfect length, I would say if you're over 5'3 there would probably be a lot of tugging. Fabulous dress!

This dress, although form-fitting, was really comfortable. I was able to wear a v-neck bra with no issues of it showing with the wrap-dress top, the fabric felt thick and durable without being too tight. There is also ruching around the middle which is flattering! Perfect length & I loved the asymmetrical cut at the bottom. I would definitely recommend.

links_Review_Title: This is a classic little black dress. The material is comfy, thick & flattering. A warm dress!
links_Review_Text: The front was a deep V but not too crazy. The sleeve length was great as I am tall. The dress wasn't too short which is hard for me to find. Would rent again
Way too short for any occasion. This was not redeemable with tights, either. The top part fit great but it was completely unwearable for the event I was going to.

links_Review_Title: If you're curvy, i wouldn't recommend
links_Review_Text: Wrap dresses like this are typically very flattering on me, however this dress has a bunch of random unnecessary extra fabric that it's not clear where it goes. It's also pretty short for a work party if you have larger hips and bust (it's going-to-the-club short). Not flattering.

links_Review_Title: First Sales Dinner - needed to look good!
links_Review_Text: I usually wore a M but I ordered an L as a backup. While the M zipped up, I just wasn't completely comfortable. The L was sexy, form fitting in the right places, but super comfortable. This dress could be your ultimate LBD. I wore it with dark grey knee high boots and the dress is about mid thigh on me (I'm pretty tall) so not too much skin was showing. I loved it!
Great material and very flattering on. Not too tight or too short of a dress

The dress fit snug and hugged my curves, and I don’t usually wear clothes this tight. I ordered the S and the M as a backup. The S fit my arms and back in contrast to the M which made the dress look big on me. All in all, I absolutely recommend this dress! I didn’t even need to wear a bra!!!!!!
Zipper could be a little difficult but the material is amazing, thick and forgiving. Hugs the waist. Love the cut. Very sexy!

i absolutely loved this dress, wish i could buy it! i wore the medium for a night out in vegas - perfectly short and low cut for this 37 year old mom of 2 without anything falling out. i felt sexy and comfortable - it was awesome. i'll rent it again! i'd size up if you don't want it to be super revealing (and i don't have particularly long legs).

links_Review_Title: nice material and loved the long sleeves for winter party.
links_Review_Text: Neckline fit too low on me and was not appropriate for the occasion I rented it for.

Wore this to see George Strait with my husband in Fort Worth. Add some blingy boots and it was perfect. The small fit good but was quite a bit shorter than the medium. Thick fabric kept me warm in November.

Based on reviews, I sized up but the top was too big and the bottom was pretty tight and short. Top was just too loose, seams didn't line up at shoulders, etc. Super cute dress, just not for a more petite upper body and a larger bottom half.
Stylist picked this when my second size option wasn't available. It fit nicely, but I didn't want to show as much leg as this dress shows.

links_Review_Title: Was able to wear during work and then on a date. Professional yet sexy.
links_Review_Text: Form fitting. Nice thick fabric.

links_Review_Title: Really flattering! Great thick material. Abdominal detailing is very forgiving.
links_Review_Text: Very low-cut (had to use a safety pin) but flattering. It's also pretty short (I'm 5'8")

This dress does all the right things. It's not super short, it's very comfortable and overall very flattering. While it is tight it's still comfortable. I would recommend sizing up if you're between sizes
Blech. This fit like a sausage casing. Shiny material, very low cut and tight in the chest. I felt like a frumpy old lady trying to be sexy. Not cute. Didn't wear it.
Very short

links_Review_Title: Rented this for my friend's hen party and it was a total hit!
links_Review_Text: Ladies, if you are little to feel confident and sexy - this is the dress for you! I sized up on this (usually a large). This really shows off your cleavage so if you are not comfortable with that, you may want to wear a tank top.

links_Review_Title: A bit in the chest but I was wearing with a turtleneck so I didn't mind, very short for someone tall
links_Review_Text: But I paired it with a cute boot so it looked intentional. Very very comfortable and had nice detail to make it feel luxe, beautiful fabric.

This was cool and sophisticated and comfortable. The 4 ended up being a lot looser than I expected (I'm typically a 6) but I thought it still worked. I wished the pants were just a bit longer so I could have worn higher heels but I still loved it. Got a bajillion compliments!

links_Review_Title: Nice details, runs long and large
links_Review_Text: Comfortable, professional looking jumpsuit. Easy in and out with a button and zip at the waist. I appreciated that there was a hook and eye closure at the bust to avoid accidental exposure. It runs large. I am usually a 4-6, ordered a 4 but could easily have worn a 2
Too large to wear! I am a solid 12 and some things I order big based on description. Shouldn't have done that with this.
Beautiful but way too big. I'm typically true to size but this was too big in the waist and in length. Would probably need one maybe even two sizes down and fairly high heels, and I'm 5' 7"!
The waist was too big.

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous jumpsuit and long enough for taller women
links_Review_Text: I rented this for a date night. I got the 2 because I am usually a size tall and wear high heels often. I would not recommend this to anyone below 5'7" because it will brush the floor unless you're in 4"+ heels. I wish I got the size zero, this was overall pretty baggy. I thought I'd need the size two to add length in the torso and legs, but it was too much. The fabric is comfortable, and the neckline is perfect for a variety of necklace lengths.

I wore this dress for a formal work occasion with a cute jacket! It fit very well and wasn't super revealing. I also wore it to a concert with cute heels. I'm typically a size 4 and wore this in a 2. If you're between sizes order down.

I wore this top a couple of times while on vacation. I'm 5'6", with a small chest (34A) and had to wear a padded bra to fill in the XS. I also had to pin the top in order for it to stay closed enough to cover my bra. Once pinned, I loved the top! Lovely floaty material and the wrap waist let me adjust it to a comfortable fit. I think this top would be way low cut for the office without a tank top underneath.

links_Review_Title: Super bright and flattering! A little odd/small in the chest but can be adjusted.

links_Review_Text: I rented this top for date night! Overall, it fit well but I sized up due to my chest size. I did have to pin it but overall super cute! I would rent again!
Loved this top! Wore both to work and on the weekend with friends. I put a pin in the top while at work as it's a little low but otherwise was perfect.
I used it for work with a black blazer on top and it took me all the way to happy hour. Great color. Lots of compliments. I had to use it with a pin to avoid showing too much cleavage.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful print and cut. Great for an hourglass shape.
links_Review_Text: Oh how I loved this top! I'm curvy and I find wrap tops to be very flattering if they are the correct size. If they are too small, they become way too low cut. This top runs true to size. I did wind up pinning the top to ether so I felt confident in my movements at work.
I thought this top was adorable. True to size. I definitely had to wear a tank under it if I didn't want to show cleavage and midriff, but I think it looks cute even with the tank.

Love the beautiful eye-catching colors & print! Perfect balance of flowy and fitted in all the right places makes it a very flattering top and extremely comfortable. Inside secondary tie ensures wrap top stays in place. Wore it to work with a cami underneath because it's low cut and to a festival without, and got non-stop compliments at both.
Noticed from the reviews and photos that it fit large so I ordered a size down (xs). It fit perfectly and I wore it several times!
Easy wrap blouse. True to size and very comfortable. Vibrant blue. Looks great with a white skirt, white jeans or even light wash jeans.

This is a great top if you have a smaller waist (this picture doesn't do justice to how flattering the waistline is!) The fabric is comfortable and flowy and the print and color are gorgeous. I do wish it were longer, and covered up more cleavage. I wore it for a family reunion and a theater event, so wanted to not show a lot of chest.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful blouse. Light weight and delicate. It's true to size.
links_Review_Text: They sent me an X-large when I usually wear a large. Was big on me but I made it work with a white tank under. I would rent again but my normal size.

links_Review_Title: So pretty! (I think so and so did others :) )
links_Review_Text: Loved the colors of this blouse - The blue is gorgeous. It fit well (true to size) and I liked the belted waist as it gave the silky fabric (which was nice and soft) a more out-together look and feel. Got several compliments.

I love Yumi Kim and the pattern, fabric, and color of this blouse are all beautiful BUT the front does not stay closed because there is no snap or closure. I wore it twice -- once without a cami, and once with. Without a cami I was constantly readjusting and making sure I was covered up. The tie is also very very long so I had to wrap it twice around my waist. Overall this was fine to wear, but I wouldn't rent again.

Love yumi Kim, and this didn't disappoint. I gave it a four because it was a little too low cut/no button to keep it closed so it exposed my bra at times. Maybe a smaller size would have fixed this. Not sure. Beautiful fabric and design though!
It wasn't my favorite shirt and was shorter on me. I was just not a fan of the style once it was on me.

links_Review_Title: loved the color and the fabric
links_Review_Text: While this shirt was beautiful, its not for bustier women. There wasnt enough fabric.
Loose in the arms like a kimono typically is wraps nicely overall beautiful piece.
I liked this top for work, but it was a bit small for me. Just ok.

links_Review_Title: C cup gals need not apply
links_Review_Text: I deliberately ordered a size L from my usual M based on reviews that this runs small. Even with a cami, this top would've exposed most of my bust. Wonder if this has shrunk from dry cleaning. Otherwise this line must be for flat chested gals. Couldn't wear. Exceptional material, colors and style. Beautiful kimono sleeves.
The blouse was fun to wear, but since my figure is very straight, the blouse did not wrap as much as it would for others. I wore a cami under it and really enjoyed the look.

links_Review_Title: wear to work & a fun brunch
links_Review_Text: Super cute & comfortable--can easily be dressed up or worn everyday
Very nice print and fabric. The neck came down low though so you may need a camisole underneath.

links_Review_Title: A wrap that stays in place!
links_Review_Text: Love this top! Thought about buying it. High quality feel and look. I loved that it had ties on the inside to actually keep the top in place, absolutely no adjusting throughout the day. The arms are flowy, but not over the top. Order your normal size. If you have a large chest it would probably require a cami underneath for work.
Cute and classy, a little low-cut so I added a cami underneath.
I wore this to work and I loved the colors! It is very low cut (I got away with it because I'm flat chested) but otherwise I liked it.
It was great for everyday and also very professional!

This shirt was a great color, but a bit of a hassle to assemble. Fashion tape was used to hold a bralette in place as well as around the bust of the shirt. This shirt fit a little small around my waist and had to use fashion tape to hold slit closed where the shirt tie strap laces through. If it wasn't such a process to wear I would rent again in a size up since I liked how the shirt looked.

links_Review_Title: Cute - runs short and low cut
links_Review_Text: Wore this top to work with black pants and a black tank under. It would have shown a lot of cleavage otherwise, and sitting down the wrap fell open quite a bit. I was glad I took the precaution of wearing an underpinning! The fabric was lovely and the color vibrant. Relatively adjustable in the waist due to the wrap, but seems to run quite short.
Fit well and received several compliments.

links_Review_Title: The v neck is very low and I was not comfortable enough to ever wear it.
links_Review_Text: I know this is a wrap top and anticipated a low cut v, this one ran too deep. I personally dont feel comfortable in tops that show off too much and never found the right reason to wear this.

links_Review_Title: Pretty colors, but needs a camisole
links_Review_Text: I ended up not wearing it because I didn't have a camisole that would work.
fits really nicely. looks great with white pants! i probably should have gotten a small, but the xs was ok.

links_Review_Title: Does not work at all on a small bust.
links_Review_Text: Did not work at all on a small busy. Did not wear.
This top is so easy to wear; feminine, fits well, dress it up or dress it down!
Beautiful print - would recommend to anyone!

Amazing color, fit and fabric. Loved this top. There is some play for sizing since it is a wrap and I am small-medium in tops but the medium fit me perfectly. I wore a bralette under for work. Lots of compliments on this one.

links_Review_Title: Wore this to my daughter's recital
links_Review_Text: Fit really well...I have a large bust and typically can't wear a wrap top like this but it fit great and the wrap sinches at the upper torso so it is very flattering and the peplum covers up any pooch!
Nice fabric and flattering fit! I'll definitely rent this one again.
difficult to wear if large chested

links_Review_Title: Perfect! Lux Look, just the right amount of sexy.
links_Review_Text: This was the perfect top to pair with jeans, this top is so beautiful on. I wish I had gotten a small because it came down a little too low on me. So if you're in between a small or a medium I say go to a small. Otherwise gorgeous top beautiful sleeves got a lot of compliments & Felt good in it too.

links_Review_Title: Fun, sexy top and stays on your shoulders!
links_Review_Text: Wore this velvet top to a 70's fundraiser. It's really top quality velvet, was very warm in the dead of winter and actually stayed put even when dancing! It has a little shelf bra built in of the same material which helps hold the girls up. I rented a small and a medium and was hard pressed to figure out which was with. I think the small was a little shorter and that's the one I chose. It was sexy, comfy and like I said I danced all night in it! I was apprehensive because of the wya the sleeves were shown in the picture (think Seinfeld puffy sleeves episode, lol) but once I looked at it on real people I saw it wasn't as ridiculous and gave the outfit some body. It is hard putting on your coat with them though but it's a minor, temporary issue if you're going somewhere indoors. I would rent and recommend this top!

links_Review_Title: Love this top! I got a ton of compliments when I wore it to dinner with friends. Highly recommend !
links_Review_Text: Runs a little large

links_Review_Title: Nice velvet shirt for a night out
links_Review_Text: Material was high quality. Enjoyed this top for NYE
I love this top however it was really hot! We went to dinner then impromptu dancing and things heated up pretty quickly. But it is a beautiful top and looks and feels expensive.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful top - received so many compliments!
links_Review_Text: Wore this out for a girls night and it was perfect! Fits true to size. I have a large chest (DD) and i was able to wear this without a bra. There's a little built in bra (kind of) in the top so it holds the girls in/up. It's great quality. I would def. rent it again!

links_Review_Title: Great for a cold night out!
links_Review_Text: Even with the exposed shoulders, the velvet fabric made feel appropriate for winter. Perfect Understated statement that goes great with jeans.

I absoultely loved this top! I would totally buy it or rent it again if i couldnt buy it lol. Its so soft and comfy. I wore it for dinner and drinks in NYC with 2 of my bffs. If youre thinking about renting this, just do it. You wont regret it! Oh and yes, its true to size.
Loved the sleeves and off the shoulder style. Sleeves were WARM and perfect for winter! Torso was slightly large and flows - I tucked it into jeans, but would probably also work with a skirt.
Beautiful top. Lots of compliments!

links_Review_Title: Super cute and comfortable. Simple but elegant look.
links_Review_Text: True to size and the built-in shelf bra was helpful, and made it even more comfortable to wear.
This was my first try at off the shoulder. It's a beautiful shirt and very well made but it's not a look for me. I look a little too hulky. Still....highly recommend for quality construction and fit.
Beautiful top. Interesting fit. Definitely runs small. Was very tight in the arms and chest. Very loose on waist.
XS fit perfect was easy to wear
Didn't realize it was a body suit too short for me
Honestly this shirt seemed fun in theory, but wasn't tight enough to actually stay on and also makes you look a bit like a pirate

Absolutely LOVED this top! Very comfortable to wear, fit really nicely, has a fabulous velvet feel that paired perfectly with jeans for a dressed up casual look (I wore black sandals and added a clutch to complete the look). Wish I could buy!
Fit was odd. And top felt too heavy
Super comfortable and sexy.
Super cute blouse. Stays up very nicely. Loved it!
Tight but cute for a date

links_Review_Title: LOVED IT! Very comfortable and received MANY compliments. Wore to a girls night out with jeans!
links_Review_Text: Fit great! I usually wear a small but went with the XS since the arms were out... (my shoulders are broad). So comfortable! Would wear again!

links_Review_Title: I tried it on, but will not wear for the event planned.
links_Review_Text: The black velvet was a rich color and texture. This top is very very very heavy. The lining is the same velvet as the top which makes it easy to wear braless but adds a lot to the weight. The length was good and there wasn't a lot of excess fabric in the torso, could be worn tucked or untucked. The fit in the upper arm was quite tight but the lower sleeves are HUGE, like medieval costume huge. It was an odd proportion for me, so I will be returning it.
I loved how this top looked but the sleeves do run small and don't have a ton of give. I also wish it would have been longer so I could have worn it with leggings.
see above

links_Review_Title: great top for date night out our a girls night
links_Review_Text: large sleeves that are actually pretty heavy and great for winter.
Gorgeous velvet blouse with festive sleeves. Heavy material but not hot. I put this on wrong two times trying to figure out the elastic band on the inside was a built in bra.

links_Review_Title: Nice for a short bit, not for all day.
links_Review_Text: The shirt is beautiful! But plan when you wear this shirt, as the arm holes built into the shirt and the right shoulder band is comfortable for a few hours and then gets quickly uncomfortable.

links_Review_Title: Wore it to a dinner party
links_Review_Text: Cons - sleeves are hard to eat in and the velvet is getting a little worn Pros - was comfortable on the arms the whole evening
Really nice quality and beautiful top!
Sophisticated look, the velvet is warm so perfect for winter. Super cute look, I got many comments.

links_Review_Title: Was a little too big for me to wear comfortably
links_Review_Text: Cute top, I'm very small-busted so I kept on feeling nervous that it was going to fall down. I would say it runs a little big, I definitely should have gotten the XS. Good thick fabric, cute top.

links_Review_Title: Great top. Wore with black pants.
links_Review_Text: Easy to wear. Great fit. Would recommend highly!

links_Review_Title: I paired this top with jeans and tall black velvet boots to go on a dinner and movie date.
links_Review_Text: I had a little trouble figuring out how to get my arms through the sleeves, but once the top is on it stays in place well and is comfortable. I love velvet and this top was so sexy.
This top is amazing. The material is really thick and heavy, which made it look very expensive. Love everything about it.

I loved this top. I was kind of skeptical since I'm not high on the velvet trend but man this made me change my mind. It was so cute! Fit perfectly - didn't even have to wear a bra with it Bc it has a built in bra. I'm broad shouldered, have a bigger chest and a long torso - I was skeptical that I would need a large for length but it wasn't too short. I would recommend highly to anyone!!!
This is a great top! It has a shelf bra built in but I️ still wore a strapless. It's really flattering
Very different shirt and fits great!
Super cute shirt. Like other reviewers, VERY crop and low cut. I ended up adding a bandeau to cover up the cleavage better.
So cute and would look fabulous on someone a little bit smaller than me. Wearing a large, maybe I could have done an XL, but they don't have that size. Wished it came in a bigger size!!
Not a great fit, didn't love the flared sleeves
I have broad boney shoulders, this top made me look like a football player. Loved the colors and fabric though.
Pretty enough for day or date night!
Wore shirt to go out. Loved the fit. Shows some cleavage but not too much. Great for a date night.

links_Review_Title: Cute, but not exactly what I expected
links_Review_Text: I wore this to work with an undershirt. Very cute, but the sleeves were too long and it was a little tight.
fit great on my arms. got a large so it would be longer. would totally buy

links_Review_Title: Low cut but beautiful color and style!
links_Review_Text: Fits snug. Very low cut. I had to wear a cami under it.

I ordered this and could barely get it on in a small. I'm not that big of a person. It is really low cut. I sent it back and will try a medium. I will have to wear something under it bc it is super low cut
It is very tight around the torso but looser with a deep cut up top

This top is so pretty. The deep green is a a gorgeous color for fall/winter and the floral pattern makes it pop. I wore this to a night on the town with a friend and paired it with high waisted jeans and cognac color thigh high boots and recieved several compliments. The V on this top is quite deep, so be sure you're okay with showing quite a bit of cleavage. It's also quite cropped, and fit me much more cropped than it did the model (I am 5'7" with a "normal" torso length), so I am glad I was wearing super high waisted jeans. I found that it kept riding up even higher throughout the night, but it wasn't overly bothersome for me. If you're between sizes, I would say size up, because some of the riding up may have been due to it being a little snug on my tummy. Overall, I was pleased with this rental.

links_Review_Title: so sexy and fun- perfect night out dress
links_Review_Text: this dress exceeded my expectations and is really fun to play around with the straps! i needed to do that; however , because i'm not sure if it was my height or lack of boobs, but the shoulder straps were constantly slipping down

Rented as an option for a tropical wedding and loved the open back and print. 10 fit but I went with the 12 because it was more breathable and I had more room to walk- there is no slit so keep that in mind. However, as mentioned, the straps make this dress a terrible idea unless you plan to keep your arms at your side all night. I ended up bringing it as a going out option but had to tie the straps/pin them to keep them up, just to wear out for dinner. Not sure how this would fare for dancing.
Fit like a glove - the straps are elastic so it's snug but doesn't cut. Got compliments all night.

I ordered a 2 hoping it would motivate me to work out (I'm usually a 4) but life got in the way and I never got around to it. I was worried it wouldn't fit or wouldn't look good on me but I was so wrong! It was so flattering and had just enough stretch to be forgiving of my one size difference. I got so many compliments and my boyfriend couldn't keep his hands off me. I literally want to buy this dress I am in love.

links_Review_Title: Loved this dress! Made me feel extremely confident
links_Review_Text: Fit was great, straps were a little loose but other than that jt was perfect

links_Review_Title: Perfect for warm-weather vacation and a fun night out.
links_Review_Text: Definitely fits very tight to the body, but cinches in all the right places and shows off every curve.
This dress was so beautiful. Definitely a little tight in the hips and as some other reviews have stated the straps are a little weird/annoying but they were worth it I felt so awesome in this dress.
The back is stunning and the fit is perfect. Got compliments all night. Highly recommend!

This is a great dress! I would order this again or in another color too. So many compliments. I typically wear a 6 but I ordered an 8, since this was a paper thin material and I wanted a loser fit on my tummy area
Fit was really great. Snug in certain areas like hips and around the butt. Was a bit more revealing than I anticipated but enjoyed wearing it out. Received tons of compliments!

The straps were too big! But I alleviated some of the issue by wrapping them around the horizontal straps (3x) to make them tighter. Great dress, not too stretchy but the 2p fit right on size, super flattering, good for smaller breasted women!
This dress is so unique. The 0p fit perfectly on me (5'0). The only downside is that the straps tend to fall down because they're not really normal straps, but worth it.

links_Review_Title: I absolutely loved this dress! You can still get down in the dress and accentuates all your curves!
links_Review_Text: The fit was great (hugs you in all the right places). I did not like how the straps were, so I safety pinned them back (through the loops, no damage to dress) I believe it added a bit of a sex appeal! I chose no bra, but you'll probably want something to hold the girls in place. Great dress and a lot of fun for an awesome price. Highly suggest!!!
Great Dress. Very comfortable and nice fabric . The only complaint is that I could not keep the straps up on the area. They are elastic and it was like they stretched throughout the evening.

links_Review_Title: Perfect combination between sexy and classy
links_Review_Text: LOVE LOVE LOVED this dress. The fabric is thin - not see through, and does not have much stretch to it. The back and arm straps are stretchy and fit perfectly fine but at times fell off my shoulders- I think this may be because of my small chest. I didn’t not wear a bra and the dress was tight enough on my chest that everything was held together. My booty and thighs are on the bigger side so the tightest part of the dressers was on the upper thighs and walking was at times difficult (not able to take any big strides and I had to pull the dress up to dance). SO many compliments on the gown. Would definitely recommend.

I think you have to have a certain body type for this dress it look good. I am a very small person but once I put it on the material has no stretch and did not look as cute as I envisioned. Thankfully I got a second dress on here and that one looked amazing!!

links_Review_Title: Date night with this dress made me feel 10x cuter!
links_Review_Text: This dress is definitely true to size, I would recommend measuring yourself and getting your exact size. The straps are elastic and were not too tight so it felt comfortable. The material feels lightweight but still has a good shape to it. The dress fell about 1'inch from the floor so with heels you should be good and wont step over the fabric. I loved it so much I ended up buying it!

this dress was absolutely fabulous. it fit like a glove and I literally had people stop me on the street and ask where it was from. the price rtr has it for is amazing and obviously WELL worth it. literally the best dress ever.
It may just be that my shoulders were not broad enough, but I couldn't wear this dress because the arm straps continuously fell down. It was a bummer because the rest of the dress was great!
perfect fit

links_Review_Title: received soooo many compliments! I felt great in it!
links_Review_Text: thin and stretchy material, but great for all occasions not to mention, it fit like a glove!
Loved this top! I wore it with a bra under but you don't need to. It stays up really well, is comfy, buttons are a bit hard to get on and off, but it's ok Bc it's so cute!
This top is the cutest! You must have patience with those buttons but its so worth it! It fits snug and honestly, I worked out hard, and it showed with this top!

links_Review_Title: Loveeee. Got all the compliments with this bad boy.
links_Review_Text: Cropped with v thick material. It's a little tight on the chest but I wasn't mad about it.
Looooved this top!! So cute. Wore it to a country concert and it was comfortable enough to dance in as well.
Waist was tight, shoulders were big and the buttons were super difficult

links_Review_Title: One of my fav RTR picks yet!
links_Review_Text: Wore this to a brunch with friends and absolutely loved wearing it. It fit perfectly, great material. Received many compliments :)

I rented this for a bike ride event and dressed it down with yoga pants and sneakers . Personally it's very cropped so I probably wouldn't have worn this if I didn't have a very high waisted pant to pair. Super cute and very boho vibe, the buttons took a minute but didn't bother me at all and it stayed put all night dancing and having a great time!

People suggested maybe sizing up but I'm glad I didn't. A little more cropped than I would've like but it was fine with high waisted jeans. Super cute and sexy for a date night however getting it off and on with a million buttons is a challenge ;) For more reviews head to my RTR highlight on Instagram and feel free to DM me any questions @leahgay

This runs a little small, but I don't even care! I think honestly I could have fit in my size (M) but it would have been snug. This is perfect, is so different & gorgeous and everyone always asks me where it is from when I wear it!
The color and fit of this top was so flattering! The buttons are a pain and the corset really has no give so just something to be aware of. Overall would definitely recommend.

Cute top for day or night. After you do all of the buttons on the front it is worth it. I wish it were slightly longer. If you have a large chest you will probably have to size up. I am small chested so I didn't have any issues.
Fit perfectly and the fabric is heavy enough for fall. Love!

I love love love this top. Wish I could afford to buy it. It is heavy like others mentioned, but that didn't bother me a bit. I chose to wear it to dinner on a hot summer day and I was fine because I was inside... outside I would have died
Wore this out to dinner date for my birthday and felt like a million bucks. Fit really well can great with high waisted jeans.

Buttons did require some work but once it was on, it was so pretty! Ruffles weren't overdoing it, the fit is slimming as well. Kind of like a corset. I paired it up with black shorts and heels and I was ready to party in Las Vegas. Would rent again!! I wore a large and it was fine, but I would size up if you don't like it too tight. Definitely size up if you have a bigger bust area.
Loved this blouse paired with lightly destroyed jeans. It looked effortless and cool. I think the torso portion was TIGHT but I was able to get away with it.
Love this gorgeous top! I wish the buttons were easier to button in the front or maybe a zipper would have been better. Otherwise it fit perfectly and photographed well!

links_Review_Title: Great fit and solid statement piece
links_Review_Text: I loved the fit and style of this top. I am smaller/average chested, but I would maybe size up if you're larger in the chest. The only thing that's annoying about this top is the buttons are functional, which means you have to button every single one of them to take it on/off.

links_Review_Title: In love with it, fabric is thick so don't recommend for outside unless that the weather is nice
links_Review_Text: Fit is great even for large breast, wear it with hight waist pants

This was such a great day-party top. The fabric is thick with no stretch so size up if you are in between sizes. Also, I would recommend this for a 60-70 degree day unless worn with shorts because this will get hot in anything above that. The buttons do take a while to close, but once on the top is great. If you have a larger bust I also recommend sizing up because there is not a lot of room up top and there is no stretch in the fabrication.I liked that the sleeves could be worn on or off the shoulders. Definitely recommend.
It took a few minutes to get this top buttoned but it was worth it. So colorful and fun for spring. Loved the puffy sleeves and off the shoulder style.
hard to button for larger chested people, but fit right when buttoned up

This shirt is perfect and makes your waist look so small even after stuffing your face at AYCE cruise :) It was kind of tight after eating though so would probably size up if I ever rent again. But sizing down also is very flatting to your boobs. Choose your victories, y'all!
Loved this, but to be honest it was too much work. Half tipsy on vacation and didn't want to deal with all of the buttons so I gave up and wore something else!
Tight on chest

I am a D cup and I was bursting out of this shirt. you have to undo all of the buttons to get it on as there is no give. It's also more cropped than I had imagined. Wouldn't recommend unless you have a small chest/torso.

This top was great. It was wonderful in pictures with the color and puff sleeves. I sized up based on other reviews but don't think it was needed. Material is thicker as well so it's warm when there is wind or a breeze.

I loved this shirt and wanted to wear it for a concert, but there is no stretch to the corset body and it was pretty tight so I knew I wouldn't be super comfortable. Maybe size up and rock this gorgeous top.
It's very odd looking with pointy boobs. Hard to tell from the picture. Returning.

links_Review_Title: Super cute! Hard to put on
links_Review_Text: Loved this, got so many compliments! You have to button each ring button to put this on though, which ended up taking 30 minutes
Gorgeous print and fabric, but sooo short. I have a longish torso and it hit about 4 inches above my belly button. Would love to see it in a longer style.

links_Review_Title: Wore this for a night out for my friend's bachelorette weekend
links_Review_Text: Fits well, a little large but I'm usually a medium for fitted tops Received tons of compliments!

links_Review_Title: A great pop of color and a wonderful neckline and fit.
links_Review_Text: The buttons on this one are very small! It takes a while to get in and out of the top and it is a real pain in the ass at the end of the night to work your way through all the buttons but the look is worth it and you feel very secure in the top.
i have a long torso so this was much more of a crop than i wanted it to be. didn't wear it.
Very heavy fabric, good luck to anyone trying to wear this somewhere warm, despite the off-shoulder cut. Also, if you have shoulders, do not bother.
This is the most beautiful gown! Perfectly shaped, the color is so vibrant, the bows are amazing - I got so many compliments all night!

I loved the fit and feel of this dress. I ordered the 6r because that's all that was in stock but normally I wear anywhere between a 2-6. It was definitely a snug fit but in a good way. The dress itself had clearly been a bit worn down and had a broken clasp but overall it was a great dress! Highly recommend it!

links_Review_Title: Fits like a GLOVE & I received compliments all night!
links_Review_Text: The color, and bottom ruffle make this dress stand out! It's beautiful for almost any occasion (spring.summer.or fall) Im 5'8-32DD & my msrmnts r 37-24-36 for ref.-wore sz 0R) adj. straps make it great for any cup size & the material is stretchy & also forgiving (multi-fabric layers, so you don't have to worry about any imperfections showing) -- id recommend this dress to ne1 who's a bit taller -5'5&Up-(cuz if the btm is too long, it could make the dress look off) RENT THIS!! ITS BEAUTIFUL!

This dress was comfortable but a little tight on the bottom. I normally wear a size 4 but this dress was tighter on bottom. It fit nice on top though. I love the color, but it looks better with a tan.
Loved the color, the dress was tight! Size up but it still looks amazing

Beyond not being in love with the super tight fabric on me in general, this dress felt really over-worn which made it look so much less sophisticated. Do what all the reviews say and size up if you do rent!

This dress was too long for my 5'2" frame but after opting for 4" heels, throwing on a strapless bra and tying the adjustable straps shorter it turned into a dream! The quality of the cut & fabric are worth the price. No spanx needed. I was so happy to see great colors at this Black Tie Wedding in Malibu!

I am so happy with this dress! I felt chic and beautiful. I will say that it fits like a glove so shapewear was my friend. I am normally between a size 2 and 4. It was quite snug around my hips where I am a bit curvier but I would not have sized up.

links_Review_Title: Unending compliments for this beautiful sunny dress.
links_Review_Text: Such a gorgeous, well-made dress that fit like a glove (or like a gorgeous, well-made dress). The color was more of a sunflower yellow and less golden than it appeared in photos--still lovely regardless. Also, I thought the material would be thicker, but instead it was thin enough that the outline of my belly button showed through. So, be aware it shows every curve and bump. I would have liked to try on a size 4 to see how it would have fit (my backup was a size 0 and way too small), but I was happy in the size 2 as well.

links_Review_Title: Stunning dress, must be body confident
links_Review_Text: The dress is absolutely stunning. The color is vibrant and beautiful. You must be confident in your body, because this will show off everything. I wore spanx, no underwear. couldn’t wear a bra, even removable bra cups could be seen. Used Band-Aids on my nipples for modesty. Size up! I normally wear a size 6, occasionally a 4. I wore the 8R. Since I’m short, the back of the dress dragged on the floor, and was stepped on a couple of times by other people. Held it up while walking, and hiked it up a little bit while dancing. If it ever went on sale, I would seriously think about buying it, It was that flattering.

links_Review_Title: I received so many compliments on this dress! It was perfect for a summer wedding.
links_Review_Text: I felt very comfortable in this dress despite it being pretty snug.

links_Review_Title: Iv never received so many compliments before!
links_Review_Text: The dress is tight but stretchy and fit perfectly. The mustard yellow was a hit at a Napa summer wedding. Highly recommend!! Considering buying for myself...

Beautiful color, thick fabric to hide and lumps/bumps, the perfect dress for accent shoes! I did not wear a bra based on how tight it was but the adjustable straps were perfect to keep the girls in tight :)

I rented this dress for my first black tie wedding and got tons of compliments! The dress is beautiful and glamorous, but is super revealing and makes it difficult to hide any flaws. If you rent it will be a hit, just make sure to have good shape wear!
Amazing fit and color. Fit my hips very well and shows everything underneath so you can't wear underwear/bra.

links_Review_Title: Beach wedding where the bold color stood out!
links_Review_Text: The bottom of this gown flowed in the wind with a nice tight bodice. I did not wear any undergarments. Size up if you are between sizes.

I normally wear a 12, and sized up to the 14R. The 12R lining was also completely ripped away from the zipper upon arrival. The fit is very tight and spanx are a must.
