Overall a great fitting dress that was fun to dance in, and received many compliments. I am 5'6" and with heels it was the perfect length. Love the shorter length in front so I never tripped over the dress.

This dress is comfortable and easy to wear. It is flattering and will hug curves so you must be comfortable with that. It was a little too cozy on my belly but it wasn't terrible looking I think. Requires seamless underwear. Very pretty color and cut.

This dress is amazing!!! I'm between a size 10/12 right now, so I wore the 12 and it was perfect. I definitely needed spanks though. I got soo many compliments throughout the night and I'd love to order it again!! Definitely worth it :)

this dress fit absolutely perfectly :-) i got so many comments on it ! the color is beautiful and bright, and the length was perfect and floor length in the back on me (im 5"2'). i wore this for my senior prom and im so glad!! only thing about it is you cant wear anything under it- it will show if you do. i would recommend this to anyone who loves yellow !!

The dress itself is beautiful and this is the one I was looking forward to wearing. The fabric is thick and good quality but I think the color was not forgiving on my cellulite as you could see my dimples in the back. The chest area was too big otherwise the size would have been good, it's stretchy so I bet I could have gone down a size or two. The chest area is the only reason I didn't wear, too big. Currently 27 weeks pregnant.

This dress runs VERY small. It was supposed to be my dress for my senior prom but it did not fit (hence the crying face in this photo). Luckily, the dress came two days earlier than it was supposed to so I was able to order a different dress to wear to the dance (thank you RTR for sending it early!!!). I am normally an 8 but the 10 was very small. A beautifully made dress... if it fits you!!!!
Super cute dress, loads of compliments. Wore it for my 25th birthday and it was a hit - little bit tight, not bra friendly but if your good with that you can throw on some spanxs and all is good!

links_Review_Title: wore this beautiful spring dress to a perfect southern wedding
links_Review_Text: loved this dress! my favorite color, got so many compliments! material was thick however tight enough where it was unforgiving since you saw the spanx I was wearing underneath. this dress provided with enough support with me to go without a bra which is a big deal for me since I have a big bust.

I was a bit worried about this dress with all the reviews mentioning shape wear but not only did I skip them, I skipped a bra for the first time since nursing two kids! I felt amazing despite the fact that I felt every other girl at the wedding throwing me daggers with their eyes! A must rent and I hope I have occasion to rent it again!

links_Review_Title: This dress was so much fun to wear. I wore it in April, and it was the brightest in the room!
links_Review_Text: It fits like a glove... I usually wear a size 8, so I'd recommend getting your second size as a size up!
Fit a little right in the chest, but other than that fits figure very well. Perfect for a formal event. Color was just what I wanted! #wedding #yellow #gorgeous

I'm 5'6'', 130 lbs, size 26 jean, size 4 and the 4 fit great! I'm small chested, but it was stretchy so I think a larger chested person would also be fine with this dress! The adjusted straps were great also!

This dress was absolutely beautiful! I so intended to wear it but didn't for seasonal color reasons (February). I intend to rent again for a summer wedding! But as people say, it does show all. Beware!
Overall was too tight and I thought it hit me at a weird length. Color was really nice though.
Beautiful dress! Thick fabric that is form fitting but a little stretchy. Highly recommended!

I am obsessed with this dress. Usually a 6 or an 8 in dresses and went with the 8 only to get a bit more room to accommodate for drinking/eating. NOT FORGIVING AT ALL. I wish I chose shape wear that went up to my bust because the Spanx I wore cut right above my hips and you could see the line in many photos. I wore 5in heels and the train just barely skimmed the ground, which was perfect. I meant to wear a strapless bra, but forgot and it wasn't the end of the world as the straps are completely adjustable (I really just wanted a more perky shape tbh). I recommend renting your regular size and one size up.

This dress was perfect for my baby shower! The material is forgiving and there's a bit of stretch to it to accommodate for a belly! I had ordered two other dress initially, neither option fit. RTR was extremely accommodating in getting me a replacement in time for my event. I was so happy with the replacement and received a ton of compliments! I got the 14R and a 16R as a backup .. was able to fit into the 14R!
A little snug in the bust, but loved it.

links_Review_Title: A dress that you have no choice but to stand out in!
links_Review_Text: This is a wonderful, form-fitting dress! I wore it to a holiday work party, and was slightly worried that the bold yellow color would clash with a winter event. I'm quite tall but the fit (size 4R) was great. I loved it, and received many compliments! This is a great dress to wear, regardless of season. I wish that I could keep this rental!

links_Review_Title: The luxury of this fabric, the color!
links_Review_Text: I would have loved to try a 6 in this, though I think it might have been too tight. Did NOT like the fit at the bust, which is why this is a 'No' from me. Sure I'm itty bitty titty committee, but I have no problem with that...this just didn't hit right, even with those silicone pasty things slapped on. Perhaps a proportion issue. The fabric is luxurious with a beautiful hand and weight. Loved it around my rather up and down/straight body...I never look that curvy so it's a fun thing for me to see on myself! Didn't love how the seam on the inside of the "train" was visible, I found it glaring and unfinished considering the $$$ of this piece. The slip is also shorter than the dress, 2 things that I didn't notice much from the pics but that kept stopping my eye when I had it on. Pleased to have been able to try it, may give it a whirl again in another season.

The dress ran really small. I typically wear a size 10-12 but I read the reviews and ordered a 12 and a size 14, just in case. Thank goodness I did, because I ended up wearing the size 14!! Loved the color, the style. Got loads of compliments.

Love the color!! The tie straps were great, I hate when my straps are falling down all night! The material is very stretchy so it was comfortable all night while still being form fitting. I was worried about the length of the dress as I am 5'2, but it was perfect :) Would highly recommend!
Loved the dress. Got tons of compliments!! Only bad thing is I had to wear spanx. The dress is pretty see through.
Went to my friends piano performance

I rented this dress just for fun to wear around the house during quarantine (you know-homeschool and princess parties with my daughter) and I am so obsessed with it I bought it, hoping for an occasion out of the house sometime soon! The fit is tight enough up top to not need a bra and a tad long in the skirt length as I'm only 5 feet tall. But overall the fit is amazing!

links_Review_Title: Jay Godfrey can do no wrong!
links_Review_Text: Might be hard to use the bathroom with the overlay skirt + side zip romper, but worth it!

links_Review_Title: Special look with a color to die for!
links_Review_Text: Actually wore the size 6 jumper and 4 skirt. It was a little big but more comfortable to avoid it riding up. It was so beautiful and fun to dance and twirl in. Fabric didn't wrinkle! Work with sticky bra, gold shoes and accessories. Love this designer!

Really had fun wearing this for a fundraising Gala. I felt like my gown was different, very comfortable and it has pockets! The only down side is I didn't even try to use the ladies room with this on. You have the shorts romper then the skirt overlay and...to tricky for doing out and about. Otherwise, great dress!

Perfect fit (would have gotten a 4 if they had it in stock but made the 2 work). Found a picture but doesn't do the dress/romper justice. Gorgeous fabric, smooth and well-made. Did the romper reveal removing the skirt at the end of the night. People were talking about it today :)

This dress was amazing! I loved it so much and got so many compliments. The fit was great. I discovered halfway into the evening the skirt has pockets--- added bonus! Loved everything about this rental!

Wore this to a gala event. There is NO GIVE and NO STRETCH to this. I'm 5'8" and the romper is a tiny short for my preference to wear by itself, but with the overlay, it turns into a flowing beautiful gown WITH POCKETS. I loved how this look could be dressed up or dressed down, depending on accessories and shoes. The color was an amazing blue, allowing for black, gold, and brown shoe would work.

This is probably one of my favorite RTR dresses. I felt very glamorous and it was so fun to wear. I received many compliments all night long. Going to the bathroom was pain, but worth it! I'm 5'6" and 130-135lbs. I could have worn either the 4 or 6, but I wore the 6 mostly because of the romper. I have a long torso, so I needed the length. I would have worn the 4 skirt because it stayed put better, but it was a little but wrinkly, so I wore the 6 skirt. I highly recommend this dress!

This dress was AMAZING! I rented a size 10 with a 12 for back up. I had to go with the 12 because of my chest size. If you have a bigger bust like myself, please size up. I felt so beautiful and received compliments all night!

links_Review_Title: Loved the dress. Size was true. Fabric was so nice.
links_Review_Text: Loved this option for renting a dress for my school Gala! Made finding a dress easy. Received many compliments on the dress and how unique it was. Will definitely use this service again!

The color is eye catching and the skirt flares out and grants you a dramatic entrance but when you have a few glasses of champagne and drop the skirt, the entire room will gasp. The romper does run shorter so long or curvy torsos will want to size up for comfort. I enjoyed all the drama this dress afforded me but I opted to keep the skirt on as I didn't feel the romper solo was very forgiving/flattering.
Fit is spot on. This dress is super comfortable. I thought it would be heavy but it isn't. I absolutely loved it!!!! So fun too. Took the skirt off and danced the night away in the romper.

Loved this dress! Only a 10 and 14 were available so I opted for the 14. The 12 would've got perfect. It was a little large in the chest. The shorts were a good length. There is zero stretch in this dress. And going to the bathroom was not the easiest! The color is amazing and I got compliments all night! The dress is very figure flattering. I recently had a baby and it hid all the extra weight! I would definitely recommend!

This dress was so fun! It was perfect for my company's annual Award's Gala. I wasn't sure if it was going to work fit wise but with 3in heels, it was perfect! The romper underneath caught everyone off guard and was an unexpected conversation starter. Did I mention that the color stood out amongst all the black? I would love to wear this again. Short girls- this ball gown is a total winner!

links_Review_Title: If you don't want to stand out this dress isn't for you.
links_Review_Text: It is very tight... I have barely any breathing room it fit like a glove. It is also kind of a pain to use the bathroom definitely need an extra hand. With that said I received compliments all night..... it is a gorgeous dress super flattering on any body shape I highly recommend this dress to anyone that wants to make a statement.

I absolutely felt like a superstar wearing this electric blue dress!! The romper fit perfectly and the stunning, flowing skirt (with pockets!) could be adjusted to reveal either leg or the center covering the romper. I wore this to my company awards ceremony and for this event the dress was fun and sophisticated AND comfortable . I could dance in this dress with the romper with no worries about exposing anything. The romper was challenging to go to the bathroom with, but I loved it regardless - I will rent again! Wish I owned it! If you are debating whether or not to rent this dress, do it!

Wore this for my sorority's 100th anniversary. AMAZING dress! I was especially excited about the removable skirt but I never even took it off. I received compliments all night long. The pockets on the skirt were an added bonus. Ordered a size up because my true size wasn't available and it fit perfectly. All around great outfit!

I still can't believe how comfortable this dress was to wear all evening. Heads were turning wherever I went. Such a fun dress in a stunning color. Perfect for a fancy dinner and theater date in Las Vegas! Original size of 10 and 12 were WAY too small in the bust. A 14 fit in the bust but was a little loose in the hips and waist but was wearable!
The fit was absolutely great! I had so much fun walking around in this dress, and I wore 6in heels and lifted the length perfectly off the floor.
May have been the hardest dress to return. Super flattering. I wore the size 6 in romper just to be more comfy and a 4 in the skirt.
I have never had so many compliments on a dress. So breathtaking in person.

links_Review_Title: This dress was perfect for a formal wedding.
links_Review_Text: I am 5'6 and the length was perfect with heels. I ordered size 0 and it fit great but was a little hard to zip along then side over my bust. The skirt stayed perfectly in place all night and the color is beautiful
Was complimented all night.

links_Review_Title: Amazing and eye catching blue romper with over skirt! Fun formal affair look
links_Review_Text: This dress was a show stopper all night and was perfect for the after party as well because the detachable skirt could be removed. Loved the fit and look of it. Does run small in chest area due to side zipper, had to size up. 10R was worn due 8R was not available to rent however I do feel the 8R would've worked and helped it be more fitted in the stomach area. One size up recommendation for this dress.

Really loved this dress and got a ton of compliments. I'm 5'7 and wore three inch heels and the back of the dress doesn't touch the floor. It doesn't look bad though because it's a high low. I think with Jay Godfrey, he runs TTS or slightly smaller, so I'd get the bigger back up size. I ended up wearing the 8, as the 6 was too tight in the romper. Felt very beautiful in this, but just remember it is two pieces when using the restroom! Great rental!

links_Review_Title: Be different with this gorgeous romper skirt set
links_Review_Text: Loved this! Rented it for work Christmas party and everyone complemented it! Very different but fun and flirty. I wore it with the detachable skirt. I'm 5'10" and usually a size 2-4 in dresses, the 4 fit perfectly. The skirt was a little long, but for a gala type party it worked out perfectly. Very comfortable! Recommend if you want to do something different!

links_Review_Title: Romper situation with a dreaded side zipper - but still worth it. Size up!
links_Review_Text: Work this on vacation in SF to go to a fancy dinner in SF. Loved the dress, my favorite piece I have ever rented! The watch out is that this is a ROMPER, with a skirt that you step into and hook and zip. When going to the bathroom understand you have to take off the skirt, struggle with the side zipper and then take off the entire romper (and pray the bathroom has a hook). Then you must put back in the romper, fight with the side zipper, then get the skirt back on. It's a process but worth it.

I'm an in between side 2 and 4. Got this in 4 since they didn't have 2 and was slightly big but still great. Wore this to my office holiday party and got sooooo many compliments. The best part is the skirt while walking. It stays out of your way and since the material is heavy and flowy, it makes you feel like a Star. Loved it

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous dress that is unique + glam!
links_Review_Text: This dress was so gorgeous, I felt like a princess in it! Comfortable. Structured fabric gave good form. I'm 5'10" and the skirt was perfect length even in heels. If you were shorter it would have a bit of a train but that would be pretty too! Only downside was it was a lot of hassle going to the bathroom because it is a two piece romper. But who cares when the dress is this fun?!

This dress was so beautiful! It was so so comfy with the short romper and the skirt overlay.! I definitely felt like a princess. It was different from all the other dresses at the event as well. The skirt overlay was so fun. The only negative is that the skirt ran a bit big for my waist and a tiny bit long. The larger waist made it slide down a bit below the waistline of the romper at times. Not the best look. I kept having to pull it up but I still loved the dress and got so many compliments!

I got so many compliments wearing this outfit! I love that the skirt comes off. I wore this to my company holiday party and wanted to dance, so I removed the skirt on the dance floor, which gave me more room to dance, but several people were wowed by the convertible outfit!! Cons: - it's a bit tight in the seat - size up. - the skirt is long. It creates a train effect and is stunning but my husband kept stepping on it all night. I'm 5'4" and wore 3" platforms

The color is amazing, the style is unique.,so many people commented on this dress... I felt amazing in it. The fit is true to size, fabric is high quality and it's a beautiful dress with a the unique plus of being a romper too! Only negative is it's impossible to go to the restroom in, soooo much work!

The fit was pretty true to size for a pear shaped 8. I’m small up top, so had to wear a very padded strapless bra and then use some fashion tape to keep the side with no shoulder from exposing the top part of my bra in the front. Other than that, it looked gorgeous! I felt super glamorous and got tons of compliments. I was definitely the best and most elegantly dressed lady at the Christmas party. This would work well in a formal setting.
This dress was amazing. I wish I could have kept it. The only thing, it was very difficult to zip around the boobs but I have larger boobs. So if you're heavy chested, size up.

Loved this dress and received a million complements. Torso length and legs had good fit, waist was a bit large, but I am quite petite. At 5'2" with 4 inch heals the skirt was just sweeping the floor. The skirt had so much body, dancing and spinning was glorious. Skirt removal boomerang is a MUST! I actually watch jaws dropped.
Fit well. I don't have a narrow waist even though my bottom half is quite small. I needed the 6 for my waist but the 4 for my hips/butt/thighs.

links_Review_Title: This dress/romper made me believe in magic!
links_Review_Text: Now you see it, now you don't! Perfect for day to night: The 1 shoulder with bow detail, the detachable high low skirt that converts to a romper....Great for dancing the night away! Fit-wise, I have a small chest so the top was a little loose, whereas the waist was pretty snug. Also the skirt is quite long and flowy, so beware of ppl stepping on it. I wore with high heels to a wedding in wine country and paired with the Nocturne earrings and a fur coat for the evening chill. Best RTR rental!

This dress totally surprised me, because It's actually two pieces, a romper, and then a long skirt you wear over which makes it super versatile. It fit totally true to size, although was a bit long on me because there was no petite option. Loved this dress and felt so glamorous in it. Also, the skirt had pockets!

links_Review_Title: This dress is a head turner- but...
links_Review_Text: It's super flattering. I had plenty of room in a size larger than I normally wear except for my rib cage. Can wear a strapless bra with it easily. The color is amazing! Size up- absolutely no stretch and no wiggle room because it is a romper. I almost didn't wear it because it wasn't comfortable. But it was gorgeous on.

This dress was downright amazing. I'm typically between a 4 and 6 depending on fit and the 4 torso length in the romper was shorter so I went with the 6 which was perfect. The color was phenomenal and I got so many compliments that my husband said he felt like the third wheel to me and the dress. The skirt overlay is definitely a statement, I had to pick it up to walk up/down stairs, and it was a blast to dance in too.

Amazing print, fabric, cut. Short sleeves were perfect. The only thing that wasn't great is the belt that cane with it so I used a wide belt I had. I kind of sort of regretted it because I changed the waistline from the strange but deliberate mid-rib cage waist RV was going for but it looked much cleaner.

The fit is loose and flowing and not tight in the bosom. There is a ribbon for a belt which gives nice shape. Warning!!! It's a very thin dress and you must have a slip or wear yoga pants underneath or you can see through it. It's very thin. Also, the night I wore it there was so much static that it cling to me the entire time. I was wearing it in a geeenhouse party at a botanical garden and you would think that moisture would have kept the dress from doing this.

links_Review_Title: Felt like I should be at Paris Fashion Week!
links_Review_Text: I LOVED this dress! It's actually very simple, but the print and the belt give it such a polished look. It is thin material and I wore a black slip underneath and a black bra. Fits true to size and made me feel very chic!

The good Nice cut at neckline. I like this mock neck and it lays very nicely. The fabric - wow! The bad The belt. The RTR bar code showed through it so it was unusable. Also, the lack of structure of the dress at the waistline with this flimsy belt caused it not to stay lined up on the seam. (Pictured with my own belt in a similar style. Later in the day I was tied of fussing with lining up at the seam and removed the belt entirely.) The neutral Thin silk fabric makes a slip a must. Length may be too long for some. Cut may not be flattering for many body types.
Flattering even on my curvy pear shaped frame. The belt does sometimes loosen. Would rent again.
This dress is gorgeous but I could not get rid of the static cling. I tried steam, lotion, hairspray even... wore a slip but it didn't help the cling around my calves.
This dress is really pretty, but the material is way thinner than I was expecting. Also, the top runs very small. The arms/waist/chest area is really tight and restrictive. I would size up.
Was super excited for this one but in the end so so. Changed up belt to make it look younger. Static cling all day :/
Rented this for a Christmas party. Material is thin, so you will need to wear a slip or Spandex underneath. Super easy to move in, very comfortable.

It's a cute dress. The static cling, however, was off the charts. I wore a size bigger than I ordinarily would have, because it's what was available, though I don't think that has an impact on the static cling. That's not something I would ordinarily even notice, but I couldn't help it!

I absolutely loved this dress! I wore it 4 times and each time, I styled it a bit differently. Once with powder blue suede 3" pumps, my own black wide ribbon belt ( the one included was NOT in good shape),and a cashmere pashmina, then one day with western style tall boots and a denim jacket, then black stiletto tall boots and a faux fur vest, and lastly same stiletto boots with a black leather motto jacket...each time I received many compliments and was thrilled to be wearing it, so comfortable, and feeling VERY chic!! I also wore a wide leather belt, and that really pulled in the waist. It ran small on me through the rib cage/bust, but there is extra material at the "almost" empire waist;the belt helped to keep it from "poofing out" at my tummy. One of my favorite RTR picks, and I have rented hundreds of dresses!

I felt stylish and like a boss babe in this dress. Definitely see through in light so I wore a cami and slip under. The fit is not body hugging but I absolutely loved it. The ribbon that cinges the waist was the perfect touch. Felt like I was wearing the full $1200. (;
Disappointed in the quality of the fabric. Silk, but not lined and the neck is huge. If you're between sizes order down as this runs large.

links_Review_Title: Super sexy dress and beautiful color
links_Review_Text: Ok so this dress puts a lot on show but if you own it, you'll feel so sexy and it's surprisingly comfortable. It's backless and has a deep cut front so make sure you are prepared with some fashion tape. The slit was a liiiiitle high for my liking which caused me to keep adjusting throughout the night. Also the material was stretchy and soft, almost like a Jersey, but still looks v formal. Loved it but maybe wouldnt wear to a corporate event again....
This dress is sexy and sits well in your frame. I didn't make it to the party for which I rented it. I will rent it again, and again, and again!

links_Review_Title: I looked like a million bucks and you can't deny it. I've always loved Cushnie! So fire.
links_Review_Text: I usually wear a 12 but with the stretchy material of the dress I decided to size up. The color was perfect for my skin tone and you really can't wear a bra with this dress.
And I give full credit of my exposure to this brand to RTR! Dress was perfect and clingy in all the right spots. I styled it with yellow suede Manolo pumps and a while Mansur Gabriel top handle bag.

I wore this to a fundraiser and felt great in it. I am usually a 12 but found the 10 fit better. It has some unique ruching and having it a little more snug made it look more cinched and flattering. Very sexy!

links_Review_Title: Great dress! Very comfortable and perfect fit. Received a ton of complements
links_Review_Text: Should have got the size 8 bc i have a bigger bottom and the slit was more exposed it was fine just had to be careful
Flattering, comfortable & got so many compliments. Fits true to size. Could not recommend enough!

links_Review_Title: I really wanted to love this one!
links_Review_Text: I loved the color of this dress but the dress does not work for the curvy girl. It showed all my flaws. Back is cut fairly low so when you attempt to wear a strapless bra, it's a tug of war. Also show all your back fat (if you have it)! There was also something weird going on with the slit where it flipped up continuously where you could see the dress lining which was annoying. I opted not to wear this one unfortunately.
Loved it! Thought it was very flattering! Many compliments! Slit was tricky

This dress came to me overnight after my original RTR dress came with missing pieces. And let's just say: OMG THANK GOD. This dress was perfect. Hugged every curve,but not inappropriately. Didn't have to wear a bra (although I'd recommend those little stick on petals if you're going to be anywhere with air conditioning) The only complaint id have is the slit is a liiiiittle on the high side and if you have any type of thigh at all (like me) it opens a little more than it should. Otherwise- loved it.
Love this dress! Will def rent again! So flattering - FYI you can't wear a bra and it's super high cut slit but looks amazing on!
The fit is super flattering and I color is gorgeous, very sexy

I rented this for a fall wedding and it was the perfect pick. It fits true to size and accents curves in a flattering way. I received so many compliments. The slit does go high so be careful when sitting. Would recommend wear nip covers/stickies because the fabric get a bit thinner in that area. Overall a great experience.

links_Review_Title: Sexy and elegant. I loved this dress.
links_Review_Text: Fits nicely

links_Review_Title: Love this dress - needs specific body type
links_Review_Text: None
It's a beautiful dress it was just a bit too big.

links_Review_Title: for the price I was shocked!
links_Review_Text: love the color, thick material but still showed every bump on my body. More then that the knot in the front is thick and you can see it. could not where I think it would be nice on a slim gal

This skirt is fantastic! It was in my first RTR shipment and it was a home run! It is adorable and comfortable and fits well. I think it may run a little bit large but because the material is a bit stiffer, the size worked and I don't think I'd want it tighter. It is flattering and fun and cute. I wore it twice already and will probably wear a third time. Definitely thinking about purchasing it.

Received so many compliments on this outfit (the sweater is also RTR) and was perfect for an NYC date night out to dinner and a broadway show. Looks great with OTK boots. It fit true to size and sat high enough that I could wear it with a short sweater without it showing my midriff. The price was so good I decided to buy it so I can match with lots of other cute tops!

I rented this to go out in for my birthday and it was perfect! If I knew I'd wear it more, I would have bought it. It is a little tight around the butt area so I ended up wearing the bigger size that I rented. It was warm - it is thick, it was a good length to dance in, very comfortable, and I loved the texture on it. I highly recommend this skirt.

links_Review_Title: Received a lot of compliments wearing this. Wore it to work and to happy hour.
links_Review_Text: It fit great. Not too short.

links_Review_Title: This was a very flattering skirt! Comfortable too!
The perfect skirt for a night out with my friends, a nice break from jeans and a fun top.
links_Review_Text: It was true to size, and I have large hips. It was a nice short length on me, I imagine it would be very short on someone tall.
Didn't have enough opportunities to wear it out and I knew I wanted more. Classic mini skirt made of good quality fabric. Sits a little higher at the waist, so a great match for a leotard.
Awesome skirt for a night out, runs a bit large (I'd normally order myself a S for bottoms - 27 in jeans) but nothing too large. Short!
This skirt is super cute and very soft. Will rent again in a larger size.
perfect fit
Almost bought this. Very cute and comfy.

links_Review_Title: Material is thick so adds some bulk
links_Review_Text: Loved it but it's not terribly slimming. It's good quality and I will rent again. I thought I would need a small but a M fit fine.

I absolutely loved this jumpsuit. It was flattering, fashionable, and super comfortable. I wore it several times and received multiple compliments. It is on the longer side so heels are a must. The pattern and the fabric are wonderful.

I really liked this jumpsuit, but I did have a few issues with it: it was very roomy around the waist so I had to cinch it with a belt, the buttons on it are very very loose (some came undone randomly), there's a space near the pocket where it's really sheer and it gets kinda wrinkly. However, I loved the pattern, it's very comfortable, and very cute! I don't think I'd get a smaller size because the length worked for me.

I’d say this PJ like jumpsuit runs true to size. I got an 8 bc/ the 6 wasn’t available & it was too big but I pulled it off by wearing a thin black belt. The material is very sheet. It took me over 45min to iron & I felt committed to wearing it. I’m 5’7 & could only wear a 1” heal to avoid a high water look.

I wasn't sure what to expect from this jumpsuit that I rented for my bachelorette brunch, but it ended up being my favorite of all the outfits I rented for the weekend! I felt like a 40s era Hollywood starlet on vacation in the tropics. I would say it runs large though. I typically wear a 0-2, and this size 0 was pretty roomy. The waist was huge and the torso was too long, but adding a belt took care of both issues. Kinda long in the pant, so I wore with platform slides.

So I leaned all into the 1940's look, complete with turban. My friend deemed it too much so maybe you should skip the turban. I did love the ease and comfort of the jumpsuit. I thought it ran big on me but I am in between sizes right now so I have a hard time picking the right one.
This romper has a great pattern and silhouette, definitely a standout look! The legs are a little wide which makes shoes look weird with it but worth it to rock something sicker than your average
I wore this to a casual wedding ceremony in India. The overall fit was very comfy and I got a lot of compliments. I was underwhelmed by how flimsy the fabric was however--doesn't feel very luxurious.

links_Review_Title: Just own that you're wearing pajamas
links_Review_Text: So light and comfy!
Super comfortable, runs long. Wrinkles a bit but I got lots of compliments!
Super comfy but looks like I was wearing a 2 piece sleep set :(.
I wore this out, I wore this to work, and I wore it on vacation. LOVED IT. Will rent again. Only complaint would be all the buttons-so many and seem like they should be secured better.

links_Review_Title: Much more sheer than expected. Boyfriend said I looked like a "sexy tropical mechanic"
links_Review_Text: Little big, but that might just be sizing. It was cute, but the fabric was very sheer and thin - didn't feel particularly high quality. Would be nice as a vacation outfit!

Perfect for a vacation with friends to throw on to go downstairs when everyone is pajamas. The fabric feels really smooth, but it is thin. The waist was slimming yet comfortable. Fits true to size. The length is an inch or two long, but the fabric moved well and was okay for the length.

links_Review_Title: Loved it. So fun, fit great.
links_Review_Text: Lots of buttons so hard to get in and out of it
It's very hard for me to find jumpsuits or pants that fit because of my short torso. This one fit surprisingly well, plus the print is fun! Perfect for weekend plans with casual shoes.

The fit was great, it was SO COMFORTABLE it felt like I walked out in my pajamas, and the material was soo soft. Also the buttons were large and not nearly as much of a logistical nightmare as I thought they would be. Obviously all jumpsuits are really not great for going to the bathroom, but since the buttons are up the front it actually made it easier. Also, POCKETS.
Lined in all the right places and unlined in all the right places :)

links_Review_Title: PJs to Work and Everyone Loved It!
links_Review_Text: Fit - perfect, good and baggy with a bigger size Pros - comfy and cute Cons - thin

The legs were sheer, which I wasn't expecting, but they weren't too sheer that it looked overtly trendy. Sophisticated and well crafted. I usually have issues with buttons gaping, but this is so well made, it wasn't an issue at all.

links_Review_Title: Many compliments. Wore it twice to dinners.
links_Review_Text: I am a bit busty so sized up. Happy surprise that it fit in the waist.

What really stood out here was that beautiful pattern!!!! This was the first jumpsuit I ever wore... and it will probably be my last. Individually, these would've been great items, but I didn't love it as a whole. Looked a lot like a Pyjama, alternatively I felt like a fancy 1940s factory worker. Let's just say this just wasn't for me. It was also very tight, i can't attest to this running large at all. I was afraid it would rib every time i sat down because there just wasn't enough fabric in the top.
This silky cotton, sheer fabric was great for hot evening out. Just weird enough to make this unique but elegant enough to work for dinner. Loved it! #pockets
Very thin and see through Wasn't forming pretty shapeless and see through Print is nice though

links_Review_Title: Wore it for every day and it was perfect!
links_Review_Text: AMAZING! Added a belt and an amazing necklace, got SOOOO many compliments!

links_Review_Title: Really cool jumpsuit - I got a lot of compliments with this one!
links_Review_Text: Cute, comfy, runs true to size. I got a size up because I wasn't sure, but I probably could have gotten my true size. The fabric is light and great for summer. The overall length was a little long, but perfect to wear with platforms. Would rent again for the right occasion.
BUT it's slightly see through on the bottom so wear with spanx or boy shorts. Ran really big on me.

This jumpsuit is gorgeous. It runs large - I could have sized down, but the larger size looked fine. Very comfortable and breathable fabric. I had to wear heels (I am 5'5), so this should be long enough for taller girls!
Beautiful jumpsuit, it was a little tight around the middle, but otherwise very comfortable and lightweight.

links_Review_Title: Wasn't able to wear it, it was too long..
links_Review_Text: I'm 5'4" and this garment was waaay too long. Should have gotten a size 0.
Stylish, tailored, comfortable and a little extra room to give. A more relaxed fit. Loved

links_Review_Title: Wonderful dress. Received so many compliments.

links_Review_Text: Comfortable fit, received compliments all night!

I absolutely loved this dress, it definitely met my expectations. I got tons of compliments. It was a great length, easy to dance in, comfortable, and figure flattering. Very classy and age appropriate dress for a wedding or any type of event!

links_Review_Title: Cute, but didn't love the nude color under the embroidery
links_Review_Text: Definitely size up if you are in between sizes - the dress underneath the embroidery is very form fitting. I liked this, but didn't love the nude color (it looked a little brown), and ended up wearing something else.

links_Review_Title: Birthday Evening at a Jazz themed restaurant
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress for all the details and fit - all measurements were true to size and the dress was simple to wear. The only person disappointed was my boyfriend when I took off my jacket initially as I think he thought I was wearing nothing underneath :o

links_Review_Title: Beautiful, classic lace with a touch of sheer.
links_Review_Text: Rented for an outdoor wedding in MS in November. Perfect length for a taller gal.

Overall fit was great. The top was a tad big, would've been perfect if I was 1 cup size bigger (story of my life). I got compliments all night and felt amazing in it. I will definitely be renting this one again.

links_Review_Title: Perfect fit.. First time with RTR!
links_Review_Text: Fit was perfect. I'm 72, 5'2", 118 lbs. I received so many compliments. Very comfortable dress!

Absolutely loved this dress. It fit beautifully. I normally wear a 4, but that size wasn't available so I went for the 2 and it fit well. Details are gorgeous and I got tons of compliments all night. Wish I could keep it!
This dress was gorgeous! Photographed very well. Perfect dress for a wedding guest
This fit perfectly! It is forgiving in the Mommy tummy area! I got tons of compliments!
I normally wear a 14 but had to size up due to the chest area being really tight. the dressed was nice and was so comfortable. and I received a lot of compliments on it.

links_Review_Title: This dress was perfect for a vintage garden themed wedding. It fit great and was comfortable
links_Review_Text: This dress is beautiful! I wore it to a vintage garden themed wedding (complete with a fascinator, which brought the look all together). The fit was true to size and the dress was super easy and comfortable to wear. Like other reviewers, I found the area around the arms a bit itchy at first, but after a few minutes, I didn't even notice it. I got a ton of compliments. I would totally wear it again!
Loved this dress. So many compliments! Was super comfy. I went with the bigger size. 14 fit but was a little snug so the 16 was more comfortable.

The photos online made me think it was black, but I was pleasantly surprised at it being navy (clearly I didn't read the description). It is flattering and I got compliments. After wearing it for 8 hours the sleeve fabric began to irrate my skin and I was happy to take it off. I also thought the keyhole back should have laid flat, but it didn't. Regardless, I loved the look and length.
Absolutely loved this dress and got tons of compliments!

I ended up wearing a size bigger than normal as it fit more comfortably. When I tried on my size it fit but I couldn't raise my arms. The only downside to wearing the more comfy size is that the sheer top of the back didn't lay flat, it was a little bit gapey. Overall very comfortable dress and pretty in pics. Up close the flowers were folded and a little strange.
I had just had a baby 1 month before. I'm typically a size 4 or 6 but needed the size 8. I still felt great and the dress was comfortable. I highly recommend!
Did not wear. Did not like on.

This was my first RTR and I ordered a 4 and a 6 because I just got measured for a wedding I am in and at the bridal shop my measurements said 8. (Most my clothes are 2s and 4s). I think I could have worn a 2 and just not worn such a padded bra. If I didn't wear a padded bra, the bust would have been loose. I am 5'3 so it was a touch below the knee but still looked great. Overall the appliqué detail was luxurious and nobody had my dress. Will be using RTR in the future 100%!!!

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous lace and dainty dress! So flattering!
links_Review_Text: The fabric cut into my under arms, but when I sized up, it was too small everywhere else. All in all, I would rent again. It's so pretty!

links_Review_Title: Didn't actually wear this one, but it's lovely
links_Review_Text: Nice fit, very classic silhouette and style. Great quality. I chose a more fun option, but this was a definite contender. I'm wearing a regular bra, no shaper, no shoes in these photos. It would look even better with the right undergarments and accessories.

links_Review_Title: Great for comfortable glamour as a wedding guest!
links_Review_Text: I wore my backup size because it fit me better. I usually wear a 14, but I think right now I'm a bit heavier than I normally am, so my guess is the fit is pretty true to size. The dress is very fancy and I got a lot of compliments all evening long. But it's also very comfortable, and I was able to dance all night long with no pulling, riding up, or discomfort. I had read you could go braless in this dress but I wanted to wear my bra (for the dancing!); it is a True&Co nude bra which was basically invisible through the embroidery. Also doesn't reveal your underwear lines. I'm all about comfort!

THIS WAS MY BACKUP DRESS SO I DIDNT USE IT BUT TRIED IT ON AND IT WAS BEAUTILFUL ALSO HAD FLOWERS THAT WERE 3D MUCH PRETTIER IN PERSON AND LOVS THE COLOR BLUE. FIT GREAT TRUE TO SIZE AND HID MY FLAWS WELL
Fabulous dress for my son's First Holy Communion! Received several compliments throughout the evening. Another successful rental from RTR!

Baggy in places but tight in bust and arms. The 10 was too small at my rib cage. Would prefer more of a knit undergarment for a better form fit. I managed to wear a bra under with clear straps that were hidden by the blue florets. Received several compliments. For dancing it was difficult to raise my arms over head but otherwise comfortable throughout evening.

This dress is gorgeous! I loved the colors and the appliqué type flowers. The lining is great and the lines of this dress were very flattering. I received so many compliments and felt so confident in this gorgeous dress for my husband's graduation.

I ended up with this dress when the one I rented wasn't able to ship. It was a definite upgrade! The detailing was delicate & beautiful. I felt gorgeous in it. My only complaint is that the underdress was a little tight & kept making the bottom of the dress twist in the back.

Worth the price and showed up in pristine condition! I wore this to a fancy rehearsal dinner and added a navy cardigan due to my nude bra showing in the back. The dress is gorgeous and compliments came all night. I'm short, so the dress was grazing around my knees. The 16 fit with lots of room to move around, but my guess is that I would have been comfortable in the 14 too. The lace work is stunning and for those complaining of it not laying flat, I had no issues. I can't help searching my calendar for another reason to rent this again. LOVED it!!!

This dress is even nicer in person. You can't tell from the photos but some of the navy embroidery is actually appliqué that are attached that makes the attention to detail on this dress even more spectacular. Great for dancing the night away- super comfortable! Highly recommend it. I wore without a bra- just nippies.

links_Review_Title: Love RTR!!! Service, quality of dresses, etc!!!
links_Review_Text: Loved the dress!
Rented this dress for a formal out of town conference formal dinner. I got a ton of compliments and it was super comfy!
Pretty tight. Not best for eating a big meal. Lots of compliments.

This dress was absolutely beautiful! Being a pale skin person nude dresses can look funny on me, this one did not! It matched my skin tone perfectly! I received multiple compliments on my dress throughout the night and felt fabulous in it. The only downside was the flowers needed pressing, especially the big one in the front center and the fabric under my armpits after a night of dancing rubbed me a little bit. Other than that, it was perfect.

links_Review_Title: Many compliments on the dress! I chose Navy heels instead of beige, because it was a March wedding.
links_Review_Text: The 6 was snug in the zipper area, so I sized up to the 8.

Fit was as I would expect. Wore shape-wear to smooth out the liner which is fitted. The lace is less fitted in the skirt. I felt great in it. I am a B cup and it fit me in the top perfectly. Throw on a nude shoe and gold earrings, done!

links_Review_Title: Classy dress to wear to a wedding.
links_Review_Text: I really liked how comfortable this dress was. I had to iron some of the blue flowers to flatten them out. I just got pictures back from my cousin's wedding and I don't like how form fitting the slip was and the sheer layer shows everything.
One of my favorite rentals ever. Good for curvier girls.

links_Review_Title: So unique! I received compliments all night!
links_Review_Text: It was a great dress! I ordered both a 0 and 2 (& they both fit well actually) but I ended wearing the 2 because the nude fabric underneath laid flat and didn't pull or wrinkle on the 2. This was my first dress to rent from RTR and can't wait to do it again! I'm super happy how it turned out.
I got tons of compliments on this dress! It runs true to size. I'm short so it looked much longer on me than on the model but still loved it! Comfortable to dance all night in.
The arms are SMALL and I barely made it so if you have a little larger arms, this won't work. I do YouTube so wore this and didn't move much. Beautiful to look at but hard to move arms.

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous detailing, but will overwhelm petites.
links_Review_Text: I got this in hopes of wearing to a wedding in Cabo, but alas, it overwhelmed my size. The waist falls far too low and looks frumpy, because of my petite size. Wanted this to work so badly! Be warned though either way, the sleeves were so tight on my arms and this was probably a size too big on me everywhere else. I tried tucking them in per other recommenders, which would have worked, had the rest of the fit not overwhelmed me. I would suggest sizing up. normally a 0, but 2 would've been best.

links_Review_Title: I am so sad to be sending this dress back!
links_Review_Text: The dress is a showstopper. I felt so glamorous in it. Wore it for a fancy anniversary dinner date with my husband while in the Cayman Islands. It was perfect for the occasion! The arm cuffs did restrict my range of motion a bit- but the beauty of the dress/how I felt in it far outweighed the inconvenience! I already loved RTR for work wear - and being able to rent a unique dress that made me feel like a wealthy socialite (when I am so NOT) elevated my experience with this service! 100!
Beautiful dress. Received compliments all night.

The details in this dress are amazing and it photographs like a dream! Had no issue with the shoulders being restrictive, as other reviewers have mentioned, but that may be because it seemed to run a little large. I wear either a 4 or 6 depending on the brand, but even on this 4 there was a little room to give in the mid section. No regrets either way - has to be one of my favorite rentals ever.

links_Review_Title: Excessive compliments. A work of art.
links_Review_Text: This dress is a work of art. I went to a wine event and the compliments flowed as much as the wine (even more as people loosened up) this is one of the most beautiful dresses I've ever worn. The fit was flawless.
Incredible dress! It was so comfortable and it fit great. A little itchy around the neck, but it didn't bother me. It had a really unique look that stood out!
Dress was gorgeous! Was tempted to buy. It is a little constricting in the arms.

So beautiful and unique I love love loved this dress! It was very well-made, looked expensive and felt great. There is this upper arm sleeve part that I didn't utilize and just tucked into the dress since it restricted my arm movement. Absolutely recommend for anyone looking for something different

This is such a gorgeous dress. It was a little tight on me in the chest area but I didn't want to go a size up because the waist was too loose in the 6. Also beware that if you're short like me, the bust area is pretty low which makes it difficult to wear a bra without it showing. I had to pin the dress to my bra to keep it from showing.

links_Review_Title: I went to a black tie wedding and wore this stunner! I got so many compliments on it.
links_Review_Text: The size 4 fit me perfectly BUT I couldn't fit my arms through the holes fully. I ended up wearing the 6 in order to have the sleeves out which resulted in the dress being a little big in the waist. Other than that, I love this dress. The arms are the only reason why I'm taking a star away.

I loved this dress, got compliment after compliment throughout the evening. Fit true to size; the arms were a little snug but it didn't prevent me from dancing or being comfortable. Would definitely rent this again!

links_Review_Title: Complete strangers approached me just to compliment the dress!
links_Review_Text: The dress is heavier than most with all of the embroidery. There was some stretch to the fabric and it felt comfortably snug. The lace did chafe my arms a bit but nothing that needed much treatment. I felt like a million dollars in this dress. The colors are vibrant and the pattern is unlike any other.

links_Review_Title: Compliments all night long and into the next week; garden beauty!
links_Review_Text: I have been trying to rent this dress since it first appeared on the site and I'm so glad to have finally had it available as an Unlimited customer! I wore this to a wedding in the fall, along with a dark green fur coat (also a rental), and it was divine! The colors were perfect for spring or fall, and the length was great to fit with cocktail or something a little more formal. I have been between a 2 and 4, closer to a 2, and the 2 was perfect. There is no give or stretch at all, beware
Son's wedding. The compliments about my beauty in the dress, and the compliments about my speech. Great night
So many compliments!!
The lace sleeves required me to go up a size, but the dress fit comfortably. I received complements from so many attendees on this dress. Easy to sit in and dance in.

links_Review_Title: This dress was truly stunning! True work of art! Tons of compliments all night!
links_Review_Text: Dress was very comfortable, easy to move in and dance! Arms are a little snug, but makes for a beautiful silhouette all around! #marchesanotte #redfloraldress #blacktiedress #blacktiewedding #gorgeousdress #lacedress

I loved this dress! I couldn't really lift my arms that much but I didn't care. There's not much give in the dress. I ordered the 6R and 4R and went with the 4R. I loved it, would highly recommend and will surely be renting from RTR again!

Wore this to a black tie optional wedding and it was perfect! I'm 5'4 and wore 3" heels and it hit me right at my ankles. The arm holes were too tight and I had to tuck them in, but it wasn't noticeable. Would definitely rent this or any other marchesa gown again!

links_Review_Title: I felt like the belle of the ball- this isn't a dress, it's a work of art!!
links_Review_Text: I wore this to a Hollywood red carpet event and could not have loved it more. The detail and quality are absolutely exquisite- it really is a work of art. I almost shed a tear putting it back in the bag today. It is so beautiful and I got so many compliments, from colleagues and strangers alike. Such a special dress- if you want to make a statement, wear this!

First time using RTR and I listened to the reviews and got this dress and am so happy I did! Fit perfectly, gorgeous detail, great quality. I agree with the other reviews that the sleeves are a little tight and difficult to dance in and the neck is a little itchy but I'd still choose this dress. Soo worth it.

I was so nervous this dress would be too tight but it fit perfectly. I ordered an 8 (my usual size) and a 10. The 8 fit perfectly. I could even eat at the wedding. The sleeves are very fitting and don't have a lot of give. I received so many compliments it became a little embarrassing! This was my first experience with RTR and I am definitely a believer!!!

links_Review_Title: Plenty of compliments. A lovely pattern in a sea of navy and black.
links_Review_Text: I loved this dress! I don't typically rent the same dress twice but I absolutely loved how this made me feel and would give it another go. The only noticeable negative was that my arms wouldn't comfortably go straight above my head but it's not even worth losing a star. The best Marchesa Notte dress I've rented thus far (it was my 4th)! If you're even a little tempted, get it!

Truly one of the prettiest dresses I have worn! At first it felt restrictive because of the sleeves but it loosened up and I was able to dance. Only problem was the material was very rough on my neckline. Worth it!!

This is a beautiful dress. Absolutely stunning. If you’re on the fence, rent it. I’ve rented it twice. The size 8 wasn’t exactly comfortable, but it zipped with no problem and fit like a glove. The 10 (which wasn’t available) probably would’ve looked just as good and been a bit more comfortable for sitting and dancing. Overall, no regrets. I’d rent it again.

I've never received so many compliments on a dress!!! This dress fit me like a glove. Like others have said: the sleeves have NO GIVE and were snug on my pretty small arms. I wish I would have read the tips about tucking them in- I would have been much more comfortable. Besides that, it's a really fun dress and fit the theme of this eclectic wedding so well.

links_Review_Title: True to size except for the arms! Worth it because the dress is stunning and a work of art.
links_Review_Text: The dress is absolutely stunning and extremely well made.. The only thing is the arms could have used some extra wiggle room.. the size 6 arms fit better but the body of the size 4 was much more flattering so I went with my normal size of 4. It may be one of the most beautiful dresses I've ever worn and so in that respect I still give it top stars even though the arms will give you a complex. Also love that you can wear a normal bra with this dress. Photographs well. Love love love

links_Review_Title: Dress was absolutely stunning, even better than I imagined!
links_Review_Text: While the dress is beautiful, the material is very unforgiving because it is very thick/heavy and does not have much give. While I was able to squeeze in and it wasn't too uncomfortable, I definitely could have worn a size bigger. The neckline was also pretty itchy, but overall the dress was very flattering and I loved it.

links_Review_Title: It fit like it was made for me!
links_Review_Text: This. Dress. Is. Everything. - I got so many compliments throughout the night, and have still continued to get them since the event! I ordered a 4 and a 6, and while they both fit me in the body, the arms on the 4 were a bit tight. Ultimately wore the 6 and it fit me as if it were made for me. The detailing and the colors are just gorgeous. Danced the night away, and felt like a million bucks. Will 100% be renting this beauty again in the future.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress and lots of compliments
links_Review_Text: Loved the look of this dress! Lots of compliments. The material is heavy and no stretch, but really not a problem. The arms are tight like others have said. By 3ish hours I wanted to take it off just because of the arms. I tried putting a little chafing cream before and maybe it helped a bit. I also tried it on with the arms tucked in like others suggested and this is definitely an option. I just liked it better with the arms. I'm 5'4 and about 155lbs and both the 8 and 10 fit well. I went with the 8 because it fit my chest better, but the 10 was more comfortable through the hips and arms. Since the 8 was tighter in the hips, I did notice the pink layer would ride up a bit as I walked and sat down. It wasn't so much that it was a problem though. I wore a nude bra underneath that you could see if you looked really closely at the sheer part, but I don't think anyone could notice. The rest of the dress is not see through so you don't need to worry about what to wear underneath. Black shoes and accessories for well as there is black in the dress. Nude would work too. I would highly recommend the dress for the style and look. It was worth the slight discomfort in the arms.

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous dress & fit like a glove
links_Review_Text: This was my first RTR experience & this dress was a massive hit. It fit my hourglass body perfectly. I hated the arm cuffs, they were so uncomfortable but I tucked them in as other reviews said to & the dress was perfect. I got so many compliments. I was a little nervous about being hot because this dress is heavy & it was an outdoor summer wedding but I danced all night in it & was extremely comfortable.

The fit is body skimming without being restricting and it was forgiving on my hips and booty. The embroidery detail is define and impossible to capture in photos. The arms are a bit snug if you plan on spending the evening dancing.

links_Review_Title: This dress is magical! Compliments from people of all ages all night - definitely best dressed!!
links_Review_Text: I highly recommend this dress if you want to make a statement for a formal event or an evening wedding. It really could work for any season because of the color palette and floral design elements. I thoroughly read other reviews and was a little nervous about fit, but the dressed worked perfectly. My primary size wasn't available (0) and I took a chance just ordering my back up (2), which was the perfect choice because this dress has very little give in the waist and hips. I have a very small frame and am petite through my chest and rib cage but am a little curvier in my waist and butt, not narrow like up top, and this dress is very form-fitting so if you are curvier be aware that there is no give in the fabric when considering your sizes! As for the arms, a lot of people have noted that they are tight and I agree -- the area between the arm band and shoulder is short but I wasn't uncomfortable - just know that the fabric of this dress is thick, intricate, and pretty structured - this isn't a flowy gown. Also, I'm 5'4 and wore 3 inch heels and the length was great - not tea length on me, it hit just above my ankles so worked well for a formal event. I absolutely loved this dress and received compliments from tons of people at my event and when I went out after (I never wanted the night to end!) Highly, highly recommend!

links_Review_Title: This dress is drop dead gorgeous!
links_Review_Text: The overall fit is super comfortable however one thing to note is that the lace has zero stretch and fit my arms very snug versus the rest of the dress.

Fit was perfect. I'm petite so it obviously is longer on me than it should've been but it was still perfect. Super comfortable with an inner lining and I received so many compliments. Obsessed, and never wanted to take it off.

links_Review_Title: This dress is absolutely gorgeous, I got compliments all night!
links_Review_Text: It's among the most beautiful garments I've ever worn (up there with other Marchesa dresses I've rented) and is really well made. I agree with all the comments that the arm bands are very tight (I actually had bruising on my arms afterwards!), but the fit seemed very true-to-size otherwise.
Absolutely loved the dress! I will agree with the other reviews in that the arm sleeves are very tight so as others did I tucked them in! Overall, very comfortable.

links_Review_Title: This dress makes you feel like a goddess!
links_Review_Text: Sooo many compliments!! This ran a little large on me, but I still felt beautiful! If you’ve been contemplating, don’t be! GET THIS DRESS!!

I rented this dress for my anniversary weekend. We stayed in a fancy hotel in Houston and had dinner/drinks. My anniversary is in March right before it gets warm here in Houston, so this dress was perfect for the cold night time weather while still being a floral pattern for spring. The dress is a wrap fit and ties high up on the waist which is flattering if you have some curves under there like me. I do have a tiny rib cage (32D), and wear small tops, etc. The small size wouldn't wrap around, so keep that in mind. I ended up wearing the Medium. The dress has a high low cut at the bottom so your shoes will show. I wore this with some strappy black chunky heels.

This dress is gorgeous. I wore it to a winter wedding in Denver that turned out to be an unseasonably warm day. It is feminine and a little bad ass all at the same time. I had lots of compliments. Like others have said it's super long for short girls but I wore 4" heels and it wasn't that big of a deal, just be cautious on a crowded dance floor. One other fit issue is that if you have broad shoulders it may be a bit boobie. I loved wearing this dress and would absolutely rent it again.
It fits perfect! It's comfortable and elegant. I don't have much of a chest and if I did, I would need tape or a shirt under. Either way, it's a perfect dress for an event or just everyday.
I LOVED this dress! Fit perfectly, was comfortable, and got so many compliments. Even got text compliments from people who saw photos on Facebook. :)

links_Review_Title: Wore this for a winter wedding in Texas. It was perfect! I felt comfortable and sexy.
links_Review_Text: Wrap allows wiggle room for sizing. Sheer fabric until liner hits mid leg. I had to wear a black camisole underneath to feel comfortable. This dress was perfect for my larger breast size; I'm a 38DDD

I am large busted I had to use fashion tape to keep dress in place for me I did not want to show too much cleavage . Very comfortable and for a winter wedding in snow it was perfect. High heels are a must or the dress dragged on the ground. ( I am 5’6).
This dress was so perfect! Easy to dress up or down for an event

Rented this for my birthday dinner- it was beautiful. Runs true to size. Very comfortable. The richness in the colors is amazing. Fancy without being too formal. The lining stops above well above the knee and it shows off the girls to make it sexy!

I wore this dress at the wedding of two dear friends - it was also my first night out as a new Mom! This wrap dress was perfect to nurse my baby in and pump while I was at the reception. I received a ton of complements and it made me feel normal again just eight weeks after giving birth!
This dress is definitely a showstopper but not in an obnoxious or obvious way. The burnout detail is so subtle but yet sexy. The wrap is flattering. Fit really well and would definitely rent again.

links_Review_Title: perfect dress for winter black tie wedding
links_Review_Text: LOVED everything about this dress. Perfect for chilly November black tie wedding. Especially loved the deep purple and red velvet flower details and flattering silhouette (wrap dress - able to show as much or as little cleavage as I wanted to). fun to dance in - twirls well! Received many compliments. I'm 5'7" and the dress length was ideal with a tall pair of heels.
This dress was just gorgeous. It was just one of those dresses that everyone complimented. As a wrap dress the fit was pretty forgiving and very flattering. The burnouts made it a little sexy.

This dress was absolutely beautiful. Very flattering fit and the fabric was amazing. I used fashion tape for the front v area, because it was too low to wear a bra, but too loose to just let the fabric be. No issues once I put on the tape, but definitely something to keep in mind (I have a small bust, so going braless is no problem for me - perhaps wouldn't be great for a larger chested gal). Overall I loved it and would definitely rent again!

links_Review_Title: Fit well and lots of compliments!
links_Review_Text: Adjustable tie dress.
The dress was beautiful! The bust was a little revealing but if you have bandeau, slip or something to pin it, it's perfect!

This dress flowed beautifully, and the sheen was both fun and elegant. I'm petite (5'3"), so the hem of the dress brushed the floor, but didn't drag in a way that would've been a problem. I wore it with a block heel, and was comfortable all night long.

I loved everything about this dress. The flowy sleeves and wrap style kept it from being restricting. I ordered the large, but it didn't close enough in the bust for my taste, it was too revealing. So I ended up wearing the XL, which worked perfectly. I got a lot of compliments.

links_Review_Title: This dress wears very nicely and looks more expensive in reality than online.
links_Review_Text: I'm 5'4 and typically wear US 4P, but this dress in SR felt a bit tight. As it's a kimono type, it still fit, but the cleavage got too low. However I bough a plain black bandeau that blended well with the dress and solved the issue.

Because this is a wrap dress, I ended up needing the larger size so that I wouldn't have to worry about my bra showing throughout the night. As a result, the rest of the dress was a little bit big. Pros: comfort, elegant, don't need shapewear or nylons under, love the kimono-style sleeves Cons: it was a tiny bit like a bathrobe, especially because I had to wear the larger size.
The flowy sleeves make for comfortable dancing and the tie wrap style it easy to wear. Can look a little large.

Great fit, fabric and style. The sizes are pretty accurate, however I felt more comfortable pinning the cleavage to prevent any unnecessary gaps. I'm 5'5 and wore platform shoes, making the length easier to manage. Would definitely rent again!

links_Review_Title: I wore this for a black tie, Orthodox wedding.
links_Review_Text: Incredibly forgiving and comfortable! It runs true to size and I didn't even have to worry about it dragging on the ground wearing 3" heels (I'm 5'2"). I was so stressed about whether this would fit and I didn't need to be.
Such a lovely dress! I'm going to wear it everywhere just because it's so beautiful. Gas station, supermarket,ballet, concert

This was a great dress. The colors were rich and it was very comfortable. The back of the dress was quite long and made it difficult to walk on hills and stairs without stepping on it. If I didn't need to carry my toddler around the venue, I would have worn it.
Wore with low-heeled boots and was a little long, but still, totally worth it. LOVE this dress, would definitely order it again.

Overall a nice dress for the fall wedding we attended. It is a true wrap dress, which meant I was a little self conscious that it kind of looked like a kimono style robe but I got lots of compliments so it didn't seem to bother anyone else! You'll definitely need to steam it before wearing.
Extremely comfortable and really beautiful dress. I really loved it except it didn't fit over my chest at ALL and I had to wear something underneath.

I rented this in my usual small regular and got the only backup size available, extra small. Unfortunately, I could barely tie the wrap because the bust area was so tight. I ended up not wearing it, fortunately RTR was amazing and sent free replacements. I would love to try this again in a size (or maybe two?) up, because the fabric, pattern, and shape of the dress were absolutely beautiful!

GORGEOUS dress that fits like a dream-- the fabric is luxurious, the pattern is stunning and the cut is classic with a few unique elements. I was stopped in mid-conversation a number of times by strangers to compliment this dress!!

links_Review_Title: Perfect dress for this formal occasion
links_Review_Text: This dress fit great. It was not too low-cut and it did not accentuate my middle, which happens to be a problem area for me. It was perfect for the black-tie affair that I attended.

The dress is beautiful but runs very large. I usually wear a medium (size 6/8), but ordered a small and medium because the dress is loose fitting. I tried on the small first and the top was way too big and did not fall nicely at all. Unfortunately, I was not able to use this dress for the occasion I rented it for.
Great fall dress. Got a lot of compliments.

This is a fun fall dress for any occasion wear you want to feel flirty and feminine. You can easily dress it up or down with accessories. Be warned the top is low cut and it was hard for me to keep the girls contained (no complaints from hubby...)
So cute, a little big and a little long, should have opted for a petite (if there is that option) overall loved it!
Couldn't get it to cover my bust. Even a camisole wouldn't have made it decent. A really huge disappointment, since the dress itself is GORGEOUS - lovely, flowy fabric with a bit of a sheen.
This dress is so comfortable and true to size! It is a perfect wrap dress! The high-low cut on the bottom is super sexy. I received so many compliments all night!

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous dress, but unable to wear
links_Review_Text: The dress is lovely - the combination of moody velvet and sheer paneling made me incredibly eager to wear it. However, if you're between sizes (especially with RTR's range of designers) or have broader shoulders, bust, or rib cage, you will need to go with your larger size. I am 5'7.5", a 36B 1/2 with ThirdLove or 36C with VS, and typically a 12-14 in dresses or 31 in denim. While the waist and hips were fine, the bust was too small and the shoulders sat a little too high. If the XL were available, I would have rented in a heartbeat to replace.
Fit like a loose fitting size 2. Was great that it wasn't tight for a style change. It does have an open back though so I wore a bandeau.

This might be one of my favorites that I have rented thus far. I Particularly loved the open back detailing. The sleeves were a little large but it just added more flare. I think I might purchase this one for my self.
I loved this dress! I wore it to my friends bridal party and she tried to convince me to keep it. It was very comfortable and kept me a little warmer since it had sleeves. Boho chic for sure

Absolutely love the dress. The material is great; the length is perfect. I wore it with high boots because it was cold out, but the dress also looked great with heels. Loved the back as much as the front. I'm planning to keep this dress for a little while.
The dress was loose fitting enough, that it wasn't u comfortable but had a cinched waist so didn't feel like you were wearing a bag. It's definitely short but if work with tights it's totally fine.
Fits as expected, it could be short if you're taller, but it was fine on me. Overall super cute and loved it!

The dress was so comfortable. It was the perfect length and so easy to dress up or down. Originally wore it to a quinceañera which had me receiving several compliments. Then wore it to a friend's birthday and Thanksgiving dinner. All occasions the dress was a complete success

links_Review_Title: Date night to dinner party this dress is Falltastic!
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress. Easy to wear and very versatile - wore for date, to church, and for hosting Thanksgiving. Would rent again!

links_Review_Title: Odd fit, open back a challenge
links_Review_Text: Cute colors, fabric and sleeves, but this dress ended up being a fail. Husband thought it looked so weird in the back he kept asking if I really planned to wear it. Had rented for Thanksgiving with no other options, so I kept my sweater on to hide the back, but it wasn't a favorite.

links_Review_Title: Very cute but right in the chest!
links_Review_Text: The dress was very cute but had this awkward bunching at the chest that would cause a crease. It was loose elsewhere so it didn't really make sense. Other than that it was very cute and comfy and perfect for a night out!

Such a cute and comfortable dress. Elastic waist was great and tie at the neck helped adjust the openness of the back. I wore this to work and out after no problem. Definitely on the short side but worked fine for my height. The waist is a little lower and the top billowed out more than I liked but overall a really fun rental. Definitely recommend for everyday or a themed party outfit.

links_Review_Title: A little short but not as bad as I thought
links_Review_Text: Added a belt to keep the dress secured and added a pair of shorts underneath! Super fun layered bottom and gorgeous pattern that can work any time of year

links_Review_Title: Loved the fit and worked for warm or cold weather
links_Review_Text: Loved how this fit and was really fun to wear. I live in Alabama and rented for an unpredictable weather weekend in Boston. I wore with boots but could have worn at home with spring / summer shoes and no tights. Someone asked me if I was from California, it def has a bohemian feel which I liked as well. Fits true to size I'm 5'7" and thought the length was perfect if anything maybe a little short in the back if i had not had on tights
It was appropriate for a day at work into a work function. Received tons of compliments and it was very flattering.

Love the colors and pattern. Perfect mix of comfy (elastic waist and long sleeves) combined with sexy (open back). Wore out on a Friday night for a friends birthday party. Would be cute for fall with flats but also works with tights and boots!

links_Review_Title: Cute date night dress for fall
links_Review_Text: This is the perfect date night dress but only for someone under 5'3"-- it's very short. The back is sexy and the look definitely requires sticky bra/nude underwear. I wore this in the winter and it's very thin so not warm enough but would have been perfect for fall.

This is the 2nd time renting this dress and just love it. Wore it with high heels before and now with tights and boots. Got several compliments and should probably buy it to have it ready in my closet. It's a keeper.

links_Review_Title: So many compliments on this perfect early autumn dress!
links_Review_Text: I loved this dress! Be aware that it is a bit short. I styled it with a belt, and wore a tank underneath, because the back is open and I didn't want to show a bra. I got several compliments, and this is one I would re-rent!

links_Review_Title: Adorable boho print but too short - even at 5'3''
links_Review_Text: This was an adorable dress for brunch with the girls. It was a chilly, windy day, so I draped a jean jacket over my shoulders so it wouldn't take away from the bell sleeve. I think it'd be better with tights or something. It was just long enough when I was standing still, but when I was walking home I had to hold it down so it wouldn't fly up. Might be better with tights.

links_Review_Title: Great dress for an outdoor art fair!
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress! It was perfect for the plaza art fair (outdoors). I wore a plum tank under but didn't need it other than a bra would have shown in back. I wore with leggings. I think it would look short without opaque tights or leggings. Wore with flats during the day and boots in the evening. So many compliments and the material was soft and flowy.
Elastic waistband makes this super comfortable. Pattern is very pretty and the fabric is decent quality. Back is exposed so may need a sweater. Highly recommend
True to size fit. Dress was just ok though.

links_Review_Title: Cute and unique. Not something I would typically wear but was so fun. I maximized the 70s vibes
links_Review_Text: The skirt was the perfect length with a high neckline. Still flirty and fun plus the open back detail was nice but not over revealing
This dress is backless for my busty friends! I didn't realize that and had to reconsider my bra choice. Other than that, it is super cute.

links_Review_Title: This is a nice dress. Its backless though and runs a bit too short.
links_Review_Text: This dress is really nice and the quality was great, however, it runs a bit too short.
It runs pretty true to size and is also bit shorter then I thought it would be. The fabric is nice and breezy and can go with casual or dress up shoes.
Did t end up wearing this because it was too short. Everytime i raised my arms my bottom was revealed
its perfect
Fit great. Its a bit short with heals but i wore a long sweater over it...and was able to still play pool. Fun outfit..

links_Review_Title: Wish I could have worn this!
links_Review_Text: So stinking cute! But it was just too tight at my hips and ultra short. Next time I'll try the L.
Super cute and a good length. The open back was really cute - but a little tight across the chest and I don't have a large bust...

links_Review_Title: Great for the fall while it's still warm!
links_Review_Text: Was pretty short but super comfortable. Light enough weight to wear while it's still hot. I loved the high neck- very 70's vibes.

links_Review_Title: Loved it for a date night
links_Review_Text: I usually wear a large but was recommended the XL and it was too large I would rent the large again. Felt flirty
So cute, fit so well. Looked great with regular jeans and black jeans.
I'm 5'5, 150lbs & 36C. I rented a medium it fit perfect. Rented it for a vacation. It fit great

It fit me perfectly and I didn't feel like it was sliding down at all. It was a little itchy but it didn't bother me. The fringe part at the bottom added some flare and it looked great with high waisted jeans. Will probably rent again!
Fabric was rough against the skin. Not comfortable
Perfect vacation basic top! Love it with long skirts, shorts, or jeans!
Unfortunately this too was just too itchy to rock. Nothing is worse than feeling uncomfortable - especially in a tube top.
Doesn't really flatter your body.
was uncomfortable to wear.
This top looks great on, and was perfect for a day party because I was only wearing it for a few hours. Any longer than that and I would have had to take it off its so itchy.

links_Review_Title: Cute top, fun for a night out
links_Review_Text: Like others said it's a little itchy. Probably could of sized down to a large easily-it's stretchy. Very cute top overall!

Cute top but runs a little large! Could've made it work since it is stretchy, but material is itchy and not comfortable. Also hits in a weird spot so it wasn't flattering for my hourglass figure. Cute idea for taller girls.
