links_Review_Title: Cute top but weird itchy material
links_Review_Text: It was a great top but horrible fabric itchy
This top is adorable for date night, it's unfortunate that I couldn't wait to go home and take it off because it's so itchy!!

links_Review_Title: I like it! It is a bit itchy though. It's not the most comfortable.
links_Review_Text: Pro: -Cute -body hugging Cons: -Falls down easily
I wore this for only a day because it was sooo itchy all over. Material is not comfortable
This dress is pretty versatile. It looks great by itself with some strapped heels, but also fits in with some over the knee boots and a blazer. The material is super thick, but slightly stretchy.
The dress was really flattering, but it was just a little too short.

links_Review_Title: super sexy LBD if you aren't afraid of wearing SHORT
links_Review_Text: great fit, great ruching and details - i love the lace asymetric hemline. Typical for Likely, the dress runs quite small. I'm normally a tight 4/ slightly too relaxed in size 6 in most clothes. I rented this in 6 bc 8 was unavailable, and 6 was way too tight on me - 8 would have been perfect. Still wore it out, but I looked like a ho.
Nicely fitted dress and very sexy but not over sexy.
Sexy and classy! would rent agai.

links_Review_Title: Loved this dress. Very comfortable and the silk material feels weightless.

links_Review_Text: Rented this dress for an afternoon wedding. The fit was great and the color and cut of the drape are perfect. Would definitely rent again and may consider purchasing as it could be used for many different occasions!

Loved this dress. Wore it for an anniversary dinner with tights and boots. The top has a lot of material but I'm a 36C and it worked with a strapless bra. Length was great for tall girls- I'm 5'10. Will definitely rent again

Loved this dress wore It to a work holiday party and for numerous compliments - could easily be dressed up or down wirh shoes & jewelry. The material is thin but good quality. I got both a medium & large and the large was very large but the medium fit nice.

This dress in comfy and flattering and I got so many compliments. I will either hold on to it for a while I'll it wear it to another event or two, or be buying it I love it so much. Was lovey for a holiday party with the hubby. (Hubby gets 5 stars too). :)

links_Review_Title: Comfortable , great color, can wear halter strap bra!!!
links_Review_Text: This seemed to run a little big. Lots of room for us larger busted people though! Loved the color , pretty comfortable, a little "forgiving" ,fabric thinner than I had hoped but that also allows it to drape nicely. Was able to wear a halter strap bra with this with my hair down you could not see it at the neck. Received lots of compliments on this dress.
Really pretty material and color. The hook and eye behind the neck kept coming undone and it was a bit short. True to size
Great fit. I felt beautiful in this dress. Super comfortable. Received a ton of compliments in this dress. My husband loved it and he's hard to please.

I thought this was a romper when I ordered but was pleasantly surprised when it was a dress. The satin is comfy and beautiful, not too shiny. I wore it to a fall casual rehearsal dinner and it can be dressed up or down. Not the most form flattering since it's loose but I still liked it a lot

I love this dress so much. It was comfortable and flattering for all day wear. I was worried that it would be too low cut for a regular bra, but my strapless bra worked perfectly and the draping allowed for a nice neckline without too much cleavage. My only concern for tall girls is that it might be too short. I'm 5'9 and wouldn't have felt comfortable in the dress if I hadn't been wearing tights. I loved this outfit so much and got so many compliments on it all day!

This dress is awesome. The color and material is great for fall. I wish the draping on top was a little tighter but still nice. I first ordered a medium but it was too big so I waited for a small. I ended up wearing a lariat to add some interest around deep V and it looked great but I didn't get a photo:( the only issue I had with the dress was it arrived totally wrinkled and I had to steam it a few times.

links_Review_Title: Great color, short and super comfortable!
links_Review_Text: Wore this in Vegas- super short on me but I'm 5'10. So comfortable and different because it wasn't skin tight but was still sexy! Loved the color also!
Great fit, cute style, great for a night out!

links_Review_Title: Didn't quite work out because it's a bit short for my taste but excellent quality.
links_Review_Text: Didn't quite work out because it's a bit short for my taste but excellent quality.
It's perfect. I'd buy it if it was $100.
Stunning look and feel. Neck closure not reliable... nearly lost the dress a few times. Definitely gorgeous... but risky!
Sits slightly high on waist even for a short person.
Rehearsal dinner dress for my sister's wedding and I love it! I paired it with a nice black leather jacket and was feeling all the vibes!

links_Review_Title: Great dress, runs large, beautiful color
links_Review_Text: Rented this dress for a photo shoot for work- it was a beautiful color, gorgeous material, nice neckline- however, the stomach area and back were WAY too big, so all of my pics in this dress were taken sitting down ...

links_Review_Title: Dress is super comfortable and forgiving in the waist! lovely fabric.
links_Review_Text: The dress fit well! I have a nearly flat chest and used tape at the base of the v to avoid revealing anything. Otherwise the dress was just very comfortable, sexy without being too revealing and fun to wear!
You have to rent this dress. Shows just enough to make it date night ready.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress that go lots of compliments
links_Review_Text: This dress was so elegant for a late summer wedding, I received so many compliments. The material is lovely and falls really nicely, with a plunging neckline to make sure it still a little sexy. I wore it with a regular bra and taped it to prevent it slipping at the front, which was perfect. I'm 5'6" and wore it with 3 inch heels and the length was just right. Is definitely rent this one again.

Loved this dress. It was light and breezy but heavy enough for California winter at the beach. My only dislike was the wrap situation. I had to tie it SO tight to keep the weird hole from opening and I ended up having to tuck it under my bra to keep the gap closed.

links_Review_Title: Wore this dress for a very important wedding and got rave reviews!
links_Review_Text: This dress was incredibly flattering on my fuller figure (I wear a street size 16 and I'm 5'4" without heels) and the wrap portion was adjustable to reveal just the right amount of neckline and didn't require all night adjustments (just a few after some rigorous dancing). The skirt is NOT A WRAP!! Thank GOD. It's a long, flowy skirt so no worries about flashing anyone on the dance floor. Super comfortable too and it traveled beautifully, didn't even need a steam touch up. The sleeves were perfect as this was a beach wedding and it was slightly cool. Loved everything about this dress!

The dress is super comfortable and flattering, and photographs nicely. My only complaint is that it gaps a little in the mid section if you're not careful. I wore it way more than I expected and will definitely rent again.

links_Review_Title: So nice i rented it twice!
links_Review_Text: Love this dress! Currently in a space where I'm uncomfortable dressing up and this dress made me feel so pretty and comfortable! Flows in all the right places! It's a wrap dress so a few times i had to adjust the wrap so i didn't lose a boob, but very manageable nonetheless! Would recommend this to anyone! It's a good thing i can't afford to purchase it or I'd be an endless outfit repeater!

Everything about this dress is wonderful, but the bust/wrap top was a little tricky and took me a few attempts to manage the big gap on the right side/sleeve. Still would definitely rent again, what a gorgeous summer dress!

This dress is wonderful! I wore this to a resort casual work event, and it could easily span from casual to cocktail. I'm 5'4 and was able to wear this with flats, which is also a huge plus! The wrap is a faux wrap so no falling apart midway through the night. The fabric is silky and stunning. It looks expensive and was forgiving, as well as cool and comfortable in Florida heat. I wish I could buy this...I may just have to rent again!

I rented this for some family photos and ended up wearing a different dress. The print is fun and the dress is very comfortable, but the ties were a bit confusing and showed a peak of skin when it shouldn't have. Wrap dresses are always a bit difficult with a full bust, and this was no exception. Probably would have needed to pin it or would have been constantly pulling at the front.
Loved the wrap top, without the "risk" of a full wrap on a breezy day.

If I could buy this dress, I 100% would. I got a bit confused with the ties that wrap around - but eventually got it. The material is beautiful, super light silk that flows nicely on the body. This dress is top notch - highly recommend it to anyone considering it!
Light as air, moves beautifully, really comfortable. The sizing is very flexible. I could have easily worn the Small or Medium, but preferred the Medium for better coverage on top.
Wore it to a gala and it was perfect!

Just logged back on to RTR after a long hiatus and it asked me to review my most recent order - I really wish I could but I never received it! I rented several dresses for my anniversary dinner to make it really special and sadly wound up wearing an old standby. That was the second time in a year my order didn't make it, the other was a friend's wedding where I was being asked to give a reading and wanted to look extra special. RTR - you should maybe fix this flaw in your site, it's kind of a sour reminder to someone whose grudge against you was softening. Logging back out now, I'm not ready to be let down again.
So soft and comfy, very adjustable on the top. Amazing colors and print. Just gorg
love this

links_Review_Title: I felt very pretty and fashionable in my dress!
links_Review_Text: Diane von Furstenberg basically invented the V-neck dress. This one is beautiful with a design that includes a fluid, full skirt. Only the top has a wrap around design so you don't have to worry about the skirt flying open. Fabric is delicious and the navy & white print is timeless.
Amazing dress that has so many uses!! Can be worn everyday, to work, date night, etc. LOVE LOVE LOVE!!!
I loved this dress. So comfortable. Very nice material will rent again in the future
This dress got lots of compliments. I was very comfortable and felt appropriately dressed for both a formal wine dinner and a ladies bridal luncheon.
Gorgeous pattern, flattering cut. I could NOT figure out how to tie this without skin showing on my side (I safety pinned it), if someone knows, help a sister out!
Perfect DVF dress! A MUST rent!
Beautiful

links_Review_Title: Very long for me but great for the heat.
links_Review_Text: Pretty much hits the floor at my height but it is wonderful when it is super hot outside. Very light and flowy.
Literally got complements everywhere I went, every time I wore this. If it didn't cost $350 (discounted) I'd buy it.

links_Review_Title: This is a great wrap dress, silk is cool, soft and so comfy.
links_Review_Text: The fit was perfect, not a completely true wrap, so don't have to worry about "popping open". It is very comfortable and was perfect for my brother's wedding welcome party in southern California.
It's a beautiful dress (very light and comfy). Runs big. However the wrap part is awkward and showed skin on my side where it shouldn't.

Beautiful fabric but waaaaaaaaaaay too much of it, especially in upper torso, unless perhaps for fuller figures. The size S looked like an adult XXXXL bathrobe on me (so ridiculous that my normally very supportive husband burst out laughing!). I'm 5'8" and wide shouldered, slender, small busted, normally an 8 or a 6, but the wide sleeves connect directly to the waist leaving tons of fabric billowing around the rib cage - the "wrap" look is kind of lost. Dress tape was pointless; there was just no place to put all of that material!

links_Review_Title: Pure silk, very easy-breezy, perfect for summer.
links_Review_Text: I received this dress very, very wrinkled... had to steam-press it myself. It was easy to wear.

links_Review_Title: Love the fabric and fit. Great for work or play
links_Review_Text: More generously cut than most DVF dresses. Love the fabric. Fit great across large bust

links_Review_Title: Easy, breezy, and chic maxi dress.
links_Review_Text: Faux wrap dress in silk with adjustable, waist defining tie. Gorgeous rich navy and white print makes this work for an outdoor wedding, or a fun night out. I'm pregnant and found the style flattering (sleeves, generous bust, and adjustable tie waist, able to wear a full bra). I think my non-pregnant self would have needed tape or a pin at the bust, runs a tad large there. Potentially size down if you are smaller in the bust with a small waist, or if you are short. I am 5'8" and was able to wear a flat shoe with 1/2" heal, no problem. Renters under 5'6" will probably need a heel.

This dress was the perfect amount of fitted and flowy. Great adjustable wrap for tighter or looser fit and more or less coverage in chest. It grazed my feet at 5'4 but I could wear with sandals and not drag.

links_Review_Title: Great dress for afternoon wedding and evening reception!
links_Review_Text: Great fit and fabric; this is not a true wrap dress, but does have a wrap top (you have to pull it on over your head, and then tie). It was floor length on me (5'5") and worked well with heeled sandals, but could also have worked with flat sandals.

links_Review_Title: Dress is sort of sloppy and very long.
links_Review_Text: Dress is very long

links_Review_Title: Cute crop with lots of character
links_Review_Text: I wore this for my Bachelorette party in Vegas on a night we themed "Girls Wild Night Out." The animal print is subtle. It was adorable paired with the high waisted leggings. Just the right amount of skin to still feel sexy but covered up. The shoulder pads gave the sleeves some character and made it feel more girly. One of my favorite rentals and one I'd definitely rent again.

This is a true crop top so just expect that. The material is gorgeous, thin, and very comfortable. I LOVE the puffy shoulders and it adds such a fun element! I got so many compliments on this and would definitely rent it again!

So cute! The puffed sleeves are so fun. I tied it on the opposite side like another reviewer and I agree, much cuter :) I wore this with black jeans on a date and again with a black skirt and knee high boots to work. Would rent again
I rented this to wear with very high waisted, wide leg, black dress pants. Think it's cute and a fun/funky mix up to the norm. I knew it was cropped. But it's quite short. Still liked it.

This top is awesome. Make sure to wear with either a high waisted pair of pants/jeans or a high waisted skirt if you don't want too much skin showing. Went perfect with show me your mumu Berkeley bells.
Tried tying it on the opposite side and it looks much cuter this way and more flattering

This top is really cool, the asymmetric shape and shoulder pad puffs made it very unique. The sash gives it movement, so it was fun at a party. It's a little short though, so if you don't want to flash some stomach, perhaps pair it with some high waist pants
Even with high waisted pants this shirt shows your mid drift. But it is a very nice top.
The top fit as expected. Cut was flattering. Wore with higher waisted pants so didn't have my whole midriff showing all night.

links_Review_Title: Doesn't have to be a crop top
links_Review_Text: With a high enough waste it is not cropped. The tie of the side does leave a slit where you can see your skin. Shoulder pads making the big sleeve magic.

links_Review_Title: Perfect for photoshoot. Look is unique and good quality material.
links_Review_Text: Cropped and hit right above navel for me. Loved it.
I wish it was longer and I'm 5'0. The top shows a lot above the belly button so I worn a super with waisted skirt, and still had skin to show
The fit and look of this top are amazing! You can dress up any outfit with this top
Great length and beautiful color! Day after my wedding leaving the hotel. Neckline has to be pinned. Deep plunge.
Great fit. Lots of compliments
Was an adorable dress I wore on vacation. Was very comfortable. Low cut but nothing a ruffle couldn't fix.

links_Review_Title: Unique and pretty, but needs a layer
links_Review_Text: The waist is perfect - actually very fitted - so the dress is slimming. The top is a little off - I could not come close to buttoning - with too much fabric and frills. Love the type of fabric and colors, bottom is perfect in fit and length.

links_Review_Title: This dress is cute as a button
links_Review_Text: This dress fit really really well it did already have a pin in it for from when someone had it last I kept it in there so the neckline was not too long if it really well and felt great on very attractive dress

Easily one of my favorite rentals yet. For me the fit was great, it was fitted without being too tight and felt flirty and feminine while still being comfortable. The clasp on the top portion was a little wonky, something I would alter to better fit my chest if I owned it, but overall was a great rental and a huge hit.

I was nervous about this dress because of the reviews on the neckline. But honestly, it was perfect. I was able to wear a normal, racer back bra. I loved everything about this dress and really wanted to buy it. It was short, but not uncomfortably so. It was very flattering.
This dress runs true to size. Has become my go-to option as a casual day dress that transitions perfectly into a night-out dress. Fabric is gorgeous and lightweight for summer.

Liked the bottom half and the color. But too low cut so had to pin. Ruffles hid pin but not ideal. And didn't looove the print. Had to size up one like all Saloni as this brand runs tight in waist for me.
This is a nice everyday summer dress. The material is nice and light and the print is fun. It fits true to size, but is quite short and quite low cut, so probably best for someone on the petite side.

links_Review_Title: Cute color, but too low cut
links_Review_Text: Cute color, but never wore because it cut too low. I also wasn't a big fan of the grill along the neckline.
Rented for a baby shower and it was just right. Had to pin at the top of the neckline, there is a hook and eye that was s little low for a normal bra. Still cute!
Fun summer dress. Will rent again!
This dress runs small. I have an athletic build - 5’6’’ 155lbs. I wore a size 8 in this dress- it has zero stretch. If you are deciding between 2 sizes, go with the bigger size.
Dress was perfect and just as described

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress, bizarre fit. Couldn't wear
links_Review_Text: I got this dress new with the tags on and I really wish I could have worn it because it's a beautiful dress. The colors are brighter and more vibrant than the RTR photo and the material feels really nice. I'm usually a 6 but I sized up and got the 8 because I think I have needed to in the past with this designer. The top was waaaay too huge. It was very low cut, and super wide. It gaped at the sides, lots of extra fabric in the bust and back/shoulders. I would have needed to gather and pin a lot of material in the back for it to fit. But the waist fit perfectly - I think the 6 might have been too tight or not zipped up. I'm really not sure who could wear this dress - ladies with smaller chests would have too much extra fabric and ladies with larger chests would totally bust out of this neckline. Maybe someone with a smaller wide-set bust could go bra-less and have less of an issue. Or maybe it just needs to be worn with a statement bralette. I'm going to try again in the 6 just because the dress is so pretty, but I don't have high hopes because of the bizarre fit.
Noting fancy but a cute a comfortable dress. I wore it while running errands in Oahu.

links_Review_Title: Was too low in the chest for where I was going. Beautiful dress though
Bright colors but not the most flattering
links_Review_Text: This ran large, and wasn't flattering around the hips. The top was also a bit large, and probably could have used some tape, but I was on vacation and didn't have any.

links_Review_Title: Runs VERY small in waist, back and bust. I'd go up at least 2 sizes if you are broad back/chested.
links_Review_Text: Cute dress. Nothing amazing. I absolutely could not get thus dress zipped up past the waist. I'm 27" on my waist and 32D busted. There was NO way I could zip it up. So my advice, size up at least 2 sizes if you are built like me. It fits true to size in the hips. It's a short dress, as I'm 5'7". So keep that in mind when ordering as well.
This dress was so fun for a night out on vacation. The neck line plunges low but keeps everything in!

links_Review_Title: It's very low cut, however, I was able to pin it and still be cute!
links_Review_Text: get the boob tape and pins out … this one is very cute but VERY low cut.
The dress it's self was beautiful. Great color but not for someone who is tall . I couldn't wear it out on my date because it was way to short
Way way too low in front. I have a 38C bust, and don't mind a little show, but this was a Lotta show, didn't wear it

Great sexy dress for date or night out. Dress was just tight enough to create good lines in the waist, then draped with ease up top. While the top is low, there was an inside clasp that kept it from revealing too much. Didn't have to wear a bra under.

Pros: The color of the dress is gorgeous. It is more of a deep pink than the red it looked like in the picture. Great color/print for summer or fall. Was a perfect length for petite. Con: runs small. I'm almost always a 2. I wore the 2, but it was uncomfortable in the waist. The tightness in the waist made my stomach look wider above the waist. The ruffles on the front were a bit much on my frame. And the dress is extremely low cut, I had to wear a cami underneath to wear to dinner. This was a wear once on a date and return type dress for me.
Bottom is really nice but top is too revealing for me
Not worn. Beautiful dress but it has no stretch and runs about 2 sizes too small. I could barely zip it up.
This is a really cute dress but I would recommend getting it only if you have a chest to support it. If you were an a or a B it is challenging because it is low cut. But very cute.

Wasn't sure about the review that said the chest was weird - I have a small chest - but I wore this to work with a body suit underneath and it was totally perfect. It's ruffles touches are playful and it's a beautiful summery vibe. Like most Saloni, go with your backup larger size even if it's a little big in certain places, the "true" size will almost always be too small. It's a bit fancier than a "day" dress but you'd still be able to pull it off.

The dress is pretty and the colors are vibrant. I got many compliments. The dress runs small, so definitely size up. The chest is weird, too. It's very low-cut, but it has a hook-and-eye. But the placement of the hook is weird, and leaves you with a big gap. Didn't like how I felt in this dress.
It was tight around 29" waist, its nice summery dress
Loved this top. Wore for our gender reveal party during Mardi Gras. The color is beautiful and almost slightly purple when the light hits it! Loved it and got so many compliments

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous shimmery top, perfect for New Year's Eve!
links_Review_Text: Loved this top. Very in your face with poofy sleeves and the neck tie, but perfect if you are trying to be extra for some kind of event or theme party!
I wore this to work and then out after work. Versatile yet flashy and I received so many compliments.
A gift with a bow on top! Many ways to wear and pair and guaranteed you will be noticed, so SMILE! Made in USA; comfortable, merry and bright are all the reasons to for the gold!

Loved this top! It was incredibly fun and I received all the compliments. This top is super shiny, but adorable. The length was perfect on my petite frame. Material is a little itchy, but I felt super glam and loved this piece!

links_Review_Title: Cute dinner or going out top
links_Review_Text: Cute puffy sleeves, great rose color, love the metallic! Great top!
Fun and flirty but it wasn't anything amazing. I liked it but won't rent again.

I love this top!! Such a statement and I got so many compliments when I wore it to my friend's holiday party. I was nervous that the foiled material would be stiff or uncomfortable, but it was surprisingly soft to the touch. Super easy fit too. Highly recommend!
This is the only jumpsuit that has worked for my short, pear shaped body so far. Wore it for a night out and a house party. My friends loved the outfit :)
Really cute, flattering & versatile. I'm usually a 14 and the 16 is a tad snug at the waist.
Loved the lace detail and flattering cut. So many compliments, even from random people on the street. Runs TTS.
True to size and great for a cocktail party for work or personal. Many compliments from others and very comfortable.

links_Review_Title: Work party, favorite RTR by far
links_Review_Text: Work party, I'm not one who can generally pull off the jumpsuit look but this one was amazing. The 14 fit but couldn't comfortably zip up over my chest. I'm 5'5" about 200lbs with a size 36 F/G chest. I'm post partum and not quite where I want to be yet. That being said this outfit gave me loads of confidence. It was both sexy and work appropriate. Wish I could have kept this one, definitely my favorite rental so far.
Loved the black lace. It was a cute cut! Would rent again on a not as cold night!
Beautiful comfy and fun! Would have bought this if it wasn't so expensive. Will def rent again!
I just wish this had pockets!

links_Review_Title: Super comfortable & flattering, doubled as a work outfit & a party outfit & went with flats & heels!
links_Review_Text: This is my dream jumper! I'm normally afraid to wear jumpers because I have a long torso and I get camel toe so easily. I was pleasantly surprised that this size 4 ran true to size and I did not have to size up! the seam hit me right in the sweet spot of my waist so it was very slimming and super comfortable. I'm 5'7" and 130 lbs with a 32 D bra size. I wore it while working as a publicist on a red carpet, and then immediately afterward to a film industry party. It worked well with loafers and with heels. 10/10 WOULD recommend.

links_Review_Title: I want to own this now!
links_Review_Text: Loved this Jumpsuit.

I am 5'11" so I never considered wearing an adult one-z. However, I was pleasantly surprised when I tried this on. It fit perfectly. It was a tiny bit snug in the bust, but not uncomfortable. I definitely recommend.

Would rent again! The 16 fit great! The 14 was too small only in the crotch area. I'm 5'6" and 199lbs and the 16 was just right. Not too tight or loose anywhere. This jumpsuit is so cute and I want to buy it so badly! Too bad it's $$$! The only issue is a general jumpsuit issue which I didn't think about. Every time I had to go to the bathroom someone had to unbutton the neck then unzip me all the way, lol!
Loved this jumpsuit! Easy to wear, comfortable, classy with a little sass. Looking for any reason to wear again because it was so flattering and fun.

Wore this for a rehearsal dinner. Jumpsuits are hard for me to wear due to my body type but this one was perfect!! You can zip and button yourself so bathroom isn't horrible! Rented 8 and 10 but 10 was spot on. Loved it!!

This was the perfect formal jumpsuit--wore it to a family wedding. It was a bit sexy but not inappropriate. The fit was perfect and it was very comfortable. The only slight issue was the button at the neck was a bit difficult to close, but otherwise I was really happy with my choice.
Loved this jumper. I've been wanting to try one but nervous and this one was perfect! Wore it for my daughter's graduation.

This was a perfect fit and fashion! I'm surprised how it fit my curves because I have a hard time finding dresses for that reason. But this was great... I have a big booty and smaller top and it fit like a glove.
Fit true to size and was perfect for a wedding. Elegant yet trendy.

links_Review_Title: This was the most comfortable jumpsuit I've ever worn!
links_Review_Text: The lace was soft, not scratchy.

links_Review_Title: It was a daytime wedding and this outfit suited it perfectly.
links_Review_Text: What a stunner!!! I couldn’t have been happier with this outfit. I received so many compliments. Super comfortable, not at all tight in the chest, and very classy. I loved it so much I tried finding it online to buy. I’m 5’6”, 135lbs, athletic build, 36C. I ordered an 8 and a 10 and if I could go back I’d wear a 6.
The fit is perfect.
True to size and elegant. I could dress it up or down. Perfect fit for a lovely fine dining experience. Woth fun jewelry it can really be dressed up for any occasion. Very comfortable as well.

links_Review_Title: A jumpsuit that fit a long torso!
links_Review_Text: This fit like a glove. I LOVE jumpsuits and rompers but they're really hit or miss with my long torso. This one was a WIN! I didn't want to send it back!
I love this jumper! It fit perfectly and looked fabulous, while also being super comfortable.
So perfect- worked for my long torso and since the pants aren't full length it worked in the length as well
It fits perfectly! The only downside is getting the button at the top done up by yourself!
Tight in bust area
So comfortable! Wore to a bar mitzvah got compliments all night. I paired it with red shoes and lips.

This was my first time using RTR and it was amazing! I rented this jumpsuit for our school gala. I am on the board, so I figured I would be running around a lot that night. Everything about this outfit was perfect. It was comfortable, classy, elegant. I felt great in it, and received so many compliments. I would rent it again in a heartbeat!!!! Loved it!

links_Review_Title: Lots of compliments! Loved the lace at top.
links_Review_Text: Tighter in chest than I was expecting. I'm a 34b and the 2r was snug.

This was my first time wearing a jumper- I was a little hesitant to try but ended up loving it! I was able to easily unzip and button without assistance. I wore it for a concert- it was super comfortable and was able to dance all night in it! I definitely plan on renting this again- it was cute and different.

links_Review_Title: Fun to wear and super sliming
links_Review_Text: I LOVED this jumpsuit. I'm a big fan of jumpsuits in general and this one was no exception. The jumpsuit is made of black lace that is see through at the shoulders and bottom hem but I was still able to wear a black bra with it and you couldn't tell. The fabric was slightly stretchy so it fit over my rather large chest no problem while still being nipped in at the waist. I could zip it up myself about 3/4 of the way and then needed either a bathroom buddy or for my husband to zip and unzip before running into the bathroom. Fabric is not very thick so it was a bit chilly for New Years in Vegas but I survived. So cute and sliming I would definitely rent again.

links_Review_Title: Perfect for a semi formal event.
links_Review_Text: Pretty, semi-formal, sassy, fun, and comfortable. I received many compliments and felt great. The top fit well which was a concern prior to renting because I'm long waist-ed. The bottom was a bit long because my legs are very short but I still felt confident and loved wearing this.

It's a nice piece because it feels like it can go super formal, more cocktail, or even dressed down a bit. I had no idea what the actual dress code for this event was and it was more dressy than expected and I fit in perfectly. We later went to another party after -- which was casual, no problem! Magic jumpsuit.

links_Review_Title: PERFECT dress up item for petites!
links_Review_Text: I have so much trouble with jumpsuits because I am short but this one fit PERFECTLY. I wore with black pointy toe shoes with an ankle strap and it was cropped enough to see the ankle strap. The lace was gorgeous, I wore it all night and was super comfortable. Will definitely rent again!

links_Review_Title: Great jumpsuit! Loved it and would totally rent again! Pictures do not do it justice.
links_Review_Text: Fit very well and true to size. I'm 5'4 and a more of an athletic build, with bigger thighs and a small waist. Pictures DO NOT do this justice. Hard to capture the black on black lace detailing in photos. Form fitting around the waist, makes you look really tiny and lose in all the right areas, perfect for dancing and moving around.

links_Review_Title: Delightful surprise! Flattering, pretty and so many compliments! And SO comfy?!!!
links_Review_Text: This was a last minute (morning off for a noon wedding?!) pick. I got it at the RtR store in NYC because my other dress and back up didn’t fit at all. I am so glad the others were a bust! This is my fav RTR ever. The neckline and lace is so pretty, and the jump suit is flattering and comfortable. I think there’s a tiny bit of stretch in the liner?? I wore it for 8 hours and was never uncomfortable. It’s glamorous, classy and the jumpsuit makes it modern and fun. I usually wear an 8 or 10, but this fit perfectly.

This was my second time renting Kate Spade, and I loved this jumpsuit even more than the dress I'd rented previously. The jumpsuit was incredibly comfortable while still slimming, and was so fun to dance in. It was a struggle to send it back -- I wanted to keep it!
I tried renting this for valentine's day and it didn't work for me. The 8 didn't really fit the crotch area but then the chest area was very baggy. Ultimately didn't work for me
I have a long torso and this fit beautifully. I dressed it down with a denim jacket and big chunky jewelry. Very fun. Lots of compliments.
I ended up wearing something else but jut because this dress wasn't stunning. It is #Stunning!!! Enjoy!
Love this dress!!! It's so stylish, so special. The color is so beautiful and it fits true to size. Rent this one!!!

I ordered a size 16 with my unlimited to check out this dress for a May wedding. I loved it! I am a true 14 and ordered a 14 for the wedding. I have on a strapless bra and spanx - all fit comfortably.

Fit: TTS, but the shoulder strap was a bit loose. Pros: gorgeous color, not your typical event dress. Definitely got a ton of compliments. I felt like a million bucks. Cons: the shoulder strap was loose and slipped down all night, which was a little annoying. Once I just resigned myself to letting it fall where it wanted, I was fine.

Wow this dress, I got so many compliments. "You look like a celebrity", "your dress won this event", "looks tailored for you". Easy to wear although the slim fit doesn't allow for fast walking. It was good for dancing though. It does show everything so I'd recommend Spanx. Wore with normal strapless nude coloured bra. I was nervous that the length wouldn't suit me but due to the slim cut I think is flattering.
Absolutely loved the color of this dress!!!

I wore this to a friends wedding and received SO many compliments from women of all ages. Between the cut and color, this dress definitely turns heads. My only qualm was that it's challenging to raise your arms too high which is a pain when dancing. I have a large chest so I sized up which worked fine for me.
Most amazing dress I've ever worn- true to size and color is even more beautiful in person.
I absolutely loved wearing this dress. It was so comfortable and was stunning in person.

I wore this for a rehearsal dinner. I received lots of compliments and felt great! The dress looks longer in this picture because of the angle but it hit around mid-calf. I loved the color and the neckline. I wish I could buy it!
Gorgeous dress - compliments all night. I have rented multiple Christian sirano dresses and felt this ran small. Usually wear a 6 and sized up to 8.

I'm a sea of mother of the bride dresses the hot pink stood out making me look young and hip. The arm area was a little tight, I tried ordering up but the 14 was never available. Even though I avoided situations that required me to raise the roof, I still partied like cash money taking over for the 99 and 2000.
Great color!! Size up!!! I am 5"2 so the dress was a bit longer then the picture but looked fine. I really liked this dress but the top was awkward at times and didn't stay in place.

Loved this dress so much! Christian Siriano dresses normally have some give it them, so always size down especially if you're an hourglass and have a tint waist! This is the kind of dress that needs to hug you and not be loose!

The bright color and elegant deign of this dress was perfect for formal summer work event. I got compliments all night! The shoulder/back detail was unique. And the cut of the dress was incredibly flattering on my curvy frame. The fabric felt expensive and hugged my figure perfectly while the length and neckline kept it from being too over the top sexy. Definitely a favorite from RTRW!
Better than traditional dresses for black tie wedding. Color is amazing. Fabric sucks you in.

links_Review_Title: This dress was absolutely breathtaking. The color was striking and the style-- perfect!
links_Review_Text: This dress ran small (usually a solid 12, dress was a 16) but since I needed a replacement dress, and gambled that this dress would run small as well, I went with what was available which was a 16. Although it was stressful (not because of RTR, they were amazing), I am so glad my original dress didn't work out. I got so many compliments and felt fantastic on this very special day.
Cut, color, fit were all fantastic. Got compliments all night long. Will definitely rent again.

links_Review_Title: I got so many compliments on this dress!!
links_Review_Text: People stopped me all night to tell me how much they loved this dress! I'm 5'3" so it was a bit long, but still looked good. It was a teeny bit tighter than the other 8 dress I got, thank goodness for Spanx! Such a fun color!!
Would have rather it been a bit shorter
This dress made me feel so pretty! It was really comfortable and I loved the length.

I loved this dress it has clean lines but the color and swoop in the back make it fun. I wore a 4 but found it to be a little big in the stomach area, I could have gone with a 2 but I'm a 32DD and was afraid it wouldn't fit. Rent this!!

links_Review_Title: I attended a beautiful Spring outdoor wedding in Provence France. This dress was perfection!
links_Review_Text: The overall fit was true to size! I love the unique detail of the asymmetrical off the shoulder. Loved the color! The tea length was so classic!

links_Review_Title: Color captured beautifully! Completed all night!
links_Review_Text: Great dress for petite women-no hem necessary with a 2-3 inch heel. Fabric is slightly stretchy so comfortable to sit eat and dance!

links_Review_Title: Fantastic dress that wows. I wore this dress to an event and got a lots of compliments.
links_Review_Text: I loved wearing this dress. It was tea length on me and I am 5'10" so it's probably best suited for taller women. I am typically a size 8 and wore a 10 in this dress and it fit perfectly. The color is stunning and paired well with nude heels. I chose a blue beaded bag with pink accents and it was perfect for a spring event.

Wore to a black tie wedding. Loved it. Super fitted so wore spanx and felt like it worked out but probably would've been better going with the 4. I'm usually between a 2 and 4. The length was elegant but looks awkward in this picture because I was slightly squatting.

links_Review_Title: Fit was amazing. Asymmetrical top and color really popped.
links_Review_Text: Dress fit like a glove but had a little give.

SO LADIES! Here is my story.... I rented this for a gala because it looked perfect but I was unsure how it would look on my body as I typically wear fit and flares due to my midsection. This dress hit all the right areas while flattering my midsection. It was very high fashion, classy, and made me stand out! I did have to wear hose underneath so my belly button shadow wouldnt be seen through the dress... but it was worth the adjustments on my undergarments because I felt like a million bucks all night! I loved how it doesn't wrinkle easy too! It may seem long but it's made to be that way.... it lets the dress hang where it needs to, hits the right spots to make the neckline perfect.
It was perfect for the wedding I attended. My only issue is that it ran a little small in comparison to the other size 10 dresses that I rented. Nevertheless I received a lot of compliments!
great fit, easy to dance in, size up!

links_Review_Title: This dress is amazing! I felt like a million bucks all night. The shoulders and color are so sexy!
links_Review_Text: This dress has pretty good stretch to it, so it hugs curves perfectly. I felt like a goddess. The fabric is very high quality and the color is so vibrant. It stands out in the best possible way.

links_Review_Title: Thanks to this dress, I was easily the best dressed at the event.
links_Review_Text: I wore this dress to a CA state pageant. It was perfect for the event. I am typically a 00 off the rack so the top half of the dress was a little big. Because there is so much material where it drapes off the shoulder, I had to put a little pin underneath to keep it from draping too low. For those who are petite, it's nothing a thick, padded bra can't help. The dress is in interesting length so matching the proper style heels is pretty important. I paired the WHITING & DAVIS-Diamond Drips Minaudiere (also from RTR) as my handbag; large pearl drop earrings and a crystal and pearl bracelet (jewelry by Sweets Jewelry). I received many compliments for the complete look. Everyone could tell the quality of the dress was very high. I highly recommend this dress if you're looking to make a statement and stand out from the crowd.

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous dress, but not for me, sadly
links_Review_Text: This is a truly stunning dress. I wish I'd ordered a a size 18! I'm usually a14 but also ordered a 16 based on reviews. Th 16 fit, bit I would have needed a few layers of Spanx to feel comfortable. I went with my second choice for my party but would definitely rent this one again. It would be a great #royalwedding guest dress!

Fit me perfectly. I also got the 6 and it was figure hugging tight. Since I wanted to eat dinner I opted to stick with the 8. It hit me right at my ankles and the armpits were a little low but this was a beautiful dress, amazing structure and terrific color. it's a great dress to wear if you're going to be sitting for dinner or standing, travels really well and wrinkles shake out easily. Not so great for dancing since the arms are kind of restricted but I would rent this again for any occasion.

links_Review_Title: This dress has so much personality, it is so intentional - I felt amazing the entire night.
links_Review_Text: True to size, not restricting at all. Be sure to steam the bottom of the dress before wear, the full length of this gown is so elegant. A bra is not a non negotiable, the material is thick enough to support you.

links_Review_Title: Just amazing, vibrant and a show stopper
links_Review_Text: So many people complimented me on the color and design. I was looking for a bright happy color and also a elegant design. Dresses often are dark colors or too revealing. This was not. Also went one size up and was perfect. I think size 2 would have been too tight. I would just suggest to get two sizes in this and let this dress be your first choice. The dress for some reason would twist around /shift (as you can see in the picture). Also I tried to use hollywood tape to control the way it draped over my shoulder, but that didn't work.

links_Review_Title: The stares that I got when I got up to take a picture with my husband.
links_Review_Text: Super sexy and flattering. I loved this dress!
Wore on my newest album cover photoshoot. Love the dramatic neckline. Wish were shorter.

I rented this for some quarantine fun. The dress is absolutely beautiful. In the RTR photos I thought there were stars in silver, but these actually are flowers. So comfortable, very flattering cut. My only complaint is that the straps were a little too long

I've started renting pretty gowns ever since social distancing went into effect and I just loved the heck out of this dress. It's a gorgeous, flattering fit, rich heavy embroidered fabric, and artful construction. The top was a little loose on my 32A sized chest, but it still looked great. Plus, it has pockets, which is pretty much magical.

This dress was a perfect fit and feel for a work event. Pockets aside as the automatic best part, I felt beautiful all night long. The dress was so comfortable and I got constant compliments. My only negative is I couldn't buy it and keep it forever!

I am pretty tall and bigger than the average girl, so finding a dress that is both beautiful and fits great is amazing. The dress was so long I felt so happy about that. But, it was a little itchy due to the design and I didn't have enough boobs to fill it out so I had to constantly fix myself. Other than that, I loved it so much!!! So many compliments!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful fabric, pockets!!!, deep V, tough zipper but sturdy bodice
links_Review_Text: I've tried this designer & similar style before and have found that the zippers tend to get caught at the seam of the bodice, nothing an extra hand can't handle if you have the correct size for your torso and chest. I sized up (also did last time I tried this style&designer) and I found that the deep V was still very flattering and the fabric fit to my body without much gapping; overall very comfortable in that I wasn't fixing myself all night. Wore 4" heals and I'm about 5' 7" length was great!

links_Review_Title: Best dressed for Oscars-themed school auction gala
links_Review_Text: Wore 2P which was still long since I'm 5'3". Bodice fitted for my 34B and 120 pounds. Fit like a glove and compliments all night in a sea of sequin dresses.

links_Review_Title: This dress is a magical piece. It fit perfectly and turned all the heads. Understated and glamorous.
links_Review_Text: Perfect fit. You will have to tell folks not to step on the gown!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress for a beautiful event
links_Review_Text: I rented this dress for my sorority's formal philanthropy gala. I absolutely love Monique Lhuillier so I was super excited to get to wear this gown. I am so happy that I decided to get the bigger size though. While I am a size 18/20, I had to wear the size 22 in this dress because it was so tight in the rib cage are for me, which isn't usually my problem area. The 22 was even still a bit small in the rib cage and it took 3 of my friends to zip up the dress, but it did fit. Other than that, the dress was beautiful and fit me so nicely. Everyone loved it and I got compliments all night long! I highly suggest this dress if you are a plus sized woman, but be aware if you have a wide set rib cage like myself, the dress can run a little small!

Loved this dress! If you have a larger chest size it does show a lot of cleavage, but they felt secure and I wasn't really afraid of being overexposed. The fabric and pattern is great - I received lots of compliments!

links_Review_Title: Dance the night away, no heels necessary!
links_Review_Text: This dress fit me perfectly! It has a very flattering waist, with the perfect length, and has wonderful deep pockets. At 5’ 7” I was surprised that the length was perfect for me, but I was able to wear flats and it was just the right length. If you have a large chest, be aware that the dress will be very low cut. The only downside is that the straps may cut into your shoulders just a little bit. Overall, it was actually a very comfortable dress.

I rented this for a black and white ball -- the embroidery is more silver than white but it was perfect for this event. The fabric is lighter than I was expecting but moved beautifully on the dance floor. The dress was very low cut but I was still able to wear a strapless bra! I have tiny boobs so even the 2 was a little big on me -- small chested women will definitely want to size down (I'm usually right between a 2 and a 4). I got compliments all night on this glamorous dress!
This dress fit true to size and wore shoes with a small heel it was the perfect length. It felt so comfortable and bonus it has pockets!!

links_Review_Title: I felt so special and beautiful in this gown.
links_Review_Text: For me, it may have been a little tight on the top, maybe. I am not used to wearing a gown of this type. I loved it. I loved it and received so many compliments it was unbelievable. This gown is a head-turner.

links_Review_Title: So many compliments on this dress!
links_Review_Text: The fit was comfortable and pockets are always a plus. The crinoline can be a bit tricky to maneuver walking up stairs and going up escalators with heels so you have to really hike it up. Otherwise, a very glamorous dress!
wow'd at work holiday party. Detailed metallic stars embroidered the black formal gown. Needed really high heels to not drag for my height.

links_Review_Title: Received a lot of compliments, loved the pockets.
links_Review_Text: Is very low cut so the girls were on full display

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress and it has Pockets!!
links_Review_Text: This dress was perfect for our military Ball. The fabric was a good thickness for winter while still feeling light and airy. I got so many compliments! Loved it!

I loved the dress for the most part. Cons - fit tight, length was long even with 6 inch heels and a little more revealing than I expected. Pros - Got tons of compliments, felt like a princess. Overall, it's a great dress for a formal event, such as a gala. I wore it to a Red Carpet work holiday party.

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous material, and pockets were amazing!
links_Review_Text: Based on other reviews, I expected this dress to have a little more room in the bust, and the waist of the bodice was longer than I would have liked. But, I have a very short waist and fairly large boobs, so this may not affect many other women. My boobs ended up taking up part of the bodice designed for the waist, as well as filling out the cups, and that was in the larger backup size. The fabric was gorgeous, but a little thick, which made the zipper stiff at the waistband, even just taking it off the hanger. All that being said, it was a gorgeous dress, I got lots of compliments, and the pockets really are a game-changer, especially when going solo to a friend's wedding. I didn't have to leave my purse at the table, or ask a friend to hold my stuff in his pants pocket, which was very convenient! Overall a very nice dress, and would wear again!

I love love love this dress. So comfortable and flattering for this smaller chested lady. No spanx, bra, or purse necessary (this thing has POCKETS). I would rent again in a heartbeat. The only downside is it is VERY hard to zip up. You have to pinch the top while also pinching the area where it's stuck so definitely a two person job.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful gown, but beware of the cleavage!
links_Review_Text: Tbe fit is gorgeous and when standing, the cleavage is sexy but not risque. However, I am a well-endowed girl and the minute I sat down I had to cover my chest with a shawl or be very comfortable with exposing a lot! I also used a size up for the chest as my regular size fit well otherwise. Having said all that, I received compliments all night, even from random people on the street! I felt that the shape and cut was very flattering.
Great ball gown with amazing silver details.

I rented this dress for New Years Eve, and I felt like the belle of the ball wearing it. The embroidered flowers are so beautiful, and the shape of the dress is extremely flattering. I wish I'd had another affair to attend so that I could wear it again!

This dress is gorgeous! I got so many compliments! And is has pockets!!! Wore it on the red carpet at the guild awards in LA! It was a tiny bit tight in the rib cage, but it fit great otherwise! I danced the night away and loved every minute of it! Would definitely recommend!
This dress was perfect. I'm always hesitant to rent full length dresses since I'm so short, but the 2P fit perfectly with heels. The pockets were an added bonus.

I would say this is true to size - I had to size up due to availability and it was looser than I would have preferred on top. I'm 5'2 and the R was a tad long with heels too. Beautiful, high quality dress!

links_Review_Title: Best Dress I have EVER rented...
links_Review_Text: I felt amazing in this dress- don't think I have ever felt more beautiful or have worn a more flattering dress. I loved everything about it. I wore it for to work for a New Years Eve event- I did wear a cardigan during work hours (I felt the bare shoulder and open bust was a bit too much skin for work), but got rid of the cardigan for partying. The pockets MADE this dress. I would wear this AGAIN AND AGAIN!

links_Review_Title: I wore this to my son's military ball and it was perfect! Comfortable, flattering and has pockets!
links_Review_Text: The neckline is very deep and I couldn't fill the dress out on top. This was easily fixed with a black push-up bra. It blended right in and looked fabulous!

This dress definitely runs larger. I'm normally around a 6 and this fit a little tight, but not uncomfortably so. I'm about 5'7 and the regular was perfect with a small heel. Perfect for NYE and beautiful on with just the right amount of sparkle!

links_Review_Title: New Years Eve Black Tie Gala to celebrate the next decade
links_Review_Text: I loved this dress, it was so comfortable & I got lots of compliments + awesome pockets!
Originally rented a 10L but too small in the chest. All that was available for a quick replay was a 14L which worked fine even though a little big.

This dress is so gorgeous! I could have used the 12 but it wasn't available so I gifted the gown to my sister for a NYE black tie wedding. It was stunning and just classic. The length is long and the waist a little snug so order a bigger backup size.

links_Review_Title: I got to live my dream of wearing a beautifully embroidered dress like this!
links_Review_Text: LOVED IT!! So beautiful in person. Some cleavage but not as bad as picture suggests. Pockets were so helpful but did make hips look bigger. A bit itchy but not an issue. SOOOO PRETTY!!
Would recommend ordering a Long size for those on the taller side, especially if you want to wear heels. I wore two inch heels. Perfect fit, strong material and pockets are a added bonus

I got the best compliments about this dress last night at my hubby's holiday party! It fits like a glove. Material is comfortable and sturdy! This is a must for anyone looking for a formal gown! #holidayparty #party

This dress was an absolute stunner. I got SO many compliments! I fell in love with it and wish I didn't have to return it. So gorgeous! The fit through the bodice and waist was perfect. The material is thick, and a tiny bit heavy but not enough to be bothersome. I'm almost 5'4" and even with my highest heels it was just a tad too long. The pockets were a great bonus to an already kick butt dress!

This dress is perfect for formal events! It was a little too big for me, but the length was perfect (I'm 5'8"). I could eat and drink and not feel self conscious because it's not tight in the belly. Felt like a princess!

links_Review_Title: So much prettier in person - flattering silhouette!!
links_Review_Text: This dress was not my first choice but due to some sizing issues, I had to make a last minute change and boy am I glad I did! This dress is stunning in person and the silhouette is so figure flattering! I got tons of compliments the night of my event and really enjoyed wearing this dress. I felt pretty comfortable in it and loved that it has pockets! My only complaint was that it was a bit large in the bust for me. I'm a 36c for reference. Easy fix with a bit of flash tape and a stick on bra.

This fit me incredibly well with zero sideboob. The darts really hold the girls in place, but I'd still use tape under it. The reason I didn't wear it was how low cut it was. I could actually see my sternum, and I'm not comfortable with that. But if you're more brave than I am, this is a stunner.

links_Review_Title: Size down, flowy and fun dress!
links_Review_Text: I loved this dress but have 1 complaint. The "keyhole" around the breasts is very large. If you have a bigger bust, it may not be appealing to you. Other than that I loved it! I would normally get a L dress but based on reviews I got a M and I'm glad I did! It was stretchy yet slimming and flow-y. I am 5'7" and the dress hit me right in the right spot but some people may find it to be too short for their liking. I may order it again if the right occasion arises!

The cutest dress! I added a blazer and it was the perfect combo. Also wearing it for a fun night Friday without a blazer and feel like it takes on a new look. Very cute, low maintenance/non wrinkle. Only problem I had was when people asked where I got it I had to say it wasn't mine lol
Great four hourglass shape. Soft material. Love this dress!
So comfy. Wore to work and to a girls night dinner. Loved the color and found the dress to be very flattering as well. Will rent again.
Dress is super stretchy and a bit shiny. Cute for everyday/work.
Love the pattern, fit, and feel. No wrinkles ever. Works with or without tights. #day-to-night #party #pattern #floral #soft

links_Review_Title: Eye catchingly cute and easy to wear.
links_Review_Text: I usually wear a size 6 in designer dresses and a size small for this dress fit well. The fabric has a ton of stretch so it's very comfortable to wear. Because it's not lined, the fabric did a little clinging to my tights but not too bad. I'd suggest shiny tights or stockings if you're wearing them with the dress so that the skirt doesn't stick.

links_Review_Title: One of my favorite rentals ever!
links_Review_Text: I had to keep this one! The color really pops and the waistband is super flattering!
The fit was perfect for me. I liked the peekaboo front

Rented this for work and got so many compliments all day! Fabric is super stretchy so I found the dress to be very comfortable. Dress was a bit on the shorter side for the office, in my opinion and I'm 5'3. If you're much taller I would size up for length

I can't explain how much I love this dress; it's sadly out of my price range or I would buy it in a second. I'm an 8/10 and the medium fit perfectly. The material is like spandex, so it never wrinkles and always keeps its shape, no matter how many times I tried it on and, ultimately, wore it. It's also super comfortable and flattering (especially for those of us with a belly). I didn't get a good picture of the front, but a little bit of cleavage gives it a hint of sexiness. Amazing. A+ dress.

This might have been too much for the office but I didn't care. It was soft, comfortable and flattering. It does run a little short so be aware of that on windy days. It paired nicely with a leather jacket - soft and hard.

The colors and print on this dress are amazing! I had complete strangers stop me to say how beautiful this dress is. I would have to agree. I found the arms to be a bit long and the waist wasn't quite in the right place for me. Neither of which were deal breakers, but I wasn't very comfortable in it. Looks only: 10/10!

links_Review_Title: Fun dress and light, comfortable material
links_Review_Text: I rented this dress for an all day meeting. The cut is super flattering and the light, stretch material made it comfortable to wear all day.

I ordered a small. The dress is light and airy, perfect for a Spring wedding or luncheon. I enjoyed how the material flows and feels. I only tried the dress and decided not to wear it for my girls' night out since it was 38 degrees outside. The dress is more for late Spring/ early summer kind of weather.

links_Review_Title: The material makes this a great pack-able item.
links_Review_Text: The dress was comfortable, but really wasn't my style. I wouldn't rent it again.
Loved it
Cute, but not blown away by it, so I chose not to wear. Thicker material and good length.
Just a little short but loved!
Nice dress. Fit well. Emphasizes the waist but in a good way.
Love this brand and it's perfect for the office as well, hits at the knee and I'm 5'6, also flattering if you're curvy and the cut isn't too deep in the front, tons of compliments!

links_Review_Title: Fits well, not flattering for busty girls
links_Review_Text: Loved the fit and feel of the dress- but I don't think it minimizes the chest at all. It made me look bigger
Pretty, comfortable, not a "wow" item, but a nice additon for everyday.
The cut was perfect to transition from work to a friends birthday party. Fit like a glove would definitely rent it again!

links_Review_Title: Wore this dress to a black tie optional winter wedding during my second trimester.
links_Review_Text: I ended up being fine in my pre-pregnancy size. It was perfect for the occasion and I felt comfortable and glamorous in it.

Rented this dress for a holiday party whilst 35 pregnant. I was shocked I could wear close to my pre-pregnancy size and that this dress flattered the bump. The material is really stretchy so it worked great!
Even tho this dress what not my type of dress I would usually wear to parties... I actually like how I didn't need to pull my dress down all the time.(even when dancing)! I really liked it (:

I got so many compliments wearing this dress. I wore it to a Christmas work holiday party (cocktail attire). It was a beautiful color and fabric and comfortable to boot. It fits true to size. I literally cannot say one bad thing about it!
This dress is so beautiful! It is very comfortable and easy to travel with. Would love to purchase this dress!

links_Review_Title: Super comfortable dress and looks great too
links_Review_Text: This dress was really comfortable and perfect for a cold, winter date night. It's supposedly grey, but sometimes looked blue or green depending on the light. Fits true to size.
The velvet has some stretch and feels luxe. Hugs curves in all the right ways. A beautiful dress.
Fabric is plush. And has some elasticity to it. Hides your body's imperfections perfectly. Very comfortable to wear.

I went to an outdoor winter wedding and wanted to be warm, this dress was literally perfect! Fit great because there is a little stretch, was warm but not hot and was so comfortable all evening. I received several compliments, even from strangers at the wedding. Overall, I would highly recommend this dress as I am honestly considering buying it!

I really wish I had a full-body picture, but this was for a work event so no one wanted a picture of *me* lol. In any case, I was really concerned because the backup size that I would have ordered of this dress was unavailable but it fit perfectly. The weight of the fabric and its velvety texture playing with the light made it super forgiving. I got quite a bit of compliments and I loved the way I felt in it: comfortable yet chic. Just a heads up, though, that soft velvet means people on their 2nd or 3rd drinks may want to stroke your sleeves and whatnot. Everyone kept saying, "oh my God, this is so soft!". You've been warned haha!

links_Review_Title: I wore this dress to 3 events!
links_Review_Text: It was so comfortable and elegant. I received multiple compliments and I felt beautiful wearing it. I nearly bought it!

I didn't end up wearing this, but it fit super well. It's a stretchy, thick material that is easy to wear with or without a bra (I'm a D cup and would have gone without - it's thick enough!). The material is a slate gray with a little bit of glimmery shine to it. I ordered a 2 and 4, my typical sizes, and the 2 was just a little tight (but wearable), and the 4 was great. Super warm, lots of coverage, very easy to wear. I can't seem to add my profile, so I'll let you know I'm 5'6", 135lb, 32D, hourglass, long torso. I usually wear sizes 2-6.
Big in the waist

links_Review_Title: I LOVED this dress, beautiful and flattering
links_Review_Text: I loved this dress, but unfortunately could not wear it because my son got the Flu and we had to cancel! I will rent this next year! I love RTR

links_Review_Title: Annual holiday party with friends at a country club so black tie.
links_Review_Text: Outfit was super comfortable all night and stayed put. Loved it and would wear again. Thought I was in the 14 (spare) but wore the 16. Probably could have worn the 14 as well but may have been a little less stay put in the chest.
This was a backpack dress for a winter wedding. Didn't get to wear it but the fit was perfect. It would have been amazing if my first choice hadn't turned out to be incredible.

links_Review_Title: Great dress for formal winter event
links_Review_Text: Awesome dress, fit well and hugged in all the right places
I wore this to a work holiday party and got so many compliments! Fitted and elegant, not too tight.

This dress was perfection. I wore this to a formal wedding in the winter. Not too revealing and you could barely see my baby bump with the gathered velvet. Very flattering. I would rent it down a size if I wasn't pregnant.

Didn't end up wearing this one although it was a nice dress. The material would have been a bit too hot for a party where you're dancing around, especially since you can't really pull the sleeves up at all.
This dress is the right amount of everything -- sexy but still classy. I'm 5'4" 127 lbs and the 2 fit perfectly.

links_Review_Title: Fits perfectly very flattering for second trimester
links_Review_Text: This dress was a perfect fit for me deep into my second trimester. I am normally a 10/12, the 14 fit perfectly and was super comfy. It gave me a flattering silhouette and got lots of compliments
I loved this dress. It was very comfortable and worked well at an event where some people were more dressed up than others.

links_Review_Title: First time RTR and I'm impressed!
links_Review_Text: This is a great dress! I wore it to a holiday party/concert and it was perfect. Very flattering and elegant - plus it is comfortable!
This dress fits TTS but is also loose enough to hide any imperfections. Very flattering and super comfortable!

links_Review_Title: Lots of compliments on this dress!
links_Review_Text: Could have definitely worn a size 14 but was out of stock. Comfortable, warm and super cute for a holiday party. Needed some wardrobe tape to keep from seeing the girls. Would absolutely rent again!

links_Review_Title: wore this to a holiday party!
links_Review_Text: I got a lot of compliments on this dress. i was at a winter holiday party, so the long sleeves and velvet material kept me cozy all night. The color and neckline are stunning, and the faux wrap is flattering. I did find the bottom of the dress to run a touch small, especially if you are like me and are wide in the hips. The dress does have some stretch, but i found myself having to pull the dress down as the night went on, and it caused a small amount of stretch that was a bit unflattering. It fit perfectly on the top, which makes me think it runs a bit small, given my smaller chest. I would rent it again.

Everything was perfect from the 'v' neckline to the length of the sleeves to the length of the dress. Hit at my knees, lush feeling, ruching was super pretty but not tight. Grey for sure, but could look green or blue in certain lighting. Received so many compliments!

links_Review_Title: Among very well dressed men and women in an amazing setting, I fit right in!
links_Review_Text: Friends had noticed I had “upped my game” with this dress, which was also very comfortable. A rare combination of comfortable and chic!

This velvet dress has the perfect necklace! Not too open or too closed! Felt comfortable in this dress as it was the perfect length, formed to my body but not tight! Color was beautiful and went with a pair of sparkling heels! No jewelry needed except for some earrings! Would rent this dress again!

links_Review_Title: I loved how the fabric changed color in different light!
links_Review_Text: I got this dress for a corporate Holiday Party. It fit very nicely, was very flattering and was super comfortable. The length was conservative, definitely to the knee.

I chose this as my backup dress so I didn't actually wear it. It's a pretty dress and very comfortable, not too low cut and just the right length. It would be great for a winter party or if you are worried about being cold. I was happy that I could have worn all 3 dresses that I received.

Fit like a glove, flattered my pear shaped frame, soft and yummy fabric! I wore it to a Christmas luncheon and the shimmer of the velvet worked with the occasion perfectly. I'm buying this dress to wear over and over again!

links_Review_Title: I got many compliments on this dress.
links_Review_Text: This fit perfectly. The lining, together with the drape effect are very figure flattering. Very easy to move in, as well...I hate tight clothes! This felt like I was wearing pajamas.

links_Review_Title: Different take on a work dress
links_Review_Text: Luxurious fabric and flattering cut. My teammates loved this rent.
Super flattering and comfy- great for vacation. The fabric was thick, but comfy as long as it's not a million degrees out.
Great dress, I have a large chest and it was a little snug but still worked great!

I love this dress. The print and color is gorgeous, the cut is flatter, the material is comfy, and it has pockets! It's not the lightest fabric so temps that leave you sweating in the shade won't be great. It's was a tiny bit tight in the bust, but not unbearable.

links_Review_Title: I loved the unique design and comfort!
links_Review_Text: I wore it to vacation to Puerto Rico. I have broad shoulders and gained a bit of weight lately, so size 2 was a bit tight but I think it was a perfect fit. It was cute, unique and looked good under the sun! I really liked the dress and am considering buying it!
Compliments from men and women alike - this dress was a hit! Flattering and comfortable. I highly recommend.
Great dress that's comfy and got loads of compliments. It was very tight across the bust for me, but plenty generous elsewhere.

links_Review_Title: A stranger literally pulled her car over to tell me how great I looked. GET THE DRESS.
links_Review_Text: I've been an Unlimited member for two years now and this is my favorite daytime rental to date. As a busty gal, it's hard to find flattering options that are draped up top and this dress finds a way to have the trend and not be a tent. The peek of fitted waist is glorious. Also, POCKETS for days, breathable fabric, radiant color, and East wear all collide for my wishlist item.
Loved the fun print and the popover detail. Nice and sturdy fabric. Wore well for hours without easily wrinkling. Total winner!!
Such a pretty print, quality fabric & great fit! Compliments all day long, can't wait to rent again and explore what else RTR has from this designer.

It took me a while to find an occasion for this dress but I'm glad I had it for a while. It's comfy and fun and great for summer! Fit really well and felt special even for a casual occasion. Huge pockets so you don't have to bring a bag!

links_Review_Title: Super cute - modern and retro at the same time!
links_Review_Text: Loved it. Exactly what I wanted. I don't like skinny strap sundresses so this was an awesome alternative. I was nervous to wear bright yellow but the color and pattern were gorgeous and wearable.

links_Review_Title: Perfect spring/summer dress for under 80 F weather
links_Review_Text: Love the midi skirt and crop style. Amazing colors. Thick fabric so not ideal for overly warm weather but perfect for indoor AC wear. Zipper isn't super oily and seems uncomfortable but sits high enough on back to be okay.

So many compliments on this dress including the color, the print, and the fit. And it has pockets! I usually wear a 4, but the 2 fit perfectly. The fabric is heavier, but it was perfect for an outdoor rehearsal dinner in June. I would buy this one if I could!

Rent this now! I have never received so many complements. So comfortable and incredibly easy to move and eat in! Normally an 8-10 but a 10-12 for RTR items and the 10 fit perfectly! Love love love this dress and pockets!

Overall the dress is a dream! The colors are vibrant and the print is so cute. I received tons of compliments! The only down side is the fabric is thick so it got a bit warm on an 80 degree day. It also accentuated my hips and made the saddlebags bigger :(

links_Review_Title: Absolutely loved the style for a casual day of outdoor fun!!!
links_Review_Text: So fun!!

links_Review_Title: This is my favorite thing I have rented thus far. It was actually hard to give it back!
links_Review_Text: The dress fit perfectly, and the fabric was nice and thick, but the color and cut made sure it didn't feel too heavy.

links_Review_Title: The women's version of Tommy Bahama but like, cool.
links_Review_Text: Looking for a cute summer dress to wear to a concert with your dad, work, or a daytime charity event? This is your dress! For real though, as someone with an apple shaped belly, this actually gave me the illusion of a waist and even though I'm short it hit at the perfect spot for a midi. Definitely check this one out if you like piña coladas, and dancing in the rain.

links_Review_Title: This dress is why I RTR
links_Review_Text: This dress is adorable - the print is amazing and was a perfect late summer dress. I would never buy such a busy print or try such an unusual shape. This is exactly why I love RTR!
Fun dress with an interesting shape and pattern. Fabric is very heavy, so probably not great for hot summer weather.
Loved this dress, very flattering and comfortable to wear. Only con is that the fabric is a little bit on the heavier side, so it's not the best for warm weather. But adorable on!
The length was great even with my 5'2" frame. Paired with a small block heel. It was a bit tight in the armpits but fit everywhere else.
The beautiful yellow, heavy-yet-cool material, and forgiving cut make this a great dress for work. I also wore it to a garden party. Helps you look great and feel great. Great designer!
Wow... I love this dress! It is so beautiful and the fit is incredibly flattering. I don't know how I'm going to send it back ... going to have to buy it! I love it too much!
Loved this dress. It was super comfy and easy to wear. I got a ton of compliments.
#beachfun #maraika

TTS BUT The straps are incredibly long and not adjustable which I've noticed with several maxi dresses from this designer. Note I am 5'9 and have a long chest/torso. Used a safety pin to pull the straps together on the back and topped it off with a white denim Jack for dinner on vacation and black leather jacket for dinner in the city. As shown, this doesn't touch the floor. Shiny but not silky material with a slight pattern.
It's a beautiful easy dress. The only thing is the strap is way too long. I had pinned about 4-5" in the back to prevent my nipple from showing

A lot of reviews mention that the straps are long on this dress. While yes they are long, the back of the dress is also low, so I didn't feel the straps were TOO long, more like just perfect (granted I am a bit tall). Note on the low back - you can't wear a bra, other than a stick on one without it showing in the back. Had no issues with a stick on bra though. I would definitely rent this dress again for work or for vacation!
It was so flowy and gorgeous. The fabric is so soft and the color is not something i would normally wear but looked great with my beachy glow :)

links_Review_Title: It was very comfy, lots of compliments
links_Review_Text: Great fit and color

This dress is so bright and fun and the material is so soft I loved it. It does run slightly big specially in the straps, I am very tall and I felt as if I could've used an adjuster to tighten the straps a bit.
The dress is very beautiful. Straps are too long, like other reviews but if you can make it work- it is a stunner.
Great color.

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous color and cut, long straps
links_Review_Text: I loved the fabric of this dress. Was a beautiful color and soft luxurious fabric. As others have said, the straps are very long. I had a little tropical silk scarf that I tied around the straps in the back. I'm 5'3" and with the straps pulled together in the back, this just hit the ground with flats on, but not too long to walk.

links_Review_Title: The dress was overall too big to wear.
links_Review_Text: The dress runs large. I usually wear an S and it fits like a large. The straps are also super long so it fit really low on me. I wasn't able to wear it unfortunately because you can't adjust the straps.
Didn't wear this as it was too large - beautiful dress so I'll try to size down than recommended
Way too big and straps way too long

links_Review_Title: Wore to a stepped up casual welcome party for a gorgeous wedding on the Sonoma Coast.
links_Review_Text: Long straps, but with a safety pin it worked out perfectly. Super beautiful bright yellow! Love.
This was awful. I've been doing unlimited for about six months and usually love most things. This was like a big shapeless awful yellow mess.
Fit well except for the top. Straps were way too long
Not very form fitting.

This dress itself is beautiful and I so wanted it to work BUT the body of the dress fit perfectly while my poor boobs were squished like pancakes AND the straps, which are not adjustable, kept falling down. I could not wear this rental :(
Its cute

links_Review_Title: Not for pear shape or hourglass
links_Review_Text: There is no stretch or tailoring. Unless you've got an inverted triangle or banana body type, I would stay away. Color and fabric are nice though.

The color of this dress is AMAZING. I feel like this brand often runs huge but found this to be true to size. The straps are EXTREMELY long and not adjustable - the dress hung so low you could see all the way to my bra line. I improvised with a safety pin and pinned the straps together in the back and it worked great and had a flattering shape!
The straps are too long. Otherwise, beautiful dress.

links_Review_Title: Loved this dress. Sexy yet sophisticated. Comfortable to wear.
links_Review_Text: Fit perfectly.

links_Review_Title: The dress flattered everything I wanted it to.
This dress was a show stopper
links_Review_Text: Wore this dress for fall/winter wedding and it was beautiful. Love the asymmetrical cut and long sleeves. The top was tight enough I never felt like I was going to fall out. Was snug around the ribs, but the 8 was a perfect fit. Would absolutely rent again!
