Love this dress! I wore it to a NYE wedding in Chicago, and the fabric and long sleeves were great for the cold night. The shoulder pads give the dress a great silhouette along with the asymmetrical skirt, and the deep green color is gorgeous (doesn't show well in pictures, though!). I was originally going to wear with sheer black tights and black pumps, but because the green is so dark, I opted for gold heels. I'm very small chested, so the deep V wasn't scandalous and I didn't need tape to keep things in place. I'm also very petite and the size 0 fit me perfectly, so it may run slightly small for some. I'd rent this again for another winter party.
This dress was perfect! It runs a little small so I would recommend a back up size. Low cut but in a flattering way.

links_Review_Title: Have a moment with this dress
links_Review_Text: Like most reviews, the dress runs small I would size up one size. Really great dress no fashion tape needed for small chested gals, just pasties.

The dress was beautiful and fit very well. As advertised it is low and wide cut. You have to have some good tape. I added a lacy cami, because it was for my husband's work event and I needed a bit more coverage.

Loved this dress. I know people have said it runs small but I felt like it ran pretty true to size. I chose the side 4 over the size 6 in order to fit my waist and bust, so it was a little tight on the bottom but that's to be expected. I received lots of compliments throughout the night and also danced a lot.
Deep v neckline did not require dress tape, the sleeves are unique and help to slim the waistline creating an hourglass shape, the skirt is roomy enough to sit and eat!
Loved this dress. It was a little small in the bust area post baby, but fashion tape helped.
Love this dress so much! Ordered a 0 and a 2 but the 0 only shipped so had to make it work. I have a larger chest so it was a little scandalous for a wedding but it was so fun!
Dope dress. I felt great. Color was gorg. A little short in front but nothing a strategically placed clutch or napkin couldn't fix

I was so excited about this dress and really actually loved it. Unfortunately, it was a bit too booby for the event I was needing it for. But if you want to show off your girls - this is a super flattering dress!

Rented this dress for my birthday in NYC. My husband surprised me with Hamilton tickets so this was the perfect theater dress! It is definitely short in front for tall girls, but longer in the back. I wore a regular black bra underneath for nice cleavage - if you don't want any bra to show, make sure you have a plunging one as mine showed a little but was barely noticeable with the dark colors. I highly recommend this dress - I felt so sexy and sophisticated!

love, love, love. I wore this for a night out in Vegas and received so many compliments. I'm in between a B and C cup, size 36 and felt it was just sexy enough without putting the girls on full display. Not only was it classy and sexy but also really comfortable to wear. I'd absolutely wear this again! Pro tip: use Sparthos Kinesiology Tape to give the girls some perk and hold them in place. Worked like a charm!!

links_Review_Title: Made my ex jealous - did it's job!
links_Review_Text: Beautiful cut that flatters any shape - long sleeves with a deep plunging neckline looks sophisticated and sexy at the same time. For people with larger chests: there isn't much support in the fabric of the dress, though it is thick enough to wear without a bra. I did the Kim K tape trick so I did not end up spending the night panicking about everything staying in place.

Love, love, love this dress and would definitely rent again. Highly recommend fashion tape shapes, used the trapezoid shapes above the breasts and curve below. Tape held throughout a night of dancing without incident. Also used the breast lift tape with this dress as well. There is a slip underneath the asymmetrical slit in the front. The wind caught this a few times so would use tape here if you’re planning to be outdoors for an extended period. The length was a little short for my preference, it was fine standing but definitely had to be mindful of how I was positioning my self when sitting/standing.

links_Review_Title: Housewife Worthy! This dress is sexy and sophisticated. Dorinda from NYC Housewives loved it!
links_Review_Text: There are only two cons to this dress. One it runs small. I am normally an 8 or 10, and with this dress, I wore a 12. Two it is short. Other than that I love this dress. When I stood on stage to take pictures with the Bravolebrities I felt beautiful. My favorite part of the dress is the shade of forest green!
This dress fit me so well. I felt great and the material kept me warmer in the colder months. I loved having long sleeves.

This has been my favorite dress I've rented on RTR. I wore this to my engagement party. Size 2, my measurements are 32-27-35. I am very pale and the green looked lovely on my skin (not easy to find a flattering color for us Irish girls). The neckline was sexy but not scandalous. I felt sexy, chic, and like a model. I honestly don't have a con for this dress and I'm very honest in my reviews.
Fits true to size. Beautiful dress.

links_Review_Title: Perfect for Girls Night in Chicago
links_Review_Text: The 4 was perfect, it was a little tight in the thighs. I wanted to wear the 6 for more room, but the zipper kept getting stuck at the waist seam and the small shoulder pads were missing.
It's definitely a bold deep V, but I got a ton of compliments. I would recommend some bust tape

links_Review_Title: Wore this dress for my white coat ceremony!
links_Review_Text: The dress was super low cut at first but double sided sticky tape worked very well! Once that detail was worked out, the dress was a perfect choice for the event. Very light weight material and the green perfectly matched the picture.

links_Review_Title: First time I've felt since sexy since having my baby..
links_Review_Text: The fit was very flattering. Definitely not for the well endowed, if you know what I mean...I'm a C cup and barely got away without it looking obscene. I would wear it again! #workparty #bmas

Absolutely flattering dress. It's a tight dress that isn't so tight you feel like you're a sausage! The wide shoulders create an illusion of a smaller waist. The layering of the material hides your midsection and the length is short but not offensive. One watch out is the deep v; I used fashion tape to ensure I did not have a nip slip! I got so many compliments and felt incredibly sexy!

I absolutely loved this dress. All the reviews cautioned that the dress ran quite small, but for smaller chested ladies like myself that might not be the case? I ordered my usual size 2 and a 4 for backup; the 2 fit perfect. I wore this dress to a charity event, got a ton of compliments and my husband loved it. Most importantly though, I felt gorgeous in it! One word of caution, fashion tape is necessary to prevent any side boob from showing.
This dress was so great, I even want to rent it again. Stunning and received so many comments.
The only issue I had with this dress is that it’s a little snug in the waist. Other than that, great fit, surprisingly comfortable, super sexy but still sophisticated. Love it!!

links_Review_Title: Perfect dress for my “swanky, Vegas themed” fundraiser!
links_Review_Text: Little snug through the middle on this mom bod. Size up! Very sexy little number. Got tons and tons of compliments!!

links_Review_Title: This dress was perfect for a night out in Vegas.
links_Review_Text: It's very boob-y so be sure to wear nipple covers

This dress is HOT! Reallllly low cut so tape is necessary. Rented a 0 and 2 and the 0 fit best. Wasn't sure if I'd like the shoulder pads but it really makes the dress. And the color is very chic! I didn't end up wearing because of the low cut and my event being a work party...but I can't wait to rent this again for a non work event!

links_Review_Title: I wore this for my birthday dinner in New York. It’s a great dress!
links_Review_Text: Very flattering and comfortable, I felt confident in this dress. Great design and nice material.
Love love this dress!!

I wore this on a night out in Vegas and I loved it! I got a lot of compliments. It felt very short but the outer skirt made me feel covered up. It was a little small on me but still comfortable! I wish I could've kept it!

This dress was a great find. I'm quite tall, so finding sleeved dresses that are long enough is a big win. Only complaint is that it ran a bit small. I'm between a 6 and 8 typically, and the 8 I wore was snug. But overall, I loved the look and got tons of compliments.

This is a great dress, it fit really well and was the perfect level of being sexy without being too much! The 2 came with shoulder pads, but the 0 did not. The shoulder pads were fun, but the dress was a touch too big. I got so many compliments, and would definitely rent this again!!

I wore this for my husband's work Christmas party. Other reviews said that this dress ran small, however, I found the dress to be true to size. I have a small chest and this may make the difference in opinions. I ordered sizes 4 and 6 and I wore the size 4, I am 5'3" and 125lbs. I wore KT body tape on my boobs and I felt secure all night. I felt that the dress actually stretched a bit throughout the evening and had I worn the size 6, this could have been a problem in the chest area. The only thing that bothered me the most is that the color of the dress is so dark that it looked black in every picture and I really wanted the green to be more noticeable. This dress was very comfortable and I definitely recommend it!

links_Review_Title: I wore this dress to my best friend's rehearsal dinner on new year's eve eve!
links_Review_Text: This dress fit like a glove. It was a bit long in the arms, but the split wrist made it feel like it was supposed to be that way. I wish i had worn the dress with black tights and thigh-high flat boots (it was freezing) but it went very well with these chunky black pumps as well! I loved this dress so much I'd buy it in a second! I'm 5'4" and 110lbs with a very long torso and short legs. the 0 was a teeny bit short in the butt, but fit perfectly otherwise!

links_Review_Title: Will make you feel amazing! Sophisticated and Sexy
links_Review_Text: Y'all...this dress was perfect for a winter wedding!! Many compliments all evening with this beauty! If you want a sophisticated dress with a flare of sexiness, rent this dress! You won't be disappointed.
Just a dream. Skims curves without being stiff. Feels amazing, comfortable and hot af. Got a ton of complements. I would buy this is the discount was better.

links_Review_Title: I thought it would be impossible for me to live Universal Standard more...
links_Review_Text: I was wrong. This dress. It arrived last night. I wore it to happy hour right out of the RTR bag, over a thin, long sleeved tee and jeans. Then, I wore it over a tank for a stay at home queer-femme-get-it-done day in, followed by over jeans and under a polka dot cardigan to run errands. US sizing is tricky for me. I'm usually a XS, sometimes a S when I want more wiggle room. I rented this in S but probably should have trusted that skimming meant skimming and sized down to a XS.

Rented with my unlimited to wear to work. Wore it with a turtleneck underneath and booties. Very cute concept. Fit was a little funny by the pockets but I did get compliments and it was very comfortable. A good unlimited rental.

links_Review_Title: Don't be fooled by the size-runs really big!
links_Review_Text: I'm usually a L/12 and this sizing is a bit weird. I went with the XS and it was HUGE! I probably could have gone down 2 sizes. It was also a bit long and hit at an unflattering length for me.

I wore this for a concert and felt like the colors stood out and the cut was very flattering. It was light and lovely. Was a little long for me at 5'3 and in heels I kept tripping over the hem. Love this dress though!

This dress was very long. I'm 190 and 5.3. This dress would probably work better on someone who is at least 5,6. I had to wear major heels so it didn't drag on the ground. Personally it was a little too much pink for me. The dress is kind of hot. I had a lunch tea outside and was sweating. The straps slide down easily too
Wore this to a rehearsal lunch in Disney World. The dress was perfect, good fabric, good color, and very comfortable. Definitely recommend for a warm weather day time event
Little long and the color is very loud, little brighter in person than pics. But true to size, comfortable and easy to wear.

Overall fit was great - having the built in bra pads was so convenient. I am not hugely blessed in that area (34B) so it was loose in the chest., and the length was a bit long on me (5'6"). If I let it I would've had the chest and length taken in - but it was perfect for one night on the beach!

links_Review_Title: Much needed R &R with my husband.
links_Review_Text: Perfect for a vacation getaway. I loved the color and style. The bust was small so I had to keep the back slightly unzipped. My hair was long enough to cover the unzipped part, so I didn't mind.
A smidge too long at 5'4'' but I made it work. Be prepared it is a bit low cut.
bright bright bright! perfect for a hot tropical day. long enough without dragging on the floor or having to trip over. it's a true fuschia / bright pink.

This dress is so fun! I wore it outside- in August in Texas and I was relieved that it was very light and breezy! I have a large chest so there was some cleavage, but on the bright side I did not have to wear a bra because of the adjustable straps. Would rent again!

I'm 5'8 and fit between a size 10R and 12R. This dress is the perfect floor length item and with a small heel, its floats just above the ground. The adjustable straps are also a bonus. I thought the color might be a bit loud (it truly is hot pink), but I wore it to a wedding over Labor Day and got tons of compliments! Highly recommend.
Nice dress for beach vacation. Flowing and nice. It was a bit long.
This dress is lightweight for hot summer night, but thick enough to lay and flow nicely. Works perfectly with a strapless bra. Might even keep this one, but will definitely rent this again!
I'm just under 5'3" and with 3" Soludos this is still dragging on the ground. I appreciate the built in bra padding and adjustable straps. I might have to buy this and get it hemmed.

Fits true to size, was super bright and fun. I wore it out for a date night on MV and people were stopping and complimenting me all night long. My husband told me I needed to buy it! Would rent again or buy!
Wore to a wedding - it's a bit long but thankfully the straps are adjustable !

links_Review_Title: Very comfy, didn't wear a bra, bright color
links_Review_Text: Wore to a rehearsal dinner in Key West. Definitely recommend it!
This dress was great for a South Carolina vacation! It was very comfortable and perfect for a nice dinner out.

links_Review_Title: A Special Dress! The bright pink patterned colors made this a stand out for this beach event.
links_Review_Text: The light flowy fabric made this the perfect occasion dress. Many compliments all day long came my way. It was a stand out in the crowd and I felt like I wore the perfect dress!
Wore this to a bar on a boat, felt beautiful!
I'm 5'7" and the dress was just the right length with sandals. It's a little heavier than I expected. Beautiful colors- vibrant for vacation!
I loved this dress. I am 5'8 and the regular length fit me perfectly. The dress is very comfortable and I didn't have to wear a bra. I received lots of compliments.

I love the color of this dress. It's so bright and fun. I wore this on Mother's Day. The fit of the dress was perfect, although I tightened the movable straps a little too much to try and hide my bra and then the shoulder area was uncomfortable. I should have not worn a bra because it does have cups and looks good. I just felt it was a little revealing for church. This would be a perfect beach dress!
I love love love this dress. I'm 5'4 and wore 4" wedges and it was perfect. Flows and colors are beautiful

Super comfortable dress. Wore to a semi-formal spring wedding and it looked great. The fabric is a little more formal than cotton, so I could dress it up a little more than a typical maxi. I'm 5'7" and it was a little long, even with about 3" heels, so careful the tripping hazard. LOVED it!
TTS. Beautiful color. Cool ruffle details on the skirt. I am busty and the 8R fit well

links_Review_Title: Loved it! Was the perfect Easter Sunday Brunch outfit!
links_Review_Text: It's long, so wear heels. I wish it had pockets
Loved this dress for vacation with my family!

I rented this dress for my baby shower. I had to size up because of my belly but overall it fits true to size. Colors are beautiful, very bright. A little tight in chest area. Would highly recommend this gorgeous dress for any event!
Runs a big large and long for petite
Excellent
Perfect length. I'm 5'6 and 3/4 . Wore with sandals. Didn't wear a bra woohoo 36C

links_Review_Title: Super Cute and Easy to Wear
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress. It was super cute and forgiving in the stomach area for party snacking. Loved the super vibrant colors too. I got so many compliments!!
Supportive enough to wear without a bra - always a plus! It complemented my daughters Lilly Pulitzer dress perfectly. I'd love to own this one!

links_Review_Title: Bright and sunny classic Lilly Pulitzer.
links_Review_Text: This is a super easy vacation dress. It is fully lined, true to size and doesn't wrinkle at all so perfect for packing. It's bright and noticable your quick essential Lilly dress!

Perfect for vacation! The pattern is very bright but I loved the color in a vacation setting and the dress is comfortable. Loved the padded cups as well to add support. Material is heavier than expected but good quality. Dress is LONG! I'm 5'8" and had to wear a block heel so it wasn't dragging on the floor.

I had a lot of compliments on this dress!! Pros: built in bra, bright colors, fantastic fit for small chest (I'm an A cup), perfect for resort dinner, tropical vacation Cons: very very long, had to wear a high wedge and it still was dragging on the floor (I'm 5'5") Sort of snug around my ribs, but made a decent fit

Dress fit great. True to size. Nice bra padding built in so no bra needed. It's long, so dragged for me (I'm 5'3")- would be good in anyone a few inches taller. Need heals. Fun. The pink is super bright- more so than in the picture. Typically LP.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful vibrant dress for a day event!
links_Review_Text: I rented this for my best friends baby shower. The dress was a hit, i got tons of complements. I am 5'6 and with wedges the dress was just long enough. I love the lightness and comfort of it. I would definitely recommend it, and i would consider renting again :)

links_Review_Title: My second rental of this dress
links_Review_Text: I rented this for the Steeplechase that was cancelled due to COVID-19. This would have been my second year wearing this dress in a different color. It fits true to size, isn't too long (I'm 5'10 and it barely hits the top of my shoe), and it's very comfortable. Recommend!

This dress is very fun and flattering. Even though it is long, it could be worn either for a formal event or a more casual vacation dinner look. The top has a light padding which makes it very comfortable!

links_Review_Title: Tight Around Waist One Shoulder Blue
links_Review_Text: Love the fabric and overall sexy look of this top. It fit perfectly while standing, but once I sat down and my stomach expanded, it felt really tight around the waist. I normally wear size 4, but upped the size to 6 after other reviews, but still tight around the waist while sitting.

links_Review_Title: So many compliments... but 2 sizes too small!
links_Review_Text: Loved this! But... I normally wear a 4--I ordered the 6 based on other comments and I actually could have used an 8.

Beautiful blue top with side zip and sash. Very fitted yet true to size. Material is top quality, and the tags were still on when it arrived - felt very rich and elegant. Perfect with skinny black pants for a night out or fun brunch!

links_Review_Title: Runs very small but beautiful shirt!

links_Review_Text: I wore this on dates and to go out. I usually wear a 12 but sized up per other reviews and it fit fine. Loved the curve enhancing peplum flair and felt super sexy wore it with bronze metallic leggings and pumps and red lipstick and a fur coat. Looked fab everywhere I went
Loved this color! Fits true to size, wore for a daytime wine tasting and got lots of compliments
The was sent when my original item wasn't available to ship. I wear a large or a 10/12 and couldn't even get the 14 on to wear it. Disappointing

links_Review_Title: I couldn't get it over my shoulders. Way too small/tight.
links_Review_Text: No go.

I read the reviews to size up so I ordered an 8 (usually a 6). I received the top and I was very excited BUT it didn't fit. I needed it for a trip so I read the reviews again and some said to size up 2-3 sizes so I ordered a 10. It was HUGE!!! There is no gradual size up...it's either too small or too big. So sad to because it was such a pretty top.

I am normally a 4 or 6 and I couldn't not get the 6 zipped . The fabric does not have any stretch to it. It is was a very pretty color and good quality. I may size up a couple sizes and try it again.!
Gorgeous and great quality but runs small. Unfortunately I had to return it without wearing it.

links_Review_Title: I ordered the top for a cocktail event but didn't wear it.
links_Review_Text: It was a cute top but I didn't wear it. Normally I'm a size 4, but based on the reviews, I ordered one size up. The bust, shoulder and sleeve length fit fine (without a bra). The waist was very narrow and the peplum did nothing to hide my tummy. Returned it the following day.
Beautiful material, color and cool design but I thought it ran large in the chest.
This is a really cute top, but be aware that it runs at least one size small. I typically wear a 0-2 and a 32C. The 4 fit me but was very tight.
In the waist, peplum section it was a bit tight, so that if you sat it would roll-up. I would recommend sizing-up. I can't wait to get this in 1-size up.

links_Review_Title: Felt great in this beautiful top - if you can wear different sizes (i.e. 6 and 8) recommend the 8.
links_Review_Text: I wore this to a festive party to ring in the holiday season and received too many compliments to count. Paired it with black pants and Jimmy Choo silver sparkle heals. Absolutely lovely!
I loved this asymmetrical peplum top. It was a bit complicated to put on, but lovely. Runs small in the ribcage, I could've tried a larger size.

links_Review_Title: Great color and fabric. The fit is on the small side.
links_Review_Text: I went up a size (normally a 2, ordered 4). It fit, but I might have preferred a little more room. The side showed a little bit of skin around my waist when I moved. I've had a couple babies, so that's not an area I like to flaunt. But overall, it was a good rental experience.
runs a little small , peplum look is very flattering
See my size 20 review. I'm glad I ordered up bc I could not zip the 18 even thought I could get them to close when my arm was down.
Loved how this it was but it was way too tight do didn't get to wear it. But he too was beautiful.
Very attractive, soft material, structured top. Fits tightly in waist for hourglass look.
VERY FLATERING
I loved the feel of the fabric on the blouse but it definitely runs really small. Not great for a large bust.
Gorgeous top. Beautiful cut, material and tailoring. Runs a bit small so size up one size. Loved it!
Beautiful top! I didn't end up wearing it because the sleeve was a little tight.

I rented this as a size 4 to begin with RTR's recommendation. However the sleeve and waist under the bust was too small. I ordered a size six with the hopes that it would fit. It also was returned due to the waist under the bust being too small but the bust was too big. The sleeve fit well on the size six however. Both of these garments had been delivered to me with tags on. I returned them with tags on. It was a shame because the design was a beautiful one, the execution was flawed.

I attended a 50th birthday party in Miami . This dress was perfect. I am pear shaped ( bigger on bottom than top). This dress was very flattering. I also tried the large but it was too big on top. If you are cleavage conservative you will need to wear a bandeau.

links_Review_Title: Great dress for fancy vacation dinner
links_Review_Text: This is a beautiful dress, but the fit wasn't great on me. They only had an XS available so I went with it... should have gotten a S or even M. The top barely covered my small top, and the slit created from the wrap exposed EVERYTHING with one gust of wind. I'm usually ok with XS in wrap dresses, but this one didn't wrap around very far and was all around too small on me. I was tugging and adjusting all through dinner so my boobs didn't fall out. Still, the dress is very silky and flowy, the print is fun, and the quality is high.

You will need fashion tape and safety pins with this dress unless you want to be revealing. Pattern is great and dress is light and flowy, although it does have a train to it so if your short it will drag. I'm 5'1 and wore 4 inch heals and it was still dragging, but I didn't mind that. I got tons of complement wearing it.

I loved the fabric and drape of this dress but the other reviews are correct - it gapes a lot at the bust. Also I'm 5'7" and even in heeled boots it lightly swept the ground. I wore it 26 weeks pregnant and it covered my bump well, but you might want to size up bc of the bust issue. I wore a cardigan so that I didn't have to worry about it.

This dress has a gorgeous jungle inspired print with exotic snakes woven throughout the pattern. It was a hit on my honeymoon in Fiji and also for right into the well dressed crowds of Sydney. I wore with a full length slip for modesty since the top tends to gale and the bottom also shows a LOT of leg. I wore this dress several times and was a little sad to part with it. It was a bit long on my 5'9" 175 lb frame, so not idea for shorter ladies. I had to wear heels.

Pros: A silky beautiful fabric! Unique print that was eye catching. Received tons of compliments! Cons: I definitely needed to use double sided tape to keep the front from showing too much and the slit would sometimes open too wide in the breeze. Needed to wear heels due to its length.

links_Review_Title: Amazing dress that's flattering on any body type!!!
links_Review_Text: This dress was spectacular and super comfortable! I received SO many compliments and the color/pattern was really unique. It was SUPER long even in my tallest YSL tribute pumps, it was skimming the floor. I also had to fashion tape down the boobs as those were a little looser than I liked ... but once the girls were taped down, i was very comfortable! I would wear this again to a formal or informal event and it would be flattering on any body type!!! Enjoy!!!

I cannot tell you how much I love this dress. It is a little long for the shorter ladies, but it wrapped beautifully and I got all the compliments. The fabric was soft like butter. Such a fan! Will rent again when it's warm :)

links_Review_Title: Great flowy style, perfect for my vacation!
links_Review_Text: For was good ... true to size to too big. But wrap style allows for great adjustments.

links_Review_Title: The fabric is smooth and soft and silky. The dress flows beautifully and the pattern is gorgeous
links_Review_Text: Great fabric, flattering fit. I am very hippy and can wear this dress comfortably. Pattern is gorgeous with hidden animal scents on it

I LOVED wearing this dress for a tropical/glam wedding. I chose the medium because it gave me the right amount of bust coverage. I used fashion tape to avoid feeling exposed, which worked perfectly and would recommend. I was completely comfortable the entire night and received many compliments. The pattern is so fun - this was definitely one of my favorite dresses I've rented so far!

links_Review_Title: Exotic and fun dress that will certainly turn heads!
links_Review_Text: Beautiful fabric and print. I loved how soft and flowy it was. It was a little difficult to tie/ secure in the front, you have to play with the ties a bit to find the right adjustment. It required two safety pins in the bust area for me to feel comfortable wearing it but that was just personal preference. I usually wear a size 4 but required an XS in this dress. Overall, I was very pleased with the turn out of this dress at a formal wedding. Would certainly recommend!

Being a wrap dress, it was extremely comfortable and had a flexible fit. It's very flowy and a silk material. I got a ton of compliments and felt so pretty all night. I will either be buying this dress or renting it again.

links_Review_Title: The print on the fabric is phenomenal
links_Review_Text: The slit from the wrap is just sexy enough. Your leg peeks through when you walk and the skirt floats as you move. I felt like I was in a perfume add every time I walked down stairs. Heads up I'm 5'11" and I was in 3" heels and the hem brushed the ground in the back. A normal height human would have a train.
Perfect for a beach vacation! Super comfortable, super flattering!

links_Review_Title: AMAZING but so annoying to wear
links_Review_Text: Ughhhh I wanted to love this dress and I did because it's freakin gorgeous and funky and silky and amazing but it's a pain in the buttocks to wear because the top is SO BAGGY like ridiculously so. And yes, I am flat chested, but I think even if I had a lot more up top it would have been the same nipple extravaganza it was for me. I tried tape but that was annoying, so then I turned it around and wore it backwards (an RTR user hack someone posted on another dress from this designer) which mostly solved the nip issue but then led to a new issue which is that anytime I moved the wrong way everyone saw my butt. Cool. No chance of dancing in this thing I'll tell ya that. Ended up changing into a different dress halfway through the wedding so I could dance even though it made me sad bc I love this one so much.

I wore this dress for an outdoor party at my Reunion that is very difficult to dress for -- you want to look nice, but relaxed, fabulous but not too fabulous as yet also stay cool. This flowy silk fabric and wrap-styling made it perfect for the heat and the pattern and sheen of the silk elevated the look from average to audacious. I got lots of compliments! I was worried about the straps but was able to wear my regular bra with no problem!

I was surprised to find this is a TRUE WRAP dress, which is not mentioned in the description at all. Probably helps with fit. But I was fiddling with the chest a lot to make sure I wasn't flashing people all night. Armholes were strangely small for the size of the dress. Wore to a family retirement party on a very hot evening. Dress is very light and breezy and I was very comfortable all evening. Fabric is GORGEOUS- you can't tell from photo but there are snakes and moths and all kids of cool critters in the print. Very silky.

This dress is gorgeous but I guess I didn't look at the fabric in the photo close enough. It has snakes, lizards, and frogs on it. Very bizarre but I wore it anyway. Got some good laughs out of this one.

I absolutely loved this dress and got so many compliments on it after wearing it as a bridesmaid. It's true to size but definitely small on top and needs a strapless bra because it plunges in the back. I loved it but was a little hard finding the right bra.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful gown, a little large in the bust

links_Review_Text: Love the print. The wrap does show some leg but it wasn't really an issue. I also had to be careful my bra wasn't showing.

links_Review_Title: this was a great dress for my sister's wedding!!!
links_Review_Text: the only surprising detail was that it wraps up around your waist, i did end up wearing shorts because the slit was so high, but fun!

links_Review_Title: It looked perfect in Barracoa, Cuba.
links_Review_Text: Fit perfect!

I wore this over a bathing suit and it worked really well. Otherwise it might be tough for smaller chested ladies, and it does blow open pretty easily. That said, the print is fantastic and I loved the feel and weight of the fabric (almost bathing suit like itself).

links_Review_Title: Fabric is beautiful. Feels so good on your skin.
links_Review_Text: Front is very low, plan on some tape or safety pin. I wore this twice on a sunny vacation because it felt so nice and cool on my skin after a day in the sun.

I liked the pattern and material but the dress was way too long for me. I ended up only wearing it around the resort since I had to pick up all the extra material just to walk. I also wasn't a fan of the way it wrapped, since pulling it a particular way could end up pulling apart/revealing the back side completely (luckily I wore shorts underneath).

The dress is a knockout. The pattern is gorgeous, the fabric is silky and rich, and the dress flows behind you when you walk. The fit is tricky, though-On the one hand, this dress runs large in the armholes and the midsection. I wore the smaller backup size, and I'm glad I ordered it! On the other, it is a true wrap dress and it's cut to have a deep neckline, so if you have broad shoulders or a wide ribcage, this dress will be MUCH lower cut on you than it is on the model! I layered a black tube top under the dress, and luckily it looked deliberate.

links_Review_Title: It was awesome for Afrochella and the photo shoot. The photographer loved it!
links_Review_Text: Ran a bit large for my chest, couldn't tie too tight bc it hurt my ribs, lol.

This is a very comfortable and forgiving wrap dress. I felt like a million bucks, and while a lot of ladies may not want snakes and insects on a dress, I loved it and thought it was perfect for a Florida wedding reception..
This dress is stunning! So many compliments on it!

This was worn for a cruise formal night. The color and pattern was very bright and garnered many compliments. While cruising with my family; however, it was a little low cut in the chest despite pinning. My husband had no complaints about that part! Otherwise, would consider sizing down from my usual as it's a wrap dress and had oodles of material left over.

links_Review_Title: v v v cute; can be a little on the sultry side
links_Review_Text: Super fun; there are parrots on cute stuff in the print, very tropical and darling. I wore this a few times; it's comfortable and silky. Very cute and a wrap dress, so it can bee versatile

links_Review_Title: Didn't get to wear the dress.
links_Review_Text: Lovely print and beautiful fabric! I love the dress but unfortunately it runs really large and couldn't wear it.

links_Review_Title: So pretty, but I bit for the insecurely small-chested.
links_Review_Text: I wanted to be able to embrace this dress so much. I loved the fabric and pattern; it had lovely flow and movement. Sadly for me, I'm not confident with my small chest and just felt too exposed. I thought about trying to pair with a cami, but just seemed to throw off the casual tropical elegance. Pattern is definitely unusual, but that made me love it more. Sad to send back without wearing, but I do think the sizing was TTS.
I absolutely LOVED this dress, it was extremely flattering and made me feel like a jungle princess.

Pros: silky and flows material with an amazing print. Cons: Plus sizes are bulkier looking up top. Does not have dainty straps. Does not look like picture. Didn't use because it was not sexy anymore, it's was bulky in my size.

links_Review_Title: Loads of compliments on the cut and pattern.
links_Review_Text: Like some other reviewers, I found the top to run a bit large. Sticky tape held it in place fine. The back of the dress dragged the floor a little bit even in platform sandals. Had the XS been available, I would have gone with that one.

As other reviewers said, this dress is very revealing in the front. I ended up wearing a cute little ivory t-shirt under it. It flows open when you walk so I needed to safety pin it closed. Also, I'm 5'7" and needed to wear 4inch heels so this wouldn't drag on the ground. Lovely dress, just a bit of a hassle.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful pattern but super low cut
links_Review_Text: Gorgeous print but as someone with size 34e, I had to wear a cami underneath to avoid flashing them! It is also very long and at 5ft4, I would have needed to wear very high heels for this not to trail behind me on the ground. So beautiful, but the most practical!
Zipper was a bit tricky up the back but worth the trouble. Came with simple belt which wasn't my favorite so added my own bridal style black sparkle belt (Amazon = $15!).
This worked out well for a formal event, lots of compliments and the two sizes I chose were perfect. I ended up wearing my usual size.
...make sure someone helps you unzip before going to the restroom! Pants were not too long with 3" heel, am 5'3". Lots of compliments, would rent again!

Shoshanna understands and respects women's bodies. Her cuts are always so flattering. This is true to size. Must wear heels. Could wear with a jacket for work. Pockets! The lace detail on the top is heavy/thick. Very flattering. Note: the pants are unlined.

This jumpsuit is adorable and flattering. It fits true to size. Like others have said, it's a little challenging to get on and off due to a sticky zipper (from the lace). If you're going to be peeing a lot, maybe try another jumpsuit.

I wore this to a work dinner for my husband's office 6 weeks post partum and felt amazing. Shoshanna just understands real women's bodies! It fit perfectly and was just right style wise for the occasion. I'll definitely rent this again! My only complaint was the zipper was a bit sticky over the lace so I needed some help to zip up, keep in mind for bathroom breaks! Highly recommend though!
I wore this at Disney for a girls trip. The puffed sleeves are very fun (and perfect for Disney!). It was pretty tight in the chest so difficult to take off, but I loved the look.

links_Review_Title: Didn't fit right and a little too funky
links_Review_Text: I was trying a new style to be a little more fun since I tend to stick to plain and simple clothing. This fabric was beautiful but the top was too big in the chest (I'm smaller chested) and tight on the arms. I put a camisole underneath to feel more comfortable in not flashing anyone but I ended up changing tops before I left the house.

It was so beautiful inloved it! Wish I could buy it! I ordered XL but i think the L or M for me would have been more flattering, since I am pear shaped. Smaller upper body. It is very well made. Luxurious to say the least!

links_Review_Title: Pretty color, better with a fuller chest
links_Review_Text: Didn't end up wearing this - I'm a B cup and felt like it was a bit loose in the chest to be flattering plus the waist was a little wide. Pretty cool, soft velvet feel but maybe would go down a size if you're shorter and it could work - I'm 5'8 and think a smaller size would be too cropped on me.

The side buttons on the side were a bit tough but other than that this is a cute holiday shirt. Needed a tank underneath or else this would have been too much cleavage---Worn with flats out to a brewery. Warm and fashionable
kinda booby

links_Review_Title: Cute top for a night out
links_Review_Text: Wore this out to a dinner and received tons of compliments! Overall fit is TTS but I did have to use fashion tape to keep the neckline in place.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful Top! Perfect for winter date night.
links_Review_Text: This top runs true to the sizes listed. A Medium is a smallish 6 but overall it runs true to size. Wear with high waisted pants to avoid exposing skin. Soft velvet with a well-designed fastening for the wrap.
I wore this for a night out with my husband and another couple. I felt good in it, but it's very low cut, so be careful! Fits true to size!

I was bummed I didn't opt for the extra small, I really liked the cut of this blouse. I usually have problems with my bust being too big, but this kept falling down in the front and my girls were spilling out. The sleeves were also too long and loose. It was more fuscia than I expected.

links_Review_Title: Loose fit in the chest which allows for some gaping.
links_Review_Text: Beautiful fabric.
Wore to an engagement party. Velvet material can be dressed up or down. Felt very Victorian chic !
This is a wrap shirt. Connects through two small hook & eye on either side of torso.

links_Review_Title: Great top for the holiday season!
links_Review_Text: Flattering in person (less so in pictures), but still super comfy and fun!

I really wanted to love this shirt. I rented this for a holiday party and didn't wear it. The color is a deep fuchsia that only Lord Farquad would love and it wasn't helped by the puffy shoulders. I feel like the shirt was great theory but flawed in execution.
Was tight around my waist and was unable to wear.

links_Review_Title: The color of this top was perfect for the Holidays! I would definitely rent again.
links_Review_Text: It fit as exactly described.
Made me feel like a chic juliette.

links_Review_Title: Perfect dress for a Miami Wedding!
links_Review_Text: I am 5'3 115lbs and I wore a size 0. Definitely need to wear a padded bra if you have a small chest like me, but overall loved the dress and the fit.

This dress was a bit big on me so I had to fiddle with keeping it up all night, but I am between a four and a six so I believe this may run true to size. It was comfortable and easy to wear and did not wrinkle. I received a ton of compliments and would definitely recommend!

links_Review_Title: Perfect for Naples, FL February wedding!
links_Review_Text: First time renting and it worked out perfectly. The color and fit were fabulous! The rubber at the top of the bust line kept the strapless gown up. Did not wear bra but wore the silicone covers from Target that hook. Had the Nine West shoes from six years ago and found the Betsey Johnson necklace at TJ Maxx. It traveled well folded w tissue in my carry on suitcase. I really felt happy and comfortable in this dress. It was a 12 hour day!

links_Review_Title: Loved this dress so much I bought it!
links_Review_Text: I originally ordered the size 8, but being a 34D, the 10 fit better in the bust line and didn't smash my girls. I actually could have worn with out a strapless bra but didn't want to risk show through. I got so many compliments, and it was the perfect choice for a fashion industry awards dinner. I would absolutely recommend the dress!
Sized up one and it was great. Comfortable. I would rent again. David gives a little. No need to rent a bra.

I loved this dress and wore it for a formal work Christmas party in the city. In a sea of black dresses, this pink number was stunning. The fabric is thick and easy to move in. Would rent again in a heartbeat!

The fabric and color is incredible! However the dress wrinkles easily and even though I steamed it, the minute I put it on it had wrinkles in all the wrong places. The slit also runs high when you sit so be sure to have a bag or something to cover up!

Rented this for a rehearsal dinner, it was my first time renting and I absolutely love it! I got a size 12 and 14 I'm normally a 10 or 12 but after reading the reviews I decided to get the 12 and 14... I got soooo many compliments! The color is perfect and I love the color. Also I was sweating my butt of (it was in Florida) and you could not even tell.

Was going to wear this for my brothers engagement celebration - but ended up wearing a different cocktail dress. Loved the color and fit of this one except for the way it made my chest look flat and wide. Would caution those with a larger chest to be aware that it's definitely better suited for a smaller chest.

links_Review_Title: The Dress I Wore When I Got Engaged!
links_Review_Text: This dress will always have a special place in my heart because it is what I was wearing the night my fiancé proposed to me! The color and silhouette are gorgeous! Although, it is snug and very unforgiving. I'd recommend going up a size and not skipping shapewear. Use shapewear that has invisible lines and that does not have heavy boning.

links_Review_Title: Amazing dress! Fit and color- WOW!
links_Review_Text: I got so many compliments on this dress! It was very comfortable and flattering. I ended up wearing the large size than I normally do and it worked out perfectly. I love this dress! Highly recommend for a wedding or formal affair!

This fit true to size without feeling too tight or restricting. Nice stretch to it. Comfortable! No readjusting needed. The color is gorgeous and eye catching. You sometimes need to be mindful about the slit when sitting down cross-legged, but overall great dress for a wedding or formal party!

First RTR experience. I shipped it to our hotel so the timing would work out while we were out of town, which did work out perfectly. Thurs-Sun return Mon AM for a Saturday night wedding. The dress was incredibly comfortable and I got SO many compliments. It is flattering, elegant and the color is so attractive! I am a 32C and I felt the chest area was a bit bigger than I wanted and did not provide the full support I was looking for so I did wear a strapless bra, however you do not have to! I only pulled the dress up a few times due to the slippery material of my bra. I had a drink spilled on me and the split in the dress ripped as I bent down to pick something up. Both were covered by the $5 insurance. Highly recommend this dress!!!

links_Review_Title: The dress was fitted but stretchy, so it was easy to dance in!
links_Review_Text: I rented this dress for a wedding. I received a ton of compliments-- the color was a hit! I am 5' 3'' and the length was perfect. I worried it would be too long, but it wasn't. The fabric is nice and thick, but stretchy, so it was very comfortable to wear, sit, and dance in. The slit on the thigh was a bit high, so just be careful when you sit! It was appropriate enough for a formal wedding, but still fun and funky! I highly recommend this dress. I also rented the teal earrings to go along with it. I loved the color contrast!

links_Review_Title: Everyone loved the color and fit on me
links_Review_Text: Fitted material. Split was not too high. Dress didn't make me feel hot, temperature wise. I felt so beautiful! Loved it. A friend of mine rented it for a wedding after and she loved it too.

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous color. So fitting and flattering!
links_Review_Text: I LOVED this dress - so much so I would consider buying it. It has some stretch so it was a lovely fit that complimented my curves and the color was outstanding. I felt comfortable and sexy all at the same time. I rented this for a photoshoot and I'm so glad I did - can't recommend enough!

links_Review_Title: Va va voom- pop of pink for a summer wedding
links_Review_Text: Love this cut, it's stretchy and fits in all the right places. A little big in so areas but it was perfect fit on my waist. I thought it was going to be a lot brighter but it's a perfect bright raspberry color, not wine. Plan on steaming it. Has room for a strapless bra and has a zipper back. Want this dress in every color.

The fabric is great and the garment is obviously high quality. Got the 10 and the 12 and this runs small. I normally wear an 8 or 10 in dresses and gowns. Had to wear the 12 out because the 10 did not fit well. Got compliments all night! You can move in this dress as well... it is great for dancing. And yes, you can catch the bouquet in it as shown!

links_Review_Title: Great color and dress that fit like a glove!
links_Review_Text: Overall amazing dress. It hugged in all the right places. The boning really helped to create a nice curve, but the only downside of the boning was that it poked me in the side when sitting. After sitting for a bit, I didn't notice it. The color was stunning. It makes for a great dress to play up for a wedding or dress down for a casual event. I would absolutely rent again!
Dress does run a little small but wearing a size up and some shape wear does wonders. Received lot of compliments
Perfect for a formal wedding. Hot pink. Tight fitting- I needed spanx. Got lots of compliments. Stunning dress!

The dress was great. It got very nicely, and I could move freely in it. I got so many compliments about the dress. One problem I had being a pear shaped lady was that the top was a little loose, but it didn't fall down or anything. I would DEFINITELY rent it again!!

The color of this dress is stunning! If you're looking for a fun vibrant color, that's form fitting, then this is the perfect dress. I gave it a 4 because I had to keep pulling the dress down through out the night.

links_Review_Title: Amazing Pink/Magenta strapless dress with slit was a confidence booster
links_Review_Text: Absolutely loved this dress color, fit, and style! Slightly more magenta than bright pink than in photo. Length came to lower calf for me (I'm 5'3.5") but the slit and tight fit gave the length the perfect balance to feeling sexy without over the top (but to each their own!) I do have a more athletic build, and felt very feminine in this dress. In spite of being strapless, I was not constantly pulling the dress up even while dancing! The top had a rubber type lining to help secure the dress from slipping. However, be wary of the slit, the threading did not have a very strong hold. Both the 0 and 2 fit well which is pretty true to size for me, but I wore the 2 for a little more comfort and give for dancing. I preferred the fit of the 0 (2 had more loose fit in stomach but likely from having shorter torso and odd zipper bunching on the bum). I wore spanks too keep the lines smooth. Tons of compliments on the dress and would 100% wear again!

Fit well ran a bit small so I'm glad I got a size up. Beautiful color so many compliments. Very comfortable. The color was a bit of a deeper pink than the photo which I liked better! Sometimes I'm concerned with strapless that it won't stay up but it was completely fine no issues. The slit and sleek fit was perfect for a wedding--classy and sexy at the same time :)

I loved the dress. Was a bit apprehensive at first because it is form fitting but it was super comfortable and such a beautiful color. I did not feel worried about the top slipping or having to pull it up all night. It doesn't have a ton of support in the chest but that wasn't an issue for me as I am small chested. I would rent again!
dress is a comfy material, fit great. i wore a size 6R for an outdoor wedding in maine. wore with pink earrings, also from RTR

links_Review_Title: Such a fun color! Tons of compliments!
links_Review_Text: Fits like a glove!

I wore this dress for a wedding, and it was perfect! I have a small bust, & I didn't have to keep pulling the dress up throughout the night! I went with the 2R instead of a 4R, as the 4R was just a smidge too loose on the hips. I loved the color, and the length of the dress. It is form fitting!!! The only con is I wish I had worn Spanx underneath. I wore it all day, and it was totally comfortable enough to sit down in. The material was not too thick either, and I was totally comfortable even standing outside in the heat!
The dress fit well everywhere but the waist. It was pretty loose there but I wore it anyway, would size down next time!

Pros - COLOR! Form fitting, eye catching, compliments, something different, looks good in pictures, makes your booty look good Cons - unforgiving, very tight, I had to run and get a $40 pair of spanx just to make sure everything was tucked away, not very comfortable Overall, I liked the dress. However, if I had had to wear for more than 4 hours I wouldn't have survived. It was soo tight plus coupled with the spanx, it was a lot to handle. I had to make sure my posture was on point or else my belly popped out. Probably wouldn't wear it again so I'm glad it was just a rental.
Super comfy! Was a little tight in the chest (I'm a 32DD) but aside from that it was PERFECT!

links_Review_Title: Awesome dress. Was great for a summer wedding.
links_Review_Text: Pros- I was able to try both the 2 & 4. It was amazing. Fits great and has a pretty good fabric so it doesn't feel heavy nor is the fabric thin. Cons- it's a tube top dress. So it does slide a bit.

links_Review_Title: Loved it and received lots of compliments!
links_Review_Text: I loved this dress! It was perfect for a wedding! One downside was that because I wore spanx (it is pretty tight!) the dress kept turning, which got annoying. But other than that, it was great!
Loved the color and fit of the dress.
Fit really well and moved really well! No issues with top sliding around and also didn't need a bra.
This dress was perfect. They didn't have my usual size, so I sized up and it fit perfectly. Would definitely recommend this and will probably rent it again.
Tight fitting but stretchy material. I received so many compliments!

links_Review_Title: They are very professional and easy to use.
links_Review_Text: I usually wear a size 4 but I had to go up because of my chest. It was a great fit and I received tons of compliments. Loved it!

links_Review_Title: Sexy dress for a summer wedding
links_Review_Text: I was complimented all night on this dress and for months after from people that saw pictures. The dress was easy to move/dance in, stretchy, and comfortable! I was able to dance all night without an issue. The seam on the slit did pop a few stitches when I stepped up onto the curb though. Only gave 4/5 stars because the second size that I got wasn't taken care of well and looked to be at the end of its life as a rental, otherwise great dress!
Great fit and the cut out allows you to still wear a braw without it showing. The legs have some flair to their cut making your legs look smaller.

Wore for my bachelorette, and it was perfect! I had to go up a size, but recommend going up two sizes if blessed up top, my girls could barley breath! But it was so fitting for the occasion, I could not pass!
Beautiful elegant material. Great for any height. I am 5'2 135lbs and it fit like a little snug but loosen up through the night.

Wore this for a day in the French Quarter. The perfect brunch outfit for sure! Fit was perfect in all the right places. The zipper was a little tough to get up by myself, but I got it eventually. Loved this outfit though!

links_Review_Title: Perfect sassy white outfit for bachelorette
links_Review_Text: This is my favorite rental - great fit! Wore for night out for dinner and dancing with my girls in Austin

links_Review_Title: Very unflattering material and cut of shorts
links_Review_Text: Shiny white material made this casual romper too formal to wear to brunch or out during the day, even though the cut and fit is very casual. Shorts cut very unflattering and runs large.

links_Review_Title: Great romper, was a little too fancy for what I was aiming for
links_Review_Text: So cute and fit really well, but it actually ended up looking a lot more "formal" than I expected. even tho it's a romper the material and fit is more suited for a night out or an evening party rather than a day time event (which is what I rented it for)

I rented this for the daytime portion of my bachelorette party! It was so cute and flattering! Runs true to size. I am usually a 4 but rented the 6 bc that was only size available and it still Worked great! Got so many compliments! The bow on the front is cute and flattering not too over the top.

I found this to be pretty tight in chest area. Would have been more comfortable in an 8. Bottom fit great. Super flattering if you are self conscious of your lower tummy from all the pleating. I would buy this in a bigger size. Was adorable and perfect for dinner with the girls the night before my wedding.
Loved this beautiful romper!! Material thicker than I imagined but not heavy or hot. Perfect length for petite girls. Zero stretch in the fabric, I would size up if you're curvy.

This was the best outfit ever for my bridal shower! I got compliments all night! I wore a size 0 (my normal size) and it fit perfectly! It was also super comfortable to wear all day/night- I wish I could have another bridal shower to wear this all over again!
This fit as expected. I rented the 12 instead of the 10 because it wasn't available. It was a little big, but it still worked and I got SO many compliments! Excellent quality fabric and well made.
Loved this romper for my bridal shower! The material is amazing quality and fully lined. Compliments all day!
Super comfortable and true to size. Very flattering as it accentuates waist line while shorts are more loose fitting. #bridalshower #party

I absolutely loved this romper, I have a small chest and that didn't matter because of the oversized bow. The satin felt great, looked great and added an extra sheen to it. I have long legs and it looked great!

links_Review_Title: Perfect for the all white party
links_Review_Text: The fit was perfect because I had a larger size as my backup.

Love this romper so much, I felt amazing and got so many compliments. I am usually a 4 but ended up wearing the 6. It was a little snug up top but can't complain since I didn't have to wear a bra. Always a plus!
Great fit, highly recommend!

links_Review_Title: I received tons of compliments on this romper! It was super fun to wear!
links_Review_Text: The only thing I would warn is that it is SHORT. I started the night in a wedge and felt like it was a lot of leg so switched to flats. Other than that is fit well!

I'm usually a 10/12 but always size up in rompers and the 12 was perfect! This was awesome for Diner En Blanc, lots of compliments. My one complaint is that this arrived super wrinkled, I legit had to use a steamer for a good 30 minutes or so to get the wrinkles out.
Ok

links_Review_Title: Always a simple process and great customer service.
links_Review_Text: Tight in the chest area. Hard to zip up
Around the rib cage it's so tight and uncomfortable. There should be some stretch.

This was my first all sequin dress and it did not disappoint! It’s so beautiful and I only wish I had more occasions to wear it. I usually wear and 8 but sized up to a 10 based on other reviews. That was a good call. It’s fitted at the hips and the 10 was more comfortable. Be prepared to sparkle!!

links_Review_Title: So many compliments on this dress!
links_Review_Text: Dress fits pretty TTS. If your chest is on the larger size - I wear a 34DD, you'll likely end up with the larger of your two sizes. I wear a 4 normally & wore the size 6.
Absolutely fell in love with this dress. The fit, the quality, the comfort (honestly), and the endless compliments! Could not recommend this head turner enough!

links_Review_Title: Such a fun dress to wear!
links_Review_Text: Fit true to size and was very comfortable!
This dress is fabulous!!! I received so many compliments on it. The multi-color and shine is spectacular. I sized up to a 12 because the 10 was too tight in the bust. I'm a 36D. Will rent again.

links_Review_Title: The sequence complemented the cut of the dress, a bit flashy but in a sophisticated way!
links_Review_Text: Fit was fantastic. I'm 5'4" and pear shaped. I chose to wear spanx underneath but could have been fine without. The zipper can be a challenge to get up because of the sequence. I rented the dress twice for two different occasions, the first dress was hard to zip (I had to have help) the second time I had no problems and could do it myself. If you are dancing/moving... the sequence around the armpit does rub a bit but nothing painful just slightly irritating by the end of a long night.

links_Review_Title: Wow this was fun to wear for a David Bowie party!
links_Review_Text: Great fun dress I side with socks and heels!!
Great dress, so many compliments!!

First experience with RTR and it was great. Mostly thanks to the community and their detailed reviews. This dress was so much fun to wear to an office holiday party. I loved the shoulder detail. Works really well for tall girls, but wouldn't suit anyone under 5'7 think. For reference I am 5'9 and the dress came mid calf. I'm 30B/C-25-36 and the size 2 was perfectly fitted. Anyone with more of a bust would be better off with the size 4.

links_Review_Title: So sparkly, fits like a glove
links_Review_Text: Fantastic dress that managed to be comfortable and fitted at the same time, while covered in sequins. Lots of compliments!

I wore this to my husband's fire department banquet and it looked fantastic with his Class A uniform. I am between a 6 and 8, the 8 fit perfect. I received so many compliments and hated to take it off.
I received so many compliments in this dress! Comfortable and felt great. Relaxed fitting below waist. If you have a fuller bust, I would suggest sizing up. Would rent again!

links_Review_Title: Great dress! Multiple compliments. LOVED IT.
links_Review_Text: Rented for an office party. Beautiful in person. Fit perfectly and easy to wear. I received countless compliments on it. I contimplated buying it but it's one of those dresses that is so memorable you can only wear it once unless you have multiple social circles :). I was having too much fun to take any pictures at the event. Forgive the horrible photo from my daughter's messy room + mirror. We were moving the next day. I wore similar shoes to the ones the model shows.

I wore the 10R due to my hips and the top area wasn't too large on me. It was still a little snug at the hip area but I was able to move with ease. Received a lot of compliments on the dress. It was a little long (I'm 5'4") but still looked great.

links_Review_Title: My son and I went to see Aladdin on Broadway. The dress was perfect and a showstopper! Loved it!
links_Review_Text: My son and I went to see Aladdin on Broadway. The dress was perfect and a showstopper! Loved it! It was true to fit. I thought the glitter would make it uncomfortable but it inside was lined with a soft cloth. I received so many compliments and I felt so fancy!
This dress definitely stood out in a crowd - it is a WOW and so pretty. I am a shorty and it hung a bit below my calves but still perfect. Absolutely memorable and very fun in a sea of black dresses!
I rented this dress for NYE and WOW!!!!!! I felt so confident and comfortable in it, and the amount of compliments I received were unbelievable! Rent this dress TODAY!!!

links_Review_Title: The perfect dress for a NYE wedding!
links_Review_Text: Got many compliments on this dress! Ran a bit small (I normally wear a 6R); but the fit was very flattering. Would definitely wear again!
Loved the dress for NYE. Fit great and true to size – people were saying it looked like it was made for me! I'm curvy/pear/petite/athletic build! May rent it again :)
One of my favorite RTR dresses ever! Fits true to size but note that if you have a butt you may have to remove the whole dress to go to the bathroom. Got compliments all night. Rent it!

The only reason I didn't give this dress 5 stars was because it runs a bit small in the bust. I would have loved one more size up, but I made it work and got so many compliments. Perfect dress for a New Year's Eve wedding!

Show stopper! There isn't one thing I didn't like about this dress. I received compliments on it from the second I arrived. I'm 5'4" 134 34D and the 6 fit perfect. If you want to stand out and have the most unique dress on this is the one!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress! Fun, classy, and special all at the same time.
links_Review_Text: I rented this for a black-tie optional wedding and got many many compliments on it. It was a lot of fun to wear and it photographs well. I tried the 6 and the 8, but wore the 8 because the 6 wouldn’t fit my hips. It’s a sheath dress so it hugs your body, but I could dance all night without feeling restricted. Loved it!

I absolutely loved this dress. I have zero complaints. It was super comfortable. Soft on the inside, and the sequins did not itch at all. I'm 5'7" 135lbs, and the 4 fit perfectly. Not too loose or tight. I received tons of compliments! I want to buy this. I would rent again if I didn't take so many pictures in it!!!
This was my back up dress but ended up wearing it to a themed holiday party. It's unique and so sparkly in person. Plus, has some stretch for dancing and moving
I wore this to my office holiday party and received tons of compliments on the dress. It was fun, sparkly, well fitting, suitable for the party and I was able to dance all night long.

I've been rent from RTR for over 5 years and I've never gotten more compliments on a dress. This is a fitted dress with beautiful sequins in red, blue, turquoise and pink. The shoulder details give a modern feel while still giving a little cover. The dress is a show stopped and you have to have to confidence to wear it because you will stand out. While it doesn't show a lot of skin it is fitted to show off your curves. I wore a bold blue eyeshadow and red and turquoise earrings that were mine.

links_Review_Title: Sequins for days and the perfect balance of class and sass!
links_Review_Text: This dress was a delight to wear. I rented the 4R because that was the available size close to my usual size 2. I loved how this fit! The sequins from head to hem are fabulous and for my fuller bust there was no unsightly underarm fat that can happen with a cap-like sleeve. I would highly recommend this dress!

links_Review_Title: Felt so glam in this dress and got tons of compliments all night!!
links_Review_Text: I LOVED this dress! It fit like a glove and was super comfortable all night! I usually wear a 4 but needed the 6 to get the zipper up in the back. This dress is definitely a head turner- would be amazing for NYE!
Loved the sleeves and gorgeous colors. Wore for a "sneaker ball" and got compliments all night

links_Review_Title: A great, unique dress that fit well and was comfortable! I received a ton of compliments
links_Review_Text: This dress was amazing. Fun, comfortable and fit really well. The colors were great and the flutter sleeves were a nice detail. I didn't want to return the dress!

This dress fit like a glove. Only thing to keep in mind is your are rubbing on the sequins. It's manageable though. I'm 5'6" and 135 lbs. The 4 fit great. The light sequins is a pale pink, very pretty. Black or silver shoes pairs well with the beauty.

First, sorry the pic is blurry! Second, strangers and friends came up to me throughout the night to compliment the dress. It was such a pleasure to wear and also feel a level of elegance not typically associated with multi-colored sequins. LOVED this dress and wish I owned it!

links_Review_Title: Stop looking and Rent this incredible show stopping dress!
links_Review_Text: I loved everything about this dress! Design is gorgeous, fit was perfect and comfortable and the compliments were endless!

I got so many compliments on this dress and felt like a star. It was comfortable and glamorous. I got the 2 and 4, although I could fit into the 2, it squished my chest so it looked flat, so I opted for the 4. If you're curvy like me, you'll need your bigger normal size, lol. For me I'm a 2 in some designers and a 4 in others.
Sexy and flattering while still being covered up.
What a beautiful dress, felt great comfortable I could dance just fine. Would love to own it !

This dress is shiny, flattering, fun, classy and sexy. Got so many compliments and felt like a colorful diamond in a sea of black. For the girl who likes to stand out! Ps. I saw this dress on AOC at a recent event... so there you have it.. :)
Great dress. Perfect for a cocktail party. Colors shine just right. I will probably rent again.
Although it has NO stretch- it fit very well and was comfortable to dance in. Everyone loved it!
Wore this skirt to lots of holiday parties and got tons of compliments! Easy to style and very comfortable.

I love the style of this skirt. I didn't notice this when I was browsing but the skirt is sheer with a short lining, so it shows a lot of leg in addition to the slit. I'm hanging onto this one for a while! It is a little bit tight around the stomach for me, and there's no stretch in the waistband, so size up if you're between sizes or unsure.

I love this skirt. It's definitely longer than on the model- almost floor length. But the breezy fabric and long slits on the side make it sexy and fun for the summer. I should've sized down one for a tighter fit, but this fits true to size. Love love love.

links_Review_Title: Cute design but ran WAY small
links_Review_Text: Definitely size up on this one if you have hips

links_Review_Title: Really comfortable fit great - nothing super special

links_Review_Text: The slide slit and breezy material make this feel really fresh and sexy but not too exposed. I have a small waist so I went with a 4 and it fits great. I rented it to wear to a music festival but it would also work great for weekend days or a night out.
Not a flattering style on me. Made my hips look wide...

links_Review_Title: Way too tight in the waist
links_Review_Text: Much longer than the picture and super tight in the waist. I couldn't wear this.
Great skirt, fit well, hit at the right places.
Not the most flattering skirt. It ran small so it was very uncomfortable for a dinner party night. Ended up not wearing
Super flattering and fun. Would highly recommend renting. Ran TTS. Loved the slit and work it out and to work.

I ordered up a size based on other reviews and I would say this absolutely runs true to size, sizing up definitely made it too big. Size subtle pattern and definitely more flowy and voluminous than the photos
Wish I would not have sized up and this would've been perfection. It was a little loose and a tad too long on me but I wore it anyway. Loved walking down the sidewalk in this skirt on a windy day.

links_Review_Title: Wasn't able to wear it because the waist was too small
links_Review_Text: Size up, because the waist is tight with no give. I couldn't even zip mine at the top, and I don't usually have an issue with waist-fitted items.
Waist is a bit loose, and it definitely is a maxi skirt and goes to your ankle. I am 5'7 and it skims the tops of my feet. Otherwise it is cute and good for every day wear
Beautiful pleats and the side slit is tasteful. But the skirt itself was small around the waist for me and the length hit me at the top of my ankle area - I'm 5'4". Will size up if I rent again.

I really liked this skirt and the way the side slit and light pleating elevate the look. The only thing that bothered me was I probably tripped no less than 10 times on the front of the skirt. Either it's really long or my legs aren't long enough. It went to my ankles, not mid calf like in the model picture. Still cute but dangerous?
Everything on this skirt is perfect! Super flattering and girly. I rented for a trip and was the best skirt ever!!! Is heavy but perfect!
Beautiful jean material skirt. It was perfect for a tennis tournament. Fits true to size and is comfortable all day!

links_Review_Title: Cute for a casual summer day!
links_Review_Text: I loved this flirty little skirt for a date to the farmers' market. It's a heavier material, more like denim, but I thought that was good because it kept the skirt in place in the breeze. I felt like it was just the right length - short enough to be sexy, but not too sexy for daytime.
I wore this for my sister's graduation fiesta! It was so fun! A little hard figuring out how to tie it but once I did it was great! I love rent the runway!

The wrap around tie takes a little maneuvering and I had to safety pin the hem to be able to wear it to work, but overall it exceeded my expectations. I usually wear a medium but all that was available was a large, so hard to tell if it runs true to size.
Loved this skirt - material is thicker and it's nice that it is huge adjustable because of how it wraps and ties. Perfect for a summer day, loved wearing it

Such a cute denim skirt!!! Got so many compliments when wearing it. The fabric is a little heavy but once tied on, it is not going anywhere and stayed snug the whole night. Other reviews mention a gap where the skirt creates a little hole in the front... add a piece of fashion tape to connect it and you are good to go!
The material is very durable so the skirt feels heavy when you pick it up, but it still stays tied and keeps it shape all day. Love this skirt. Thinking about getting again for another trip.
A little hard to figure out the belt but it was comfortable and looked good on!

links_Review_Title: Super trendy outfit for wine tasting
links_Review_Text: The skirt was lots of fun - paired with booties, a simple white tank and a Jean jacket. Downsize was the tie for the skirt was really long and I had to re-tie throughout the day. Also the fabric is really heavy.

I really like this skirt! At first, not so much, it's a bit of a trial-and-error experience getting it to fit and sit right initially. And yes, there is a gap between the two "sides" of the wrap skirt so that's a bit of a design flaw that I'd love changed if there was a sequel to this skirt coming out. However, I was able to figure out where to place it on my waist, how to tie it so it stays on (tighten that knot, folks!) and how to rotate it just so to hide the gap. Once on and in place, this is so much fun to wear. I love how it feels when I walk. I get compliments on it every time I wear it. It has a great weight to it and while it *feels* flirty like you're wearing a "cute little skirt" it still has enough fabric and length to pass for work/more demure situations.
I loved this skirt, it was super flattering and fun. It's thick material but that's because it was good material. It's adjustable too. Cute for a summer day!

Love this skirt. The fabric is heavier than I expected but not uncomfortable to wear. It's well made, flirty and flattering. My only issue with it is that I can't tell if it will come untied throughout the day. It seems like there may be potential for a wardrobe malfunction. Other than that, I love it!

The good news -- this pieces is well made and easy to wear. A great summer look. BUT there isn't enough fabric in the lower layer. Considering how heavy the skirt is overall, it's really odd. You end up with a slit on the left side that shows a lot of leg. It doesn't seem like others were bothered by this, so maybe it's just my ocd.

I loved this skirt. It stayed in place all day even though it was a wrap. I wore it to work with a white blouse and wedges and on the weekend with a white tee and sneakers. Got lots of compliments. Very flattering. It has a fun, flirty look to it. Material is thick enough that you don't see a visible line when you tuck in your shirt, but still light and wearable in 90 degree humid summer weather. Will rent again!
One of my favorite rentals yet!

I love this feminine,skirt by Alexis! Running true to size with no,stretch, I recommend wearing your true size, for your primary size. and going up, for your back up. This style is a wrap skirt so you can loosedn up the midsection a bit and loose at the hips. At 5 foot the length hit just below the knee on me. The material is a little heavier than I expected, but very flattering Pair with a sandale and some colorful accessories to complete your outfit!

High waisted, not too short. So cute and comfortable. I got a lot of compliments! My only complaint is that the hole that you use to loop the belt through is MASSIVE. Three different people were like "0h no! Your seam!" and I had to explain that the belt is just too skinny and the hole is too big! I kept trying to cover it with the belt itself but I had to move a little bit! The belt is also a bit long (although that would be good if you need more space) so I did a knot instead of a bow. But really cute!

links_Review_Title: Cute, comfortable and perfect for a summer day!
links_Review_Text: I really liked this rental. It definitely is heavy material, but it was very comfortable on. I got a lot of compliments on it and felt great the whole day! It does wrinkle easily, but to be honest it kind of goes with the whole look anyway. I think this ran true-to-size, maybe a little on the bigger side if anything. Would rent again!

links_Review_Title: Such a cute skirt highly recommend
links_Review_Text: Super cute wrap skirt the fabric was a little heavy but it shows how well made it was. Got tons of compliments!

links_Review_Title: I wore this skirt to go wedding dress shopping and it was the perfect daytime outfit!
links_Review_Text: Fit perfectly, I wore a size small and it wasn't too tight around my waist. I was able to pair it with a crop top. The material is heavy but I wasn't hot. Would definitely rent this again!
Heavier fabric than I had expected but very cute and flattering

Such a great skirt, flattering, and because of the wrap style, would fit anyone regardless of shape and size. Wore it twice- once with a crisp button down & heels and again with a simple white tee and snazzy sneakers. Would rent again and suggest to anyone.

links_Review_Title: Great skirt for a date night
links_Review_Text: Doesn't wrinkle when you pack!

The wrap/tie part was folded and at times showed my skin and/or under shirt. Got tons of compliments and few would notice the side at the wrap yet I didn't feel comfortable and constantly looked to ensure it was not showing my skin.
Nice heavy material and tie to allow for a perfect fit. Lays perfectly and got so many compliments

Adorable and flattering skirt for the day time, paired it with a cropped white top and it was perfect! Only downside is the fabric is fairly heavy so it's hot and hard to tie.. but would definitely still recommend! I'm tall and it wasn't too short
just pin the end of the skirt to the other part of the wrap and it fits just like the photo
Loved this! It's a little short but great for spring. I paired it with a White T.
This skirt runs extremely small. I typically wear small/medium and rented a large. I couldn't wear it. It's a heavier fabric than I was expecting.

I know some reviewers were frustrated with the sharp angled end of the interior wrap of the skirt, but I found it to be a fun asymmetric feature that actually worked well. The weight of this skirt makes it a little hot in warmer weather but also lends to it its luxe feel. I got so, so many compliments on this skirt. Works great to dress up with pumps and a blouse or dress down with a tee and sneakers. Contemplating purchasing it. It's a great denim piece without screaming "jeans", ya know?
This skirt is great for a casual event or everyday wear. It is extremely flattering and easy to wear with a white top.

links_Review_Title: Wore for an outdoor wedding shower.
links_Review_Text: The skirt was long enough for my height, flowy, and perfect for an outdoor summer event.
Couldn't even wear this because of how small/short it was... I was able to wrap it around but the way the front closes there was a huge gap at the hem and didn't cover very much.
