Wore this skirt for a vacation and then again for Easter. Great fit, quality and length. The reviews said to size up, so I got a large but should have gotten a Med for sure, so order true to size.

links_Review_Title: Cute but bow was difficult to tie
links_Review_Text: Wanted to love this skirt but the material was too thick for me to tie a cute bow that wouldn't unravel. Unfortunately wasn't able to wear.
The length was too short for my personal preference. Otherwise, this is a fun ruffled skirt!

I wore this skirt more than anything else I rented for my trip to Bali. The fabric is thick and really lovely and it goes equally well with a swimsuit & sandals vs a nice top and heels. If I didn't live in a cold climate I would definitely buy this. I was worried about the length since I'm really short and my frame is easily overwhelmed but this skirt hung really nicely on my body and made my butt and legs look great. highly recommend!!!

THIS SKIRT! I can't say enough about it. I was stopped by complete strangers telling me how cute it is. Definitely keeping this!!! Size wise, normally Alexis runs small. This skirt runs true to size. Read the reviews and go by that. Rent this skirt, you won't regret it <3
Because of the tie feature this was able to fit my body perfectly. Ideally this would any body type !
Loved the dress, straps are a bit long so it'd slip down quite a bit.

This dress is a real beaut!!! Fits true to size & the colors are stunning. I wore this for my birthday party with a leather jacket & chunky heels, but you can really lean into its beauty & pair with simple straps heels, too. More on @thanksitsrtr or thanksitsrtr.com
Thai dress runs VERY large. I was swimming in the small
Fit well and very nicely made
So pretty. Fit me perfectly.
The top part on the chest and breast was super large and not proportionate to the nice fit on the hips unfortunately - otherwise would have been a great fall wedding dress!

links_Review_Title: Unfortunately didn't end up wearing it.
links_Review_Text: The dress was too large around the boobs and the straps were very long.
I'm 5'10, but this dress seemed like it would've fit better on a longer person. The middle bulged in a way I didn't find flattering but it was comfortable and felt nice.

links_Review_Title: Unable to wear it to my event.
links_Review_Text: Runs too large...could not wear it as it was not flattering. Size down.

links_Review_Title: Light, festive and fun! The hot pink is a great color. Perfect for Miami occasions
links_Review_Text: Easy to wear. Festive and fun. Would probably be better with a pair of spanx under - ruching tends to scrunch.
Super cute and girly dress.

links_Review_Title: The color was perfect for Miami.
links_Review_Text: Really comfortable. The scrunchy stomach part felt like it expanded my stomach head on. Otherwise loved.
Rented for birthday dinner! So fun and flirty and fit great.

links_Review_Title: So cute, surprisingly slimming, not great for super hot day
links_Review_Text: Love this
Great summer color. XL was the only size available but I wish I had the L ...or even medium. Material is very stretchy.

Such a cute and flirty dress! Loved the color and the subtle polka dot pattern. Smocking around the bottom is really flattering. I got a medium mostly for length and I'm glad I did - it's short, but not uncomfortably so! Could be worn up around the shoulders as a square neck dress as well. Lightweight and comfortable for summer!
Pretty
Really cute. Flat stomach or spans required. Great for nice shoulders.
Not the most flattering but super cute and packs a punch
This would be cute if you had no imperfections on your bottom half. Ended up not wearing.

Amazing dress, note it does have orange polka dots that don't register in photo. OTS island ruching is so flattering, though did find the bottom just a tad snug (but not unwearable). If between sizes would go up
Super cute summer dress that is incredibly flattering. If you're taller and in between sizes, order up. Loved this dress

links_Review_Title: This is a fun summer dress. The color is pretty and the fit is true to size.
links_Review_Text: Fun summer dress that is very flattering to your figure. I loved wearing it and wore it a couple of times which I rarely do.

links_Review_Title: Fantastic pants with the matching jacket
links_Review_Text: I rented this outfit for a trip to Vegas and it was absolutely fabulous. I wore to a private event at Mr. Chow's and received compliments all evening from both men and women. Great shade of pink with the animal print and a little bit of shine. Pants are a bit snug it the waist and thighs so I would definitely size up. Great outfit!
Loved creating this outfit for our conference opening party! Paired these more "funky" pants with a classic top from Tibi! It was the perfect combination! I received so many compliments to boot!!!!!
Don't rent these if you want to blend in. Wore them with a RTR top for a great wine pairing dinner date night.
These were great! Ran a little small and a bit hard to sit in but they are super cute and I will rent again

I loved these pants so much! I wore with the jacket but they could be worn by themselves. SERIOUSLY AWESOME PANTS!!! They were a little big in the waist for me, my hips are slightly larger than my waist, I'm about 107 lbs so they fell down a lot which looked weird. I loved them anyway because who wouldnt?!! So cool!

these pants go better with the matching blazer, don't @ me. I got more compliments on this outfit than any other thing I've ever rented. I ended up getting sick and missed a holiday party so I wore it to work on a Tuesday and wowed everyone. pants are TTS. I'm definitely a true 16 in the waist, with thinner hips. the legs and calf area were pretty huge for me but I couldn't size down because of the waist. the color is a true berry and very sparkly. don't let it deter you - rent the set.
What a great fit! Loved the pop of sparkle! Fits TTS!
A little snug in my thighs but overall fine fit
Loved putting this with the jacket for a great look!
It's too bad that these pants didn't fit because they were so cool!

links_Review_Title: The event I ordered this for got cancelled, but the dress is absolutely gorgeous! Will rent again!!
links_Review_Text: This dress definitely fits true to size. I ordered a size down hoping for a snug fit, but it was nearly impossible to squeeze into it - so definitely order your normal size! However, it is absolutely stunning, great material, and sexy! Love it so much!

links_Review_Title: First rtr dress! Loved everything about it!
links_Review_Text: I wore this dress for a bachelorette party and it was perfect. Easy to dress up or down. The fabric has a little give so it was easy to move in and sit in even though it's very body conforming. I am very busty and loved the way it fit my chest, I felt sexy but not like I was showing too much which tends to be what happens. I expected to wear the 10 but ended up wearing the 12 so it may run a bit small, if you're curvy like me. The one thing I didn't love was having to return it!!

Literally perfect LBD. Sexy yet easy to wear as the fit and fabric are forgiving. I'm usually a 2, but took the 4 here. Wore it with boots and a leather jacket for a night out, will rent again for sure.
What can I say? This dress was magic. Fit perfectly in my usual size. Sexy yet classy, straps were a bit long but I could still dance. Wore with a strapless bra. Perfect for turning 40 in Las Vegas!

Fit perfectly except for slightly loose in the bust. Straps are not adjustable and might be slightly stretched. They kept slipping but the rest of the dress was so fitted that it stayed. I chose to wear it without a bra. I usually am between a size 0 or 2 and the 0 was all that was available so I chanced it and it fit perfectly.
This dress was super simple but the little bit of detailing made it cute and feminine. My favorite part of this dress was the shape it gave my frame. Hit my waist perfectly!
I felt amazing in this dress on my recent Vegas trip. It fits like a glove and the ruching hits in all the right spots
rented this dress for homecoming and everything worked out pretty well! dress was a little tight, but it was wearable

Rented this dress for homecoming and it was perfect except the straps kept fall off my shoulders which was annoying as there's no way to adjust them. Other than that I loved look and fit of this dress.

I rented this dress for my daughter's homecoming. She was reluctant to wear a dress from Rent the Runway because dresses are only for "old people". However she picked this dress and was very happy with the way it looked and felt when wearing it. The dress is pretty true to size and was a snug fit I think because of the scrunching on the side. I would recommend ordering the size you normally wear and then the one size up. I think one size up would have given a little more wiggle room.

links_Review_Title: Sexy anniversary dress. Straps not adjustable,big. This designer runs small. Size up if in between.
links_Review_Text: This dress was a great height on me at 5 foot two and I loved how the front has cowl neck draping and the one side of dress was ruched so it draped across the front. The dress has stretch with a side zip. I did need a sticky bra to help fill out the top but this designer runs small. I definitely went with a two instead of a zero and it looked great!

They were out of my usual size 0 so I decided to to take a risk and size up to a 2 and boy I'm glad I did! Fit like a glove except the straps needed to be pinned! Overall a very cute dress. Perfect length! I know this is more for clubbing but I paired it with a belt and booties for a music festival!

links_Review_Title: This dress fit like a dream! I loved the dress and the way it looked.
links_Review_Text: The one downside of this dress was the straps were a little bit too loose.
Despite the dress having a small hole in the right side seam when it arrived, I wore the dress for formal birthday dinner on the cruise. Beautiful dress, but needs a bit of touch up.
Way too small and I honestly don't even know what size I should have ordered because the proportions were a mess.
This is a tight dress, but the ruching hides any body flaws. I thought it was very flattering and felt great on. The only negative was I felt the straps were a bit long.

links_Review_Title: Great quality material but sizing did not make sense and dress was very tight
links_Review_Text: Go with a much larger size than you think.

This dress is amaaaaaazing. I wore it out for my birthday. I have large breasts and a straight lower half, and it made me look like I have hips for the first time ever. Plenty of room for boobs, the cowl neck is super flattering on any shape I'd guess. The body of the dress is shaped almost like a corset. It's super fitted, but the way the material and the ruching sit it's super flattering and zero chance for tummy rolls. Also was comfy to sit and eat in. 10/10 will rent again.
This fit veryyyy snug. I'd suggest sizing up a couple of sizes. Material and quality really nice though!

links_Review_Title: Wore for my birthday night out!
links_Review_Text: If the 8 was available I would have gotten that, but I was able to fit into the 6 and still feel like hot stuff! Quite comfortable even for being very tight.

links_Review_Title: Great vacation dress - definitely need tape or cutlets
links_Review_Text: This dress is pretty low cut - so be prepared for some wardrobe tape

links_Review_Title: Loved this dress. Got so many compliments on it.
links_Review_Text: Fit true to size. Thicker fabric. Better for smaller bust.

This dress is really only fitted in the rib cage area - it's really flowy around hips/butt plenty of room for arms. If you have a small waist this is a great option. The material is cotton and a tad heavy so might not be great on a super hot day.
The small hook at the front kept opening which was fine it just made it low cut so you can't bend over. Fit a little big all over (waist, bust). More loose and comfy than fitted.

links_Review_Title: Never got to wear it and so bummed!
links_Review_Text: This dress would have fit like a dream if the zipper wasn't completely broken. So bummed because I rented it for a birthday party over Labor Day weekend!
Light and enjoyable!
Loved this dress. It was a bit large in the chest. Fixed with with a little sticky tape. Love the color and quality.

Wore to an Alice in Wonderland themed party! The sleeves were a little puffier than I usually like. Fit more like a small than an XS. Length was good with flats but would've worked with heels too. Overall liked it! Photographs well!

Got so many compliments wearing this dress!! Everyone said I look like Alice in Wonderland! The dress was super comfy and fit true to size. A super easy dress to just throw on and go. HIGHLY recommend! Will definitely be renting again

The dress is beautiful. The length was perfect on me. I loved the lace and embroidery. The dress is lightly fastened together at the top with a hook. It easily comes undone. I was having to rebook it every hour. It made me self conscious. Other than that, I loved it.
Gorgeous and flattering. Good length for me (5'9"). Can wear the neckline clasped like this or unclasped for a low cut.

Rented this for a cultural festival. Lots of compliments! The dress is sexy because of the low cut and the see through mid body part. I wore this with a sports bra to keep it PG. I'm 5'5 and the dress almost hit the floor. If you're shorter, you'll need heels. Has a side zipper and can be a little tough to get out of. Might be challenging if you aren't flexible/bigger chested.

This dress is darling! I rented it for Memorial Day weekend and it is perfect. I received it New with tags and still need to steam it. I would say it runs true to size or slightly large. I am a 6/8 and still could have ordered the small. Plenty of room in the bust and hips, however the waist has no give. I have a small rib cage, so if you tend to run wider through the ribs, I would say still with your normal size. It does have a little hook on the v neck for extra coverage. I am 5'8" and could have had another inch for when i put on heels, so I would say great for shorter girls too. Sweet, sweet dress!

The dress in nice and well made however it was not great on me. At 5'3" the dress drug the floor so I had to have on heals, no sandals. It also was a little tight in the ribcage and you can't wear a bar. I really liked the dress but probably will not rent again.
Love this dress. At first I didn't see the clasp at the chest, but thankfully it's there! You can't wear a bra so bigger busted ladies beware

links_Review_Title: Like the idea but weird fit
links_Review_Text: It's really cute on the hanger but the sleeves looked weird on me and made me look like a linebacker. I didn't end up wearing it.

links_Review_Title: Cute dress, too long for me.
links_Review_Text: This is a cute dress that fits as expected. Unfortunately, it is much too long for me. I am 5'1 and it drags.

links_Review_Title: very cute for a weekend getaway
links_Review_Text: loved the details and comfort of this piece.

links_Review_Title: This dress is so beautiful and comfortable, It suits perfectly .. love it
links_Review_Text: it fits perfectly, super comfortable and it gives you a super fresh and natural look and feeling :)
Love this dress but couldn't wear it as it was way too small, mostly around the top/chest for me. Size up!
This dress didn't work for my body type and I did not end up wearing it.
Don't try to wear this if you have a larger chest!

Love this dress. The fit was tts and super flattering, the construction and fabric was high quality, and its just overall gorgeous! It was warm for a July wedding but I overlooked that for everything else!
great quality, thick materials. very low cut but it has a clasp.
I received many compliments on this dress. I loved it but I had to wear a white tank under the dress because it is very low cut.

links_Review_Title: Love it! Runs a tad large
links_Review_Text: I really like this dress! It runs just a bit big and is quite long (I tripped a couple times in flats) but still loved it. Got several compliments while wearing it. Might try renting it again but sizing down to see if the XS fits better.

links_Review_Title: Adorable dress that fit well too!
links_Review_Text: Very cute details...was told I looked like a princess which I took as a compliment :) Fit true to size (I usually wear a 2-4). It's fairly long...the picture is right if you are 5'9 or taller so not a great one for the petite gals.
This dress was so cute on! I got so many compliments and questions about it!

links_Review_Title: It was great for a indoor wedding with an outdoor cocktail hour.
links_Review_Text: I usually wear a 12 or 14 dress size and this dress was just right for me. I'm also 5'10" and it was a pretty good length for me.

links_Review_Title: Love this dress and super cute on!
links_Review_Text: Dress fit perfect. I'm 5'3" and 125 - I went with M. Super cute and comfortable. I received a number of compliments. Definitely rent!
Very low cut. Would be hard for a large busted gal.

I loved this dress, but I couldn't get the side zip to close over my 34D chest - absolutely no stretch! I recommend sizing up when you order this. The material is heavier than I was expecting, I'm not sure I would wear this on a hot summer day. But the sleeves are gorgeous, and the details are well made.
So many compliments - will definitely rent again!
This dress was literally the lightest material I've ever worn. It was like wearing a sheet out.. buuut it did fit great and I loved the sass of the whole look. Perfect for Miami.

LOVES this dress! I am typically a size 2/4/6, but usually a straight up 4 and the 4 fit perfectly! I rented this dress for Super Bowl party weekend in Miami. It's super lightweight material and very comfortable for Florida climate. I received so many compliments all night long - 10/10 would recommend!
Loved this sexy dress. Rachel Zoe always runs small so I sized up to an 8. This dress is so light & airy. Perfect for vacation or Summer.

links_Review_Title: Great dress for a night out
links_Review_Text: Rented this for a birthday party and got a lot of compliments. Definitely size up. I'm normally a 4/6 and the 6 was tight. I would have preferred an 8

I loved this dress; gorgeous neckline with the one shoulder, beautiful and on trend animal print and super comfortable to wear. Material has no stretch and the 4 fit me with a lot of give and it was perfect. Sexy without being revealing. Loved it and will rent it again.
Wore this for a bachelorette night out and absolutely loved! If it weren't such a memorable and dramatic dress I would consider keeping. It's super lightweight and fun to wear. Tons of compliments!
Loved everything about this dress. Comfortable, unique and flattering.

links_Review_Title: I got SO many compliments on this dress!!
links_Review_Text: Everyone loved my dress and kept asking where I got it because they loved it that much. It was a beautiful dress!
Loved the fit, the light material (slightly annoying in the shoulder)... a favorite!
I am so obsessed with this dress. The 0 fit perfectly and was so flattering. I would wear it over and over again if I could! Love the one-sleeve and neck detail and the fabric was thin and soft.

This dress is well made and interesting. I enjoyed wearing it although as others said it's not super flattering. I wore an 8. I felt the back was a little tight around the butt rather than being flown. However, I have an athletic build. I think maybe a 10 would've been better on the bottom but maybe too big on top. It worked and received compliments just not a must have.
Super cute and fun! Glad I got the 10, but probably could have made an 8 work. If you are sometimes between sizes go up.

Loooved this dress! Can be styled for warm or cool weather. I paired mine with black booties and a leather jacket draped over my shoulders. Got so many compliments. I usually wear a 0 in dresses, but was happy the 2 was the only one available. Fit perfectly.
Fun dress, lots of compliments. Fabric made me a bit warm; definitely runs on the short side and if you're in bw sizes, size up. I belted it.

links_Review_Title: Probably my most favorite rental to date.
links_Review_Text: I love love love love this dress. The fit is perfect. It's so flattering. The compliments were overwhelming. It was almost embarrassing how many people commented on this dress after a while. The length was perfect for me. (I'm 5'9). I really miss this dress now that I sent it back. Lucky you if you can snag it.

links_Review_Title: True to size and fun design and print, not the most flattering in the midsection
Didn’t wear. Thought I looked like a cave girl.
links_Review_Text: Tried an 8 & it felt small and too sheer. I just didn’t think I could pull this off & didn’t wear it. I’m sure it’s very chic on others.

I passed this dress at the Georgetown store and I HAD to get it- I usually wear a 6 but the 10 worked since the piece is flowy. I wore it to brunch and got SO many compliments on it from my friends and strangers on the street. Wish I could wear this piece everyday!

links_Review_Title: The perfect bday dress for dinner with the hubs
links_Review_Text: The dress was amazing but just a smidge to tight in the hip and butt. Camouflaged by the print, so it wasn't obvious, but I knew it. But even with that, the compliments poured in. Would definitely rent again!

links_Review_Title: Loved it and got a ton of compliments!
links_Review_Text: I'm typically between a 4 or 6 but went with the 6 on this one. very comfortable to wear, wore to a holiday party and rented it again for a trip to Vegas.
I had to return because this dress was a little short for my 5'9" body. I wish it would have worked.

links_Review_Title: It's cute but I need to size up
links_Review_Text: Cute fun fabric just a lil to small in the chest

A great date dress! No zippers, elastic waist and a flattering length. The neck was tight so I added a hair tie to give a little breathing room. So many compliments I wish I would have got a photo, true proof of a good dress when you're too busy dancing! My hubby LOVED it and he is the only one who mattered and his compliments on my clothes are rare.

This dress was so fun to wear. It was the perfect length to feel sexy not trashy. I went up one size from my normal and was glad I did. The neck piece fit a tad bit tight on me. The fabric was a little on the thinner cheaper side than what I was expecting. I wore it with a belt. It was a fun look and different from what I would normally try.
So fun to wear! TTS, non-stretch flowy fabric.
Loved this dress and got tons of compliments. It is really thin material and light.
Loved this dress! It was very comfortable and felt fine without a bra. Fits true to size or a little big so it was roomy enough to shift easily.

the overall fit is small i'm always a 0 in Rachel Zoe and i could not comfortably wear this dress in my usual size. i would rent this dress again in a size 2 as it is totaLLy adorable and probably very flattering in right size.

Loved the print, cut and color! Fabric is super light and silky, perfect for a hot day. No need to wear a bra either—really feels effortless and comfy all day long. Probably works better with a small bust, size up otherwise.

Although I didn't get to go to the gala because of COVID-19, I sure did put makeup on, do my hair, and put on the dress for a picture. Great dress--just sexy enough without feeling inappropriate! Would rent again

links_Review_Title: The fit was so flattering! I got so many compliments!
links_Review_Text: This dress was stunning! So many people loved my dress! It was form fitting and still super classy! The dress was a tad long since I'm short but I used fashion tape and it worked like a charm!

This dress was my backup that I ended up wearing over my original pick. Although I loved both dress, the fiancé liked this one =) I wore this for a wedding and it was super comfortable and a beautiful color blue in person! It was such a fun and different design I had a lot of compliments on it. The best part for me was the fact that it has adjustable straps and holds you in place without needing a bra. I am a 36DD and felt more than comfortable not wearing one.

I rented this dress for a cocktail attire benefit. I wore the Large, but only because a M was not available. My backup was a S and that would have been a little snug. Stretchy dress so fit perfect on every curve! Not too low cut, didn't wear a bra, just stick on covers. I'm a 36DD so might not work as well for a smaller chest.
Single straps were boring looking so I spiced it up with a bolero and jewelry for a cold winter wedding

This dress is made of really high quality, thick material that sucks you in but is super comfortable at the same time. The adjustable straps make it easier to perfect your size. The slit up the front makes it easy to walk in. Obsessed and perfect for a wedding.

links_Review_Title: This dress is true to size. Thick fabric. Brighter color in person. Looked great!

links_Review_Text: I needed this in one day for a last-minute gala I had to attend and it was great! The material is somewhat stretchy so that was great. I loved the dark blue and blue combo.
This dress fits perfectly in all the right places! I had so many people ask me where I got it from :)

This dress fit like a glove but was still stretchy so perfect for dancing at a wedding! I wore a sticky bra with it and spanx but may not have even needed the spanx thanks to the material. I like where it hit below the knee too.
This dress fit like a glove! Was appropriate enough for a church wedding, but sexy enough for the dance floor. Lots of compliments with this one!
The thickness was nice. Smoothed our the bumps. Thirty weeks pregnant in this pic. I'm 5'7'' and would usually wear a medium (sometimes a small depending). Worked for the occasion!
Great dress. Some stretch and support in a thick knit but shape flattering. Adjustable straps. A bit long for my frame but easily amended with double sided tape at the hem.

Loved the way this dress fit on me. I liked that it fit snug and is a thick material. The slit in the front was different which I really liked just need to be careful dancing! Otherwise I loved it and got a lot of compliments!
Nice material. Runs a little large, but that made it flattering. Great for larger bust and curves.

This dress fit like an absolute glove. The design is unique, colors are dark enough to still be formal but fun, and the fit huts in all the right places. Was super comfortable to sit and dance in. Would rent this a million times again!

links_Review_Title: THIS DRESS WAS THE BEST EVER
links_Review_Text: zero cons at all, so comfy. Fit like a glove

I LOVE this dress! It's navy and blue, not blue and black and the lines on it are super flattering. The slit in the front makes it sexy but the style and length keeps it classy. The straps are adjustable and it was super comfortable to wear. I'm 5'5 about 140 with thick thighs and a bum and the small was perfect!
Dress fit so perfectly, extremely comfortable, adjustable straps, perfect length to dance without worrying !!
Material felt tight but also very breathable, it's pretty stretchy so I would suggest going true to size or down one if you're not sure.

This is probably my favorite dress I've ever worn. It is form fitting, the color blocking is super flattering and the look so just so chic and unique. It's high quality and well made. I loved wearing this dress and received so many compliments. This dress made my night!

I wore this to a black tie optional event. It fit like a glove and was very comfortable. I liked how you could adjust the straps. Definitely a unique piece with its pattern but still very classy. I'd rent again!

This was true to size which was great since I didn't rent a back up size. My breasts are small (34 B) and I could have been bigger busted and still fit in this but I wasn't swimming. It was so sexy and flattering for a curvy girl like me, but still tasteful. Definitely sexier in person than on the model.

links_Review_Title: My stylist found this gem for me!
links_Review_Text: Great dress!
Perfect. Sexy. Fit like a glove and I received so many compliments !
I thought it'd fit perfect but it was lose on the waist and a bit tight on the hips. Not so flattering on me :(
I thought this dress looked good on me, but it just didn't work for me. The material was really thick and it made me look older than I am.
The front slit is amazing!

links_Review_Title: This dress was the perfect blend of sexy and sophisticated.
links_Review_Text: The dress fit really well. I would say it fits very true to size. I am 5'4, 135 pounds and the S fit perfectly.
This dress fit amazing, I loved it and got so many compliments

links_Review_Title: Comfortable all night and so many compliments!
links_Review_Text: This is such a comfortable dress. The fabric is thick, but hugs your curves. I am only 5'1", so the dress was about ankle length on me. I didn't mind the length, but if that's not your style, then I might chose something else.

I wear a 10 and RTR recommended the XLR and it was huge. The fabric feels a big rough and though it's cute the midi length wasn't flattering on me. In the right size Id have worn it with a leather jacket out to dinner but it felt too casual for the party I planned to attend.

links_Review_Title: Great for New Year's Eve in the Caribbean
links_Review_Text: Fit wonderful and very flattering

links_Review_Title: So comfortable, flattering and easy to wear
links_Review_Text: It was a tad big in the bust for me, but it still looked fine and only I could tell. It's a nice thick material, holds you in but also stretches, super flattering, loved loved loved it!!

Love the fabric and cut of this dress. It's a thick fabric so you feel secure and shapely without any bulges or panty-line issues. I wish teh colors were more striking as it was difficult to get a good picture in the evening light to show them off. That's my only complaint!
Gorgeous dress! The fabric was beautiful and did not feel cheap. Tight fitting & sexy/classy! The slit in front was a little uncomfortable when sitting down at ceremony. But overall I loved it!!

links_Review_Title: Lots of compliments on this sexy dress. It highlights natural curves for sure.
links_Review_Text: The material is a little thicker than I thought it would be. The colors and nice and bright - the blues and navy are pop more than the pictures show. The dress is a little more low cut than I would normally wear, but there are adjustable straps to adjust the top of the dress which is nice.
Perfect party dress for my sons Jungle themed bday. Runs true to size. I probably could have done a 4 but I'm a 34D and needed the 6. Gorgeous and true to Valentino style.

I felt really pretty in this dress. Very light fabric. The top fit (32DD), but there was a fair amount of room in the waistline. You could wear this dress pregnant for sure (I'm not pregnant). I did receive tons of compliments though !

I have never received so many compliments before! I get lots of compliments on my outfits, but with this one I even had complete strangers tell me how much they loved it. The print is super weird with all of the lizards and birds-- all descendants of dinosaurs! The dress is pretty short and there is no stretch. It's gorgeous and comfortable. I would 100% recommend and I will absolutely be renting again!
I'm not prone to wearing pink or a ton of frills. BUT I couldn't resist this print. The fabric is very structured with a little stretch. I will size down when I rent again (and again and again).

The print on this dress is even more gorgeous in person. I received many compliments. The only drawback was the fit. It fit great everywhere except my mid section. It was really loose in the stomach area. Also it wrinkles very quickly. The fabric is polyester but it is lined.

I loved wearing this print! The juxtaposition of the pattern and pink background w the lizards and snakes is brilliant and I was surprised how many people didn't actually notice the reptiles but complimented the dress and later noticed the reptiles. I feel like my RTR rentals have been a little snug (my weight fluctuates but oh well) so I sized up and it was a little big so I added the belt.

This dress has a gorgeous print that looks even better in person! I received many compliments on the dress throughout the night. As I read in other reviews before renting, the proportions are a little off, but it still looked great! The dress will work best for those with smaller chests, but has PLENTY of room in the torso. The material does not stretch so order accordingly.
Fits very comfortably and is a fun dress to wear. Got many compliments and would definitely recommend.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful pattern, weird cut and fit....
links_Review_Text: I was so excited to get this dress and waited a while with Unlimited for it to be available. While, I absolutely loved the pattern, the fabric and cut of the dress was just off for me. I am a solid 6 with a good fit & flare-this dress was loose in the waist and tighter around the hips & never laid straight. There is no stretch in the fabric-with alterations it could be a perfect dress-not the best rental for me.
I loved this dress! A little tights in the bust and no stretch

links_Review_Title: Made me feel like a queen!
links_Review_Text: This dress just feels expensive. The structure is very flattering. My dress wasn't exactly form hugging giving me enough room to relax & feel great. It's so cute for spring. I revived compliments all day long!
Runs true to size. Material is not stretchy. Some reviews said it wasn't a good fit for girls with a large back side, but I didn't have any problem!! Will definitely rent again!!!

So I really really wanted to like this dress but the fit was so weird on me. I am pretty curvy (yah girl has got a booty) and this fit me so weird around that area. It was really tight around the butt and very loose in other places. It made me look heavier because the material bunched up around my stomach and hips.

links_Review_Title: Much better in pictures than in person
links_Review_Text: Extremely puffy in person, not flattering. Beautiful fabric, but not made well.

links_Review_Title: I wore this to a bridal tea.
links_Review_Text: I have a tiny waist but large hips. Where it flares at the bottom, is not stretchy. I constantly had to pull it down as it would scrunch up as I walked. So while it was almost too tight around my hips, it was swallowing me in my waist area. All in all totally worth wearing the designer for an afternoon- so many compliments on this unique dress

links_Review_Title: Loved the pattern and it got several compliments while we were out.
links_Review_Text: It was a little big in the waist but fit great every where else.

links_Review_Title: Love the style and pattern of this dress!!!
links_Review_Text: Fit was perfect!

links_Review_Title: Extremely too big. Ordered the smallest size possible and it was still way too loose in waist
links_Review_Text: Beautiful print. Runs about 1 size too large

links_Review_Title: It was a fun print for a girl's dinner.
links_Review_Text: It was fun and I got compliments. It seemed wrinkly right away but overall a fun dress and beautiful color.
This was a super fun dress!! It is flattering an comfortable. It was a little tight in the chest but true to size otherwise. One of the sleeves was frayed but not super noticeable.
For me it was tight in the bust then just flared out. I had to belt it. It felt a little like wearing a comforter.

links_Review_Title: amazing print - fun ruffles - tea party chic
links_Review_Text: I rented a size up because of the reviews but I really didn't need to, the size up was way too big - I wore it once anyway and still got lots of compliments - not as short as other Valentino dresses I have rented so that was a big plus

I ordered one size up because that's all that was available...and it was too big so I would say this dress is true to size. I won't bother reordering, even though I love the print...because I don't like the cut of the dress, too short-waisted and seam of bottom frill ran right under my butt cheeks. Dressy rather casual due to shiny fabric and frills.
This dress doesn't have much give but the cut is great! The print is feminine yet edgy and cool. Look close on the pictures. I received tons of compliments. Rent it!

links_Review_Title: Absolutely stylish print on an otherwise floral dress
links_Review_Text: The floral print is gorgeous and then people see snakes, lizards, and birds on it... so it just ups the style factor even more! Totally loved wearing it. So comfy! And the ruffle detail is so fun.

The fabric of this dress was beautiful, and the fit was relatively true to size maybe a little large. The cut however was so strange that the dress, at least for me, was unwearable. Specifically in the front where the flutter was attached to the main body of the dress made the dress fall extremely weirdly.
Wore this with booties for a rehearsal dinner for a mountain wedding and it was the perfect style! Was a bit worried about the size but the 42 was great. I'm normally a 4-6.

I love this dress. I paired it with a Gucci Snake belt and it went really well with the motif of the print. I did not end up wearing it, however, but that was my fault. I just tried to wear it for a Fall event but decided that it was just too Spring/Summer to make it work. I can't wait to rent it again, however.
I rented this to wear to a conference but it is so SHORT I didn't end up wearing it. Pretty fabric though.

I really love the pattern of this dress, but the fit was very strange. The seam above the ruffle hit me almost in the middle of my behind, so the whole dress sat awkwardly. The fabric on the chest also wasn't very flattering since it was poofing along the midsection, it looked disproportionately small in the bust. Sadly, didn't wear.

This dress transitioned well from church rehearsal to rehearsal dinner at restaurant. The reptile and bird print is unique. It's a conservative dress but the print makes it a little edgy. The skirt half rides up a bit, other than that the fit is very comfortable.

links_Review_Title: Didn't wear it, was too big and very weird material.
links_Review_Text: The style was super cute and flattering, but it was just too big and the fabric was a very weird material that looked and felt cheap. The pattern is also just too much with a big lizard on your chest, etc.

links_Review_Title: sooo pretty!! got so many compliments. I could have held on to this for forever.
links_Review_Text: simply gorgeous!! the print on this is amazing!!

I don't believe that you can have a bad day when you are wearing a dress with lizards and birds eating snakes. I received so many compliments on this quirky look. Runs small, but only from the stand point of all designer clothing runs small and this was no exception. Recommend a good belt to pull it together. I had a moss green leather belt that was perfect. I will definitely repeat this dress.

I love Valentino. My favorite designer but this dress is a big miss. Not a flattering cut. Seem right under butt. Feels awkward and ruffles flare up with wind. It's poofy at abdomen and cut kinda straight. Doesn't flatter curves.
Large and puffy but would rent another size down to wear at work. The fabric is strange and thin but the design is nice and fun
The pattern of this dress with the lizards and birds is the best. Fit was a little odd, but still loved it.

links_Review_Title: Fun dress for Easter brunch - it is short wear a low heel shoe.
links_Review_Text: Adorable - it is short - wear low heels

I love the print of this dress, but it fit very awkwardly. It was tight on the chest and butt, but really loose in my waist. If you have more of an hourglass shape I wouldn't go for this dress. Also the material is a little odd, almost feels like it needs a liner.... I didn't wear it and had to return
Tons of compliments! Flattering fit. I could've sized down and still been comfortable
Very flattering and fit like a dream
This dress for so well. It is super comfortable and easy to move in. The knot hit me just right. Very flattering and gorgeous.

I went out of my comfort zone with this dress and while it was fun, it really isn't my style. It fits well- I sized up because it's a tighter fitting dress and I'm glad I did. There is natural ruching with the style of the dress which is nice and makes it more figure flattering.
Stretchy mesh keeps it's shape and feels good to wear

I felt like a star in this dress! It fit me great, the stretch makes it hard not to flatter a body no matter your shape. I loved the dark floral pattern, and the mesh-like fabric and semi-sheer arms were such edgy details! I styled it with black knee boots and (believe it or not) camo patterned leather earrings and got major kudos. This was a fun one. WRA.

links_Review_Title: Loved this dress! Perfect for our theatre party!
links_Review_Text: I got so many compliments on this dress! It fit perfectly!

I rented this to wear for a work trip to New Orleans and the Gulf Coast but also wore it to a funeral. The sleeves of this dress are sheer which kept me from overheating in the warm Gulf coast winter heat. The gathering at the waist was extremely flattering. The coloring is somber enough that it's funeral appropriate, but the butterflies add a nice happy pop.

This designer uses a stretchy mesh - which may not sound comfortable or pretty and yet it's both. It's got layers to it, with beautiful prints and swingy flow. Arms are fitted but not tight. Absolute winner. I wore with jean jacket to concert. It was perfect.
Comfortable & really flattering on a curvy body. Love the dress, love the brand.

links_Review_Title: This was a perfect dress for our fundraising event! The most comfortable and flattering.

links_Review_Text: Gorgeously made and love this designer. Fits like a glove, but in a good way. Able to wear a regular bra. Beautifully made too like all other Fuzzi items.

For starters the fabric is light as a feather veil-like knit that gives a lot to shape with your body. It loosens up a bit and stays in place. The pattern of this one is so dramatic and cool and different. Wish I could afford to keep it. Would wear to an elegant party with heals or with a denim jacket. Love love Fuzzi dresses!

links_Review_Title: So sexy but I wish it was tighter at my waist.
links_Review_Text: This dress is gorgeous! My only negative is that the way the twist is in the front it was slightly unflattering at my waist, down. I received so many compliments and wore it with black booties for a more casual look.
Wore this for work with cobalt blue jacket, which I removed for dinner. Arms tend to stretch a bit too much and are itchy after a while. Really comfortable overall and the pattern is fabulous.

links_Review_Title: This was my favorite rental of all! Beautiful fabric, flattering fit, many compliments!
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress!
The fit was nice, but I didn’t like the style of the dress and how it hang on me.
I wore this dress on a date with my husband and felt like a million bucks! It fit well and had a beautiful, unique print. Would rent it again!

links_Review_Title: Loved this dress. So flattering and super comfy, but still notably pretty. Lots of compliments.
links_Review_Text: stretchy, comfortable fabric. very flattering. tea legnth.
Comfortable dress, looked amazing on, and loved that it covered my arms but was still sheer. Very flattering too. So many compliments.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful but runs small. Fabric is clingy.
links_Review_Text: Rented as a backup option and ended up going with jumpsuit instead. This was a beautiful dress but it runs a little small and the fabric was a bit clingy. I was about 14 weeks pregnant at the time and hadn't yet told anyone publicly. This dress & its clinginess around the midsection would've made the announcement for me. lol

links_Review_Title: It's light and flowy but fit really well.
links_Review_Text: I have large bust but it stretched over and still fit my waist.
Beautiful in every way. Would rent again.
Fit perfect. Not too tight, flattering
perfect fit
lovely print and fit was good.

links_Review_Title: So many compliments on this dress!
links_Review_Text: Fit perfectly
I wore this to an outdoor winter wedding and it was perfect. The material is stretchy and flattering and the colors are beautiful. I received several comments and will definitely rent again!
I wore this dress for a work Christmas party and loved it. The mesh sleeves are nice because you won't overheat, but it hides my less-than-tan arms this time of the year

Fits large - the small wasn't fitted through the waist and wasn't tight at all (except arms, which fit perfectly). Reads sort of 90s reimagined, but professional enough to work for work at a law firm. Sort of itchy in a couple of places but looked great. Very light.

links_Review_Title: Loved this dress. It was amazing
links_Review_Text: It runs small but I got a larger size and it is very flattering especially for curvy girls

So many beautiful dresses from rent the runway but my favorite designer is fuzzi with easy material that doesn't wrinkle and is comfortable. I wore this with black boots and that's it. The butterfly print is subtle and I didn't add to this stunning dress as I felt it was beautiful just as it was. I'm tall so this kind of dress really works well for me and I enjoyed wearing it.

This dress exceeded my expectations. I wore this to my family's Thanksgiving this year & it was absolutely perfect. It's really beautiful and flattering while still being family appropriate. It's a black slip with a very fine mesh overlay and it's very, very stretchy. The twist over the stomach was flattering. It was also very comfortable - I wasn't aching to take it off after gorging on our Thanksgiving meal and I could easily sit on the floor and play with the kids. I'll rent again for sure.

links_Review_Title: If you have the perfect figure, this dress is for YOU!!!
links_Review_Text: Just. Did. Not. Fit my body at all. Too loose in the hips, too tight across the back and made me look like I was 6 mos pg. It definitely is very stretchy so if you happen to be pregnant and want to show off that beautiful bump, this could be your dress. Just waaaaay to tight for an old woman like me!

Wore this to my agency with a leather jacket and black sock booties. It was a hit, I had a management training that day and the two professionals commented that they loved my style. Felt confident in it. The material just clings to you, I wish I sized down to have to be more skin tight.
Great fit, mediocre style
I love Fuzzi dresses. The soft mesh they use is incredibly comfortable. Loved the print and cut of this dress.
Great fit,

Forgot to get a picture but this dress has a good amount of stretch and a flattering silhouette. The arms run a little long but I folded them in about 2 inches on each side and the fold stuck all night without fashion tape or anything. I'm just about 20 weeks pregnant so a bump is starting to form and this was nice and light and allowed for extra room. It was a perfect mesh material for a September evening gala even. Don't know if I'd rent again but definitely worked well for the evening.
It was super lose on the waist and my breasts and hips are large so it didn't look flattering at all.

I wore this for a baby shower and it was very comfy. The waist is very stretchy and not form fitting. The length was a low tea length, just above the ankle. (You can only barely see my shoes because of the angle / my husband had me twirl.) Lots of compliments!
At 13.5 this dress was just perfect for work -- it was comfortable and I would suggest ran a little large

I wore this dress when I was about 12 weeks pregnant and it was so comfortable and flattering. It runs on the long side, so I am not sure how it would fit on shorter gals (im 5'6). The 4 fit me perfectly with a growing bump, but I probably could have normally fit in a 2 if I weren't pregnant so I would suggest sizing down. It is a black dress with white raised dots (it reads kind of gray in pictures), but I loved the print/style/and fabric.

Ok this is a terrible photo I posted (it's all I had), but I absolutely love this dress! This is seriously probably the fourth time I've rented it. It's so flattering, while also sophisticated and extremely comfortable. I've worn to a ton of work events, and receive so many compliments every time I do!
Very comfortable. Loved the details.
Rented this to wear at work, super comfortable. Relaxed fit, didn't need spanx. Also wore it at night with heals to a charity event. Very versatile summer dress.
I was told I looked so powerful in this dress, walking down the hall. I don't know about that, but it is a flattering dress that is easy to wear. The sides are smocked so it gives it breathing room.
I wore this dress to a breakfast event and received so many compliments! It was super comfy too.
Lots of compliments and very comfortable. I paired it with a belt

links_Review_Title: This dress was the reason I joined Rent the Runway
links_Review_Text: The fabric is stretchy, so if you're in between sizes it is likely to still fit you. I literally travel from 16-22 and wore a size 16R with no issues whatsoever. Honestly the fabric is amazing and it fits your form well.

links_Review_Title: Unique shape and easy to wear
links_Review_Text: High neck and flair sleeves made this piece stand it. Very comfy, zipper was a little sticky but not impossible in the back.

links_Review_Title: Love love love this style fit everything.
links_Review_Text: It's so comfy and flattering. Love it.

I loved the look of the dress and it was fairly light without being see-through. The length was a bit odd, I should have probably worn flats with it, but I did not. I love the neckline. I had to wear a tank top under the dress because my bra would show due to the cut if the armhole and my small frame.

This is a pretty basic dress in terms of fabric and construction, but it's a wonderful canvas for statement accessories like jewelry, belts, shoes, and bags. Everyone needs this or their own version of a dress like this in their closet. These are the garments where our individuality can really shine. One star off because its pretty worn out and smells funky but apart from that it's great!

links_Review_Title: too hot longer then i expected and did not fit well
links_Review_Text: too hot longer then i expected and did not fit well
I really liked this dress. Definitely a different style, but it was very flattering on.

This dress is very cute! Only issue is that there seemed to be a little extra fabric in the bust and upper back area, not sure if that’s intentional or from the dress being stretched out by other RTR customers. Not a huge problem, because it seemed to be the only one that noticed. 😅

This dress was perfect for a conservative look and could we worn dressed up to the office, or dressed down to an everyday affair. The fabric is beautiful. It is so much fabric, that if you are in between two sizes, I would recommend going for the smaller one for a slightly more fitted look. I am between a 6 and an 8, rented the 8, but wished I had rented the 6.

links_Review_Title: This dress was fun, different, and super comfortable!
links_Review_Text: I wore this to a baptism and it was a lot of fun to wear something different! I wore it with fun black heels and it was super comfortable.
Great dress. True to size. Wore to work then out to gallery show straight after - lots of compliments in both places.
This dress is so adorable! The floaty cap sleeve and the contrasting pattern is super flattering. Loved this so much!
Unique and comfortable!
The level of detail on this dress is absolutely stunning and only best appreciated when you have it on hand. It's also comfortable and fits true to size.
I loved the texture and neck of this dress, but it felt large even sizing down. Great quality!
Didn't wear it. Certainly comfortable, but I felt marmy in it.

links_Review_Title: This dress is so flattering. It's lightweight and comfortable. LOVE.
links_Review_Text: The flutter sleeves are beautiful. The length is perfect for heels or flats, and it just fits so well.
The bust ran too large and the torso is long on this dress. Could have sized down

links_Review_Title: My father in law didn't recognize me!
links_Review_Text: Love the dress. So cute, so chic.
Loved this dress. Flattering and wearable without heels for a 5'2" person
Love it. I'm tall so the length was perfect.

links_Review_Title: I LOVE THIS DRESS SO MUCH
links_Review_Text: OH MY GOD I LOVE IT. Fits like a dream - nice and stretchy but still looks very structured. Fabrication is beautiful - great movement - love the fabric dots. I'm absolutely buying this one as a special "treat yo-self" item for my birthday!
Wore this for work and it was perfect. Super comfortable and flattering. I'm obsessed with the texture of the polka dots. May have to buy this one :)

Elastic panels on the side make this a form fitting dress so I would order a size down if youre in between. It is a heavier weight than it looks in the pictures so if I rented again I would wear in the spring or fall. Very comfy and fun for work.
Eh. Just ok.

Always hard to know what fabric is going to be like but this has a lot of stretch to it, true to size (for me I should have gone with a 10, the 12 was big). Didn't stop people from saying they loved it. Comfy and flattering. Rent!
The fit was great, tons of compliments. Cute and spunky while being a classic cut for work

links_Review_Title: Loved the fabric - didn't love the length. Really accentuates your waistline
links_Review_Text: The length of the dress with my height made me feel a little frumpy.
I wore it for a casual Friday at work with flats..Sooooo many compliments..I also belted it...love the fabric overall amazing wearable dress.

I loved this dress SO MUCH you guys! Obviously, because I took 1038 photos of it. I will be looking for it on sale in the future. Might rent again in a week I mean I die for this dress. No stretch but excellent craftsmanship and fabric. I felt like a million bucks. Styled as shown (with adhesive bra).
Got so many compliments. Super low cut for a big chested gal like me- so I went rogue and laced the front ties thru a peek a boo front lace bra- worked great!

Loved this dress and pattern!! The slits are higher than shown on the image and it is lower cut. Wore with a tank top underneath for work and without for a dressier more formal weekend event. Usually wear a 4 and the 8 worked great and fit well in the arms and shoulders.
Great dress. Was a little out of my comfort zone, but felt great in it. Very low cut so be prepared with going braless or a deep v bra. Also- get some fashion tape to keep it in place.

links_Review_Title: The dress is great if breast didn't require coverage!
links_Review_Text: The dress was comfortable after I incorporated a bralette. The feel is amazing, the flow is great and dress hugged all the right places except my breast.
Wore to take the man out to dinner for his bday. Cute and sexy. Love the print
Fits like a glove. A little low cut but in a tasteful way! I have broader shoulders and still fit great! Couldn't recommend more for a cocktail event!
Felt like an Italian stallion in the dress walking the streets of Tuscany while on vacation. Paired perfectly with a black blazer, boots and the hat. Loved the sexiness while still very classy

links_Review_Title: Classic Elegance with a sexy twist
links_Review_Text: Perfect date night dress in a breezy fabric that works great for transitioning seasons. Can be dressed up or down and is the perfect amount of class and sex appeal. Highly recommend
I love the print of this dress, but the cut and style are what really makes it! It's classy and sophisticated, but also kind of hot with the low cut v.
Beautiful all around, loved it.
Fit perfectly. I didn't wear a bra but you can get away with a cute black lace one if you need it (it will show). Got so many compliments! Would rent again
Absolutely perfect! The v is adjustable, perfect length and the fabric is lightweight. I wish I could buy it! Runs TTS
The plunging neckline in the front is my favorite. Definitely not for the fuller busted. Perfect for day or night. So many compliments!
Great drape and fabric- very low so wore a lace cami

I've learned I can't wear a sz 4 in PS when the item has sleeves, my broad shoulders make it too tight up top. With that said, the size 6 was a great fit! Plenty of room in the shoulders, good room across the bust and not too big in the waist and hips. Overall this was a great dress and I understand why it is rarely available!
Such a gorgeous piece. So many compliments. Loved the wrist ties and side slits. No stretch. Would rent again!!
A little tight in the arms, but otherwise fit perfect!!! In small chested, and didnt need to wear a bra, or ise garment tape. Felt like the coolest girl in town all night.

It is simple yet not. Looser fit but the slits and low cut make it just sexy enough! The print is super simple and pretty- especially in a sea of black dresses! Comfortable, light material. Its a pretty deep v, I didnt see that theres a small hook right at the bottom of the v until I put it on for the event! I needed some fashion tape due to a small chest but got tons of compliments!!

Beautiful designer dress great attention to detail black lining that flashes as you walk due to the side slits is a nice effect. the plunging neck lie is flattering I chose to wear a lace bralette underneath as I do not like to show too much cleavage. I wore a size larger than normal as my size was not available it was comfortable and I there was some room but did not swamp me.

The fit was fairly true to size, but the bust area was a little big. Looked great with a sticky bra but a little tough to keep from flashing people when i sat down haha. If i had implants i think the dress would have been perfect though. I wore it to work as week but added a cami underneath for more coverage. Beautiful dress but wouldnt purchase it.

This is one of my most favorite rentals as of late. Dress runs TTS and is SO flattering on the body. The tie in the front allows you to slightly adjust the deep v in front but there is also a hook and eye closure to ensure your ladies dont bust free. This style and print is incredibly versatile and easy go dress io or down. I rented this with a Style Pass and wore it twice during the four day rental. And I hardly repeat ensembles so you know I loved it. Also note, I'm 6 ft tall and the sleeves were full length on me and the hem hit mid calf. Slit on leg came up to mid thigh. This dress might be a touch long on someone more petite.
It is definitely low cut and required a bra. That being said, it may be too much skin depending on the situation but I found it to be a lovely dress.
Loved this - you can tell it's a nice dress based on the way it's cut. I loved it!

This dress.. Omg! So gorgeous! The fit, the floral print, the length.. everything was amazing! Since there are slits at the thigh area is more comfortable but still gives the look of a fitted dress. I can say though that since the bust area is a low-cut, wearing a bra is a bit complicated. You'd probably need to a wear a plunge-style bra or atleast a nude color so it isn't visible. There is a clip in the front that closes it a little, but you could definitely pin it if you don't want to show as much. If you have a smaller bust and are comfortable enough, you could probably get aware with no bra. This is definitely something I'd buy.

links_Review_Title: Sexy Dress, but Zipper in Back Makes a Bump
links_Review_Text: This dress is very nice and with the low low cut very sexy. Unfortunately, the zipper in the back would come up into a bump anytime I stood straight. I think if I had more boob it wouldnt do that. Definitely NSFW or any modest occassion.

links_Review_Title: Cute but I'm not tall enough
links_Review_Text: Super cute but I need to be a little longer in the torso area. It hit me at a weird place. But very pretty and I loved the deep V.

links_Review_Title: Definitely low cut but also extremely sexy and beautiful. Highly recommend!
links_Review_Text: Good for day or night. Fits very true to size.
It fit but was a little snug across the hips - would look better on a less curvy body.

links_Review_Title: I didn't end up wearing it.
links_Review_Text: After reading all the glowing reviews, I was sure I was going to love this dress. It didn't really flatter me: I think I need a little more assistance camouflaging my not-great mid-section. The fabric is pretty thin and the style is minimal with *very* little seaming/ rucking/ panels, etc. It would probably look best on a tall rail-thin woman. I did really like the side slits and the overall length: great with black boots for that transitional time between winter and spring.

links_Review_Title: Loved the cut. Flattering, classy and sexy!
links_Review_Text: A little low cut, but balanced out with the long sleeves and longer length. It is flattering and classy with a touch of sexy.

links_Review_Title: Huge in all the wrong places.
links_Review_Text: Just awful
Love low cut dresses but this is not meant for the short/petite. It still fits and I made it work but the waist fell below where mine actually was. Came to ankles and wore with heels.
It fit well but the neckline was more plunging than I anticipated. It was a super sexy dress but a little too much for my event.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress, wore with that shirt underneath
links_Review_Text: Love this dress. Wore it to work with black booties and a shirt underneath

links_Review_Title: Did not wear. Wide open front.
links_Review_Text: I read the reviews and I did not heed the warning that this dress is very low cut. There was no bra and my lingerie drawer that could be worn with this dress (and I have an extensive array). You need to be small chested or not need a bra and use lingerie tape to stay inside of this garment. I will say that it gave me a big heads up that I need to pay attention to what people are saying about cleavage. I wish every reviewer included cup size and weight. It would be helpful.
I wore this to dinner on vacation. It was a comfortable fabric but wasn't the best fit for my body. The front ties were a bit awkward. Very well made, but just not my style.
Didn't work for me. Low cut. No stretch. Tight for a pear shaped person unless you size up.
So comfy, cute, and stylish. Love it. I am 5'6, 145 pounds and got the size 6.

This dress fits perfectly and has gorgeous details that you can't see in the photos. The print is great and it is so flattering. The neckline is super low and the slits are higher than I was expecting so it is not a casual dress, but you can dress it down by putting a tank top under it and it still looks great.
Super flattering. Great stretchy fabric that was comfortable for a wedding. Looked like a feminine tuxedo. I paired it with a big statement necklace. Highly recommend!

links_Review_Title: Fun night with my husband at the Delta Sigma Theta Black MasqueRED Gala!
links_Review_Text: I'm short and curvy with a very short torso! The jumpsuit fit great through the bust, waist, and just right through the hips! The peplum ruffle hid my belly well without making me look wider, and the asymmetrical line distracted from my mild scoliosis. It was a little long, but the petite was not available. I would 100% rent this again, but pair with red heels and jewelry next time!
I work this for a work presentation and it's flattering in so many ways! I'm 5'5" and normally jumpsuits are very long on me. This one was the perfect length. Comfy and amazing!

links_Review_Title: Wore this to a trendy bar in NYC for my 30th birthday. So fabulous!
links_Review_Text: This was so comfortable and fit me perfectly. Still debating purchasing to keep!
Was super comfortable! Got so many compliments at work today. One lady even said "Wow, i think that's your power suit". Gleaming. I'll rent again.

links_Review_Title: Black Halo always order 1 or 2 sizes up and expect compliments
links_Review_Text: I almost sent this back but had an event and it was this or nothing. I am hourglass to pear shape, hippy. I usually wear a 14 on bottom, but was able to make the 16 work, with shape wear. Smaller would not have fit. Also short in the torso. The material is thick and nice. You could coordinate this with any accessories for a subdued or edgy look. Pretty comfortable. Got lots of comments.

Great little work outfit or even for an event. I only wish the torso was about 1" longer! I have short legs and a long torso so it's a little tight on my bootie. Had to wear a long sweater and flats. Cute little outfit though.
Was a little short in the torso, but def order the long if you want to wear heels. So unique! And AMAZING material

links_Review_Title: Thick stretchy material with the exception of the sleeves VERY tight. Danced all night super comfy!

links_Review_Text: I never thought I'd find a pantsuit that would look good on me, but I really liked this one. It was a little tight in the shoulders for me. But other than that I felt like it fit well. My husband commented on how nice it looked too. So overall a winner.

links_Review_Title: Wishing it was easier to use the bathroom
links_Review_Text: I didn't think I'd be able to get this jumpsuit back on after I went to the bathroom at an event! Luckily a nice lady in the bathroom helped me zip up but that was awkward! Lol I am 5' 2" and the petite size 16P fit like a glove. I probably would have purchased it if it was easier to get on and off
This was a great work outfit and I contemplating hard whether I purchase or re-rent. Fun design and cut, professional, and super comfortable
Crotch was too low for the fit, I also had to wear 2+ inch heels to make the length work

links_Review_Title: So many compliments! Fits like a glove.
links_Review_Text: Fits perfectly. The material is stretchy enough to avoid looking bad, but thick enough to be professional. Great option for formal office.
Fit like a dream, nice thick fabric very forgiving. Would recommend in a heart beat, was tempted to keep it!!!

Best outfit ever. I wore this outfit for my annual women's only charity event. Most women are wearing formal dresses but I felt like a standout in this jumpsuit!! I was told many times that my outfit was the favorite of the night. It was so comfortable. Not too long but not too short either. I felt like a total boss-babe in this thing. If you are looking for a unique outfit that stands out without being too flashy, this is the one to pick!!
Wore this on a double date and felt fabulous. It was comfortable yet looked chic. Would be fantastic for a wedding or more formal event.

links_Review_Title: I got so many compliments on it!!
links_Review_Text: Definitely a great choice! Wore it for an election and won!! Would rent again! It was a little heavier than i expected but i felt like i could do anything in it! A great power suit!!!
Perfect fit, fabric was soft but thick.

Rented the 14L and 16L for the gala I needed to attend. Wore the 14 and it fit perfect! Material is thick and so soft perfect for a winter evening. The ruffle was perfectly detailed and covered the portion of my tummy I was concerned about with being short torso in a jumpsuit. I have fairly long legs and was going to wear a 3" heel so I rented the long and it was perfect. Loved that I was able to wear a regular bra and was so comfortable all night long.

links_Review_Title: Love the unique cut of this!
links_Review_Text: Thicker fabric but had a lot of stretch. I'm 5'3 and wore the regular length with kitten heels and it was perfect. Was comfortable not wearing a bra. I got the 12R as my backup size but preferred the tighter fit. Shoulders were a bit tight.

links_Review_Title: Underrated! Get the Long Version if taller than 5'5"
links_Review_Text: Fabulous fabric - thick! I felt warm in it towards the end of the day. This piece would have been short if I did not get the Long version! Would totally get again!

links_Review_Title: A nice substitute for a dress at a rehearsal dinner
links_Review_Text: I loved the style and material of this jumpsuit and for the most part it was very flattering. I went with the long option based on other reviews and I felt as though it was still short in the legs for my liking (may be my hips though). It's also challenging to go to the restroom by yourself as it zips all the way in the back. Overall, very comfortable and pretty jumpsuit.

links_Review_Title: It was NYE and my last wedding of the year!
links_Review_Text: I got two sizes. The 6 was a little tight in the bust. The 8 fit perfectly. Length of the pant worked great with heels. As a wedding planner, I need to look presentable while being able to function. I wanted to look a little nicer for the NYE wedding and this was the perfect outfit. I would rent it again for a nice dinner, event or even attending a wedding!

links_Review_Title: Wore for New Years. Easy to wear, classic and elegant.
links_Review_Text: Fabric has a neoprene feel and weight, which lets it drape beautifully and keeps you warm.
This fit great and was comfortable. I worry with jumpsuits and my long torso but it fit like a glove and left plenty of room for my delicious dinner
This piece runs a tad large from the torso, down. The material stretches so you can go 1 size smaller and it will hug your curves and fit nicely.

I wore this to a formal event. I got a ton of compliments! It's form fitting but very flattering and stretchy! I wish I would've ordered the size 2 (what I normally wear) but went up a size based on reviews. It still fit great but was a little baggier than I like. Overall, a great piece and I will rent again!

links_Review_Title: Fresh and innovative take on the LBD
links_Review_Text: I wore this for a big work event and it did not disappoint. In the sea of LBDs, this pantsuit with peplum detail and great material/fit stood way out. The diamond collar necklace was the perfect accent for my event, but I can also see some great colorful jewelry/shoes working as well.

Wore on stage for a panel, fit perfectly. Professional feel with a little flair. Embellishment at the front is long, hit almost mid thigh. Pants fall straight (I have a big butt and didn't notice any tightness around the rear). Photographs with a slight shine.
Not quite right style for my event but would get again, much more flattering than I thought a jumpsuit would be. The 12L fit well
Very comfortable. Good quality!

I like how the ruffle takes away from the awkward crotch view I always feel like jumpsuits give. The ruffle is attached to the middle of the right butt cheek, which I don't mine, but I can see that part not being loved by all.
Loved it but working from home now so returned it without wearing it
For someone with curves and is on the shorter size, this was so pretty! And at 5'4", the petite was the perfect length.

links_Review_Title: Great fit up top, but way too short in the legs.
links_Review_Text: This outfit fit really nicely throughout the shoulders and waist and butt. However it was so short that it totally made it look like it was for a child.

links_Review_Title: Great for those with shorter torsos.
links_Review_Text: I really wanted to like this, and for the most part I did, but I have a fairly long torso and the jumpsuit was too short in the body to fit comfortably. Otherwise it was of really nice quality. I wish I could have worn it!
I have remarkably short legs - this fit without needing to tape the hem! It was really flattering and very fun for formal work meetings.
I wore this to work and loved the forgiving/ flattering fabric. It's an easy outfit for either a dinner out or work. Will rent again.
Luxurious fabric but too short with heels (even in the long length option). Other than tugging at the bottom of the pant all night - it was a perfect fit.

This dress is so soft and absolutely enchanting. I ordered it for my COVID 19 music videos and it was perfect for "Used to be Mine" from Waitress. I would wear this to the #park #daytimedate #familyreunion #brunch I'm an hour glass and hugged in all the right places. Little low in the front, so if you don't mind that it's a perfect dress

links_Review_Title: Absolutely beautiful! Grown up Disney princess
links_Review_Text: The color of this dress is absolutely stunning, the material is soft and beautiful and flows perfectly over the body, the yellow embroidery is literally perfection. I wore it to work one day during COVID Restrictions since all of the restaurants and normal places I would wear this are closed. I literally cannot even walk down the hallway without someone giving me a compliment. One of the ladies at work even told me I looked like Elsa from frozen LOL. It's so pretty and ladylike! Rent it!!!
Such a gorgeous dress that was both sexy and delicately sweet. Wore this for my birthday dinner and people couldn't take their eyes off this dress! Had a vintage feel and was flattering throughout.

Wore this to a Halloween party with a 60s slumber party theme! It was so comfortable and so gorgeous - love the color and the shape of the dress. I got many compliments on it. Definitely recommend this one!

Renting this to wear on vacation in Morocco. Was looking for something that was modest and cute and this did the trick. Had to wear a cami underneath otherwise it would have been way too much cleavage. The fabric of the dress is luxe and silky but beware it can be static-y
This felt like a fabulous 70's silk pajama gown. I got asked if my grandmother saved me all her pretty dresses when I wore this. It was really unique.

So loved this dress. Wanted to purchase it. The color, fabric, and detail was lovely. It had a vintage feel to it which on the reviews some called grandmotherly. I had women and men stop me on the street to compliment the dress. I would rent this again and again!

links_Review_Title: Very unique and also comfy! Lots of compliments!
links_Review_Text: Beautiful material and embroidery. Wore with adidas.

This will not go under the radar, also, happened to wander into the local public library with my kids and was apparently mistaken for a Disney Princess and made to read a story for everyone, however it is really fun to wear. Prettier without an undershirt but I made it PG and wore one. Caveat - Does not come with talking birds and tailor mice but you might find yourself batting those eyelashes more frequently with this one.

links_Review_Title: Pretty, Very Low Cut, Wrinkles Easy
links_Review_Text: I rented this to wear for my birthday dinner. It came out of the bag already slightly wrinkled. The dress was cut such that I couldn't wear a bra without it showing. Also, this fabric has absolutely no give, so make sure you have the correct size. Otherwise, a very beautiful, very detailed dress.
I'm usually a size 4 in Saloni and this dress fit great. Shows quite a bit of cleavage. The yellow appliqué is somewhat itchy on your chest. Loved this dress.

This dress definitely runs true to size, I wanted a size 6, but they only had a size 8, so after wearing it once it was a bit too stretched out. This dress is absolutely stunning. Not a normal color I would traditionally wear, but it is so insanely figure flattering, and the color looked really beautiful on. It is cleavagey, so if you're not comfortable showing cleavage, maybe not the dress best dress for you. I got a ton of compliments on it.

links_Review_Title: Absolutely stunning details. Very classy and a standout piece. I may even rent again
Get ready for so many DMs asking about this dress
links_Review_Text: A little more "grandma-esque" IRL but styled correctly and you'll get so many compliments.

links_Review_Title: Just a night out with friends
links_Review_Text: Dress fits very well. I rented it just for the weekend. Silk charmeuse is such a nice material. It hugs your body in the right way, very soft to the touch and very airy. The dress has a good length and can be appropriate for work, cocktails, wedding or just weekend. I highly recommend this dress.

links_Review_Title: Loved it except for the sleeves. Might try again this fall with a shirt on top.
links_Review_Text: This fit great and had a silk lining for the top, not synthetic. I felt the puffy sleeves weren’t an asset for me but I liked wearing a tied button-up over it. That rules out the breezy summer wear so I might try again to see how I like it this fall.

There are a lot of good points about this dress. It's flattering to the bust, waist and hips. I wore a bralette underneath. It's lightweight and only lined on top. Great slit in front. On the negative side, the embroidery is very itchy and uncomfortable against the skin. The arm fit me well but could be tight on some. Quality is lacking for a dress in this price point. I sized down from a 12 to a 10. Good choice for short term wear! See more of my style and connect with me on Instagram @the_things_she_wore
wear it everyday if u want to live your best life.

I wore this to a "garden party"-style rehearsal dinner and the title of my post is a direct quote from another guest. Because it was difficult to adjust the low cut of the dress with dress tape, I wore a bra with pretty jewel detail in the middle for anyone taller than me to appreciate though I think I was actually the only one who noticed! I loved this dress so much, I would definitely rent this beauty again.
Chest area was a little big but I could still wear it and it didn't look too weird. Silky and light. It looks really like Jasmine's new costume and a lot of people recognized who i was bounding as.

I didn't end up wearing this one because it runs large and the bust area was a little loose and low cut. However, it's a really beautiful (but shiny) material and, in the right size, could be pretty for the right occasion.
Adored this dress! So comfy and beautiful. Only weird thing is that it bags a little in the chest area.
Little big and a lot of cleavage but lots of compliments
Gorgeous. Very easy to wear.
Very flattering cut dress, but you have to be ok with the puffy sleeves look - very prairie. True to size.

This dress is beautiful, unique, and stylish. It's 100% silk so it would get a little clingy. I sometimes wear an 8 but felt this size was perfect! I received so many compliments--the sign of a great rental!

The color of the dress is beautiful and the yellow embroidery adds a nice touch. However I feel the puff shoulders gives this dress a very stylist grandma feel and the inside of the embroidery is very itchy on my body.

I made a review but forgot to upload a photo. Get this dress!!! It's stunning and timeless. I felt so confident in it!!! I think I needed a size smaller bc I have a small torso but the double sided tape made everything ok.
This dress is flattering and very pretty. I got lots of compliments and I loved that I didn’t need special undergarments! I wore this one in a 6.

The color of this dress is so sweet, and the embroidered flowers are the perfect touch! This dress can be dressed up or down to suit any occasion. The puffed sleeve is just right, and does not overwhelm my already broad shoulders.
