I really wanted to love this dress because the color is beautiful and I love the embroidered yellow detailing. However, I found this dress to be odd-fitting. It's quite small in the arms/shoulders (I don't usually have this problem with clothes and am pretty well-proportioned) and it is very low cut in the front. I did not wear it.

I didn't end up wearing this dress because I needed a size larger, but I planned on dressing it down with sneakers and a jean jacket. Love the slight prairie vibes. I'll consider reordering in the spring or summer.

Very pretty lightweight dress. Received a lot of compliments. It's made of silk with very intricate embroidery. This embroidery scratched my skin , but otherwise a comfortable dress. Maybe need to wear a slip underneath (but that may take away the airiness of the dress)

links_Review_Title: Lovely dress can be wearing everywhere
links_Review_Text: It looks fancy but it can also be an everyday dress. Very nice color and fits great on me.
This is a great dress, and perfect for a date. Very low cut though and prone to static cling
The front is cut too low for work as well as the slit is quite high. Gorgeous dress, received a lot of compliments
Good fit. Nice hemline.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful but dressier than I expected
links_Review_Text: Didn't realize the dress was silk - loved the fit and the colors but it wasn't quite what I had in mind. Regardless I got tons of compliments on it.
This dress is super flattering very pretty I wore to work
Like everyone said, it runs large. The cups have this extra baggage to it thats odd. It might fit better if I get a size smaller but I didn't wear it out.

This dress is gorgeous and the medium fit like a glove (34-29-39). The only issue was length. I'm 5' and needed to tape up the bottom, but once I did it was perfect. This dress is very comfortable and very flattering to curves.

links_Review_Title: I didn't follow my gut and allowed my friend to convince me dress looked good when I tried it on.
links_Review_Text: It was too fitted for my body and age. I'm 5'4 1/2" and weigh 130. I didn't wear it and am glad because I would have felt undignified. On a tall slim woman it would probably be very nice.
Classy with flair. True to size fit. Cons: Revealing bust

links_Review_Title: Looking put together as the dress complimented everything
links_Review_Text: Fit like a glove, loved it!

links_Review_Title: So much better than the photos portray
links_Review_Text: I LOVE this dress... way more than I thought I would in fact. The bustier style top was very flattering for my small bust, even without a bra. The silhouette accentuated my curves in all the right ways. It was comfortable for the most part, albeit a bit snug around the rib cage. And it was easy to accessorize. I felt beautiful, elegant, sexy, tasteful, chic, and, importantly, comfortable all night long. Highly recommend.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress - elegant but still interesting and unique!
links_Review_Text: This dress was perfect! Good quality and stunning without being flashy. If I rented again I would make sure to wear slightly taller heels (2+ inches) or some sort of wedge heel - at 5'6" the medium was a tiny bit long and I was worried the spike of my shoe would catch the lace on the bottom.
Sooo beautiful and classy for black tie. Fit perfectly and comfortable without a bra

Loved it!!! I ended up needing the backup size, the large. I'm a size 6 jeans but my boobs are big so the large was needed. I couldn't wear a bra with it, which was ok but I felt like my boobs were coming out a little bit. The only part that bothered me was the stitched cups on the top that were clearly made for an A cup girl. My boobs did not fit in that stitched outline and I kinda had to tuck them in which looked weird in bright lighting. Was showered in compliments tho! Such great quality.

links_Review_Title: Exactly what I expected, tons of compliments!
links_Review_Text: This dress was so comfortable, it hugged all the right places and was the perfect length. I'm 5'6 and the regular was just right with 3 inch heels. I also got a ton of compliments!

Seriously loved the fit and material in this dress. I rented for a winter black tie wedding and it was perfect. The M fit nicely but the L gave me a little more room to be comfortable so I opted for the L. Loved the adjustable straps, the skirt is absolutely gorgeous and super thick. If you need a floor length dress go with this!

links_Review_Title: Great dress! Felt good, good structure and classy design.
links_Review_Text: A bit snug at closure, but I have a fairly broad back. It wasn't too tight.. A bit long also, wearing a modest heel - I'm 5'3 and wore the SR. SP might have been better or a taller heel.

I LOVED this dress! So flattering and fit like a glove in the best way. The top is corseted slightly which is great because I didn't have to wear a bra. Also the straps are adjustable which is excellent. The fit runs a little small per the fit guidelines -- I'm so glad I went with the S vs. the XS which was also recommended (I usually wear a 4). Wore the SL which was perfect with a 2-3 inch heel and my height (I'm 5'8")

This dress was the perfect length with 3 inch heels. Bra and spanx are optional because there is boning in the bodice, and the lace skirt overlay provides almost full coverage of your belly and lower half. I felt comfortable eating and dancing all night long. However, there is only minimal stretch to this dress, so sometimes I felt restricted when sitting or doing certain dance moves. I would not recommend this as a maternity option.

links_Review_Title: Perfect dress for a black tie event!
links_Review_Text: Just beautiful without being over the top.
Fit like a glove. Would rent again.

Loved wearing this dress for my anniversary dinner! Really great for curvy girls that want to show off their figure. I'm a true 4 and the small was a little snug up top, and felt a little stiff to sit in, but it was worth it. :) The dress is very thick material, great for winter. Definitely recommend!
Fit amazing and very comfortable. I'm 5'1 and wore regular height heels... the length was PERFECT.

links_Review_Title: Perfect for black tie New Year's Eve party!
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress - fit well and felt glamorous!

Very comfortable dress that looked beautiful for a formal New Year's Eve party. The XS was a little tight in the chest and was too short to wear 3" heels, I'm 5'5. The SM was more comfortable and the perfect length.
I wore this to a formal winter wedding. It was a little tight on the chest but I received so many compliments throughout the night. I loved it!

This gown is even prettier in person than in the photo online! The gold is a gold lace pattern. I wore this to a holiday winter wedding and it was perfect! The style is so flattering and it was super comfortable. Thicker material and great quality. Highly recommend!

links_Review_Title: Stunning gown ! Got a ton of compliments .
links_Review_Text: Straps are adjustable which is a wonderful feature .
The fit was amazing. It was different than your typical black dress. Yes, it is heavy but it didn't bother me at all. Perfect for the cold weather. Very comfortable. Would definitely recommend.

links_Review_Title: This dress was perfect for a ball I was attending, so glamours!
links_Review_Text: This dress fit perfectly. The gold applique was stunning and I loved the straps on the dress.

links_Review_Title: Dress is lovely. Prettier in person in my opinion, sometimes the bottom got washed out in photos
links_Review_Text: I have a wide ribcage and the dress was tight there, but too big in the chest/shoulders. Luckily straps are adjustable. Dress was very pretty and I wanted to love it, but I think it may look/feel better on other ladies who are less broad up top!

links_Review_Title: It fit so nice and everyone loved it!
links_Review_Text: Fit perfect!

links_Review_Title: Ordered as a backup and did not wear to event.
links_Review_Text: I ordered this dress as a backup and didn't end up wearing it because I couldn't zip it up all the way. The zipper was hard to use in general thanks to the applique skirt, but my real struggle was the bodice. The chest was extremely tight, even with the straps loosened, and I'm not a particularly busty girl (34B). Even without the dress fully zipped, I struggled to breathe in it. Definitely size up!
The purple is a deeper purple than my photo. Wore to two different cocktail parties as well as under a suit for work. Best to wear a black bra underneath.
This super stylish top is a wow. Wore for Thanksgiving and for an art gallery event. Wish I'd had more occasions to wear. It's not something you see everyday. Beware -- it's sheer in the back.
Able to dress up or down. Runs small. Very pretty and looks way more purple in real life than the photo

links_Review_Title: i feel so pretty in this top!
links_Review_Text: fits great, modest and full coverage while still sexy. I liked it so much that i purchased it!
Attractive but a little sheer in the back

I rented this for a night out with the hubs, but didn't wear it. I sized up (ordered an XL) based on other reviews, and it was still too tight and too short, and kept riding up. The back is also completely sheer, which I didn't realize, so I would have had to wear a cami underneath.
Fitted shirt; great color; wore with skinny jeans; very flattering
Nice shirts to wear under jacket for work

links_Review_Title: Saw my sisters for the first time in a while.
links_Review_Text: Very cute! I have a long waist and it didn't show my belly button.

This top is on the tighter size, but the layering and pull of the fabric make it very flattering. It is pretty sheer even though the middle, which I didn’t expect based on the pictures. There was no way I could wear it without a cami underneath. Loved the color, sort of a mix between a dark blue and purple.
Pretty feminine shirt - loved the deep purple color

links_Review_Title: It is much more purple than the pic!
links_Review_Text: I didn't end you wearing this because the color is bright purple and it didn't look great on me. Aside from the color it is a very pretty top

This blouse is such a beautiful color, but it is a deep purple best seen during the day light hours. I had no occasion to wear during the day to let it really shine! This would look beautiful under a suit or with slacks for business. It covers up, but commands attention. I recommend this blouse!

Really enjoyed this top. It's form-fitting (yet stretchy). The color is both deep and bright purple. Worn with light grey pants. The back and sleeves are see through but are thicker than typical see through fabric. Still appropriate for work with a tank underneath or with a blazer.
Perfect.

What a GREAT shirt. I'm 26 weeks pregnant, and I wore this for work, and for every day. Definitely see-through, and definitely want to wear it in cooler weather because the material does not wick away sweat, even though it's light. Beautiful color; straight up 90s vibe, which I love.

links_Review_Title: Right idea, but misses the mark
links_Review_Text: Color is more purple than navy. The swooping material on the front is nice, but the back and sides highlight love handles and rolls. Not an issue with a blazer, but would not wear without a top layer for myself.

I rented from the store and wore a large, which fit fine. If I was wearing again I would probably go for a medium. The fabric and details are sleek looking. This could be worn for work, a night out or a more formal event depending on how it's styled.
Didn't expect this to be completely sheer in the back -- definitely not for every day as the bra would show through. Material is also a little itchy.

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous color and style but a little frumpy
links_Review_Text: I loved the color and style of the dress but it was definitely a bit frumpy. I wore it to my daughter's birthday party so it was fine to be frumpy there but I wouldn't have worn it out at night or anything. It was comfortable and good quality but not super flattering.
Great Summery dress, comfortable and bright!

links_Review_Title: Got several compliments on the fun color!
links_Review_Text: My ideal size wasnt available so I had to size up and it was baggy in the chest. I would definitely size down! Pretty color, great for spring or summer if you want to stand out in the crowd!

I'm obsessed with this girly, summery, fabric. Super cute dressed up or down. Color is perfect. The fit is true to size. I probably wouldn't have liked this as much a few months ago with a post baby belly... it's pretty fitted. I don't think this style would work for a baby bump either. Overall a winner!
Fits true to size! Great material and very comfortable.
Loved everything about this dress. Sturdy, thick material with stretch so super comfortable. The waist band hits at just the right spot and the sleeves are so cute.
Very breathable fabric! Loved the fit and look. I got a ton of compliments
Such a cute sundress that you can dress up or down. Love the elastic waist, and the length is good for taller women!
I went to the grocery store and someone stopped me to tell me that this was the best dress they have ever seen. I loved everything about it!
Fit perfectly, beautiful color, tons of compliments! Wish I could afford to buy it, definitely will rent it again!

This dress was wonderful. It was very comfortable. There are no snaps/zippers/buttons; it just slips on over your head. It is lined on the bottom half but not the top. The cinch hit me in the right spot. It is a little oversized and probably not all that flattering on a size 12, but I still felt happy in it. It's the color of sunshine and it brought a smile to my face. I wore it to work and may keep it for the weekend for a party.
I loved this dress for church and brunch. Would rent it again tomorrow! The length was great and the material was very nice. The chest was a little big for me, but it wasn't noticeable.

links_Review_Title: Adorable dress in stunning color yellow
links_Review_Text: Very easy fit, true to size. Loved the ease for dinner with the girls.

This dress was great. I loved how loose and comfortable it was. The material was very breathable and perfect for Florida weather. I got so many compliments and totally lived up to my nickname "Sunshine" in this. Next time I would definitely size down it had a lot of room even though I'm busty. It might be a little more flattering in a smaller size.
Absolutely beautiful color. I'm normally a size 2 and could have worn a zero. Very voluminous skirt for my petite frame. Definitely recommend for someone taller. Could be dressed up or down.

links_Review_Title: Super cute and comfortable cotton dress!
links_Review_Text: This cotton dress is great. It has a stretchy waist that makes it easy to fit and comfy to wear. The skirt is lined. The only drawback is that it does not have pockets. Otherwise fantastic dress!
Love this one! Huge compliments and fun to wear. Would rent again!

I wore this more than one day on my Vegas vacation. It worked in many environments and was comfortable. I usually wear an 8, but liked the 10 for the extra length. The embroidery is very cute and this looks expensive.
This dress was great because of the smocking which allowed it to fit better. The details were beautiful, length was perfect, color was amazing! Very tempted to purchase!

This dress is amazing! I wore it for Mother’s Day brunch and church. I loved it and received multiple compliments. The color is beautiful. It definitely fits a tad large, as most Tory dresses do, but I wore my usual size 6. (Between size 6/8 at the moment) Could have definitely gone down a size but I loved the flowy fit and length - for this reason, I would rent the same size if I rented again. The cinched waist area still gives nice shape to a flowy dress. I wish I could keep it but I’ll definitely rent again!

Easy to wear and a nice bright yellow standout color make this a fun rental. It runs large in my opinion, I'm 120lbs, 5'7" athletic shaped and the size 2 felt big in the top half especially. The sleeves are a bit too heavy of a material for the flutter shape which adds to the feeling it runs big, but still super cute and mostly comfortable.

My first impressions of this dress was that I looked like a rich kid socialite going to brunch or something - butttt ended up loving it. Wore to work, casual ish dinner, & on Mother's Day since I had it for a month as part of my RTR update. Really ended up loving it... Flattering and looks expensive. If you are between sizes I would size down since the top is pretty loose, but it's probably supposed to be that way.

links_Review_Title: Versatile dress for almost any occasion!
links_Review_Text: I went a size up just to make sure it fit on my hips. I could wear my true to size since the waist band is stretchy and it's a flow dress. Got a lot of complements from women walking by. Definitely recommend!
Super baggy in the chest. I pulled it down to try to minimize the unflattering "poof" factor. Beautiful, sunny color combo.
This dress was much heavier and shapeless in person. The bust area was at least two sizes too big and the elastic waist wasn't strong enough to give any definitive shape. Sent back without wearing.
This was a back-up dress since RTR didn't have the dress I wanted in size L. It was very cute on, very comfortable, and very flattering. Lots of compliments!
I got compliments ALL DAY! So comfy, so cute and I wore three times!
Color is bright! You can dress this up or down!

This dress is very cute! I received several compliments at the first event I wore it to (even from the host!). It's light/cool and comfortable and just long enough. It also has a lined skirt so you don't need to worry about your underwear showing through.
So many compliments. I think I may have to buy this one!

I have a bump (and I'm not pregnant) at the bottom but a thin torso and this dress was VERY bump friendly!! It accents the torso with the middle elastic and flares out enough to cover the bump. Perfect length.

links_Review_Title: The color was fun for Easter
links_Review_Text: The cut was kinda. If and somewhat frumpy. Wore once for a Easter picnic and sent back. Nothing really made me feel special.

links_Review_Title: Wanted to love it, but it was just ok for me
links_Review_Text: I really wanted to love this dress. It looked so cute in other reviews, but the fit wasn't quite right on me. I'm not sure exactly what it was, but it felt matronly. It also was extremely wrinkled, which is unusual for RTR.

This dress is detailed and well-made. I got lots of compliments on it. It kind of hid my waist but still I felt good in it, and the color couldn't be beat for summer. It is kind of heavy and bulky which doesn't factor into wearing so much as for packing (if you are planning to take it somewhere).

links_Review_Title: Got tons of compliments. Yellow can be a hard color to wear but this dress worked well.
links_Review_Text: Very comfortable and flattering
I love this dress...reminds you of spring and vacation at the same time....
I would rent this again. It is absolutely beautiful. I ordered a size down and it fit but I think a true size would have looked better.

links_Review_Title: I was hoping to wear this to work, but it felt a little "much." I wore it to a pool party instead.
links_Review_Text: Nice coverage on legs and arms. Pretty color. You can tell it's high quality. The material is thick and sturdy while also breathing.
Runs large in the chest, otherwise a beautiful dress
I bought this dress because it was so comfortable and versatile and flattering.

Love this dress. The wrap feature makes it customizable to your waist size, and the bottom ruffles are so fun. The chest is billowy, like everyone says. I'll use fashion tape for the event I'm going to, but I think if I had a bigger chest it would be a little scandy.

I got so many compliments on this dress! It felt dressy enough for a summer wedding, and I loved the way it slimmed me and outlined my curves. I will say that the neckline does gape some, I just used some fabric tape though. I wouldn't recommend for girls with smaller busts, but it fit my body in a great way. Loved this dress!

As other reviewers noted, the dress runs a bit large, but since only the 8 was available, I ordered it anyway. The bust was loose, but I was able to secure it closed with a small safety pin and wore it anyway. Loved the fabric and color, will definitely rent again, but next time in a smaller size.

links_Review_Title: Wanted to love but top was large
links_Review_Text: I love this dress. The material is comfortable and structured. The style is so pretty. The straps are nice and wide. But unfortunately the wrapped top didn't lay right and it gaped. I could wear without a bra but it's just too loose then. With a bra, even my lowest cut bra, it shows a lot. Maybe a size down would have fixed this problem. Either way, I didn't wear it.

links_Review_Title: Cute cut but a bit roomy...
links_Review_Text: This was a cute dress but could have had a bit more edge to balance out the floral print.

The colors were a bit orange for my taste, and the fit is large overall. I think if I would have worn the 0, I would have been happier with the silhouette. Wore a jean jacket over it because it was chilly. Cute, but have to get the right size or it's just meh.

links_Review_Title: This dress is really sweet and fun! It can be dressed up or dressed down.
links_Review_Text: I layered this with a sweater and long trench for a more casual look and to keep warmer. My favorite part of this dress was the ruffled, feminine bottom.

Gorgeous print and comfortable fit (thanks to the adjustable belt); I even had a bit of room in my typical size. The texture of the fabric was heavier than I expected, but it wasn't stifling, even in the summer heat. Love the flounce at the hem!
It is cute, but the material is weird and not very Foley. Hard to rewear. It made me look a little larger than I am. Fit was comfortable.

Dress is light-weight wrap dress w slightly crisp feel to fabric. Runs slightly big, so I sized down one size and it was perfect. Has inside tie at knee level to keep dress from coming open. Loved the flouncy hem at the bottom.
Very cute wrap dress, can easily dress it up or down. It ran much bigger than expected though, I usually wear a 2/4 and would have been far more comfortable in the 0 than the 2 in this.

links_Review_Title: Everyone shop assistant in LA commented they liked my dress.
links_Review_Text: The top was way too big.
So easy and fun! Perfect for that in between summer and fall time when the weather still calls for a dress but you're wanting to wear those wonderful orange and yellows. :)
I'm a short person but this dress with a pair of heels made me feel 6' tall! The colors are beautiful for a summer/fall event, I could wear a regular bra, and the ruffles were too cute!

links_Review_Title: I wore this dress for engagement pictures and it was PERFECT!
links_Review_Text: This dress was so flattering! It fit in all the right places. It's stylish yet classy. The material of the dress was thicker/sturdier than expected, and it appeared to be of very high quality. I absolutely loved this dress and have received so many compliments on it!

links_Review_Title: Pretty autumnal dress, perfect for fall.
links_Review_Text: This was my first Rent the Runway dress and I'm now hooked. I wore this dress to an outside September wedding on a horse farm in Virginia. The autumn colors and floral pattern were perfect. I'm 5'2 and I probably haven't worn a long dress since my own wedding because I didn't think I could pull the length off, but I loved how this fit. The only downside was the top part was a little too long/big for me, but I bought some fashion tape and it worked great. The dress is not lined, so I wore a slip underneath. I love this dress and would definitely recommend it.
Love the feel of the fabric. The ruffles on the bottom are fun and move around a lot. Perfect for a summer day at the office.

LOVED this rental. Wore it to a work meeting and rehearsal dinner I attended. Multiple people complimented it and I felt super confident and comfortable in it. Would size down next time and consider purchasing!

This dress was flattering and comfy. It was also breezy enough that I wasn't dying in the Texas heat. It absolutely needed fashion tape to keep the front in place, but other than that it was a easy fun dress to wear.
Was pleasantly surprised with the lightness of this fabric! It was special without being flashy and the colors felt very 1970s to me. Loved it!
One of my favs thus far
Loved this dress! Would def purchase. Comfy and pretty ! Makes you feel like "lady" literally got compliments at the post office , bank and Grocery store.
I normally wear a size 2 or 4 in dresses and the 2 fit perfectly. The material is a very light cotton and perfect for warm weather. A great dress for any casual daytime event.
The cutoff this dress is very flattering. The detail of the skirt really makes it stand out. Great colors and comfortable fit. Will rent again!

This dress was really pretty and I received a lot of compliments. I paured it with nude mules and a neutral colored leather jacket. However, it did take a few safety pins so keep the top from opening up too much. I'm a 34B and I have a short torso. I think it would work better with someone who's torso is a little longer. I wouldnt rent it again, but it was great for the party I went to at a wine bar.

This dress was so fun to wear and very comfortable. I wore it casually on vacation but it could definitely be dressed up. I think it would've fit better on someone with a larger bust (I'm a 36B and I felt as though I wasn't filling it out on top). As a result, I had to wear a tank underneath. I would definitely recommend it, but if you're small on top you may want to size down.
Pattern is perfect for Fall. Long enough to be worn with booties for fall shoe warm. Top was so flattering- perfect amount of revealing and sleeves were flattering on arms. Loved this so much
Wore this to a nice dinner at our resort in Mexico and it was perfect. Very romantic and great with large hoop earrings and espadrilles. I am usually a 2 but the 0 in this was perfect.
I liked that this is a wrap style so I could tighten the waist to suit my body. The fabric is light weight, and I was comfortable in the dress for all day wear.
The best dress ever. Can dress up or down and fit like a glove. Great light material. Beautiful pattern.

Fun dress to wear wine tasting! It was an easy, comfy dress yet stylish. I wore it wine tasting and it was a hot day but the dress kept me cool. I had fun wearing it. I didn't get any full length pics of me in it but here is me sitting. I have a fuller bust and had not issues and loved that I could wear a normal bra.

links_Review_Title: Plenty of room on top, easily adjustable at the waist
links_Review_Text: A goodbye to summer, and hello to fall dress. Iovely dress for hourglass figures
Really nice, easy to wear, if you are in between sizes size down.

I absolutely loved the dress. I'm in between sizes and I thought a larger than usual would look better since my breasts are just super big (when I gain weight they're usually the first to increase in size). It runs LARGE so I suggest you stick to your size or even go a step-down. The wrap around feature is very flattering but if the dress runs too big the armholes and the breast front would flare out and expose you. I still enjoyed it and it made feel super girlie!

The wrap fit is really flattering and the fabric is light and comfy. Got complimented a couple times for the fun colors and shape! Would rent again. As noted by previous reviewers, fashion tape came in handy to wrangle the top from being too low.
Loved this dress! Perfect for a more casual party and fit well due to the wrap nature of it. Not too heavy at all and a great length. Highly recommend!
Cute dress it felt a little matronly for me. So I won't likely rent again but served its purpose as a day dress for work.

What a wonderful dress! Got a ton of compliments when I wore this to a conference + dinner. The ruffle and wrap are surprisingly flattering, and the belt is adjustable for comfort. I have a smaller chest so I wish I sized down as the down was a bit billowy on me. Rent this !!

links_Review_Title: Loved the fit and the print!
links_Review_Text: The dress runs a little loose so you may want to size lower than higher when you order. The waist tie lets you adjust to the right waist size. The dress did make me look very tall and I got quite a few compliments for this dress. I wore it for a party at my friend's place. The overlap of the dress is pretty good so even when there's wind, the flying of the dress wasn't bad. Very easy to wear and light weight, a nice dress to wear in summer. I felt the neck was a little deep so pinned it up in place. Easy to wear and definitely a dress I would rent again!
